msg: Lord brother.
msg_zh: 哥哥。

msg: I'm going to be a god.
msg_zh: 我一定会成为神祇。

msg: If we honour our part of the vow,
msg_zh: 所以说，如果我们实现约定，

msg: promise me you'll be my consort.
msg_zh: 请你成为我的王。

msg: I'll make the world a gentler place.
msg_zh: ……我想打造一个温柔的世界。

msg: O Horn-deck'd beast, from higher sphere deliver'd.
msg_zh: 噢，角之兽啊，神兽啊──

msg: O Horn-deck'd beast, from higher sphere deliver'd.
msg_zh: ……噢，角之兽啊，神兽啊……

msg: Take root inside the tower's sculpted keepers.
msg_zh: 栖宿于塔之子，勇人们的体内，

msg: We beg of thee to dance and cavort.
msg_zh: ……为了我等、舞动吧……

msg: And perch'd within, we beg of thee; rise.
msg_zh: 为了我等舞动吧。

msg: And with the beauty of thy grand display...
msg_zh: ……舞得绚丽、舞得华美……

msg: Dance and cavort, cleanse all that thou wilt.
msg_zh: 舞得绚丽、舞得华美，净化一切吧──

msg: Cleanse away the foulness fate imposed.
msg_zh: ……净化、厄运吧……

msg: Cruelty, woe, and those who plague the tower.
msg_zh: 净化厄运、恶贼、塔的仇敌……

msg: Cleanse away the strumpet's vile progeny.
msg_zh: ……净化那群、恶妇之子……！

msg: Cleanse away the strumpet's vile progeny.
msg_zh: 净化那群恶妇之子！

msg: My loyal blade. And champion of the festival.
msg_zh: 我的锋刃，以及祭典的英雄啊。

msg: Both your deeds will ever be praised in song.
msg_zh: 你们奋战的轨迹，将被永世传唱。

msg: Now, the vow will be honoured, and my Lord brother's soul will return.
msg_zh: 如今约定履行，强大灵魂即将归来──

msg: So that he may be my consort.
msg_zh: 成为我的王。

msg: I hereby swear.
msg_zh: 我在此宣誓：

msg: Lord brother.
msg_zh: ……哥哥。

msg: To every living being, and every living soul.
msg_zh: 所有的生命，所有的灵魂啊，

msg: At long last, you are returned.
msg_zh: 你终于回来了。

msg: Now comes the age of our eden.
msg_zh: 接下来即将迈入乐园时代──

msg: If you have known sin, if you grieve for this world,
msg_zh: 如果你对罪孽知情，并为世界烦忧──

msg: A thousand year voyage guided by compassion.
msg_zh: 将遵循温柔的法则，开始千年的旅程。

msg: Tarnished one.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊。

msg: Beginning here, love encompasses all.
msg_zh: 众生啊，唯独思考爱吧──

msg: Aspiring Lord of the old order.
msg_zh: 老旧律法之王啊。

msg: No living thing will be denied, no deed censured.
msg_zh: 那不因人、不因事排拒，也不问罪过的存在。

msg: If you have known sin, if you grieve for this world,
msg_zh: 如果你对罪孽知情，并为世界烦忧──

msg: I am ready. To embrace the whole of it.
msg_zh: 我将怀抱众生万物。

msg: then yield the path forward to us.
msg_zh: 就请你让出路来。

msg: Let us go together.
msg_zh: ……一起走吧。

msg: To I, Miquella,
msg_zh: 那条路由我米凯拉──

msg: Radahn, my promised consort.
msg_zh: 拉塔恩──我约定的王啊。

msg: and my promised consort, Radahn.
msg_zh: 以及我约定的王，拉塔恩前行。

msg: Mongrel intruder.
msg_zh: ……无礼的入侵者。

msg: Thou'rt Tarnished, it seemeth.
msg_zh: 是褪色者啊。

msg: Mother, wouldst thou truly Lordship sanction,
msg_zh: 母亲，您真的把为王之任……

msg: in one so bereft of light?
msg_zh: 交付无光者了？

msg: Yet...my purpose standeth unchanged.
msg_zh: ……即便如此，我的使命依旧。

msg: Those stripped of the Grace of Gold shall all meet death.
msg_zh: 对不受黄金赐福的，降下死亡……

msg: In the embrace of Messmer's flame.
msg_zh: 受梅瑟莫之火吞噬吧。

msg: Enough...
msg_zh: ……这么久了……

msg: I have endured...more than enough...
msg_zh: ……也都够了吧……

msg: I ask you forgive me, dearest Nanaya...
msg_zh: ……原谅我吧，娜娜亚。

msg: Ahhhhhh...
Ahh...
UnkText
Gah...hah...
I will not suffer...
msg_zh: ……绝不能发生……

msg: A lord devoid of light.
msg_zh: ……怎能让无光者、当上王？

msg: O mother, forgive me.
msg_zh: 母亲啊，请您原谅我。

msg: Grah!
A-Argh...
Gah... Phew...
Soon, Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊。

msg: Wilt thou be taken in the jaws...
msg_zh: 受吞噬吧──

msg: Of the abyssal serpent, shorn of light.
msg_zh: 无光的深渊之蛇等着你。

msg: Make Miquella stop...
Don't turn the poor thing into a god...
Godhood would be Miquella's prison.
A caged divinity...is beyond saving.
You must kill Miquella...
Grant him forgiveness.
UnkText
UnkText
Those stripped of the Grace of Gold shall all meet death.
msg_zh: 对不受黄金赐福的，降下死亡……

msg: In the embrace of Messmer's flame.
msg_zh: 受梅瑟莫之火吞噬吧。

msg: O lightless creature...
msg_zh: ……无光者啊……

msg: Embrace thine oblivion, as shall I.
msg_zh: 一同步上毁灭之路吧。

msg: UnkText
UnkText
UnkText
UnkText
Mother... Marika...
msg_zh: ……吾母玛莉卡啊。

msg: A curse...upon thee...
msg_zh: 受诅咒吧……

msg: A-Ah!
Who art thou, stranger...?
msg_zh: 你是什么东西……？

msg: ...by the look of thee, another of Messmer's peons, methinks.
msg_zh: ……又是梅瑟莫的爪牙？

msg: Tell me, dost thy kind never weary grow?
msg_zh: ……你们都不烦腻吶？

msg: How do these old bones fascinate thee yet?
msg_zh: 还来找我老太婆做什么？

msg: Our lands were by thy kind set aflame, our tower by thy kind veiled in shadow.
msg_zh: 一把火烧了我们的土地，用影子藏住了塔──

msg: Thou cam'st, robbing us of all, spoiling all. Have ye not basked in these deeds long enough?
msg_zh: 都抢走、破坏我们的一切了，还嫌自己不够卑劣？

msg: Listen, progeny of the wanton strumpet.
msg_zh: ……你们这群恶妇之子，记住了。

msg: For thy sins thou shalt have thy recompense— the sacred beast shall unleash its ire.
msg_zh: 神兽之怒迟早会带来报应。

msg: Till then, with this old hag do what thou wilt, for all the good it'll do thee in the end!
msg_zh: 你们继续虐待我老太婆也无妨，等着大难临头吧！

msg: For what reason dost thou falter, villain?
msg_zh: ……快啊，动手。

msg: Enact thy sordid work with fullest pride.
msg_zh: 之后再去宣扬自己做了什么好事。

msg: Else tuck away thy tail and leave for good,
msg_zh: 没胆子就夹尾巴，滚吧。

msg: loathsome issue of the rotten strumpet!
msg_zh: 可恨的恶妇之子！

msg: Be gone!
msg_zh: ……滚出去！

msg: These lands were ours since times of old.
msg_zh: 自古以来，这里就是我们的土地！

msg: Well! 'Tis no surprise. Thou hast thy choice made!
msg_zh: 哼！又如何吶！

msg: Act as thou wilt, but still must I ask... Is killing me truly within thy pow'r?
msg_zh: 再来几遭，也杀不了我老太婆！

msg: Didst thou imagine I would beg thee cease?
msg_zh: 要我求饶，门儿都没有！

msg: Nay, nay, do what thou wilt to this poor soul!
msg_zh: 快啊，动手！继续动手！

msg: Heaven shall judge thee all for thy deeds!
msg_zh: 让上天看清楚！你们有多丑陋！

msg: Aaaaaargh!
msg_zh: 噫呀啊啊啊……

msg: A-Argh!
msg_zh: 噫！

msg: Again!
msg_zh: 什么东西！

msg: Messmer's peon come to plague me!
msg_zh: 又是梅瑟莫的爪牙？

msg: Act as thou wilt, but still must I ask... Is killing me truly within thy pow'r?
msg_zh: 再来几遭，也杀不了我老太婆！

msg: Didst thou imagine I would beg thee cease?
msg_zh: 要我求饶，门儿都没有！

msg: Nay, nay, do what thou wilt to this poor soul!
msg_zh: 快啊，动手！继续动手！

msg: Heaven shall judge thee all for thy deeds!
msg_zh: 让上天看清楚！你们有多丑陋！

msg: Aaaaaargh!
msg_zh: 噫呀啊啊啊……

msg: A curse upon thee, rotten miscreant.
msg_zh: ……受诅咒吧……

msg: A curse upon the strumpet's progeny, upon Marika's children each and all.
msg_zh: 恶妇之子、玛莉卡的孩子们……

msg: The curse of the omen shall strike thee down...
msg_zh: 全部蒙受不祥的诅咒吧……

msg: In the form of the sacred beast's ire.
msg_zh: 神兽之怒，降临吧……

msg: May the curse strike thee...
msg_zh: ……受诅咒吧……

msg: To the very last...
msg_zh: 你们全都受诅咒吧……

msg: Ah, such a joy to smell this scent again...
msg_zh: ……哦，这阵香气……

msg: Does a sculpted keeper stand before me?
msg_zh: 是勇人莅临了吶？

msg: Ohh!
msg_zh: 哦哦……

msg: As I felt the sacred beast's essence fade, a great anxiety welled up within.
msg_zh: 感应不到神兽的气息，婆婆我还在担心。

msg: Forgive this old woman her foolish fears!
msg_zh: 啊，幸好是多虑了吶。

msg: Tis such a relief, I cannot express.
msg_zh: 万幸、真的是万幸吶。

msg: After an eternity of the mind, our voices have at last reached the heavens.
msg_zh: 我们的祈求总算、总算是传到了天上。

msg: As evinced by thy gracious arrival.
msg_zh: 您来到了我们身边。

msg: Ohh! Ohhh!
msg_zh: 哦、哦哦……

msg: A-A-Ah, Ohhh!
I implore, vessel of the sacred beast...
msg_zh: ……勇人啊，神兽啊。

msg: Have my son accompany thee to war.
msg_zh: 请将吾儿带在身边。

msg: And dance thy dance of beauteous choler.
msg_zh: 请同理我等的愤怒，跳出绚丽的舞。

msg: Take vengeance upon Messmer and his lot.
msg_zh: 那群背叛我等，放火的玛莉卡之子──

msg: They who betrayed us, aye, they who burned us...
msg_zh: 梅瑟莫还有他的那群爪牙……

msg: Let them face in thy wrath their just deserts.
msg_zh: 求求您，对他们降下报应。

msg: My song will I sing...in service to thee.
msg_zh: 婆婆我愿意为您的舞，献上歌声。

msg: O Sculpted keeper, channel thy choler, into the most resplendent of dances.
msg_zh: ……勇人啊，请同理我等的愤怒，跳出绚丽的舞。

msg: My song will I sing...in service to thee.
msg_zh: 婆婆我愿意为您的舞，献上歌声。

msg: O Horn-deck'd beast, from higher sphere deliver'd.
msg_zh: ……角之兽啊，神兽啊，

msg: We beg of thee to dance and cavort.
msg_zh: 为了我等舞动吧。

msg: Dance and cavort, cleanse all that thou wilt.
msg_zh: 舞得绚丽、舞得华美，净化一切吧──

msg: Cruelty, woe, and those who plague the tower.
msg_zh: 净化厄运、恶贼、塔的仇敌……

msg: Cleanse away the strumpet's vile progeny.
msg_zh: 净化那群恶妇之子！

msg: Welcome,
msg_zh: ……哦哦，勇人啊。

msg: O glorious Sculpted Keeper.
msg_zh: 欢迎您来。

msg: Thou'rt kind indeed, to this aged crone.
msg_zh: 您居然为婆婆费心，真是感恩。

msg: Pardon me, my dear, where are my manners!
msg_zh: ……哦哦，对吶！

msg: Surely thou must hunger, O Sculpted Keeper?
msg_zh: 勇人啊，您的肚子饿不饿？

msg: I prithee, partake of this modest dish.
msg_zh: 您愿意的话，带走这份料理吧。

msg: Tis only plain fare, but sup to the lees, and it will surely grant thee ample vigour.
msg_zh: 虽是粗茶淡饭，补充精力却颇有奇效吶。

msg: Shouldst thou be by hunger's pangs beset, I implore thee, partake of my stew.
msg_zh: 饿的时候，拿刚才的炖煮料理填饱肚子吧。

msg: Thou'rt sure to feel thy vigour restored.
msg_zh: 那在补充精力上，颇有奇效吶。

msg: Though, if the flavour doth thy tongue offend, I care not if thou throwest it away.
msg_zh: ……但如果不合胃口，别介意，直接扔掉吧。

msg: Welcome,
msg_zh: ……哦哦，勇人啊。

msg: O glorious Sculpted Keeper.
msg_zh: 欢迎您来。

msg: What a joy it is to see thee again.
msg_zh: 婆婆很高兴看到您。

msg: Thou possessest yet my scorpion stew...
msg_zh: 您还带着婆婆煮的炖煮蝎子吶。

msg: The broth is mine own little invention. 'Tis palatable for quite the long while.
msg_zh: 那道料理的汤汁下了点工夫，能保存比较久。

msg: Shouldst thou be by hunger's pangs beset, I implore thee to partake of it.
msg_zh: 等您肚子饿了，再享用吧。

msg: I implore thee, partake of my stew, shouldst thou be by hunger's pangs beset.
msg_zh: 饿的时候，就拿炖煮料理填饱肚子吧。

msg: Thou'rt sure to feel thy vigour restored.
msg_zh: 那在补充精力上，颇有奇效吶。

msg: Though, if the flavour doth thy tongue offend, I care not if thou throwest it away.
msg_zh: ……但如果不合胃口，别介意，直接扔掉吧。

msg: Welcome,
msg_zh: ……哦哦，勇人啊。

msg: O glorious Sculpted Keeper.
msg_zh: 欢迎您来。

msg: What a joy it is to see thee again.
msg_zh: 婆婆很高兴看到您。

msg: Oh, I know...
msg_zh: 啊，对吶。

msg: Dost thou hunger, noble guest?
msg_zh: 勇人啊，您的肚子饿不饿？

msg: Prithee take with thee more scorpion stew.
msg_zh: 您愿意的话，带走婆婆煮的炖煮蝎子吧。

msg: I've an inkling thou might have need of more.
msg_zh: 婆婆心想您大概吃完了，所以事先准备了一些。

msg: I implore thee, partake of my stew, shouldst thou be by hunger's pangs beset.
msg_zh: 饿的时候，就拿炖煮料理填饱肚子吧。

msg: Thou'rt sure to feel thy vigour restored.
msg_zh: 那在补充精力上，颇有奇效吶。

msg: Though, if the flavour doth thy tongue offend, I care not if thou throwest it away.
msg_zh: ……但如果不合胃口，别介意，直接扔掉吧。

msg: Heavens! Great and gallant Sculpted Keeper!
msg_zh: ……哦哦，勇人啊。

msg: I know it in my bones...
msg_zh: 婆婆我是知情的──

msg: Thy deed is done!
msg_zh: 您完成了一件大事。

msg: A worthy deed no doubt, to bring our foes what surely was deserved recompense!
msg_zh: 您让那群仇敌受到了莫大的报应。

msg: Ohh! Ohhh!
msg_zh: 哦、哦哦……

msg: Heaven hath borne witness to our plight,
msg_zh: 上天将一切都看在眼里。

msg: thy gleaming wrath, and unparalleled dance.
msg_zh: 所以肯定也有看见您的愤怒，以及舞蹈。

msg: Though a trifle it might seem to thee, I have prepared a dish in celebration.
msg_zh: 婆婆准备了表示谢意的餐点。

msg: T'would please me much if thou might partake.
msg_zh: 来，请用。

msg: Partake, partake, until thou art sated.
msg_zh: 尽情享用吧。

msg: O Sculpted Keeper,
msg_zh: ……勇人啊。

msg: I offer my thanks.
msg_zh: 谢谢您。

msg: Thou danced with passing wrath and beauty, such that rightfully avenged we would be...
msg_zh: 您为了我等展现愤怒，跳出绚丽的舞蹈。

msg: I have never known such joy as this.
msg_zh: 这对我等来说，是无比的喜悦。

msg: UnkText
Sculpted Keeper,
msg_zh: ……勇人啊。

msg: O great and gallant Sculpted Keeper...
msg_zh: 啊啊，勇人啊。

msg: Wert thou by this old maid unduly push'd? Into facing such labours as thou didst?
msg_zh: 是不是婆婆我，把愿望强加在您身上？

msg: Has our grave resentment fettered thee?
msg_zh: 是不是我等的悲叹，束缚了您？

msg: With such bounteous fury didst thou dance...
msg_zh: 您为了我等那么尽力地愤怒、舞动……

msg: I cannot presume thou didst not suffer...
msg_zh: 所以，如果您感到痛苦，

msg: Please, I ask thee, allow thyself some rest.
msg_zh: 记得稍事休息吶。

msg: None of the tower would dare interfere.
msg_zh: 塔之民不会因此出言责备。

msg: And if one should, I'll see to them myself!
msg_zh: 要是有这种不识相的，还不看婆婆修理他一顿！

msg: Ha ha ha...
Apologies, O noble visitor.
msg_zh: ……勇人啊，对不起吶。

msg: But wouldst thou permit me a little rest?
msg_zh: 婆婆想休息一下。

msg: Mine eyes are oft apt to glaze over—the years taking their toll, 'tis plain to see.
msg_zh: 可能是年纪大了，发呆的时间也跟着多了。

msg: Even telling dream from reality...is a task increasingly beyond me...
msg_zh: 有时候会分不清楚是现实，还是在做梦吶。

msg: Apologies, O noble visitor...
msg_zh: ……对不起吶。

msg: But wouldst thou permit me a little rest...?
msg_zh: 婆婆、想休息、一下……

msg: Sculpted Keeper!
msg_zh: 勇人啊！

msg: What hath come over thee!
msg_zh: 您是怎么了？

msg: Look at me! I am not thine enemy!
msg_zh: 仇敌不在这里！

msg: Messmer and his sordid lot are elsewhere!
msg_zh: 梅瑟莫和他的爪牙，不在这里吶！

msg: Sculpted Keeper, art thou now becalmed?
msg_zh: ……冷静下来了吶？

msg: Worry not, thy deeds were not thine own.
msg_zh: 放宽心吧。

msg: Twas the thrashing rage of the sacred beast, spilling out from within thee, I am sure...
msg_zh: 您的心中常有神兽的怒气流窜，

msg: Tis bound to occur, once in a while...
msg_zh: 所以发生这种事，也是正常。

msg: See! I am just fine. No harm done at all.
msg_zh: 您看婆婆，婆婆平安无事，很强壮吶。

msg: I see thy purpose now! Clear as day!
msg_zh: ……哦哦，我明白了！

msg: A sacrifice thou wouldst make of me.
msg_zh: 这是要婆婆成为祭品吶。

msg: The sacred beast appeareth fully wroth, such tumult it wreaketh from within thee...
msg_zh: 因为神兽的怒气愈加高张了吶！

msg: Ohh! Ohhh!
msg_zh: 哦！哦哦！

msg: Feast upon these aged bones, sacred beast!
msg_zh: 神兽啊，吞噬我老太婆吧！

msg: Wolf down ev'ry crumb, and wax fully wroth!
msg_zh: 尽情吞噬、尽情愤怒吧！

msg: If this direful act serves the judgement thou shalt upon Marika's offspring loose—
msg_zh: 只要让玛莉卡之子受到莫大的报应，

msg: Then for thy cause will I gladly succumb!
msg_zh: 我老太婆没什么好留恋的吶！

msg: Aaaaaargh...
msg_zh: 噫呀啊啊啊……

msg: Sculpted Keeper!
msg_zh: 勇人啊！

msg: What hath come over thee!
msg_zh: 您是怎么了？

msg: I beg of thee, please halt thy hallowed hand!
msg_zh: 请您住手！

msg: Sculpted Keeper, art thou now becalmed?
msg_zh: ……冷静下来了吶？

msg: Worry not, thy deeds were not thine own.
msg_zh: 放宽心吧。

msg: Twas the thrashing rage of the sacred beast, spilling out from within thee, I am sure...
msg_zh: 您的心中常有神兽的怒气流窜，

msg: Tis bound to occur, once in a while...
msg_zh: 所以发生这种事，也是正常。

msg: See! I am just fine. No harm done at all.
msg_zh: 您看婆婆，婆婆平安无事，很强壮吶。

msg: O sacred beast...
msg_zh: ……哦哦，神兽啊。

msg: I see thy purpose now! Wax wroth to thy heart's content, wild and free.
msg_zh: 我明白，尽情发泄您的怒气吧。

msg: And then...
msg_zh: 只是，在这之后……

msg: In exchange for this woman's life...
msg_zh: 请您看在老太婆这条命的分上──

msg: Release the Sculpted Keeper from thy rage.
msg_zh: 放过勇人，让他从怒气中解脱吧。

msg: I ask thee at my last, O sacred beast...
msg_zh: 神兽啊，求求您了……

msg: O-Oh... Ohh...
msg_zh: ……呜、喔喔喔……

msg: O-Ohh! Ohhhhhh!
msg_zh: 喔喔喔喔喔喔！

msg: The pain... The pain!
msg_zh: 好疼！疼啊！

msg: My arms! My legs! Each lies a bloody ruin!
msg_zh: 我的手！我的脚！被毁了的地方！

msg: Ah... A-Aaaaaargh!
msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！

msg: The pain... The exquisite pain...
msg_zh: ……好疼啊，要受不了了……

msg: Bayle! Vile Bayle!
msg_zh: ……贝勒！贝勒啊！

msg: O terror incarnate!
msg_zh: 恐惧的化身啊！

msg: There is life in me yet!
msg_zh: 告诉你，我还活着！

msg: I will soon feast upon your heart!
msg_zh: 渴望你的心脏，渴望得不得了！

msg: Mark my words! You too shall know fear!
msg_zh: 也要让你知道！什么叫恐惧！

msg: Uaaaaargh!
msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！

msg: O-Oh...the pain...
msg_zh: ……呜呜，好疼……

msg: The exquisite pain...
msg_zh: 疼到要受不了了……

msg: Please, no more.
msg_zh: ……求求你，住手。

msg: I am sorry. I repent!
msg_zh: 是我不对、是我不对。

msg: Come no closer. Oh, the horror.
msg_zh: 求求你……太可怕了……

msg: Please, savage me no further.
msg_zh: ……不要再继续了。

msg: O-Oh... Oh...
Please, no more...
msg_zh: ……求求你，住手。

msg: Spare me your cruelty...
msg_zh: ……不要再继续了。

msg: O-Oh... Oh...
Heh heh heh, ha ha ha!
msg_zh: ……哈哈，哈哈哈。

msg: Ah ha ha ha!
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈……！

msg: What a sight! A warrior true, if ever one there was!
msg_zh: 见识到了吧！这就是战士！

msg: A fellow drake warrior!
msg_zh: 所谓的龙战士啊！

msg: Igon, piteous Igon, do you not remember?
msg_zh: 埃贡啊，想想以前的你！

msg: Conjure your past! How once you were!
msg_zh: 快回想！想起来！

msg: When fear was yet foreign to ye!
msg_zh: 你天不怕地不怕，哪知道什么恐惧！

msg: Heh heh... Ha ha ha!
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈……！

msg: Ahh, drake warrior, dear friend.
msg_zh: ……啊，龙战士啊。

msg: Grant me this one wish.
msg_zh: 听听老夫我的愿望吧。

msg: Take this finger. My finger.
msg_zh: ……带走我的指头。

msg: Scale the jagged peak. Face Bayle the Dread. And when you do...
msg_zh: 等你爬上那座尖刺山，对上“狂龙”贝勒的时候……

msg: Summon me. Summon my soul.
msg_zh: 召唤我的灵魂吧。

msg: My limbs are limbs no more. My heart is twice-over filled with fear.
msg_zh: 即使四肢不完全，心还被恐惧侵蚀了两次……

msg: But a drake warrior I remain.
msg_zh: 老夫我仍是龙战士。

msg: And my soul yet lies on the mountain.
msg_zh: 我的灵魂还在那座山上。

msg: Proud drake warrior, I beg of you.
msg_zh: ……龙战士啊，拜托了。

msg: Scale the jagged peak. Face Bayle the Dread. And when you do...
msg_zh: 你爬上那座尖刺山，对上“狂龙”贝勒的时候……

msg: Summon me. Summon my soul.
msg_zh: 召唤我的灵魂吧。

msg: UnkText
UnkText
UnkText
Curse you, Bayle!
msg_zh: 贝勒啊！

msg: I hereby vow! You will rue this day!
msg_zh: 这次绝对要让你明白！

msg: Behold, a true drake warrior! And I, Igon!
msg_zh: 龙战士！还有我埃贡！

msg: Your fears made flesh!
msg_zh: 就是你恐惧的化身！

msg: Solid of scale you might be, foul dragon...
msg_zh: ……可恨的狂龙，果真难缠。

msg: But I will riddle with holes your rotten hide!
msg_zh: 但再来几次！我都奉陪！

msg: With a hail of harpoons!
msg_zh: 老夫我的灵魂，会随着每一支鱼叉，

msg: With every last drop of my being!
msg_zh: 打穿你这浑球！

msg: Graaaaaargh!
msg_zh: 喔喔喔喔喔！

msg: Bayle the Dread!
msg_zh: 贝勒啊！

msg: You shall haunt me no longer!
msg_zh: 老夫我不再怕你啦！

msg: A-Ahhhhhh...
msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊……

msg: B...Bayle...
You shall know...fear yet...
msg_zh: ……让你明白、恐惧……

msg: Oof!
msg_zh: 喔！

msg: Pain!
msg_zh: 好疼！

msg: The exquisite pain!
msg_zh: 很疼啊！

msg: Graaaaaargh!
msg_zh: 喔喔喔喔喔！

msg: Bayle! O terror incarnate!
msg_zh: 贝勒！我恐惧的化身啊！

msg: There is life in me yet!
msg_zh: 告诉你，我还活着！

msg: Bayle, terror incarnate.
msg_zh: ……贝勒，我恐惧的化身啊。

msg: Your time will come...
msg_zh: 你一定也、逃不掉……

msg: Oof!
msg_zh: 呜！

msg: Drake warrior, hear me out!
msg_zh: 龙战士啊，请听我说！

msg: I have but one wish!
msg_zh: 听听我的愿望！

msg: Hah... Hah...
...Drake warrior, dear friend.
msg_zh: ……龙战士啊，

msg: Grant me this...one wish.
msg_zh: 听听我的愿望吧。

msg: Take this finger. My finger.
msg_zh: ……带走我的指头。

msg: Scale the jagged peak. Face Bayle the Dread. And when you do...
msg_zh: 等你爬上那座尖刺山，对上“狂龙”贝勒的时候……

msg: Summon me. Summon my soul.
msg_zh: 召唤我的灵魂吧。

msg: My limbs are limbs no more. My heart is twice-over filled with fear.
msg_zh: 即使四肢不完全，心还被恐惧侵蚀了两次……

msg: But a drake warrior I remain.
msg_zh: 老夫我仍是龙战士。

msg: And my soul yet lies on the mountain.
msg_zh: 我的灵魂还在那座山上。

msg: Is this some manner of trial?
msg_zh: ……想测试看看，是吗！

msg: To divine the mettle of my soul! Whether it befits a drake warrior?!
msg_zh: 老夫我的灵魂，作为龙战士有多少斤两！

msg: UnkText
You are no drake warrior.
msg_zh: 你不是龙战士，

msg: I fear ye not.
msg_zh: 不会是他人的恐惧。

msg: Face Bayle the Dread, and when you do...
msg_zh: 对上“狂龙”贝勒、的时候……

msg: Summon me. Summon my soul.
msg_zh: 召唤……我的灵魂……

msg: Urgh!
msg_zh: 呜！

msg: Ahh, behold!
msg_zh: 啊，看清楚了！

msg: My soul! The soul of a drake warrior!
msg_zh: 老夫我的灵魂，作为龙战士的灵魂！

msg: UnkText
Why did I entrust this fool...
msg_zh: 我竟然把指头，还有灵魂，

msg: with my finger. With my soul?
msg_zh: 交给这种人……？

msg: Did ye witness...?
msg_zh: ……见识到了吗？

msg: My soul. The soul of a drake warrior...?
msg_zh: 我的灵魂，作为、龙战士……

msg: Leave now...
msg_zh: ……折回去。

msg: Come no closer...
msg_zh: 不要靠近……

msg: No closer I say—the madness wells!
msg_zh: 不要靠近疯狂……

msg: Nyaaargh!
msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！

msg: UnkText
UnkText
UnkText
UnkText
UnkText
UnkText
The depths of your foolishness!
msg_zh: ……一群蠢人！

msg: UnkText
Warrior true.
msg_zh: ……战士啊。

msg: Picture yourself. Feasting upon a dragon's essence.
msg_zh: 你想吞下龙的力量吗？

msg: On the throbbing heart of the oldest, vilest dragon of them all.
msg_zh: 想吞下最为古老、凶恶的龙，它烫热的心脏吗？

msg: It would be the purest form of Communion.
msg_zh: ……那堪称至高无上的龙飨，

msg: The fullest sating of your hunger,
msg_zh: 肯定能满足你的渴望……

msg: and your consummation, as a dragon whole.
msg_zh: 进一步，让你化为龙。

msg: Yes, as it should be.
msg_zh: 答得很好。

msg: Now, seek the jagged peak.
msg_zh: 那么，朝那座尖刺山前进吧。

msg: There you will find Bayle, the oldest, and vilest, of all dragons.
msg_zh: 最为古老、最为凶恶的龙……贝勒就在那里。

msg: Landbound warrior. Follow your desire, and slay the foul beast.
msg_zh: 人类战士啊，顺从你的渴望，杀了那东西……

msg: Devour its throbbing heart.
msg_zh: 吞下它烫热的心脏吧。

msg: I will grant you the strength required.
msg_zh: 为了帮助你达到目的，我以吾王──

msg: In the name of my lord, Placidusax.
msg_zh: 普拉顿桑克斯之名，赐予你力量。

msg: Perhaps you have yet to feel true want.
msg_zh: ……还不明白渴望啊。

msg: I am patient.
msg_zh: 那么，还需费些时日。

msg: There will come a day when hunger knocks.
msg_zh: 静待你明了何谓渴望。

msg: Warrior true. Do you feel the hunger?
msg_zh: ……战士啊，你明白渴望了吗？

msg: Then why not feast upon a dragon's essence.
msg_zh: 既然如此，你想吞下龙的力量吗？

msg: On the throbbing heart of the oldest, vilest dragon of them all.
msg_zh: 想吞下最为古老、凶恶的龙，它烫热的心脏吗？

msg: Warrior true. What is it that you need?
msg_zh: ……战士啊，有什么事？

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……好吧。

msg: If you hunger for Dragon Communion,
msg_zh: 只要你渴望执行龙飨，

msg: and seek to slay Bayle, the vilest of dragons,
msg_zh: 决意屠杀那凶恶的龙，贝勒……

msg: then I shall grant you strength time and again.
msg_zh: 我都会助一臂之力。

msg: In the name of my lord, Placidusax.
msg_zh: 以吾王普拉顿桑克斯之名，赐予你力量。

msg: In a time long past, Bayle turned upon the Dragonlord.
msg_zh: ……在久远以前的时代，贝勒背叛了龙王。

msg: The foul traitor assailed our master and inflicted a grievous wound, only to make a hasty retreat.
msg_zh: 那胆敢造反并大伤吾王的叛徒，最终落败的狂龙……

msg: ...Becoming a sworn enemy of the brood.
msg_zh: 是我等可憎的仇敌。

msg: Since that day, Bayle and his bloodline—the drakes— have served as sacrifices for Dragon Communion.
msg_zh: 从那之后，贝勒与它的族人──\n飞龙，就成了龙飨的祭品。

msg: Landbound warrior. My lord, Placidusax, has shown your kind what must be done.
msg_zh: 人类战士啊，吾王普拉顿桑克斯指引了你们──

msg: Seek communion. Sate your boundless appetite.
msg_zh: 在果敢意志之下暗藏的渴望，能抚平它的美馔为何。

msg: Feel the euphoria of a dragon's essence taking root in your meagre frame.
msg_zh: 还有龙栖宿于娇小身躯之中，多么令人振奋。

msg: I remember that name well.
msg_zh: ……我记得那名字。

msg: The broken drake warrior.
msg_zh: 蒙受毁坏的龙战士──

msg: Driven by bottomless hunger and fiery ambition.
msg_zh: 但他的渴望与果敢意志，依旧燃烧不止。

msg: Precisely what the Dragonlord envisaged.
msg_zh: 吾王指引你们执行龙飨，

msg: for men who partake in Dragon Communion.
msg_zh: 他可说是最贴切的成果展现。

msg: The mad hunger and fierceness of spirit that only flows from those young and short of sight.
msg_zh: 因为年幼，因为渺小──\n才能有无止尽的渴望，以及果敢的意志。

msg: He rather reminds me of Bayle, in fact.
msg_zh: 这和贝勒很相似……

msg: Such thoughts are unfathomable to ones as old as we.
msg_zh: 是年迈的我们不可得的特性。

msg: My dear lord, Placidusax.
msg_zh: ……吾王，普拉顿桑克斯啊，

msg: Tonight, like every night, my solace is yours.
msg_zh: 今晚也为您献上我的安眠。

msg: May it grant you sleep, in your place beyond time.
msg_zh: 请您在遥远时空的那一端，安稳入睡。

msg: Ah...
I have broken my pledge.
msg_zh: ……我违背了誓言。

msg: I succumbed to the deep slumber...
msg_zh: 本该献给吾王的深沉安眠……

msg: ...that was meant for my Lord.
msg_zh: 我竟无耻地耽于其中。

msg: Twas a craven act! Of a foul and lowly beast!
msg_zh: 无耻至极！这和禽兽有何区别！

msg: Forgive me, good warrior.
msg_zh: ……战士啊，请你谅解。

msg: My Lord will no longer look upon me.
msg_zh: 吾王不再照望我──

msg: I have fallen from grace. An old dragon no longer.
msg_zh: 凡堕落的，就不再是古龙。

msg: Go on, leave me be.
msg_zh: ……不用管我，你走吧。

msg: Go on, leave me be.
msg_zh: ……不用管我，你走吧。

msg: My Lord will no longer look upon me.
msg_zh: 吾王已不再照望我。

msg: Ahh, finally, our wish is granted.
msg_zh: ……啊，你办到了。

msg: Our dream, long yearned for, has come to pass.
msg_zh: 一偿我等久远以来的夙愿。

msg: My Lord was blessed with great insight.
msg_zh: ……吾王真是别具慧眼。

msg: He saw in the insatiable hunger and fierce spirit of man,
msg_zh: 人类拥有的无尽渴望，以及果敢意志，

msg: the very things that would fell Bayle, our wretched nemesis.
msg_zh: 才能杀了我等可憎的仇敌，贝勒。

msg: Warrior, you soar with the strength of dragons.
msg_zh: 战士啊，你是名符其实的龙。

msg: Whereas I am fallen. Leave me be.
msg_zh: ……不必留心堕落的我，你走吧。

msg: Good warrior, leave me be.
msg_zh: ……战士啊，不用管我，走吧。

msg: I can call myself an old dragon no longer.
msg_zh: 我已不再是古龙。

msg: Is that the truth?
msg_zh: ……你说的是事实？

msg: Never, in all my years...
msg_zh: 你怎能……

msg: How could you inflict such cruelty?
msg_zh: 做出如此残忍的行为？

msg: No, that is not for me to judge.
msg_zh: ……不对，这算不上理由。

msg: Whatever your hand in it, it was I who succumbed to the sweetness of slumber.
msg_zh: 不论前因后果，耽于安眠的依旧是我。

msg: The fault lies with me.
msg_zh: 一切都在于我。

msg: I may be fallen, but I need not surrender my honour.
msg_zh: ……堕落是事实，怎能连尊严都失去。

msg: On second thought,
msg_zh: ……不过，也是。

msg: I believe you do owe me something for the transgression.
msg_zh: 是该让你担起责任。

msg: On a mere whim, you've stripped me of my one and only Lord.
msg_zh: 只因一时兴起就夺走了吾王，还有我的一切。

msg: As such, I require another—you.
msg_zh: 那么你是该取而代之──

msg: One day, may you become a dragon whole, a Lord of your own making.
msg_zh: 请您务必化为龙，成为王。

msg: Lead me, and I will follow.
msg_zh: 带领我前行吧，

msg: My good Lord.
msg_zh: 吾王啊。

msg: My good Lord.
msg_zh: 吾王啊，

msg: Let me join you on your journey.
msg_zh: 请带领我前行。

msg: For my noble Lord!
msg_zh: 为了吾王！

msg: In the name of my brave Lord!
msg_zh: 以吾王之名！

msg: Lord of the old order.
msg_zh: 老旧律法之王啊，

msg: Let us go together.
msg_zh: 一起来吧。

msg: Come, now. Let us go together.
msg_zh: 你也一起来吧。

msg: I promise you.
msg_zh: 我向你发誓──

msg: A thousand year voyage guided by compassion.
msg_zh: 会遵循温柔的法则，开始千年的旅程。

msg: Let your thoughts...be only of love.
msg_zh: 让你的思绪充满爱吧。

msg: I've no interest in small talk.
msg_zh: ……打招呼就免了。

msg: My only concerns are the concerns of Count Ymir.
msg_zh: 我只会照尤弥尔先生的意思行事。

msg: And you are not among them.
msg_zh: 对你本人，我没有丝毫兴趣。

msg: Only, there is one thing I will say.
msg_zh: ……但有一件事，劝你记住。

msg: Count Ymir's kindness is a gift. Should you cross him,
msg_zh: 不要辜负尤弥尔先生的好意。

msg: you will sorely regret it.
msg_zh: ……不论你有什么理由。

msg: Be gone.
msg_zh: ……快走吧。

msg: There is nothing more to say.
msg_zh: 我对你无话可说。

msg: How did you...
msg_zh: 那是……

msg: Did Count Ymir reward you with that?
msg_zh: 是尤弥尔先生交给你的？

msg: Hmm.
Then I see you have gained his trust.
msg_zh: ……那位先生认同你了。

msg: And therefore, mine.
msg_zh: 那么，我也认同你。

msg: I am Jolán. The Night is yours now to wield.
msg_zh: 我是约兰，愿意成为你的黑夜。

msg: Count Ymir spoke of you.
msg_zh: ……我听尤弥尔先生说过，

msg: That you had earned his trust.
msg_zh: 那位先生认同你这个人。

msg: Hmm.
Then you have earned mine, as well.
msg_zh: ……那么，我也认同你。

msg: I am Jolán. The Night is yours now to wield.
msg_zh: 我是约兰，愿意成为你的黑夜。

msg: Don't get the wrong idea.
msg_zh: ……不要会错意。

msg: We are neither friends nor confidantes.
msg_zh: 我没兴趣和你混熟。

msg: I am merely honouring Count Ymir's wishes.
msg_zh: 只是照尤弥尔先生的意思行事罢了。

msg: Enough of you.
msg_zh: ……快走吧。

msg: Well, well, what is that...
msg_zh: 哦，那是……

msg: A reward from Count Ymir?
msg_zh: 是尤弥尔先生交给你的？

msg: Huh...
If the Count has placed his trust in you, then so shall I.
msg_zh: ……那位先生认同的人物，我也认同。

msg: I am Jolán. The Night is yours now to wield.
msg_zh: 我是约兰，愿意成为你的黑夜。

msg: Ahh, who have we here...?
msg_zh: ……哦，就是你啊……

msg: Count Ymir spoke of you.
msg_zh: 我听尤弥尔先生说过，

msg: That you had earned his trust.
msg_zh: 那位先生认同你这个人。

msg: Hmm.
Then you have earned mine, as well.
msg_zh: ……那么，我也认同你。

msg: I am Jolán. The Night is yours now to wield.
msg_zh: 我是约兰，愿意成为你的黑夜。

msg: I told you once.
msg_zh: ……我说过了。

msg: I've no interest in companionship.
msg_zh: 没兴趣和你混熟。

msg: But I must admit.
msg_zh: ……好吧，就算了。

msg: Count Ymir did seem very pleased.
msg_zh: 看到尤弥尔先生那么高兴，

msg: Perhaps an exception is in order.
msg_zh: 我也有兴致说一些独白。

msg: Ahh, who have we here...?
msg_zh: ……哦，就是你啊……

msg: Count Ymir seemed very pleased.
msg_zh: 尤弥尔先生非常高兴，

msg: And for that, I express my gratitude.
msg_zh: 我也向你致谢。

msg: I am Jolán. Loyal to Count Ymir.
msg_zh: 我是约兰，替尤弥尔先生做事。

msg: The Night is yours now to wield.
msg_zh: 往后，我愿意成为你的黑夜。

msg: Ymir is a shining star.
msg_zh: ……尤弥尔先生是星星──

msg: In our eyes, the only star upon the black canvas of the night.
msg_zh: 在无星的黑夜、我们的世界里，唯一的星星。

msg: Our meeting with the Count taught us of the star-draped sky.
msg_zh: ……在遇见先生的那时候起，我们才明白何谓星空。

msg: We know that we cannot reach out to touch it.
msg_zh: 无法亲手碰到星星，也无所谓。

msg: But we can peer up at its brilliance, and heed its guidance.
msg_zh: 只要抬头望着那璀璨的光，

msg: We will never again lose our way in the night.
msg_zh: 我们就不会在黑夜里，再次迷失方向。

msg: I have spoken far too freely.
msg_zh: ……说太多了。

msg: Pay me no mind. Let us focus on our shared purpose.
msg_zh: 你就当没听过吧……现在我们该做的，

msg: Our service to Count Ymir.
msg_zh: 是回应尤弥尔先生的好意。

msg: Now, be on your way.
msg_zh: ……你走吧。

msg: Tell me.
msg_zh: ……我问你。

msg: Where did you find this?
msg_zh: 这是从哪里拿到手的……？

msg: Hmm.
No, do not explain.
msg_zh: ……算了，不用说了。

msg: I have one star alone.
msg_zh: 我那唯一的星星……

msg: And only his words will do...
msg_zh: 不是你的话语能取代。

msg: Stop.
msg_zh: ……慢着。

msg: What did you just say?
msg_zh: 你刚刚说了什么……？

msg: Hmmm.
Wait, no. Say nothing.
msg_zh: ……够了，不要再提。

msg: I have one star alone.
msg_zh: 我那唯一的星星……

msg: And only his words will do...
msg_zh: 不是你的话语能取代。

msg: I will say this much.
msg_zh: ……我是该道谢。

msg: I am in your debt.
msg_zh: 谢谢你。

msg: But I will hear no more.
msg_zh: ……但别再提这件事了。

msg: I have one star alone.
msg_zh: 我那唯一的星星……

msg: And only his words will do...
msg_zh: 不是你的话语能取代。

msg: Be on your way.
msg_zh: ……你走吧。

msg: I will hear no more about this.
msg_zh: 别再提这件事了。

msg: You were warned.
msg_zh: ……我警告过你了。

msg: Not to betray the kindness of Count Ymir.
msg_zh: “不要辜负尤弥尔先生的好意。”

msg: Appalling. Your lot never ceases to repulse me.
msg_zh: 真可悲，你们这种人总是死性不改。

msg: Such willingness to exploit true largesse.
msg_zh: 只要有人释出善意，就认为能大肆利用。

msg: Surrender. To the Night of Jolán.
msg_zh: 凋零在约兰的黑夜里吧。

msg: You have betrayed the kindness of Count Ymir.
msg_zh: ……你辜负了尤弥尔先生的好意。

msg: Appalling. Your lot never ceases to repulse me.
msg_zh: 真可悲，你们这种人总是死性不改。

msg: Such willingness to exploit true largesse.
msg_zh: 只要有人释出善意，就认为能大肆利用。

msg: Surrender. To the Night of Jolán.
msg_zh: 凋零在约兰的黑夜里吧。

msg: What have you done?
msg_zh: ……你到底做了什么？

msg: You've wounded Count Ymir most irreparably.
msg_zh: 尤弥尔先生非常悲伤……

msg: Such that he wishes for your death.
msg_zh: 希望你以死赔罪。

msg: And I must attend to the Count's concerns.
msg_zh: 而我，会照尤弥尔先生的意思行事。

msg: You would abscond with it.
msg_zh: ……你心底的盘算，

msg: The whole of Count Ymir's wisdom?
msg_zh: 是窃取尤弥尔先生的智慧？

msg: You undeserving little miscreant.
msg_zh: 不知天高地厚的人，

msg: Surrender. To the Night of Jolán.
msg_zh: 凋零在约兰的黑夜里吧。

msg: You have only yourself to blame, base creature.
msg_zh: ……为自己的恶行忏悔吧。

msg: Count Ymir...
msg_zh: ……尤弥尔先生……

msg: I, Jolán, am afraid that I...
msg_zh: 约兰我，没有替您……

msg: Why...
msg_zh: ……为什么，你……

msg: Why did you cross Count Ymir?
msg_zh: 背叛了尤弥尔先生……？

msg: UnkText
UnkText
Oh, my dear star...
msg_zh: ……啊，我的星星……

msg: A fine mother...you will be...
msg_zh: 请您成为……母亲……

msg: UnkText
UnkText
Surrender. To the Night of Jolán.
msg_zh: 凋零在约兰的黑夜里吧。

msg: Count Ymir...
msg_zh: ……尤弥尔先生……

msg: The stars...the sky... I see them not...
msg_zh: 星星呢？星空呢？我看不见……

msg: The Night is ever-dark.
msg_zh: ……夜一直很黑。

msg: I need the stars... Give me light.
msg_zh: 拜托，我想看见星星……看见光……

msg: Oh, it blinds...
msg_zh: ……啊，好亮啊……

msg: As if our Night simply never was...
msg_zh: 我们的黑夜，已经消失了啊……

msg: No light...anywhere at all...
msg_zh: ……啊，完全看不见光……

msg: This is the night I know. Our Night...
msg_zh: 这是我的黑夜、我们的黑夜……

msg: Those stripped of the Grace of Gold shall all meet death.
msg_zh: ……对不受黄金赐福的，降下死亡──

msg: In the embrace of Messmer's flame.
msg_zh: 受梅瑟莫之火吞噬吧。

msg: All ye spurned by Grace.
msg_zh: ……所有不受赐福的，

msg: Kneel evermore. Before the flame of Messmer.
msg_zh: 畏惧梅瑟莫之火吧。

msg: Mark my words, graceless heathen.
msg_zh: ……牢记在心了，不受赐福的。

msg: Thou shalt not evade the flame of Messmer.
msg_zh: 你逃离不了梅瑟莫之火。

msg: UnkText
Thou shalt not evade the flame of Messmer.
msg_zh: 你逃离不了梅瑟莫之火。

msg: Queen Marika, behold!
msg_zh: ……玛莉卡大人，望您见证。

msg: I have excised another. Another cancer to thy joy.
msg_zh: 我又摒除了一个造成烦忧的东西！

msg: Ahh, how could this be...
msg_zh: ……啊，怎么可能！

msg: Forsake me not...
msg_zh: 请您、请您不要抛弃我……

msg: Queen Marika, my grace...
msg_zh: 玛莉卡大人……

msg: Queen Marika, mother to us all.
msg_zh: ……玛莉卡大人，吾等之母啊。

msg: Favour me with thy grace.
msg_zh: 求您垂怜，赐福于我。

msg: I have met many who would threaten or distress thee, and quelled each and all.
msg_zh: 我摒除了那些与您为敌的，造成烦忧的──

msg: And I hereby swear to never cease.
msg_zh: 先前如此，我发誓往后亦是如此。

msg: So, please, grant me thy grace.
msg_zh: 所以请您垂怜，赐福于我。

msg: Leave me with my solitary light...
msg_zh: 千万别带走那光芒……

msg: Queen Marika, I implore thee, bestow thy grace.
msg_zh: ……玛莉卡大人，求您垂怜，赐福于我。

msg: Take not from me my solitary light...
msg_zh: 千万别带走那光芒……

msg: Ahh!
msg_zh: ……啊啊！

msg: Queen Marika. Dearest mother!
msg_zh: 玛莉卡大人，吾等之母啊！

msg: I shall silence all who would trespass upon thy peace.
msg_zh: 那些为敌的、造成烦忧的，我愿为您摒除。

msg: As decreed by the Grace of Gold.
msg_zh: 一切遵循黄金赐福的引导。

msg: Ahhh! No soul shall thy sanctity imperil!
msg_zh: 啊！愿污秽的一切，永久远离您！

msg: Ahh, ahh...
I would not. Am I not pure? Defile thee, I would never.
msg_zh: 不，我不是秽物，绝对不会冒犯您。

msg: I ask, why wouldst thou think to purloin from me?
msg_zh: 您为什么要带走光芒？

msg: Deignest thou not to look upon me?
msg_zh: 我所做的一切，您都没有看见吗？

msg: All this time, I held in my heart only thee!
msg_zh: 我一直，为了您……！

msg: Fie, another? Treading the heels of Miquella?
msg_zh: ……哼，你也在追寻米凯拉？

msg: Then, as that woman would surely say, we are in our purposes well aligned...
msg_zh: 那照那个女人说的，你跟我是同伴。

msg: But understand—your kind are not forgiven.
msg_zh: 别会错意了，这不代表我原谅你们。

msg: The Erdtree is my peoples' enemy—By Marika long betray'd, set aflame.
msg_zh: ……黄金树是敌人──\n玛莉卡背叛我们，甚至火烧我们一族。

msg: I believe Miquella's apologies, when he says our delivery will come...
msg_zh: 即便米凯拉诚心谢罪，我也相信他带来救赎的誓言……

msg: But never will I see your kind as worthy.
msg_zh: 我还是对你们没有好感。

msg: And yet, my oath I cannot overlook.
msg_zh: ……但约定终究是约定。

msg: If Miquella it is whom you would seek, then comrade, allow me to give you this.
msg_zh: 既然同样在追寻米凯拉，\n身为同伴，我愿意告诉你──

msg: These are the sites of the crosses I've found.
msg_zh: 我所知的，十字记号所在地。

msg: I urge you, follow after Miquella.
msg_zh: ……追寻米凯拉吧。

msg: As long as you abide by his footfalls, you will be no enemy to me.
msg_zh: 只要你继续追寻，就不会是我的敌人。

msg: I urge you, follow after Miquella.
msg_zh: ……追寻米凯拉吧。

msg: As long as you abide by his footfalls, you will be no enemy to me.
msg_zh: 只要你继续追寻，就不会是我的敌人。

msg: You have a knack for timing, my fellow.
msg_zh: ……你还真会挑时间现身。

msg: I've found the site of a new cross. Take this.
msg_zh: 找到新的十字记号了，拿去吧。

msg: New sites of crosses discovered. For you.
msg_zh: 找到新的十字记号了，拿去吧。

msg: Miquella has said as much himself—he wishes now to throw it all away.
msg_zh: ……米凯拉说过，他要舍弃所有的一切。

msg: He says the act—though undoubtedly painful—will sear clean the Erdtree's wanton sin.
msg_zh: 这么做会伴随痛楚，但能净化黄金树的重罪。

msg: The truth of his claim can be found at each cross.
msg_zh: 十字记号是他言行一致的证据。

msg: Tis evidence enough to earn my belief.
msg_zh: ……所以我才会相信米凯拉。

msg: Go to the misshapen tree of umbra.
msg_zh: ……朝那棵歪扭的影子大树前进吧。

msg: In that forsaken place, blood must spill—the blood of your fellows, the Erdtree faithful.
msg_zh: 接着你们黄金树阵营的，彼此厮杀吧。

msg: Fie, another? Treading the heels of Miquella?
msg_zh: ……哼，你也在追寻米凯拉？

msg: Then, as that woman would surely say, we are in our purposes well aligned...
msg_zh: 那照那个女人说的，你跟我是同伴。

msg: But understand—your kind are not forgiven.
msg_zh: 别会错意了，这不代表我原谅你们。

msg: The Erdtree is my peoples' enemy—By Marika long betray'd, set aflame.
msg_zh: ……黄金树是敌人──\n玛莉卡背叛我们，甚至火烧我们一族。

msg: I believe Miquella's apologies, when he says our delivery will come...
msg_zh: 即便米凯拉诚心谢罪，我也相信他带来救赎的誓言……

msg: But never will I see your kind as worthy.
msg_zh: 我还是对你们没有好感。

msg: And yet, my oath I cannot overlook.
msg_zh: ……但约定终究是约定。

msg: If Miquella it is whom you would seek, then comrade, allow me to give you this.
msg_zh: 既然同样在追寻米凯拉，\n身为同伴，我愿意告诉你──

msg: It'll show you where crosses can be found.
msg_zh: 上头标了十字记号的所在地，拿去。

msg: What's this?
msg_zh: ……这么突然？

msg: Do you think me in need of alms?
msg_zh: 你有什么目的？

msg: Ah, but this dish...
Tis fare o'the tower. I remember fondly this kin-clad scent.
msg_zh: 我记得，这是塔的料理。

msg: ...Brings back memories I'd all but forgot.
msg_zh: ……现在才回想起来，好怀念的味道。

msg: This, by my troth, is but a dismal copy.
msg_zh: ……但味道有点变了。

msg: Indeed, I think it rather plain to see...
msg_zh: ……这也当然啊。

msg: Things once broken can never be the same...
msg_zh: 曾经被摧毁的，不可能恢复原状……

msg: Look. Take this for your troubles, won't you?
msg_zh: ……这个你拿去。

msg: I desire not to be in your debt.
msg_zh: 我不想欠你人情。

msg: I've had my fill...
msg_zh: ……不必了。

msg: Indeed, I have no wish...to wax nostalgic 'bout days gone by...
msg_zh: 我不打算怀念过去，

msg: Nor do I yearn to friendship kindle...
msg_zh: 也不打算与你和睦相处……

msg: Intriguing. What remains there to be said?
msg_zh: ……哦？你来找我搭话？

msg: Do you presume us allies, even now? Though Miquella's spell is newly broken?
msg_zh: 没了米凯拉的魅惑，你想我还会当你们是同伴？

msg: I must profess, the spell mattered little.
msg_zh: ……随便你吧。

msg: Uphold his covenant Miquella shall, and in godhood redeem our rueful clan.
msg_zh: 只要米凯拉能够遵守誓言──\n成为神祇，也替我们一族带来救赎，

msg: Then Marika, and vilest Erdtree both, will at last be from divinity wrench'd.
msg_zh: 并将玛莉卡、黄金树拉下神祇之位……

msg: And surely I...contented I will be.
msg_zh: 我在乎的，也就这些。

msg: Fie, another? Treading the heels of Miquella?
msg_zh: ……哼，你也在追寻米凯拉？

msg: A brazen fellow you must surely be, to loose your tongue to a stranger as I.
msg_zh: 话又说回来，直接找我搭话，你还真有胆量。

msg: Do you presume us allies, even now? Though Miquella's spell is newly broken?
msg_zh: 没了米凯拉的魅惑，你想我还会当你们是同伴？

msg: I must profess, the spell mattered little.
msg_zh: ……随便你吧。

msg: Uphold his covenant Miquella shall, and in godhood redeem our rueful clan.
msg_zh: 只要米凯拉能够遵守誓言──\n成为神祇，也替我们一族带来救赎，

msg: Then Marika, and vilest Erdtree both, will at last be from divinity wrench'd.
msg_zh: 并将玛莉卡、黄金树拉下神祇之位……

msg: And surely I...contented I will be.
msg_zh: 我在乎的，也就这些。

msg: But first, clear resounds the call of vengeance.
msg_zh: ……不过在那之前，还是得先复仇。

msg: The impaler, Messmer, must pay his due.
msg_zh: 梅瑟莫，那可恨的“穿刺者”。

msg: In vengeance for the flames, my blade I wield...
msg_zh: 火焰害我们承受伤痛，我要让他受到报应。

msg: UnkText
How could I allow myself to forget?
msg_zh: 对，我不会再忘记──

msg: Revenge alone assures me peace of mind.
msg_zh: 先有复仇，才会有救赎。

msg: Think not to hinder me upon my path.
msg_zh: ……你最好不要妨碍我。

msg: Lest you too wish to face the reckoning.
msg_zh: 敢这么做的，就是我的敌人。

msg: Messmer! Foe of my beloved people!
msg_zh: 梅瑟莫！我们一族的仇人！

msg: In vengeance for the flames, my blade I wield!
msg_zh: 竟敢火烧我们一族！现在，接受报应吧！

msg: UnkText
Have I made it known, accursed Messmer?
msg_zh: 梅瑟莫啊，懂了没有？

msg: My clan's suff'ring? Their pain? All that they felt?
msg_zh: 我们一族多么痛苦、悔恨！心中的千思万绪！

msg: Do you understand now, your ugliness?
msg_zh: 再看看你自己，多么丑陋！

msg: Aaaaaargh!
We meet again I see, comrade-in-arms.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊。

msg: Upon his end, did you see Messmer's face?
msg_zh: 你有看到梅瑟莫的死状吗？

msg: Twas sublime—a very tangle of snakes!
msg_zh: 有看到那张活该被唾弃的丑陋蛇脸吗？

msg: To think he dared to call us savages.
msg_zh: ……还好意思说我们是“秽物”？

msg: When he himself was most base of all.
msg_zh: 哪一边才是真正的秽物，他自己最清楚！

msg: Ha ha ha ha!
To say the least, I am to you indebted.
msg_zh: 受了你不少关照。

msg: Yet unquenched remains my thirst for revenge.
msg_zh: ……不过，我不会停下复仇的脚步。

msg: The death of Messmer was merely the start.
msg_zh: ……梅瑟莫的死，只是开端。

msg: Now comes the piper to collect from Marika, her offspring, and all the Erdtree's denizens...
msg_zh: 还有玛莉卡、还有她的孩子、还有全部的黄金树之民。

msg: In vengeance for the flames, my blade I wield...
msg_zh: 火焰害我们承受伤痛，所有人都得因此受到报应。

msg: UnkText
If Miquella's redemption soothes the ache...that throbs within, demanding blessed vengeance...
msg_zh: 如果米凯拉带来的救赎，会让人遗忘复仇的想法，

msg: Then I wish not to be by him redeemed.
msg_zh: 那种救赎，不要也罢。

msg: If Miquella's redemption soothes the ache...that throbs within, demanding blessed vengeance...
msg_zh: 如果米凯拉带来的救赎，会让人遗忘复仇的想法，

msg: Then I wish not to be by him redeemed.
msg_zh: 那种救赎，不要也罢。

msg: What cruelty's this...
msg_zh: ……为什么？

msg: Who would rob me of my one vital purpose?
msg_zh: 为什么剥夺让我复仇的机会？

msg: Am I so feeble, witless, dull of blade...
msg_zh: 结果我什么都办不到？

msg: That vengeance was never to have been mine?
msg_zh: 我的刀，没办法刺向仇人吗？

msg: O mother, O most cherished wife and child.
msg_zh: ……唉，母亲啊，我深爱的妻儿啊。

msg: It seems vengeance was not mine to enact.
msg_zh: 我的复仇，难道就这样没了方向？

msg: Where now should I point my tired blade...
msg_zh: ……我的刀，该刺向谁……

msg: Where now should I point my tired blade...
msg_zh: ……我的刀，该刺向谁……

msg: In the end, I knew this day would come.
msg_zh: ……对啊，我想也是。

msg: The nature of your kind, I am certain, will always show itself, given time.
msg_zh: 说到底，你们这些人终究本性难移。

msg: Interfere not with my business, zealot.
msg_zh: 自以为忠心的走狗，少来碍事！

msg: What could your purpose possibly be?
msg_zh: ……你在盘算什么？

msg: I do not recollect begging for help.
msg_zh: 我不记得有求你帮我。

msg: I ask you stay back—this is my revenge.
msg_zh: 不要妨碍我复仇……

msg: In the end, I knew this day would come.
msg_zh: ……对啊，我想也是。

msg: The nature of your kind, I am certain, will always show itself, given time.
msg_zh: 说到底，你们这些人终究本性难移。

msg: Interfere not with my business, zealot.
msg_zh: 自以为忠心的走狗，少来碍事。

msg: So, your mongrel blood shows through at last.
msg_zh: ……结果你也不出下三滥之流。

msg: I was a fool to expect more of you.
msg_zh: 会对你抱有一丝期待，是我愚蠢。

msg: Small wonder Miquella employed his spells.
msg_zh: 但我也明白了，米凯拉会魅惑你们的原因……

msg: Do not interfere—this is my revenge.
msg_zh: 不要妨碍我复仇……

msg: Apologies...
msg_zh: ……对不起……

msg: O Mother, wife, and...chil...
msg_zh: ……母亲啊，我深爱的妻、儿……

msg: Tis just as the woman said it would be.
msg_zh: ……结果和那个女人说的一样。

msg: Lord of the Erdtree, Lord of Marika...
msg_zh: 既然你是黄金树，还有玛莉卡的王──

msg: You too deserve to face the reckoning.
msg_zh: 那的确很适合复仇。

msg: Lord of the Erdtree, Lord of Marika...
msg_zh: ……既然你是黄金树，还有玛莉卡的王──

msg: You too deserve to face my reckoning.
msg_zh: 那的确很适合复仇。

msg: Your lord is slain.
msg_zh: ……你的王已经死了。

msg: And you are next, Marika.
msg_zh: 接下来轮到你了，玛莉卡……

msg: O Miquella...
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人……

msg: Please...redeem our...clan...
msg_zh: 请替我们一族、带来救赎……

msg: Hello there.
msg_zh: ……第一次见到你，你好。

msg: Together, we work.
msg_zh: 我们是同伴。

msg: Together, for Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 一起努力，为了米凯拉大人……

msg: Many things, we have found.
msg_zh: 大家一起，准备了很多东西。

msg: Many things, we have found.
msg_zh: ……大家一起，准备了很多东西。

msg: Welcome...
msg_zh: ……欢迎。

msg: Good bye.
msg_zh: ……再见。

msg: I like finding things.
msg_zh: ……准备东西，很快乐。

msg: For you, Lady Leda, her allies, and the forager brood.
msg_zh: 因为你，还有蕾妲大人他们，还有集物虫……

msg: Things bring joy to all.
msg_zh: 大家都会开心。

msg: One of the forager brood was killed.
msg_zh: ……集物虫死了。

msg: This thing, is a tragedy.
msg_zh: 好伤心。

msg: This thing, cannot be forgiven.
msg_zh: ……不可原谅。

msg: You hurt one of the forager brood.
msg_zh: ……你伤害集物虫，

msg: This thing, cannot be forgiven.
msg_zh: 不可原谅。

msg: Oh, I know.
msg_zh: ……对了。

msg: This is for you.
msg_zh: 要给你礼物。

msg: The forager brood
msg_zh: 集物虫给的，

msg: give their thanks.
msg_zh: 说要谢谢你。

msg: Oh, I know.
msg_zh: ……对了。

msg: Give this to Thiollier.
msg_zh: 这个要给休里耶大人。

msg: He asked me to find it.
msg_zh: 那是他委托的东西。

msg: I finally found it.
msg_zh: 找了好久，终于找到。

msg: You come often.
msg_zh: ……你好常来喔。

msg: You enjoy things.
msg_zh: 每次都很开心的样子。

msg: I like finding things.
msg_zh: 我喜欢准备东西。

msg: I like you.
msg_zh: 我也喜欢你。

msg: I don't feel it. It's broken.
msg_zh: ……我的光也坏掉了。

msg: Kind Miquella's light is gone.
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人的光。

msg: But I stand tall.
msg_zh: ……不过，还是一样。

msg: Together, we work.
msg_zh: 我们是同伴。

msg: Together, for Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 一起努力，为了米凯拉大人。

msg: I never change.
msg_zh: ……我还是一样。

msg: Always friend to you.
msg_zh: 是你的同伴。

msg: Hello.
msg_zh: ……你好。

msg: Till we meet again.
msg_zh: ……再见。

msg: Hello there.
msg_zh: ……第一次见到你，你好。

msg: Together, we work.
msg_zh: 我们是同伴。

msg: Even if Kind Miquella's light is broken.
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人的光坏掉了，也一样。

msg: So, I find things. Many things.
msg_zh: ……然后，我准备了很多东西。

msg: I don't know what to do.
msg_zh: ……我不知道怎么办。

msg: Our mother abandoned her brood.
msg_zh: ……母亲丢掉小孩，

msg: She did not love us.
msg_zh: 母亲不爱我们。

msg: We are her children, what should we do?
msg_zh: 那小孩怎么办？

msg: Must we be sad forever?
msg_zh: 一直很伤心吗？

msg: Hm.
msg_zh: ……原来。

msg: Maybe that's Kindly Miquella's love.
msg_zh: 那就是米凯拉大人的爱。

msg: Love for all the unloved.
msg_zh: 所有不被爱的，

msg: Love, to banish the pain.
msg_zh: 都能忘记自己很痛苦。

msg: Yes.
The unloved, every single one of us...
msg_zh: 所有不被爱的，

msg: can banish our pain forever.
msg_zh: 都忘记自己很伤心，比较好。

msg: Hmm.
Sad, forever.
msg_zh: 就一直很伤心。

msg: Sad, forever and ever.
msg_zh: 一直、一直很伤心。

msg: Sad, forever and ever.
msg_zh: ……一直、一直很伤心。

msg: Good bye...
msg_zh: ……再见。

msg: Mm.
I don't know either.
msg_zh: 我也不知道。

msg: I don't know how to be.
msg_zh: 不知道怎么办。

msg: I don't know how to be.
msg_zh: ……我也不知道，该怎么办。

msg: I don't know how to be.
msg_zh: ……我也不知道，该怎么办。

msg: Still. I have my brood.
msg_zh: ……不过，集物虫还在。

msg: I enjoy foraging.
msg_zh: 准备东西，很快乐。

msg: It is enough.
msg_zh: ……这样就好。

msg: I enjoy foraging.
msg_zh: ……准备东西，很快乐。

msg: It is enough.
msg_zh: 这样就好。

msg: My brood is no more.
msg_zh: ……同伴都不见了。

msg: No one comes to visit.
msg_zh: 没有人来了。

msg: Not Lady Leda. Not Father Dane. Not Sir Ansbach.
msg_zh: 蕾妲大人、丹恩大人、安帕赫大人，

msg: Not Freyja. Not Thiollier. Not the hornsent.
msg_zh: 弗蕾亚大人、休里耶大人，还有那个角人大人。

msg: Where have they all gone?
msg_zh: 大家怎么了……？

msg: Thank you.
msg_zh: 谢谢你。

msg: No one comes to visit. Except you.
msg_zh: 只有你还会来。

msg: Till we meet again.
msg_zh: ……再见。

msg: You are no friend.
msg_zh: ……你不是同伴。

msg: A tragedy, this is.
msg_zh: 好伤心。

msg: You hurt...forager brood.
msg_zh: ……你伤害集物虫。

msg: Please, no more.
msg_zh: 这样做、不可以……

msg: Sad, forever?
msg_zh: ……会一直很伤心。

msg: Brood always bad?
msg_zh: 因为是虫……？

msg: You and I, fighting.
msg_zh: ……要和你战斗。

msg: A tragedy, this is.
msg_zh: 好伤心。

msg: Miquella the Kind...
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人，

msg: will help us forget.
msg_zh: 会帮忙忘记一切。

msg: One day, you will forget.
msg_zh: ……你一定也会忘记──

msg: The guidance...
msg_zh: 忘记指引……

msg: Sad, forever?
msg_zh: ……一直很伤心？

msg: You must be the Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……您就是传闻中的那位褪色者？

msg: I am Ansbach. Formerly in service to Lord Mohg.
msg_zh: 我的名字是安帕赫，过去曾侍奉蒙格大人……

msg: But now, like you, another soul guided by Kindly Miquella.
msg_zh: 现在和您一样，接受米凯拉大人的引导。

msg: I'm hardly the steady hand I once was. My fighting days are far behind me.
msg_zh: 话虽如此，我不过是一介老弱残兵。\n那些需要动干戈的事，也是爱莫能助。

msg: Which is why I have chosen to dedicate myself to investigation.
msg_zh: ……因此，我转而进行调查──

msg: To discern Tender Miquella's ultimate purpose.
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人想在这地方成就些什么。

msg: I'd rather not volunteer service to a new master unless I know that I can be of use.
msg_zh: 毕竟一无所知地追寻那位大人，\n最后发现自己无用武之地，反而本末倒置。

msg: May I request a service of you?
msg_zh: 所以，有件事情想要拜托您。

msg: UnkText
They are akin to Tender Miquella's footprints. Or gravestones, which mark what he's left behind.
msg_zh: 这个十字记号是米凯拉大人的足迹。\n也可以说是那位大人舍弃的，代表某种事物的墓碑。

msg: If you discover any more crosses,
msg_zh: 如果您发现新的十字记号，

msg: be certain to tell me.
msg_zh: 请知会我一声。

msg: I presume you, too, are keen to know.
msg_zh: 我想您也一样好奇吧？

msg: Just what Kind Miquella is doing here.
msg_zh: 关于米凯拉大人想在这地方，成就些什么。

msg: UnkText
Six crosses, identical to this one, have been discovered in these lands.
msg_zh: 在这地方，已经发现６个与这相同的十字记号。

msg: If you discover any more crosses,
msg_zh: 如果您发现新的十字记号，

msg: be certain to tell me.
msg_zh: 请知会我一声。

msg: I presume you, too, are keen to know.
msg_zh: 我想您也一样好奇吧？

msg: Just what Kind Miquella is doing here.
msg_zh: 关于米凯拉大人想在这地方，成就些什么。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. What brings you here?
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，怎么了吗？

msg: Oh, you must mean Sir Moore.
msg_zh: ……啊，您想了解穆尔啊。

msg: Sir Moore is a kind and stalwart ally.
msg_zh: 穆尔的个性温和，是一位非常可靠的同伴。

msg: He provisions our little outfit.
msg_zh: 他为了所有人，准备了各式各样的物资。

msg: Sir Moore traffics with the forager brood.
msg_zh: 穆尔有好几位，他称为“集物虫”的伙伴，

msg: His brethren who collect supplies from all corners of the land.
msg_zh: 会在各个地方收集物资……

msg: No doubt they find inspiration in his many virtues.
msg_zh: 这肯定是因为他的善良，才能促成此事。

msg: These are not your foes, Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……您也要多加留意。

msg: Should you spot any forager brood, be sure to mind your manners.
msg_zh: 遇到集物虫的时候，切记，不要伤害它们。

msg: Well, I am much obliged.
msg_zh: ……噢，谢谢您。

msg: As suspected, Kindly Miquella has visited the lands which hold the tower.
msg_zh: ……不出所料，米凯拉大人到过塔之地。

msg: And appears intent on wholly dispossessing himself of his flesh.
msg_zh: 而且看来，大人想要舍弃整副躯体。

msg: He must be seeking entrance to the tower of shadow.
msg_zh: ……他可能想透过这种方式，进入那座幽影塔。

msg: Well, I am much obliged.
msg_zh: ……噢，谢谢您。

msg: I can hardly believe it, he's divested himself of his very eye...
msg_zh: 话虽如此，没想到连眼眸都舍弃……

msg: Tender Miquella's eye is no mere morsel of flesh.
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人的眼眸并不普通。

msg: It is a vessel of soaring grace. Proof of his Empyrean lineage.
msg_zh: 那寄宿着特殊的赐福，是身为黄金树神人的证明。

msg: I wonder, does Miquella the Kind intend to sever his very birthright?
msg_zh: ……难道说，米凯拉大人想要切割掉──

msg: His fate as a child of the Erdtree?
msg_zh: 自己身为黄金树之子的命运？

msg: Well, I am much obliged.
msg_zh: ……噢，谢谢您。

msg: To think there was a cross left in such a faraway place...
msg_zh: 那么远的地方也有十字记号……

msg: And that deep-purple water lilies would be blooming there.
msg_zh: 您还看到了盛开的深紫色睡莲啊。

msg: This can only mean Kindly Miquella has divested himself even of that...
msg_zh: ……果不其然，米凯拉大人舍弃了──

msg: His adoring other self, his blossom of slumber.
msg_zh: 那娇柔的酣眠花朵、深情的半身。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. I have reasoned through my findings.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，我有事情想要知会您。

msg: Concerning Kind Miquella's intentions—why he is here.
msg_zh: 是关于米凯拉大人想在这地方，成就什么一事。

msg: The full picture is yet to coalesce,
msg_zh: ……虽然还没有明确的答案，

msg: but we do know that he is bound for the tower of shadow.
msg_zh: 但能确定的是，那位大人正朝着幽影塔前进。

msg: And that is where he intends to rise to true godhood...
msg_zh: 再来就是，米凯拉大人想在那里成为神祇。

msg: The tower of shadow houses a divine gateway.
msg_zh: 那座幽影塔里，有一道神之门──

msg: A well-kept secret, it was, but...
msg_zh: 那是某一位神祇的诞生之处。

msg: The gateway was once the birthplace of a god.
msg_zh: 它的存在被严加保密……

msg: A god we know all too well.
msg_zh: 很可能是我们熟知的神祇，所做的决定。

msg: Kindly Miquella has discarded his Great Rune.
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人舍弃了大卢恩。

msg: The fog that vexed my aging faculties has been lifted.
msg_zh: 多亏如此，那令人不快的朦胧感也随之散去……

msg: And follies better left forgotten haunt me once again.
msg_zh: ……让我想起了不堪的往事。

msg: Once, in an attempt to free Lord Mohg from his enchantment,
msg_zh: 我曾为了解除吾主，蒙格大人受到的魅惑……

msg: I challenged Tender Miquella, only to have my own heart rather artfully stolen.
msg_zh: 于是挑战了米凯拉大人，\n结果事不成，反倒被他深深吸引。

msg: I knew not how weak I was.
msg_zh: 现在想想，我也是自负了。

msg: I believed that with sufficient mastery, even an Empyrean would be within reach of my blade.
msg_zh: 以为靠自己锻炼的身手，对付得了神人。

msg: I could not have been more mistaken...
msg_zh: ……这种事情打从一开始就不可能。

msg: Miquella the Kind...is a monster.
msg_zh: ……那位大人是怪物。

msg: Pure and radiant, he wields love to shrive clean the hearts of men.
msg_zh: 拥有纯真的心，盈满光辉，\n却凭借着爱，淡化人们的心。

msg: There is nothing more terrifying.
msg_zh: ……对此，我打从心里感到恐惧。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. Miquella the Kind makes my blood run cold.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，米凯拉大人太可怕了。

msg: I am loath to admit it, but even at this very instant I wish to run very far away indeed.
msg_zh: 我也顾不得丢脸，真想立刻逃离这地方。

msg: You must be the Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……您就是传闻中的那位褪色者？

msg: I am Ansbach. Formerly in service to Lord Mohg.
msg_zh: 我的名字是安帕赫，过去曾侍奉蒙格大人……

msg: But now, like you, another soul guided by Kindly Miquella.
msg_zh: 现在和您一样，接受米凯拉大人的引导。

msg: I'm hardly the steady hand I once was. My fighting days are far behind me.
msg_zh: 话虽如此，我不过是一介老弱残兵。\n那些需要动干戈的事，也是爱莫能助。

msg: Yes, I am well aware.
msg_zh: ……对，我知道。

msg: Kindly Miquella has discarded his Great Rune.
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人舍弃了大卢恩。

msg: The fog that vexed my aging faculties has been lifted.
msg_zh: 多亏如此，那令人不快的朦胧感也随之散去……

msg: And follies better left forgotten haunt me once again.
msg_zh: ……让我想起了不堪的往事。

msg: Once, in an attempt to free Lord Mohg from his enchantment,
msg_zh: 我曾为了解除吾主，蒙格大人受到的魅惑……

msg: I challenged Tender Miquella, only to have my own heart rather artfully stolen.
msg_zh: 于是挑战了米凯拉大人，\n结果事不成，反倒被他深深吸引。

msg: I knew not how weak I was.
msg_zh: 现在想想，我也是自负了。

msg: I believed that with sufficient mastery, even an Empyrean would be within reach of my blade.
msg_zh: 以为靠自己锻炼的身手，对付得了神人。

msg: I could not have been more mistaken...
msg_zh: ……这种事情打从一开始就不可能。

msg: Miquella the Kind...is a monster.
msg_zh: ……那位大人是怪物。

msg: Pure and radiant, he wields love to shrive clean the hearts of men.
msg_zh: 拥有纯真的心，盈满光辉，\n却凭借着爱，淡化人们的心。

msg: There is nothing more terrifying.
msg_zh: ……对此，我打从心里感到恐惧。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. It's been some time.
msg_zh: ……噢，褪色者啊，好久不见了。

msg: After unburdening my soul to you, I had hoped to make a fresh start.
msg_zh: 说完那段丧气话之后再会，想来真难为情。

msg: But there was one thought I could not dislodge from my mind.
msg_zh: 只是有些事情，萦绕在心头不去。

msg: So here I am, quite unable to move on.
msg_zh: 于是，我继续留在这里。

msg: ...There was one thought I could not dislodge from my mind.
msg_zh: 只是有些事情，萦绕在心头不去。

msg: After Lord Mohg's slaying at his dynastic palace,
msg_zh: ……蒙格大人在那座王朝庙，被不知名人士打倒。

msg: it appears his body has been absconded with.
msg_zh: 随后发现了大人的遗体被运走的迹象。

msg: And taken straight to Kind Miquella.
msg_zh: 看来遗体是被运到米凯拉大人的身边。

msg: Surely you recall that I once served Lord Mohg as a Pureblood Knight.
msg_zh: 再怎么说，我也是以纯血骑士身分，侍奉蒙格大人的人。

msg: After failing him in every regard, and losing sight of my vows,
msg_zh: 然而却一事无成，甚至忘记誓言。

msg: I'd do anything to make amends, in whatever meagre way I can.
msg_zh: 如果有机会赎罪，我会竭尽所能……

msg: What could they possibly have in mind for Lord Mohg's remains?
msg_zh: ……他们想用蒙格大人的遗体做些什么？

msg: The implications are rather...unnerving.
msg_zh: 实在是令人非常在意。

msg: Freyja, by the gods...
msg_zh: ……弗蕾亚现在是那种情况啊。

msg: She must be feeling the need to reaffirm her allegiance before she heads to war...
msg_zh: 在挺身而战前，先确认背后的信念──

msg: A true Redmane she is, hardly troubled by the rot.
msg_zh: 即使受腐败重创，果然红狮子还是红狮子。

msg: But no-one is without their shortcomings...
msg_zh: ……只是说，人各有所长。

msg: She has a hard road ahead...
msg_zh: 想必她一定伤透脑筋……

msg: Hmm, it does make one think...
Perhaps our concerns are but two sides of the same coin?
msg_zh: 该不会这两个问题，其实息息相关……？

msg: Well, what's this...
msg_zh: 哦，这是……

msg: Yes, yes, I should have known.
msg_zh: ……原来是这么一回事……

msg: Even the truth was itself mere folly.
msg_zh: 真相总是见不得光。

msg: As if using Lord Mohg to gain entrance to the land of shadow were not enough,
msg_zh: 利用蒙格大人抵达幽影之地了，还不满足──

msg: he plans to use his corpse as the vessel of his king consort.
msg_zh: 竟然还想利用大人的遗体，作为王依附的容器。

msg: He has forsaken Lord Mohg's soul. He desires only his empty shell.
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人需要的不是灵魂，而是一具空壳。

msg: It beggars belief, but…
msg_zh: ……但是啊……

msg: I'm afraid Tender Miquella fails to grasp the humiliation implied by this act.
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人肯定不曾想过，这是一种耻辱。

msg: One thing is certain. My dear lord deserved better.
msg_zh: ……吾主啊，这实在太过悲哀了。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. You have my gratitude.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，谢谢您。

msg: You have given me the answers I needed.
msg_zh: 多亏您的帮助，问题都有了解答。

msg: But I can hardly fathom it. Such folly, unto the end.
msg_zh: ……只不过，这件事真令人不齿。

msg: I am a warrior, but I've aged. I cannot afford to act hastily.
msg_zh: 但一介老弱残兵，已经没有自负的本钱。

msg: Curse it all. I know my limits.
msg_zh: ……毕竟都亲身体验过了。

msg: I could spend the rest of my life honing my craft, and still that creature would be out of my blade's reach.
msg_zh: 再怎么锻炼身手，也不可能对付得了那种存在。

msg: The absolute folly of it all.
msg_zh: ……真的是令人不齿。

msg: Righteous Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊。

msg: Could you please give this to Freyja?
msg_zh: 可以请您帮忙转交这个给弗蕾亚吗？

msg: Thanks to you, she, too, will have the answer she requires.
msg_zh: 因为有您的帮助，她的问题也有了答案。

msg: Freyja possesses a youth I no longer have.
msg_zh: ……弗蕾亚和我这老弱残兵不同，

msg: This knowledge will surely stoke the flames of valour within her.
msg_zh: 这份解答一定能驱使她挺身而战，战得炙热。

msg: Yes, I can see her barreling into the fray right now...
msg_zh: ……是啊，我其实对那位豪杰很有好感。

msg: Perhaps I shouldn't meddle in her affairs...
msg_zh: ……仔细一想，我还真是爱插手管事。

msg: But this is the only way I can help...
msg_zh: 反观自己，倒是一事无成。

msg: Freyja, by the gods...
msg_zh: ……弗蕾亚现在是那种情况啊。

msg: She must be feeling the need to reaffirm her allegiance before she heads to war...
msg_zh: 在挺身而战前，先确认背后的信念──

msg: A true Redmane she is, hardly troubled by the rot.
msg_zh: 即使受腐败重创，果然红狮子还是红狮子。

msg: Righteous Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊。

msg: Could you please give this to Freyja?
msg_zh: 可以请您帮忙转交这个给弗蕾亚吗？

msg: Thanks to you, she, too, will have the answer she requires.
msg_zh: 因为有您的帮助，她的问题也有了答案。

msg: Yes, I can see her barreling into the fray right now...
msg_zh: ……是啊，我其实对那位豪杰很有好感。

msg: Ha ha ha...
msg_zh: ……哈哈。

msg: I should have expected as much from Freyja!
msg_zh: 很有弗蕾亚的风格。

msg: Some things simply never occur to her.
msg_zh: 她肯定无法想象吧──

msg: Paralyzing fear. True despair.
msg_zh: 什么叫恐惧，什么叫绝望。

msg: That's Freyja, through and through.
msg_zh: ……真的是很有弗蕾亚的风格。

msg: Ungh...
msg_zh: 呜！

msg: What on earth is the matter?
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，您是怎么了？

msg: Have you come to your senses?
msg_zh: ……冷静下来了吗？

msg: Now, there's no need for any hand-wringing.
msg_zh: 不用放在心上。

msg: The way the world is, I'd say it's a wonder people don't lash out more often.
msg_zh: 世态如此，一时冲动也是在所难免。

msg: There is no denying it, now.
msg_zh: ……我明白了。

msg: A culling appears to be on the cards.
msg_zh: 所谓的“排除异己”，是吗？

msg: One that won't overlook even an aging soldier as myself...
msg_zh: 对一介老弱残兵，还真是慎重其事。

msg: Righteous Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊。

msg: You should have taken stock of your limitations.
msg_zh: 世事理当量力而为。

msg: I only wanted to play my part...
msg_zh: ……到头来，一事无成啊……

msg: Curse these ageing bones...
msg_zh: 我也是老了……

msg: So, you would cull an old man such as I?
msg_zh: ……排除异己，连老弱残兵也不放过啊。

msg: You are thorough indeed, Lady Leda. I would expect nothing less.
msg_zh: 这么深思熟虑，蕾妲，很有您的风格。

msg: As you surmise, I do have my doubts.
msg_zh: ……不过，我确实还在仿徨。

msg: And will not simply lay down and die with them.
msg_zh: 所以也会做出该有的挣扎。

msg: Have you lost your wits?
msg_zh: ……您也真是特异独行。

msg: By my troth, you have no such debt to this old man.
msg_zh: 实在没必要陪一个老人，度过他的仿徨。

msg: Though I gladly welcome your decision.
msg_zh: ……感谢您拔刀相助。

msg: Now I might even live to see the morrow...
msg_zh: 如此一来，就多了胜算。

msg: UnkText
UnkText
Lady Leda, I ask you keep Kindly Miquella in your care.
msg_zh: ……蕾妲啊，请代为关照米凯拉大人。

msg: So, you would cull an old man such as I?
msg_zh: ……排除异己，连老弱残兵也不放过啊。

msg: You are thorough indeed, Lady Leda. I would expect nothing less.
msg_zh: 这么深思熟虑，蕾妲，很有您的风格。

msg: As you surmise, I do have my doubts.
msg_zh: ……不过，我确实还在仿徨。

msg: And will not simply lay down and die with them.
msg_zh: 所以也会做出该有的挣扎。

msg: So, you've taken Lady Leda's side.
msg_zh: ……您站在蕾妲的那一边啊。

msg: I'm glad she stands with an ally.
msg_zh: 这样我就放心了。

msg: She tends to overestimate...
msg_zh: ……她的身上有太多重担，

msg: The burden she might carry alone.
msg_zh: 其实不如她自己想象得坚强。

msg: Well, this is an unexpected victory.
msg_zh: ……我居然会赢，真没料到。

msg: It seems I have my uses yet...
msg_zh: 看来我还是宝刀未老。

msg: I've utterly failed you both...
msg_zh: ……我还是一事无成。

msg: Miquella the Kind, Lord Mohg...
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人、蒙格大人……

msg: I am Ansbach of the Pureblood Knights.
msg_zh: ……“纯血骑士”安帕赫──

msg: I stand with blade aloft, blood afire.
msg_zh: 高举吾镰，鲜血奔扬。

msg: For the dignity of my lord and master, Mohg.
msg_zh: 为吾主蒙格的尊严而战。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. It appears that our interests have aligned.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，看来彼此利害关系一致。

msg: A balm upon my soul it is, that we do not meet today as enemies.
msg_zh: 幸好您不是敌人，真令人无比喜悦。

msg: Now, my blade. Watch closely.
msg_zh: ……那么，容我献丑了。

msg: Ha-hah!
msg_zh: ……哈哈。

msg: How readily the sensation returns! The runaway spirit of war!
msg_zh: 没想到那么轻易，就能回想起战斗的激昂！

msg: Lady Leda. Your suspicions were dead-on.
msg_zh: ……蕾妲啊，正如同您所担忧的。

msg: In the end, I could not bury the memories.
msg_zh: ……我无法放下──

msg: Of Lord Mohg, and our pact of blood.
msg_zh: 放下蒙格大人，还有以鲜血立下的誓约。

msg: Well, good Freyja.
msg_zh: ……那么，弗蕾亚啊。

msg: It will be my honour to test my blade against a Redmane.
msg_zh: 我的镰刀，红狮子可还满意？

msg: Lord Mohg, your honour...
msg_zh: ……蒙格大人，愿荣耀归于您……

msg: Was my only...
msg_zh: 就算只有、我……

msg: Righteous Tarnished. That was an astounding battle, to be sure.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，刚才的战斗真是精采。

msg: Now I suppose this leaves only one.
msg_zh: ……接下来，还差最后一步。

msg: But in truth, I cannot calm my quivering. Challenging a god is no small matter.
msg_zh: ……要挑战神祇，仔细一想，真令人战栗。

msg: Only one more to go.
msg_zh: ……还差最后一步。

msg: But in truth, I cannot calm my quivering. Challenging a god is no small matter.
msg_zh: ……要挑战神祇，仔细一想，真令人战栗。

msg: I am afraid I underestimated the lad.
msg_zh: ……我太低估他了。

msg: Appearing frail in both body and mind, I presumed he'd be like to stumble upon the field of battle...
msg_zh: 认定他的身心都纤弱，不适合踏上战场……

msg: What a fool I was.
msg_zh: 这是多么愚蠢的偏见。

msg: He serves another master, but Sir Thiollier performed magnificently.
msg_zh: 即使侍奉的对象不同，休里耶的表现也十分了得。

msg: Perhaps he too quivers with anticipation.
msg_zh: ……现在的他，可能也正感到战栗。

msg: As do we.
msg_zh: 就和我们一样。

msg: Oh, something you want to get off your chest?
msg_zh: ……噢，您心有芥蒂吗？

msg: Well, you needn't worry.
msg_zh: 一切我都知情──

msg: It was you, wasn't it? Who defeated Lord Mohg.
msg_zh: 打倒吾主蒙格的人，就是您吧？

msg: Fear not, I bear no grudge against you.
msg_zh: ……我无意出言指责。

msg: His Eminence was felled in an honourable duel, and such are the risks of seeking Lordship.
msg_zh: 正面对决、败下阵──\n这是渴望为王的人，要面对的宿命。

msg: Besides, what right have I to complain? I blame the enchantment more than anything.
msg_zh: 除此之外，我因为魅惑忘了一切，更没有立场指责。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. We will have our victory.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，我将助您得胜。

msg: I swear upon my blood.
msg_zh: 以我的鲜血发誓。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. We will have our victory.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，我将助您得胜。

msg: I swear upon my blood.
msg_zh: 以我的鲜血发誓。

msg: General Radahn. A pleasure to see you, after all this time.
msg_zh: ……拉塔恩将军，久未问候了。

msg: But those remains do not belong to you.
msg_zh: 为了吾主蒙格的尊严，

msg: Lord Mohg will have his dignity.
msg_zh: 还请您归还那副躯体。

msg: Righteous Tarnished. Become our new lord.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，当上王吧──

msg: A lord not for gods, but for men.
msg_zh: 不是为了神祇，而是为了人们而在的王。

msg: Ahh, Lady Leda spoke of you.
msg_zh: ……啊，我有听蕾妲说过。

msg: You're that Tarnished. Guided here by Kindly Miquella. Weren't we all.
msg_zh: 你是那个，和我们一样受米凯拉大人指引的褪色者吧？

msg: I am Freyja. I once fought alongside General Radahn.
msg_zh: 我叫弗蕾亚，过去曾和拉塔恩将军并肩作战。

msg: In battle, you can be sure I'll hold my own.
msg_zh: 在战场上需要帮忙，找我就对了。

msg: Oh, another thing.
msg_zh: ……啊，对了。

msg: Did you speak to our dour little friend?
msg_zh: 你有和那个阴沉男讲过话吗？

msg: If you've yet to do so, have him give you a map of the crosses' whereabouts.
msg_zh: 如果还没，找那个男的拿十字记号的地图吧。

msg: You'll find more of them dotted about these lands.
msg_zh: ……在这块土地，还有其他和这个一样的十字记号。

msg: They are Miquella the Kind's footprints.
msg_zh: 那些都是米凯拉大人的足迹。

msg: If you've yet to do so, be sure to have our dour little friend share his map of crosses.
msg_zh: ……如果你打算追寻米凯拉大人，

msg: Assuming you intend to trace Kind Miquella's path...
msg_zh: 先找那个阴沉男拿十字记号的地图吧。

msg: In battle, you can be sure I'll hold my own.
msg_zh: ……在战场上需要帮忙的时候，别客气啊。

msg: Ah, well met.
msg_zh: ……喔，是你啊。

msg: That was a fine battle indeed.
msg_zh: 刚才的战斗还真精彩。

msg: It heartens me, that another warrior stands among us. Among the beckoned.
msg_zh: 我很高兴耶，没想到受指引的同伴里，\n还有你这种身手的战士。

msg: Ah, Lady Leda spoke of you.
msg_zh: ……啊，我有听蕾妲说过。

msg: You're that Tarnished. Guided here by Kindly Miquella. Weren't we all.
msg_zh: 你是那个，和我们一样受米凯拉大人指引的褪色者吧？

msg: I am Freyja. I once fought alongside General Radahn.
msg_zh: 我叫弗蕾亚，过去曾和拉塔恩将军并肩作战。

msg: You demonstrated great valour in battle.
msg_zh: ……你刚才的战斗表现还真精彩。

msg: It heartens me, that another warrior stands among us. Among the beckoned.
msg_zh: 我很高兴耶，没想到受指引的同伴里，\n还有你这种身手的战士。

msg: Long ago, I was stricken by scarlet rot in the Swamp of Aeonia.
msg_zh: ……我以前在艾奥尼亚的时候，中了很严重的毒。

msg: Immobile, feverish, and in great pain, I was entirely resigned to death.
msg_zh: 因为发了高烧、浑身剧痛，完全无法动弹，\n就只能等时间到了上路。

msg: I was left behind, and only Kindly Miquella was good enough to seek me out.
msg_zh: ……在那当下，米凯拉大人却发现了我──

msg: My wound was swollen and festering—exuding a most pungent odour—
msg_zh: 找出那个肿胀、溃烂又发臭的伤口之后，

msg: and yet he drained the poison from it.
msg_zh: 他居然直接就口，把毒吸出来。

msg: ...Despite my wretched visage.
msg_zh: ……对不堪入目的我，他竟然愿意这么做。

msg: Now, I consider this wound my compass.
msg_zh: 所以这道伤口，就是赐予我的指引。

msg: Let us both take Kindly Miquella's guidance to heart.
msg_zh: ……一起遵从米凯拉大人的指引吧。

msg: May we meet again on the battlefield, brave warrior.
msg_zh: 战士啊，之后战场上再会了。

msg: May we meet again on the battlefield, brave warrior.
msg_zh: ……战士啊，之后战场上再会了。

msg: Do you wonder why the eternally dour fellow keeps his distance?
msg_zh: ……那男的拒人于千里之外的态度，你很介意啊？

msg: He's one of the tower's hornsent.
msg_zh: ……因为他是塔之民，也就是角人嘛。

msg: I can only assume he fights for his own reasons, and carries his own burdens.
msg_zh: 战斗动机啊，想法之类的，肯定不少吧……

msg: But we needn't concern ourselves with his affairs.
msg_zh: 但介意又能怎样呢？

msg: He, too, was charmed by Kindly Miquella, and guided here.
msg_zh: 那男的受米凯拉大人吸引，也接受了指引。

msg: And that makes us allies.
msg_zh: 这样就够了。

msg: We're not gods, you and I. Even if we did manage to dig up the secrets of his past...
msg_zh: ……知道再多也不能干么。大家都不是神，

msg: I doubt our meddling could ever amount to much.
msg_zh: 能做的事情有限。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……喔，是你啊。

msg: Good. If you happen to see Lady Leda,
msg_zh: 来得正好，等你遇到蕾妲，帮我转告她。

msg: tell her that I'm striking out on my own.
msg_zh: 说“我要暂时分开行动”。

msg: Don't worry. I've no mind to cross any of you.
msg_zh: ……别担心啦，我不会和你们作对。

msg: The guidance of Kind Miquella remains etched into my very flesh.
msg_zh: 我的心中还是一样，有米凯拉大人的指引。

msg: It's only, there's something that I must know.
msg_zh: ……只是有一件事情，我必须查清楚。

msg: Ah, Lady Leda spoke of you.
msg_zh: ……啊，我有听蕾妲说过。

msg: You're that Tarnished. Guided here by Kindly Miquella. Weren't we all.
msg_zh: 你是那个，和我们一样受米凯拉大人指引的褪色者吧？

msg: I am Freyja. I once fought alongside General Radahn.
msg_zh: 我叫弗蕾亚，过去曾和拉塔恩将军并肩作战。

msg: You picked quite the time to show up, with the enchantment having faded...
msg_zh: 你还真刚好，挑在魅惑失效的时候出现……

msg: No matter. If you happen to see Lady Leda,
msg_zh: 嗯，也好啦。等你遇到蕾妲，帮我转告她。

msg: tell her that I'm striking out on my own.
msg_zh: 说“我要暂时分开行动”。

msg: Don't worry. I've no mind to cross any of you.
msg_zh: ……别担心啦，我不会和你们作对。

msg: The guidance of Kind Miquella remains etched into my very flesh.
msg_zh: 我的心中还是一样，有米凯拉大人的指引。

msg: It's only, there's something that I must know.
msg_zh: ……只是有一件事情，我必须查清楚。

msg: Ahh, Lady Leda spoke of you.
msg_zh: ……啊，我有听蕾妲说过。

msg: You're that Tarnished. Guided here by Kindly Miquella. Weren't we all.
msg_zh: 你是那个，和我们一样受米凯拉大人指引的褪色者吧？

msg: I am Freyja. I once fought alongside General Radahn.
msg_zh: 我叫弗蕾亚，过去曾和拉塔恩将军并肩作战。

msg: You demonstrated great valour in battle.
msg_zh: ……你那时候的战斗表现还真精彩。

msg: But this wasn't the best time to show up, now the enchantment's faded...
msg_zh: 但怎么那么刚好，挑在魅惑失效的时候出现……

msg: No matter. If you happen to see Lady Leda,
msg_zh: 嗯，也好啦。等你遇到蕾妲，帮我转告她。

msg: tell her that I'm striking out on my own.
msg_zh: 说“我要暂时分开行动”。

msg: Don't worry. I've no mind to cross any of you.
msg_zh: ……别担心啦，我不会和你们作对。

msg: The guidance of Kind Miquella remains etched into my very flesh.
msg_zh: 我的心中还是一样，有米凯拉大人的指引。

msg: It's only, there's something that I must know.
msg_zh: ……只是有一件事情，我必须查清楚。

msg: I'll be out on my own for some time.
msg_zh: ……我要暂时分开行动。

msg: There's something I must know.
msg_zh: 有一件事情，我必须查清楚……

msg: Kindly Miquella spoke...
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人说过。

msg: of the vow he once made with General Radahn.
msg_zh: 在过去，他和拉塔恩将军有过约定。

msg: And...it is here the vow shall be honoured.
msg_zh: ……然后那约定，就要在这块土地履行。

msg: I am a Redmane.
msg_zh: 我是红狮子──

msg: I must know the nature of the vow.
msg_zh: 所以我必须查明，那“约定”究竟是什么。

msg: There is no need for concern.
msg_zh: ……就说了，不用担心啦。

msg: I will be true to my word.
msg_zh: 我没有欺骗你的意思。

msg: Though I do feel a hint of regret.
msg_zh: ……但老实说，是有一点可惜。

msg: Lady Leda, honourable Ansbach, and warriors like you, are all of a special breed.
msg_zh: 像你啊、蕾妲，还有安帕赫，都是很特别的战士。

msg: How glorious it would have been, had we met in battle as sworn enemies.
msg_zh: 要是在战场交锋，肯定会是一场炙热的战斗。

msg: There is no need for concern.
msg_zh: ……就说了，不用担心啦。

msg: I will be true to my word.
msg_zh: 我没有欺骗你的意思。

msg: Though I do feel a hint of regret.
msg_zh: ……但老实说，是有一点可惜。

msg: Lady Leda and honourable Ansbach are of a special breed.
msg_zh: 像蕾妲啊，还有安帕赫，都是很特别的战士。

msg: How glorious it would have been, had we met in battle as sworn enemies.
msg_zh: 要是在战场交锋，肯定会是一场炙热的战斗。

msg: Hmm, let me see...
msg_zh: ……嗯，这个嘛……

msg: Fickle, fidgety little letters.
msg_zh: 密密麻麻的字也太烦了吧……

msg: I should wipe you clean off the page.
msg_zh: 干脆敲坏算了……

msg: Ahh... Now, now, Freyja. Don't let it rile you up.
msg_zh: ……不行，弗蕾亚啊，你要沉得住气……

msg: Take it slow, take it slow.
msg_zh: ……要忍耐、忍耐……

msg: By my lord...
Will I ever make sense of this jumble?
msg_zh: 该拿这东西怎么办啊……？

msg: Oh. Hello.
msg_zh: ……喔，是你啊。

msg: I'm afraid I'm busy.
msg_zh: 抱歉，我正在忙。

msg: ...A curse upon my lack of foresight.
msg_zh: ……真受不了自己的笨脑袋。

msg: I should have asked Ansbach to impart his knowledge when I had the chance.
msg_zh: 早知如此，当时就不该嫌麻烦，\n好好向安帕赫讨教才对。

msg: I'm afraid I'm busy.
msg_zh: ……抱歉，我正在忙。

msg: Truly, I should have asked Ansbach to impart his knowledge when I had the chance.
msg_zh: ……受不了，早知道就该好好向安帕赫讨教。

msg: From Sir Ansbach, to me?
msg_zh: ……安帕赫要给我的？

msg: What on earth could it...
msg_zh: 有什么事啊……？

msg: Yes, of course, I see.
msg_zh: 原来……

msg: As the festival of war concluded, General Radahn's soul met an honourable end.
msg_zh: 战斗祭典结束，将军的灵魂迎向了充满名誉的结局。

msg: But Kindly Miquella wishes to revive it.
msg_zh: 要再唤回将军的灵魂啊……

msg: ...Which is fine by me.
msg_zh: ……这样很好啊。

msg: I know it would pain old Jerren, but war has always suited General Radahn best.
msg_zh: 这么说对杰廉老爷爷很不好意思，\n但我觉得，拉塔恩将军更适合投入战斗。

msg: And certainly far more than any honourable death.
msg_zh: 比起什么充满名誉的结局，还更适合。

msg: Endless war to invigorate the soul.
msg_zh: 无穷无尽的战斗、炙热不已的战斗──

msg: As befits General Radahn, the great lion.
msg_zh: 这才是拉塔恩将军，才是狮子啊。

msg: Thank you. Now I've finally cast off my misgivings.
msg_zh: ……谢谢你。多亏有你，我不犹豫了。

msg: Give my regards to honourable Ansbach.
msg_zh: 也帮我谢谢安帕赫。

msg: Tell him if we should meet in battle,
msg_zh: ……然后帮我转告他，“之后在战场上再会吧”。

msg: to face your bow would be fine enough, but to face your blade would be an honour.
msg_zh: “到时候除了弓以外，也想受你的镰刀指教”。

msg: Brave warrior. Perhaps next time we, too, will meet on the battlefield.
msg_zh: 战士啊，希望之后在战场上也能和你再会。

msg: All that remains is the fight. For our Kind Miquella.
msg_zh: 接下来该做的，就只剩为米凯拉大人而战。

msg: Ngh!
What's the matter with you?
msg_zh: 你在做什么？

msg: Are you done?
msg_zh: ……算了，没关系啦。

msg: Kindly Miquella's enchantment has expired.
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人的魅惑失效了嘛，

msg: It can be disorientating, to say the least.
msg_zh: 你大概脑子一时混乱吧。

msg: Looking for a fight, are you.
msg_zh: ……原来如此，你想打吗？

msg: Fine by me.
msg_zh: 那就来吧。

msg: Those squirmy little letters were driving me mad.
msg_zh: 正好，那堆密密麻麻的字快烦死我了。

msg: And I've vigour to spare.
msg_zh: 让我发泄一下吧！

msg: Looking for a fight, are you.
msg_zh: ……原来如此，你想打吗？

msg: Haven't you any patience whatsoever?
msg_zh: 那么性急啊？

msg: No matter. I could do with a warm-up.
msg_zh: 好吧，当作暖身也好。

msg: What a pitiful place to meet your end.
msg_zh: ……你的死亡毫无名誉可言。

msg: A warrior should know—any fight might be your last.
msg_zh: 你该知道，自己为了什么而战。

msg: What's the matter with you...
msg_zh: ……你、到底是……

msg: Lady Leda, beware.
msg_zh: 蕾妲，你要小心……

msg: I am the Redmane, Freyja.
msg_zh: “红狮子”弗蕾亚──

msg: The time has come.
msg_zh: 请指教。

msg: I could not hope for a worthier foe.
msg_zh: ……你是敌人啊，真开心。

msg: This is our moment. Let's make it something to remember.
msg_zh: 这么好的机会，彼此炙热一战吧。

msg: I never could have imagined it.
msg_zh: ……不过啊，我做梦都没想到，

msg: That you might be the Erdtree's rightful lord.
msg_zh: 你居然是要成为黄金树之王的人。

msg: Ha ha ha... Such as it is, this battle could not be more fitting.
msg_zh: 哈哈，那这场战斗还真对头。

msg: For the birth of a new god, and the coming of a lord!
msg_zh: 真适合新生神祇，还有降临的王！

msg: Thank you, Sir Ansbach.
msg_zh: ……安帕赫，我由衷感谢。

msg: The mere sight of your blade sets my heart aflutter.
msg_zh: 你的镰刀还是一样，美得令人起鸡皮疙瘩。

msg: All the more I yearn to crush it in my grasp!
msg_zh: ……所以更有亲手摧毁的价值！

msg: There can only be one lord.
msg_zh: ……我们要的，只有一个王。

msg: And you are not worthy.
msg_zh: 但那个王，不是你。

msg: I offer this fight...
msg_zh: ……我愿、挺身而战……

msg: To Miquella the Kind. And Rada...
msg_zh: 为米凯拉大人、拉塔……

msg: You were fine...in your part...
msg_zh: ……你不赖嘛。

msg: Truly, a glorious battle...it was...
msg_zh: 这场战斗，真的炙热……

msg: Ahh, were you guided here by Kindly Miquella?
msg_zh: ……噢，你也感受到了米凯拉大人的引导？

msg: I am Leda. And like you, I was guided by faith along his honourable path.
msg_zh: 我名叫蕾妲。和你一样遵循引导，追寻着那位大人。

msg: Touch the withered arm, and you too, will be transported.
msg_zh: 触碰那只干枯的手臂后，你也会受到指引──

msg: To the realm of shadow where Miquella the Kind now dwells.
msg_zh: 前往米凯拉大人所在的幽影之地。

msg: My compatriots are there already.
msg_zh: ……在幽影之地，有我的同伴。

msg: Like us, they have heard Kindly Miquella's call.
msg_zh: 那些和我们一样，受米凯拉大人引导的人。

msg: If you can find them, they are certain to lend you aid.
msg_zh: 若有幸相遇，想必他们会对你伸出援手。

msg: Come, now. Touch the withered arm, and travel to the realm of shadow.
msg_zh: 来吧，触碰那只干枯手臂，前往幽影之地。

msg: I will not be far behind. May we meet again.
msg_zh: 我稍后也会前往，届时再见。

msg: Hello again.
msg_zh: 你好，是你啊。

msg: Did you meet my compatriots?
msg_zh: 你有遇见我的同伴吗？

msg: They're quite the congregation. From places as far and wide as you can imagine.
msg_zh: ……想来你一定大吃一惊吧？\n所有人的出身之类的，全部大相径庭。

msg: Doubtless they'd have all come to blows at first glance...
msg_zh: 即使会爆发冲突，也不奇怪。

msg: Were it not for the charm Kindly Miquella put upon us.
msg_zh: 只是现在，我们都深受米凯拉大人吸引。

msg: This is what allows us to serve together.
msg_zh: 也因此，彼此能够携手合作……

msg: The work of a living god.
msg_zh: 这是名符其实的神迹。

msg: We are all utterly captivated by Kindly Miquella.
msg_zh: 我们都深受米凯拉大人吸引。

msg: It is what binds us together.
msg_zh: ……也因此，我们是同伴。

msg: Oh, that man is known as Dane.
msg_zh: ……噢，那位男性名叫丹恩。

msg: He's been in the service of Miquella the Kind longer than I.
msg_zh: 他侍奉米凯拉大人的时间比我早得多。

msg: He might be solemn of cheer, but is a fierce warrior nevertheless.
msg_zh: 个性一丝不苟，是一名杰出的习武之人。

msg: There's no cause for concern—
msg_zh: ……希望你不要误会丹恩的为人。

msg: Dane's reluctance to speak to you is no fault of your own.
msg_zh: 他不愿和你对话，并不是针对你。

msg: We've been acquainted for quite some time, but even I am yet to hear his voice.
msg_zh: 我认识他一段时日了，也不曾听他开口说话。

msg: Perhaps one day.
msg_zh: ……真希望未来有机会。

msg: Wondering about the hornsent, are you?
msg_zh: ……你好奇角人啊？

msg: True enough, in any other circumstance he'd be at our throats...
msg_zh: 说到可能会爆发冲突的人，的确会先想起他。

msg: Long ago, Queen Marika commanded Sir Messmer to purge the tower folk.
msg_zh: ……玛莉卡大人命令梅瑟莫先生肃清塔之民族，

msg: A cleansing by fire.
msg_zh: 他的族人因此蒙受火难。

msg: It's no wonder the hornsent holds the Erdtree in contempt.
msg_zh: ……不能原谅黄金树，也是合情合理。

msg: That aside, man is by nature a creature of conquest.
msg_zh: 不过，残害同类是人的天性──

msg: And in this regard, the tower folk are no different.
msg_zh: 塔之民族也不例外。

msg: They were never saints.
msg_zh: 他们不是平白无辜的好人。

msg: They just happened to be on the losing side of a war.
msg_zh: 只不过是恰巧，沦为输家。

msg: But it's still a wretched shame.
msg_zh: ……真令人感伤。

msg: Ah, finally we meet.
msg_zh: 噢，遇见你了。

msg: I am Leda. I missed my chance to speak with you last time,
msg_zh: 我名叫蕾妲，先前我们没有机会交谈。

msg: but you too must have been guided here by Kindly Miquella.
msg_zh: 这么看来，你也受到米凯拉大人的引导。

msg: Have you met my compatriots?
msg_zh: 那么，你有遇见我的同伴吗？

msg: They were drawn here by Miquella the Kind, much like you, following the path he himself trod.
msg_zh: 他们和你一样受米凯拉大人引导，追寻着那位大人。

msg: You must have been surprised to see such a band, each come from places far and wide...
msg_zh: ……想来你一定大吃一惊吧？\n所有人的出身之类的，全部大相径庭。

msg: Doubtless they'd have all come to blows at first glance...
msg_zh: 即使会爆发冲突，也不奇怪。

msg: Were it not for the charm Kindly Miquella put upon us.
msg_zh: 只是现在，我们都深受米凯拉大人吸引。

msg: That is what allows us to serve together.
msg_zh: 也因此，彼此能够携手合作……

msg: The work of a living god.
msg_zh: 这是名符其实的神迹。

msg: Oh, hello.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。

msg: Did you feel it? Miquella the Kind's enchantment appears to have broken.
msg_zh: 你也有感觉到吧？米凯拉大人的魅惑应该失效了。

msg: But while my devotion to Kindly Miquella remains unchanged,
msg_zh: 我本身对米凯拉大人的心意，不会因此生变。

msg: by my troth, I am not so sure about the others.
msg_zh: 可是同伴们却不一定，这下子麻烦了……

msg: No, wait. Perhaps this is a blessing in disguise.
msg_zh: 不对，转念一想，这反而是好事。

msg: I can wield my sword to cull the undeserving, those unfit to bask in Tender Miquella's presence.
msg_zh: 不配服侍米凯拉大人的，直接用剑制裁……

msg: I should've thought of this earlier.
msg_zh: 这种作法才适合我。

msg: Right. It's time to begin ferreting out....
msg_zh: ……好，我就仔细观察，

msg: Those of us who don't deserve to be at Kindly Miquella's side...
msg_zh: 有哪些人不配服侍米凯拉大人。

msg: Ah, finally we meet.
msg_zh: 噢，遇见你了。

msg: I am Leda. I missed my chance to speak with you last time,
msg_zh: 我名叫蕾妲，先前我们没有机会交谈。

msg: but you too must have been guided here by Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 这么看来，你也受到米凯拉大人的引导。

msg: Then you must have felt it. Tender Miquella's enchantment has broken.
msg_zh: ……那么，你也有感觉到吧？\n米凯拉大人的魅惑应该失效了。

msg: But while my devotion to Kindly Miquella remains unchanged,
msg_zh: 我本身对米凯拉大人的心意，不会因此生变。

msg: by my troth, I am not so sure about the others.
msg_zh: 可是同伴们却不一定，这下子麻烦了……

msg: No, wait. Perhaps this is a blessing in disguise.
msg_zh: 不对，转念一想，这反而是好事。

msg: I can wield my sword to cull the undeserving, those unfit to bask in Miquella the Kind's presence.
msg_zh: 不配服侍米凯拉大人的，直接用剑制裁……

msg: I should've thought of this earlier.
msg_zh: 这种作法才适合我。

msg: Thiollier, hmm.
msg_zh: ……休里耶啊。

msg: It's true, his devotion to St. Trina is plain to see.
msg_zh: 确实，他的心思全放在托莉娜大人身上。

msg: I fear his vows to Miquella the Kind are merely secondary.
msg_zh: 关心的程度，更甚于对米凯拉大人的忠心。

msg: But for this very reason, Thiollier is incapable of betrayal.
msg_zh: ……但也因为如此，休里耶不会背叛。

msg: St. Trina's love for Kind Miquella is boundless.
msg_zh: 托莉娜大人深爱着米凯拉大人──

msg: She is, after all, his other half. Or perhaps her feelings go beyond even that.
msg_zh: 那是身为半身的爱，也可能是更深层的情感。

msg: Even if she was left behind, I doubt her heart would waver.
msg_zh: ……即使被米凯拉大人舍弃，也很难想象会就此生变。

msg: The hornsent, hmm.
msg_zh: ……角人啊。

msg: On one hand, he trusts Miquella the Kind to bring salvation to his people.
msg_zh: 他把救赎塔之民族的事情，寄托在米凯拉大人身上。

msg: With the enchantment lifted, his vengeful passions may once again ignite, but surely he'd be mindful of Kindly Miquella's promise...
msg_zh: 如果魅惑失效，心中的复仇之火再起，\n他会忘记这件事吗……？

msg: On the other hand, the hornsent does present his own dangers.
msg_zh: 不过，也对。他依旧是个危险人物。

msg: Perhaps your concerns are well-founded after all.
msg_zh: ……你说得对。

msg: Allow me some time to mull it over.
msg_zh: 我再考虑一下。

msg: Allow me some time to mull it over.
msg_zh: ……我再考虑一下。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。

msg: I've made up my mind—
msg_zh: 时机正好，告诉你一声。

msg: The hornsent will be eliminated.
msg_zh: ……的确有必要除掉角人。

msg: If he were to point his blade at Sir Messmer or Queen Marika, perhaps it would not matter.
msg_zh: 他要找梅瑟莫先生或玛莉卡大人复仇，这无所谓。

msg: But vengeance changes a man.
msg_zh: ……只是复仇之心，会使人性情大变。

msg: And one day, his blade may turn towards Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 说不定他的矛头，会转向米凯拉大人。

msg: Kindly Miquella is, after all, the true golden child.
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人是如假包换的黄金宠儿。

msg: Even if he discards every last drop of his being,
msg_zh: 即使当事人舍弃了一切……

msg: his lineage will always remain.
msg_zh: 也无法和自身的血缘划清界线。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。

msg: It took me long enough, I know, but I've made my decision.
msg_zh: 久等了，我想清楚了。

msg: I believe it wisest to eliminate the hornsent.
msg_zh: ……还是除掉角人，比较妥当。

msg: If he were to point his blade at Sir Messmer or Queen Marika, perhaps it would not matter.
msg_zh: 他要找梅瑟莫先生或玛莉卡大人复仇，这无所谓。

msg: But vengeance changes a man.
