msg_zh: ……只是复仇之心，会使人性情大变。

msg: And one day, his blade may turn towards Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 说不定他的矛头，会转向米凯拉大人。

msg: Kindly Miquella is, after all, the true golden child.
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人是如假包换的黄金宠儿。

msg: Even if he discards every last drop of his being,
msg_zh: 即使当事人舍弃了一切……

msg: his lineage will always remain.
msg_zh: 也无法和自身的血缘划清界线。

msg: I believe the hornsent suspects what I have in mind.
msg_zh: ……角人可能早有预感，事情会走到这一步。

msg: He never placed his full trust in me, even under the effect of Kindly Miquella's spell.
msg_zh: 即使在米凯拉大人的魅惑失效以前，\n他也完全不对我敞开心胸。

msg: He must've recognised something. The scent of the killer that slept within me.
msg_zh: 肯定是因为他察觉到了──连我自己都遗忘的本性，

msg: The stench of crusted blood.
msg_zh: 还有那挥之不去的血腥味。

msg: I will follow the hornsent.
msg_zh: ……我打算去找角人。

msg: To have his revenge on Sir Messmer, there is only one place he will go.
msg_zh: 如果他想找梅瑟莫先生复仇，目的地的话……

msg: The black keep.
msg_zh: 肯定是那座黑色城堡。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。

msg: It took me long enough, I know, but I've made my decision.
msg_zh: 久等了，我想清楚了。

msg: I'm going to leave the hornsent to his own devices.
msg_zh: ……我认为不需要处置角人。

msg: With his grudge against Sir Messmer settled, his blade is bent by madness.
msg_zh: 他对梅瑟莫先生复仇成功后，就此陷入疯狂。

msg: Wherever he goes he won't last long. I needn't bother with him.
msg_zh: 看那样子可能没多久就会丢了性命，不需要特地处置。

msg: Unruly emotions only lead to misfortune.
msg_zh: ……激情总是会使人不幸。

msg: All the more reason we need someone like Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 正因为如此，我们需要米凯拉大人。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。

msg: It took me long enough, I know, but I've made my decision.
msg_zh: 久等了，我想清楚了。

msg: I'm going to leave the hornsent to his own devices.
msg_zh: ……我认为不需要处置角人。

msg: With the object of his vengeance gone, his blade has grown dull.
msg_zh: 复仇对象被抢先下手，他就此陷入消沉。

msg: In that state, I don't imagine he will ever fight again. I needn't bother with him.
msg_zh: 看那样子应该失去了战斗的动力，不需要特地处置。

msg: Lest, of course, another target for his retribution should appear.
msg_zh: ……除非正好有适合复仇的对象，出现在他面前。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。

msg: Well fought. You have my gratitude.
msg_zh: 感谢你在那场战斗出手相助。

msg: He was never going to see eye to eye with us,
msg_zh: 那场战斗中，不存在沟通与理解……

msg: but his words were ill-founded.
msg_zh: 但害你连带被侮辱成“下三滥”，

msg: It was hard to hear, I know.
msg_zh: 对你很抱歉。

msg: I know I shouldn't let myself...
msg_zh: ……真不像我该有的作法。

msg: But I suppose it's only natural to feel the weight of one's deeds at times like these.
msg_zh: 这是我的坏习惯。\n断送他人的希望后，不由得会有些感伤。

msg: There is plenty left to be done. And I will see to it.
msg_zh: ……那些我该做的事，就尽力完成吧。

msg: Who else, I wonder....
msg_zh: ……那么，还有谁呢？

msg: I don't enjoy casting suspicion on anyone I've called a comrade.
msg_zh: 心情上是不想怀疑过去的同伴，

msg: But it's a small sacrifice in the grand scheme of things. We must eradicate all doubt...
msg_zh: 但要顺利完成大事，有必要未雨绸缪……

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。

msg: I've made up my mind—
msg_zh: 时机正好，告诉你一声。

msg: The hornsent is no longer a mortal danger.
msg_zh: ……没有必要除掉角人了。

msg: With his grudge against Sir Messmer settled, his blade is bent by madness.
msg_zh: 他对梅瑟莫先生复仇成功后，就此陷入疯狂。

msg: Wherever he goes he won't last long. I needn't bother with him.
msg_zh: 看那样子可能没多久就会丢了性命，不需要特地处置。

msg: Unruly emotions only lead to misfortune.
msg_zh: ……激情总是会使人不幸。

msg: All the more reason we need someone like Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 正因为如此，我们需要米凯拉大人。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。

msg: I've made up my mind—
msg_zh: 时机正好，告诉你一声。

msg: The hornsent is no longer a mortal danger.
msg_zh: ……没有必要除掉角人了。

msg: With the object of his vengeance gone, his blade has grown dull.
msg_zh: 失去向梅瑟莫先生复仇的机会，他就此陷入消沉。

msg: In that state, I don't imagine he will ever fight again. I needn't bother with him.
msg_zh: 看那样子应该失去了战斗的动力，不需要特地处置。

msg: Lest, of course, another target for his retribution should appear.
msg_zh: ……除非正好有适合复仇的对象，出现在他面前。

msg: Ah, there you are.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: I'm afraid Sir Ansbach will have to be next.
msg_zh: ……我在想，有必要除掉安帕赫。

msg: He insists that he's nothing but a worn-down, over-the-hill soldier.
msg_zh: 那位先生现在自谦为老兵，

msg: But in his day, he was the feared commander of the Pureblood Knights,
msg_zh: 但过去的他可是列居纯血骑士之首，赫赫有名。

msg: who cleaved open Miquella the Kind with his blood blade.
msg_zh: 还凭着血刃撕裂了米凯拉大人。

msg: He claims he hasn't the spirit to take up his sword again,
msg_zh: 虽然和他交谈时，看不出振作的迹象……

msg: but I doubt it'll be very long...
msg_zh: 但有可能，他会再回想起来；

msg: Before he recalls, as I have, the cascading sheets of blood.
msg_zh: 和我一样，回想起过去的激昂热血。

msg: I'm afraid he cannot be left to fester...
msg_zh: ……不处理的话，太过危险。

msg: I've come to a realisation...
msg_zh: ……嗯，我知道。

msg: There's ample evidence... Without Kindly Miquella's influence...
msg_zh: 我有自觉。没有了米凯拉大人的魅惑，

msg: I'm quite mistrustful of others...
msg_zh: 原来自己这么不信任他人……

msg: Ah, there you are.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: I owe you for your help in battle, once again.
msg_zh: 感谢再次出手相助。

msg: Sir Ansbach must have considered it an honourable end, being felled by your hand.
msg_zh: 想必安帕赫即使落败，也会服气。

msg: After all, the good fellow held you in the highest regard.
msg_zh: 毕竟那位先生非常看好你的能力。

msg: When we speak of it, we may speak with pride—that we were Sir Ansbach's final adversaries.
msg_zh: 安帕赫最后的对手是我们，一起感到荣幸吧。

msg: I appreciate the help in battle.
msg_zh: 感谢你在那场战斗出手相助。

msg: Ah, there you are.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: I owe you for your help in battle, once again.
msg_zh: 感谢再次出手相助。

msg: None can deny Sir Ansbach was truly a great man.
msg_zh: ……安帕赫是位非常杰出的人物。

msg: We can be proud, that we were the last opponents he ever faced.
msg_zh: 那位先生最后的对手是我们，一起感到荣幸吧。

msg: I appreciate the help in battle.
msg_zh: 感谢你在那场战斗出手相助。

msg: You are an odd one, aren't you.
msg_zh: ……话说回来，你很奇特。

msg: The enchantment is broken, and yet you alone appear completely unchanged.
msg_zh: 魅惑失效之后，只有你看起来没有任何变化。

msg: As if nothing was ever cast upon you.
msg_zh: ……仿佛从一开始，你就不受魅惑影响。

msg: No matter.
msg_zh: ……嗯，没关系。

msg: If you found your way here, it was because Kindly Miquella wished it so.
msg_zh: 你会来到这里，想必是米凯拉大人希望如此。

msg: But I am afraid this is our farewell.
msg_zh: ……接下来，会有一阵子不会见面。

msg: When next we meet, let it be under the eyes of Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 之后在米凯拉大人身边会合吧。

msg: Good bye, comrade.
msg_zh: ……对吧？我的战友。

msg: I'm afraid this is our farewell, comrade.
msg_zh: ……战友啊，接下来会有一阵子不会见面。

msg: When next we meet, let it be under the eyes of Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 之后在米凯拉大人身边会合吧。

msg: Ah, I thought I'd see you here.
msg_zh: ……好久不见。

msg: It's been quite some time.
msg_zh: 你果然还是来了。

msg: It was never Kindly Miquella, was it? The Erdtree was leading you all along.
msg_zh: ……引导你的不是米凯拉大人，而是黄金树吧？

msg: So that you might ascend to lordship.
msg_zh: 而你是要成为王的人。

msg: Why come to these lands to begin with?
msg_zh: 既然如此，你是为了什么来到这里？

msg: I suppose it must be what his Eminence, or perhaps the Erdtree, desired all along?
msg_zh: ……难道是米凯拉大人，还是黄金树希望──

msg: The clashing of the favoured lords, such that one would prevail?
msg_zh: 让王者相会，一决高下？

msg: So be it.
msg_zh: ……嗯，无所谓。

msg: If you insist upon facing Miquella the Kind,
msg_zh: 任何想往前走，到米凯拉大人身边的，

msg: Then I will run you through, whoever you might be.
msg_zh: 我都会用剑制裁。

msg: Don't tarry now.
msg_zh: 我等你。

msg: Worthy hornsent. I will dispose of you.
msg_zh: ……角人，我要除掉你。

msg: Before your thirst for revenge beckons our undoing.
msg_zh: 你的复仇之心，太过危险。

msg: I can no longer trust your word.
msg_zh: 我无法再相信你。

msg: What a surprise. That you should join me here.
msg_zh: ……没想到你会来，真意外。

msg: I am pleased. Now go and make yourself useful.
msg_zh: 我很开心，要麻烦你了。

msg: Kindly Miquella never betrays a vow.
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人不会毁约。

msg: Go. Your family awaits you.
msg_zh: 去吧，到你家人身边。

msg: Y-You have bested me.
msg_zh: ……呜，太大意了。

msg: Only...
msg_zh: 不过……

msg: Worthy hornsent. I will dispose of you.
msg_zh: ……角人，我要除掉你。

msg: Before your thirst for revenge beckons our undoing.
msg_zh: 你的复仇之心，太过危险。

msg: I can no longer trust your word.
msg_zh: 我无法再相信你。

msg: Have you been taken in by the plight of the hornsent?
msg_zh: ……你这是同情角人的遭遇？

msg: Foolish...
msg_zh: 真是愚昧。

msg: But hardly unexpected. Man is a compassionate animal, for better or worse.
msg_zh: 不过，也算合理。毕竟是人之常情。

msg: UnkText
I expected things to end differently with you.
msg_zh: ……还以为最后会是不一样的结局。

msg: What a pity.
msg_zh: 真可惜。

msg: Urgh! You have bested me.
msg_zh: ……呜，太大意了。

msg: A single betrayal, enough to turn the tides...
msg_zh: 有你替他撑腰，对我实在太不利。

msg: Unfortunate. But I will leave you be, for now.
msg_zh: ……没办法，这次就先撤退。

msg: Sir Ansbach. I will dispose of you.
msg_zh: ……安帕赫，我要除掉你。

msg: I find that I have a new apprehension—
msg_zh: 因为我很担心──

msg: Your ambivalence. And exactly where it might lead you...
msg_zh: 当你走过仿徨之后，会给出什么答案。

msg: You've come again, have you.
msg_zh: ……你过来了啊。

msg: Thank you. Now go and make yourself useful.
msg_zh: 谢谢你，要再麻烦你了。

msg: Well, fancy meeting you here.
msg_zh: ……没想到你会来。

msg: I am pleased. Now go and make yourself useful.
msg_zh: 我很开心，要麻烦你了。

msg: Thank you for all that you have done.
msg_zh: ……感谢你一直以来的付出。

msg: Sir Ansbach.
msg_zh: 安帕赫。

msg: You are a force of nature...
msg_zh: ……果然棘手。

msg: Only...
msg_zh: 不过……

msg: Sir Ansbach. I will dispose of you.
msg_zh: ……安帕赫，我要除掉你。

msg: I find that I have a new apprehension—
msg_zh: 因为我很担心──

msg: Your ambivalence. And exactly where it might lead you.
msg_zh: 当你走过仿徨之后，会给出什么答案。

msg: So you've chosen your side, have you.
msg_zh: ……你站在那一边啊。

msg: Despite having no debt to the Lord of Blood.
msg_zh: 你对鲜血君王，也没有任何义务。

msg: I suppose it was Sir Ansbach who won you over.
msg_zh: 所以是因为安帕赫的品德？

msg: Fine. One more heart for my blade to skewer.
msg_zh: ……嗯，没关系。用剑制裁就对了。

msg: With this battle I send you on. It was an honour.
msg_zh: ……和你之间的战斗，\n我会放在心底，引以为傲。

msg: Now, go.
msg_zh: 放心地走吧。

msg: Perhaps I should have known.
msg_zh: ……要一次对上你们两个人，

msg: Not to challenge the two of you alone.
msg_zh: 还是太勉强了。

msg: I take my leave, for now.
msg_zh: ……这次就先撤退。

msg: Don't you dare approach Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 不要靠近米凯拉大人。

msg: Needle Knight Leda, Dryleaf Dane, and our allies...
msg_zh: “金针骑士”蕾妲、“落叶”丹恩，再加上我等的诸位同伴，

msg: Will never allow this.
msg_zh: 不会放过你们。

msg: Will never allow this.
msg_zh: 不会放过你。

msg: Needle Knight Leda, Dryleaf Dane, and our ally...
msg_zh: “金针骑士”蕾妲、“落叶”丹恩，再加上我等的同伴，

msg: Don't you dare approach Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 不要靠近米凯拉大人。

msg: Needle Knight Leda and Dryleaf Dane...
msg_zh: “金针骑士”蕾妲、“落叶”丹恩，

msg: Will never allow this.
msg_zh: 不会放过你们。

msg: Will never allow this.
msg_zh: 不会放过你。

msg: I am sorry.
msg_zh: ……真的很抱歉。

msg: For speaking to you as a compatriot.
msg_zh: 那时候，在干枯手臂的前面，

msg: When we stood before the withered arm.
msg_zh: 自顾自地认为你是同伴。

msg: By way of apology, I will reveal the marrow of my sword.
msg_zh: ……为表歉意，我会展现剑术的精髓──

msg: Its needles, that will stitch you into death.
msg_zh: 针，让死亡与你紧紧相系。

msg: I can't fathom your convictions.
msg_zh: ……我实在不能理解。

msg: After knowing Kindly Miquella, what remains to pledge to your Lord of Blood?
msg_zh: 知道米凯拉大人之后，\n为什么还有对鲜血君王效忠的想法？

msg: Thiollier.
msg_zh: ……休里耶。

msg: I seem to have made a poor judgement.
msg_zh: 看来是我误判了──

msg: About you. Or perhaps, St. Trina.
msg_zh: 误判你的立场，或者该说，托莉娜大人的立场。

msg: With this battle I send you on. It was an honour to face a worthy lord.
msg_zh: ……和王者之间的战斗，\n我会放在心底，引以为傲。

msg: Now, go.
msg_zh: 放心地走吧。

msg: Kindly Miquella...
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人。

msg: Make the world... A gentler place...
msg_zh: 请您让世界、更加温柔……

msg: Oh, hello there.
msg_zh: ……那个，你好。

msg: Are you the Tarnished?
msg_zh: 请问你是褪色者吗？

msg: Lady Leda spoke of you.
msg_zh: 我听蕾妲大人说过，

msg: Another Tarnished, guided here by Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 说除了我之外，还有其他受米凯拉大人引导的褪色者。

msg: My name is Thiollier.
msg_zh: 我叫作休里耶。

msg: I, too, am Tarnished, and here on Kindly Miquella's account.
msg_zh: 和你一样是褪色者，一样受到米凯拉大人引导。

msg: So, well...
msg_zh: 那个……

msg: Here's to new beginnings, I suppose.
msg_zh: 之后，请多关照了。

msg: Um, I'm sorry...
But, well, I'm not much good at anything, is all.
msg_zh: 对不起，我没什么能力。

msg: I'm as weak as a kitten and thick as two planks.
msg_zh: 既没有力气，也不够聪明。

msg: I've always been this way...since the very day I was born.
msg_zh: 要自白这种事很丢脸，\n但我生来就是这副德行。

msg: I'm afraid the only thing I’m proficient in is...is poison...
msg_zh: ……说起我在行的，都是和毒相关的事情。

msg: Sorry...
msg_zh: 对不起。

msg: UnkText
UnkText
UnkText
So, um, what can I help you with?
msg_zh: ……那个，有什么事吗？

msg: Um...
msg_zh: ……那个。

msg: Just give me the word if you need any more poison.
msg_zh: 还需要毒的话，请再和我说。

msg: Oh, what's this!
msg_zh: ……哦，这个！

msg: I have to say, Sir Moore has an awfully sharp eye, doesn't he.
msg_zh: 这是穆尔先生帮忙拿到的吧？

msg: It's wonderful. This ebony, as lustrous as the night sky unending.
msg_zh: ……太棒了。这带有饱满光泽的漆黑，\n就像是不会迎来破晓的夜空。

msg: I don't think I could ever thank him enough...
msg_zh: 真的是非常感谢穆尔先生。

msg: But I'll have to think of something...
msg_zh: ……必须想想，该送什么当谢礼。

msg: Ahh, forgive me.
msg_zh: ……啊，对了。

msg: You too deserve your share of the reward.
msg_zh: 也必须谢谢你。

msg: I'll mix up something special.
msg_zh: 这样就能做出很棒的东西了。

msg: If you find yourself...weary of the weight of this life, then just give me the word.
msg_zh: ……要是你觉得活着很累，请和我说。

msg: Sleep is a balm, and eternal sleep...is an elixir.
msg_zh: 睡眠是很美好的事情──\n如果能持续到永远，就更美好了。

msg: Is that so?
msg_zh: ……这样啊。

msg: Then take this.
msg_zh: 那请你收下这个。

msg: This concoction can coax even the oldest of dragons to sleep.
msg_zh: 那是连古龙也会陷入沉睡的秘药。

msg: For you, it will grant the sweetest slumber...
msg_zh: 一定能引领你进入安稳的睡眠……

msg: ...for all eternity.
msg_zh: 直到永远。

msg: Oh, umm...
Are you not affected? Even with the spell broken?
msg_zh: 魅惑失效了，那个，你没事吗？

msg: I'm feeling rather lost. Haunted by memories.
msg_zh: 我撑不下去了，因为我想起来了。

msg: Of St. Trina. Her visage. Her scent. The lure of velvety sleep.
msg_zh: 我想起托莉娜大人──\n想起了她的身影、香气，还有那深沉酣眠的诱惑。

msg: Would Kindly Miquella chasten me?
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人会鄙视我吗？

msg: For falling for St. Trina, while knowing that she was the discarded half?
msg_zh: 我明知道大人舍弃了半身，却成为那半身的俘虏。

msg: The problem is...I simply cannot help it.
msg_zh: ……啊啊，我不行了。

msg: I would sacrifice everything, just to gaze upon her, one last time.
msg_zh: 即使要我抛弃一切，我也想再见到托莉娜大人……

msg: I'm feeling rather lost. Haunted by memories.
msg_zh: ……我撑不下去了，因为我想起来了。

msg: Of St. Trina.
msg_zh: 想起了托莉娜大人。

msg: Oh, hello there.
msg_zh: ……那个，你好。

msg: Are you the Tarnished?
msg_zh: 请问你是褪色者吗？

msg: Lady Leda spoke of you.
msg_zh: 我听蕾妲大人说过，

msg: Another Tarnished, guided here by Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: 说除了我之外，还有其他受米凯拉大人引导的褪色者。

msg: My name is Thiollier.
msg_zh: 我叫作休里耶。

msg: I, too, am Tarnished, and here on Kindly Miquella's account.
msg_zh: 和你一样是褪色者，一样受到米凯拉大人引导。

msg: Oh, umm...
Are you not affected? Even with the spell broken?
msg_zh: 魅惑失效了，那个，你没事吗？

msg: I'm feeling rather lost. Haunted by memories.
msg_zh: ……我撑不下去了，因为我想起来了。

msg: Of St. Trina. Her visage. Her scent. The lure of velvety sleep.
msg_zh: 我想起托莉娜大人──\n想起了她的身影、香气，还有那深沉酣眠的诱惑。

msg: Would Kindly Miquella chasten me?
msg_zh: 米凯拉大人会鄙视我吗？

msg: For falling for St. Trina, while knowing that she was the discarded half?
msg_zh: 我明知道大人舍弃了半身，却成为那半身的俘虏。

msg: The problem is...I simply cannot help it.
msg_zh: ……啊啊，我不行了。

msg: I would sacrifice everything, just to gaze upon her, one last time.
msg_zh: 即使要我抛弃一切，我也想再见到托莉娜大人……

msg: Umm, oh...
I had something I wish to tell you.
msg_zh: 我有一件事情想要和你说。

msg: I'm heading south.
msg_zh: ……我想要朝南方前进。

msg: I've recalled something that Sir Moore said.
msg_zh: 我想起来之前穆尔先生提过的事情。

msg: He discovered deep-purple water lilies blooming on the southern shore.
msg_zh: 据说在南方海岸，盛开着深紫色的睡莲。

msg: That must be where St. Trina was left to wither away.
msg_zh: ……托莉娜大人肯定是被丢弃在那里。

msg: I'm heading south.
msg_zh: ……我想要朝南方前进。

msg: To the shore Sir Moore mentioned.
msg_zh: 去穆尔先生提过的海岸。

msg: Are...are you certain of this?
msg_zh: ……你、你是说真的吗？

msg: Is this all a plot to make a mockery of me?
msg_zh: 你不是想骗我，趁机嘲笑我吧？

msg: Oh, heavens, what am I saying. Forgive me.
msg_zh: ……呃，没有，没事。对不起。

msg: You deserve my deepest gratitude.
msg_zh: 谢谢你。

msg: I will make the journey.
msg_zh: ……我会去看看。

msg: To the southern coast, as you say. To venture into the depths of the fissure.
msg_zh: 去南方海岸的裂缝底部，就照你说的。

msg: I will make the journey.
msg_zh: ……我会去看看。

msg: To the southern coast, as you say. To venture into the depths of the fissure.
msg_zh: 去南方海岸的裂缝底部，就照你说的。

msg: St. Trina...
msg_zh: ……托莉娜大人。

msg: Oh, St. Trina...
msg_zh: 啊，托莉娜大人。

msg: What velvety ambrosia is this?
msg_zh: 您的毒，还有那甜美的酣眠，

msg: Your poison, and the sweet sleep that follows.
msg_zh: 竟然已经熟成到这么深的颜色。

msg: Oh, please, let me hear your voice...
msg_zh: ……啊啊，请您出声，对我说话吧。

msg: Ah, hello.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Thank you for your help.
msg_zh: 刚才谢谢你的帮忙。

msg: Without it, I wouldn't have seen St. Trina again.
msg_zh: 我才能像这样，见到托莉娜大人……

msg: I'm drifting off in the sea of her poison.
msg_zh: ……我现在沉浸在、托莉娜大人的毒之中。

msg: Soon, I will hear her voice.
msg_zh: 想在半梦半醒之间，听见她失去的声音。

msg: Let me be. I won't be long.
msg_zh: ……请稍待片刻，不要阻止我……

msg: Ah, hello.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Thank you. It was all just as you said.
msg_zh: 谢谢你，你说的话都是真的。

msg: To think, without your guidance, I wouldn't have seen St. Trina again.
msg_zh: 多亏有你，我才能像这样，见到托莉娜大人……

msg: I'm drifting off in the sea of her poison.
msg_zh: ……我现在沉浸在、托莉娜大人的毒之中。

msg: Soon, I will hear her voice.
msg_zh: 想在半梦半醒之间，听见她失去的声音。

msg: Let me be. I won't be long.
msg_zh: ……请稍待片刻，不要阻止我……

msg: Ahh, then you, too, must have paid a visit...
msg_zh: ……啊，你也来了。

msg: To St. Trina's garden of deepest purple.
msg_zh: 这里是托莉娜大人的深紫花园。

msg: I'm drifting off in the sea of her poison.
msg_zh: ……我现在沉浸在、托莉娜大人的毒之中。

msg: Soon, I will hear her voice.
msg_zh: 想在半梦半醒之间，听见她失去的声音。

msg: Let me be. I won't be long.
msg_zh: ……请稍待片刻，不要阻止我……

msg: Oh, I almost forgot.
msg_zh: ……有一件事情，我忘了提。

msg: You mustn't follow my example.
msg_zh: 请你不要、学我这么做。

msg: St. Trina's poison would plunge you into an eternal slumber.
msg_zh: 托莉娜大人的毒，会让你、陷入永恒的沉眠。

msg: It must be me, and only me.
msg_zh: 这是只有我、才办得到的事……

msg: I am gone, adrift in sleep.
msg_zh: ……我想在半梦半醒之间，

msg: So that I may hear St. Trina's lost voice.
msg_zh: 听见托莉娜大人失去的声音。

msg: Let me be. I won't be long.
msg_zh: ……请稍待片刻，不要阻止我……

msg: St. Trina.
msg_zh: ……托莉娜大人。

msg: Why won't you share your voice with me?
msg_zh: 为什么您不出声，对我说话……？

msg: Ahh, grant me more of your poison.
msg_zh: 啊，让我浸在您的毒里、更多一些，

msg: That I might drift further into sleep.
msg_zh: 让我睡得更沉一些。

msg: Perhaps then you'll grace me with your voice?
msg_zh: ……拜托，让我听听、您的声音。

msg: Please. Leave me alone.
msg_zh: ……请不要、阻止我……

msg: I'll thank you not to lie to me.
msg_zh: ……请不要、骗我……

msg: I am the chosen, not you.
msg_zh: 我是被选上的人。

msg: Only I can doze off in the sea of St. Trina.
msg_zh: 只有我才能半梦半醒地、沉浸在托莉娜大人的毒里。

msg: Why would you hear her voice, when I cannot?
msg_zh: 所以说，我听不到的声音，你不可能听见。

msg: If you should utter these cruel untruths to me again I...
msg_zh: ……不要再说、那种不中听的谎话。

msg: I won't be held responsible for my actions...
msg_zh: 我再听到，也没把握能原谅你。

msg: Never utter these cruel untruths to me again...
msg_zh: ……不要再说、那种不中听的谎话。

msg: Please, enough.
msg_zh: ……请你、住口。

msg: I cannot believe your cheek.
msg_zh: 你这是在侮辱我。

msg: And I will stand for it no longer!
msg_zh: 我不会、原谅你了。

msg: I will never forgive you.
msg_zh: ……我不会、原谅你了。

msg: Ah, you...
I was no good to anyone, beginning to end.
msg_zh: 我果然没什么能力。

msg: Weak as a kitten and thick as two planks.
msg_zh: 没有力气，也不够聪明……

msg: I suppose dying in disgrace is fitting, in a way...
msg_zh: 报仇雪耻这种事，哪可能办到……

msg: Ha...ha...
Tell me, please.
msg_zh: ……请告诉我。

msg: Assuming you spoke the truth back then...
msg_zh: 假设你没有说谎，

msg: What did St. Trina tell you?
msg_zh: 托莉娜大人说了什么？

msg: Tell me, please.
msg_zh: ……请告诉我。

msg: Assuming you spoke the truth back then...
msg_zh: 假设你没有说谎，

msg: What did St. Trina tell you?
msg_zh: 托莉娜大人说了什么？

msg: Ahh, you are a wretched, wretched soul...
msg_zh: ……啊，你这个人、真是残忍。

msg: A nightmare, come to plague me.
msg_zh: 根本是恶梦的化身。

msg: Such a thing...couldn't possibly be...
msg_zh: 怎么可能、有这种事……

msg: Could it? St. Trina.
msg_zh: ……托莉娜大人，我说得没错吧？

msg: Please, let me hear your voice.
msg_zh: 请让我听听您的声音。

msg: In my everlasting slumber...
msg_zh: 请在永恒的沉眠中，对我说……

msg: St. Trina, let me hear your voice.
msg_zh: ……托莉娜大人，请让我听听您的声音。

msg: In my everlasting slumber...
msg_zh: 请在永恒的沉眠中，对我说……

msg: I will never forgive you.
msg_zh: ……我不原谅你。

msg: For your trespass, you will know my poison...
msg_zh: 你侮辱我，我就用毒回敬你。

msg: Never utter these untruths again.
msg_zh: 请你不要、再继续说，

msg: St. Trina would never say such things.
msg_zh: 托莉娜大人不可能说的话。

msg: Why did you mislead me?
msg_zh: ……为什么要骗人……

msg: Such strength, but for what...
msg_zh: 你明明那么强……

msg: I am here to serve St. Trina, evermore.
msg_zh: ……一切只为了托莉娜大人。

msg: I am deeply sorry. For doubting you.
msg_zh: ……之前怀疑你，对不起。

msg: I am here only to grant St. Trina's singular wish.
msg_zh: 现在托莉娜大人的心愿，就是我的一切。

msg: I will stop Miquella the Kind.
msg_zh: ……我要阻止米凯拉大人。

msg: He will never become a god.
msg_zh: 不让他当上神祇。

msg: Not the finest blade, nor the mightiest armour...
msg_zh: 刀剑砍不得、铠甲防不了──

msg: will spare your life. From the poison of Thiollier.
msg_zh: 奉劝各位，别小看休里耶的毒。

msg: Sir Moore. I do not wish to fight you.
msg_zh: ……穆尔先生，我不想和你战斗。

msg: But I have new purpose I must see through.
msg_zh: 但是我有了不能退让的理由。

msg: You have no understanding.
msg_zh: 你们根本不懂。

msg: Of Kind Miquella. Of St. Trina's love...
msg_zh: 不懂米凯拉大人，也不懂托莉娜大人的心意……

msg: I am here to serve St. Trina, evermore.
msg_zh: ……一切只为了托莉娜大人。

msg: Sorry. It's up to you now.
msg_zh: ……对不起，之后的事交给你了。

msg: Grant St. Trina's one wish.
msg_zh: 实现托莉娜大人的、心愿……

msg: ...Ahhh...
Well. We don't often receive visitors.
msg_zh: ……噢，竟然有来客，太难得了。

msg: I am Ymir. Welcome, to Manus Metyr.
msg_zh: 我名叫尤弥尔，欢迎莅临玛努斯·美特。

msg: It is a pleasure to have you.
msg_zh: ……很荣幸见到你。

msg: In lands so forsaken as these, chance encounters are precious indeed.
msg_zh: 在这种遗弃之地能有新的邂逅，实属难得。

msg: Seeing that we have convened here on this day,
msg_zh: 想想彼此也是有缘分，

msg: allow me to mark the occasion with a modest offering.
msg_zh: 这份心意请你收下，作为纪念。

msg: The map I gave you charts the site of a hallowed ruin.
msg_zh: 赠予你的那张地图，标记着一座神秘的遗迹。

msg: It is said that after sounding the hanging bell there...
msg_zh: 据说那里有一口吊钟，而吹响那口钟之后，

msg: One's fate will be guided by the stars.
msg_zh: 那人的命运就会受璀璨星星的牵引。

msg: I only wish to be of service.
msg_zh: ……我只是想成为他人的助力。

msg: To help those who fight for their purpose.
msg_zh: 尤其是那些为了目标而战的人。

msg: I'm not mistaken am I? I can see it in your eyes.
msg_zh: 不必解释，我也明白──

msg: You are a fighter, are you not?
msg_zh: 你也同样拥有目标，对吧？

msg: Is something the matter?
msg_zh: ……怎么了呢？

msg: I've given you a map to the hallowed ruin...
msg_zh: 标记神秘遗迹的地图，已经在你手上了……

msg: Oh, I suppose you expect a lesson of me, do you.
msg_zh: ……难道说，你希望我指导你？

msg: I know the feeling. Those with purpose are nothing if not ravenous...
msg_zh: 我能明白，有目标的人总是渴望──

msg: For power. For truth.
msg_zh: 渴望力量，也渴望真相。

msg: Is something the matter?
msg_zh: ……怎么了呢？

msg: Here to squeeze another lesson out of me?
msg_zh: 还希望我指导吗？

msg: Oh, yes.
msg_zh: 噢，对了。

msg: Do mind your feet around the church.
msg_zh: 在这里活动的时候，请注意脚边。

msg: You wouldn't want to hurt the little boy.
msg_zh: 因为可能会有小孩子在地上玩耍。

msg: Oh my, you poor thing.
msg_zh: ……哎呀，多可怜。

msg: Another bad dream, Yuri?
msg_zh: 尤利呀，你做恶梦了？

msg: Put that rotten thing out of your mind.
msg_zh: 希望你能快快忘记，

msg: That tangled mess can't hurt you.
msg_zh: 那个坏了又丑陋的东西。

msg: I am a glintstone sorcerer.
msg_zh: 我是辉石魔法师，

msg: We study the stars, and examine the life therein.
msg_zh: 探索着星星以及星星的生命。

msg: Are you familiar with our findings?
msg_zh: 不晓得你知不知情呢？

msg: Long ago, we began as stardust, born of a great rupture far across the skies.
msg_zh: 很久以前，在遥远他方发生了爆炸，\n而爆炸产生了星尘──也就是我们。

msg: We, too, are children of the Greater Will.
msg_zh: 我们都是无上意志的孩子。

msg: Is that not divine? Is that not sublime?
msg_zh: 多么诗意、多么美好呀！

msg: ...and yet, none can fathom its implications, its utter brilliance!
msg_zh: ……只是这件事情鲜为人知，太令人感慨。

msg: I, too, am a glintstone sorcerer.
msg_zh: 我也是辉石魔法师，

msg: Ah, you met Jolán?
msg_zh: 你遇见约兰了呀。

msg: Well, I hope that she behaved, at least.
msg_zh: 希望你没有觉得被冒犯。

msg: The poor girl has overcome grave misfortune.
msg_zh: ……那孩子以前过得很苦。

msg: Her tongue can be sharp at the best of times,
msg_zh: 所以和人相处时，都像带了刺……

msg: but don't think that makes her a bad person.
msg_zh: 但她是个好女孩。

msg: Mm. It's no surprise her little sister too, has a heart of gold.
msg_zh: 对，她和她的妹妹，都是好女孩。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: 噢，你来了。

msg: The exalted timbre of the bell has reached these ears of mine.
msg_zh: 我听见钟声了，你吹响的神秘音色飘扬空中。

msg: Gracious, the starry sky is wondrous tonight indeed.
msg_zh: 你瞧瞧，今晚的星空多么璀璨美丽！

msg: Only your fate shines brighter.
msg_zh: 有如你那光辉无比的命运。

msg: Now, these are for you.
msg_zh: ……来，请你收下。

msg: Think nothing of it.
msg_zh: 不需要推辞。

msg: I have made my decision to be of help.
msg_zh: 我只想成为你的助力。

msg: May the gleaming stars guide you evermore.
msg_zh: 愿璀璨星星牵引你前行。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: 噢，你来了。

msg: The exalted timbre of the bell has reached these ears of mine.
msg_zh: 我听见钟声了，你吹响的神秘音色飘扬空中。

msg: Gracious, the starry sky is wondrous tonight indeed.
msg_zh: 你瞧瞧，今晚的星空多么璀璨美丽！

msg: Only your fate shines brighter.
msg_zh: 有如你那光辉无比的命运。

msg: But fate can be a strange thing indeed.
msg_zh: ……只是说，真有趣的巧合。

msg: The hanging bell you sounded was not the one on the map I gave you.
msg_zh: 你吹响的吊钟，其实不是你手边地图上的那一口……

msg: The bell you found was in fact, here.
msg_zh: 而是这张地图上的吊钟。

msg: Please, take a second look at the original map.
msg_zh: ……请参考一开始的那张地图。

msg: And may the gleaming stars guide you evermore.
msg_zh: 愿璀璨星星牵引你前行。

msg: Oh, hello. Is something the matter?
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。怎么了呢？

msg: May the gleaming stars guide you evermore.
msg_zh: 愿璀璨星星牵引你前行。

msg: Forgive me.
msg_zh: ……对不起。

msg: I failed you. Failed to birth you whole.
msg_zh: 没办法把你生得健健康康的。

msg: I was not ready to be your mother.
msg_zh: ……我还没有办法成为母亲，

msg: But I can still stay here, nice and close.
msg_zh: 但我可以一直陪在你身边。

msg: For now, my dear, sleep soundly...
msg_zh: 现在，先乖乖地睡吧……

msg: I will return shortly.
msg_zh: ……我会尽快回去。

msg: Please, allow the two of us a moment alone.
msg_zh: 所以能给我们一点空间吗？

msg: Hmm?
Did you espy something unsightly, perchance?
msg_zh: ……你是不是看到了什么？

msg: Well, put it out of your mind.
msg_zh: 如果是，最好尽快忘记。

msg: The stars will reveal the truth, in time.
msg_zh: 总有一天，星星会带领你得知真相。

msg: Free yourself of any misconceptions, lest they bring woe upon the both of us.
msg_zh: ……不必要的误会，只会让彼此都难过。

msg: I fear that you have borne witness to the whole of it.
msg_zh: ……我想你也亲眼见识过了。

msg: The conceits—the hypocrisy—of the world built upon the Erdtree. The follies of men. Their bitter suffering.
msg_zh: 黄金树世代的谎言与矛盾……\n人们的愚昧，以及生灵涂炭之苦。

msg: Is there no hope for redemption?
msg_zh: 为什么会沦落到这么绝望的境地？

msg: The answer, sadly, is clear.
msg_zh: ……很遗憾，答案显而易见。

msg: There never was any hope. They were each of them defective. Unhinged, from the start.
msg_zh: 因为毁坏、失序，从一开始就存在──

msg: Marika herself. And the fingers that guided her.
msg_zh: 就是玛莉卡，还有引导祂的那些指头。

msg: And this is what troubles me.
msg_zh: 我最担心的，莫过于此。

msg: No matter our efforts, if the roots are rotten,
msg_zh: 不论众人再怎么努力，毁坏之源在于根本……

msg: ...then we have little recourse.
msg_zh: 努力，也是枉然。

msg: Ever-young Miquella saw things for what they were.
msg_zh: ……那位年轻人，米凯拉有自知之明。

msg: He knew that his bloodline was tainted. His roots mired in madness.
msg_zh: 了解自己的出身、血统，是多么地污秽与疯狂。

msg: A tragedy if ever there was one.
msg_zh: 实在是太过悲壮──

msg: That he would feel compelled to renounce everything.
msg_zh: 他为此，选择舍弃了一切。

msg: When the blame...lay squarely with the mother.
msg_zh: 唉，这明明都是母亲犯下的罪过呀。

msg: Mm. Hello there.
msg_zh: 噢，你来了。

msg: I heard another sound, coloured by your essence.
msg_zh: 我又听见你的音色飘扬而来。

msg: Simply exhilarating, I must say.
msg_zh: 多么震撼感官呀。

msg: The stars are dark tonight.
msg_zh: 今晚的星空十分幽暗。

msg: But rest assured, this is no ill omen.
msg_zh: 然而，这并非坏兆头。

msg: On the contrary. I believe that this portends a magnificent starry cascade.
msg_zh: 我认为，这反而是璀璨巨光即将倾注而下的前兆。

msg: Now, take this, my final gift to you.
msg_zh: 来，这是我最后一份心意。

msg: May you join the glimmering stars above.
msg_zh: 愿你成为璀璨星星。

msg: Mm. Hello there.
msg_zh: 噢，你来了。

msg: The exalted timbre of the bells has reached these ears of mine.
msg_zh: 我听见钟声了，你吹响的神秘音色飘扬空中。

msg: Twice, now. How very exhilarating, indeed.
msg_zh: ……而且足足两次，多么震撼感官呀。

msg: The stars are dark tonight.
msg_zh: 今晚的星空十分幽暗。

msg: But rest assured, this is no ill omen.
msg_zh: 然而，这并非坏兆头。

msg: On the contrary. I believe that this portends a magnificent starry cascade.
msg_zh: 我认为，这反而是璀璨巨光即将倾注而下的前兆。

msg: Now, take this, my final gift to you.
msg_zh: 来，这是我最后一份心意。

msg: May you join the glimmering stars above.
msg_zh: 愿你成为璀璨星星。

msg: Oh, yes. I believe I can feel it brewing.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你。我认为就在今晚。

msg: This evening is a sign, of a greater night to come.
msg_zh: 今晚会有大事发生的前兆……

msg: May you join the glimmering stars above.
msg_zh: 愿你成为璀璨星星。

msg: Do you recall what I said?
msg_zh: ……我曾经和你说过，

msg: That Marika, and the fingers that guided her, were unsound from the start.
msg_zh: 在一开始毁坏与失序的，是玛莉卡与引导祂的指头们。

msg: Well, the truth lies deeper still.
msg_zh: 但其实，那不是真相。

msg: It is their mother who is damaged and unhinged.
msg_zh: ……真正毁坏、失序的，是指头之母。

msg: The fingers are but unripe children. Victims in their own right.
msg_zh: 那些指头是指头之母的弃子，也是可怜的受害者。

msg: We all need a mother, do we not?
msg_zh: 母亲这个角色至关重要，你说是不是？

msg: A new mother, a true mother, who will not give birth to further malady.
msg_zh: 我们需要一位不会催生毁坏，真正的、新的母亲。

msg: Forgive me.
msg_zh: ……对不起。

msg: I failed you. Failed to birth you whole.
msg_zh: 没办法把你生得健健康康的。

msg: But it won't be long now.
msg_zh: 不过，时机就要成熟了。

msg: I will soon be a mother. I will give you new life.
msg_zh: 我会变成母亲，这样就能再生下你了。

msg: I assure you, you will have life.
msg_zh: ……我会好好地把你生下来。

msg: Please, will you allow the two of us this time alone?
msg_zh: ……现在能给我们一点空间吗？

msg: It isn't much to ask.
msg_zh: 麻烦你了。

msg: My shining star.
msg_zh: ……我璀璨的星星呀。

msg: Grant me a mother's strength.
msg_zh: 请把母亲的力量交给我。

msg: Look here. At my fingers.
msg_zh: 看呀，看我的指头。

msg: I will be the true mother.
msg_zh: 我会成为真正的母亲──

msg: And I will be the only mother!
msg_zh: 唯一的母亲！

msg: UnkText
UnkText
I will be the true mother!
msg_zh: 我会成为真正的母亲！

msg: Dear Yuri, dear Fingers!
msg_zh: 尤利的母亲！指头们的母亲！

msg: Forgive me, Yuri.
msg_zh: ……尤利，对不起……

msg: Truly, I desired...to be your mother...
msg_zh: 我很想、成为你的母亲……

msg: My dear child!
msg_zh: 我的孩子啊！

msg: My dear children!
msg_zh: 我的孩子们啊！

msg: My dear finger!
msg_zh: 我的指头啊！

msg: My dear fingers!
msg_zh: 我的指头们啊！

msg: Kind Miquella…
msg_zh: ……米凯拉大人，

msg: In godhood shall you rise…
msg_zh: 请您成为神祇。

msg: (dummyText)
(dummyText)
The Tarnished will soon return.
msg_zh: 褪色者将要归来──

msg: Guided by Grace once lost.
msg_zh: 受那失去的赐福指引，回到此地。

msg: The Golden Order is broken to its core.
msg_zh: 黄金律法早已破碎到无以复加。

msg: They will fight. And they will die. In an unending curse.
msg_zh: 战斗、死亡──这永无止尽的诅咒，

msg: For how else is a champion, or a lord, to be born?
msg_zh: 却是催生英雄与王者的唯一温床。

msg: Brandish the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 为了我们所有人……

msg: ...for all of us.
msg_zh: 展现艾尔登法环吧。

msg: The fallen leaves have spoken.
msg_zh: ……落叶捎来讯息：

msg: Of the return of the Tarnished. To the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 褪色者将回到交界地。

msg: Elden Ring, O, Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 艾尔登法环啊，艾尔登法环──

msg: Shaper of life, arbiter of fate.
msg_zh: 掌管生命、左右命运，

msg: Lord of the very stars above.
msg_zh: 甚至能支配星辰流转。

msg: Tarnished warrior, spurned by the grace of gold.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，不受黄金赐福的战士啊，

msg: Seek that which hath been lost to thee.
msg_zh: 寻找失去的事物吧。

msg: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 穿越雾海，前往交界地──

msg: Seek the Elden Ring!
msg_zh: 寻找艾尔登法环吧！

msg: Brave Tarnished. Mighty warriors, who fought at my side.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，并肩而战的战士们啊。

msg: Await the summons. It will call to thee one day.
msg_zh: 我们那失去的赐福，还有指头，

msg: Heed the fading grace. Listen to the Fingers.
msg_zh: 总有一天会呼唤你们。

msg: Gold commandeth the very stars,
msg_zh: 那甚至能支配星辰流转，

msg: giving life its fullest brilliance.
msg_zh: 让生命登上颠峰的黄金──

msg: Elden Ring, O, Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 艾尔登法环啊，艾尔登法环，

msg: Be ready, once it is shattered.
msg_zh: 直到它破碎的那一刻到来。

msg: Seek the Elden Ring, O Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，寻求艾尔登法环吧。

msg: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 穿越雾海，前往交界地吧。

msg: Become Lord. Enact thy will!
msg_zh: 当上王，实现愿望吧！

msg: Seek the Elden Ring!
msg_zh: 寻求艾尔登法环吧！

msg: Long ago, ye Tarnished lost something most dear.
msg_zh: 你们褪色者吶，曾经失去了某种伟大的事物。

msg: The Elden Ring. O Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 艾尔登法环吶，艾尔登法环──

msg: Its gold commanded the very stars,
msg_zh: 那甚至能支配星辰流转，

msg: giving life its fullest brilliance.
msg_zh: 让生命登上颠峰的黄金。

msg: Though shattered, it yet guides thy kin.
msg_zh: 然而如今，它早已破碎──

msg: Though fractured, it yet guides thy kin.
msg_zh: 然而如今，它早已破碎──

msg: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 指引你们穿越雾海，前往交界地。

msg: Hoarah Roux, the Gold Mask.
msg_zh: “金色面具”荷莱·露、

msg: Lady Yuliya, the Deathbed Companion.
msg_zh: “同眠少女”尤莉雅、

msg: The hideous Dung Eater.
msg_zh: “食粪者”、

msg: And Sir Gideon Orphnier, the All-knowing.
msg_zh: “百智爵士”基甸·奥夫尼尔。

msg: Each coveteth the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 所有人都渴求艾尔登法环──

msg: But their ambitions are yet unmet.
msg_zh: 却没有人能得偿所愿。

msg: Surely thou hast thine own design?
msg_zh: ……你心里也有未了的愿望吧？

msg: Then implore the Two Fingers, for guidance.
msg_zh: 那就祈求双指降下指引吧。

msg: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 祈求在雾海彼端的交界地之中，

msg: To face the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 有幸觐见艾尔登法环。

msg: To stand before the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 有幸觐见艾尔登法环。

msg: Face the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 有幸觐见艾尔登法环。

msg: And reclaim what was thine.
msg_zh: 有幸觐见艾尔登法环。

msg: Elden Ring, O Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 艾尔登法环吶，艾尔登法环──

msg: Its gold commanded the very stars,
msg_zh: 那甚至能支配星辰流转，

msg: giving life its fullest brilliance.
msg_zh: 让生命登上颠峰的黄金。

msg: Shattered, by someone, or something.
msg_zh: ……如今却因故变得支离破碎。

msg: Fractured, by someone, or something.
msg_zh: ……如今却因故变得支离破碎。

msg: Godrick, the feeble.
msg_zh: “懦弱”葛瑞克、

msg: Malenia, decayed from birth.
msg_zh: “生而腐败”玛莲妮亚、

msg: General Radahn, slayer of giants.
msg_zh: “巨人杀手”拉塔恩将军、

msg: Rykard, the tyrannical serpent.
msg_zh: “傲慢之蛇”拉卡德，

msg: And Morgott, Prince of the Omen.
msg_zh: 再加上“恶兆王子”蒙葛特。

msg: Each, inheriting their own shard, played a part in the Shattering,
msg_zh: 那些碎片君王引发了破碎战争，

msg: a war with no end, and no victor.
msg_zh: 战争持续了很久、很久，然而却没有人胜出。

msg: And so the Two Fingers call upon ye, the Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……所以双指才会呼唤你们这些褪色者。

msg: To cross the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 要你们穿越雾海，前往交界地，

msg: To seek the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 去追求艾尔登法环。

msg: Seek the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 渴求艾尔登法环吧。

msg: The fallen leaves tell a story.
msg_zh: ……落叶捎来讯息：

msg: The great Elden Ring was shattered.
msg_zh: 在雾的彼端，我们的故乡“交界地”，

msg: In our home, across the fog, the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 那伟大的艾尔登法环已经破碎──

msg: Now, Queen Marika the Eternal is nowhere to be found,
msg_zh: “永恒女王”玛莉卡销声匿迹，

msg: and in the Night of the Black Knives, Godwyn the Golden was first to perish.
msg_zh: 在黑刀阴谋之夜，“黄金”葛德文最先失去性命。

msg: Soon, Marika's offspring, demigods all, claimed the shards of the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 玛莉卡之子──\n诸位半神拿到艾尔登法环的碎片，

msg: The mad taint of their newfound strength triggered the Shattering.
msg_zh: 却因为那股力量堕入歧途、陷入疯狂、引发碎片战争……

msg: A war from which no lord arose.
msg_zh: 在那场无王存在的战争最后──

msg: A war leading to abandonment by the Greater Will.
msg_zh: 无上意志放逐了他们。

msg: Arise now, ye Tarnished.
msg_zh: 噢，所以啊，褪色者啊──

msg: Ye dead, who yet live.
msg_zh: 依旧无法永眠的死者啊。

msg: The call of long-lost grace speaks to us all.
msg_zh: 那许久以前我们失去的赐福，正在出声呼唤。

msg: Hoarah Loux, chieftain of the badlands.
msg_zh: “蛮荒地王者”荷莱·露、

msg: The ever-brilliant Goldmask.
msg_zh: 光耀金面具、

msg: Fia, the Deathbed Companion.
msg_zh: “死眠少女”菲雅、

msg: The loathsome Dung Eater.
msg_zh: 受尽唾弃的食粪者、

msg: And Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-knowing.
msg_zh: “百智爵士”基甸·奥夫尼尔。

msg: It happened an age ago.
msg_zh: 那是很久远的事了……

msg: But when I recall, I see it true.
msg_zh: 但对我来说，历历在目。

msg: On a night of wint'ry fog.
msg_zh: 在飘着冰冷浓雾的夜里……

msg: The Rune of Death was stolen,
msg_zh: 死亡卢恩被窃走，

msg: And the demigods began to fall, starting with Godwyn the Golden.
msg_zh: 在“黄金”葛德文成为半神的初始死者……

msg: Queen Marika was driven to the brink.
msg_zh: 也许玛莉卡女王就陷入了狂乱。

msg: The Elden Ring was broken,
msg_zh: 之后，艾尔登法环被击碎，

msg: triggering the Shattering, an internecine war between demigods.
msg_zh: 诸位半神引发了破碎战争。

msg: The conqueror of the stars, General Radahn.
msg_zh: “碎星英雄”拉塔恩将军，

msg: And the Blade of Miquella, Malenia the Severed.
msg_zh: “米凯拉的锋刃”残身玛莲妮亚，

msg: These two were the mightiest to remain, and locked horns in combat.
msg_zh: 力量最为强大的他们战斗到最后一刻……

msg: But there would be no victor.
msg_zh: 然而，却无人胜出。

msg: And so, we inhabit a fractured world.
msg_zh: 所以时至今日，世界依旧百废待举，

msg: Awaiting the arrival of the Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 静待艾尔登之王现身。

msg: Unless of course, thou shouldst take the crown?
msg_zh: ……还是说，你就是那个人？

msg: It happened an age ago.
msg_zh: 那是很久远的事了……

msg: But when I recall, I see it true.
msg_zh: 但对我来说，历历在目。

msg: On a night of wint'ry fog.
msg_zh: 在飘着冰冷浓雾的夜里……

msg: Bearers of Black Knives stole into the dark.
msg_zh: 黑刀刺客傍着夜色疾行。

msg: And the demigods began to fall, starting with Godwyn the Golden.
msg_zh: 在“黄金”葛德文成为半神的初始死者……

msg: Queen Marika was driven to the brink.
msg_zh: 也许玛莉卡女王就陷入了狂乱。

msg: The Shattering ensued; a war that wrought only darkness.
msg_zh: 关于破碎战争，全是一团迷雾──

msg: The Elden Ring was broken, but by whom? And why?
msg_zh: 是什么人，为了什么目的击碎艾尔登法环？

msg: What could the Demigods ever hope to win by warring?
msg_zh: 诸位半神是为了什么投身战争？

msg: The conqueror of the stars, General Radahn.
msg_zh: “碎星英雄”拉塔恩将军，

msg: And the Blade of Miquella, Malenia the Severed.
msg_zh: “米凯拉的锋刃”残身玛莲妮亚，

msg: These two were the mightiest to remain, and locked horns in combat.
msg_zh: 力量最为强大的他们战斗到最后一刻……

msg: But why was there no victor?
msg_zh: 但又为什么，无人胜出？

msg: And so, we inhabit a fractured world.
msg_zh: 时至今日，世界依旧百废待举，

msg: Awaiting the arrival of the Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 静待艾尔登之王现身。

msg: Unless of course, thou shouldst take the crown?
msg_zh: ……还是说，你就是那个人？

msg: You think this is the one, Torrent?
msg_zh: ……托雷特，你很在意这个人？

msg: Is that him, Torrent?
msg_zh: ……托雷特，是这个人吧？

msg: Is that her, Torrent?
msg_zh: ……托雷特，是这个人吧？

msg: Don't worry, it's not too late.
msg_zh: 不用担心，还有救喔。

msg: He is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 这个人肯定也会追求艾尔登法环……

msg: She is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 这个人肯定也会追求艾尔登法环……

msg: ...For that is their curse.
msg_zh: 毕竟这是个诅咒。

msg: Don't worry Torrent, fortune is on his side.
msg_zh: ……不用担心，托雷特。还有救喔。

msg: Don't worry Torrent, fortune is on her side.
msg_zh: ……不用担心，托雷特。还有救喔。

msg: We found him here, after all.
msg_zh: 终于找到了。

msg: We found her here, after all.
msg_zh: 终于找到了。

msg: One of his kind is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 这个人肯定也会追求艾尔登法环……

msg: One of her kind is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 这个人肯定也会追求艾尔登法环……

msg: ...Even if it does violate the Golden Order...
msg_zh: 即使这么做会背离黄金律法。

msg: Foul Tarnished,
msg_zh: 褪色者啊──

msg: In search of the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 受愚昧的野心之火摆弄，

msg: Emboldened by the flame of ambition.
msg_zh: 妄想得到艾尔登法环？

msg: Hrah!
Someone must extinguish thy flame.
msg_zh: 那么，连同那阵火在内，都该扑灭。

msg: Let it be Margit the Fell!
msg_zh: 我“恶兆妖鬼”玛尔基特，立刻执行。

msg: Mighty dragon, thou'rt a trueborn heir.
msg_zh: ……同为后裔的龙啊，

msg: Lend me thy strength, o kindred.
msg_zh: 汝的力量，无庸置疑……

msg: Deliver me unto greater heights.
msg_zh: 能将朕推向更高的境界。

msg: ...Well.
A lowly Tarnished,
msg_zh: 区区褪色者，

msg: playing as a lord.
msg_zh: 气焰倒是不小。

msg: I command thee, kneel!
msg_zh: 跪下吧，

msg: I am the lord of all that is golden!
msg_zh: 朕可是黄金君王！

msg: <panting>
Ahh, truest of dragons.
msg_zh: 啊，强大的龙啊……

msg: Lend me thy strength...
msg_zh: 将汝的力量……

msg: Nnngh!
<panting>
Forefathers, one and all...
msg_zh: 诸位先祖啊……

msg: Great King Godfrey...
msg_zh: 伟大的葛孚雷王啊……

msg: Bear witness!
msg_zh: 敬请见证！

msg: It's been a long while, Morgott.
msg_zh: ……许久不见了，蒙葛特。

msg: Long and hard didst thou fight.
msg_zh: ……能战斗至今，着实不简单。

msg: Tarnished Warrior.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊──

msg: Spurned by the grace of gold.
msg_zh: 不受黄金赐福的战士啊。

msg: Be assured, the Elden Ring
msg_zh: 那伟大的艾尔登法环──

msg: resteth close at hand.
msg_zh: 确实近在眼前。

msg: Alas, I am returned.
msg_zh: 然而我重回此地，

msg: To be granted audience once more.
msg_zh: 为的就是再次觐见它。

msg: Upon my name as Godfrey,
msg_zh: 我名为葛孚雷──

msg: The first Elden Lord!
msg_zh: 是初始的艾尔登之王。

msg: Nngh!
That will be all.
msg_zh: 好了，够了。

msg: Thou didst me good service, Serosh.
msg_zh: 瑟洛修啊，你帮了我不少忙。

msg: I've given thee courtesy enough.
msg_zh: 我受够繁文缛节了。

msg: Rrraaargh!
<exhales>
Now I fight as Hoarah Loux!
msg_zh: 从此刻开始，我是荷莱·露！

msg: Warrior!
msg_zh: 一名“战士”！

msg: Dearest Miquella.
msg_zh: 我的米凯拉啊，

msg: You must abide alone a while.
msg_zh: 请您稍等我一会儿。

msg: No one else will take you.
msg_zh: 我不会再让您……

msg: Never again, I swear!
msg_zh: 被任何一个人夺走！

msg: Welcome, honoured guest.
msg_zh: 贵宾莅临了──

msg: To the birthplace of our dynasty!
msg_zh: 前来见证我们的美妙王朝！

msg: Foul Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，

msg: Graceless Tarnished.
msg_zh: 不受赐福的褪色者啊──

msg: What is thy business with these thrones?
msg_zh: 来到王座，何事之有？

msg: Ahh...
Godrick the Golden.
msg_zh: “黄金”葛瑞克、

msg: The twin prodigies, Miquella and Malenia.
msg_zh: 蒙受天赐的孪生子，米凯拉与玛莲妮亚、

msg: General Radahn.
msg_zh: 拉塔恩将军、

msg: Praetor Rykard.
msg_zh: 拉卡德司法官、

msg: Lunar Princess Ranni.
msg_zh: “月之公主”菈妮──

msg: Wilful traitors, all.
msg_zh: 一群不知服从的叛徒。

msg: Thy kind are all of a piece.
msg_zh: 你们全都是一丘之貉。

msg: Pillagers, come seeking vengeance upon the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 敌视黄金树的侵略者啊。

msg: Pillagers. Emboldened by the flame of ambition.
msg_zh: 为野心之火摆弄的掠夺者啊。

msg: Ngh!
Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
msg_zh: ……在你那愚昧的墓志铭上，

msg: Felled by King Morgott! Last of all kings.
msg_zh: 刻上我“末代之王”蒙葛特之名！

msg: O, Death.
O Destined Death...
msg_zh: ……命定之死啊。

msg: Become my blade, once more.
msg_zh: 再一次化成我的剑吧。

msg: <long exhalation>
Ahh, art thou come to be born anew?
msg_zh: 哎呀，你也想要再一次诞生，所以过来了吗？

msg: Be not afraid, there is no pain...
msg_zh: 不用担心，一点也不会痛唷……

msg: <children giggling>
Hush, little culver.
msg_zh: 哎呀……你出现了……

msg: Hush, fair maid.
msg_zh: 哎呀……你出现了……

msg: I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pure...
msg_zh: 我一定会让你诞生成乖孩子……

msg: Ahh, my beloved...
msg_zh: 啊，我可爱的孩子……

msg: Have no fear, I will hold thee. Patience...
msg_zh: 等等我，我马上来抱抱你……

msg: Ye will be countless born, forever and ever.
msg_zh: 你们会一直、一直、一直诞生唷。

msg: Ye will be countless, born, forever.
msg_zh: 你们会一直、一直诞生唷……

msg: Defiler of mother's rich slumber.
msg_zh: 侵入母亲如泥摇篮的人物啊。

msg: Upon my name as Ranni theWitch, thou wilt not gounpunished.
msg_zh: 我以魔女菈妮之名，降下惩罚。

msg: After death, quite the tale will bethine to tell.
msg_zh: 在死亡之后继续传唱吧：

msg: Of the last Queen of Caria,Rennala of the Full Moon.
msg_zh: 卡利亚的末代女王──

msg: And the majesty of the nightshe conjureth.
msg_zh: “满月”蕾娜菈有如高雅黑夜的化身。

msg: Ahh, my sweet children...
msg_zh: 啊，我的孩子……

msg: Have no fear, I will hold thee. Patience...
msg_zh: 等等我，我马上来抱抱你……

msg: Ye will be countless born, forever and ever.
msg_zh: 你们会一直、一直、一直诞生唷。

msg: Upon my name as Ranni the Witch.
msg_zh: 我以魔女菈妮之名宣告：

msg: Mother's rich slumber shall not bedisturbed by thee.
msg_zh: 勿侵扰母亲的如泥酣眠。

msg: Foul trespasser.
msg_zh: 罪人啊。

msg: Send word far and wide.
msg_zh: 传唱后世吧：

msg: Of the last Queen of Caria,Rennala of the Full Moon.
msg_zh: 卡利亚的末代女王──

msg: And the majesty of the nightshe conjureth.
msg_zh: “满月”蕾娜菈有如高雅黑夜的化身。

msg: I dreamt for so long.
msg_zh: ……我做了好长的梦──

msg: My flesh was dull gold...and my blood, rotted.
msg_zh: 身体如黄金失色，血液陷入腐败……

msg: Corpse after corpse, left in my wake...
msg_zh: 堆积了不计其数的尸骸，

msg: As I awaited...his return.
msg_zh: 就为了等到那个人归来。

msg: ...Heed my words.
msg_zh: ……好好感受吧。

msg: I am Malenia.Blade of Miquella.
msg_zh: 我玛莲妮亚，身为米凯拉的锋刃──

msg: And I have never known defeat.
msg_zh: 战无不胜的理由。

msg: Sweet Tarnished...
msg_zh: 褪色者啊……

msg: Dearest companion...
msg_zh: 我的朋友啊……

msg: Did you not heed my warning?
msg_zh: 你不理会我的警告吗？

msg: Your greed knows no end.
msg_zh: 真是贪婪。

msg: You would steal the last drop of warmth from his empty frame?
msg_zh: 事到如今，还想夺走空壳仅存的温暖。

msg: After all you've taken, you still want more?
msg_zh: 你还想夺走更多吗？

msg: Then you will have to kill me.
msg_zh: ……那么，就战胜我吧。

msg: I am Malenia, Sword of Miquella.
msg_zh: 打倒战无不胜、米凯拉的剑──

msg: And I have never known defeat.
msg_zh: 打倒我玛莲妮亚。

msg: My dear twin, accept this gift.
msg_zh: 亲爱的妹妹啊──

msg: A gift of abundance, my last drop of dew.
msg_zh: 收下我的丰饶，我最后的露滴。

msg: Let all things flourish,
msg_zh: 无论美丽，无论丑陋──

msg: whether graceful, or malign.
msg_zh: 愿一切都依他的原形，成长茁壮。

msg: Wait.
msg_zh: ……慢着。

msg: The scarlet bloom flowers once more.
msg_zh: 猩红花朵将再一次怒放。

msg: You will witness true horror.
msg_zh: 见识何谓“毛骨悚然”吧。

msg: Now, rot!
msg_zh: 腐败吧！

msg: Farewell, then.
msg_zh: ……永别了，

msg: May your visit be fruitful.
msg_zh: 希望会是一场完美的邂逅。

msg: Hmm...
Very well.
msg_zh: 还不坏啊。

msg: You...
msg_zh: 你啊……

msg: A fitting sacrifice you shall be, for the Serpent King.
msg_zh: 成为我蛇王的祭品吧，

msg: Join the Serpent King, as family...
msg_zh: 成为我蛇王的族人吧，

msg: And devour the gods with me!
msg_zh: 一起吞噬神祇吧！

msg: Together, we will devour the very gods!
msg_zh: 一起吞噬神祇吧！

msg: General Radahn is cursed ever to wander.
msg_zh: 拉塔恩将军一直处在仿徨的状态──

msg: Before we begin, allow me to paint you the full picture.
msg_zh: ……在祭典开始前，和你说一说吧。

msg: Eaten from the inside, by Malenia's scarlet rot, his wits are long gone.
msg_zh: 玛莲妮亚的猩红腐败不只由内而外侵蚀身体，\n也让将军的神智陷入疯狂。

msg: Now he gathers the corpses of former friends and foes alike, gorging on them, like a dog.
msg_zh: 他将尸体集中起来，不论敌我，\n接着像条野狗一样啃食……

msg: Howling at the sky.
msg_zh: 朝天空发出痛心的哭喊。

msg: O Erdtree, you shall burn.
msg_zh: 黄金树啊，燃烧吧。

msg: Burn, for the sake of the new Lord.
msg_zh: 为了新王，燃烧吧。

msg: Thank you. For guiding me here.
msg_zh: ……谢谢你带我来这里。

msg: The one who walks alongside flame,
msg_zh: “伴火同进者，”

msg: Shall one day meet the road of Destined Death.
msg_zh: “终有一天会遇见命定之死。”

msg: Good-bye.
msg_zh: 永别了。

msg: I hope you will become Lord. Lord of each and all.
msg_zh: 希望你能当上王──我们所有人的王。

msg: Aaargh! Aargh!
<guttural moan>
Nngghaa!
Argh!
<great howl>
Now wilt ye serve, each and all.
msg_zh: ……侍奉的时刻到啦。

msg: The Elden Lord is crowned.
msg_zh: ……法环之王加冕啦。

msg: The new Elden Lord,steward of a fracturing world.
msg_zh: 新的法环之王现身，衰颓时代随之降临……

msg: And so beginneth the age of fracture...
msg_zh: 衰颓时代就要拉开序幕了吶……

msg: The fallen leaves tell a story.
msg_zh: ……落叶捎来讯息：

msg: Of how a Tarnished, of no renown, became Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 无名的褪色者，当上了艾尔登之王。

msg: The fallen leaves tell a story.
msg_zh: ……落叶捎来讯息：

msg: Of how a Tarnished became Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 在雾的彼端，我们的故乡“交界地”，

msg: In our home, across the fog, the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 褪色者当上了艾尔登之王。

msg: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
msg_zh: 在王的治理之下，想必人们会如此形容──

msg: An Age of Fracture.
msg_zh: 那是个“衰颓时代”。

msg: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
msg_zh: 在王的治理之下，想必人们会如此形容──

msg: The Age of Order.
msg_zh: 那是个“律法时代”。

msg: The Age Absolute.
msg_zh: 那是个“完美律法时代”。

msg: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
msg_zh: 在王的治理之下，想必人们会如此形容──

msg: The Age of the Duskborn
msg_zh: 那是个“潜藏者当道的时代”。

msg: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
msg_zh: 在王的治理之下，想必人们会如此形容──

msg: The reviled curse that defined our age.
msg_zh: 那时代充斥该忌讳的诅咒、玷污……

msg: The Blessing of Despair.
msg_zh: 最适合以绝望赐福为名。

msg: ...The battle is over, I see.
msg_zh: ……一切都结束了吧。

msg: I do solemnly swear.
msg_zh: 我在此宣誓：

msg: To every living being, and every living soul.
msg_zh: 所有的生命，所有的灵魂啊，

msg: Now cometh the age of the stars.
msg_zh: 接下来即将迈入星星时代──

msg: A thousand year voyageunder the wisdom of the Moon.
msg_zh: 将遵循月的法则，开始千年的旅程。

msg: Here beginneth the chill night that encompasses all, reaching the great beyond.
msg_zh: 众生啊，在这冰冷长夜中，漫长地思考吧──

msg: Into fear, doubt, and loneliness...
msg_zh: 何谓恐惧、仿徨、孤独？

msg: As the path stretcheth into darkness...
msg_zh: 以及何谓深入黑暗？

msg: Well then. Shall we?
msg_zh: 来，走吧……

msg: My fair consort, eternal.
msg_zh: 我永远的王啊。

msg: ...The battle is over, I see.
msg_zh: ……战争结束了吧。

msg: ...All matters are settled, then.
msg_zh: ……一切都结束了吧。

msg: I do solemnly swear.
msg_zh: 我在此宣誓：

msg: To all the hearts that remain in thy thrall.
msg_zh: 依然受到禁锢的众生心灵啊。

msg: To all life, and the souls harboured therein.
msg_zh: 众生的生命，以及其中的心灵啊。

msg: Now comes the age of the mind.
msg_zh: 接下来即将迈入精神时代──

msg: A thousand year voyage,governed by the wisdom of the Moon.
msg_zh: 将遵循月的法则，开始千年的旅程。

msg: All shall be encompassed, in a still and silent night, unending.And thought shall turn to fear,
msg_zh: 众生啊，在这悄然无声的长夜中，永远思考吧──

msg: emptiness, life...
msg_zh: 何谓恐惧、空虚、生命？

msg: And a path stretching into the darkness...
msg_zh: 以及何谓深入黑暗？

msg: Let us go, together.
msg_zh: 来，一起走吧……

msg: My dear consort, eternal.
msg_zh: 我永远的王啊。

msg: Lord of Frenzied Flame...
msg_zh: 癫火之王……

msg: I will seek you, as far as you may travel...
msg_zh: ……我一定会到你的身边……

msg: To deliver you what is yours.
msg_zh: 为你送上──

msg: Destined Death.
msg_zh: 命定之死。

msg: Young seedling, young seedling.
msg_zh: 小树苗啊，小树苗，

msg: Return to the bosom of earth.
msg_zh: 回到大地的怀抱吧。

msg: But remember well,
msg_zh: 但是千万要记得，

msg: Thou'rt mine.
msg_zh: 你是属于我的。

msg: So shall I give of myself. This is for thee.
msg_zh: 来，收下吧。

msg: Mine abundance, my drop of dew.
msg_zh: 收下我的丰饶，收下我的露滴，

msg: Quench thy thirst, throughout thy frame.
msg_zh: 滋润你的渴、充满你的身，

msg: Blossom and burgeon, time and again.
msg_zh: 一株株的新芽，一株株地萌生。

msg: Grow larger, stronger.
msg_zh: 愿你越长越大、越长越高。

msg: Until the day cometh.
msg_zh: 然后终有一天，

msg: When thou canst share in my dream.
msg_zh: 和我一同梦见吧──

msg: Elden Ring, O Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 艾尔登法环、艾尔登法环，

msg: Beget Order most elegant, from my tender reverie.
msg_zh: 那优美的律法，那温柔的梦。

msg: If thou covetest the throne,
msg_zh: 有意为王的人啊，

msg: Impress my vision upon thine heart.
msg_zh: 请别忘记我的虚像。

msg: In the new world of thy making,
msg_zh: 希望在你那全新的世界里头，

msg: all things will flourish,
msg_zh: 无论美丽，无论丑陋──

msg: whether graceful, or malign.
msg_zh: 一切都能依他的原形，成长茁壮。

msg: Greetings.
msg_zh: 你好。

msg: Traveller from beyond the Fog.
msg_zh: 穿越雾前来的人啊。

msg: I am Melina.
msg_zh: 我的名字是梅琳娜……

msg: I offer you an accord.
msg_zh: 想要和你谈个条件。

msg: And one other. Whom grace would again bless.
msg_zh: ……那失去的赐福又再一次，

msg: A Tarnished of no renown.
msg_zh: 回到默默无名的褪色者身上。

msg: Cross the fog, to the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 朝雾的彼端前进，抵达交界地，

msg: To stand before the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 觐见艾尔登法环──

msg: And become the Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 当上艾尔登之王吧。

msg: The Rune of Death is unbound.
msg_zh: ……死亡卢恩被释放了。

msg: Black flames have devoured the Erdtree,
msg_zh: 黑色火焰燃烧了黄金树，

msg: and the Lands Between are shrouded by Death's dark fate.
msg_zh: 灰暗的死亡命运遍布交界地。

msg: But the flames will also burn the impenetrable thorns.
msg_zh: 然而那火焰，同样也燃烧了拒绝的刺。

msg: Farewell it is, then.
msg_zh: 是时候道别了。

msg: You'll be Elden Lord, yet.
msg_zh: 一定要当上艾尔登之王吶……

msg: Well, if you really are that gullible...
msg_zh: ……你真的是烂好人啊。

msg: Ngh!
then stay away from the Volcano Manor!
msg_zh: 那我劝你最好别靠近火山官邸。

msg: Bye now!
msg_zh: 拜啦！

msg: Take care!
msg_zh: 一路小心！

msg: Lord host, I could not be more content.
msg_zh: 宿主啊，我真的非常高兴。

msg: I found knowledge, and then found someone. That someone was you.
msg_zh: 庆幸自己获得智慧，遇见的人是您……

msg: And now, inside you, here I am...
msg_zh: 庆幸能待在您的体内，完成这件事。

msg: Well well well?
msg_zh: 哦哦哦？

msg: I should have known, you scheming little thief.
msg_zh: 你真的是不要脸的小偷啊。

msg: The gods demand vengeance. Vengeance!
msg_zh: 那只能说活该遭天谴啦，这是天谴！

msg: He he he he he...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: My sincerest gratitude. I thought I'd never wrench that thing open.
msg_zh: 多谢啊，你不打开我还伤脑筋咧。

msg: You're the finest customer a man ever had!
msg_zh: 你真的是大贵客耶。

msg: This is how you die, you disgusting Tarnished.
msg_zh: 下贱的褪色者，你去死吧。

msg: Don't worry, I've got big plans for you. After you snuff it...
msg_zh: 我会让你的牺牲发挥最大的价值。

msg: <screaming>
<screaming>
(explained above)
Unleash it upon them! A cursed blessing to all!
msg_zh: 所有的一切！蒙受诅咒的赐福吧！

msg: (scream of pain)
Have you heard of the Finger Maidens?
msg_zh: ……你知道指头女巫吗？

msg: They serve the Two Fingers, offering guidance, and aid, to the Tarnished.
msg_zh: 她们是侍奉双指，帮助、引导褪色者的人……

msg: But you, I am afraid, are maidenless.
msg_zh: 但现在的你，没有女巫在身边。

msg: I can play the role of maiden.
msg_zh: ……我可以代替她们的职务。

msg: Turning runes into strength.
msg_zh: 我能够将卢恩化作你的力量。

msg: To aid you in your search for the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 只要你渴求艾尔登法环，\n这件事肯定对你有帮助。

msg: You need only take me with you.
msg_zh: ……所以，希望你能帮忙──

msg: To the foot of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 带我到黄金树的树脚。

msg: Then it's settled.
msg_zh: ……这样就算谈成了。

msg: Summon me by grace to turn runes into strength.
msg_zh: 想让卢恩化为自己的力量时，\n请在赐福所在处呼唤我。

msg: Ahh, another matter.
msg_zh: ……对了，还有一件事。

msg: I bequeath to you this ring.
msg_zh: 这枚戒指交给你。

msg: Use it to traverse great distances.
msg_zh: 需要长距离移动时，就使用那枚戒指吧。

msg: It will summon a spectral steed named Torrent.
msg_zh: 那能够呼唤名为托雷特的骏马灵魂。

msg: Torrent has chosen you.
msg_zh: ……托雷特选上了你，

msg: Treat him with respect.
msg_zh: 希望你好好待它。

msg: I understand. I'm asking you to put faith in but a stranger.
msg_zh: ……我明白了。心有疑念，我也不勉强。

msg: Yet I'm certain that we can reach an understanding.
msg_zh: 但你一定会需要这个条件。

msg: Summon me by grace if you should reconsider.
msg_zh: 届时，希望你到赐福所在处呼唤我。

msg: Have you reconsidered my offer?
msg_zh: ……你愿意接受条件了吗？

msg: Shall I turn your runes to strength?
msg_zh: ……想把卢恩化为自己的力量吗？

msg: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
msg_zh: 一下子就好，让我碰触你……

msg: Phew. It is done.
msg_zh: ……这样就结束了。

msg: This tiny golden aura is the grace of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……这簇小巧的金光，是黄金树的赐福。

msg: This light once shone in the eyes of your Tarnished brethren.
msg_zh: 据说在过去，这金光从你们褪色者的眼眸散失，

msg: But now it is all that guides you. Or so I hear.
msg_zh: 而如今，又转而出现、引导你们。

msg: You can see them, can't you?
msg_zh: 你应该看得见吧？

msg: The rays of grace, that guide you through your burden.
msg_zh: 赐福的指引──引导使命所在的光芒。

msg: Me?
msg_zh: ……关于我吗？

msg: I'm searching.
msg_zh: ……我在寻找。

msg: For my purpose, given to me by my mother inside the Erdtree, long ago.
msg_zh: 过去母亲在黄金树赐予我的那个使命，

msg: For the reason that I yet live, burned and bodiless.
msg_zh: 还有即使肉身烧毁，变成灵魂形貌的身体，\n我还能继续活命的理由。

msg: There is something for which I must apologise.
msg_zh: ……其实我也想向你道歉，

msg: I've acted the Finger Maiden, yet can offer no guidance.
msg_zh: 我曾说要代替指头女巫的职务，\n但我没有办法引导你。

msg: I am no maiden. My purpose…was long ago lost.
msg_zh: 因为我不是女巫，而且……\n也失去了既有的使命。

msg: Upon the cliff, in Castle Stormveil, is a shardbearer.
msg_zh: ……断崖之城史东薇尔，那里有一位碎片君王。

msg: A demigod who inherited a fragment of the shattered Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 他是在艾尔登法环破碎之际，\n拥有那破碎一部分的其中一位半神。

msg: If the rays of grace signal the castle,
msg_zh: ……如果赐福的光芒指引你前往那里，

msg: then the Elden Ring beckons you.
msg_zh: 那么，你就是真的受到艾尔登法环引导。

msg: As an ally by pact,
msg_zh: 对和你有着约定的人而言……

msg: ...I pray that you are fit...
msg_zh: 我希望你能保持如此。

msg: To face the challenge presented by the Ring.
msg_zh: ……我希望你能受艾尔登法环引导，\n进而勇于挑战各种难关。

msg: Spoken echoes linger here.
msg_zh: ……这个地方存在着箴言。

msg: Words of Queen Marika, who vanished long ago.
msg_zh: 是很久以前就销声匿迹的玛莉卡女王，\n她所留下的箴言。

msg: If you wish, I will share them with you.
msg_zh: ……你想听的话，我可以转达。

msg: Very well. In Marika's own words.
msg_zh: ……我知道了。\n我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

msg: My Lord, and thy warriors. I divest each of thee of thy grace.
msg_zh: “吾王啊，王的众战士啊，我将夺去你们的赐福。”

msg: With thine eyes dimmed, ye will be driven from the Lands Between.
msg_zh: “当你们的双眸黯淡褪色，\n我将放逐你们于交界地之外──”

msg: Ye will wage war in a land afar, where ye will live, and die.
msg_zh: “于交界地之外征战，生存，死亡吧。”

msg: Well? Perhaps that might serve you in lieu of a maiden's guidance.
msg_zh: ……怎么样？希望多少能代替女巫的引导。

msg: Of course. Perhaps there is no need.
msg_zh: ……我知道了，这不必勉强自己听。

msg: Tell me if you should change your mind.
msg_zh: 改变心意了再和我说。

msg: Spoken echoes of Queen Marika linger here, as well.
msg_zh: ……这个地方也有玛莉卡女王的箴言。

msg: Shall I share them with you?
msg_zh: 你还想听的话，我可以转达。

msg: In Marika's own words.
msg_zh: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

msg: Then, after thy death, I will give back what I once claimed.
msg_zh: “在你们面临死亡之后，那被夺去的会再归还──”

msg: Return to the Lands Between, wage war, and brandish the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: “返回交界地，投身交战，\n随心所欲地展现艾尔登法环。”

msg: Grow strong in the face of death. Warriors of my lord. Lord Godfrey.
msg_zh: “与死亡比邻，成为强者吧──\n王的众战士啊，吾王葛孚雷啊。”

msg: In Marika's own words.
msg_zh: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

msg: The Erdtree governs all. The choice is thine.
msg_zh: “黄金树是掌管一切的存在。做出抉择吧──”

msg: Become one with the Order. Or divest thyself of it.
msg_zh: “要融入律法？还是脱离律法……”

msg: To wallow at the fringes; a powerless upstart.
msg_zh: “沦为无力的边境支流？”

msg: In Marika's own words.
msg_zh: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

msg: Hear me, Demigods. My children beloved.
msg_zh: “半神啊，我可爱的孩子啊。”

msg: Make of thyselves that which ye desire. Be it a Lord. Be it a God.
msg_zh: “你们能成为任何存在──\n能成为王者，也能当上神祇。”

msg: But should ye fail to become aught at all, ye will be forsaken.
msg_zh: “但是当你们没有成为任一存在，就会被抛弃……”

msg: Amounting only to sacrifices...
msg_zh: “并且，成为祭品。”

msg: In Marika's own words.
msg_zh: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

msg: O Radagon, leal hound of the Golden Order.
msg_zh: “噢，拉达冈啊，黄金律法的忠犬啊。”

msg: Thou'rt yet to become me. Thou'rt yet to become a god.
msg_zh: “你还不是我，还不是神祇。”

msg: Let us be shattered, both. Mine other self.
msg_zh: “我的半身啊！击碎彼此吧！”

msg: In Marika's own words.
msg_zh: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

msg: I declare mine intent, to search the depths of the Golden Order.
msg_zh: “我在此宣告，去探索黄金律法──”

msg: Through understanding of the proper way, our faith, our grace, is increased.
msg_zh: “明了何谓正当性之际，\n我们的信仰与赐福也会获得加强。”

msg: Those blissful early days of blind belief are long past.
msg_zh: “那些幸福的幼年时光，盲从时代已经走向终结。”

msg: My comrades; why must ye falter?
msg_zh: “我的同志啊，毋须再犹豫不决！”

msg: In Marika's own words.
msg_zh: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

msg: Hark, brave warriors. Hark, my lord Godfrey. We commend your deeds.
msg_zh: “王的众战士啊，吾王葛孚雷啊。”

msg: Guidance hath delivered ye through each ordeal, to the place ye stand.
msg_zh: “遵循引导战斗至此，着实难能可贵。”

msg: Put the Giants to the sword, and confine the flame atop the mount.
msg_zh: “歼灭那山顶上的巨人们，封印火焰吧。”

msg: Let a new epoch begin. An epoch glistening with life.
msg_zh: “如此一来，那光耀的生命时代，\n就能拉开序幕──”

msg: Brandish the Elden Ring, for the Age of the Erdtree!
msg_zh: “展现艾尔登法环，迎接黄金树时代之始！”

msg: Forgive me. I've been...testing you.
msg_zh: ……对不起，其实我一直在观察你。

msg: To see whether or not grace truly does guide you.
msg_zh: 怀疑你是不是真的受赐福指引……

msg: And...whether you are fit to face the challenge that entails.
msg_zh: 还有，会不会挺身挑战难关。

msg: It seems my worries were unfounded.
msg_zh: 结果是我杞人忧天。

msg: Torrent had your measure from the very start.
msg_zh: 从一开始，托雷特就相信你了……

msg: Whereas I merely pretended.
msg_zh: 我不够真诚。

msg: There is but one other thing I can do to offer you guidance.
msg_zh: 有一件事情，是我能引导你的──

msg: I can take you to the Roundtable Hold...
msg_zh: 圆桌厅堂。那是受到指引的褪色者，

msg: Gathering place of Tarnished champions, guided by Grace...
msg_zh: 也就是英雄们聚集的地方，我能够带你前往。

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……我明白了。

msg: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
msg_zh: 一下子就好，让我碰触你……

msg: Forgive me. I've been...testing you.
msg_zh: ……对不起，其实我一直在观察你。

msg: To determine if the Elden Ring would truly have you.
msg_zh: 怀疑你是不是真的想觐见艾尔登法环，

msg: If you had the mettle to endure this long and arduous path.
msg_zh: 还有，会不会为此投身无数战斗，向前迈进。

msg: It seems my worries were unfounded.
msg_zh: 结果是我杞人忧天。

msg: Torrent had your measure from the very start.
msg_zh: 从一开始，托雷特就相信你了……

msg: Whereas I merely pretended.
msg_zh: 我不够真诚。

msg: There is but one other thing I can do to offer you guidance.
msg_zh: 有一件事情，是我能引导你的──

msg: I can take you to the Roundtable Hold...
msg_zh: 圆桌厅堂。那是受到指引的褪色者，

msg: Gathering place of Tarnished champions, guided by Grace...
msg_zh: 也就是英雄们聚集的地方，我能够带你前往。

msg: Your seamster, Boc...
msg_zh: ……你的裁缝师，柏克。

msg: He is always eager to see your return.
msg_zh: 他一直在等你。

msg: Please, will you talk to him, when you can?
msg_zh: ……可以的话，希望你去见他。

msg: I'm sure he would be much contented.
msg_zh: 他一定会很高兴。

msg: Your seamster, Boc...
msg_zh: ……你的裁缝师，柏克。

msg: I see him crying, from time to time.
msg_zh: 他有时候会哭泣。

msg: I think he misses his mother.
msg_zh: 好像是因为想念母亲，

msg: He wants someone to tell him he's beautiful.
msg_zh: 也希望有人能称赞他好看。

msg: Does being born of a mother...
msg_zh: ……身为母亲，还有母亲生下的人，

msg: Mean one behaves in such a manner?
msg_zh: 所有人都会像他们那样吗……？

msg: Is there...another person inside of you?
msg_zh: ……你的身体里，还住着另外一个人吗？

msg: Did you...want that to happen?
msg_zh: 那是你所希望的事吗？

msg: I sense no malice. Do as you think best.
msg_zh: ……我没有从中感受到恶念，就交由你判断了。

msg: Hello, other you.
msg_zh: ……另外一个人啊。

msg: I am Melina, and I have an accord with this person.
msg_zh: 我的名字是梅琳娜，和这个人有着约定。

msg: We might be together for some time.
msg_zh: 说不定我们会相处一阵子……

msg: Pleased to meet you.
msg_zh: 请多关照了。

msg: Is there...another person inside of you?
msg_zh: ……你的身体里，还住着另外一个人吗？

msg: Did you...want that to happen?
msg_zh: 那是你所希望的事吗？

msg: I sense no malice. Do as you think best.
msg_zh: ……我没有从中感受到恶念，就交由你判断了。

msg: Hello, other you.
msg_zh: ……另外一个人啊。

msg: I am Melina, and I am travelling with this person.
msg_zh: 我的名字是梅琳娜，和这个人一起旅行。

msg: We might be together for some time.
msg_zh: 说不定我们会相处一阵子……

msg: Pleased to meet you.
msg_zh: 请多关照了。

msg: The Erdtree...is close.
msg_zh: ……快到黄金树了。

msg: Only a little further till the foot of the Erdtree, and the accord is fulfilled.
msg_zh: 交换条件中提到的树脚，就快到了。

msg: It takes me back.
msg_zh: ……好怀念啊。

msg: I was born at the foot of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 我是在黄金树的树脚诞生的，

msg: Where mother gave me my purpose.
msg_zh: 也是在那里接受了母亲赐予我的使命……

msg: Though now, everything is lost to me.
msg_zh: 但现在，我失去了一切。

msg: I...have to ascertain for myself.
msg_zh: ……我必须要知道──

msg: The reason for which I live, burned and bodiless.
msg_zh: 即使肉身烧毁，变成灵魂形貌的身体，\n我还能继续活命的理由。

msg: My utmost thanks.
msg_zh: ……谢谢你。

msg: For bringing me to the base of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 谢谢你带我来到黄金树的树脚。

msg: Here, I can govern my own movement.
msg_zh: 在这里，我就可以自由行动。

msg: And thus, the accord is fulfilled.
msg_zh: ……那么，我们的约定完成了。

msg: I shall depart to ascertain the purpose I was given.
msg_zh: 我要去确认自己的使命。

msg: Farewell.
msg_zh: ……再会了。

msg: I shall leave Torrent, and the power to turn runes into strength, here with you.
msg_zh: 将卢恩化为力量的方法，还有托雷特，\n我都留在这里。

msg: I wish you luck, in realising your ambition.
msg_zh: 希望你能达成自己的使命。

msg: You have fought long and hard.
msg_zh: ……你都一路征战过来了，

msg: I have no doubt you will become Elden Lord. May you take the throne.
msg_zh: 肯定有办法当上王──当上艾尔登之王。

msg: Hello again, old friend.
msg_zh: ……好久不见了。

msg: It's me, Melina. Your travelling companion.
msg_zh: 你还记得我吗？我是梅琳娜。

msg: Allow me a moment to converse with you.
msg_zh: 我想和你聊一聊。

msg: You were unable to enter the Erdtree, no?
msg_zh: ……你没办法进入黄金树吧？

msg: Prevented by the mantle of barbs.
msg_zh: 它的表面布满荆棘，拒绝让你进入。

msg: The thorns are impenetrable.
msg_zh: ……那是拒绝的刺，

msg: A husk of the Erdtree's being; that spurns all that exists without.
msg_zh: 是黄金树拒绝外界一切，由自我形成的硬壳。

msg: The only way to stand before the Elden Ring...
msg_zh: 想要觐见艾尔登法环，当上艾尔登之王，

msg: and become the Elden Lord...is to pass the thorns.
msg_zh: 就必须克服那些刺。

msg: My purpose serves to aid in that very act.
msg_zh: ……我的使命与此相关。

msg: So I'd like you to undertake a new journey, with me.
msg_zh: 所以，我希望再和你一起旅行，

msg: To the flame of ruin, far above the clouds, upon the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
msg_zh: 走到云海之上，积着厚雪的巨人山顶──\n那有着灰灭火焰的山顶。

msg: Then I can set the Erdtree aflame.
msg_zh: 这么一来，我就能燃烧黄金树……

msg: And guide you. Down the path to becoming Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 也能引导你走上成为艾尔登之王的路。

msg: I wish to journey with you once more.
msg_zh: ……我希望再和你一起旅行，

msg: To the flame of ruin, far above the clouds, upon the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
msg_zh: 走到云海之上，积着厚雪的巨人山顶──\n那有着灰灭火焰的山顶。

msg: Then I can set the Erdtree aflame.
msg_zh: 这么一来，我就能燃烧黄金树……

msg: And guide you. Down the path to becoming Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 也能引导你走上成为艾尔登之王的路。

msg: Think not, of the kindling.
msg_zh: ……你不用担心火种。

msg: I shall see to that.
msg_zh: 我会准备。

msg: All I ask of you is to make the journey.
msg_zh: 你只要想办法前往，

msg: To the snowy mountaintops of the giants, far above the clouds.
msg_zh: 到那云海之上，积着厚雪的巨人山顶。

msg: I know...
msg_zh: ……我很清楚，

msg: I'm asking you to commit a cardinal sin.
msg_zh: 自己是在要求你犯下重罪。

msg: But it must be done to reach the path beyond.
msg_zh: 但如果，那条路会通往我希望的结果，

msg: And that is the path I wish to travel.
msg_zh: 我想要往下走。

msg: What is your mind?
msg_zh: ……你怎么想呢？

msg: There is something I'd like to say.
msg_zh: ……我想告诉你一件事。

msg: My purpose was given to me by my mother.
msg_zh: 我的使命虽然是母亲赐予的，

msg: But now, I act of my own volition.
msg_zh: 但现在，达成使命是出自我的意愿，

msg: I have set my heart upon the world that I would have.
msg_zh: 已经和母亲的期望无关。\n我是为了让世界变成希望的模样而行动──

msg: Regardless of my mother's designs.
msg_zh: 是我的心，决定这么做。

msg: I won't allow anyone to speak ill of that.
msg_zh: ……我不允许任何人践踏这份心意。

msg: Not even you.
msg_zh: 当然，就算是你也不允许。

msg: We're almost there.
msg_zh: ……就快到了。

msg: The flame of ruin lies just ahead.
msg_zh: 灰灭火焰就在前方。

msg: I'm glad it was you I travelled with.
msg_zh: ……我很庆幸是和你一起旅行。

msg: I must tender my thanks to Torrent, too.
msg_zh: 真的该谢谢托雷特。

msg: Thank you, Torrent.
msg_zh: ……托雷特，谢谢你。

msg: Please continue to lend your aid. Till the end.
msg_zh: 你要一直帮助这个人喔。

msg: I have long observed the Lands Between.
msg_zh: ……我一直注视着交界地。

msg: This world is in dire need of repair...
msg_zh: 心想着，这个世界必须被修复……

msg: and Death...indiscriminate...
msg_zh: 也认为，必须让死亡平等降临。

msg: Are you prepared...
msg_zh: ……你准备好了吗？

msg: To commit a cardinal sin?
msg_zh: 做好犯下重罪的心理准备了？

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……我明白了。

msg: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
msg_zh: 一下子就好，让我碰触你……

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……我明白了。

msg: Tell me, when you are fully prepared.
msg_zh: 等你准备好了，再和我说。

msg: Are you ready to commit a cardinal sin?
msg_zh: 你做好犯下重罪的心理准备了？

msg: If you intend to claim the frenzied flame,
msg_zh: ……如果你的心向着癫火，

msg: I ask that you cease.
msg_zh: 我希望你回心转意。

msg: It is not to be meddled with.
msg_zh: 那是不能接触的事物，

msg: It is chaos, devouring life and thought unending.
msg_zh: 是会吞噬所有生命，所有意念的浑沌。

msg: However ruined this world has become, however mired in torment and despair...
msg_zh: 即使这个世界陷入毁灭的境地，充满了痛苦与绝望，

msg: Life endures. Births continue.
msg_zh: 只要生命存在，世间生生不息……

msg: There is beauty in that, is there not?
msg_zh: 一切还是美好。

msg: If you would become Lord, do not deny this notion.
msg_zh: 我希望你──想当上王的你，\n不要否定这件事情。

msg: Please, leave the frenzied flame alone.
msg_zh: ……请不要让你的心，向着癫火。

msg: I shall see to the kindling.
msg_zh: ……我会准备火种。

msg: It is a purpose which I choose to fulfil.
msg_zh: 这是我的使命，同时也是出自我的意愿。

msg: So, please... Leave the frenzied flame alone.
msg_zh: 所以请不要让你的心，向着癫火。

msg: The frenzied flame is not to be meddled with.
msg_zh: ……癫火是不能接触的事物。

msg: It is chaos, devouring life and thought unending.
msg_zh: 那是会吞噬所有生命、所有意念的浑沌。

msg: So, please... Leave the frenzied flame alone.
msg_zh: 请不要让你的心，向着癫火。

msg: I ask you, one more time.
msg_zh: ……我再说一次──

msg: Please, seek not the frenzied flame.
msg_zh: 请让你的心，远离癫火吧。

msg: As one who strives to become a Lord,
msg_zh: 我希望你──想当上王的你，

msg: deny not the lives, the new births of this world.
msg_zh: 不要否定生命存在，世间生生不息这些事。

msg: Those who would are not fit to be called Lord.
msg_zh: ……否定这些了，那也算不上是王了。

msg: When the land they preside over is lifeless.
msg_zh: 没有生命的世界里，哪里会有王呢？

msg: Please, put a stop to this madness.
msg_zh: 拜托你了，能不能悬崖勒马？

msg: The Lord of Frenzied Flame is no lord at all.
msg_zh: 癫火之王根本算不上是王──

msg: When the land they preside over is lifeless.
msg_zh: 没有生命的世界里，哪里会有王呢？

msg: You...have inherited the frenzied flame.
msg_zh: ……你受赐癫火了。

msg: A pity. You are no longer fit.
msg_zh: 那么，你我已经不能共存。

msg: Our accord ends here.
msg_zh: 彼此立下的约定，也到此为止。

msg: But remember...
msg_zh: ……希望你能记住，

msg: Should you rise, as the Lord of Chaos,
msg_zh: 如果你真的当上了浑沌之王……

msg: I will kill you, as sure as night follows day.
msg_zh: 我会对你痛下杀手。

msg: Such is my duty, for allowing you the strength of runes.
msg_zh: 这是我的责任──\n因为我让你获得了卢恩的力量。

msg: Goodbye, my companion.
msg_zh: ……永别了。

msg: Goodbye, Torrent...
msg_zh: 托雷特，再见了……

msg: You...have inherited the frenzied flame.
msg_zh: ……你受赐癫火了。

msg: A pity. You are no longer fit.
msg_zh: 那么，你我已经不能共存。

msg: Our journey together ends here.
msg_zh: 此时此刻，就是旅行的终点。

msg: And remember...
msg_zh: ……希望你能记住，

msg: Should you rise as the Lord of Chaos,
msg_zh: 如果你真的当上了浑沌之王……

msg: I will kill you, as sure as night follows day.
msg_zh: 我会对你痛下杀手。

msg: Such is my duty, for allowing you the strength of runes.
msg_zh: 这是我的责任──\n因为我让你获得了卢恩的力量。

msg: Goodbye, my companion.
msg_zh: ……永别了。

msg: Goodbye, Torrent...
msg_zh: 托雷特，再见了……

msg: You, please, I can read them.
msg_zh: ……你啊，过来吧，过来老太婆这吧……

msg: Your fingers, please, your fingers...
msg_zh: 拜托吶，让我解读你的指头吧……

msg: Oh, bless you.
msg_zh: ……谢天谢地啊。

msg: Oh..ohh!
Within the fog, a gaping hole. Beyond the fog, one cursed by blood.
msg_zh: ……迷雾中有座深不见底的洞穴，\n迷雾彼端有血的诅咒。

msg: Below the surface, traces of those who lurk in the shadows.
msg_zh: ……地底有着潜伏者的片鳞半爪。

msg: In the east, the east. Should you desire…
msg_zh: ……想要一探究竟，朝东边，朝东边去！

msg: Oh, bless you.
msg_zh: ……谢天谢地啊。

msg: Oh..ohh!
Heavens, how can this be!
msg_zh: ……天吶，有这种事……

msg: A dreadful sign! Truly dreadful!
msg_zh: 不祥的预兆！这是不祥的预兆吶！

msg: You will face wrath, then madness, and finally, chaos.
msg_zh: 穿过怒潮，会有疯狂，会有浑沌等着。

msg: Turn back.
msg_zh: ……最好折返吶。

msg: This is a path you must forsake.
msg_zh: 你不可以往这条路前进。

msg: Dread awaits you in the south. Blackest dread!
msg_zh: 南方有不祥之兆，不祥之兆啊！

msg: Dragon slayer...
msg_zh: ……龙杀手……

msg: Ohhh, dragon slayer...
msg_zh: ……哦，龙杀手……

msg: You unfeeling barbarian.
msg_zh: 不知天高地厚的野人。

msg: Planning to feast? On dragon?
msg_zh: 你想把龙吃下去吗？

msg: At an abandoned church on that wee isle.
msg_zh: 想到那座小岛的废弃教堂，

msg: You would devour the heart of an ancient?
msg_zh: 把古老心脏吃下去吗？

msg: You wretched, undeserving brute!
msg_zh: 你这罪该万死，不知天高地厚的野人！

msg: Oh, bless you.
msg_zh: ……谢天谢地啊。

msg: Oh..ohh!
Head to the foundation of gold, Tarnished...
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，往黄金树脚前进吧。

msg: Traverse Raya Lucaria; \"Glintstone Eventide\"…
msg_zh: 穿越雷亚卢卡利亚──辉石星夜，

msg: …and reunite the half crescents, at the Grand Lift.
msg_zh: 在大升降机重合半月吧。

msg: Oh, but the bridge is collapsed, and cannot be crossed.
msg_zh: 哦，是吶。这座桥坏了，过不得。

msg: Only, why should that matter!
msg_zh: 但那又何妨！

msg: Stormveil Castle still stands tall!
msg_zh: 史东薇尔城仍然屹立不摇吶！

msg: Oh, bless you.
msg_zh: ……谢天谢地啊。

msg: Oh..ohh!
Miquella's favour can be yours…
msg_zh: ……你和米凯拉大人有缘分啊。

msg: Slaughter, slaughter, slaughter... The all-hearing slaughtered, but alas, it was for naught.
msg_zh: 屠杀、屠杀、再屠杀……\n但百耳小子却无法得逞。

msg: But all you need do, is snatch it from the big pot.
msg_zh: 因为你会从大壶之中抢走那东西嘛。
嘻嘻，嘻嘻嘻……

msg: Pity the poor, poor fool!
msg_zh: 活该啊，真是活该啊……

msg: Oh, bless you.
msg_zh: ……谢天谢地啊。

msg: Oh..ohh!
…Are you one for festivals? Or flowers?
msg_zh: ……你喜欢祭典吗？还是喜欢花？

msg: To the South, a grand festival to make the stars turn.
msg_zh: 南边有催动星辰的大祭典；

msg: To the East, the hardened bud of a flower to be.
msg_zh: 东边有含苞待放的花蕾吶。

msg: But dare you enter?
msg_zh: ……那你要去吗？

msg: Into the heart of the scarlet rot?
msg_zh: 投身进那片吓人的猩红腐败之中吶？

msg: Ah...ahhh...
What a pity it is, to be without the right.
msg_zh: ……没有资格这档事，说来也真悲哀吶。

msg: All you can do is stand, at a loss.
msg_zh: 你也只能束手无策──

msg: Without even the half crescents that wish to be whole.
msg_zh: 拿不到重合用的半月，

msg: Before the unmoving, unfeeling Grand Lift ahead.
msg_zh: 呆站在这条路前方，那一动也不动的大升降机前头。

msg: Or, are you planning to throw yourself to the waters?
msg_zh: 还是说，你要投身水中？

msg: To find the coward's passage, through the dim cavern?
msg_zh: 走向那不光彩的路，潜入黑暗的地底？

msg: What a pity it is, to be without the right.
msg_zh: ……没有资格这档事，说来也真悲哀吶。

msg: Oh, bless you...
msg_zh: ……谢天谢地啊。

msg: Bless you...
msg_zh: ……谢天谢地。

msg: You. The one who holds both half crescents.
msg_zh: ……你身怀重合用的半月，

msg: Take the path to the Grand Lift ahead.
msg_zh: 那去这条路前方的大升降机吧。

msg: For you...are the one who will be Lord.
msg_zh: ……你会当上王。

msg: Bear witness, one and all! The Lord is returned!
msg_zh: 所有人啊，看仔细了！回朝啦！

msg: The Elden Lord is come again!
msg_zh: 艾尔登之王，回朝啦！

msg: Oh, bless you...
msg_zh: ……谢天谢地啊。

msg: Oh..ohh!
To the east...ruins of gold. To the west...the serpent's sacrilege.
msg_zh: 东边有崩毁的黄金，西边有亵渎的蛇。

msg: Wherever the path leads, so shall you follow.
msg_zh: ……要选哪一边去，都无妨吶。

msg: Wherever the path leads, only more sorrow.
msg_zh: 去哪一边，都半斤八两吶！

msg: Tis a curse! A curse! The curse of Queen Marika!
msg_zh: 这是诅咒啊──玛莉卡女王的诅咒！

msg: Ah...ahh... Ha...ha...
msg_zh: 噫──嘻嘻嘻！

msg: The Fingers I served once prophesied...
msg_zh: ……指头大人以前说过：

msg: A Tarnished would one day become Elden Lord and restore the Golden Order.
msg_zh: 褪色者终有一天会当上艾尔登之王，修复黄金律法。

msg: Surely you see it, too?
msg_zh: 你也有看见吧？

msg: The gold that enshrouds the heavens. The great tree which begets the pillars of light.
msg_zh: 铺天盖地的黄金──那光柱源头的大树。

msg: O Tarnished, hasten to the foot of the tree.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，朝大树的树脚迈进吧。

msg: And whatever you might face...
msg_zh: 要是你因此，遭遇了什么……

msg: The Fingers will surely guide you...
msg_zh: 指头大人肯定会引导你吶。

msg: Turn back.
msg_zh: ……快折返吶。

msg: Ahead lies the Land of the Giants' Flame.
msg_zh: 往前走就是巨人火焰之地，

msg: And the way forth is forbidden.
msg_zh: 不准继续靠近。

msg: Hear me. The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin.
msg_zh: 燃烧黄金树是初始的重罪啊，你有听懂吗？

msg: Doing so will unbind Destined Death, and slay the world itself.
msg_zh: 那会释放命定之死，最后会毁了世界。

msg: Who would dare put you up to such a task?
msg_zh: 谁准你做这种事的吶！

msg: Most certainly not the Fingers!
msg_zh: 指头大人肯定不会准！

msg: Ohh...
msg_zh: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: Oh, Lord Godwyn...
msg_zh: ……噢，葛德文大人。

msg: Such cruelty, such humiliation...
msg_zh: 这事，多么地不堪啊。

msg: My poor, sweet lordling should have died a true death.
msg_zh: 少爷，您本该丧命的呀。

msg: As the first of the demigods to die.
msg_zh: 您应该是半神中的第一位死者，

msg: As a martyr to Destined Death.
msg_zh: 因为命定之死而殒命。

msg: But why must it yet bring such disgrace?
msg_zh: 那为什么，您会化成这身丑陋的模样？

msg: A scion of the golden bough, sentenced to live in Death...
msg_zh: 黄金之子竟然变成死诞者，

msg: How could such a thing come to be...
msg_zh: 还有什么事，比这更不堪？

msg: <sobbing>
msg_zh: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: Ohh...
msg_zh: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: Oh, Lord Godwyn...
msg_zh: ……噢，葛德文大人。

msg: My poor, sweet lordling should have died a true death.
msg_zh: 少爷本该丧命的呀。

msg: A scion of the golden bough, sentenced to live in Death...
msg_zh: 黄金之子竟然变成死诞者，

msg: How could such a thing come to be...
msg_zh: 还有什么事，比这更不堪？

msg: <sobbing>
msg_zh: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: Ha, ha, ha!
msg_zh: 噫──嘻嘻嘻！

msg: A curse! A curse upon you!
msg_zh: 罪该万死的！你这罪该万死的东西！

msg: Your path leads only to death!
msg_zh: 最后等着你的，只有死亡吶！

msg: You godless brute.
msg_zh: ……不知天高地厚的野人。

msg: You'll soil your hands soon enough.
msg_zh: 要犯下滔天大罪，

msg: With mortal sin!
msg_zh: 也是迟早的事吶！

msg: Are you that new Tarnished?
msg_zh: ……新来的褪色者吶？

msg: You've done well. I am Enia, the Finger Reader.
msg_zh: 一路辛苦了，我是“解指”恩雅。

msg: I interpret the words of the Fingers, envoys to the Greater Will.
msg_zh: 指头大人是无上意志的使者，\n而我是传达大人所言的老太婆。

msg: Look there. The Fingers tremble. To welcome you, shardbearer.
msg_zh: 仔细瞧，指头大人在颤动──\n这代表祂在欢迎你这大卢恩的持有者吶。

msg: Let their wisdom wash over you.
msg_zh: ……来，听好指头大人的话：

msg: \"Great Elden Ring, root of the Golden Order.\"
msg_zh: “伟大的艾尔登法环是黄金律法──”

msg: \"Anchor of all lands, giver of grace, wellspring of all joy.\"
msg_zh: “让世界规律不乱，让生命蒙受福祉与赐福。”

msg: \"Until it was shattered.\"
msg_zh: “然而，艾尔登法环已经破碎。”

msg: \"The tragic corruption of the Order has taken its toll.\"
msg_zh: “破坏律法是滔天大罪，带来的恶果当然无可避免……”

msg: \"Across the realm, life lies in ruin. Fallen to pieces.\"
msg_zh: “如今世界与生命毁坏得无以复加，”

msg: \"Foul curses and misery spread, unabating.\"
msg_zh: “诅咒与不幸蔓延四处。”

msg: \"But the Greater Will has not abandoned the realm, nor the life that inhabits it.\"
msg_zh: “即使如此，无上意志也不会弃世界、生命于不顾，”

msg: \"So it is that the Tarnished are guided by grace. Called to act.\"
msg_zh: “因此你们褪色者才会受到赐福指引，被赋予使命。”

msg: \"Brave Tarnished, your Great Rune is a handsome shard of the Elden Ring.\"
msg_zh: “褪色者啊，你持有的大卢恩是艾尔登法环的大碎片，”

msg: \"Seek another of its kind.\"
msg_zh: “再去取得另一个吧。”

msg: \"To become Elden Lord, and restore the Golden Order.\"
msg_zh: “成为艾尔登之王，修复黄金律法吧。”

msg: Let the words of the Fingers guide you.
msg_zh: ……别忘了指头大人的话。

msg: Ahh, Great Runes are the stuff of demigods;
msg_zh: ……对了，大卢恩都是由半神持有。

msg: the children of the goddess, Queen Marika. She who is vessel of the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 半神是指艾尔登法环的宿主──\n神祇女王玛莉卡，祂的孩子们。

msg: Tainted by the strength of their runes, her children warred, but none could become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 那群孩子都因为大卢恩的力量堕入歧途，彼此争斗……\n但是没有人能当上艾尔登之王。

msg: And so grace was extended, to your kind, the Tarnished.
msg_zh: 所以你们褪色者才会受赐福指引吶。

msg: Listen, the Fingers speak.
msg_zh: ……听吧，指头大人也说了：

msg: \"The Greater Will has long renounced the demigods.\"
msg_zh: “在许久许久以前，无上意志早已舍弃那群半神。”

msg: \"Tarnished, show no mercy. Have their heads. Take all they have left.\"
msg_zh: “褪色者啊，无须踌躇──尽情杀戮、掠夺他们吧。”

msg: \"The Fingers have willed it so.\"
msg_zh: “此为指头的引导。”

msg: ...Indeed. But remember one thing.
msg_zh: ……话虽如此，你也要小心吶。

msg: The demigods are each and all the direct offspring of Queen Marika.
msg_zh: 半神全部都是玛莉卡女王的孩子，

msg: Godrick the Grafted was but a distant relation...
msg_zh: 其中只有“接肢”葛瑞克是后代子孙……

msg: The runt of the litter, his divine blood sorely diluted.
msg_zh: 所以继承到的神祇血统最为稀薄，力量也最为弱小。

msg: Well, well… I see…
msg_zh: ……哦，还有啊……

msg: A remembrance of gold has found its way into your possession.
msg_zh: 你身上好像有黄金追忆吶。

msg: Demigods, and even the greater of the champions,
msg_zh: ……半神还有伟大的诸位英雄，

msg: are hewn by the Erdtree upon their end, into remembrances.
msg_zh: 身形消失之后，会受黄金树雕琢，成为追忆。

msg: They are…valuable indeed.
msg_zh: ……你手上的东西，就是这样来的。

msg: These remembrances yet house the power of their former masters.
msg_zh: 黄金追忆会保存追忆之主的力量，

msg: And should you wish to wield that same power, well…
msg_zh: 如果你希望得到那力量，尽情施展……

msg: I will lend you the strength of the Fingers.
msg_zh: 指头大人能助你一臂之力。

msg: Heh… Do not recoil from my offer.
msg_zh: ……有什么好犹豫的吶？

msg: The Fingers guide us all. And you Tarnished, you are here to take, are you not?
msg_zh: 指头大人都出言引导了──要你们褪色者动手争夺。

msg: Ah. You have returned. What is it?
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊。有什么事吶？

msg: Now, go forth.
msg_zh: ……好啦，快出发吧。

msg: Let the words of the Fingers guide you.
msg_zh: 别忘了指头大人的话。

msg: I had my doubts, but...my, look at you.
msg_zh: ……哦，真不简单……

msg: Only once before have I seen two Great Runes together.
msg_zh: 从以前到现在，这是我第二次同时看到两片大卢恩吶。

msg: Look there. The Fingers shudder with exuberance.
msg_zh: 瞧啊，指头大人也十分激动：

msg: \"Fine work, brave Tarnished. The Greater Will is pleased.\"
msg_zh: “褪色者啊，做得很好。无上意志肯定会欢欣无比。”

msg: \"You have earned the right to become Elden Lord.\"
msg_zh: “如此便证明，你拥有成为艾尔登之王的资质。”

msg: \"Now, seek the Erdtree, and an audience with Queen Marika.\"
msg_zh: “褪色者啊，朝着黄金树前进，觐见玛莉卡女王吧。”

msg: \"To become Elden Lord, and restore the Golden Order.\"
msg_zh: “成为艾尔登之王，修复黄金律法吧。”

msg: The Fingers expect...
msg_zh: ……指头大人很期待你的表现吶。

msg: As much from you as they do young Gideon.
msg_zh: 嗯，大概跟基甸小鬼头不相上下。

msg: Take this. A token of farewell.
msg_zh: 收下吧，这是老太婆的一点心意。

msg: Now, go forth.
msg_zh: ……好啦，快出发吶。

msg: Become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 你要当上艾尔登之王啊。

msg: Queen Marika is the vessel of the Elden Ring, carrier of its vision.
msg_zh: 玛莉卡女王是艾尔登法环的宿主，能见到相关的虚像。

msg: A god, in truth.
msg_zh: 也就是说，祂是神吶。

msg: But after the Elden Ring's shattering, she was imprisoned in the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 然而祂在艾尔登法环破碎之后，被囚禁在黄金树之内──

msg: A grim punishment for shattering the Order, despite her godhood.
msg_zh: 作为神却让律法破碎，那是犯下大错的惩罚。

msg: The Fingers speak...
msg_zh: ……指头大人说了：

msg: \"Marika's trespass demanded a heavy sentence.\"
msg_zh: “玛莉卡犯下的滔天大罪，处以重罚也不为过。”

msg: \"But even in shackles, she remains a god, and the vision's vessel.\"
msg_zh: “但即使祂受到重罚，仍旧是神，也是虚像的容器。”

msg: \"Confer Great Runes to become Elden Lord, and join Queen Marika as her consort.\"
msg_zh: “只要向那容器献上大卢恩，\n你就会成为她的伴侣──成为艾尔登之王。”

msg: \"The Fingers have willed it so.\"
msg_zh: “此为指头的引导。”

msg: Now, you may go.
msg_zh: ……好啦，快出发吧。

msg: Well, you managed to return.
msg_zh: ……你回来啦。
