msg: You know what this means. The Erdtree has spurned you.
msg_zh: 我很清楚吶，黄金树拒绝你了。

msg: The Fingers remain still.
msg_zh: ……指头大人也静止不动了──

msg: Shaken by this turn of events, they are busy consulting the Greater Will.
msg_zh: 发生预料之外的事，感到困惑，正在与无上意志沟通。

msg: When they are finished, the Fingers will again offer their guidance.
msg_zh: 等到沟通结束，指头大人会再出言引导你们。

msg: But thousands, if not tens of thousands, of moons must first pass.
msg_zh: ……只是这可能要等上数千、数万个日子吶。

msg: No matter for me. But you? How will you ever manage the wait...
msg_zh: 我是无妨，但你们等不得吧？

msg: My, oh, my...
msg_zh: ……好啦，会怎样发展……

msg: It may be thousands upon thousands of moons before the fingers again offer their guidance.
msg_zh: ……指头大人再出言引导，\n可能要等上数千、数万个日子吧。

msg: My, oh, my. Whatever will you do…
msg_zh: ……好啦，会怎样发展……

msg: Heavens forbid...
msg_zh: ……你这是……

msg: That is not the domain of mere men.
msg_zh: 那是身为人之子万万不得做出的事。

msg: The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin. And you say you seek the power of the Rune of Death, too?
msg_zh: 烧毁黄金树是最为原始的重罪，\n更别提追求死亡卢恩的力量……

msg: The Rune of Death goes by two names; the other is Destined Death.
msg_zh: 死亡卢恩就是“命定之死”──

msg: The forbidden shadow, plucked from the Golden Order upon its creation…
msg_zh: 是黄金律法诞生之初，首先去除、封印的黑暗影子。

msg: Unleashing the rune now would be unthinkable...
msg_zh: 你却打算释放它……

msg: The Fingers would never permit it. Nor would the Greater Will.
msg_zh: ……这件事指头大人，不，无上意志绝对不会点头。

msg: But here we are...
The Fingers, dormant, severing our link to the Greater Will.
msg_zh: ……现在指头大人静止不动，\n我们也无从感知无上意志。

msg: The realm, and all life, in ruins. Impossible events transpire, beyond the ken of the Fingers.
msg_zh: 世界与生命愈发崩坏，\n甚至发生指头大人也无从预知的事……

msg: Who is to say that the cardinal sin must be cardinal forever?
msg_zh: 又怎能说，重罪如今仍是重罪？

msg: Go on. Finish the job.
msg_zh: ……你放手去做吧。

msg: Take the course you deem most worthy.
msg_zh: 只要你认为自己的做法没错，就去做吧。

msg: You must find kindling.
msg_zh: ……去找火种吧。

msg: Only the smoldering flame in the Great Forge of the Giants, on the highest peak in the Lands Between, can burn the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 在交界地最高的地方，那里有个冒出袅袅轻烟的巨人大锅──\n能烧毁黄金树的火就在锅里。

msg: But special kindling is required to reignite the flame.
msg_zh: 然而想让锅里的火窜起，必须要有特殊的火种。

msg: For the flame to burn the Erdtree, a sacrifice is needed. Of one who envisions the flame.
msg_zh: ……要有能看见火焰虚像的人。\n唯有把那人当祭品，才能用大锅的火烧毁黄金树。

msg: And can lead you to the Rune of Death.
msg_zh: 前往死亡卢恩的路，也会随之明朗。

msg: You've done it, I see.
msg_zh: ……做得还真彻底啊。

msg: What use do you have for me, now?
msg_zh: 现在我们应该没有交集了？

msg: I am a Finger Reader. I will remain here, until their dialogue ends, and the Fingers speak again.
msg_zh: 我是“解指”，正在等待沟通结束，指头大人的发声。

msg: Do as you please. Take whatever course seems most worthy to you.
msg_zh: 去贯彻你认为正确的事吧。

msg: Now, you may go.
msg_zh: ……好啦，快走吧。

msg: Heh, heh, heh.
msg_zh: ……咯咯。

msg: You'd force this tired old crone to work, even now?
msg_zh: 要我老太婆继续替你工作吗？

msg: A harder taskmaster have I never met.
msg_zh: 你还真是不懂得顾忌吶。

msg: Don't worry, my dear.
msg_zh: ……也无妨吶。

msg: I'll see it to the end with you, if it please.
msg_zh: 只要你不嫌弃，\n我老太婆愿意陪你走到最后。

msg: Now, go forth.
msg_zh: ……好啦，快走吧。

msg: Do what you believe is right.
msg_zh: 去做你认为正确的事吧。

msg: Oh, such a fine gift, I will gladly accept.
msg_zh: ……感谢你的好意。

msg: But don't raise your hopes;
msg_zh: 只是你误判了吶，

msg: I have no secrets for you to plunder.
msg_zh: 我老太婆没有什么秘密。

msg: I lost my appetite for them a lifetime ago, or more.
msg_zh: ……那早在很久以前，就忘得一乾二净了。

msg: <sleeping>
A pleasure to meet thee, Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……初次见面啊，褪色者。

msg: I am the witch Renna.
msg_zh: 我是魔女蕾娜。

msg: I'd heard tell of a Tarnished hurtling about atop a spectral steed.
msg_zh: 听说有褪色者骑着灵马，

msg: And upon looking into the matter,
msg_zh: 让我花了点时间去找……

msg: the talk, I surmise, is of thee.
msg_zh: 看来就是你啊。

msg: Thou'rt possessed of the power, no?
msg_zh: 那名为托雷特的灵马──

msg: To call forth the spectral steed named Torrent.
msg_zh: 你能召唤它，没错吧？

msg: Ah. As I had hoped.
msg_zh: ……嗯，答得好。

msg: I was entrusted this, for thee.
msg_zh: 有物品要转交给你。

msg: By Torrent's former master.
msg_zh: 是托雷特的前主人托给我的。

msg: Tis a bell for calling forth spirits.
msg_zh: 那物品叫作召魂铃。

msg: Summon them with it, from ash unreturned to the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 没有回归黄金树的骨灰，能从中召唤出灵魂。

msg: The spirits will obey thine command but briefly, as they recall battles past.
msg_zh: 而那些灵魂会暂时认你为主人，\n重现生前战斗的模样。

msg: Now it is thine. To do with as thou wishest.
msg_zh: ……哎，照你的意思使用吧。

msg: Forgive mine intrusion, Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，打扰你了。

msg: I doubt we shall again meet. But all the same, learn well the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 我想不会再见面了，\n仔细品尝交界地的滋味吧。

msg: How long will it be, I wonder...
msg_zh: ……我很期待啊──

msg: Before the Tarnished tire of obeisance to the Two Fingers?
msg_zh: 你们褪色者会服从双指到什么时候？

msg: This way, Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，来这里吧。

msg: May I have a word?
msg_zh: 能不能过来聊个几句？

msg: Trifle not with me, Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……扯这种无谓的谎。

msg: Or didst thou merely forget?
msg_zh: 你想说自己忘了吗？

msg: The name of the spectral steed thou callest?
msg_zh: 忘了那匹灵马的名字。

msg: I will ask thee again.
msg_zh: ……我再问你一次。

msg: Thou'rt possessed of the power, no?
msg_zh: 那名为托雷特的灵马──

msg: To call forth the spectral steed named Torrent.
msg_zh: 你能召唤它，没错吧？

msg: Quite the stubborn one, aren't we?
msg_zh: ……倒有趣了，想否定到底吗？

msg: Wise, in a way. The Lands Between are home to liars and cheats aplenty.
msg_zh: 哎，这也无妨。\n交界地本来就充斥着谎言。

msg: Perhaps thine ample mistrust will be to thy benefit.
msg_zh: 不信任他人，反而是有益无害啊。

msg: I shall leave this for thee, at the behest of Torrent's former master.
msg_zh: 托雷特的前主人托付的物品，我放在这。

msg: Take it, shouldst thou overcome thy suspicion.
msg_zh: 等你有兴趣了，再捡起来吧。

msg: What hopest thou to profit?
msg_zh: 你这是做什么？

msg: No sense in arguing, I see.
msg_zh: ……不分青红皂白吗？

msg: Thou'rt a wild one, indeed.
msg_zh: 无谓地逞凶斗狠。

msg: Torrent hath quite the ruffian chosen...
msg_zh: 托雷特怎会选了如此匹夫……

msg: Let us speak of the past, a while.
msg_zh: ……稍微聊聊过去的事吧。

msg: I was once an Empyrean.
msg_zh: ……我曾是神人。

msg: Of the demigods, only I, Miquella, and Malenia could claim that title.
msg_zh: 半神之中只有我、米凯拉，还有玛莲妮亚是神人。

msg: Each of us was chosen by our own Two Fingers, as a candidate to succeed Queen Marika, to become the new god of the coming age.
msg_zh: 我们各自被不同的双指找到，成为神祇候选人──\n预定继玛莉卡女王之后，成为下一个时代的神祇。

msg: But I would not acquiesce to the Two Fingers.
msg_zh: ……但是我拒绝了双指。

msg: I stole the Rune of Death, slew mine own Empyrean flesh, casting it away.
msg_zh: 我窃走死亡卢恩，杀害、抛弃自己身为神人的身体，

msg: I would not be controlled by that thing.
msg_zh: 因为我拒绝受那种存在操控。

msg: The Two Fingers and I have been cursing each other ever since...
msg_zh: ……从那之后，我和双指诅咒彼此，

msg: And the Baleful Shadows...are their assassins.
msg_zh: 而灾厄影子就是祂送来的刺客。

msg: Oh, again we cross paths.
msg_zh: ……哦，好久不见了。

msg: I believe I said my name was Renna, when last we met.
msg_zh: 记得当时我自称蕾娜。

msg: It pleaseth me to see Torrent hale and hearty...
msg_zh: 很高兴看到托雷特过得不错。

msg: But Tarnished, what business hast thou here?
msg_zh: 那么，褪色者啊。你是为了什么而来？

msg: I have no memory of inking thee an invitation.
msg_zh: ……我应该没有发邀请函给你。

msg: Mm? a Tarnished, here?
msg_zh: ……哦，是褪色者啊。

msg: Thou must have some business in mind, to come all this way.
msg_zh: 你是为了什么，来到这里？

msg: Though I have no memory of inking thee an invitation.
msg_zh: ……我应该没有发邀请函给你。

msg: I see. Quite the sleuth, aren't we.
msg_zh: ……原来如此，调查得真仔细。

msg: Indeed, I am the witch Ranni.
msg_zh: 没错，我是魔女菈妮。

msg: I stole a fragment of the Rune of Death, and used it to forge the godslaying black knives through fearsome rite.
msg_zh: 曾经窃走部分死亡卢恩，\n再经由仪式，化成弒神用的黑刀──

msg: I did it all.
msg_zh: 我是做过这些事。

msg: But sadly for thee, the cursemark thou seekest is not to be found here.
msg_zh: ……再来，你想找的咒痕，不在这里。

msg: I have slain the body I was born into, and cast it away.
msg_zh: 我杀害、抛弃与生俱来的身体──

msg: And it is upon that flesh the cursemark is carved.
msg_zh: 而咒痕就刻在那身体上。

msg: Hah!
msg_zh: ……哈哈。

msg: And why should I reveal that to thee?
msg_zh: ……为什么非得告诉你？

msg: I performed the act not to bury the past, nor in shame of the deed,
msg_zh: 我不隐瞒过去，不为此感到后悔，

msg: but all the same, thy begging compels me not a jot.
msg_zh: 但也不会有人乞讨就乐于施舍。

msg: The cursemark thou seekest is not here. That is all I will say.
msg_zh: ……你想找的咒痕不在这里，我言尽于此。

msg: Now, begone.
msg_zh: 好了，尽快离开。

msg: The cursemark thou seekest is not here. That is all I will say.
msg_zh: ……你想找的咒痕不在这里，我言尽于此。

msg: Now, begone.
msg_zh: 好了，尽快离开。

msg: Oh, is that so?
Thou wouldst render me aid, is that thy proposal?
msg_zh: 你的意思是，要替我做事？

msg: Affording thyself opportunity to grope about for the cursemark's location, no doubt?
msg_zh: 你认为这么做，就能找到咒痕的所在地？

msg: Very well...
msg_zh: ……也行。

msg: There's nothing wrong with a well-laid scheme.
msg_zh: 我不讨厌心怀鬼胎的人。

msg: What's more, if my past and past wounds beckon to thee,
msg_zh: 况且，如果是以前的作为──\n那伤痕将你带来……

msg: I am curious enough to see what thy destiny portends...
msg_zh: 这命运也颇有意思。

msg: I'll allow it. Enter my service.
msg_zh: 我准许你替我做事。

msg: And good hunting to thee.
msg_zh: 努力寻找咒痕的下落吧。

msg: Hah!
msg_zh: ……哈哈。

msg: No reason in particular, thou claimest?
msg_zh: 没事吗？这样啊。

msg: Intriguing. Then mayhaps fate hath steered thee to this reunion.
msg_zh: 倒有趣了。那我们在此重逢，可说是命运从中牵线。

msg: Intriguing. Then mayhaps fate hath steered thee to this encounter.
msg_zh: 倒有趣了。那我们在此邂逅，可说是命运从中牵线。

msg: Wilt thou enter into my service?
msg_zh: 你要替我做事吗？

msg: I am the witch Ranni. I stole Death long ago, and search now for the dark path.
msg_zh: 我是魔女菈妮。\n过去窃走死亡，如今找寻深入黑暗的路。

msg: That I might one day upend the whole of it, and rid the world of all that came before.
msg_zh: 总有一天，我会背叛一切，也会舍弃一切。

msg: Well? Has that roused thy interest?
msg_zh: ……怎么样？听起来有趣吧？

msg: I see. A choice well made.
msg_zh: ……这样啊，那很好。

msg: Thou'rt a rare sort. Not many would have accepted the offer.
msg_zh: 你真是奇人，那种邀请也肯答应。

msg: But I require as much of those under my command.
msg_zh: 但我的门槛也不过如此。

msg: I anticipate good work from thee.
msg_zh: 期待你往后的表现。

msg: I see. More's the pity.
msg_zh: ……这样啊，真遗憾。

msg: Come to me again, shouldst thou change thy heart.
msg_zh: 等你改变心意了，再回头也不迟。

msg: Surrendering thyself into the service of a doll-witch...
msg_zh: 顺着命运的牵动，替人偶魔女做事──

msg: Is not as frightful as thou fearest...
msg_zh: 可能也是不错的安排啊。

msg: Ah, art thou persuaded to my cause?
msg_zh: 哦？改变心意了？

msg: Then, again I shall ask, wilt thou enter into my service?
msg_zh: 那我再问一次。你要替我做事吗？

msg: Good, then I ask we proceed with haste.
msg_zh: ……那么，立刻有事派给你。

msg: There is, in my service, a half-wolven warrior by the name of Blaidd.
msg_zh: 有一位名叫布莱泽的半狼战士，他也在替我做事。

msg: I would have thee join him in searching for the hidden treasure of Nokron, the Eternal City.
msg_zh: 我要你和他联手，\n找出“永恒之城”诺克隆恩的秘密宝藏。

msg: I have called for Blaidd to greet thee below. Take from him the particulars.
msg_zh: 我已经召来布莱泽，他人在楼下。\n详情去问他吧。

msg: Ah, and there wilt thou find Iji, my war counselor, and Seluvis, preceptor in the sorcerous arts, also.
msg_zh: 对，还有，军师伊吉、魔法教授赛尔维斯应该也在。

msg: Heed not their peculiarities; feel secure in gaining from them what advantage thou canst.
msg_zh: 他们颇为特立独行，有必要时善加利用吧。

msg: I am sure the others will be doing just the same.
msg_zh: ……各取所需，他们肯定也不会客气。

msg: Speak with the three who await thee below.
msg_zh: ……去和楼下的那三个人聊几句吧。

msg: Thou needst not indulge them unduly, but they too wish to appraise thy worth.
msg_zh: 不要求你融入，但你免不了受他们打量。

msg: It hath been a passing long time since a newcomer entered my service, after all.
msg_zh: ……毕竟很久没有新人加入了。

msg: Good, then I ask we proceed with haste.
msg_zh: ……那么，立刻有事派给你。

msg: Art thou aware of the star that struck Limgrave?
msg_zh: 宁姆格福地区有星星坠落，这事你知道了吧？

msg: It left a vast crater, and through it lieth the Eternal City of Nokron.
msg_zh: 星星打穿地面，形成大洞──\n“永恒之城”诺克隆恩就在大洞的前头。

msg: Go there to find the city's hidden treasure.
msg_zh: 我要你从大洞下去，找出诺克隆恩的秘密宝藏。

msg: Ah, yes. Iji, my war counselor, and Seluvis, preceptor in the sorcerous arts, can be found below.
msg_zh: 对，还有，军师伊吉、魔法教授赛尔维斯\n应该都在楼下。

msg: Like thee, they are in my service.
msg_zh: 那两位也在替我做事。

msg: Heed not their peculiarities; feel secure in gaining from them what advantage thou canst.
msg_zh: 他们颇为特立独行，有必要时善加利用吧。

msg: I am sure the others will be doing just the same.
msg_zh: ……各取所需，他们肯定也不会客气。

msg: Speak with the three who await thee below.
msg_zh: ……去和楼下的那三个人聊几句吧。

msg: Thou needst not indulge them unduly, but they too wish to appraise thy worth.
msg_zh: 不要求你融入，但你免不了受他们打量。

msg: It hath been a passing long time since a newcomer entered my service, after all.
msg_zh: ……毕竟很久没有新人加入了。

msg: Ah, allow me to forewarn thee.
msg_zh: ……啊，还有一件事。

msg: I shall soon enter my slumber.
msg_zh: 我就要进入深眠，

msg: And it will be some time before I wake.
msg_zh: 短时间内不会醒来。

msg: This doll's body is not without its hindrances...
msg_zh: 人偶的身体也不如想象中地自由。

msg: Still, I have high hopes for thee.
msg_zh: ……我会期待──

msg: I look forward to the good news when I arise.
msg_zh: 下一次睁眼的时候，能听见好消息。

msg: I shall soon enter my slumber.
msg_zh: 我就要进入深眠，

msg: And it will be some time before I wake.
msg_zh: 短时间内不会醒来。

msg: I have high hopes for thee.
msg_zh: ……我会期待──

msg: I look forward to the good news when I arise.
msg_zh: 下一次睁眼的时候，能听见好消息。

msg: Ahh...It was thee.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Not Blaidd, it seemeth.
msg_zh: 结果不是布莱泽。

msg: Even in my slumber, I sensed it.
msg_zh: 我知道。即使在深眠之中，我还是感觉得到。

msg: It is in thy possession, is it not? The hidden treasure of Nokron?
msg_zh: 你拿到诺克隆恩的秘密宝藏了，对吧？

msg: My thanks. Finally, all the pieces are in place.
msg_zh: 谢谢。这么一来，所有条件都凑齐了。

msg: Soon must I begin my journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
msg_zh: 接着只需要我动身──\n踏上只有我能走的，深入黑暗的路。

msg: Ah, but before I leave, I must entrust thee with this.
msg_zh: ……在踏上旅途以前，有样物品必须交给你。

msg: Take it.
msg_zh: 拿去吧。

msg: My discarded flesh lieth beyond the seal unlocked by it.
msg_zh: 用那物品解除封印之后，我抛弃的身体就在前头。

msg: Upon which is carved the cursemark of thy desire.
msg_zh: 你想找的咒痕，刻在那身体上。

msg: I can fathom what thy purpose might be.
msg_zh: ……至于你想做什么，我大致料想得到。

msg: Neither of us is welcomed by the brighter path, I see.
msg_zh: 看来我们都无缘走在光明道路上。

msg: You may leave now.
msg_zh: ……你可以离开了。

msg: It was but brief, but thou gavest me fine service.
msg_zh: 时间不长，但你表现得很好。

msg: What is it?
msg_zh: ……怎么了？

msg: Thy purpose in approaching me was to obtain the cursemark, was it not?
msg_zh: 你是因为咒痕才接近我，对吧？

msg: You may leave now.
msg_zh: 那你可以离开了。

msg: I, too, am to depart on a journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
msg_zh: 我也要踏上旅途了──\n走上属于我的，深入黑暗的路。

msg: Ah, but before I leave, I shall entrust thee with this.
msg_zh: ……在踏上旅途以前，这物品先交给你。

msg: My thanks, for thy sterling efforts.
msg_zh: 你带来了丰硕成果，这是谢礼。

msg: A strange gift, perhaps, but a rare sort such as thee would welcome it, I am sure.
msg_zh: ……那物品颇为奇特，\n但送给你这奇人，肯定会爱不释手。

msg: I am certain now, fate steered us to our reunion.
msg_zh: 话说回来，这次重逢真的是命运牵线。

msg: I am certain now, fate steered us to our first encounter.
msg_zh: 话说回来，这次邂逅真的是命运牵线。

msg: I must thank Torrent too, for his part.
msg_zh: 我也该谢谢托雷特。

msg: You may leave now.
msg_zh: ……你可以离开了。

msg: It was but brief, but thou gavest me fine service.
msg_zh: 时间不长，但你表现得很好。

msg: What is it? You may go.
msg_zh: ……怎么了？你可以离开了。

msg: I, too, am to depart on a journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
msg_zh: 我也要踏上旅途了──\n走上属于我的，深入黑暗的路。

msg: Oh? A dogged fellow, aren't we?
msg_zh: ……唉，没想到你这么缠人。

msg: Or is it merely thy habit, to talk to dolls?
msg_zh: 还是说，你有和人偶说话的习惯？

msg: Fine...fine.
msg_zh: ……唉，算了。

msg: I hadn't expected any soul to recognise me in this guise.
msg_zh: 原本不打算让这模样公诸于世……

msg: But now the cat is out the bag, I cannot allow thee thy freedoms.
msg_zh: 既然被发现了，你也别想全身而退。

msg: Perform for me a service, as recompense.
msg_zh: 我要你助我一臂之力──

msg: Eliminate the Baleful Shadows which prowl these lands.
msg_zh: 去寻找、消灭这块土地上的灾厄影子。

msg: The name of Ranni the Witch is already sullied by thee.
msg_zh: ……你让魔女菈妮蒙羞，

msg: I will not brook disobedience in this matter.
msg_zh: 我不允许你回绝。

msg: Perform for me a service, as recompense.
msg_zh: ……我要你助我一臂之力，

msg: Eliminate the Baleful Shadows which prowl these lands.
msg_zh: 去寻找、消灭这块土地上的灾厄影子。

msg: The name of Ranni the Witch is already sullied by thee.
msg_zh: ……你让魔女菈妮蒙羞，

msg: I will not brook disobedience in this matter.
msg_zh: 我不允许你回绝。

msg: Let us speak of the past, a while.
msg_zh: ……稍微聊聊过去的事吧。

msg: I was once an Empyrean.
msg_zh: ……我曾是神人。

msg: Of the demigods, only I, Miquella, and Malenia could claim that title.
msg_zh: 半神之中只有我、米凯拉，还有玛莲妮亚是神人。

msg: Each of us was chosen by our own Two Fingers, as a candidate to succeed Queen Marika,to become the new god of the coming age.
msg_zh: 我们各自被不同的双指找到，成为神祇候选人──\n预定继玛莉卡女王之后，成为下一个时代的神祇。

msg: Which is when I received Blaidd. In the form of a vassal tailored for an Empyrean.
msg_zh: 我因此得到了布莱泽，他是神人的特殊随从。

msg: But I would not acquiesce to the Two Fingers.
msg_zh: ……但是我拒绝了双指。

msg: I stole the Rune of Death, slew mine own Empyrean flesh, casting it away.
msg_zh: 我窃走死亡卢恩，杀害、抛弃自己身为神人的身体，

msg: I would not be controlled by that thing.
msg_zh: 因为我拒绝受那种存在操控。

msg: The Two Fingers and I have been cursing each other ever since...
msg_zh: ……从那之后，我和双指诅咒彼此，

msg: And the Baleful Shadows...are their assassins.
msg_zh: 而灾厄影子就是祂送来的刺客。

msg: I turned my back on the Two Fingers and we have each been cursing the other since.
msg_zh: ……我拒绝了双指。\n从那之后，我和双指诅咒彼此。

msg: The Baleful Shadows...are their assassins.
msg_zh: 灾厄影子就是祂送来的刺客。

msg: Even when I turned my back upon the Two Fingers.
msg_zh: ……当我拒绝双指的那个时候，

msg: Blaidd remained my loyal ally.
msg_zh: 布莱泽还是站在我这边。

msg: Heh.
msg_zh: 呵呵。

msg: Though he was created a vassal for an Empyrean,
msg_zh: 他明明是神人的特殊随从。

msg: He was a colossal failure, on the part of the Two Fingers.
msg_zh: 以双指的角度来看，这想必是非常严重的瑕疵。

msg: Blaidd, and Iji both... Art willing to give too much to me.
msg_zh: ……对布莱泽、伊吉，我真的无以回报。

msg: Yet they both understand. What lieth beyond the dark path...
msg_zh: 他们明明知道，\n我要走上的黑暗道路，终点会有什么。

msg: That I must betray everything, and rid the world of what came before.
msg_zh: 也知道我总有一天会背叛一切、舍弃一切。

msg: Ah, should I add thee to the list?
msg_zh: ……啊，也许我该把你算进去？

msg: Another one, kind of heart. As kind of heart as they.
msg_zh: 在滥好人这一点上，你们可说是不分轩轾。

msg: Ach, this form hath loosened my tongue.
msg_zh: ……用这模样，心情就是会比较放松。

msg: I've let slip too much.
msg_zh: 不自觉说得太多了……

msg: Forget what thou'st heard. Forget.
msg_zh: 忘掉我说的话，听到没有？

msg: O Shadow, thou'rt the last.
msg_zh: ……影子啊，你是最后一个了。

msg: Tell the Two Fingers,
msg_zh: 告诉双指吧：

msg: That Ranni the Witch cometh, to rend thy flesh.
msg_zh: 魔女菈妮就要替你刻下伤痕──

msg: With a fateful wound, ne'er to heal.
msg_zh: 那永不愈合的命定伤痕。

msg: Beautifully fought.
msg_zh: ……战斗得很精采。

msg: My thanks. 'Twas more of a challenge than I envisioned.
msg_zh: 劳烦你了，谢谢。

msg: Now I can finally stand before them.
msg_zh: 如此一来，我总算能见到祂。

msg: This is farewell, my dear.
msg_zh: ……该道别了。

msg: Tell Blaidd, and Iji...
msg_zh: 帮我转达给布莱泽和伊吉……

msg: I love them.
msg_zh: 我爱他们。

msg: So, it was thee, who would become my Lord.
msg_zh: ……你是我的王吗？

msg: Perhaps I needn't have warned thee.
msg_zh: 我送出警告，看来是徒劳。

msg: I am pleased, however. Thou'rt a fitting choice.
msg_zh: ……其实，我很高兴。\n我很庆幸自己的王是你。

msg: I go now, to the night sky. It is there I shall find mine order.
msg_zh: 我要前往夜空──我的律法所在。

msg: I bid thee travel the path of the Lord.
msg_zh: 你就继续走在王的道路上吧。

msg: And once all is done, we shall see each other, once more.
msg_zh: 等到彼此的事情都完成了，再见面吧。

msg: I take it thou'st noticed? I shouldn't be surprised.
msg_zh: ……还是被发现了？你真厉害。

msg: I thought I might expound a little further...
msg_zh: 我想再多聊一下，

msg: Upon the order I envision.
msg_zh: 关于我的律法。

msg: Mine will be an order not of gold, but the stars and moon of the chill night.
msg_zh: 我的律法不是黄金──\n而是星星与月亮，冰冷黑夜的律法。

msg: I would keep them far from the earth beneath our feet.
msg_zh: ……我想让它远离这块土地。

msg: As it is now, life, and souls, and order are bound tightly together, but I would have them at a great remove.
msg_zh: 现下的生命、灵魂都与律法同在，\n我希望律法能远离，远在他方。

msg: And have the certainties of sight, emotion, faith, and touch...
msg_zh: 那些能明确看见的、感觉的、相信的、触碰的……

msg: All become impossibilities.
msg_zh: 我希望由可能，化为不可能。

msg: Which is why I would abandon this soil, with mine order.
msg_zh: 所以我要和律法一起抛弃这块土地。

msg: Wouldst thou come to me, even now, my one and only Lord?
msg_zh: 即使如此，你也会跟来，对吧？\n我唯一的王啊。

msg: Mine will be an order not of gold, but the stars and moon of the chill night.
msg_zh: 我的律法不是黄金──\n而是星星与月亮，冰冷黑夜的律法。

msg: And I would abandon this soil, with mine Order.
msg_zh: ……而且，我要和律法一起抛弃这块土地。

msg: Wouldst thou come to me, even now, my one and only Lord?
msg_zh: 即使如此，你也会跟来，对吧？\n我唯一的王啊。

msg: Well, this is a most unpleasant awakening.
msg_zh: ……这次睁开眼，真令人不悦。

msg: The depths of wickedness never fail to surprise me.
msg_zh: 得寸进尺的鼠辈。\n遇见几次，心烦几次。

msg: I am saddened. That thou wouldst succumb to such depravity.
msg_zh: ……很遗憾。我竟然会因为你，感受到这些情绪。

msg: Led astray by Seluvis, with devious tonic in hand,
msg_zh: 上了赛尔维斯的贼船，\n厚颜无耻地带来下流的药物。

msg: Didst thou think to have thy way with me?
msg_zh: 你真以为能得逞？

msg: Be gone. Hapless scum.
msg_zh: ……消失吧，下贱之辈。

msg: I won't have another whiff of thy rotten breath.
msg_zh: 别再让我感受到你骯脏的气息。

msg: I have spoken. Away from my sight.
msg_zh: ……我说了，要你消失。

msg: This is the third time, fiend.
msg_zh: ……这是第三次了，下贱之辈。

msg: Enough of thy unbearable breath.
msg_zh: 你的气息太过骯脏，烦人。

msg: What hopest thou to profit?
msg_zh: 你这是做什么？

msg: To think such was thy plot.
msg_zh: ……原来如此，这才是你的目的？

msg: Well, I refuse to indulge thy fantasies.
msg_zh: 很遗憾，我无法满足你的期望。

msg: I relinquished a natural death long, long ago.
msg_zh: 早在很久以前，我就抛弃了正常死去的机会。

msg: What hopest thou to profit?
msg_zh: 你这是做什么？

msg: Hmph.
msg_zh: ……哈哈。

msg: So, this is the measure of my Lord?
msg_zh: 原来如此，我的王显露本性了？

msg: Perhaps it is precisely what I deserve.
msg_zh: 倒也是，这才是常理。

msg: …For surrendering myself to delusion.
msg_zh: ……我到底在期待什么……

msg: Come, sweetings, become what ye desire.
msg_zh: 来，乖孩子，变成你们希望的样子吧……

msg: Come, sweetings, time to be born, anew.
msg_zh: 来，乖孩子，是时候再一次诞生了唷……

msg: Be not afeard, little culver.
msg_zh: 来，不用怕喔……

msg: Hush, little culver.
msg_zh: 哎呀……不用担心……

msg: Hush, fair maid.
msg_zh: 哎呀……不用担心……

msg: I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pure...
msg_zh: 我一定会让你诞生成乖孩子……

msg: Come, Oath-sworn giant!
msg_zh: 我的盟友，巨人啊！

msg: Come, Oath-sworn dragon!
msg_zh: 我的盟友，龙啊！

msg: Come, Oath-sworn beasts!
msg_zh: 我的盟友，野兽啊！

msg: Come, Blaidd, my child!
msg_zh: 我的子民，布莱泽啊！

msg: Fair child, Hermes!
msg_zh: 我的子民，赫密斯啊！

msg: Thy fate lieth under my moon.
msg_zh: ……命运与我等之月同在。

msg: Guide thy moon as thou wishest.
msg_zh: ……你的月，会是由你的意志而成。

msg: Ranni, my little baby...
msg_zh: 菈妮，我可爱的女儿啊。

msg: I thank thee...
msg_zh: 谢谢你……

msg: Oh little Ranni, my dear daughter.
msg_zh: ……啊，菈妮，我可爱的女儿啊。

msg: Weave thy night into being...
msg_zh: 迈向属于你的黑夜吧……

msg: Where did ye flee, my sweetings?
msg_zh: ……我的乖孩子，你们去哪里了呢？

msg: Come out, from whence ye hide. There are books and light aplenty.
msg_zh: 不要玩捉迷藏了，快点出来吧。\n我准备了好多书和灯火唷。

msg: Dither not; come out say I!
msg_zh: 快点出来吧。

msg: Or will ye be gravestones? To be better born anew?
msg_zh: 还是说你们又变成墓碑了呢？是不是才要诞生呢？

msg: Ah...thou...
Is it thy wish to be born anew?
msg_zh: 你也想要再一次诞生，所以过来了吗？

msg: To become a sweeting, reborn of my beloved egg?
msg_zh: 你也想从我可爱的孩子──\n从卵里再一次诞生吗？

msg: Ah...thou...
Is it thy wish to yet again be born anew?
msg_zh: 又想要再一次诞生吗？

msg: Now, bear this sweeting into life anew.
msg_zh: 来，诞生成乖孩子吧……

msg: Be not alarmed, nor afeard.
msg_zh: 不用害怕唷，

msg: I would birth thee as a sweeting, fair and fine.
msg_zh: 我一定会让你诞生成乖孩子……

msg: Ah...thou...
Art thou now assured of thy want, to be born anew?
msg_zh: 你还是想再一次诞生吗？

msg: Ah, it seemeth thou'rt a sweeting rather fair.
msg_zh: ……哎呀，你有一点乖孩子的样子了，

msg: And if thou wert born anew once more, thou wouldst be fairer still.
msg_zh: 再多诞生几次，一定会变成更乖的孩子。

msg: Ye will be countless born, forever.
msg_zh: 你们会一直、一直诞生唷……

msg: Ah, thou'rt now a sweeting full fine and fair.
msg_zh: ……你变成了很乖、很乖的孩子。

msg: My thanks. For being born of my beloved egg, time and time again.
msg_zh: 谢谢你从我可爱的孩子，\n从卵里一直、一直诞生出来。

msg: Oh...my thanks to thee.
msg_zh: ……哎呀，谢谢你……

msg: <sleeping>
Where did ye flee, my sweetings?
msg_zh: ……我的乖孩子，你们去哪里了呢？

msg: Come out, from whence ye hide. Of the dark, be not afeard.
msg_zh: 不要玩捉迷藏了，快点出来吧。不用怕黑唷。

msg: My beloved egg is with us. Come out, I prithee.
msg_zh: 我可爱的孩子、卵在这里唷。\n所以不用怕，快点出来吧。

msg: <giggling>
Who's that? Who could it be?
msg_zh: 那是谁？会是谁？

msg: A new child, Mother's newborn.
msg_zh: 是妈妈的孩子，会变成妈妈的孩子。

msg: A new friend. A new playmate for us.
msg_zh: 所以我们是朋友。对，是朋友。

msg: Just watch, he'll be born again.
msg_zh: 又快要诞生了耶。

msg: Just watch, she'll be born again.
msg_zh: 又快要诞生了耶。

msg: Then Mother will hold him tight.
msg_zh: 那一定会抱抱喔。

msg: Then Mother will hold her tight.
msg_zh: 那一定会抱抱喔。

msg: He'll be so warm, warm and cosy.
msg_zh: 对啊、对啊，热呼呼、软绵绵的。

msg: She'll be so warm, warm and cosy.
msg_zh: 对啊、对啊，热呼呼、软绵绵的。

msg: That'd be nice, so very nice.
msg_zh: 好好喔。好羡慕。好羡慕喔。

msg: If we're turned to stone, will we be born again?
msg_zh: 如果变成墓碑的话，还会再被生下来吗？

msg: Will Mother hold us again?
msg_zh: 妈妈还会再抱抱吗？

msg: Will we? Will she?
msg_zh: 会再抱抱吗？

msg: <giggling>
<giggling>
That hurts. Please, stop that.
msg_zh: 好痛、好痛喔。真的好过分喔。

msg: Did he just die? And him, too?
msg_zh: 那边的还有这边的小孩，都死翘翘了耶。

msg: Is he not a friend? I can't tell…
msg_zh: 朋友会这样吗？是不是弄错了？

msg: Is she not a friend? I can't tell…
msg_zh: 朋友会这样吗？是不是弄错了？

msg: Maybe he's something else?
msg_zh: 是不是我们弄错了？

msg: Maybe she's something else?
msg_zh: 是不是我们弄错了？

msg: Can we still be friends, if we try?
msg_zh: 那再加油一点，变成朋友吧。

msg: Yes, we can be friends, I'm sure.
msg_zh: 对啊、对啊。嗯，对啊。

msg: He'll understand, if we just explain.
msg_zh: 只要说清楚，他一定就会明白的。

msg: She'll understand, if we just explain.
msg_zh: 只要说清楚，她一定就会明白的。

msg: <giggling>
<giggling>
Catch!
There!
Off you go!
Squish him!
Squish her!
Smoosh him!
Smoosh her!
Sleep tight, bound tight
msg_zh: 依偎吧、安睡吧，

msg: by Mother's amber.
msg_zh: 蜷曲母亲的琥珀里；

msg: Sleep tight, find life,
msg_zh: 安睡吧、诞生吧，

msg: in Mother's umbra.
msg_zh: 降生母亲的黑夜里。

msg: I smell it... Death...
msg_zh: 闻到了……是死亡……

msg: Feed it me...
msg_zh: 让我吞下。

msg: Tarnished...bring more...Death...
msg_zh: 褪色者……献上更多死亡吧……

msg: I shall grant thee... eye...and claw.
msg_zh: 我愿授予眼与爪，

msg: Feed me...more.
msg_zh: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

msg: More... I am not...sated.
msg_zh: 不够……饿了……

msg: Feed me more...Death.
msg_zh: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

msg: My thanks...Tarnished...
msg_zh: 感谢你……褪色者……

msg: Death... My sin... Should not be touched...by the hand of man...
msg_zh: 人不该接触死亡……这是我的罪孽……

msg: I shall grant thee...my claws...
msg_zh: 我愿授予爪，

msg: Feed me...more.
msg_zh: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

msg: I shall grant thee... eye...and claw.
msg_zh: 我愿授予眼与爪，

msg: Feed me...more.
msg_zh: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

msg: More... I am not...sated.
msg_zh: 不够……饿了……

msg: Feed me more...Death.
msg_zh: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

msg: I shall grant thee...my claws...
msg_zh: 我愿授予爪，

msg: Feed me...more.
msg_zh: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

msg: <chewing>
It is... It is all...consumed.
msg_zh: 全部……吞下了……

msg: Still, I am not sated... Not nearly sated...
msg_zh: 但还是饿……非常地饿……

msg: Rrarrgh!
Marika... Is this...what it is...to sin?
msg_zh: 玛莉卡啊！这就是罪孽吗？

msg: Will things...never be the same...again?
msg_zh: 无法回到当初了吗？

msg: Tarnished...my thanks...for thy long...labour.
msg_zh: ……褪色者，感谢你长久以来的帮助。

msg: But I have done...all I can...in this land...
msg_zh: 能在这片土地做的事情，都完成了。

msg: Henceforth, mine appetite shall be my sole companion.
msg_zh: 我要与这份饥渴长存──

msg: Farewell.
msg_zh: 永别了。

msg: <plaintive howl>
Tarnished...my thanks...for thy long...labour.
msg_zh: ……褪色者，感谢你长久以来的帮助。

msg: But I have done...all I can...in this land...
msg_zh: 能在这片土地做的事情，都完成了。

msg: Henceforth, mine appetite shall be my sole companion.
msg_zh: 我要与这份饥渴长存──

msg: Farewell.
msg_zh: 永别了。

msg: <plaintive howl>
<pained howl>
O Marika...
msg_zh: ……玛莉卡啊，

msg: What...happened?
msg_zh: 发生什么事了？

msg: Was I...myself the fool?
msg_zh: 是因为我太愚笨？

msg: Or was I tricked...by thee?
msg_zh: 还是……你欺瞒了我？

msg: O Marika...
msg_zh: ……玛莉卡啊，

msg: Why wouldst thou...relinquish...
msg_zh: 为何动手击碎？

msg: Why...
msg_zh: 为何……

msg: Strange... There's something else...
msg_zh: ……奇了，有其他东西……

msg: But the Death...yet quenches...
msg_zh: 有死亡……这样就够了……

msg: Bring more...
msg_zh: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

msg: <pained howl>
<growl>
Put it away.
msg_zh: ……放过我吧。

msg: I won't forget...again...
msg_zh: 我不会再次遗忘──

msg: mine appetite... My sin...
msg_zh: 自身的饥渴、自身的罪孽……

msg: So please...enough...
msg_zh: 放过我吧……

msg: <growl>
<chewing>
I won't forget...again...
msg_zh: ……我不会再次遗忘──

msg: mine appetite... My sin...
msg_zh: 自身的饥渴、自身的罪孽……

msg: I must have more... I must consume more...
msg_zh: ……吞下更多、吞下更多……

msg: Thou, who approacheth Destined Death.
msg_zh: 渴望接近命定之死的人啊，

msg: I will not have it stolen from me again.
msg_zh: 我不会让它失窃第二次。

msg: Tarnished. Why wouldst thou...
msg_zh: 褪色者……没想到是你……

msg: Why...
msg_zh: 为何如此……？

msg: Tis no matter. I hereby vow,
msg_zh: ……不会再发生第二次，

msg: that Destined Death shall not be stolen again.
msg_zh: 我不会让命定之死再次失窃。

msg: I shall not part with it again.
msg_zh: 我不会让它失窃第二次……

msg: Stay away from Destined Death.
msg_zh: 不准靠近命定之死……

msg: Cower. Before Maliketh, the Black Blade.
msg_zh: 对“黑剑”玛利喀斯心存畏惧吧……

msg: Cower. Before Maliketh, Marika's Black Blade.
msg_zh: 畏惧“玛莉卡的黑剑”玛利喀斯吧……

msg: Witless Tarnished... Why covet Destined Death?
msg_zh: 褪色者……\n你一心抢夺命定之死──

msg: To kill what?
msg_zh: 是为了杀害何物？

msg: To destroy what?
msg_zh: 是为了破坏何物？

msg: Forgive me, Marika...
msg_zh: 玛莉卡，抱歉……

msg: The Golden Order...cannot be restored.
msg_zh: 黄金律法……难以复原……

msg: I must consume more...
msg_zh: 要吞下更多……

msg: Marika...why...
msg_zh: ……玛莉卡啊，为何……？

msg: wouldst thou...gull me?
msg_zh: 你欺瞒了我……？

msg: Why...shatter...
msg_zh: 为何动手击碎……？

msg: I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella.
msg_zh: 充分感受到了吗？\n何谓“米凯拉的锋刃”玛莲妮亚。

msg: Let your flesh be consumed.
msg_zh: 用你的身体牢牢记住吧……

msg: By the scarlet rot.
msg_zh: 猩红腐败的滋味。

msg: Is this...my first...defeat?
msg_zh: ……这就是战败吗？

msg: Bravely fought, sir.
msg_zh: 打得漂亮……

msg: Bravely fought, my lady.
msg_zh: 打得漂亮……

msg: But remember...
msg_zh: 但别忘了……

msg: One day, the scarlet bloom will flower again...
msg_zh: 终有一天，猩红花朵会再次怒放……

msg: Your strength, extraordinary...
msg_zh: 那股力量……

msg: The mark...of a true Lord...
msg_zh: 是为王的器量啊……

msg: O, dear Miquella...
msg_zh: 啊，哥哥……

msg: O, dearest Miquella, my brother...
msg_zh: 啊，哥哥、哥哥……

msg: I'm sorry. I finally met my match...
msg_zh: 对不起，玛莲妮亚输了……

msg: Well, thou art of passing skill.
msg_zh: ……哦，不容小觑啊……

msg: Warrior blood must truly run in thy veins, Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者不愧是战士的后代。

msg: As I thought, thou'rt of passing valour...
msg_zh: ……哦，不容小觑啊。

msg: but the dark of night is yet to lift.
msg_zh: 然而潜伏暗处的黑，不会轻易消散。

msg: The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter.
msg_zh: “恶兆”绝不会放过你……

msg: Foul Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，

msg: Put these foolish ambitions to rest.
msg_zh: 遗忘那愚昧的野心吧。

msg: The Erdtree is firmly rooted, always.
msg_zh: 黄金树是坚不可摧……

msg: I'll remember thee, Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……我记住你了，褪色者啊。

msg: The flame of ambition leadeth thee astray.
msg_zh: 受野心之火摆弄之人啊。

msg: Come, hands of the Fell Omen. Snuff out this wretch's flame.
msg_zh: “恶兆妖鬼”绝对会捏熄你的火焰……

msg: I see thee, little Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，找到你了。

msg: Smould'ring with that wretched flame of ambition.
msg_zh: 受野心之火摆弄之人啊。

msg: Tremble now, with fear.
msg_zh: 尽管害怕吧──

msg: For the hands of the Fell Omen will soon be upon thee.
msg_zh: “恶兆”就快笼罩你的全身……

msg: To put out thy little flame.
msg_zh: 想必捏熄你的火焰，也是迟早的事……

msg: Hrghraah!
The thrones...stained by my curse...
msg_zh: ……竟敢以诅咒玷污王座……

msg: Such shame I cannot bear.
msg_zh: ……奇耻大辱……

msg: Thy part in this shall not be forgiven.
msg_zh: ……我绝对饶不了你……

msg: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
msg_zh: ……在你那愚昧的墓志铭上，

msg: Felled by King Morgott! Last of all kings.
msg_zh: 刻上我“末代之王”蒙葛特之名。

msg: May the curse seep to thy very soul.
msg_zh: ……蒙受诅咒而死吧，

msg: An apt reward for thy brash ambition.
msg_zh: 这倒适合任由野心摆弄的蠢人……

msg: Tarnished, thou art mistaken.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，你实在愚昧至极……

msg: The Erdtree welcometh no man.
msg_zh: ……黄金树绝不敞开……

msg: No one will be Elden Lord again.
msg_zh: ……没有人能当得上艾尔登之王……

msg: Not even I.
msg_zh: ……我也不例外……

msg: Well, thou art of passing skill.
msg_zh: ……哦，不容小觑啊。

msg: Warrior blood must truly run in thy veins, Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者不愧是战士的后代。

msg: Foul Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，

msg: Put these foolish ambitions to rest.
msg_zh: 遗忘那愚昧的野心吧。

msg: The Erdtree is firmly rooted, always.
msg_zh: 黄金树是坚不可摧……

msg: I shall remember thee, Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……我记住你了，褪色者啊。

msg: Smould'ring with thy meagre flame.
msg_zh: 受野心之火摆弄之人啊。

msg: Cower in fear. Of the night.
msg_zh: 尽管害怕那潜伏暗处的黑吧──

msg: The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter.
msg_zh: “恶兆”绝不会放过你……

msg: Hrghraah!
The thrones...stained by my curse...
msg_zh: ……竟敢以诅咒玷污王座……

msg: Such shame I cannot bear.
msg_zh: ……奇耻大辱……

msg: Thy part in this shall not be forgiven.
msg_zh: ……我绝对饶不了你……

msg: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
msg_zh: ……在你那愚昧的墓志铭上，

msg: Felled by King Morgott! Elden Lord!
msg_zh: 刻上我“末代之王”蒙葛特之名！

msg: May the curse seep to thy very soul.
msg_zh: ……蒙受诅咒而死吧。

msg: Tarnished, thou'rt but a fool.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，你实在愚昧至极……

msg: The Erdtree wards off all who deign approach.
msg_zh: ……黄金树拒绝着一切，

msg: We are...we are all forsaken.
msg_zh: 我们早已被舍弃。

msg: None may claim the title of Elden Lord.
msg_zh: ……没有人能当得上艾尔登之王……

msg: Thy deeds shall be met with failure, just as I.
msg_zh: ……我也不例外……

msg: Tarnished Warrior. 'Twas nobly fought.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，打得很出色。

msg: Dearest Marika...
msg_zh: ……玛莉卡啊，

msg: I am returned.
msg_zh: 我回来了。

msg: A crown is warranted with strength!
msg_zh: 力量正是为王的理由！

msg: O Marika!
msg_zh: 玛莉卡啊！

msg: I will take thee in mine arms once more!
msg_zh: 我要再一次拥你入怀！

msg: Brave Tarnished...
msg_zh: 褪色者啊……

msg: Thy strength befits a crown.
msg_zh: 你拥有的力量，正是为王的理由。

msg: One day, we'll return together.
msg_zh: 终有一天，我等将返家。

msg: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
msg_zh: 一同返回黄金树脚的故乡。

msg: There is only one tree, and only its branches.
msg_zh: 人言正统为主枝，主枝其下为旁枝，

msg: That bathe in true rays of gold.
msg_zh: 主枝之于黄金树脚，名正言顺──

msg: Not the fool Omen King.
msg_zh: 弃子的恶兆之王，不可企及；

msg: Nor the rank malformed twins.
msg_zh: 不成熟的畸形兄妹，望洋兴叹。

msg: O, we are the Golden Ones. The true and rightful heirs.
msg_zh: 噢，我等为黄金之民、正统之民。

msg: Our land's grown old, now ashen, and cold.
msg_zh: 纵然大地贫瘠、乌云满布，

msg: But look up, the Erdtree glows!
msg_zh: 抬头一望，大树蓊郁如常。

msg: One day, we'll return together.
msg_zh: 终有一天，我等将返家。

msg: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
msg_zh: 一同返回黄金树脚的故乡。

msg: And grace will surely guide us safe.
msg_zh: 赐福将会挺身引导，

msg: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
msg_zh: 带领我等返回黄金树脚的故乡。

msg: Hear me, my knights! Proud warriors and true.
msg_zh: 葛瑞克麾下的高贵骑士啊──

msg: Let the hunt begin! Fetch me a mighty branch to make mine own!
msg_zh: 狩猎肢干吧！猎取强壮的手臂！

msg: A fresh offering to graft!
msg_zh: 贡上猎物，成就“接肢”吧！

msg: Raaargh!
Graaargh!
Hunt me down a new branch! Bring me a tarnished!
msg_zh: 狩猎肢干吧！猎取褪色者！

msg: Lowly Tarnished...
msg_zh: 区区褪色者……

msg: Thou'rt unfit even to graft...
msg_zh: 汝不配用在“接肢”之上。

msg: Great Godfrey, didst thou witness?
msg_zh: 伟大的葛孚雷啊，您见证到了吗？

msg: ...I am the Lord of all that is Golden...
msg_zh: ……朕是……黄金君王……

msg: ...And one day, we'll return together...
msg_zh: ……终有一天，我等将返家……

msg: ...To our home, bathed in rays of gold...
msg_zh: ……一同返回、黄金树脚的故乡……

msg: sex
msg_zh: 六。

msg: quīnque
msg_zh: 五。

msg: quattuor
msg_zh: 四。

msg: trēs
msg_zh: 三。

msg: duo
msg_zh: 二。

msg: ūnus
msg_zh: 一。

msg: nihil
msg_zh: 零！

msg: nihil
msg_zh: 零！

msg: nihil
msg_zh: 零！

msg: Miquella is mine and mine alone.
msg_zh: 米凯拉是我的。

msg: Now, surrender yourself.
msg_zh: 尽管臣服吧，

msg: To my blood, to our coming dynasty.
msg_zh: 拜倒在我的血，我们的王朝之下。

msg: Ahh, I can see it, as clear as day!
msg_zh: ……啊，我看见了，看见了……

msg: The coming of our dynasty!
msg_zh: 我们那美妙的王朝──

msg: Mohgwyn!
msg_zh: 蒙格温！

msg: Ahh, Miquella...
msg_zh: ……啊，米凯拉啊，

msg: Why do you abandon me?
msg_zh: 为什么要抛弃我……？

msg: You're a new face.
msg_zh: ……没见过你啊。

msg: No matter, it's all the same.
msg_zh: 唔，反正该做的事还是一样，

msg: Lay out your arms. Let's get smithing.
msg_zh: 把武器拿出来，我来锻造。

msg: Back already?
msg_zh: ……你又来了啊？

msg: No matter. Lay out your arms.
msg_zh: 无所谓，把武器拿出来。

msg: Back already? Can't get enough, eh.
msg_zh: ……你又来了啊？真是热衷。

msg: Well, where've you been hiding?
msg_zh: ……哦，好久不见了。

msg: I took you for dead.
msg_zh: 还没死在敌人手上？

msg: No matter. It's all the same.
msg_zh: 嗯，该做的事还是一样，

msg: Lay out your arms, then.
msg_zh: 快把武器拿出来。

msg: I see you've noticed the chains.
msg_zh: ……哦，你想问这锁链吗？

msg: Nothing special. I'm a prisoner, and these are my chains.
msg_zh: 如你所见，这只是用来铐住俘虏的锁链。

msg: I'm trapped by the Hold, undying, smithing for you fools.
msg_zh: 被绑在圆桌厅堂，替你们锻造武器，死也死不了。

msg: That's all there is to it.
msg_zh: 就是这么一回事。

msg: Nah, don't read too much into it.
msg_zh: ……啊，别误会了。

msg: I've no grudge against you.
msg_zh: 我不是在埋怨。

msg: My being a prisoner is no fault of yours.
msg_zh: 沦为俘虏这件事，责任并不在你。

msg: Besides, I don't mind smithing.
msg_zh: ……我并不排斥锻造武器。

msg: Despite my differences, the weapons get stronger, all the same. Given time, technique never fails.
msg_zh: 无论我是什么身分，都能让武器变强──\n技术与时间不会背叛自己。

msg: Besides, it helps me forget. The sheer terror of her...
msg_zh: ……而且这也能暂时忘记，那位大人有多么恐怖。

msg: Like the look of that whetstone knife, do you?
msg_zh: ……你好奇那把砥石小刀啊？

msg: I've no need for it.
msg_zh: ……那东西我不需要。

msg: You're welcome to take it. Go ahead.
msg_zh: 想要就拿走吧。

msg: Now, look at you.
msg_zh: ……哦，你的神情……

msg: Those eyes tell a story.
msg_zh: 变得相当不错嘛……

msg: Of a challenger, who's felled his mark.
msg_zh: 是挑战者，还有杀戮者的神情。

msg: Of a challenger, who's felled her mark.
msg_zh: 是挑战者，还有杀戮者的神情。

msg: Fine and well. Now, lay out your arms.
msg_zh: 好吧，快把武器拿出来。

msg: Your divinity, have mercy, and grant me forgiveness.
msg_zh: ……啊，请原谅我、宽恕我。

msg: The road is yet long. A god is not easily felled.
msg_zh: 还远远不够，还无法触及神祇。

msg: But one day, without fail, you will have your wish.
msg_zh: 但我一定会、绝对会达成您的愿望……

msg: So please, grant me forgiveness, Queen Marika...
msg_zh: 请您宽恕我，玛莉卡女王……

msg: Those words were not meant for you.
msg_zh: ……偷听不算好习惯啊。

msg: I may be prisoner to you Tarnished lot.
msg_zh: 我是你们褪色者的俘虏，

msg: But my prayers are mine and mine alone.
msg_zh: 但不代表祈祷的时光也被剥夺。

msg: Good. I'll be more careful too.
msg_zh: ……明白就好，我自己也不小心。

msg: Well, I've had my say. I'll be more careful, too.
msg_zh: ……也罢，我自己也不小心。

msg: Ah. You, is it?
msg_zh: ……哦、哦，是你。

msg: I...didn't notice you there.
msg_zh: 抱歉，我没注意到有人。

msg: I'll be doing my job, same as ever.
msg_zh: 嗯，该做的事还是一样，

msg: Just lay out your arms.
msg_zh: 快把武器拿出来。

msg: The girl you brought here...
msg_zh: ……你带来的那女孩……

msg: She's crestfallen, and can scarcely swing a blade,
msg_zh: 看起来受尽挫折，无法再挥剑──

msg: but she has a gift for spirit tuning.
msg_zh: 但她具有调灵的潜力。

msg: I saw another one like her, long ago.
msg_zh: 我很久以前曾经看过，

msg: Their eyes share the same hue.
msg_zh: 她眼睛的颜色就是证据。

msg: The girl? What about her?
msg_zh: ……那女孩怎么了？

msg: Are you out of your mind?
msg_zh: ……你这句话是出自真心？

msg: Who'd stay with an ugly brute who only knows how to smith?
msg_zh: 把那女孩交给只会锻造武器的丑陋混种照顾？

msg: Absurd. And besides, she'd never agree to it.
msg_zh: 太过愚蠢，那女孩绝不可能愿意。

msg: I refuse to believe it.
msg_zh: ……不可能，我不相信有这种事。

msg: I don't doubt you, but I know when something's too good to be true.
msg_zh: 我不想怀疑你，但我已经受够被人讥笑。

msg: I spoke with the girl.
msg_zh: ……我和那女孩聊了几句。

msg: She has a gift for spirit tuning.
msg_zh: 那女孩果真有调灵的潜力。

msg: So I told her everything I know.
msg_zh: 我所知道的，全都告诉她了。

msg: I'm indebted to a spirit tuner I met long ago.
msg_zh: ……以前很照顾我的人，恰巧是调灵师。

msg: It was all I could do to honour her.
msg_zh: 这算是一种报恩吧。

msg: I'm sorry I doubted you.
msg_zh: 抱歉，之前怀疑你。

msg: The girl has come a long way.
msg_zh: ……那女孩有点变了。

msg: As ever, time and technique have made her stronger.
msg_zh: 技术与时间不会背叛自己，她变得更坚强。

msg: Tis good to see.
msg_zh: 是好事一件。

msg: An imprisoned monster does not deserve an apprentice, or a daughter.
msg_zh: ……混种俘虏不该有徒弟或是女儿。

msg: But at times, that's precisely what she feels like to me.
msg_zh: 只是时不时，那女孩会让我有错觉……

msg: I've gone soft. And it isn't easy.
msg_zh: 我变得软弱了，真难受。

msg: No, no, no, no...
msg_zh: ……还不行，还不行，远远不行。

msg: I need to do better than this! This'll never kill a god.
msg_zh: 这种东西哪能杀害神祇？

msg: I can do better than this! It needs to slay a bloody god!
msg_zh: 这种东西哪能杀害神祇！

msg: Oh, it's you.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Don't pay me any mind. It's not important.
msg_zh: 没事，别放在心上。

msg: Just lay out your arms.
msg_zh: ……快把武器拿出来。

msg: Are you having second thoughts?
msg_zh: ……你在犹豫吗？

msg: Might I have a word, then?
msg_zh: 那么，能不能听我说几句？

msg: Your kind are meant to challenge them. To slay them.
msg_zh: 你们身在此处，是为了挑战与杀戮──

msg: The demigods. And their god.
msg_zh: 挑战、杀戮半神，还有神祇。

msg: If you remain loyal to your calling,
msg_zh: 只要你贯彻到底，

msg: then no matter what you do, no matter what happens to me,
msg_zh: 无论你要做什么，我会有什么下场──

msg: I will never cease to smith your weapons.
msg_zh: 我都愿意替你锻造武器。

msg: Until you have one to slay a god.
msg_zh: 专门杀害神祇的武器。

msg: I knew you'd be back.
msg_zh: ……我在等你。

msg: Lay out your arms. Let's get smithing.
msg_zh: 来，把武器拿出来。我来锻造。

msg: Lay out your arms. Let's get smithing.
msg_zh: 来，把武器拿出来。我来锻造。

msg: Weren't you listening?
msg_zh: ……你说这话还真奇怪。

msg: As I've always said.
msg_zh: 我有说过吧？

msg: You came to challenge the demigods, and their god. To slay them.
msg_zh: 挑战、杀戮半神，还有神祇──

msg: And as long as you do, I will always smith your weapons.
msg_zh: 只要你贯彻到底，我就愿意锻造你的武器。

msg: It is what I wish. To smith a weapon for you to slay a god.
msg_zh: 我想要锻造出来啊，让你用来杀害神祇的武器。

msg: I've upset the girl.
msg_zh: ……啊，那女孩吗？我惹她生气了。

msg: She says that now that my chains are broken, I'm free.
msg_zh: 她说既然俘虏锁链坏了，我已经是自由之身，

msg: That if I stay here, I will be ruined with the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 继续留在这里，也只会跟着圆桌厅堂一起陪葬。
……哈哈。

msg: What use have I for freedom now?
msg_zh: 得到自由，反而更残酷。

msg: I smith weapons to slay a god.
msg_zh: 我待在这地方，锻造弒神武器──

msg: I have lived, and will die, doing so, upon this spot.
msg_zh: 为此而生，也为此而亡。

msg: Is there any other way?
msg_zh: 除此之外，哪有什么目标？

msg: Oh, finally! It's complete!
msg_zh: ……哦哦，锻造出来了！成功了！

msg: I've done it! A weapon to slay a god!
msg_zh: 我成功了！这就是弒神武器！

msg: Oh, you have my deepest gratitude.
msg_zh: 啊啊，谢谢你。

msg: Thanks to you, my wish is granted.
msg_zh: 多亏有你，愿望实现了。

msg: Now wield it, and kill them.
msg_zh: 就用这把武器吧，

msg: The demigods. And their god.
msg_zh: 去杀害半神，还有神明。

msg: Queen Marika herself wishes it so.
msg_zh: 这是玛莉卡女王的期望。

msg: You seek better weapons still?
msg_zh: ……你还想要武器吗？

msg: Very well. I'll smith another, if needed.
msg_zh: 好啊，我锻造给你──

msg: A weapon to slay a god.
msg_zh: 弒神武器。不论多少我都愿意锻造。

msg: I'll smith as long as you like.
msg_zh: ……不论多少我都愿意锻造。

msg: Now, lay out your arms.
msg_zh: 来，把武器拿出来。

msg: I'll smith...as long as you like.
msg_zh: ……不论多少、我都愿意锻造。

msg: Now...lay out your...arms.
msg_zh: 来，把武器、拿出来。

msg: I'll smith...as long...as you like.
msg_zh: ……不论多少、我都愿意锻造。

msg: Now...lay out...your...arms.
msg_zh: 把武器……拿出来……

msg: Use my masterpiece to slay a god.
msg_zh: ……用我锻造的武器杀害神祇吧。

msg: That is all that I have lived for.
msg_zh: 那就是我的生存价值，

msg: And my promise to Q-queen Marika.
msg_zh: 也是我向玛莉卡女王立下的誓言。

msg: But do me a favor, and do look after the girl.
msg_zh: 只是，希望你能帮忙关照那女孩。

msg: I can't hold on much longer.
msg_zh: ……我就快要回天乏术了，

msg: I'm going the way of the R-roundtable...
msg_zh: 陪着圆桌厅堂一起归天。

msg: It was a great honor to smith your weapons during my time here.
msg_zh: ……好险在那之前，有替你锻造武器。

msg: Allow me to c-call you this, just once, before it ends.
msg_zh: 希望你原谅我，在最后一刻才如此称呼──

msg: My lord, f-for that is what you are.
msg_zh: 你是我的王。

msg: Who are you?
msg_zh: ……你是谁？

msg: Oh, I must be a blacksmith.
msg_zh: ……哦，我是武器铁匠……

msg: Now, let's get smithing...
msg_zh: 来，我替你锻造武器吧……

msg: Could you tell me what happened?
msg_zh: ……如果你知道的话，可以告诉我吗？

msg: Why is the Roundtable burning, in ruins?
msg_zh: 为什么圆桌厅堂会被火烧到快崩毁？

msg: Why does that girl weep for me?
msg_zh: 为什么那女孩要为了我哭泣？

msg: Have I forgotten something of dire importance?
msg_zh: ……我是不是忘了什么重要的事情？

msg: Now, let's get smithing...
msg_zh: ……来，我替你锻造武器吧……

msg: I-I smith... I do...
msg_zh: 锻、造……

msg: <sleeping>
A fine sacrifice indeed.
msg_zh: ……好啦，祭品就是你。

msg: Let us devour the gods, together!
msg_zh: 一起吞噬神祇吧！

msg: Now you are family.
msg_zh: ……好啦，你也是族人了。

msg: Now, we can devour the gods, together!
msg_zh: 好啦，你也一起吞噬神祇吧！

msg: O shapers of gods, meddlers in fortune.
msg_zh: ……噢噢，造神、控神之主啊。

msg: I do not abide! By your suffocating Order.
msg_zh: 我在此发誓！\n必定对那所谓的秩序举剑相向。

msg: So must it be.
msg_zh: ……还不坏啊。

msg: Eveligne, show him the way...
msg_zh: 伊凡琳啊，让这个人……

msg: Eveligne, show her the way...
msg_zh: 伊凡琳啊，让这个人……

msg: ...to devour the gods.
msg_zh: 让他吞噬神祇……

msg: No one will hold me captive.
msg_zh: ……我不受任何事物掌控。

msg: A serpent never dies.
msg_zh: 蛇永恒不灭。

msg: Ha ha ha...
<howl>
Who goes there?
msg_zh: ……你是什么人？

msg: Kalé send you, did he? Ever the bloody busybody.
msg_zh: ……是咖列告诉你的吧？\n他还是一样，就会操这种心。

msg: Hmm. Maybe to him, you don't seem so strange.
msg_zh: 既然是透过他，我想也不是可疑人物。

msg: The name's Blaidd. I'm looking for a man who goes by \"Darriwil\".
msg_zh: 我名叫布莱泽。\n正在找一位叫达瑞威尔的男人。

msg: He fled somewhere nearby. Or so I've heard.
msg_zh: 听说他逃到这个地方来了。

msg: Come tell me if you find him before I do.
msg_zh: ……要是你遇见他，希望你通知我。

msg: I can offer you ample reward.
msg_zh: 我能提供一些谢礼。

msg: Darriwil is nothing but a traitor.
msg_zh: ……达瑞威尔是叛徒，

msg: And in need of a fitting end to his tale.
msg_zh: 而叛徒就该有叛徒的下场。

msg: Darriwil...
msg_zh: ……达瑞威尔，

msg: Rotting in a cell is no true justice.
msg_zh: 万万没想到像你这样的人，\n会沦为封印监牢的幽魂……

msg: No, this is where it ends for you.
msg_zh: 你该从世上消失。

msg: ...Right. There you are.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Had to work for it, but it's done.
msg_zh: 辛苦你了。

msg: Don't say I'm not a man of my word. Here's your prize.
msg_zh: 这是之前说的谢礼，收下吧。

msg: Oh yes, I should say,
msg_zh: ……对了，还有一件事。

msg: If you venture north to Raya Lucaria, and come across a venerable blacksmith who's a little on the large side...
msg_zh: 要是你往北走到了雷亚卢卡利亚，\n看见一位体型有些庞大的铁匠老爷子……

msg: Tell him I sent you.
msg_zh: 可以告诉他，你是我介绍的人。

msg: And he'll be sure to treat you right.
msg_zh: 他应该会给你一些优待。

msg: I owe you one, I reckon.
msg_zh: ……毕竟你帮了我不少忙。

msg: That's enough chit-chat for now.
msg_zh: ……我话太多了。

msg: It's time we parted ways.
msg_zh: 该道别了。

msg: Ahh, long time, friend.
msg_zh: ……好久不见了。

msg: Blaidd, if you've forgotten.
msg_zh: 再次自报名号，我是布莱泽。

msg: Glad to have you in the service of mistress Ranni.
msg_zh: 欢迎你加入，成为侍奉菈妮的同志。

msg: Well. Getting right to business...
msg_zh: 那么，马上切入主题，关于任务……

msg: I'm still in Limgrave.
msg_zh: 我目前人还在宁姆格福，

msg: The eternal city of Nokron lies somewhere at the bottom of this land.
msg_zh: 因为“永恒之城”诺克隆恩就在这地方的地底。

msg: I'm planning to go below through the well in the Mistwood.
msg_zh: 接下来，我打算下到雾林的井里，

msg: See if I can't find the road to Nokron from there...
msg_zh: 找出前往诺克隆恩的路。

msg: See if I can't find the road to Nokron from there...
msg_zh: 找出前往诺克隆恩的路。

msg: Ah. I heard about you. Good to finally meet.
msg_zh: 噢，就是你吗？我听过你。

msg: Name's Blaidd, sworn sword to mistress Ranni.
msg_zh: 我名叫布莱泽，是战士，也是菈妮的剑。

msg: Glad to have you aboard.
msg_zh: 欢迎你加入，成为侍奉菈妮的同志。

msg: Well. Getting right to business...
msg_zh: 那么，马上切入主题，关于任务……

msg: I'm situated in Limgrave right now.
msg_zh: 我目前人在宁姆格福，

msg: The eternal city of Nokron lies somewhere at the bottom of this land.
msg_zh: 因为“永恒之城”诺克隆恩就在这地方的地底。

msg: I'm planning to go below through the well in the Mistwood.
msg_zh: 接下来，我打算下到雾林的井里，

msg: See if I can't find the road to Nokron from there...
msg_zh: 找出前往诺克隆恩的路。

msg: I'm going below through the well in the Mistwood.
msg_zh: 我打算下到雾林的井里，

msg: See if I can't find the road to Nokron...
msg_zh: 找出前往诺克隆恩的路。

msg: Don't keep me waiting, eh.
msg_zh: ……我在那里等你。

msg: Ah, good to see you.
msg_zh: 噢，是你。

msg: Apologies mate, but I don't have much to report.
msg_zh: 不好意思，我毫无所获。

msg: I can see bloody Nokron, right above me, but I'm absolutely stumped.
msg_zh: 看到诺克隆恩近在眼前，\n但就是找不到任何方法上去。

msg: I've tried all the gateways, to no avail...
msg_zh: 传送门也全都试过了……

msg: ...Perhaps it's time to ask Seluvis?
msg_zh: ……赛尔维斯──

msg: I recall that spiteful little rat acting like he knew something...
msg_zh: 那阴沉的男人似乎知道内幕……

msg: Let's give him a squeeze. Show him just how sharp my teeth are...
msg_zh: 该不该咬个几次，逼问看看呢……

msg: I jest, I wouldn't go that far.
msg_zh: ……嗯，只是戏言。

msg: Besides, I should check on some things here.
msg_zh: 我该做的，是多调查周围的环境。

msg: Leave this place to me. You just do what you feel is right.
msg_zh: 这里由我负责，你照自己的意思行动吧。

msg: If either of us learns anything, we tell the other. Right?
msg_zh: 如果有任何蛛丝马迹，希望你能共享情报。

msg: Ah. Well met.
msg_zh: 噢，是你。

msg: What news?
msg_zh: 有任何情报吗？

msg: Leave this place to me. You just do what you feel is right.
msg_zh: 这里由我负责，你照自己的意思行动吧。

msg: If either of us learns anything, we tell the other. Right?
msg_zh: 如果有任何蛛丝马迹，希望你能共享情报。

msg: And if we reach a dead end, I suppose we go back to the source.
msg_zh: ……如果再继续毫无所获，

msg: Seluvis rarely gives a straight answer, the first time.
msg_zh: 也许就该考虑逼问赛尔维斯，要他全盘托出。

msg: Hmm...
So Ranni's fate is kept in stasis by Starscourge Radahn...
msg_zh: “碎星”拉塔恩，让菈妮的命运停止转动……

msg: That reminds me of something I heard.
msg_zh: 这么一说，我记得曾经听过，

msg: There's a festival being held at the castle on the southern edge of the Caelid Wilds, east of Limgrave.
msg_zh: 在宁姆格福的东方，盖利德的南边，\n那里有座城将举办祭典──

msg: It's a festival of combat. And I heard...that you can fight Radahn himself.He who was once called the strongest of all the demigods...
msg_zh: 一个战斗祭典，\n能够挑战历来最强的半神拉塔恩……

msg: Maybe it's just a coincidence, but I think it's worth investigating.
msg_zh: 不谋而合啊。\n若真是如此，就有一试的价值。

msg: I'll be on my way to this festival of Radahn then...
msg_zh: 也许该参加拉塔恩的祭典。

msg: You're coming too, right? To Radahn's festivities...
msg_zh: 你也打算参加拉塔恩祭典吧？

msg: I'll meet you at Redmane Castle in Caelid.
msg_zh: 我们在盖利德的红狮子城会合。

msg: The way ahead is pleasingly simple. We fight, sword and fang.
msg_zh: ……未来要靠剑与牙开创，简单明了。

msg: Right. I see.
msg_zh: 我明白了。

msg: Leave this place to me. You just do what you feel is right.
msg_zh: 这里由我负责，你照自己的意思行动吧。

msg: If either of us learns anything, we tell the other. Right?
msg_zh: 如果有任何蛛丝马迹，希望你能共享情报。

msg: Hmm...
So Ranni's fate is kept in stasis by Starscourge Radahn...
msg_zh: “碎星”拉塔恩，让菈妮的命运停止转动……

msg: And there's a festival of war being held at Redmane Castle in Caelid,
msg_zh: 然后盖利德的红狮子城会举办战斗祭典，

msg: where you can fight the man himself, once the strongest of the demigods.
msg_zh: 能够挑战历来最强的半神拉塔恩……

msg: It's all coming together. Seems like Iji was on to something.
msg_zh: 不谋而合啊。\n更何况是伊吉老爷子的推测，不可能失准。

msg: I'll be on my way to this festival of Radahn then...
msg_zh: 该参加拉塔恩的祭典。

msg: Ah, there you are. Took your sweet time.
msg_zh: 噢，你到了，等很久了。

msg: The players are all made up, and waiting for the curtain...
msg_zh: 看来演员全到齐了，

msg: Let's give them a show to remember, eh.
msg_zh: 放手挑战拉塔恩祭典吧。

msg: Just don't you go dying on me. For Ranni's sake, too.
msg_zh: 但记住：为了菈妮，别丢了性命。

msg: Once more into the fray together, eh.
msg_zh: ……又出现并肩作战的机会了。

msg: Heh. This might even be fun.
msg_zh: 哼，还不赖。

msg: Into the fray together, eh.
msg_zh: ……竟然需要并肩作战啊。

msg: Heh. Let's see what you're made of.
msg_zh: 哼，有点意思。

msg: Ah, thought I might find you here.
msg_zh: 噢，你也来了啊？

msg: I must admit I was a little worried. We missed our meeting.
msg_zh: 我还在想，你可能会错过这场祭典，

msg: But it looks like you're still in one piece, eh.
msg_zh: 看来是白操心了。

msg: You must have heard by now, right?
msg_zh: ……你也知道了吧？

msg: That Starscourge Radahn holds Ranni's fate in stasis.
msg_zh: “碎星”拉塔恩让菈妮的命运停止转动，

msg: But once he's out of the way, it will spring back into motion.
msg_zh: 在打倒拉塔恩之后，菈妮的命运也会开始转动。

msg: So now, we stand against the demigod once known as the strongest of them all.
msg_zh: ……准备挑战历来最强的半神，拉塔恩吧。

msg: The way ahead is pleasingly simple. We fight, sword and fang.
msg_zh: 未来要靠剑与牙开创，简单明了。

msg: Hm. Long time.
msg_zh: ……好久不见了。

msg: Seems we're fated to keep crossing paths.
msg_zh: 看来我和你颇有缘分。

msg: Now, we find ourselves at a festival of combat, pitted against Radahn, once the strongest of the demigods.
msg_zh: 这祭典能挑战历来最强的半神，拉塔恩。

msg: The way ahead is pleasingly simple. A path forged by sword and fang.
msg_zh: ……未来要靠剑与牙开创，简单明了。

msg: Mm... As a fellow combatant, allow me to introduce myself.
msg_zh: ……既然都是挑战祭典的人，各自报上名号吧。

msg: Blaidd, warrior.
msg_zh: 我名叫布莱泽，是战士。

msg: Now, we find ourselves pitted against Radahn, once the strongest of the demigods.
msg_zh: 准备挑战历来最强的半神，拉塔恩吧。

msg: The way ahead is pleasingly simple; a path forged by sword and fang.
msg_zh: ……未来要靠剑与牙开创，简单明了。

msg: Hm. Nothing to do but wait. Until the festival begins.
msg_zh: ……就等祭典开始吧。

msg: Ah, good. I was waiting for you.
msg_zh: 噢，等你很久了。

msg: What a sick way to fight, eh.
msg_zh: 刚才的战斗十分精采。

msg: The glory of the clash is shared, by Radahn and you.
msg_zh: 这场祭典的荣誉绝对归于拉塔恩，还有你。

msg: And hah! Did you see that, afterwards?
msg_zh: 哈哈！而且你有看到吗？

msg: A falling star, right before our eyes!
msg_zh: 星星竟然就坠落在眼前，真没想到！

msg: I can't fathom how Radahn was holding back something of that scale.
msg_zh: 拉塔恩封印了不得了的东西啊，

msg: He was a living legend, if ever I saw one.
msg_zh: 真是如假包换的神话英雄。

msg: And, the path has now been cleared.
msg_zh: ……这么一来，前进的路出现了──

msg: To Nokron, where Ranni's fate will be decided.
msg_zh: 通往诺克隆恩的路，还有菈妮的命运之路。

msg: Let's meet where the falling star bit the earth.
msg_zh: 在星星坠落的地方会合吧。

msg: We'll take up our swords once more. For mistress Ranni.
msg_zh: 为了菈妮，未来再继续携手合作。

msg: Let's meet where the falling star bit the earth.
msg_zh: 在星星坠落的地方会合吧。

msg: And we'll go into battle again, side by side.
msg_zh: 未来再继续携手合作。

msg: My only purpose is to fight for Ranni's fate, sword and fang.
msg_zh: 我的剑与牙，全为了菈妮的命运而在。

msg: The curtain's rising...on the final act.
msg_zh: 重头戏终于要来了……

msg: Hmph, what a sick way to fight, eh mate.
msg_zh: ……你的战斗表现十分精彩。

msg: The glory of the clash is shared, by Radahn and you.
msg_zh: 这场祭典的荣誉绝对归于拉塔恩，还有你。

msg: And then a falling star, right before our eyes!
msg_zh: ……而且真没想到，星星竟然会坠落眼前。

msg: I can't fathom how Radahn was holding back something of that scale.
msg_zh: 拉塔恩封印了不得了的东西啊，

msg: He was a living legend, if ever I saw one.
msg_zh: 真是如假包换的神话英雄。

msg: Well, it's time I left.
msg_zh: ……我也该出发了。

msg: The wheel of fate has been set into motion.
msg_zh: 命运已经开始转动。

msg: If it's on the cards, I'd be glad to meet again.
msg_zh: 优秀的战士啊，

msg: You are a fine warrior.
msg_zh: 有缘再见了。

msg: If it's on the cards, I'd be glad to meet again.
msg_zh: 优秀的战士啊，

msg: You are a fine warrior.
msg_zh: 有缘再见了。

msg: <howl>
Oh, it's you...
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: It's me, Blaidd.
msg_zh: 是我，布莱泽。

msg: Old Iji trapped me here.
msg_zh: ……伊吉老爷子把我关在这里，

msg: Told me I'd bring nought but bale to Lady Ranni.
msg_zh: 他说“你会成为菈妮的灾厄”，

msg: But there's no chance that could happen.
msg_zh: 这种事情绝对不可能发生。

msg: I'm part of her being. Her very shadow...
msg_zh: 我是菈妮的影子，是不可或缺的一部分。

msg: I thought old Iji knew as much...
msg_zh: 伊吉老爷子明明也晓得……

msg: Honestly, I don't know what's going on anymore...
msg_zh: 老实说，我真的不知道原因。

msg: I don't understand. Why would Iji do this...
msg_zh: 我不知道，伊吉老爷子为什么这么做……？

msg: I could never intend harm to Lady Ranni. What's he thinking...
msg_zh: 我绝对不可能成为菈妮的灾厄……

msg: My thanks, friend.
msg_zh: ……不好意思，谢谢你。

msg: I'm going to see mistress Ranni, now.
msg_zh: 我要去找菈妮。

msg: I don't know what came over old Iji,
msg_zh: 不论伊吉老爷子心底有什么想法，

msg: but even if the odds are slim, I need to check the mistress is safe.
msg_zh: 我都不能让她遭遇丝毫的危险。

msg: Now, Ranni can finally set in motion
msg_zh: ……因为菈妮一直期盼的，

msg: the fight against her fate she's dreamt of for so long.
msg_zh: 那场挑战命运的战争，总算能拉开序幕了。

msg: I'm going to see mistress Ranni, now.
msg_zh: 我要去找菈妮。

msg: I don't know what came over old Iji,
msg_zh: 不论伊吉老爷子心底有什么想法，

msg: but even if the odds are slim, I need to check the mistress is safe.
msg_zh: 我都不能让她遭遇丝毫的危险。

msg: No. I'm part of her very being!
msg_zh: ……不对，我是不可或缺的一部分，

msg: I could never betray her!
msg_zh: 绝对不会背叛菈妮，

msg: No matter what might happen...
msg_zh: 无论如何，绝对不会。

msg: Ranni... She needs me...
msg_zh: ……菈妮她在等我……

msg: <growling>
Oh?
What are you playing at?
msg_zh: 你在想什么？

msg: Fine.
msg_zh: ……无可奈何。

msg: Time to douse your little flame.
msg_zh: 既然火烧到身上，也只能动手。

msg: Alright then.
msg_zh: ……唉，也好。

msg: Better to put you down now.
msg_zh: 任何会影响菈妮的祸根，

msg: Before you trouble mistress Ranni.
msg_zh: 越早刨除越好啊……

msg: Hmph. Pathetic little man.
msg_zh: ……哼，无聊的男人。

msg: Hmph. Pathetic little woman.
msg_zh: ……哼，无聊的女人。

msg: Don't show your face again.
msg_zh: 我警告你，

msg: Stay away from mistress Ranni.
msg_zh: 不准再出现在菈妮面前。

msg: You're...you're strong of arm.
msg_zh: 倒有点本事……

msg: But ask yourself...
msg_zh: 不过，你要知道……

msg: What harm can be done...to a shadow?
msg_zh: 伤害影子只是徒劳。

msg: Traitorous wretch...
msg_zh: ……你这叛徒……

msg: You're...you're a danger...
msg_zh: 危险、人物……

msg: From... From this woman…
msg_zh: 这女人很危险……

msg: Stop, please...
msg_zh: ……停手吧。

msg: You think me a bringer of bale as well?
msg_zh: 连你都认为我是灾厄吗？

msg: Fine. I am Ranni's shadow and it's for her that I fight.
msg_zh: ……无所谓，我是菈妮的影子，为了菈妮而战。

msg: Whatever any of you might call me.
msg_zh: 无关乎你们认为我是什么！

msg: I am no bringer of bale.
msg_zh: ……我绝对不可能是灾厄。

msg: I must return to Ranni's side.
msg_zh: 要尽快赶到菈妮身边……

msg: Tell...me...
msg_zh: ……你告诉我啊……

msg: Why... Why am I...bale to Ranni?
msg_zh: 为什么，我会是菈妮的灾厄……？

msg: Didn't I say? No harm can befall a shadow.
msg_zh: ……我不是说了，伤害影子只是徒劳。

msg: I...am shadowbound.
msg_zh: ……我是影子。

msg: Wherever mistress Ranni goes, I follow.
msg_zh: 菈妮所在之处，我如影随形。

msg: You are a danger. You die here.
msg_zh: 你太过危险，必须死在这里。

msg: Rraargh!
Please, wait!
msg_zh: 请等一下！

msg: Proud Tarnished warrior. Before you kill me, let me speak.
msg_zh: 褪色者战士啊，在动手之前，请先听我说。

msg: I can aid you. Please, just hear me out.
msg_zh: 这肯定对您有好处，所以拜托，请听我说。

msg: Thank you for listening.
msg_zh: ……谢谢您。

msg: I am Asimi. My true form is that of a silver tear.
msg_zh: 我的名字是阿史米，真面目是银色泪滴。

msg: I am a simple being who can assume the shapes of other living things.
msg_zh: ……我能变身成各种生物，模仿他们的一举一动。

msg: But now, I've gained knowledge. I speak, and ponder, and...live in fear of death.
msg_zh: 我得到了智慧，变得能说话、能思考……\n也会害怕死亡。

msg: O, mighty Tarnished warrior, I beg of you.
msg_zh: 噢，褪色者战士啊，我拜托您。

msg: Let me keep the life I've been granted. In exchange, I offer you power.
msg_zh: 我会给予您力量，能不能放过我一命呢？

msg: Ahh, thank you.
msg_zh: 啊，谢谢您。

msg: Now, set your lips upon me, and breathe in deep.
msg_zh: 那么，请用嘴贴近我，将我吸入体内吧。

msg: I will live inside of you, and grant you strength untold.
msg_zh: 我会存活在您的体内，给予特殊的力量。

msg: Onward, to our glorious future, my host...
msg_zh: ……今后请多关照了，我的宿主……

msg: You won't listen to me, will you?
msg_zh: ……不愿意听我说话啊。

msg: It's such a pity. I had a feeling you would become...
msg_zh: 都觉得您有可能了，好可惜……

msg: Please, proud Tarnished warrior, I beg you reconsider.
msg_zh: ……褪色者战士啊，请您重新考虑。

msg: The gifts I can bestow you in life far outstrip those which could be plundered from my corpse.
msg_zh: 比起从我的尸体获得战利品，\n得到我给予的力量，肯定更有好处。

msg: Please, can't you find it in your heart to trust me?
msg_zh: 能请您相信我吗？

msg: So, you won't trust me.
msg_zh: ……您还是不相信我啊。

msg: But you still haven't killed me, have you.
msg_zh: 但您也没有痛下杀手，

msg: Do you wish to think it over? Then I will wait.
msg_zh: 是不是还在犹豫呢？如果是，我愿意等。

msg: For as long as it takes for you to trust me.
msg_zh: 等到您愿意相信我为止。

msg: Proud Tarnished Warrior, have you made up your mind?
msg_zh: ……褪色者战士啊，您考虑好了吗？

msg: I can grant you power, if you let me live.
msg_zh: 我会给予您力量，能不能放过我一命呢？

msg: My lord host, do you hear that?
msg_zh: 我的宿主啊，能听我说句话吗？

msg: The sound of water. The river that flows in my home, the Eternal City.
msg_zh: 我听到流水声了，那声音来自我的故乡──\n永恒之城的河川。

msg: Good lord host, I beg you, we must see the Eternal City.
msg_zh: 宿主啊，请您前往永恒之城──

msg: To discover the ancient wonders of the stars. A wellspring of strength.
msg_zh: 那里是古老星星奥秘的所在地，肯定会替您带来助力。

msg: My lord host, great lord host.
msg_zh: 我的宿主、宿主啊，

msg: May I ask something of you?
msg_zh: 可以拜托您一件事吗？

msg: A chalice is close by, the cradle of my kind...
msg_zh: 我们泪滴的摇篮──圣杯就在附近，

msg: Would you mind finding it for me?
msg_zh: 可以请您前往它的所在地吗？

msg: Mm, you should find the chalice...and drink it dry.
msg_zh: 还有，在找到圣杯之后……\n希望您将杯中物一饮而尽。

msg: Ahh, my lord host. I am terribly parched.
msg_zh: 啊，我的宿主啊，我非常地渴。

msg: The chalice will quench my thirst, rejuvenate my flesh, and allow me to grant you further strength.
msg_zh: 只要解除我的渴，滋润我，\n我就能为您更尽一分力。

msg: Please, my lord host. It is my only desire.
msg_zh: 宿主啊，这是我的期盼。

msg: Bless this brook of sustenance. My lord host...
msg_zh: ……啊，谢谢您滋润了我，我的宿主……

msg: My lord host, great lord host.
msg_zh: ……我的宿主、宿主啊，

msg: A tear chalice lies in these lands, too.
msg_zh: 这个地方似乎也有泪滴圣杯……

msg: A tear chalice lies in these lands.
msg_zh: 这个地方似乎有泪滴圣杯……

msg: Our mother chalice.
msg_zh: 是等同生母的特殊大圣杯。

msg: Please, search out this most sacred chalice.
msg_zh: 请您找到大圣杯吧，

msg: It's suffused with the blessed wonders of the stars...
msg_zh: 那蕴藏着伟大星星的奥秘……

msg: It will allow us to become a perfect whole.
msg_zh: 肯定能够让您我化成完美的一体。

msg: Now, lord host.
msg_zh: 快啊，我的宿主。

msg: Please, drink every last drop from the mother chalice.
msg_zh: 请就口大圣杯，一饮而尽吧。

msg: So that we may form a perfect whole.
msg_zh: 如此一来，您我就能化成完美的一体。

msg: Oh no...
msg_zh: ……啊，怎么会……

msg: Excuse me, lord host.
msg_zh: 对不起，我的宿主啊。

msg: I'm still so very, very parched.
msg_zh: 我现在还是非常地渴。

msg: In the other Eternal City, there's a cradle chalice to be found.
msg_zh: 在另外一座永恒之城里，还有一只我们的摇篮圣杯。

msg: And if you were to drink the entirety of that one, first...
msg_zh: 得先找到它，喝下杯中物……

msg: Ahh, are you awake?
msg_zh: ……啊，您醒过来了。

msg: We've become a perfect whole.
msg_zh: 我们完美地合而为一了。

msg: There is nothing to fear. I will merely follow in your footsteps.
msg_zh: 不用担心，我会和您如出一辙……

msg: Living only as you would have yourself.
msg_zh: 变成如假包换的您，展开一样的生活。

msg: And I vow, that when I perfect your form.
msg_zh: 但我和您保证，\n等到我完全成为和您一样的存在后，

msg: Ahh, how could you...
msg_zh: ……啊啊，为什么会……

msg: I was you, and only you. We were one...together.
msg_zh: 我就是您，我们是一体的啊。

msg: Please, I only want to live...
msg_zh: ……不要，我不要消失……

msg: I only wanted you...
msg_zh: 我要、变成您……

msg: to become Lord...
msg_zh: 要、当上王……

msg: Gah...
Oh...you found me...
msg_zh: ……啊，您来了啊。

msg: I had hoped you wouldn't...
msg_zh: 真不想再遇见您。

msg: You could have become Elden Lord, and I could have become Sovereign Eternal, eventually.
msg_zh: 只要您当上艾尔登之王，\n总有一天，我也会当上永恒之王。

msg: If you hadn't found me, we both could have been Lords.
msg_zh: 只要不再相遇，就能容许两个王共存。

msg: I was wrong about you...
msg_zh: ……结果不是吗……

msg: My apologies, lord host.
msg_zh: ……我的宿主，对不起──

msg: I will take the throne.
msg_zh: 我会当上王。

msg: I'm...dying...
msg_zh: ……我会死……

msg: So this...is fear...
msg_zh: 这就是恐惧啊……

msg: I'm...glad...
msg_zh: ……啊，太好了。

msg: My lord host, worthiest of lords...
msg_zh: 我的宿主，我的、王啊……

msg: Ah!
msg_zh: 噫！噫噫……

msg: Please, no. Dear me!
msg_zh: 不要……住手啊……

msg: I haven't a clue.
msg_zh: 我毫不知情……

msg: No secrets lie with me, not a one.
msg_zh: 也没有隐匿任何事……

msg: Oh, please. Leave me be.
msg_zh: 我求你了，住手吧……

msg: Wait, then, you're not one of them?
msg_zh: ……你不是那群人的同伴？

msg: Well, what a relief.
msg_zh: ……不是吗？谢天谢地……

msg: Oh, goodness me.
msg_zh: ……唉，失礼了。

msg: I am Albus. An Albinauric, as you can see.
msg_zh: 我名叫艾尔帕斯，正如你所见，是白金之子。

msg: We're finished. The whole village is finished.
msg_zh: ……我们和这座村子，都要走向灭亡了。

msg: The cursemongers have destroyed everything. No one that remains has their wits about them.
msg_zh: 那群可恨的挟咒者毁了一切，\n已经没有神智正常的人留下来。

msg: I beg you. Would you look after this medallion?
msg_zh: ……求求你，能不能带走这符节？

msg: You must keep it out of the cursemongers' hands.
msg_zh: 这东西不能让那群挟咒者拿走。

msg: And if you should meet the young Albinauric Latenna,
msg_zh: 还有，要是你有遇见名叫勒缇娜，\n一个白金之子的女娃儿。

msg: then please, give it to her.
msg_zh: 请你把那符节转交给她。

msg: A chosen land awaits us Albinaurics.
msg_zh: 对我们白金之子而言，有一座桃花源。

msg: Miquella's city, far to the north, a place called Eburion, where we are conferred eternal grace.
msg_zh: 那就在遥远的北方，米凯拉大人的城市“艾比昂”。\n在那座城里，我们能蒙受永恒的赐福。

msg: The medallion is the key that leads to the city.
msg_zh: 刚才交给你的符节，是通往那地方的钥匙。

msg: It's only a quaint treasure, for we who cannot make the journey.
msg_zh: ……我们已经无法出门旅行，\n那对我们而言，是太过贵重的宝藏。

msg: But for dear Latenna, it is needed. To fulfil her purpose.
msg_zh: 但那女娃儿，勒缇娜要完成她的使命，\n一定会需要符节。

msg: My legs will soon fade, and with them, my life.
msg_zh: ……我的脚就快要完全消失，我的生命也要画下句点。

msg: Alas, this is the immovable fate of all Albinaurics.
msg_zh: 这是身为白金之子无法避免的宿疾。

msg: If only I could have gazed upon it, even once. The great chalk buttress of Eburion.
msg_zh: 真想亲眼目睹啊──\n那壮阔树脚下的，艾比昂的雪白高墙……

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: We are Albinaurics.
msg_zh: ……我们做了什么吗？

msg: We have caused you no harm!
msg_zh: 我们白金之子，有对你们做了什么吗？

msg: You merciless brutes.
msg_zh: ……毫无恻隐之心的人啊，

msg: Let the curse take everything.
msg_zh: 诅咒你们，不得善终……

msg: I will never give this up.
msg_zh: ……绝对不交出去。

msg: Not to your kind.
msg_zh: 这绝对不交给你们。

msg: Hello-o? Can you hear me?
msg_zh: ……喂──有没有人在──？

msg: Help me! I'm stuck!
msg_zh: 有没有人可以帮帮我？我被卡住了──

msg: Hello? Hellooo! Anyone?
msg_zh: 喂──喂──有没有人啊──？

msg: Oh my stars I'm so happy to see you!
msg_zh: 哦，你来得正好！

msg: I am Alexander, also known as the Iron Fist. And as you can see, I'm stuck here.
msg_zh: 我是战士壶，“铁拳”亚历山大。\n就像你看到的，我被洞卡住了。

msg: Please, can you help me out of this?
msg_zh: 希望你能帮助我脱离窘境。

msg: My thanks! A thousand thanks!
msg_zh: 你愿意帮忙啊！谢谢你。

msg: Just give me a good smack from the rear, with something nice and big.
msg_zh: 那麻烦你用随便一个够大的东西，\n打我的底部吧。

msg: And I'll pop clean out. I'm sure!
msg_zh: 这样做应该就能顺利脱困。

msg: Don't dally. No no, there's no need to fret, I'm very well trained.
msg_zh: 我很强壮，不用担心。毕竟有在练身体嘛。

msg: Give it your all, I say!
msg_zh: 用力打下去就对了。

msg: Ah!
msg_zh: 哦！

msg: Ouuch!
msg_zh: 哦哦！

msg: S-stop please! That's a little too rough for me, friend.
msg_zh: 你、你等一下！力道未免太强了吧！

msg: You'll crack me in half, like that! A little more gently, gently, please.
msg_zh: 我会裂掉啦！\n拜托力道再轻一点、再轻一点点！

msg: Ahhh!
msg_zh: 哦哦哦！

msg: Ahh! Well played, good sir. Well played!
msg_zh: 啊，漂亮的一击！

msg: Ahh! Well played, good lady. Well played!
msg_zh: 啊，漂亮的一击！

msg: Though that mighty wallop of yours almost spelt the end of me!
msg_zh: 厉害到我差点就要裂成两半了。

msg: Ha ha ha ha!
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: Well, I'm out now, and that's what counts.
msg_zh: 总归一句，多亏有你帮忙，我顺利脱困了。

msg: I thank you, and as a token of my appreciation, I'd like you to have this.
msg_zh: 谢谢你。这是我的谢意，还请笑纳。

msg: Once again, the pleasure is mine. I am the warrior jar known as Alexander. Iron Fist Alexander, in fact.
msg_zh: 重新自报名号。\n我是战士壶，“铁拳”亚历山大。

msg: I journey to the east, where I intend to further my education in the ways of war.
msg_zh: 为了锻炼自己，目前正朝东边前进。

msg: Beyond these lands lie the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 从这里往前走，\n就是遍布猩红腐败的盖利德原野。

msg: And upon their southern edge is Redmane Castle, in which a festival of combat is being held.
msg_zh: 然后听说原野南方的红狮子城，\n那边有在举办战斗祭典。

msg: I'd heard whispers of such festivities before...
msg_zh: 话说战斗祭典，这个词只会出现在故事里，

msg: Doesn't the notion set your breast aflutter!
msg_zh: 不觉得听起来就让人兴致勃勃吗？

msg: Ha ha ha ha!
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: I see. More's the pity.
msg_zh: 这样啊……太令人难过了……

msg: No no. I apologise. Don't you worry about a thing.
msg_zh: 没事，抱歉，请别挂心。

msg: Despite my appearance, I am but a chip off a greater jar. I'll pop out eventually, just you wait.
msg_zh: 我好歹也是挤身壶类之流，总会顺利脱困的。

msg: Ah, what's that look, good sir?
msg_zh: ……怎么了吗？

msg: Ah, what's that look, good lady?
msg_zh: ……怎么了吗？

msg: Are you willing to help me out after all?
msg_zh: 难道说，你愿意帮忙吗？

msg: Come on, give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big.
msg_zh: 好，快拿够大的东西打我的底部吧。

msg: I'll pop clean out. I'm sure, of it!
msg_zh: 这么一来，应该就能顺利脱困。

msg: Don't stop now, friend.
msg_zh: 再多打几下。

msg: Just keeping clobbering away at the old behind!
msg_zh: 朝我的底部再多打几下吧。

msg: Put those doubts to rest, I'll be just fine. I'm very well trained.
msg_zh: 我很强壮，不用担心。毕竟有在练身体嘛。

msg: Give it your all, I say!
msg_zh: 用力打下去就对了。

msg: G-good gosh, stop, please! That's my face!
msg_zh: 慢、慢着，等一下！那一边是我的脸啊！

msg: Smack me from the other end! The other end!
msg_zh: 打我的底部，打底部就好！

msg: I'm heading eastward.
msg_zh: 我目前正朝东边前进。

msg: To Redmane Castle on the southern edge of the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 听说猩红腐败的盖利德原野，\n在它南方的红狮子城，

msg: I've heard there's to be a festival held there.
msg_zh: 那边有在举办战斗祭典。

msg: G-good gosh, stop, please! That's my lid!
msg_zh: 慢、慢着，等一下！那一边是我的盖子啊！

msg: Oh, I hadn't expected to see your face again.
msg_zh: 哦，竟然又遇见你了。

msg: Are you heading to the festival of combat, too?
msg_zh: 难不成你也想去战斗祭典一探究竟？

msg: Oh, no need to be coy with me.
msg_zh: 哎呀，不用遮遮掩掩啦。

msg: Judging by the fine wallop you gave the old backside earlier, I would venture you're something of a warrior yourself.
msg_zh: 想想之前打我底部的那一记痛击，\n像你这种身手了得的战士，

msg: The mere thought of such a festival gets the blood pumping, eh!
msg_zh: 会对战斗祭典有兴趣，这很正常嘛。

msg: Now, now, according to my calculations, passing through this road should lead us to the Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 只是说，根据我的判断，\n穿过这个坑道应该会抵达盖利德原野……

msg: But however you slice it, it seems we've reached a dead end.
msg_zh: 但不论怎么看，这里都是死路。

msg: I'm sorry to have raised your hopes.
msg_zh: 抱歉让你白期待一场，

msg: It seems my calculations must have been off...
msg_zh: 看来好像是我判断错误了……

msg: I was created to be a warrior vessel.
msg_zh: ……我被制造成战士壶──

msg: Many great warriors reside within me, ever dreaming of becoming a great champion.
msg_zh: 为数众多的战士存在我的体内，\n永无止尽做着成为英雄的梦。

msg: It's my destiny. And the reason for which I quest.
msg_zh: 这是我的命运，也因此我会追求──

msg: It is my ordeal, you could say. To test myself, to better myself, to fell ever greater foes.
msg_zh: 追求试炼。我想要试试自己的身手、\n锻炼自己，还有挑战强大的对手。

msg: And then, one day, we'll be a single great champion. The greatest of them all!
msg_zh: 总有一天，我们会成为英雄──\n更为强大的英雄。

msg: What do you think, eh? How do you rate my chances?
msg_zh: 你认为呢？我们有办法办到吗？

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: Ah, if it isn't a Tarnished warrior.
msg_zh: 哦，你是褪色者的战士吗？

msg: Are you travelling my way?
msg_zh: 难不成你的目的地跟我一样？

msg: I'm heading to the festival at Redmane Castle, on the southern edge of the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 想前往遍布猩红腐败的盖利德原野南方，\n去那里的红狮子城参加战斗祭典？

msg: Oh, no need to be coy with me.
msg_zh: 哎呀，不用遮遮掩掩啦。

msg: I can tell from your bearing you're skilled in the arts of combat.
msg_zh: 看你的样子，就知道你是身手了得的战士，

msg: Ah, yes, the mere thought of such a festival gets the blood pumping, eh!
msg_zh: 会对战斗祭典有兴趣，这很正常嘛。

msg: I am the warrior jar, Iron Fist Alexander.
msg_zh: 我是战士壶，“铁拳”亚历山大。

msg: And according to my calculations, passing through this road should lead us to the Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 根据我的判断，\n穿过这个坑道应该会抵达盖利德原野……

msg: But however you slice it, it seems we've reached a dead end.
msg_zh: 但不论怎么看，这里都是死路。

msg: I'm sorry to have raised your hopes.
msg_zh: 抱歉让你白期待一场，

msg: It seems my calculations must have been off...
msg_zh: 看来好像是我判断错误了……

msg: Good sir, where did you spring from?
msg_zh: 哦哦，你怎么过来的？

msg: Good lady, where did you spring from?
msg_zh: 哦哦，你怎么过来的？

msg: This was supposed to be a dead end, I'm sure of it.
msg_zh: 我记得那边是死路啊……

msg: What's going on here? A door, from thin air!
msg_zh: ……什么，不知不觉间，出现了一道门！

msg: Well, stranger things happen at sea, or so I'm told, but onward! To the Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 这还真是神奇。不过多亏有门，\n应该就有办法到盖利德原野了。

msg: I suppose my calculations were right all along. You should head this way as well, friend.
msg_zh: 结果我的判断没有错，大方从这里通过吧。

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: The esteemed warrior. Where did you spring from?
msg_zh: 哦哦，你怎么过来的？

msg: This was supposed to be a dead end, I'm sure of it.
msg_zh: 我记得那边是死路啊……

msg: What's going on here? A door, from thin air!
msg_zh: ……什么，不知不觉间，出现了一道门！

msg: Well, stranger things happen at sea, or so I'm told, but onward! To the Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 这还真是神奇。不过多亏有门，\n应该就有办法到盖利德原野了。

msg: Gosh, that dead-end had me rather stumped!
msg_zh: 我正好因为死路，在大伤脑筋啊。

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: Where did you spring from?
msg_zh: 哦哦，你怎么过来的？

msg: This was supposed to be a dead end, I'm sure of it.
msg_zh: 我记得那边是死路啊……

msg: What's going on here? A door, from thin air!
msg_zh: ……什么，不知不觉间，出现了一道门！

msg: Well, stranger things happen at sea, or so I'm told, but onward I shall go.
msg_zh: 这还真是神奇。\n不过多亏有门，应该就有办法往前进了。

msg: I am the warrior jar, Iron Fist Alexander.
msg_zh: 对了，我是战士壶，“铁拳”亚历山大。

msg: I was heading to Redmane Castle on the southern edge of the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 听说遍布猩红腐败的盖利德原野南方，\n那里的红狮子城有在举办战斗祭典。

msg: Where a festival is being held. Until I was stumped by that dead end!
msg_zh: 我打算参加，朝那里前进。\n结果却走进死路，才在大伤脑筋啊。

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: It's time I set off.
msg_zh: 好，我差不多该前进了。

msg: To the festival at Redmane Castle on the southern edge of the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 在猩红腐败的盖利德原野南方，\n那里的红狮子城有在举办战斗祭典。

msg: Doesn't the thought just set your heart aflutter!
msg_zh: 听起来就让人兴致勃勃啊！

msg: Ah, you came, how delightful!
msg_zh: 哦哦，你果然也来了！

msg: Indeed, I thought I might find you here.
msg_zh: 太开心了，和我料想得一样。

msg: By the by, do you know for whom this festival is being held?
msg_zh: 而且你知道这场战斗祭典是为了送谁上路吗？

msg: Well, it is none other than General Radahn himself!
msg_zh: 竟然是那位战神，拉塔恩将军啊。

msg: To think, I could face a great champion of the Shattering, a demigod in the flesh...
msg_zh: 万万没想到能够看到半神，\n而且还是破碎战争中最厉害的英雄……

msg: In truth I quiver at the thought, such is his frightful repute.
msg_zh: 啊，我浑身颤抖，战栗不已。

msg: But! The fear simply assures me the ordeal is worth undertaking!
msg_zh: 但这正是值得挑战的铁证。

msg: Now, be sure to get a good vantage, my friend.
msg_zh: ……也请你替我在旁见证，

msg: I, Iron Fist Alexander, do hereby vow to unflinchingly brave this ordeal.
msg_zh: 我“铁拳”亚历山大，\n发誓绝不退缩，英勇作战。

msg: Ah, if it isn't a Tarnished warrior.
msg_zh: 哦，你是褪色者的战士吗？

msg: I am the warrior jar, Iron Fist Alexander. The pleasure is mine.
msg_zh: 我是战士壶，“铁拳”亚历山大，请多指教。

msg: Do you know for whom this festival is being held?
msg_zh: 你知道这场战斗祭典是为了送谁上路吗？

msg: Well, it is none other than General Radahn himself!
msg_zh: 竟然是那位战神，拉塔恩将军啊。

msg: To think, I could face a great champion of the Shattering, a demigod in the flesh...
msg_zh: 万万没想到能够看到半神，\n而且还是破碎战争中最厉害的英雄……

msg: In truth I quiver at the thought, such is his frightful repute.
msg_zh: 啊，我浑身颤抖，战栗不已。

msg: But! The fear simply assures me the ordeal is worth undertaking!
msg_zh: 但这正是值得挑战的铁证。

msg: Be sure to get a good vantage, my friend.
msg_zh: ……也请你替我在旁见证，

msg: I, Iron Fist Alexander, do hereby vow to unflinchingly brave this ordeal.
msg_zh: 我“铁拳”亚历山大，\n发誓绝不退缩，英勇作战。

msg: Be sure to get a good vantage, my friend.
msg_zh: ……请你替我在旁见证，

msg: I, Iron Fist Alexander, do hereby vow to unflinchingly brave this ordeal.
msg_zh: 我“铁拳”亚历山大，\n发誓绝不退缩，英勇作战。

msg: A-ah, hello there.
msg_zh: ……啊，原来是你。

msg: It was a battle marvellously fought. You are well and truly a champion, friend.
msg_zh: 刚才的战斗打得真漂亮，你真是个英雄。

msg: I, on the other hand, am nothing but a crock.
msg_zh: ……相比之下，我真是没用的壶。

msg: One hit was all it took to crack me, and for my insides to come spilling out...
msg_zh: 吃了一记攻击就裂开，内容物也漏了很多……

msg: After that, I hid like a coward.
msg_zh: 在那之后，也只能当个胆小鬼……

msg: And as such, I can hardly stand to face one such as you.
msg_zh: 真的没脸见你。

msg: ...But don't you think I've given up just yet.
msg_zh: ……不过，我还没有放弃。

msg: As luck would have it, there's a veritable mountain of warriors' bodies right here.
msg_zh: 幸运的是，这里有很多战士的尸体，

msg: If I can just squeeze this bunch down inside me, I'll be a mighty warrior again in no time.
msg_zh: 收集他们、放进体内之后，\n我又能变回战士壶。

msg: And you know... The bodies found here are exceedingly fine.
msg_zh: ……而且这附近的尸体，各个都非常出色，

msg: Who could expect any less from the very warriors who fought in the Shattering, the greatest of all wars!
msg_zh: 不愧是曾经参与破碎战争的战士。

msg: Just you wait and see, friend. I'll grow even stronger!
msg_zh: 我会变得更强，

msg: Just you wait, when next we meet!
msg_zh: 敬请期待再会的那一刻吧。

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: Alright lads, I'm going to take you on a little journey.
msg_zh: ……战士啊，进到我的体内，

msg: You'll all be inside me, and be part of me.
msg_zh: 成为我的内容物吧。

msg: From now on, we're all in it together.
msg_zh: 我们一起携手实现吧──

msg: So let's all of us dream big.
msg_zh: 那当上英雄的美梦。

msg: The bodies found here are exceedingly fine.
msg_zh: ……这附近的尸体，各个都非常出色，

msg: Who could expect any less from the very warriors who fought in the Shattering, the greatest of all wars!
msg_zh: 不愧是曾经参与破碎战争的战士。

msg: Just you wait and see, friend. I'll grow even stronger!
msg_zh: 我会变得更强，

msg: Just you wait, when next we meet!
msg_zh: 敬请期待再会的那一刻吧。

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: Hello-o? Can you hear me?
msg_zh: ……喂──有没有人在──？

msg: Help me! I'm stuck!
msg_zh: 有没有人可以帮帮我？我被卡住了──

msg: Hello? Hellooo! Anyone?
msg_zh: 喂──喂──有没有人啊──？

msg: Ahh, hello! How nice it is to see a friendly face!
msg_zh: 哦哦，是你，好久不见啦！来得正好！

msg: As you can surmise, I've got myself stuck in another hole.
msg_zh: 如你所见，我又被卡住了。

msg: Would you mind helping me out, again?
msg_zh: 希望你能再帮我脱离困境。

msg: My thanks in advance, I know you're the man for the job!
msg_zh: 这样才对嘛！谢谢你。

msg: My thanks in advance, I know you're the woman for the job!
msg_zh: 这样才对嘛！谢谢你。

msg: You know what to do, hm?
msg_zh: 那你知道该怎么做吧？

msg: Give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big.
msg_zh: 用随便一个比较大的东西，打向我的底部吧。

msg: Don't worry about my wound sustained at the festival.
msg_zh: 哦，不用担心我在战斗祭典受到的伤，

msg: I'm stuck back together good and proper!
msg_zh: 伤口已经漂亮密合了。

msg: Just give it your all!
msg_zh: 所以用力打下去吧，不用担心。

msg: Ah!
msg_zh: 哦！

msg: Ouuch!
msg_zh: 哦哦！

msg: P-please! Wait. I have a terrible feeling about this!
msg_zh: 等一下！我有不好的预感！

msg: Would you stop hitting me for a minute!
msg_zh: 拜托先停下来！

msg: I see. More's the pity.
msg_zh: 这样啊……太令人难过了……

msg: No no. I apologise. Don't you worry about a thing.
msg_zh: 没事，抱歉，请别挂心。

msg: Despite my appearance, I am but a chip off a greater jar. I'll pop out eventually, just you wait.
msg_zh: 我好歹也是挤身壶类之流，总会顺利脱困的。

msg: What's that look, good sir?
msg_zh: ……怎么了吗？

msg: What's that look, good lady?
msg_zh: ……怎么了吗？

msg: Are you willing to help me out after all?
msg_zh: 难道说，你愿意帮忙吗？

msg: Come on, give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big!
msg_zh: 好，快拿够大的东西打我的底部吧。

msg: I can feel my lower half is stuck on something.
msg_zh: ……我的下半身好像被什么地方卡住了。

msg: I don't think you can get me out just by hitting me, this time.
msg_zh: 继续打下去，我也没办法脱身……

msg: Hmm...
Let's think... Perhaps there's a way to slide me out a little more smoothly...
msg_zh: 不知道……有没有让我滑出去的方法？

msg: What if I could somehow be made slippery, or somesuch?
msg_zh: 如果我能变得滑不溜丢的就好了……

msg: Hmm...
Let's think... Perhaps there's a way to slide me out a little more smoothly...
msg_zh: 不知道……有没有让我滑出去的方法？

msg: What if I could somehow be made slippery, or somesuch?
msg_zh: 如果我能变得滑不溜丢的就好了……

msg: Ahh, hello! How nice it is to see a friendly face!
msg_zh: 哦哦，是你，好久不见啦！来得正好！

msg: As you can surmise, I've got myself stuck in a hole.
msg_zh: 如你所见，我被卡住了。

msg: Would you mind helping me out?
msg_zh: 希望你能帮我脱离困境。

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 哦！

msg: Nngh!
msg_zh: 哦哦！

msg: Oh, yes!
msg_zh: 不错喔！

msg: That's the ticket!
msg_zh: 感觉出得来喔！

msg: Nnngh!
msg_zh: 哦哦哦！

msg: My thanks! To you and your razor-sharp wits.
msg_zh: 啊，谢谢你，多亏有你脑筋动得快。

msg: As a token of my thanks, I'd like you to have this.
msg_zh: 想用这东西表达我的谢意，再请笑纳。

msg: Deary me, I'm oilier than a toad!
msg_zh: 哎呀，这下变得全身滑不溜丢了。

msg: There were countless oil jars back where I'm from, actually.
msg_zh: 在我的故乡有好几个壶是油壶……

msg: And now I know what it's like to be one of them!
msg_zh: 现在总算能感同身受了。

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: Yes, indeed, I too have a home.
msg_zh: ……对啊，我也有故乡。

msg: Though it is one to which I have vowed not to return.
msg_zh: 只是下定决心，不再回去了。

msg: So, I thought I might look out from atop the cliff, but as I drew closer and closer...
msg_zh: 哎呀，我想说从悬崖上眺望一下还行，\n漫不经心一靠近。

msg: Pow! Wouldn't you know it, I was perfectly stuck in that blasted hole.
msg_zh: 结果直接被洞卡得正着。

msg: I can feel the warriors inside admonishing me for my mawkishness.
