msg_zh: ……我在想，体内的这些战士，\n也许会斥责我这种软弱心态。

msg: To walk the path of champions, one cannot cleave to the past!
msg_zh: “想当上英雄，就要割舍想家的念头”之类的。

msg: I'm headed to the fiery mount in the north.
msg_zh: ……我打算朝北边的火山前进。

msg: I can strengthen myself there, without fear of cracking this vessel.
msg_zh: 从那之后我想了好久──\n壶如果要变强，强到不会裂开的话，

msg: I will forge myself anew in its flames!
msg_zh: 那就必须焚烧这副身体。

msg: I'm headed to the fiery mount in the north.
msg_zh: ……我打算朝北边的火山前进。

msg: I can strengthen myself there, without fear of cracking this vessel.
msg_zh: 从那之后我想了好久──\n壶如果要变强，强到不会裂开的话，

msg: I will forge myself anew in its flames!
msg_zh: 那就必须焚烧这副身体。

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 唔喔！

msg: Rnnngh!
msg_zh: 唔喔喔喔喔喔！

msg: O mountain of fire! Bake me in your flames!
msg_zh: 火山啊！焚烧我亚历山大吧！

msg: Rrrrngh!
msg_zh: 唔喔喔喔喔喔！

msg: Nnngh!
msg_zh: 唔喔喔……

msg: Ah, good sir, what business might you have in such a place as this?
msg_zh: 嗯？你为什么会在这里？

msg: Ah, good lady, what business might you have in such a place as this?
msg_zh: 嗯？你为什么会在这里？

msg: I hardly think you're here to temper yourself with flame, considering that fleshly form of yours.
msg_zh: 焚烧肉身也不会变强啊？

msg: Your timing though, is impeccable as ever!
msg_zh: 啊，不过，来得正好。

msg: I've been making just the thing for you on my journey here.
msg_zh: 这个是我一边旅行的时候，一边做的。

msg: Take it, I'm sure it'll suit you to a tee.
msg_zh: 请笑纳，我觉得一定很适合你。

msg: But oh, it's hardly more than lukewarm here.
msg_zh: 话说回来，这温度比我想得还要低呢。

msg: I won't be able to temper my body such that it'll never crack again.
msg_zh: 看来光靠这里，\n不可能让我的身体练成绝不破裂。

msg: Perhaps I'll head eastward.
msg_zh: ……还是要往东边走呢？

msg: There's an old saying I've caught wind of.
msg_zh: 就是那个，传承下来的故事有提过啊，

msg: \"Above the lofty clouds, the icy giant's peak doth soar, here lieth the flame of ruin, which ever burning roars.\"
msg_zh: 在云海之上，积着厚雪的巨人山顶，\n有道灰灭火焰永不熄灭……

msg: Perhaps I'll head eastward.
msg_zh: ……还是要往东边走呢？

msg: There's an old saying I've caught wind of.
msg_zh: 就是那个，传承下来的故事有提过啊，

msg: \"Above the lofty clouds, the icy giant's peak doth soar, here lieth the flame of ruin, which ever burning roars.\"
msg_zh: 在云海之上，积着厚雪的巨人山顶，\n有道灰灭火焰永不熄灭……

msg: Ah, I see you've finally made it here yourself.
msg_zh: ……哦，你也抵达这里啦。

msg: The city hanging in the air is slowly crumbling. What an incredible place we find ourselves.
msg_zh: 漂在空中的城市渐渐崩落……\n这个地方真的很神秘。

msg: But that aside, you're certainly a force to be reckoned with, eh.
msg_zh: ……话说回来，你刚才的战斗，打得真是精彩。

msg: I doubt there's a single soul who could've handled that giant, other than you. It was practically a god...
msg_zh: 那个跟神祇一样威严的巨人，\n想必除了你以外，没有人能打倒。

msg: Of course I count myself, the great Alexander, among the many.
msg_zh: ……当然，我亚历山大也没办法。

msg: Which means, I've but one thing to ask of you.
msg_zh: ……所以啊，有一件事情想要拜托你。

msg: Would you kindly undertake my ordeal?
msg_zh: 你能不能成为磨练我的试炼？

msg: Come and tell me when you're ready.
msg_zh: ……等你准备好了，再告诉我吧。

msg: I've been longing to fight a warrior as accomplished as you.
msg_zh: 我想要和做好万全准备的你战斗。

msg: You are ready then, I take it?
msg_zh: 准备好了吧？

msg: Then let us begin!
msg_zh: 那就开始吧。

msg: I am the great jar warrior, Iron Fist Alexander!
msg_zh: 我正是壶中战士，“铁拳”亚历山大！

msg: Lend me strength, O warriors within!
msg_zh: 在我体内的诸位战士啊，把力量借给我吧！

msg: Let us become one champion, together!
msg_zh: 一起成为英雄吧！

msg: Ah, I see you've finally made it here yourself.
msg_zh: ……哦，你也抵达这里啦。

msg: The city hanging in the air is slowly crumbling. What an incredible place we find ourselves.
msg_zh: 漂在空中的城市渐渐崩落……\n这个地方真的很神秘。

msg: But that aside, I can't believe you felled that giant. It was practically a god...
msg_zh: ……话说回来，那个跟神祇一样威严的巨人，

msg: I doubt there's another soul out there who could've done the same.
msg_zh: 想必除了你以外，没有人能打倒。

msg: Of course I count myself, the great Alexander, among the many.
msg_zh: ……当然，我亚历山大也没办法。

msg: Which means, I've but one thing to ask of you.
msg_zh: ……所以啊，有一件事情想要拜托你。

msg: Would you kindly undertake my ordeal?
msg_zh: 你能不能成为磨练我的试炼？

msg: Come and tell me when you're ready.
msg_zh: ……等你准备好了，再告诉我吧。

msg: I've been longing to fight a warrior as accomplished as you.
msg_zh: 我想要和做好万全准备的你战斗。

msg: As I suspected... Victory...was impossible.
msg_zh: ……还是到达不了那境界啊。

msg: This vessel...was found lacking...
msg_zh: 靠目前的器量，办不到啊……

msg: My thanks. I knew you were the stuff of champions.
msg_zh: 谢谢，你真的是我认定的英雄。

msg: It was a marvellous battle.
msg_zh: 这场战斗十分精采。

msg: I implore you, take what I bequeath...from inside me...
msg_zh: 请务必收下我体内的内容物。

msg: All vessels are destined to one day break.
msg_zh: 壶逃不过毁坏的命运，

msg: But the great Alexander lived as a warrior to his last!
msg_zh: 而我亚历山大直到最后一刻，都是战士壶！

msg: Ha ha ha ha!
msg_zh: 哇哈哈哈。

msg: Good sir, I can't believe your heart was in it at all.
msg_zh: ……你的力量不只有这样吧？

msg: Good lady, I can't believe your heart was in it at all.
msg_zh: ……你的力量不只有这样吧？

msg: By the gods you are a man of vision!
msg_zh: 哦哦，你脑筋动得真快！

msg: By the gods you are a woman of vision!
msg_zh: 哦哦，你脑筋动得真快！

msg: This will have me as slippery as a toad.
msg_zh: 这下子真的滑不溜丢了。

msg: I have a good feeling about this, my friend.
msg_zh: 感觉应该有办法脱困。

msg: Right! Give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big!
msg_zh: 好，快拿够大的东西打我的底部吧！

msg: Argh! Cease! Please!
msg_zh: 啊！

msg: Just stop a moment, I beg!
msg_zh: 等等！快住手！

msg: My lower half is stuck on something down there!
msg_zh: 下半身好像被什么地方卡住了！

msg: I'll break! I'll break before I'm out!
msg_zh: 继续打也脱不了身！会裂开！

msg: Argh! No!
msg_zh: 啊！不要啊！

msg: Stop, please!
msg_zh: 快住手！

msg: I beg! I beg of you!
msg_zh: 我求你了！

msg: Argh!
msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊！

msg: Phew.
I thought I was apt to split in half...
msg_zh: 我还以为会裂成两半……

msg: Mm, I can feel my lower half is stuck on something.
msg_zh: 只是说，还真伤脑筋。\n下半身好像被什么地方卡住了。

msg: I don't think you can get me out just by hitting me, this time.
msg_zh: 继续打下去也没办法脱身……

msg: Hmm...
Let's think... Perhaps there's a way to slide me out a little more smoothly...
msg_zh: 不知道……有没有让我滑出去的方法？

msg: W-what if I could somehow be made slippery, or somesuch?
msg_zh: 如果我能变得滑不溜丢的就好了……

msg: My thanks! A thousand thanks!
msg_zh: 你愿意帮忙啊！谢谢你。

msg: Just give me a good smack from the rear, with something nice and big.
msg_zh: 那麻烦你用随便一个够大的东西，\n打我的底部吧。

msg: And I'll pop clean out. I'm sure!
msg_zh: 这样做应该就能顺利脱困。

msg: Don't worry about my wound sustained at the festival.
msg_zh: 哦，不用担心我在战斗祭典受到的伤，

msg: I'm stuck back together good and proper!
msg_zh: 伤口已经漂亮密合了。

msg: Just give it your all!
msg_zh: 所以用力打下去吧，不用担心。

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 哇！

msg: What are you playing at?
msg_zh: 你在做什么啊！

msg: This is no time for games!
msg_zh: 快点住手！

msg: Wait, I see. I see it now.
msg_zh: 原来是这么一回事──

msg: Humans all lose their wits, eventually.
msg_zh: 人逃不过发疯的命运。

msg: Then there's nothing left to say, except...
msg_zh: 既然如此，不必多说。

msg: I am Iron Fist Alexander!
msg_zh: 我正是“铁拳”亚历山大！

msg: The great jar warrior!
msg_zh: 壶中战士！

msg: A finer battle was never witnessed.
msg_zh: ……这是一场精彩的战斗，

msg: How do you fancy joining the lads inside, eh?
msg_zh: 你愿意成为我的内容物吗？

msg: How could this...
msg_zh: ……竟然会这样……

msg: Was my whole existence... just a crock?
msg_zh: 我是没用的壶吗……？

msg: Oi! You there!
msg_zh: 喂──路过的人啊，

msg: Could you help us out, cully?
msg_zh: 帮帮我吧。

msg: You, yeah, you there!
msg_zh: 喂──我说的就是你啊，

msg: Stop pretending you can't see me!
msg_zh: 为什么要装作没看见？

msg: Why won't anyone look me in the eye?
msg_zh: ……为什么所有人都这样？

msg: I-I'm not that ugly, am I?
msg_zh: 难道我就真的那么丑陋？

msg: Ow!
msg_zh: 好痛！

msg: What'd you go and do that for!
msg_zh: 你怎么突然打人啊，很过分耶！

msg: Hm? Oh, yes, I remember.
msg_zh: ……嗯？啊，对喔。

msg: Some clod turned me into a tree.
msg_zh: 因为我被施魔法，变成树了。

msg: You were just breaking the spell, weren't you.
msg_zh: 你是为了帮我破除魔法啊。

msg: Thank you. The name's Boc.
msg_zh: 谢谢你，我叫作柏克。

msg: I was pushed out of the cave. Told not to come back, not ever.
msg_zh: 不受洞窟的其他人欢迎，被赶了出来……

msg: Then I ended up as a tree.
msg_zh: 然后还被变成了树。

msg: Lucky you came along, really.
msg_zh: ……所以说，你真的帮了我大忙。

msg: Oh, what a shame.
msg_zh: 啊，还有对不起，

msg: When they threw me out of the cave, they took everything I owned,
msg_zh: 在被赶出洞窟的时候，\n身上重要的东西都被拿走了，

msg: and so this is all I have to express my thanks.
msg_zh: 所以只能拿这种东西答谢你。

msg: I hope you can forgive me.
msg_zh: 真的很对不起。

msg: Or, if you can afford to wait for a while,
msg_zh: ……再等我一下下，

msg: I could sneak back into the cave, and bring back something of actual value.
msg_zh: 我想偷偷回洞窟，拿回重要的东西。

msg: Then I'd be of some real use to you, I reckon.
msg_zh: 这样我就一定能帮到你的忙。

msg: Right, but I'll need a moment.
msg_zh: ……嗯，但是要再等一下。

msg: I-I'm frightened of them... So I have to gather myself.
msg_zh: 我还是……很怕他们……\n需要一点时间做心理准备。

msg: My knees start knockin'...just thinking about that god-awful cave on the shore...
msg_zh: ……一想到他们，还有那座海岸的洞窟，\n我就怕得脚都动不了……

msg: Oh, what are you doing here?
msg_zh: ……你怎么会来这里？

msg: You must leave this place at once. They'll rush in and beat you to a pulp.
msg_zh: 这里很危险，快点逃吧。\n他们肯定会跑过来攻击你。

msg: You'll end up just like me.
msg_zh: ……最后落得跟我一样的下场。

msg: Wait, is that what I think it is?
msg_zh: ……咦？这该不会……

msg: You got it back for me? My sewing needle!
msg_zh: 我的缝衣针！是你帮我拿回来的吗？

msg: <sob>
msg_zh: 呜、呜呜……

msg: What made you go and do a thing like that...
msg_zh: 你为什么要对我这么好？

msg: My mum was a seamstress...
msg_zh: 我的母亲是裁缝师……

msg: ...and that sewing kit was all I had to remember her by.
msg_zh: 这是她的遗物。

msg: I always wanted to be just like sweet old Mum.
msg_zh: 我想成为像母亲那样的裁缝师，

msg: Then, I suppose I-I can't just curl up and die, can I.
msg_zh: 所以不可以轻易死掉，对吧……？

msg: Thank you.
msg_zh: 谢谢你。

msg: You're very kind.
msg_zh: 我真的很高兴。

msg: I always wanted to be a seamster, l-like my mum.
msg_zh: 我想成为像母亲那样的裁缝师，

msg: Then, I suppose I can't just curl up and die, can I.
msg_zh: 所以不可以轻易死掉，对吧……？

msg: Oh...
It...hurts...
msg_zh: ……呜，好痛喔……

msg: Ooh...
msg_zh: 呜，呜啊啊……

msg: Good to see you! Master.
msg_zh: 主子，好久不见了！

msg: Do you remember me? Boc, the demi-human.
msg_zh: 您还记得我吗？我是亚人柏克。

msg: You helped me before, and retrieved my sewing needle.
msg_zh: 之前因为有主子的帮忙，才能顺利拿回缝衣针。

msg: Please, master.
msg_zh: 主子，我拜托您。

msg: Allow me to serve you, as your seamster.
msg_zh: 请您让我作为裁缝师，替您工作。

msg: I can't make nothing from scratch, but…
msg_zh: 我还没办法从零开始缝制衣服，

msg: I'm happy to make adjustments to your garments.
msg_zh: 但如果需要修改衣服，请您尽管吩咐。

msg: Boc the seamster, at your service, Master.
msg_zh: 主子，裁缝师柏克为您服务。

msg: Ready to make adjustments to your garments.
msg_zh: 需要修改衣服的话，请尽管吩咐。

msg: Oh, going so soon?
msg_zh: 啊，您要出发了吗？

msg: Please, do be safe on your journeys.
msg_zh: 请一路上小心安全。

msg: Master, I was wondering...
msg_zh: ……我其实在想……

msg: Do you ever...make adjustments to your garb yourself?
msg_zh: 主子会自己修改服装吗？

msg: I would, well, rather you let me do the job when possible, please.
msg_zh: 那个，如果您有修改服装的需要，\n希望能尽可能交给我处理。

msg: I don't ask anything in return, you know, and, well...
msg_zh: 我不求任何回报，毕竟……

msg: I am your personal seamster, after all!
msg_zh: 柏克是主子的裁缝师啊！

msg: I am your personal seamster, after all!
msg_zh: 因为柏克是主子的裁缝师啊！

msg: Master, my apologies.
msg_zh: ……主子，很抱歉。

msg: Your wardrobe includes the garb of old demigods,
msg_zh: 老实说，您带来的东西里，\n我发现有属于古老半神的衣物。

msg: and I'm afraid I can't make adjustments to them.
msg_zh: 我没有能力修改这类衣物。

msg: My mum told me once.
msg_zh: 我曾经听母亲说过，

msg: That a royal seamster would do them up in a jiffy.
msg_zh: 如果是王室的裁缝师，\n修改这类衣物是轻而易举的事情……

msg: Just wait, master. Before long, I'll be that good, too!
msg_zh: 主子，我也会加油，\n努力成为那么厉害的裁缝师！

msg: Is that a gift for my undeserving self?
msg_zh: ……您要送礼给柏克？

msg: Thank you kindly. But what on earth could it...
msg_zh: 谢谢您。是什么东西呢……？

msg: Oh!
Amazing! I've never seen a golden needle, not in all my life!
msg_zh: 好棒！是黄金缝衣针，我第一次看到！

msg: With a spectacular royal crest, to boot...
msg_zh: 还有这么威武的王室徽章在上头……

msg: Are you certain that this is for me?
msg_zh: 这东西真的要送给我吗？

msg: Oh, I can hardly believe it.
msg_zh: ……啊啊，真的好棒……

msg: Have faith in me, Master!
msg_zh: 主子，请您放一百二十个心！

msg: I'll polish my craft enough that I deserve this golden gift!
msg_zh: 我一定会成为厉害的裁缝师，\n不会让您送缝衣针的美意白费。

msg: I'll be the golden seamster, Boc!
msg_zh: 我是“黄金裁缝师”柏克！

msg: Now I'll be able to sew anything, even the threads of the demigods!
msg_zh: 不会再说自己不能修改半神的衣物了！

msg: Do you think that Mum would be pleased if she knew?
msg_zh: ……如果母亲知道了，会不会替我高兴呢？

msg: That I'm as good as any royal seamster, now.
msg_zh: 我已经不输王室的裁缝师了。

msg: Oh, it's still not enough.
msg_zh: ……啊，但我还不成气候。

msg: I need to learn how to sew from scratch, like her.
msg_zh: 得先像母亲一样，有能力从零开始缝制衣服。

msg: Master, may I ask you something?
msg_zh: ……主子，我有一件请求。

msg: Would you mind if I called you lord?
msg_zh: 我能改称呼您为“吾王”吗？

msg: I heard that you and the other Tarnished seek the throne of the Elden Lord.
msg_zh: ……主子是褪色者，而我听说\n褪色者的目标是成为艾尔登之王。

msg: Well, I know that you will be the one,
msg_zh: 我认为主子能当上艾尔登之王……

msg: and you'd make just the manner of kind-hearted lord that I'd wish for.
msg_zh: 我也希望像您这么温柔的人，\n能够当上艾尔登之王。

msg: So, please, if you would.
msg_zh: 希望您允许这件请求，

msg: Allow me to call you lord.
msg_zh: 让我称呼您为“吾王”。

msg: You don't say! Thank you, thank you!
msg_zh: 真的吗！谢谢您！

msg: M'lord, m'lord, m'lord!
msg_zh: 吾王、吾王、吾王啊──

msg: Please, become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 请您当上艾尔登之王。

msg: And please, let I, Boc the seamster, remain at your side.
msg_zh: 请允许裁缝师柏克，终生随侍身旁。

msg: No, and why would you...
msg_zh: ……是我、冒昧了……

msg: Forgive me, for overstepping my bounds. I didn't mean it.
msg_zh: 竟然提出令人不快的请求，\n请您当作没发生过吧。

msg: Boc the seamster, at your service, m'lord.
msg_zh: 吾王啊，裁缝师柏克在此。

msg: Ready to make adjustments to your garments.
msg_zh: 需要修改衣服的话，请尽管吩咐。

msg: Going already, m'lord?
msg_zh: 吾王啊，您要出发了吗？

msg: Please, do be safe on your journeys.
msg_zh: 请一路上小心安全。

msg: Master, did you see it?
msg_zh: ……主子，您有看见吗？

msg: Th-the Erdtree?
msg_zh: 那、那棵，黄金树的模样？

msg: I, oh, I don't really have the words for this...
msg_zh: 我没有办法好好表达出来……

msg: But I was so...so dazzled, I felt something stir, in my breast.
msg_zh: 那看起来非常、非常耀眼，我好感动。

msg: The Erdtree is waiting for you, master.
msg_zh: ……而且，那棵黄金树在等主子找它。

msg: I know it, I do. I feel it in my bones.
msg_zh: 我很清楚，肯定不会有错。

msg: M'lord, did you see it?
msg_zh: ……吾王啊，您有看见吗？

msg: Th-the Erdtree?
msg_zh: 那、那棵，黄金树的模样？

msg: I, oh, I don't really have the words for this...
msg_zh: 我没有办法好好表达出来……

msg: But I was so...so dazzled, I felt something stir, in my breast.
msg_zh: 那看起来非常、非常耀眼，我好感动。

msg: The Erdtree is waiting for you, m'lord.
msg_zh: ……而且，那棵黄金树在等您找它。

msg: I know it, I do. I feel it in my bones.
msg_zh: 我很清楚，肯定不会有错。

msg: O please, take the throne of Elden Lord.
msg_zh: ……请您当上艾尔登之王。

msg: M'lord... Have you ever wished you might be born again?
msg_zh: 吾王啊，您有想过重生吗？

msg: Well, they say that Rennala of Raya Lucaria
msg_zh: 我听说雷亚卢卡利亚的蕾娜菈大人，

msg: has the power to help people be reborn.
msg_zh: 拥有使人重生的力量喔。

msg: Oh? Me? Reborn?
msg_zh: ……嗯？您问我想不想重生吗？

msg: Oh, look at me. When you're this ugly...
msg_zh: ……您也知道，我的外表奇丑无比。

msg: well, being reborn? It would hardly make a difference, I'm afraid.
msg_zh: 我想即使有办法重生，一定也是无药可救。

msg: M'lord, what's this?
msg_zh: 吾王啊，这东西是……？

msg: Oh! Oh!
It can't be… For my rebirth?
msg_zh: 这该不会是重生用的必需品？

msg: But these are precious, are you certain that it's for me?
msg_zh: 要给我这么贵重的东西吗？

msg: Oh...
msg_zh: 呜、呜呜……

msg: M'lord, how did you know?
msg_zh: ……吾王啊，您真的是看透一切。

msg: It was my only wish, that I might honour you with a decent appearance.
msg_zh: 我打从心底一直这么想──\n希望自己的外表能够不丢您的脸……

msg: M'lord, it shouldn't take me long.
msg_zh: ……吾王啊，请您稍待。

msg: I'm off to see Rennala of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 我准备前往雷亚卢卡利亚的蕾娜菈大人身边，

msg: I'll be reborn, fresh and new.
msg_zh: 一定会重生成理想的外表。

msg: M'lord.
msg_zh: ……吾王啊。

msg: In all honesty, what do you think of me?
msg_zh: 您是怎么想的呢？

msg: Am I fit to serve a lord such as you, in all my ugliness?
msg_zh: 我的外表丑陋，肯定无法终生侍奉您。

msg: Must I be reborn, no matter what ill fate awaits me?
msg_zh: 是否不论结果，都该试试看重生呢？

msg: Oh, I'm such a fool.
msg_zh: 唉，我真笨。

msg: I don't even have answers to the simplest of questions.
msg_zh: 这种理所当然的事情，竟然还不懂。

msg: Master... Have you ever wished you might be born again?
msg_zh: 主子，您有想过重生吗？

msg: Master, what's this?
msg_zh: 主子，这东西是……？

msg: Master, how did you know?
msg_zh: ……主子，您真的是看透一切。

msg: Master, it shouldn't take me long.
msg_zh: ……主子，请您稍待。

msg: Master.
msg_zh: ……主子啊。

msg: Am I fit to serve you, master, in all my ugliness?
msg_zh: 我的外表丑陋，肯定无法终生侍奉您。

msg: Did I just hear my mum speaking?
msg_zh: ……我刚才听到了母亲的声音。

msg: Thank you very much.
msg_zh: ……谢谢您。

msg: Mum was always the only one who said I was beautiful.
msg_zh: 我这副外表也只有母亲会夸我好看，

msg: And now, my dear lord let me hear her voice.
msg_zh: 但刚才，您让我听见了那道声音。

msg: Please, if I may dream, just once...
msg_zh: ……啊啊，如果我的想法逾矩，请您见谅。

msg: Do you feel the same way my mum did, m'lord?
msg_zh: 那道声音的背后，是否也存在吾王的想法？

msg: Do you think I'm beautiful, despite these looks?
msg_zh: 对奇丑无比的我，您是否也夸我好看？

msg: <sob>
msg_zh: 呜、呜呜……

msg: M'lord, my dear lord...
msg_zh: 吾王、吾王啊。

msg: I, Boc the seamster, am forever in your service.
msg_zh: 请让裁缝师柏克终生随侍您身旁。

msg: May the throne of Elden Lord be yours.
msg_zh: 请您当上艾尔登之王。

msg: No, why on earth would you...
msg_zh: ……这、天经地义啊……

msg: It was silly of me to ask. Please, forget that I did.
msg_zh: 我说了不切实际的话了，请您当作没发生过吧。

msg: But I beg, don't renounce me for my appearance.
msg_zh: 但拜托您，千万不要抛弃丑陋的我。

msg: One day, I'll look every bit the servant.
msg_zh: 我一定会变成不让您丢脸的外表……

msg: Did I just hear my mum speaking?
msg_zh: ……我刚才听到了母亲的声音。

msg: Thank you very much.
msg_zh: ……谢谢您。

msg: Mum was always the only one who said I was beautiful.
msg_zh: 我这副外表也只有母亲会夸我好看，

msg: And now, my kind master let me hear her voice.
msg_zh: 但刚才，您让我听见了那道声音。

msg: Please, if I may dream, just once...
msg_zh: ……啊啊，如果我的想法逾矩，请您见谅。

msg: Do you feel the same way my mum did, master?
msg_zh: 那道声音的背后，是否也存在主子的想法？

msg: Do you think I'm beautiful, despite these looks?
msg_zh: 对奇丑无比的我，您是否也夸我好看？

msg: <sob>
msg_zh: 呜、呜呜……

msg: Master, kind master...
msg_zh: 主子、主子啊，

msg: I, Boc the seamster, am forever in your service.
msg_zh: 请让裁缝师柏克终生随侍您身旁。

msg: No, why on earth would you...
msg_zh: ……这、天经地义啊……

msg: It was silly of me to ask. Please, forget that I did.
msg_zh: 我说了不切实际的话了，请您当作没发生过吧。

msg: But I beg, don't renounce me for my appearance.
msg_zh: 但拜托您，千万不要抛弃丑陋的我。

msg: One day, I'll look every bit the servant.
msg_zh: 我一定会变成不让您丢脸的外表……

msg: S-surely, not? For me?!
msg_zh: 咦！要送给我吗？

msg: Oh no, I can't. It would be wasted on the likes of me.
msg_zh: ……怎么可以，这样太浪费了。我不能收。

msg: You should drink it yourself, master.
msg_zh: 请主子享用就好。

msg: I would be far happier knowing you enjoyed it yourself.
msg_zh: 对柏克而言，这样最幸福。

msg: S-surely, not? For me?!
msg_zh: 咦！要送给我吗？

msg: Oh no, I can't. It would be wasted on the likes of me.
msg_zh: ……怎么可以，这样太浪费了。我不能收。

msg: You should drink it yourself, m'lord.
msg_zh: 请吾王享用就好。

msg: I would be far happier knowing you enjoyed it yourself.
msg_zh: 对柏克而言，这样最幸福。

msg: Master...
O-oh...
msg_zh: 呜、呜呜……

msg: My most earnest thanks.
msg_zh: 真的……谢谢您。

msg: I don't deserve it, but I'll savour every last drop.
msg_zh: 柏克一定、一定会好好珍惜。

msg: M'lord...
msg_zh: ……吾王啊……

msg: O-oh...
msg_zh: 呜、呜呜……

msg: My most earnest thanks.
msg_zh: 真的……谢谢您。

msg: I don't deserve it, but I'll savour every last drop.
msg_zh: 柏克一定、一定会好好珍惜。

msg: <sleeping>
Ow!
msg_zh: 好痛！

msg: Why'd you go and do that?
msg_zh: 你干么打我啦！

msg: It's because I'm ugly, isn't it?
msg_zh: 就因为我长得很丑吗？

msg: Oh, now, you too, is it?
msg_zh: ……哦，果然是这样吗？

msg: The story of my rotten life...
msg_zh: 怎么都是我……

msg: Ah...aaah!
msg_zh: ……呜、呜呜……哇啊啊啊啊！

msg: No...
msg_zh: ……不对啊……

msg: I never wanted this...
msg_zh: 我根本不想做这种事情……

msg: Mum...
I've... I've let you down...
msg_zh: 我、我……

msg: Ow!
msg_zh: 好痛！

msg: M-master?
msg_zh: 主、主子……？

msg: Is something wrong?
msg_zh: 您怎么了？

msg: It's me! Boc, the seamster!
msg_zh: 是我啊！您的裁缝师柏克！

msg: Master, what's happened...
msg_zh: ……主子，怎么会这样……

msg: Did I do something wrong?
msg_zh: 难道是柏克事情没做好吗？

msg: Or is it just...because I'm ugly?
msg_zh: 还是说，是因为我太过丑陋了？

msg: Oh, my...
msg_zh: ……啊，怎么会……

msg: Master, is that the truth, your heart of hearts? My, oh my...
msg_zh: 被主子这么说……我、我……

msg: Ah...aaah!
msg_zh: ……呜、呜呜……哇啊啊啊啊！

msg: Oh, master, what have I done...
msg_zh: ……啊，我对主子做了什么……

msg: Master! Master!
msg_zh: 主子！主子啊！

msg: Master...
msg_zh: ……啊，主子啊，

msg: I've failed you...please, forgive me.
msg_zh: 请原谅柏克的无能……

msg: Ow!
msg_zh: 好痛！

msg: M-m'lord?
msg_zh: 吾、吾王……？

msg: Is something wrong?
msg_zh: 您怎么了？

msg: It's me! Boc, the seamster!
msg_zh: 是我啊！您的裁缝师柏克！

msg: M'lord, what's happened...
msg_zh: ……吾王啊，怎么会这样……

msg: Did I do something wrong?
msg_zh: 难道是柏克事情没做好吗？

msg: Or is it just...because I'm ugly?
msg_zh: 还是说，是因为我太过丑陋了？

msg: Oh, my...
msg_zh: ……啊，怎么会……

msg: M'lord, is that the truth, your heart of hearts? My, oh my...
msg_zh: 被吾王这么说……我、我……

msg: Ah...aaah!
msg_zh: ……呜、呜呜……哇啊啊啊啊！

msg: M'lord, what have I done...
msg_zh: ……啊，我对吾王做了什么……

msg: M'lord! M'lord!
msg_zh: 啊，吾王！吾王啊！

msg: M'lord...
msg_zh: ……啊，吾王啊，

msg: I've failed you...please, forgive me.
msg_zh: 请原谅柏克的无能……

msg: Well, look at you. We don't receive many visitors.
msg_zh: ……哦，有访客啊？太难得了。

msg: I presume you are a Tarnished. What brings you here?
msg_zh: 你看起来是褪色者，请问有什么事？

msg: Oh, pardon me. It's hardly my place to ask, is it.
msg_zh: 啊，抱歉。\n用这种刨根究底的口吻，是不太礼貌。

msg: I am Iji. A blacksmith who once served the Carian royals…
msg_zh: 我叫伊吉，过去以铁匠身分侍奉过卡利亚王室。

msg: An old codger who refuses to retire his rusty hammer.
msg_zh: ……然后，即使锻造的工夫退步了，

msg: So, here I am, still quietly plying my trade, on this spot.
msg_zh: 还不愿退休，继续留在这里默默当铁匠。

msg: Perhaps you'd like a display? These bones are old, but still able.
msg_zh: ……我这老头子还有多少能耐，要不要一探究竟？

msg: Well, it's kind of you to speak to me again.
msg_zh: 你又过来了，真令我高兴。

msg: Then I presume these old bones served their purpose, more or less?
msg_zh: 这代表我锻造的工夫还不算太差？

msg: Brave Tarnished. Here to put my old bones to work again?
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，又想找老头子锻造吗？

msg: Brave Tarnished. A word of warning, if you please.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，请听听我的忠告。

msg: This territory once belonged to the Carian royal family. Their manor lies not far beyond this point.
msg_zh: 这块土地原本是卡利亚王室的领地，\n再往前的地方，有王室成员居住的城寨。

msg: When the Raya Lucaria Academy turned on the Carians, the Knights of the Cuckoo descended on this tract.
msg_zh: 在雷亚卢卡利亚学院背叛王室以后，\n众多杜鹃骑士前来攻击此地……

msg: After leveling it, they carried on to the manor.
msg_zh: 在摧毁这里之后，步步逼近城寨。

msg: The Carians were taken off guard, but their strength had not waned, and they repelled the knights' onslaught...
msg_zh: 不过，即使遭受出其不意的攻击，\n卡利亚王室仍有能力击退骑士，

msg: By conjuring an enchanted snare that remains potent to this day.
msg_zh: 只是当时使用的那些恐怖魔法陷阱，\n就直接维持原状，留在原地。

msg: That is why I say, Tarnished. Don't go near the manor.
msg_zh: 所以说，褪色者啊，别靠近城寨。

msg: Unless you wish to lie with the corpses of the heedless Knights of the Cuckoo.
msg_zh: 你也不想踏上那些愚蠢杜鹃的后路吧？

msg: Oh, watch out, there.
msg_zh: 啊啊，请你当心。

msg: When I'm absorbed in my smithing, I lose sight of all else.
msg_zh: 我一旦全神贯注地锻造，就无法留意周遭事物。

msg: If you come too close, I'm apt to cause you harm.
msg_zh: 靠太近的话，有可能会让你受伤。

msg: I am, after all, terribly large compared to you, Tarnished.
msg_zh: 而且我的体型比你们褪色者大上非常多，

msg: You don't know how hard it is not to break anything while I work.
msg_zh: 要我不碰坏东西行动，实在困难重重。

msg: Something else for you?
msg_zh: ……还有事情没有做吗？

msg: I've explained the peril.
msg_zh: ……别忘记我的忠告。

msg: Of the enchanted snare that remains at the royal Carian Manor.
msg_zh: 卡利亚王室的城寨里，\n还留着当时使用的恐怖魔法陷阱。

msg: Whatever you do, brave Tarnished, stay away from that deathtrap.
msg_zh: 所以褪色者啊，别靠近城寨。

msg: Blaidd actually did that, did he?
msg_zh: ……哦，你是因为布莱泽的介绍……

msg: Quite a rare occurrence, for such a guarded soul as he.
msg_zh: 那个独来独往的人会这么做，这还真稀奇。

msg: Perhaps he sensed something unusual about you.
msg_zh: ……肯定是因为，他从你身上看到了什么。

msg: At any rate, if you're friendly with Blaidd,
msg_zh: 无论如何，既然你是布莱泽的朋友，

msg: I've a few more things that might suit you.
msg_zh: 那些物品应该能卖给你。

msg: I've something else that might suit you.
msg_zh: 那物品应该能卖给你。

msg: Oh, so you were the one. Lady Ranni has explained everything.
msg_zh: 哦，你过来了。菈妮大人和我提过了。

msg: Again, I am Iji.
msg_zh: 容我再自报名号，我叫伊吉。

msg: The Carian royal family's dedicated blacksmith, and Lady Ranni's war counsellor.
msg_zh: 是侍奉卡利亚王室的铁匠，也是菈妮大人的军师。

msg: I am told that you are searching for Nokron with Blaidd.
msg_zh: 听说你和布莱泽合作，\n一同寻找前往诺克隆恩的去路。

msg: I will give you whatever guidance I can. And pray, for your success.
msg_zh: 我愿尽己所能、提出建言，请你们一定要成功。

msg: The Carian royal family's dedicated blacksmith, and Lady Ranni's war counsellor.
msg_zh: 是侍奉卡利亚王室的铁匠，也是菈妮大人的军师。

msg: I am told that you are searching for Nokron with Blaidd.
msg_zh: 听说你和布莱泽合作，\n一同寻找前往诺克隆恩的去路。

msg: I will give you whatever guidance I can. And pray, for your success.
msg_zh: 我愿尽己所能、提出建言，请你们一定要成功。

msg: Oh, then you must be the one. Lady Ranni has explained everything.
msg_zh: 哦，就是你吧？菈妮大人和我提过了。

msg: The pleasure is mine. I am Iji.
msg_zh: 初次见面，你好。我叫伊吉。

msg: I take it you've heard of the Eternal City of Nokstella?
msg_zh: ……你听过“永恒之城”诺克史黛拉吗？

msg: Well, it has a twin, known as Nokron. The other Eternal City.
msg_zh: 那是和诺克隆恩成对存在的另一座永恒之城。

msg: After years of expeditions, we've determined the location of Nokron.
msg_zh: 经过我们长久以来的调查，已经知道诺克隆恩的所在地。

msg: By going underground through the well in the Mistwood of Limgrave, you can see Nokron up above.
msg_zh: 宁姆格福的雾林，从那地方的井下到地底之后，\n仰望就能看到诺克隆恩……

msg: Only, we've failed to find a path leading to the city.
msg_zh: 只是该如何前往，至今我们还找不到路。

msg: Blaidd's made a good go of it, but I'm afraid this has him quite stumped.
msg_zh: 布莱泽做了不少努力，目前就在这一步遇到瓶颈。

msg: To be honest, I'm not sure where to go from here...
msg_zh: ……嗯，该用什么办法……

msg: Blaidd is Lady Ranni's stepbrother.
msg_zh: 布莱泽是菈妮大人结拜而来的弟弟。

msg: Ranni's mother, Queen Rennala, approved of him, and they played like siblings from childhood.
msg_zh: 大人的母亲，蕾娜菈大人对此表示赞同。\n在他们还年幼的时候，看起来真的有如亲姊弟。

msg: They were always happy to have me tag along, as well.
msg_zh: 我也时常陪着他们两位玩耍。

msg: When Lady Ranni renounced her flesh, and chose the dark path of the Empyrean,
msg_zh: 当菈妮大人选择抛弃身体，\n决心走上神人的黑暗道路，

msg: Blaidd and I swore allegiance as vassals,
msg_zh: 我和布莱泽都选择成为臣子，侍奉菈妮大人。

msg: but none of us will ever forget our earliest days together.
msg_zh: ……但那段孩提时期度过的时光，肯定所有人都记得。

msg: Promise to look after Blaidd for me, will you?
msg_zh: 布莱泽就麻烦你关照了。

msg: The man is honest to a fault. But fortunately, now he has you.
msg_zh: 他从小性格就一板一眼，很需要像你这样的搭档。

msg: Jerren. Now, that's a name I haven't heard for a while.
msg_zh: ……杰廉啊，让人怀念的名字。

msg: Before taking up the banner of General Radahn, he was a guest of the Carian royal family.
msg_zh: 在他加入拉塔恩将军旗下以前，\n曾在卡利亚王室作客。

msg: An expert swordsman, to be sure, but ever the eccentric.
msg_zh: ……杰廉是一名身手不凡的剑士，但为人也颇为奇特。

msg: No surprise he'd get wrapped up in some festival.
msg_zh: 竟然想举办祭典，很像他的作风……

msg: Oh, no, wait...
msg_zh: ……不对，等一下……

msg: How did I not see it before!
msg_zh: ……啊啊，是这么一回事吗！

msg: I ought to retire as war counsellor for such a gross oversight!
msg_zh: 我伊吉身为军师，竟然没有读出这一步！

msg: Let me explain. The fate of the Carian royal family is guided by the stars.
msg_zh: 请你仔细听好了：\n卡利亚王室的命运是随着星星而动。

msg: As is the fate of Lady Ranni, first heir in the Carian royal line.
msg_zh: 所以身为卡利亚王室的正统公主──\n菈妮大人的命运也同样不例外。

msg: But General Radahn is the conqueror of the stars.
msg_zh: 再加上，拉塔恩将军是“碎星”英雄──

msg: Who stood up to the swirling constellations, halting their movement in a smashing victory.
msg_zh: 在过去，他打碎了星星流转的定律，\n从此星星受到封印、不再转动……

msg: And so, if General Radahn were defeated, the stars would once again resume their movement.
msg_zh: 既然如此，在拉塔恩将军死亡之际，\n星星就会再一次转动。

msg: As would Lady Ranni's destiny.
msg_zh: 连带着，菈妮大人的命运肯定也会开始转动。

msg: Perhaps, even, revealing the elusive path. That leads to Nokron.
msg_zh: 这么一来，也许会出现──\n那前往诺克隆恩的道路。

msg: My apologies for the misleading words of warning.
msg_zh: ……看来我先前的忠告，警告错了人。

msg: I never imagined that an audience, let alone service to Lady Ranni was in your fate.
msg_zh: 没想到你有着觐见、侍奉菈妮大人的命运，

msg: I, for one, should have seen it, but I did not.
msg_zh: 只能说我有眼无珠。

msg: Do forgive me, my fellow.
msg_zh: 这件事请你见谅。

msg: Let us give all that we can of ourselves.
msg_zh: 然后，今后再请你多多关照了，

msg: Together, for Lady Ranni.
msg_zh: 一起为了菈妮大人奋斗吧。

msg: Let us give all that we can of ourselves.
msg_zh: 今后再请你多多关照了，

msg: Together, for Lady Ranni.
msg_zh: 一起为了菈妮大人奋斗吧。

msg: Let us give all that we can of ourselves.
msg_zh: 今后再请你多多关照了，

msg: Together, for Lady Ranni.
msg_zh: 一起为了菈妮大人奋斗吧。

msg: Well, my fellow. How may I serve you?
msg_zh: 哦，欢迎你来。

msg: As war counsellor, or as blacksmith?
msg_zh: 这次来是要找铁匠锻造，\n还是想找军师谈一谈？

msg: Greetings, my fellow. How can I help?
msg_zh: 哦，欢迎你来。有什么事吗？

msg: Something else for you?
msg_zh: ……还有事情没有做吗？

msg: Go with Blaidd to the festival grounds.
msg_zh: ……请你和布莱泽一起前往祭典的举办地。

msg: Should General Radahn be defeated, the stars would once again resume their movement.
msg_zh: 在拉塔恩将军死亡之际，星星也会再一次转动。

msg: Perhaps revealing the elusive path to Nokron.
msg_zh: 那前往诺克隆恩的道路，说不定会出现。

msg: Ah, you've finally come. Blaidd told me everything.
msg_zh: 哦，等你很久了。我有收到布莱泽的报告──

msg: You've defeated General Radahn, unlocking the stars.
msg_zh: 你打倒了拉塔恩将军，解开星星的封印。

msg: The General was blighted by scarlet rot and driven to madness,but not long ago he was hailed as the mightiest demigod of them all.
msg_zh: 即使受到猩红腐败侵蚀，陷入疯狂，\n将军仍是被誉为最强半神的英雄。

msg: There is no parallel to your achievement. Nor to Lady Ranni's acute judgement of character.
msg_zh: 你的战果肯定无人出其右。\n菈妮大人真是慧眼独具，深感佩服。

msg: Thanks to you, Lady Ranni's fate once again stirs, and the path to Nokron has opened.
msg_zh: 幸亏有你，菈妮大人的命运已经开始转动，\n而且通往诺克隆恩的道路已经出现。

msg: Descend underground where the fallen star struck Limgrave.
msg_zh: 请你前往宁姆格福，\n从星星坠落的地方前往地底──

msg: And make it yours. The precious treasure of Nokron.
msg_zh: 把珍藏在诺克隆恩的宝藏拿到手。

msg: Oh, Blaidd wanted me to tell you.
msg_zh: ……啊，还有，布莱泽有留话给你。

msg: Not to bother waiting for him, and head straight to Nokron.
msg_zh: 他要你不必等他，先出发前往诺克隆恩。

msg: Blaidd has been given an important task.
msg_zh: ……布莱泽还有其他重要的任务在身，

msg: Apparently, a matter of great urgency.
msg_zh: 似乎是颇为紧急的任务。

msg: You need not await Blaidd.
msg_zh: 不必等待布莱泽。

msg: Descend underground alone where the fallen star struck Limgrave.
msg_zh: 请先出发前往宁姆格福，\n从星星坠落的地方前往地底，

msg: And make it yours. The precious treasure of Nokron.
msg_zh: 再把珍藏在诺克隆恩的宝藏拿到手吧。

msg: So that Lady Ranni may tread the dark path of the Empyrean.
msg_zh: ……这是为了让菈妮大人走上神人的黑暗道路。

msg: Now the festival is over, and General Radahn is defeated...
msg_zh: ……祭典结束，拉塔恩将军被打败之后，

msg: Jerren's duties are finally fulfilled.
msg_zh: 杰廉总算是尽了他的责任。

msg: Though we served different masters, I could see he was truly adept in his role.
msg_zh: 即使侍奉的主人不同，我还是对他深感敬佩。

msg: Now the time has come to remind him of an old promise made.
msg_zh: ……不过也是时候提醒他，关于以前的约定。

msg: With the stars of fate set into motion, a certain sorceress is dispossessed of her immortality...
msg_zh: 在星星的命运开始转动之后，\n那个女魔法师就不再“不死”。

msg: Finally, we can be rid of a longstanding Carian weed...
msg_zh: 总算有办法刨除卡利亚的祸根……

msg: Jerren. Now, that's a name I haven't heard for a while.
msg_zh: ……杰廉啊，让人怀念的名字。

msg: Before taking up the banner of General Radahn, he was a guest of the Carian royal family.
msg_zh: 在他加入拉塔恩将军旗下以前，\n曾在卡利亚王室作客。

msg: An expert swordsman, to be sure, but ever the eccentric.
msg_zh: ……杰廉是一名身手不凡的剑士，但为人也颇为奇特。

msg: It's funny how things happen.
msg_zh: 只是这事说也奇妙。

msg: Jerren and I parted ways long, long ago, yet here he is, playing his part in Lady Ranni's fate.
msg_zh: 我们与杰廉分道扬镳已久，\n万万没想到他会和菈妮大人的命运相关。

msg: I'm afraid I never saw it coming. And I thought myself a capable war counsellor...
msg_zh: 我伊吉身为军师，却没能读出那一步，实在遗憾。

msg: I presume you've spoken with Blaidd?
msg_zh: ……你见到布莱泽了吗？

msg: Very well. There is something you should know.
msg_zh: ……好吧，我告诉你详情。

msg: The Two Fingers gave Blaidd to Lady Ranni, as a faithful follower. Her very shadow, incapable of treachery.
msg_zh: 布莱泽是双指赐予菈妮大人的侍者，\n是绝对不会背叛的，菈妮大人的影子。

msg: But if Lady Ranni, as an Empyrean, resists being an instrument of the Two Fingers,
msg_zh: 但是当菈妮大人作为神人，\n拒绝成为受双指摆布的傀儡，从那一刻起……

msg: the shadow will go mad, transforming from a follower into a horrid curse.
msg_zh: 影子就会发狂。\n这对菈妮大人而言，是恐怖的诅咒。

msg: But such is his destiny. In such matters, Blaidd's own thoughts hold no weight.
msg_zh: ……这是注定好的事，\n布莱泽本身的意志无从介入。

msg: It pains me so, but he must be neutralised. For Lady Ranni's sake.
msg_zh: 做这种事很不好受，\n但为了菈妮大人，我也只能封印他了。

msg: Unthinkable, how could Blaidd...
msg_zh: ……怎么会，布莱泽……

msg: How did he break free from his cell?
msg_zh: 他是怎么逃出那座封印监牢……

msg: No, more importantly...
msg_zh: 不，比起这件事……

msg: Blaidd became a curse that plagued Lady Ranni, yet even in madness, gave himself to her.
msg_zh: 即使受到诅咒而发狂，\n还是为了菈妮大人鞠躬尽瘁……

msg: I've made a grave misjudgment. And I thought myself a capable war counsellor...
msg_zh: 我军师伊吉，真是天大的失算……

msg: I'll catch up with you soon enough, Blaidd.
msg_zh: ……能见到面的日子也渐渐近了，

msg: When I do, I only hope you'll accept my apology.
msg_zh: 到时候再让我好好道歉吧，布莱泽啊……

msg: Oh, so you were the one. Lady Ranni has explained everything.
msg_zh: 哦，你过来了。菈妮大人和我提过了。

msg: You've defeated General Radahn, unlocking the stars.
msg_zh: 你打倒了拉塔恩将军，解开星星的封印。

msg: A grand reward, justly procured by any measure.
msg_zh: ……真的该说战果丰硕。

msg: Again, I am Iji.
msg_zh: 容我再自报名号，我叫伊吉。

msg: The Carian royal family's dedicated blacksmith, and Lady Ranni's war counsellor.
msg_zh: 是侍奉卡利亚王室的铁匠，也是菈妮大人的军师。

msg: I welcome one of your calibre. A fellow champion in service of Lady Ranni.
msg_zh: 我们很欢迎勇士加入，成为同志。\n一起为了菈妮大人奋斗吧。

msg: Thanks to you, Lady Ranni's fate once again stirs, and the path to Nokron has opened.
msg_zh: 幸亏有你，菈妮大人的命运已经开始转动，\n而且通往诺克隆恩的道路已经出现。

msg: Descend underground where the fallen star struck Limgrave.
msg_zh: 请你前往宁姆格福，\n从星星坠落的地方前往地底──

msg: And make it yours. The precious treasure of Nokron.
msg_zh: 把珍藏在诺克隆恩的宝藏拿到手。

msg: So that Lady Ranni may tread the dark path of the Empyrean.
msg_zh: ……这是为了让菈妮大人走上神人的黑暗道路。

msg: Oh, so you must be the one. Lady Ranni has explained everything.
msg_zh: 哦，就是你吧？菈妮大人和我提过了。

msg: You've defeated General Radahn, unlocking the stars.
msg_zh: 你打倒了拉塔恩将军，解开星星的封印。

msg: A grand reward, justly procured by any measure.
msg_zh: ……真的该说战果丰硕。

msg: The pleasure is mine. I am Iji.
msg_zh: 初次见面，你好。我叫伊吉。

msg: The Carian royal family's dedicated blacksmith, and Lady Ranni's war counsellor.
msg_zh: 是侍奉卡利亚王室的铁匠，也是菈妮大人的军师。

msg: I welcome one of your calibre. A fellow champion in service of Lady Ranni.
msg_zh: 我们很欢迎勇士加入，成为同志。\n一起为了菈妮大人奋斗吧。

msg: Oh, there you are. Good of you to drop by.
msg_zh: 哦，欢迎你来。

msg: Have you heard? Lady Ranni has departed on her journey.
msg_zh: 你已经知道了吗？\n菈妮大人总算出发旅行了。

msg: Along the dark path of the Empyrean, from Renna's Rise, as she calls it.
msg_zh: 她前往了那座名叫“蕾娜”的塔，\n走上神人的黑暗道路。

msg: It would not have been possible without you.
msg_zh: ……一切幸亏有你帮忙。

msg: As Lady Ranni's war counsellor, and moreover, her childhood warden, I express my deepest gratitude.
msg_zh: 作为菈妮大人的军师，不对，\n应该说作为从小照顾她的老随从，容我致上最深的谢意。

msg: You, and only you, were Lady Ranni's true champion.
msg_zh: 你是菈妮大人货真价实的英雄。

msg: My purpose is nearing its end.
msg_zh: ……我的职责就要结束。

msg: I've served Lady Ranni for as long as I can remember...
msg_zh: 我伊吉长年侍奉菈妮大人，不曾间断……

msg: It has been a long and wondrous journey.
msg_zh: 这是一段漫长，却很圆满的旅程。

msg: Now Lady Ranni is in your hands.
msg_zh: 菈妮大人就拜托你了。

msg: I pray that you serve her well, unto the very end.
msg_zh: 请你一定要侍奉她，直到最后一刻。

msg: Well, what's this?
msg_zh: 哦，这是……

msg: Are you certain? This is a fine reserve.
msg_zh: 这东西很稀罕，我真的能收下？

msg: Perhaps you knew that Old Iji appreciates a good drink.
msg_zh: ……那我不客气了。

msg: I'll save it for a quiet moment, that I might truly savour it.
msg_zh: 之后再找时间，好好品味。

msg: Lady Ranni has departed on her journey.
msg_zh: 菈妮大人出发旅行了。

msg: Along the dark path of the Empyrean, from Renna's Rise, as she calls it.
msg_zh: 她前往了那座名叫“蕾娜”的塔，\n走上神人的黑暗道路。

msg: Now Lady Ranni is in your hands.
msg_zh: 菈妮大人就拜托你了。

msg: I pray that you serve her well, unto the very end.
msg_zh: 请你一定要侍奉她，直到最后一刻。

msg: <sleeping>
Ngh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: Enough of that, Tarnished.
msg_zh: 这位褪色者，住手吧。

msg: There is no fight without a foe.
msg_zh: 逞匹夫之勇没有任何意义。

msg: If that's the cloth you're cut from,
msg_zh: ……一介无聊之辈。

msg: don't ever show your face again.
msg_zh: 我们不会再见面了──

msg: Not to me. And not to my liege.
msg_zh: 你不会再见到我，还有我的主人。

msg: Not to me. And not to my liege.
msg_zh: 你不会再见到我，还有我的主人。

msg: How could I have missed this...
msg_zh: ……我竟然没能读懂。

msg: I have failed you...
msg_zh: 我伊吉，竟然……

msg: Lady... Ranni...
msg_zh: 菈妮大人……

msg: Agh.
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: Cease this treachery at once.
msg_zh: 想反悔的话，劝你趁早回头。

msg: Lady Ranni will be devastated.
msg_zh: 变成叛徒，只会让菈妮大人伤心。

msg: This is a true shame.
msg_zh: ……非常遗憾。

msg: Don't ever show your face again.
msg_zh: 我们不会再见面了──

msg: Not to me. And not to my liege.
msg_zh: 你不会再见到我，还有我的主人。

msg: Lady Ranni has seen enough.
msg_zh: 别让菈妮大人见到你。

msg: Go as you must, Lady Ranni...
msg_zh: ……菈妮大人，请您继续迈进。

msg: Along the path of darkness...
msg_zh: 继续在那黑暗道路……

msg: Hallo coz, what are you doing here?
msg_zh: ……大哥哥，你为什么在这里呢？

msg: Hallo coz, what are you doing here?
msg_zh: ……大姐姐，你为什么在这里呢？

msg: I didn't think anyone knew about this place, 'cept us jars.
msg_zh: 这里是只有壶知道，\n不可以让其他人知道的地方耶。

msg: Oh! Are you going to be the new Potentate?
msg_zh: 啊，我知道了。\n你是不是想当我们的维壶师？

msg: Gosh, truly? That's wonderful news!
msg_zh: 咦，真的是吗？好开心喔。

msg: It's not easy being Potentate, though.
msg_zh: 可是维壶师很难当耶。

msg: I know, show me your hands.
msg_zh: 对了，让我看看你的手吧。

msg: It's just a little test, coz, to see if you've got the right stuff.
msg_zh: 我来看看大哥哥适不适合当维壶师。

msg: It's just a little test, coz, to see if you've got the right stuff.
msg_zh: 我来看看大姐姐适不适合当维壶师。

msg: Hmm.
Your skin isn't so smooth, is it...
msg_zh: 好像没有滑滑的耶。

msg: You need slick, slidey hands to be Potentate, you know.
msg_zh: 维壶师的手一定要滑滑的。

msg: I'm sorry coz, but I don't think you've got what it takes...
msg_zh: 我觉得大哥哥没有办法当我们的维壶师耶……

msg: I'm sorry coz, but I don't think you've got what it takes...
msg_zh: 我觉得大姐姐没有办法当我们的维壶师耶……

msg: What a shame...
msg_zh: 真的好可惜……

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大哥哥，你来了啊。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大姐姐，你来了啊。

msg: I'm happy you came back.
msg_zh: 又可以跟你聊天了，好开心喔！

msg: I have good tidings for you, coz.
msg_zh: 就是啊，今天有一件好消息要告诉大哥哥喔。

msg: I have good tidings for you, coz.
msg_zh: 就是啊，今天有一件好消息要告诉大姐姐喔。

msg: I have good tidings for you, coz.
msg_zh: 就是啊，今天有一件好消息要告诉大姐姐喔。

msg: Have you noticed the rare flowers growing in this village?
msg_zh: 村子里面不是有开很稀有的花吗？

msg: I asked the villagers if you could pick some of them.
msg_zh: 我问大家说，能不能让大哥哥摘花啊，

msg: I asked the villagers if you could pick some of them.
msg_zh: 我问大家说，能不能让大哥哥摘花啊，

msg: I asked the villagers if you could pick some of them.
msg_zh: 我问大家说，能不能让大姐姐摘花啊，

msg: And they said you'd be very welcome!
msg_zh: 结果大家说可以耶！

msg: The flowers we have now are nice, but it's a bit boring having the same ones all the time.
msg_zh: 现在的花很漂亮，但一直种同一种花，\n我觉得有点无聊……

msg: I think everyone would be glad of a change, actually...
msg_zh: 如果有不一样的花，大家一定会很开心。

msg: You know the huge vase, at the centre of our village?
msg_zh: 这个村子的正中央不是有一个壶吗？

msg: If you plant lovely flower seeds inside the big vase, coz...
msg_zh: 只要大哥哥把漂亮的花种子放进那个壶里，

msg: If you plant lovely flower seeds inside the big vase, coz...
msg_zh: 只要大姐姐把漂亮的花种子放进那个壶里，

msg: Those flowers will bloom all through the whole village!
msg_zh: 之后我们村子就会开很多那种花喔。

msg: Oh, well, I'm sorry.
msg_zh: ……什么嘛，你不是啊……

msg: Coz. You'll be our Potentate after all, then?
msg_zh: ……大哥哥啊，我还在猜，\n你是不是想当我们的维壶师？

msg: Coz. You'll be our Potentate after all, then?
msg_zh: ……大姐姐啊，我还在猜，\n你是不是想当我们的维壶师？

msg: Coz. You'll be our Potentate after all, then?
msg_zh: ……大姐姐啊，我还在猜，\n你是不是想当我们的维壶师？

msg: Don't look so glum, coz.
msg_zh: 大哥哥，你不要太难过喔。

msg: Don't look so glum, coz.
msg_zh: 大姐姐，你不要太难过喔。

msg: Don't look so glum, coz.
msg_zh: 大姐姐，你不要太难过喔。

msg: We can still chat, Potentate or not.
msg_zh: 没有办法当维壶师，但我们可以聊天啊。

msg: Come back and visit me, when you can.
msg_zh: 如果你愿意再来，我会很开心。

msg: Go on, coz, you really should pick some of our flowers.
msg_zh: 大哥哥愿意的话，摘一下村子的花嘛。

msg: Go on, coz, you really should pick some of our flowers.
msg_zh: 大姐姐愿意的话，摘一下村子的花嘛。

msg: Go on, coz, you really should pick some of our flowers.
msg_zh: 大姐姐愿意的话，摘一下村子的花嘛。

msg: Who knows, they might be of some use.
msg_zh: 希望那些花能派上用场。

msg: Oh, did you come to visit me again, coz?
msg_zh: 啊，大哥哥，你来了啊。

msg: Oh, did you come to visit me again, coz?
msg_zh: 啊，大姐姐，你来了啊。

msg: I'm happy you came back.
msg_zh: 又可以跟你聊天了，好开心喔！

msg: Can you tell me about the outside?
msg_zh: 告诉我外头的故事嘛。

msg: Oh first though, if you have some nice flower seeds,
msg_zh: 还有啊，如果你有漂亮的花种子，

msg: can you put them in the big vase in the middle of the village?
msg_zh: 可不可以放进村子正中央的大壶？

msg: I'm sure, when lots of them are in bloom,
msg_zh: 要是村子里开出很多漂亮的花，

msg: everyone will be so happy.
msg_zh: 大家一定会很开心。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大哥哥，你来了啊。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大姐姐，你来了啊。

msg: I'm happy you came back.
msg_zh: 又可以跟你聊天了，好开心喔！

msg: Can you tell me about the outside?
msg_zh: 告诉我外头的故事嘛。

msg: Oh, and you put seeds in the big vase, didn't you?
msg_zh: 对了，你把种子放进大壶里面了，对不对？

msg: Thanks, coz.
msg_zh: 谢谢你，大哥哥。

msg: Thanks, coz.
msg_zh: 谢谢你，大姐姐。

msg: I'm so excited to see what kind of flowers will blossom...
msg_zh: 会开出什么漂亮的花呢？好期待喔……

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大哥哥，你来了啊。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大姐姐，你来了啊。

msg: You put seeds in the big vase, didn't you?
msg_zh: ……你不是有把种子放进大壶吗？

msg: Such pretty flowers are blooming! Everyone's so happy.
msg_zh: 那些种子开出好漂亮的花喔！大家都好开心！

msg: I've never seen anything like it! I'd love to see more flowers from the outside, someday. Loads more!
msg_zh: 我第一次看到那种花。\n那是外面的花啊，以后我想看更多、更多。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大哥哥，你来了啊。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大姐姐，你来了啊。

msg: You put seeds in the big vase, didn't you?
msg_zh: ……你不是有把种子放进大壶吗？

msg: But...I don't really like those flowers.
msg_zh: 可是我好像不太喜欢那种花……

msg: I'm sorry coz, I know you brought the seeds from all that way away...
msg_zh: 对不起喔，大哥哥都特地拿来种子了……

msg: I'm sorry coz, I know you brought the seeds from all that way away...
msg_zh: 对不起喔，大姐姐都特地拿来种子了……

msg: But I'm a jar, and you're not. I s'pose we just see things differently.
msg_zh: 是因为我是壶，所以跟大哥哥的感觉不一样吗……？

msg: But I'm a jar, and you're not. I s'pose we just see things differently.
msg_zh: 是因为我是壶，所以跟大姐姐的感觉不一样吗……？

msg: Ah, hallo again.
msg_zh: 啊，你来了啊。

msg: Say, coz. Have you met Uncle Alexander?
msg_zh: 对了，大哥哥。\n你认识亚历山大叔叔吗？

msg: Say, coz. Have you met Uncle Alexander?
msg_zh: 对了，大姐姐。\n你认识亚历山大叔叔吗？

msg: He used to live here with us, but then he left, to be a champion.
msg_zh: 他以前住在村子里，\n为了要当上英雄，离开村子去旅行了。

msg: I asked to go with him, but he said \"The path of champions must be trod alone\".
msg_zh: 我求叔叔带我一起去，但是叔叔说：\n“战士是形单影只的存在”……

msg: So heroic, right? I miss him though.
msg_zh: 被拒绝有点难过，但是感觉好帅气喔。

msg: If you see him, you should ask him to teach you how to fight, coz.
msg_zh: 大哥哥如果有遇到亚历山大叔叔，\n可以找他学战斗喔！

msg: If you see him, you should ask him to teach you how to fight, coz.
msg_zh: 大姐姐如果有遇到亚历山大叔叔，\n可以找他学战斗喔！

msg: He's big and tough and strong!
msg_zh: 叔叔非常硬，所以很强喔！

msg: Uncle Alexander said he won't be back again.
msg_zh: ……可是叔叔不会再回来村子了。

msg: \"My home is of the past. And the past, as they say, is a different country.\"
msg_zh: 因为他说：“故乡是用来思念的，很遥远的存在”……

msg: I suppose that's part of being a warrior, isn't it.
msg_zh: 我听了之后有点难过，\n但也觉得，这就是所谓的战士吧。

msg: So...please don't tell anyone, coz, but...
msg_zh: ……还有啊，我偷偷跟你说喔。\n虽然我没有跟大家讲……

msg: So...please don't tell anyone, coz, but...
msg_zh: ……还有啊，我偷偷跟你说喔。\n虽然我没有跟大家讲……

msg: I'm actually a warrior jar as well! One day, I'll be just like Uncle Alexander.
msg_zh: 其实我是战士壶喔。\n总有一天，我想象亚历山大叔叔一样……

msg: And I'll have to leave the village to become a champion.
msg_zh: 离开村子出门旅行，当上英雄。

msg: Uncle Alexander won't come back here again.
msg_zh: ……亚历山大叔叔不会再回来村子了。

msg: \"My home is of the past. And the past, as they say, is a different country.\"
msg_zh: 因为他说：“故乡是用来思念的，很遥远的存在”……

msg: I suppose that's part of being a warrior, isn't it.
msg_zh: 我听了之后有点难过，\n但也觉得，这就是所谓的战士吧。

msg: Ah, hallo again.
msg_zh: 啊，你来了啊。

msg: Do you know what a poacher is, coz?
msg_zh: ……大哥哥，你知道盗猎者吗？

msg: Do you know what a poacher is, coz?
msg_zh: ……大姐姐，你知道盗猎者吗？

msg: They hunt us, smash us, and then take us away.
msg_zh: 那些人想找出我们、破坏我们，或是把我们带走。

msg: This village is kept secret, so I think we're safe here.
msg_zh: 因为这个村子没有让其他人知道，\n我觉得应该不用怕。

msg: But you should be careful if you ever meet one of them, coz.
msg_zh: 但是有这么坏的人，\n我想也要告诉大哥哥注意安全。

msg: But you should be careful if you ever meet one of them, coz.
msg_zh: 但是有这么坏的人，\n我想也要告诉大姐姐注意安全。

msg: I hope uncle Alexander beats them all up, first...
msg_zh: 要是亚历山大叔叔可以回来，教训他们就好了……

msg: Those awful poachers. I hope uncle Alexander beats them all up.
msg_zh: ……什么盗猎者嘛，\n要是亚历山大叔叔可以回来，教训他们就好了……

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大哥哥，你来了啊。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: 啊，大姐姐，你来了啊。

msg: Have you heard? A new Potentate's come to the village!
msg_zh: 你已经知道了吗？\n村子来了一个新的维壶师喔。

msg: I think he said his name was Diallos.
msg_zh: 那位先生好像叫狄亚罗斯吧？

msg: He seems a little down in the dumps, but his hands! As smooth as silk!
msg_zh: 虽然他的手滑滑的，但看起来好没有精神喔。

msg: I don't know, I'm a little disappointed actually.
msg_zh: ……其实我觉得有一点点可惜耶。

msg: Even though good sir Diallos has a wonderful suit of armour...
msg_zh: 狄亚罗斯先生穿着帅气的盔甲，

msg: He says he isn't a warrior.
msg_zh: 却说自己不是战士。

msg: And since he's a coward, he won't be fighting anymore.
msg_zh: 他说自己是胆小鬼，不会再挺身战斗。

msg: His smooth and silky hands feel nice when he pats us.
msg_zh: ……虽然他会用滑滑的手，温柔地摸我们，

msg: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
msg_zh: 但我觉得，还是像大哥哥这么强的人比较好。

msg: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
msg_zh: 但我觉得，还是像大姐姐这么强的人比较好。

msg: Diallos' smooth and silky hands feel nice when he pats us...
msg_zh: ……虽然狄亚罗斯先生会用滑滑的手，温柔地摸我们，

msg: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
msg_zh: 但我觉得，还是像大哥哥这么强的人比较好。

msg: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
msg_zh: 但我觉得，还是像大姐姐这么强的人比较好。

msg: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
msg_zh: 但我觉得，还是像大姐姐这么强的人比较好。

msg: O-oh! Coz!
msg_zh: ……啊，是大哥哥！

msg: O-oh! Coz!
msg_zh: ……啊，是大姐姐！

msg: I'm glad you came.
msg_zh: 你过来了啊。

msg: But we're fine now. Diallos fought the poacher.
msg_zh: 已经没事了喔，\n狄亚罗斯先生狠狠教训过盗猎者了。

msg: Though quite a lot of us got broken...
msg_zh: 只是村里的大家，好多都坏掉了……

msg: I won't cry though... I'm a warrior jar. A warrior.
msg_zh: ……我不会哭喔，因为我是战士壶。

msg: \"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood.\"
msg_zh: ……“霍斯劳以血代言”。

msg: That's the kind of warrior I want to be one day, coz.
msg_zh: 大哥哥，我一定要成为这种战士──

msg: That's the kind of warrior I want to be one day, coz.
msg_zh: 大姐姐，我一定要成为这种战士──

msg: Even if I'm scared, I'll still fight to protect everyone.
msg_zh: 即使是胆小鬼，也能保护大家的英雄。

msg: \"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood.\"
msg_zh: ……“霍斯劳以血代言”……

msg: That's the kind of warrior I'm going to be.
msg_zh: 我要成为这种战士，

msg: One who protects everybody.
msg_zh: 保护大家的英雄……

msg: Thanks for coming back, coz.
msg_zh: ……大哥哥，你来了啊。

msg: Thanks for coming back, coz.
msg_zh: ……大姐姐，你来了啊。

msg: I've been thinking. It's time for me to set out on a journey.
msg_zh: 我打算出门旅行了──

msg: As a warrior jar, upon the path of champions.
msg_zh: 开始战士壶为了当上英雄的旅行。

msg: Wow, coz, are these...
msg_zh: ……大哥哥，这个是……

msg: Wow, coz, are these...
msg_zh: ……大姐姐，这个是……

msg: Insides?
msg_zh: 这个是内容物吗？

msg: From Uncle Alexander?
msg_zh: 该不会是亚历山大叔叔的……

msg: Thank you, coz.
msg_zh: ……大哥哥，谢谢你。

msg: Thank you, coz.
msg_zh: ……大姐姐，谢谢你。

msg: I'm a warrior jar, so I need to be strong.
msg_zh: 是因为我是战士壶，一定要变强，

msg: I can really have them, right?
msg_zh: 所以你才给我的，对不对？

msg: I understand. I'll get strong.
msg_zh: 我知道了，我会变得更强。

msg: Strong enough I deserve to have Uncle's insides.
msg_zh: 强到配得上叔叔的内容物。

msg: I'm about to go on a journey.
msg_zh: ……我打算出门旅行了。

msg: As a warrior jar, in search of glory.
msg_zh: 开始战士壶为了当上英雄的旅行。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: ……大哥哥，你又来了啊。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: ……大姐姐，你又来了啊。

msg: Oh, hallo again, coz.
msg_zh: ……大姐姐，你又来了啊。

msg: No, I haven't changed my mind.
msg_zh: 嗯，我没有改变主意喔。

msg: I'll begin my journey once I'm ready to go.
msg_zh: 等我准备好了，就会出门旅行。

msg: As a warrior jar, in search of glory.
msg_zh: 开始战士壶为了当上英雄的旅行。

msg: I'll begin my journey once I'm ready to go.
msg_zh: ……等我准备好了，就会出门旅行。

msg: As a warrior jar, in search of glory.
msg_zh: 开始战士壶为了当上英雄的旅行。

msg: I don't think I'll see you again, when I set out.
msg_zh: ……在出发之后，一定不会再见到面了吧。

msg: Warriors are supposed to work alone.
msg_zh: 因为“战士是形单影只的存在”嘛。

msg: Goodbye, coz.
msg_zh: 大哥哥，永别了。

msg: Goodbye, coz.
msg_zh: 大姐姐，永别了。

msg: And thanks for everything.
msg_zh: 好多事情都受你帮忙，谢谢。

msg: I'll never forget you, coz.
msg_zh: 我一定不会忘记大哥哥。

msg: I'll never forget you, coz.
msg_zh: 我一定不会忘记大姐姐。

msg: I'll never forget you, coz.
msg_zh: 我一定不会忘记大哥哥。

msg: I'll never forget you, coz.
msg_zh: 我一定不会忘记大姐姐。

msg: I'll never forget you, coz.
msg_zh: 我一定不会忘记大姐姐。

msg: Coz...
msg_zh: ……大哥哥。

msg: Coz...
msg_zh: ……大姐姐。

msg: Coz...
msg_zh: ……大姐姐。

msg: Tell me a story... About the big, wide world...
msg_zh: 告诉我外头的故事嘛……

msg: Uncle Alexander, look!
msg_zh: ……叔叔，你看喔。

msg: It's me! I'm a warrior jar too!
msg_zh: 你看，我也是战士壶喔……

msg: Stop, no...
msg_zh: ……不要、不要这样……

msg: Please, no, don't break us...
msg_zh: 为什么要打破我们……

msg: They're wonderful, Diallos.
msg_zh: ……狄亚罗斯先生，你好厉害喔。

msg: So smooth, and silky...
msg_zh: 真的好滑、好滑喔……

msg: The tale of House Hoslow...
msg_zh: ……霍斯劳……

msg: ...is told in blood...
msg_zh: 以血、代言……

msg: Oh?
msg_zh: 好痛。

msg: What's the matter, coz?
msg_zh: 大哥哥，你怎么了？

msg: What's the matter, coz?
msg_zh: 大姐姐，你怎么了？

msg: What's the matter, coz?
msg_zh: 大姐姐，你怎么了？

msg: Don't be such a nasty brute.
msg_zh: 不要那么暴力啦。

msg: Is this who you are, coz?
msg_zh: ……原来大哥哥是这种人。

msg: Is this who you are, coz?
msg_zh: ……原来大姐姐是这种人。

msg: Is this who you are, coz?
msg_zh: ……原来大姐姐是这种人。

msg: You've cracked my heart.
msg_zh: 我好伤心。

msg: Please, don't crack the others...
msg_zh: 求求你，不要打破大家……

msg: You were a poacher, all along.
msg_zh: ……原来大哥哥是盗猎者。

msg: You were a poacher, all along.
msg_zh: ……原来大姐姐是盗猎者。

msg: You were a poacher, all along.
msg_zh: ……原来大姐姐是盗猎者。

msg: You've cracked my heart.
msg_zh: 我好伤心。

msg: Please, don't crack the others...
msg_zh: 求求你，不要打破大家……

msg: So, you were a poacher, too.
msg_zh: ……原来大哥哥也是盗猎者。

msg: So, you were a poacher, too.
msg_zh: ……原来大姐姐也是盗猎者。

msg: So, you were a poacher, too.
msg_zh: ……原来大姐姐也是盗猎者。

msg: But the tale of house Hoslow is told in blood.
msg_zh: 但是“霍斯劳以血代言”──

msg: I'll find you, one day, coz...
msg_zh: 所以总有一天，我会对大哥哥……

msg: I'll find you, one day, coz...
msg_zh: 所以总有一天，我会对大姐姐……

msg: I'll find you, one day, coz...
msg_zh: 所以总有一天，我会对大姐姐……

msg: Sister... Where did you go?
msg_zh: ……姐姐，你到哪里去了？

msg: You promised me. When we turned 14, we'd go to see the stars...
msg_zh: 我们不是约好了吗？\n等到１４岁了，就要一起去看星星。

msg: I've been waiting ever so long. Forever and ever, it seems.
msg_zh: 我一直在等喔，已经等了好久、好久了……

msg: Ahh, dear sister, you're finally here.
msg_zh: 啊，你终于来了，姐姐。

msg: No time to waste. Let's see the stars.
msg_zh: 快点，我们走吧，一起去看星星嘛。

msg: Foul Tarnished, what do you want?
msg_zh: ……褪色者，你来做什么？

msg: I told the all-hearing brute.
msg_zh: 我也告诉过百耳男了，

msg: That I possess no such medallion.
msg_zh: 我没有符节。

msg: Or have you come to take more from me?
msg_zh: 难道你们还不知足？

msg: Was my other half not enough?
msg_zh: 都夺走我的伙伴了，还不够吗？

msg: I told the bastard in the bone armour.
msg_zh: 我也告诉过骨盔男了，

msg: I told the all-hearing brute already.
msg_zh: ……我告诉过百耳男了，

msg: That I possess no such medallion.
msg_zh: 我没有符节。

msg: Or have you come to take more from me?
msg_zh: 难道你们还不知足？

msg: Was my other half not enough?
msg_zh: 都夺走我的伙伴了，还不够吗？

msg: I told the bastard in bone armour already.
msg_zh: ……我告诉过骨盔男了，

msg: Oh...do you speak true?
msg_zh: ……是这样吗？

msg: So old Albus entrusted his medallion to you.
msg_zh: 艾尔帕斯老先生把符节交给你保管了。

msg: Then I've no choice. But to trust that this was his dying will.
msg_zh: ……既然是他的遗愿，我也愿意相信你。

msg: Let's try again. I'm Latenna. An Albinauric, the same as Old Albus.
msg_zh: 我的名字是勒缇娜，\n和艾尔帕斯老先生一样，是白金之子。

msg: My apologies for my coarse words earlier.
msg_zh: 刚才对你不太礼貌，请见谅。

msg: I presumed the worst, seeing that you were another Tarnished, like that all-hearing brute.
msg_zh: 只因为一样是褪色者，\n就擅自认定你和百耳男是一丘之貉……

msg: I hope that you will forgive me.
msg_zh: 抱歉。

msg: I presumed the worst, seeing that you were another Tarnished, like the bastard before.
msg_zh: 只因为一样是褪色者，\n就擅自认定你和那个男人是一丘之貉……

msg: Mm, the medallion is better off in your hands, anyway.
msg_zh: 嗯，那符节该由你继续保管。

msg: Would you consider doing me a great service?
msg_zh: 只是，你能听听我的请求吗？

msg: I must go back.
msg_zh: ……我必须回去。

msg: There is something that I must do, even if I must say farewell to my wolf, Lobo.
msg_zh: 即使和我的狼，罗伯死别了，\n我还是必须完成使命。

msg: Will you show me the way? To the land of Miquella's Haligtree.
msg_zh: 你能带我回到米凯拉大人的圣树吗？

msg: If you accept, I would gladly apprise you.
msg_zh: 只要你答应我的请求，

msg: Of the whereabouts of the medallion's other half.
msg_zh: 我愿意告诉你另一个符节的所在地。

msg: Thank you kindly.
msg_zh: ……谢谢。

msg: They say the other half of the medallion is beyond the forbidden lands north of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 我听说另一个符节\n在黄金树的北方，必须深入禁域──

msg: In Castle Sol, on the Mountaintops of the Giants, accessible by the Grand Lift of Rold.
msg_zh: 就在索尔城。用洛德大升降机向上移动，\n那座城就在巨人山顶。

msg: Then I suppose it's time.
msg_zh: ……时候到了。

msg: Farewell, Lobo. My faithful wolf, my better half.
msg_zh: 罗伯，该道别了。\n我的狼，忠心不二的伙伴啊。

msg: I will go with the Tarnished. So that our journey will not have been in vain.
msg_zh: 为了不白费我们过去的努力，\n接下来，我要和这位褪色者同行。

msg: Forgive me, Lobo.
msg_zh: 所以原谅我吧，罗伯。

msg: Call upon me when needed.
msg_zh: ……需要时，随时呼唤我。

msg: And I will fight at your side.
msg_zh: 我愿意为你而战。

msg: Well...
msg_zh: ……这样啊。

msg: I understand. You must have your own duty to fulfil.
msg_zh: 我知道了，毕竟你也有要完成的使命。

msg: But please, allow me to say my piece.
msg_zh: 不过，我还是透露一些资讯给你。

msg: Even if you cannot take me, old Albus wished I relay to you the following:
msg_zh: 即使你无法答应我的要求，\n我也不能忽视艾尔帕斯老先生的遗愿。

msg: The other half of the medallion can be found beyond the forbidden lands north of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……我听说另一个符节\n在黄金树的北方，必须深入禁域──

msg: In Castle Sol, on the Mountaintops of the Giants, accessible by the Grand Lift of Rold.
msg_zh: 就在索尔城。用洛德大升降机向上移动，\n那座城就在巨人山顶。

msg: If you seek the other half of the medallion, they say it's beyond the forbidden lands north of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……我听说另一个符节\n在黄金树的北方，必须深入禁域──

msg: In Castle Sol, on the Mountaintops of the Giants, accessible by the Grand Lift of Rold.
msg_zh: 就在索尔城。用洛德大升降机向上移动，\n那座城就在巨人山顶。

msg: My thanks...
msg_zh: ……谢谢。

msg: You'll lead me then, to the land of Miquella's Haligtree.
msg_zh: 谢谢你愿意带我回到米凯拉大人的圣树。

msg: Farewell, Lobo. My faithful wolf, my better half.
msg_zh: 罗伯，该道别了。\n我的狼，忠心不二的伙伴啊。

msg: I will go with the Tarnished. So that our journey will not have been in vain.
msg_zh: 为了不白费我们过去的努力，\n接下来，我要和这位褪色者同行。

msg: Forgive me, Lobo.
msg_zh: 所以原谅我吧，罗伯。

msg: Do you hear me? It is I, Latenna.
msg_zh: ……能打扰你一下吗？

msg: We're almost there. Castle Sol lies just off to the north,
msg_zh: 索尔城就在附近，从这里往北走一段路的地方。

msg: where the other medallion is housed. It will grant passage to the land of the Haligtree.
msg_zh: 通往圣树所需的另一个符节，应该能在那里找到。

msg: Castle Sol lies just off to the north,
msg_zh: 索尔城就在从这里往北走一段路的地方。

msg: where the other medallion is housed. It will grant passage to the land of the Haligtree.
msg_zh: 通往圣树所需的另一个符节，应该能在那里找到。

msg: Oh young yet towering sister of ours.
msg_zh: 来，庞大的妹妹啊。

msg: Let the birthing droplet in.
msg_zh: 接受初始泪滴吧。

msg: And create life. For us. For all the Albinaurics.
msg_zh: 为了我们白金之子，萌发生命吧。

msg: Thank you.
msg_zh: ……谢谢你。

msg: I've finally fulfilled my purpose.
msg_zh: 我终于完成使命了。

msg: Our young yet towering sister will give us hope.
msg_zh: 我们那身形庞大的妹妹，肯定会成为希望。

msg: Now that nothing is left unfinished,
msg_zh: 我心中已无罣碍。

msg: I will join you in battle to the bitter end.
msg_zh: 让我和你战斗到最后一刻吧。

msg: And when the fighting is done,
msg_zh: ……然后，等到战争结束后，

msg: then you may lay me to rest. Beside Lobo, my dear wolf.
msg_zh: 能把我葬在我的狼，罗伯身边吗？

msg: Do you hear me? It is I, Latenna.
msg_zh: ……能打扰你一下吗？

msg: We have reached the land of Miquella's Haligtree, where Lobo and I began our travels.
msg_zh: 这里是米凯拉大人的圣树所在地，\n也是我和罗伯旅行的起点。

msg: It's entirely thanks to you that I'm so close to home.
msg_zh: 幸亏有你帮忙，我终于回到这里。

msg: These great snow-laden lands stretch far to the north.
msg_zh: 在这片雪白大地往北一直走，

msg: And beyond the ancient bowers, and the liturgical town of Ordina,
msg_zh: 经过几棵古代树、“仪典镇”奥缇那之后，继续往前，

msg: lies the place to which I must return.
msg_zh: 那里有我想回去的地方。

msg: We have reached the land of Miquella's Haligtree.
msg_zh: 这里是米凯拉大人的圣树所在地。

msg: These great snow-laden lands stretch far to the north.
msg_zh: 在这片雪白大地往北一直走，

msg: And beyond the ancient bowers, and the liturgical town of Ordina,
msg_zh: 经过几棵古代树、“仪典镇”奥缇那之后，继续往前，

msg: lies the place to which I must return.
msg_zh: 那里有我想回去的地方。

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: Stop, now.
msg_zh: 快住手吧。

msg: And I'll consider that a simple mishap.
msg_zh: 现在还能一笑置之。

msg: Are all you Tarnished the same?
msg_zh: 褪色者全都是一丘之貉……

msg: Was taking my other half not enough for you?
msg_zh: 都夺走我的伙伴了，你们还不知足吗！

msg: There is no meaning in a fight, lest it serve a greater duty.
msg_zh: ……与使命无关的战斗，毫无意义。

msg: Ohh...Phillia
msg_zh: ……啊，菲莉亚……

msg: Take...the birthing...droplet...
msg_zh: 你的、初始泪滴……

msg: Brave Tarnished, welcome to the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，欢迎来到火山官邸。

msg: I am Tanith, the proprietress of this house.
msg_zh: 我名为塔妮丝，是这座官邸的主人。

msg: Rya spoke well of you.
msg_zh: 菈雅曾提过你，

msg: \"A warrior of promise,\" I believe she said.
msg_zh: 听说你是大有可为的人才。

msg: Perhaps you are prepared to make a commitment.
msg_zh: 那么请容我一问，再次确认你的意愿：

msg: Will you join us here at the Volcano Manor, and resist the tide?
msg_zh: 你愿意加入火山官邸，与我们并肩而战吗？

msg: Why accept the burden of their grace, or be fooled by the dogmatic ramblings of the Fingers?
msg_zh: 赐福的指引，指头的傲慢空话──\n那强加的一切，我们不打算遵从……

msg: Rise with us, against the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 我们要对黄金树举剑相向。

msg: Interesting. Your decision is most welcome.
msg_zh: 谢谢你给出肯定的回复。

msg: Now you belong to the Volcano Manor family.
msg_zh: 如此一来，你就是火山官邸的一员。

msg: The drawing room lies down the hall. Make yourself comfortable.
msg_zh: 走廊的尽头有间客房供你使用，请当作自己家。

msg: But be sure to earn your keep.
msg_zh: ……接下来要请你多关照了。

msg: Well. That is unfortunate.
msg_zh: ……这样啊，真遗憾。

msg: Rya will be disappointed, but I won't twist your arm.
msg_zh: 菈雅听到肯定会很难受，虽然这也是无可奈何。

msg: Now, time for you to leave, I should think.
msg_zh: ……请离开这座官邸，

msg: Let this intersection of our paths be the last.
msg_zh: 我们彼此是走在平行线上。

msg: Aren't you precocious.
msg_zh: 哦，你是……

msg: We rarely receive visitors to the Volcano Manor without invitation.
msg_zh: 竟然自行前来我们火山官邸，真是稀客。

msg: Fascinating. And not unlike another guest we had long ago…
msg_zh: ……有趣。回想起来，那人也是如此……

msg: So, Tarnished, have you ever harboured doubts?
msg_zh: 我说，你身为褪色者，难道不曾怀疑？

msg: About the burden of grace, and the dogmatic ramblings of the Fingers?
msg_zh: 赐福的指引，指头的傲慢空话──\n那强加的一切，你认为理所当然？

msg: If you have, why not join the Volcano Manor, and fight with us?
msg_zh: 既然心存疑念，何不加入火山官邸，一起并肩战斗？

msg: Rise with us, against the Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……一同对黄金树举剑相向。

msg: Your decision is most welcome.
msg_zh: 谢谢你给出肯定的回复。

msg: Now you belong to the Volcano Manor family.
msg_zh: 如此一来，你就是火山官邸的一员。

msg: The drawing room lies down the hall. Make yourself comfortable.
msg_zh: 走廊的尽头有间客房供你使用，请当作自己家。

msg: I am Tanith, the proprietress of this house. An honour to have you.
msg_zh: 我名为塔妮丝，是这座官邸的主人。\n接下来要请你多关照了。

msg: Well. That is unfortunate.
msg_zh: ……这样啊，真遗憾。

msg: Now, time for you to leave, I should think.
msg_zh: ……既然如此，请离开这座官邸，

msg: Let this intersection of our paths be the last.
msg_zh: 我们彼此是走在平行线上。

msg: Did you read the letter left for you?
msg_zh: ……放在房间里的信件，你应该看过了。

msg: That is the task the Volcano Manor desires you enact.
msg_zh: 那是火山官邸对你发出的委托，

msg: You will be compensated once the deed is done. Good luck.
msg_zh: 当然也有相对的报酬，拜托你了。

msg: If you are loath to hunt your own kin, so be it.
msg_zh: 但如果你对狩猎同胞仍有一丝犹豫，那也无妨。

msg: But you must leave this house at once.
msg_zh: 立刻离开这座官邸便是。

msg: This is a war against the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 我们要对黄金树举剑相向，

msg: We have no place for the meek, nor the luxury of keeping clean hands.
msg_zh: 不需要软弱的人为伙，\n人人都要有玷污双手的心理准备。

msg: What's this?
msg_zh: ……什么事？

msg: Have you reconsidered the prospect?
msg_zh: 难道你想说，自己改变心意了？

msg: Of rising with us, against the Erdtree?
msg_zh: ……想与我们并肩而战，对黄金树举剑相向？

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……嗯，也好。

msg: Your decision is most welcome.
msg_zh: 谢谢你给出肯定的回复。

msg: Now you belong to the Volcano Manor family.
msg_zh: 如此一来，你就是火山官邸的一员。

msg: The drawing room lies down the hall. Make yourself comfortable.
msg_zh: 走廊的尽头有间客房供你使用，请当作自己家。

msg: You've completed your task.
msg_zh: 看来你完美达成委托了。

msg: I am pleased. Now you are a recusant true, and a full-fledged member of the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 真令人雀跃。如此一来，你也挤身叛律者之列。\n名符其实，成为我们火山官邸的一员。

msg: This is your reward, as promised.
msg_zh: 收下吧，这是先前提过的报酬。

msg: Never forget. That the recusant fights to tread the path of the champion.
msg_zh: ……请记得，叛律者的战斗，\n会开拓出成为英雄的道路。

msg: The way is tainted, but for this very reason,
msg_zh: 即使过程会遭遇污秽、不洁，\n不，应该说正因为如此，

msg: it is the true path to valour.
msg_zh: 才能通往成为英雄的道路。

msg: I see you've performed another task for us.
msg_zh: ……你又完美达成委托了。

msg: Here is your usual reward. Please, take it.
msg_zh: 收下吧，平时受你关照，这是谢礼。

msg: Now, perhaps the time has come to tell you.
msg_zh: ……看来也是时候告诉你了──

msg: Of the true ruler of this manor, Lord Rykard.
msg_zh: 关于火山官邸的真正主人，吾王拉卡德的事情。

msg: The Erdtree blessed the Tarnished with grace.
msg_zh: 黄金树给予褪色者赐福，

msg: But it was all too meagre, in the face of the enormity of their task.
msg_zh: 但和受到指引，随之肩负的使命相比，\n那赐福实在过于渺小……

msg: The Tarnished were forced to scavenge, squabbling for crumbs.
msg_zh: 因此褪色者渴求力量，也被迫如此。

msg: Like the shardbearers, vying for power in the wake of the Shattering.
msg_zh: 如同当年艾尔登法环破碎之时，\n拥有大卢恩的君王面临的窘境。

msg: Our Lord, indignant, has refused. To scurry about, fighting over what miserly scraps they allow us.
msg_zh: 被迫抢夺彼此分得的力量──\n吾王对此气愤非常，无法接受如此肤浅的行为。

msg: If the Erdtree, and indeed the very gods, would debase us so,
msg_zh: 既然黄金树，也就是神祇有意糟蹋我们，

msg: then we are willing to raise the banner of resistance, even if it means heresy.
msg_zh: 那么，即使要犯下叛律的亵渎之举，\n我们也要揭竿而起，维护尊严。

msg: We at the Volcano Manor, under Lord Rykard, have sworn no rest until it is done.
msg_zh: 此为火山官邸的全体共识，更是吾王拉卡德的决心。

msg: If you follow this heroic path, one day the Lord will see you.
msg_zh: ……只要继续在英雄的道路上迈进，\n总有一天，你也会见到吾王。

msg: The Lord's visits with our champions are always a spectacle.
msg_zh: 身处战场之人邂逅彼此，那一刻总是绝景。

msg: It cannot come a day too soon!
msg_zh: 尽管期待那一天到来吧，呵呵。

msg: The letter describes the task the Volcano Manor desires you enact.
msg_zh: 放在房间里的信件，是火山官邸对你发出的委托。

msg: You will be compensated once the deed is done. Good luck.
msg_zh: 当然也有相对的报酬，拜托你了。

msg: If you follow this heroic path, one day the Lord will see you.
msg_zh: ……只要继续在英雄的道路上迈进，\n总有一天，你也会见到吾王。

msg: It cannot come a day too soon!
msg_zh: 尽管期待那一天到来吧，呵呵。

msg: She said that, to you?
msg_zh: ……那孩子问了这件事吗……？

msg: I should have known something was wrong. The signs were clear enough.
msg_zh: 看她最近有些怪异，果然是心里有烦恼……

msg: Well. Zorayas has placed her trust in you. All the more reason I must tell you.
msg_zh: 泽菈雅丝对你敞开了心房，\n所以我希望你也能明白──

msg: That some things are better left unknown. Besides, no-one should be blamed for their heritage.
msg_zh: 真相大白不见得是好事。\n身世如何，也不该责怪当事人。

msg: Think about it. We are resisting the ways of the Erdtree itself.
msg_zh: 你也清楚，我们该做的是对抗黄金树律法。

msg: What matters one's lineage in such a crisis?
msg_zh: 相比之下，身世根本不值一提。

msg: No, I haven't seen Zorayas anywhere.
msg_zh: ……是你啊，我找不到泽菈雅丝。

msg: And she has no scouting duties now.
msg_zh: 她应该没有招募者的任务在身。

msg: Has she gone off in search of answers?
msg_zh: ……她还在调查吧。

msg: Why won't she just listen...
msg_zh: 为什么这么不明事理……

msg: May I ask your aid?
msg_zh: 我有事情想要拜托你。

msg: Not as the Manor's proprietress, but as Zorayas' mother.
msg_zh: 不是以火山官邸之主，\n而是以泽菈雅丝之母身分请托。

msg: If she discovers the answer to her question, and it causes distress,
msg_zh: 如果你发现她找到盼望已久的答案，\n因此一蹶不振的时候，

msg: have her drink this potion.
msg_zh: 希望你让她喝下这帖药。

msg: To purge that which would cause her pain.
msg_zh: ……这可以让她忘记所有的痛苦。

msg: Yes, I know.
msg_zh: 嗯，我心知肚明。

msg: My wish is a grave disrespect to her.
msg_zh: 这个请托是在践踏泽菈雅丝的尊严，

msg: No different than the Erdtree's imposition.
msg_zh: 和黄金树对我们做出的事情没有两样。

msg: But I've no choice... It must be done.
msg_zh: 可是，我……我不得不出此下策。

msg: Thank you, for allowing me this.
msg_zh: ……谢谢你实现我的愿望。

msg: I will never be a good mother. My heart is too frail.
msg_zh: 我真的不配为人母，我太软弱了，

msg: Our Lord must have known this all along.
msg_zh: 吾王应该早就知情。

msg: My meekness is all too clear...
msg_zh: 哈哈……真是软弱……

msg: Really, she is dead, then...
msg_zh: ……她丧失性命了，是吗。

msg: My gratitude for your forthrightness.
msg_zh: 谢谢你告诉我。

msg: If you would...allow me some time alone.
msg_zh: 只是……可以让我独处一阵子吗……？

msg: Please, allow me some time alone.
msg_zh: ……抱歉，让我一个人静一静吧……

msg: I see that you've stayed the path of champions.
msg_zh: 看来，你确实走在英雄的道路上。

msg: This is your usual reward. Please, take it.
msg_zh: 收下吧，平时受你关照，这是谢礼。

msg: Perhaps you are ready. Might you see our Lord?
msg_zh: ……也是时候让你觐见吾王，你意下如何？

msg: Our Lord will no doubt welcome you. Another kindred spirit, treading the path of champions.
msg_zh: 吾王肯定很欢迎你这位并肩同行的英雄──新的族人。

msg: Yes, as it should be.
msg_zh: ……嗯，我知道了。

msg: Now, close your eyes for a moment.
msg_zh: 闭上你的双眼，稍待片刻，

msg: I will transport you to the Lord's chamber.
msg_zh: 我来带领你前往吾王的身边。

msg: Farewell, then.
msg_zh: ……永别了，

msg: May your visit be fruitful.
msg_zh: 希望会是一场完美的邂逅。

msg: I see... Well, I cannot make you take the leap.
msg_zh: 这样啊……没关系，这不强迫。

msg: But do know this.
msg_zh: 但是希望你记住，

msg: To follow the path of valour, an audience with our Lord is essential.
msg_zh: 既然有意在英雄的道路上迈进，你是应该觐见吾王。

msg: In order to defy this debasement, and rise up against the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 有意为了黄金树践踏尊严一事揭竿而起，更是如此。

msg: Like a true recusant of the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 这是火山官邸渴求达成的愿望。

msg: Won't you consider having an audience with our Lord?
msg_zh: ……觐见吾王这事，你意下如何？

msg: Our Lord will no doubt welcome you. Another kindred spirit, treading the path of champions.
msg_zh: 吾王肯定很欢迎你这位并肩同行的英雄──新的族人。

msg: You...
It's true then. You've defeated our Lord.
msg_zh: ……是这样啊，吾王败下阵来了。

msg: No, I must thank you. Our Lord was yet weak. You have taught us that.
msg_zh: 没关系，我很感谢你。\n让我明白了吾王的力量还不足。

msg: Defeat is not the end. Our Lord is immortal, and will one day rise again, stronger.
msg_zh: ……然而败战并不是终点──\n吾王是不死之身，总有一天会复活成更强的存在。

msg: Until then, I must stay the path, and do my part.
msg_zh: 我会为此开始做一切准备。

msg: I will leave the Volcano Manor before long.
msg_zh: 我就快离开火山官邸了。

msg: I suggest you do the same.
msg_zh: 你也尽快准备离开吧。

msg: Here is my thanks. For allowing our Lord to be revived, even stronger than before.
msg_zh: 这是我的谢礼──\n你让吾王看见目标，他将复活成更为强大的存在。

msg: I will miss these encounters.
msg_zh: ……只是我感到些许惆怅。

msg: The champion who walks the tainted path shines all the more.
msg_zh: 走在污秽、不洁之路的英雄，总是如此耀眼──

msg: I always was an admirer.
msg_zh: 你真的很吸引人。

msg: Oh, you...
msg_zh: 噢，是你啊……

msg: Allow me some time.
msg_zh: 要再麻烦你稍待片刻。

msg: Our Lord's carcass is vast, and not easily consumed.
msg_zh: 吾王的身体过于巨大，实在是很费力。

msg: Dear Rykard, please find purchase within me,
msg_zh: 拉卡德啊，请在我体内安歇吧。

msg: I wish to be your serpent; your family.
msg_zh: 我想要成为您的蛇，您的族人。

msg: One day, let us devour the gods together.
msg_zh: 在未来，一定要一起吞噬神祇……

msg: Dear Rykard, please find purchase within me,
msg_zh: 拉卡德啊，请在我体内安歇吧。

msg: I wish to be your serpent; your family.
msg_zh: 我想要成为您的蛇，您的族人。

msg: One day, let us devour the gods together.
msg_zh: 在未来，一定要一起吞噬神祇……

msg: Now, time for you to leave, I should think.
msg_zh: ……既然如此，请离开这座官邸，

msg: Let this intersection of our paths be the last.
msg_zh: 我们彼此是走在平行线上。

msg: The drawing room is through the hall.
msg_zh: ……走廊的尽头有间客房供你使用。

msg: Use the key I handed you, and make yourself comfortable.
msg_zh: 交给你的那把钥匙能开门，请当作自己家。

msg: What's this?
msg_zh: ……什么事？

msg: Have you reconsidered the prospect?
msg_zh: 难道你想说，自己改变心意了？

msg: Of rising with us, against the Erdtree?
msg_zh: ……想与我们并肩而战，对黄金树举剑相向？

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……嗯，也好。

msg: Your decision is most welcome.
msg_zh: 谢谢你给出肯定的回复。

msg: Now you belong to the Volcano Manor family.
msg_zh: 如此一来，你就是火山官邸的一员。

msg: The drawing room lies down the hall. Make yourself comfortable.
msg_zh: 走廊的尽头有间客房供你使用，请当作自己家。

msg: Now, time for you to leave, I should think.
msg_zh: ……既然如此，请离开这座官邸，

msg: Let this intersection of our paths be the last.
msg_zh: 我们彼此是走在平行线上。

msg: The drawing room is through the hall.
msg_zh: ……走廊的尽头有间客房供你使用，

msg: Use the key I handed you, and make yourself comfortable.
msg_zh: 交给你的那把钥匙能开门，请当作自己家。

msg: Now you are a recusant true, and a full-fledged member of the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 如此一来，你也挤身叛律者之列。\n名符其实是我们火山官邸的一员。

msg: I am pleased to have you on our side.
msg_zh: 接下来要请你多关照了。

msg: Did you see her?
msg_zh: ……你看见了吗？

msg: The girl, Rya…with her true face.
msg_zh: 那孩子……菈雅的真面目。

msg: Well, if she confided in you the name Zorayas,
msg_zh: ……嗯，既然她告诉了你“泽菈雅丝”这个名字，

msg: then perhaps it is not my place to speak.
msg_zh: 这件事就没有我置喙的余地。

msg: But as her adoptive mother, I ask of you.
msg_zh: 只是身为养育她的母亲，请让我说句话──

msg: Please, be kind to her. Look after young Zorayas.
msg_zh: 希望从今以后，你能继续好好对待泽菈雅丝。

msg: Her true visage belies the purity of her heart.
msg_zh: 无论那模样有什么缘由，她依旧是个好孩子。

msg: …Honestly, I hardly deserve the sweet child.
msg_zh: ……让我这个做母亲的，都会感到心虚。

msg: Please, be kind to her. Look after young Zorayas.
msg_zh: 希望从今以后，你能继续好好对待泽菈雅丝。

msg: Her true visage belies the purity of her heart.
msg_zh: 无论那模样有什么缘由，她依旧是个好孩子。

msg: Zorayas has placed her trust in you. All the more reason I must tell you.
msg_zh: 泽菈雅丝对你敞开了心房，所以我希望你也能明白──

msg: That some things are better left unknown. Besides, no-one should be blamed for their heritage.
msg_zh: 真相大白不见得是好事。\n身世如何，也不该责怪当事人。

msg: My wish is a grave disrespect to her.
msg_zh: 这个请托是在践踏泽菈雅丝的尊严，

msg: But I've no choice... It must be done.
msg_zh: 可是，我……我不得不出此下策。

msg: Sweet Zorayas, have I earned your scorn?
msg_zh: ……泽菈雅丝，你会恨我吗……？

msg: This is farewell.
msg_zh: ……永别了。

msg: Perhaps we will meet again, along the path.
msg_zh: 希望有一天，我们的路再次交集。

msg: What is it?
msg_zh: ……那是什么？

msg: I have no need of that.
msg_zh: ……我不再需要它了。

msg: I must continue devouring my beloved lord...
msg_zh: 我要先吞噬吾王……

msg: Oh, you...
msg_zh: 噢，是你啊……

msg: Allow me some time.
msg_zh: 要再麻烦你稍待片刻。

msg: Our lord's carcass is not easily consumed.
msg_zh: 吾王的身体过于巨大，实在是很费力。

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 呜！

msg: Ahh, my lord...
Rykard...
msg_zh: 拉卡德……

msg: Oh, Rykard…
msg_zh: ……啊，拉卡德……

msg: Let me be your serpent…
msg_zh: 我想要成为您的蛇……

msg: Oh, yes... Tarnished, are we?
msg_zh: ……噢，你是……是褪色者吧？

msg: Come to the Lands Between for the Elden Ring, hmm?
msg_zh: 渴求艾尔登法环，因此来到这块交界地。

msg: Of course you have. No shame in it.
msg_zh: 我全都知道，事情肯定是如此。

msg: But I'm afraid you're plumb out of luck.
msg_zh: 但是呢，着实可悲可叹……

msg: You are maidenless. A bit player, fully divorced from the strength of runes.
msg_zh: 你没有女巫陪伴，无法获得卢恩的力量，\n只是一个脱队的瑕疵品。

msg: Feel free to go off and die in a ditch somewhere.
msg_zh: 死得默默无名的下场等着你啊。

msg: Oh, can't seem to wrap your head around your predicament?
msg_zh: ……唉，你还不能接受吗？

msg: It's no surprise. You poor have-nots are a stubborn lot.
msg_zh: 我想也是。\n这就是一无所有者的悲哀。

msg: Fine, then.
msg_zh: 好吧。

msg: If you must have a go at it, maidenless as you are, you'll require an education.
msg_zh: 如果没有女巫，还想要挣扎的话──\n那我来告诉你吧。

msg: On the ways of the learned Tarnished.
msg_zh: 什么是褪色者该有的作为。

msg: Are you familiar with grace? The golden light that gives life to you Tarnished.
msg_zh: 你知道赐福吧？\n就是让你们褪色者能稍事歇息的金光。

msg: You may also behold its golden rays pointing in a particular direction at times.
msg_zh: 那簇金光会产生光芒，指往某个方向──

msg: That is the guidance of grace. The path that a Tarnished must travel.
msg_zh: 那正是所谓“赐福的指引”，褪色者该行进的道路。

msg: It's nothing short of a miracle. That the guidance of grace can lead you,
msg_zh: ……是啊，没有错，指引会告诉你。

msg: maidenless as you are, to the perfect place to die in obscurity.
msg_zh: 没有女巫的你，最后死得默默无名的地方。

msg: What's the matter?
msg_zh: 怎么了吗？

msg: Shouldn't you be off proving yourself, or some such?
msg_zh: 不是还打算继续挣扎吗？

msg: Then go on, take the hint and follow the guidance of grace.
msg_zh: 那就快朝赐福指引的方向前进，

msg: To Castle Stormveil, on the cliff.
msg_zh: 前往断崖上的那座史东薇尔城。

msg: And if, by chance, you do find your way to the castle,
msg_zh: ……要是你有个万分之一的可能，抵达那座城，

msg: you may receive a summons. To the famed Roundtable Hold…
msg_zh: 说不定连你也能受邀到圆桌厅堂……

msg: Guidance will show the way, most certainly.
msg_zh: ……我想赐福指引的方向，

msg: To Castle Stormveil, over on the cliff.
msg_zh: 肯定是那座断崖上的城，史东薇尔。

msg: The home of the decrepit demigod, Godrick the Grafted.
msg_zh: 那座城是又老又丑的半神，“接肢”葛瑞克的居所。

msg: Although I'm afraid you'll never make it that far, hmm.
msg_zh: ……但像你这种人，根本没能耐抵达那座城吧。

msg: Rest assured, I sympathise, deeply. There's no worse fate than to be maidenless.
msg_zh: 唉，我很同情你。\n没有女巫的陪伴，看了真让人于心不忍。

msg: Oh, but if, by chance, you do find your way to the castle,
msg_zh: ……噢，不过啊。\n要是你有个万分之一的可能，抵达那座城，

msg: you may receive a summons. To the famed Roundtable Hold…
msg_zh: 说不定连你也能受邀到圆桌厅堂……

msg: Oh, yes... Tarnished, are we?
msg_zh: ……噢，你是……是褪色者吧？

msg: Come to the Lands Between for the Elden Ring, hmm?
msg_zh: 渴求艾尔登法环，因此来到这块交界地。

msg: Of course you have. No shame in it.
msg_zh: 我全都知道，事情肯定是如此。

msg: Unfortunately for you, however, you are maidenless.
msg_zh: 但是呢，着实可悲可叹……你没有女巫陪伴。

msg: Without guidance, without the strength of runes, and without an invitation to the Roundtable Hold...
msg_zh: 不知引导在何方，无法获得卢恩的力量，\n更不可能受邀到圆桌厅堂……

msg: You are fated, it seems, to die in obscurity.
msg_zh: 只能死得默默无名吧。

msg: Luckily for you, however, there is one shining ray of hope for even the maidenless.
msg_zh: ……即使你没有女巫，也还有一丝希望──

msg: Me. Varré. Take care to listen.
msg_zh: 因为你遇到了我，梵雷。

msg: Are you familiar with grace? The golden light that gives life to you Tarnished.
msg_zh: 你知道赐福吧？\n就是让你们褪色者能稍事歇息的金光。

msg: You may also behold its golden rays pointing in a particular direction at times.
msg_zh: 那簇金光会产生光芒，指往某个方向──

msg: That is the guidance of grace. The path that a Tarnished must travel.
msg_zh: 那正是所谓“赐福的指引”，褪色者该行进的道路。

msg: Mm, indeed. Grace's guidance holds the answers.
msg_zh: ……对，没错。指引会告诉你──

msg: It will lead you Tarnished to the path you are meant to follow.
msg_zh: 褪色者该往什么方向去……

msg: Even if it leads you to your grave.
msg_zh: 或是该葬身何处。

msg: Grace's guidance will reveal the path forward, most certainly.
msg_zh: ……我想赐福指引的方向，

msg: To Castle Stormveil, over on the cliff.
msg_zh: 肯定是那座断崖上的城，史东薇尔。

msg: The home of the decrepit demigod, Godrick the Grafted.
msg_zh: 那座城是又老又丑的半神，“接肢”葛瑞克的居所。

msg: It's time you set off, I should think.
msg_zh: ……快动身吧。

msg: To Castle Stormveil, on the cliff, where grace would guide you.
msg_zh: 前往指引提示的方向，那座断崖上的史东薇尔城。

msg: If you seek the Elden Ring, maidenless as you are.
msg_zh: 没有女巫陪伴也渴求艾尔登法环的话，就该如此。

msg: Ohh, well done, well done indeed.
msg_zh: ……噢，等你很久了。

msg: You made it through that entire mess, all the way to Stormveil.
msg_zh: 看来历经一番折腾，你抵达史东薇尔了。

msg: And off you trotted to the Roundtable Hold… My sincerest congratulations.
msg_zh: 而且也受邀到圆桌厅堂……恭喜你。

msg: But, how did you find the Roundtable?
msg_zh: ……那么，看到圆桌厅堂，有什么感想呢？

msg: Oh, you don't have to say it.
msg_zh: 噢，不必说出口，我也明白。

msg: Before, the Roundtable was chock full of venerated warriors, but now, it's home to puff-chests and has-beens.
msg_zh: 过去英雄云集的圆桌厅堂，如今也徒留垃圾残渣。

msg: I fear you've been terribly disappointed.
msg_zh: 你是不是感到失望？

msg: I don't blame you. But still, the Roundtable has its perks.
msg_zh: 我能体会。只是现况如此，\n如果你还是认为这对自己有所帮助……

msg: Why not earn a seat? Fly straight and true, so to speak.
msg_zh: 那首先，要不要立下目标──\n成为圆桌厅堂真正的一员呢？

msg: Ahh, then you're interested? A wise choice indeed.
msg_zh: 噢，你有意愿啊，真是了不起。

msg: To join the Roundtable proper, you must acquire a Great Rune, and request audience...
msg_zh: 要成为圆桌厅堂真正的一员，\n必须要拥有大卢恩，还需要……

msg: ...with the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
msg_zh: 觐见位于厅堂最深处房间的双指。

msg: They are the purported masters of the grace that guides your kind, the Tarnished.
msg_zh: 那位是为你们褪色者降下指引赐福的尊者。

msg: Mm, yes, pay them a visit, so that you may see for yourself.
msg_zh: 对，所以你有必要觐见祂、知道祂。

msg: Challenge Godrick the Grafted, lord of Stormveil, to acquire a Great Rune.
msg_zh: 至于大卢恩，去挑战史东薇尔的城主，\n“接肢”葛瑞克吧。

msg: Decrepit, he may be, but a demigod he remains. And of course, an inheritor of a Great Rune.
msg_zh: 即使又老又丑，那也还是个半神，\n也是拥有大卢恩的碎片君王。

msg: Worse yet, I hear old Godrick's acquired a ferocious new toy to graft...
msg_zh: ……不过这阵子，听说葛瑞克\n拿到了相当致命的接肢祭品。

msg: So. Prepare for the worst.
msg_zh: 你要当心啊。

msg: Yes, I see. Perhaps it's just as well.
msg_zh: 是吗？唉，我想也是吧。

msg: Besides, you are maidenless. One can only do so much with the materials provided.
msg_zh: 你没有女巫陪伴，本质就是脱队的瑕疵品。

msg: But then again, if you should realise the error of your ways,
msg_zh: 但如果这决定只是一时糊涂，你回心转意了，

msg: I'm always willing to hear you out.
msg_zh: 再来找我吧。

msg: Oh, have you decided to have a go after all? At joining the Roundtable proper?
msg_zh: ……噢，你回心转意，\n想成为圆桌厅堂的真正一员了？

msg: What's the matter?
msg_zh: 怎么了吗？

msg: Aren't you supposed to be earning your place at the Roundtable Hold?
msg_zh: 不是想成為圓桌廳堂真正的一員嗎？

msg: Then you must face Godrick the Grafted, lord of Stormveil,
msg_zh: 那就快去挑战史东薇尔的城主，“接肢”葛瑞克……

msg: for without a Great Rune, you will not be granted audience.
msg_zh: 取得大卢恩之后，

msg: With the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
msg_zh: 觐见位于圆桌厅堂，最深处房间的双指。

msg: Ohh, well done, well done indeed.
msg_zh: ……噢，等你很久了。

msg: You bested Godrick the Grafted, and claimed a Great Rune.
msg_zh: 成功打倒“接肢”葛瑞克，取得大卢恩了啊。

msg: You felled a demigod, and claimed a Great Rune.
msg_zh: 成功打倒半神，取得大卢恩了啊。

msg: My congratulations.
msg_zh: 恭喜你。

msg: Now, visit the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: ……那么，请前往圆桌厅堂吧。

msg: For an audience with the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
msg_zh: 到最深处的房间，觐见双指。

msg: Go to the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: ……请前往圆桌厅堂吧。

msg: For an audience with the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
msg_zh: 到最深处的房间，觐见双指。

msg: Ah, there you are.
msg_zh: ……噢，等你很久了。

msg: You claimed a Great Rune, and had your audience. With the Two Fingers, at the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 不仅成功取得了大卢恩，\n也觐见了圆桌厅堂的双指。

msg: You've had your audience. With the Two Fingers, at the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 看来你觐见了圆桌厅堂的双指。

msg: What was your impression?
msg_zh: 那么，你有什么想法？

msg: Ah-ha, your intuition serves you well.
msg_zh: ……你果然也有感觉啊。

msg: My doubts had been piling up, you see.
msg_zh: 老实说，我也有同感。

msg: ...The words of the Two Fingers cannot be trusted.
msg_zh: ……双指的话不能相信。

msg: Truly, naught but rambling, senile delusions.
msg_zh: 仿佛是上了年纪的老人在说满口空话……

msg: I believe, that when the Elden Ring was shattered, the Two Fingers were corrupted, their guidance; skewed.
msg_zh: 我心里是这么想的：当艾尔登法环破碎之际，\n双指与祂的指引是否也同样毁坏了？

msg: Even worse, the Fingers harbor no love for our kind.
msg_zh: 而且，我感受不到双指对我们的爱──

msg: That's the part that irks the most.
msg_zh: 这是我最不能忍受的部分。

msg: Oh, I have a gift for you, something fit only for the wise.
msg_zh: 噢，还有一件事。\n有件物品想要送给聪颖的你。

msg: A means for circumventing the draw of the Two Fingers.
msg_zh: ……这是可以摆脱双指指引的手段，

msg: Give it a try, won't you?
msg_zh: 请你务必一试。

msg: And if it please you, may we meet again.
msg_zh: 如果你对此感到满意，我们再见面吧。

msg: I've high hopes for you. My lambkin.
msg_zh: 我很期待再会呢，亲爱的。

msg: You don't say. Well, what a relief that must be.
msg_zh: ……原来如此，那很好。

msg: You may go, then. My work here is done.
msg_zh: 那么请你出发吧，我的使命已经达成。

msg: May the wisdom of the Two Fingers guide you.
msg_zh: 愿你有双指的指引。

msg: Oh? Is something wrong?
msg_zh: 嗯？有什么事吗？

msg: Be sure to try that finger I gave you.
msg_zh: ……送给你的那手指，请务必一试。

msg: There's no reason to dither.
msg_zh: 你根本不需要犹豫──
