msg: The Tarnished were spurned by grace, forsaken by the Two Fingers. And now they ask you to mend their crumbling world?
msg_zh: 赐福跟双指都曾对褪色者弃之不顾……\n等到面临毁灭了，又向你们求助。

msg: Hah, your loyalties are misplaced with them.
msg_zh: 对于这种存在，哪有必要讲求情义？

msg: Be sure to try that finger I gave you.
msg_zh: ……送给你的那手指，请务必一试。

msg: I'm quite certain that you'll take to it.
msg_zh: 你肯定会感到满意。

msg: Oh, lambkin, so pleased you're here.
msg_zh: 啊，亲爱的，你来啦。

msg: I'm glad that you're enjoying my gift.
msg_zh: 看来你很喜欢我送的礼物。

msg: Mmm, I knew it from the very start.
msg_zh: 噢，和我料想的一样，

msg: You have a taste for noble blood.
msg_zh: 尊贵之血和你实在太相配了。

msg: I wish to anoint you a proper inductee.
msg_zh: 我想要邀请你成为我们的正式成员──

msg: A knight to serve Luminary Mohg, the Lord of Blood, and establish a new dynasty.
msg_zh: 成为“鲜血君王”蒙格大人的骑士，\n与我们一同建立新王朝。

msg: Luminary Mohg has strength, vision, and of course, love.
msg_zh: 蒙格大人不只有强大的力量与信念，\n也满怀着爱。

msg: So, what do you say, my lambkin?
msg_zh: 想必答案呼之欲出了吧，亲爱的？

msg: Mm, yes, who would have it any other way?
msg_zh: 没错，我想也只有这种答案。

msg: Now, take this.
msg_zh: 那么，请收下这个吧。

msg: For your final trial. Soak the cloth with a maiden's blood.
msg_zh: 这是最后的试炼──请用那块布浸满女巫的血。

msg: Normally, this ritual would involve killing one's own maiden, and recanting the wisdom of the Two Fingers.
msg_zh: 这仪式原本是杀害自己的女巫，\n代表与双指的指引就此诀别……

msg: But since you are maidenless, the blood of anyone's maiden will do.
msg_zh: 但因为你没有女巫，所以用其他女巫的血也无妨。

msg: Oh my, perhaps you misheard me.
msg_zh: ……看来我听错了吧。

msg: Nothing wrong with giving you a day or two.
msg_zh: ……我们择日再谈吧？

msg: For your ears to clear out.
msg_zh: 下一次希望能听到正确的答案。

msg: Oh, it's you.
msg_zh: 噢，是你啊。

msg: Could you tell me once more? Your honest reply.
msg_zh: 可以请你再一次给出答案吗？

msg: Ahh, my lambkin.
msg_zh: ……噢，亲爱的。

msg: You've completed your final trial.
msg_zh: 你完成最后的试炼了。

msg: And with this, you are a formal inductee.
msg_zh: 如此一来，你就是我们正式的成员──

msg: A knight who will assist Luminary Mohg, the Lord of Blood, in the establishment of a new dynasty.
msg_zh: 与“鲜血君王”蒙格大人一同建立新王朝的骑士。

msg: Now, give me your finger.
msg_zh: 来吧，请伸出你的手指。

msg: This noble blood will be an immutable badge of honor, once it settles. Inside of you.
msg_zh: 让尊贵之血融入你的体内，化作永恒的证明。

msg: Oh, good heavens. Clench your teeth, or something.
msg_zh: 哎，真是丢人。好好忍耐吧。

msg: Never forget that feeling of agony.
msg_zh: ……千万要记住这股痛楚，

msg: For it is what binds you, to Luminary Mohg. To all of us.
msg_zh: 这正是蒙格大人与我们之间的连系铁证。

msg: Ha ha ha...
msg_zh: 呵呵呵。

msg: You have the sweetest scream. My lambkin.
msg_zh: 刚才的惨叫真是动听啊，亲爱的。

msg: Oh, another thing. You should have this.
msg_zh: 啊，对了。我要把这个交给你。

msg: A medal granted by the new Mohgwyn dynasty.
msg_zh: 这是新王朝“蒙格温”的勋章──

msg: With the power to grant audience with Luminary Mohg.
msg_zh: 代表有资格觐见蒙格大人的特殊奖章。

msg: I've gone out of my way to provide one to you.
msg_zh: 亲爱的，这是特别为你疏通拿到的喔。

msg: But you mustn't use it just yet.
msg_zh: 但目前还不允许使用那枚勋章，

msg: The meeting must wait until the Mohgwyn dynasty commences.
msg_zh: 要等即将到来的蒙格温王朝开创之后，才能觐见大人。

msg: Luminary Mohg yet slumbers beside the Divinity.
msg_zh: 蒙格大人还在与神共度良宵，

msg: We must endure a little longer.
msg_zh: 应该还需要一些时间。

msg: Ahh, it is trying, but we must be patient.
msg_zh: 噢，真教人迫不及待啊。

msg: One day, you will be elevated, deservedly, basking in love.
msg_zh: 你肯定能受到重用，沐浴在大人的爱之下。

msg: Right, my lambkin?
msg_zh: 对不对呢？亲爱的。

msg: Ha ha ha...
msg_zh: 呵呵呵。

msg: The cloth is your final trial. Soak it with the blood of a maiden.
msg_zh: 交给你的布是用在最后的试炼──\n用那块布浸满女巫的血吧。

msg: The blood of anyone's maiden will do. You are maidenless, after all.
msg_zh: ……用任一女巫的血都可以喔，因为你没有女巫嘛。

msg: What business does a maidenless wretch like you have here?
msg_zh: ……没有女巫的瑕疵品，来这里做什么呢？

msg: Did you come seeking violence, upon learning my esteemed position under Luminary Mohg?
msg_zh: 我是光芒万丈的蒙格大人的重臣，\n你是知道，才如此放肆？

msg: I'll take pleasure in ensuring you regret this.
msg_zh: ……我会让你悔不当初。

msg: Before you die in obscurity.
msg_zh: 死得默默无名吧。

msg: You seek violence, heedless of my warning, though you have been raised to a knight of the dynasty?
msg_zh: ……身为王朝的骑士，对警告充耳不闻，\n还做出如此蛮横的行为。

msg: I am pained, to the very depths of my being.
msg_zh: 我打从心底对你感到失望。

msg: I'll ensure you regret this, my lambkin.
msg_zh: ……亲爱的，我会让你悔不当初。

msg: Enjoy your miserable death.
msg_zh: 接受横死的下场吧。

msg: How dare you trouble Luminary Mohg's passions.
msg_zh: ……不准让蒙格大人的心有一丝烦忧，

msg: You vulgar churl.
msg_zh: 下等的瑕疵品。

msg: I made a grave error.
msg_zh: ……我真是犯下了大错。

msg: Why must I be...
msg_zh: ……我为什么……

msg: Disgraced by this lowborn...
msg_zh: 会败给这种瑕疵品……

msg: O...Luminary...Mohg...
msg_zh: ……蒙格大人……蒙格大人……

msg: Please grant...the strength...you promised...
msg_zh: 请您赐予小的，那股力量……

msg: I have given...everything...
msg_zh: 小的已经竭尽全力……

msg: Please...my lord...
msg_zh: 蒙格大人，求求您……

msg: Please, answer me...Luminary...Mohg.
msg_zh: ……蒙格大人，您为什么保持沉默？

msg: A-ahh...
msg_zh: 啊啊……啊啊啊……

msg: Bless the Mohgwyn Dynasty, with love!
msg_zh: 愿蒙格温王朝沐浴在爱之下……！

msg: <groan>
Oh?
msg_zh: 哦？

msg: Do you even comprehend?
msg_zh: 你明白这些举动……

msg: The gravity of this choice.
msg_zh: 代表着什么吗？

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……好吧。

msg: If you mistake kindness for frailty of heart,
msg_zh: 如果你以为，我只是个和善的好人，

msg: then perhaps a more physical lesson is in order!
msg_zh: 那我就让你体会，看不起人的代价！

msg: You disappoint me.
msg_zh: ……实在可叹。

msg: Perhaps noble blood is too rich for the maidenless.
msg_zh: 对没有女巫陪伴的人而言，\n尊贵之血可能过于刺激了……

msg: Well, no sense in sparing your life now.
msg_zh: 没有活命的价值呢。

msg: You were a maidenless upstart to begin with.
msg_zh: 说到底，你也只是个没有女巫陪伴的瑕疵品。

msg: You will die nameless, without ceremony.
msg_zh: 默默无名地横死路边吧。

msg: Oh dear, a pity it's come to this, my lambkin.
msg_zh: 唉，亲爱的，我真的很惋惜。

msg: How does it feel to die a failure?
msg_zh: 凄惨地死去吧。

msg: Materials of quality are so hard to find, these days...
msg_zh: 拥有资质的人真的不好找呢……

msg: You maidenless runt...
msg_zh: ……没有女巫陪伴的，瑕疵品……

msg: Who do you think I am?
msg_zh: 就凭你，你知道我是谁吗……？

msg: <groan>
Luminary Mohg...
msg_zh: ……蒙格大人……

msg: Bless the Mohgwyn Dynasty, with love!
msg_zh: 愿蒙格温王朝沐浴在爱之下……！

msg: <groan>
You there.
msg_zh: 不好意思，那边的那位……

msg: Come over here, would you?
msg_zh: 你能不能过来这里？

msg: You're Tarnished, aren't you?
msg_zh: 你是褪色者，对吧？

msg: I would advise against taking the main gate into the castle.
msg_zh: 想进城里的话，劝你最好别从正门进去。

msg: It's tightly guarded by hardened old hands.
msg_zh: 那边有一群身手高超的士兵挡着。

msg: Try the opening right here.
msg_zh: 但你也别烦恼，从那边的洞穴进去吧。

msg: The guards don't know about it.
msg_zh: 那条小路士兵并不知情。

msg: You'll breach the castle undetected.
msg_zh: 应该有办法直接入侵城内，不被他们发现。

msg: Yes, that's the spirit.
msg_zh: 嗯，明智的选择。

msg: ...You're just the kind of Tarnished that I like.
msg_zh: ……像你这样的褪色者，我很有好感。

msg: I pray for your success.
msg_zh: 希望你一路幸运。

msg: Fair enough, you certainly don't have to trust me.
msg_zh: 好吧……也对，你会怀疑也是正常……

msg: Well, If you must go through the gates, I'll signal them to open.
msg_zh: 我尊重你的选择。\n如果你想从正门进去，我会大喊开门。

msg: But of course, I'd advise against it.
msg_zh: ……但你再想想，这样好吗？\n我劝你还是仔细思考过吧？

msg: Use that opening to breach the castle.
msg_zh: 想进城里的话，从那边的洞穴进去吧。

msg: The guards haven't a clue about it.
msg_zh: 那条小路士兵并不知情。

msg: You'll slip right inside undetected.
msg_zh: 应该有办法直接入侵城内，不被他们发现。

msg: Of course. I understand.
msg_zh: 好吧……我尊重你的选择。

msg: When you approach the gates, I'll signal them to open.
msg_zh: 如果你想从正门进去，我会大喊开门。

msg: It's only your neck on the line, after all.
msg_zh: ……人如果一心求死，真的没人能拉得住。

msg: The gates! Open the gates!
msg_zh: 开门！把门打开吧！

msg: ...You're just the kind of Tarnished that I like.
msg_zh: ……像你这样的褪色者，我很有好感。

msg: I pray for your success.
msg_zh: 希望你一路幸运。

msg: The gates are open. Do as you like.
msg_zh: ……正门打开了，看你想怎么做吧。

msg: It's only your neck on the line, after all.
msg_zh: ……人如果一心求死，真的没人能拉得住。

msg: Oh, oh, you...
Oh, great, I'm glad you're here.
msg_zh: 啊，对、对了，我在找你……

msg: Just a small reward, I was saving it for you.
msg_zh: 之前要给你饯别礼，结果没能交给你。

msg: Please, it's all yours.
msg_zh: 快点收下吧。

msg: Good, now let's be on our way, shall we?
msg_zh: ……好啦，你趁现在快走。

msg: Wouldn't want the guards to spot you.
msg_zh: 现在士兵还没有发现异状。

msg: Hop along, will you?
msg_zh: ……好啦，快点走吧。

msg: What'll happen if the guards catch you strutting about?
msg_zh: 再慢吞吞的，被士兵发现了怎么办？

msg: Rubbish...
msg_zh: ……派不上用场嘛……

msg: Another one...another one all skin and bones.
msg_zh: 这个也是……这也一样干瘪……

msg: ...Worse than a petty squire...
msg_zh: ……毕竟是上不了台面的家伙……

msg: ...Ahh, not a muscle on this one either...
msg_zh: ……唉，这一个也太细瘦了……

msg: Oh, you...
msg_zh: ……噫！是、是你……

msg: For god's sake, don't scare me like that!
msg_zh: 我真的吓了一大跳，别这样吓人啊。

msg: What, oh, just clearing out some corpses.
msg_zh: 我、我没有在做什么，只是在清理尸体。

msg: Can't just leave them about, you know, they'll start to pong, eh.
msg_zh: 你想想，如果放着不管，\n味道肯定会非常不好闻啊。

msg: Oh, hello. No, don't you mind me for a minute.
msg_zh: ……噢，没关系，你不用放在心上。

msg: It's my job to keep the grounds clean.
msg_zh: 因为清理环境是我分内的工作啊。

msg: Oh, hello... Glad to see you safe.
msg_zh: 噢，是你啊……人平安无事就好。

msg: I've come into some fine goods.
msg_zh: 其实最近我拿到了一些物资，

msg: Only, it turns out I can't use a one of them.
msg_zh: 但都是我用不到的东西。

msg: Perhaps you'd like to take them off my hands?
msg_zh: 不嫌弃的话，要不要来买一些？

msg: Oh, hello, anything you'd care to purchase?
msg_zh: 噢，是你啊。要不要来买些东西？

msg: Fare thee well.
msg_zh: 那个，就是啊……

msg: I pray for your success.
msg_zh: 希望你一路幸运。

msg: What a pathetic excuse for a Lord you were. Craven to the bone.
msg_zh: ……软弱的君王啊，真是可悲。

msg: Pushing me about like that. And after all that grafting? Where did that get you?
msg_zh: 劳师动众要人帮忙“接肢”，结果落得这种下场？

msg: Look down, on me, would you?
msg_zh: 竟敢贬低我！

msg: Godrick? You filthy slug.
msg_zh: 葛瑞克，你这蛞蝓！

msg: Feel it! Feel it! Feel my bloody wrath!
msg_zh: 活该！活该啊！感受我的怒火吧！

msg: Oh...hello there.
msg_zh: ……噢，是你啊。

msg: This weasel was... Godrick was always looking down on me.
msg_zh: 这东西，葛瑞克做出贬低我的行为，

msg: He got what he bloody deserved, thanks to you.
msg_zh: 我只是让他受到应有的报应。

msg: I tell you though, what goes around comes around.
msg_zh: 只是话说回来，\n世上真的有所谓的因果吧？

msg: He had an ugly heart, an uglier countenance, and met the ugliest of ends, eh.
msg_zh: 外表丑陋，内心丑陋，下场也非常丑陋，\n全配合得天衣无缝。

msg: He he he he he...
msg_zh: 嘻……嘻嘻……

msg: Now, I suppose I'm free.
msg_zh: ……这下我终于自由了，

msg: I can do whatever takes my fancy...
msg_zh: 能够尽情做想做的事情。

msg: Can't I, mate?
msg_zh: 你说对不对？

msg: You giving that to me?
msg_zh: ……你要给我吗？

msg: Well, I suppose I did save your life, in a way.
msg_zh: ……我确实对你有恩。

msg: I'll gladly take it off your hands. Be rude not to, eh!
msg_zh: 那我当成谢礼，直接收下了。

msg: Mmm, you Tarnished are alright by me.
msg_zh: 噢，像你这样的褪色者，

msg: The sweet ones like you, anyway.
msg_zh: 我真的很有好感。

msg: Ah, you, is it?
msg_zh: ……噢，是你啊。

msg: Haven't seen your mug in quite some time.
msg_zh: 真的好久不见了。

msg: As you can see, I'm the new Lady's attendant.
msg_zh: 你也看到了，到头来我还是王的奴仆，

msg: Freedom? Wasn't worth squat.
msg_zh: 什么鬼自由，一点价值都没有。

msg: B-besides, I like it 'round 'ere...
msg_zh: ……不过，事情也不算太糟。

msg: Lady Nepheli's still fair of heart and countenance...
msg_zh: 涅斐丽王没有丑陋的外表，\n也没有丑陋的内心，至少现在还是如此。

msg: Still, I have the Lady's trust.
msg_zh: ……况且啊，王她相信我。

msg: ...So I can loot all the corpses I like.
msg_zh: ……幸亏如此，我也能尽情搜刮尸体。

msg: I'll let you take a look at the goods, if you fancy.
msg_zh: 不嫌弃的话，来做点买卖吧。

msg: Ah, back again, are we? Curious one, you are.
msg_zh: ……又来了啊？你也真是怪人。

msg: Well then, what are you after?
msg_zh: ……好吧，想找些什么？

msg: Ouch!
msg_zh: 啊。

msg: Oi, what're you doing?
msg_zh: 你在做什么？

msg: Stop that!
msg_zh: 快住手啊。

msg: Blast, what's it to you!
msg_zh: 可恶，怎么回事啊？

msg: Step back, you wretched Tarnished!
msg_zh: 下贱的褪色者，你在耍人吗！

msg: Finally given up the ghost, eh...
msg_zh: 总算死了吗……

msg: Oh, don't worry, I've got big plans for what's left of you...
msg_zh: 我会让你的牺牲，发挥最大的价值。

msg: Hah! Do you feel it?
msg_zh: 怎么样，这下你懂了吧！

msg: Do you feel my bloody wrath?
msg_zh: 感受到我的怒火了吧！

msg: Damn it all. Why is it always me...
msg_zh: ……混账啊，为什么光是我……

msg: What did I do to deserve...
msg_zh: 我又做了什么……

msg: But...I'm free...
msg_zh: ……我自由了，

msg: I can do...what I like...
msg_zh: 能做想做的事……

msg: Good Lord! Good God of Vengeance!
msg_zh: 噢，神啊！复仇之神啊！

msg: Till grudges soak the lands!
msg_zh: 请庇佑复仇之心充斥人间！

msg: Oh...
msg_zh: 哦，你是谁……？

msg: I see, you're Tarnished.
msg_zh: 原来啊，你是褪色者吧？

msg: I am Guilbert. A Redeemer of vengeance. In all its forms.
msg_zh: 我是吉尔伯特，是复仇的代理人。\n任何仇恨都能代为寻仇。

msg: By the way...
msg_zh: 话说回来，我问你……

msg: Have you heard of the crucible knights?
msg_zh: 你知道熔炉骑士吗？

msg: There's one by the name of Ordovis, and I must find him.
msg_zh: 我在找他们的其中一名成员，名叫奥陶琵斯。

msg: He's an old hero of the Shattering, but there's a grudge out against him.
msg_zh: ……听说他是经历破碎战争的老英雄，\n但现在还是有人要向他复仇。

msg: The Lands Between are brimming with those who cannot die. It makes for a cesspool of vengeance.
msg_zh: 交界地有太多死不了的人，\n所以也是复仇念头丛生的苦海。

msg: ...Gives me a shiver just thinking about it...
msg_zh: ……实在让人为之沸腾……

msg: These fellows?
msg_zh: ……你想问这些人是谁吗？

msg: Who knows, just some lads who did someone wrong.
msg_zh: 招人怨恨了，事情就是这么简单。

msg: They got what was coming, nothing more.
msg_zh: 只是遭到报应，然后丢了性命。

msg: If you're intent on revenge, pray to the God of Vengeance.
msg_zh: ……如果你也有真心想寻仇的对象，\n就向复仇之神祈祷吧。

msg: You'll have yourself a corpse in no time.
msg_zh: 过不了多久，对方肯定会变成一具尸体。

msg: You're Tarnished. Then you're here to fight, aren't you?
msg_zh: 你是褪色者，那应该也会战斗吧？

msg: For the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 尤其事关艾尔登法环的时候。

msg: Well, there's something you ought to know.
msg_zh: 那么，你最好记住一件事。

msg: There's an aberration of a blacksmith past the checkpoint that leads to Stormveil.
msg_zh: 在前往史东薇尔城的关卡前，有一个混种的铁匠。

msg: He doesn't seem to think much of anyone or anything, but oddly, he's willing to smith weapons for Tarnished.
msg_zh: 那铁匠个性顽固，怨恨一切，\n但不知怎地，会替褪色者锻造武器。

msg: He has a fine arm. Have him take a crack at your goods.
msg_zh: 总之他确实有本事，叫他帮你锻造武器吧。

msg: ...The question for me, of course, is whether he's in need of any vengeance...
msg_zh: ……我个人认为，那倒像是一种复仇的形式。

msg: In the Lands Between, everyone lives longer than they should.
msg_zh: 在交界地的人都太长寿了，

msg: They may go mad, but even so, they plead to the God of Vengeance.
msg_zh: 所以才会发疯。\n发疯之后，又会向复仇之神祈祷……

msg: That's why I'm here. To exact revenge for those who can't do it themselves.
msg_zh: 我再代为寻仇。

msg: Like someone did for me, when I...when I was but a tyke.
msg_zh: 就像在小时候，有人替我挥下复仇之剑……

msg: Oh, there you are...
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊……

msg: It must have been a dream. Strange.
msg_zh: ……好像在做梦，感觉真不可思议。

msg: I was fighting at your side. Against Ordovis of the Crucible.
msg_zh: 我竟然和你一起对上“熔炉”的奥陶琵斯。

msg: It was a revenge so sweet, fit to serve the very God of Vengeance.
msg_zh: 这场复仇之精彩，足以献给复仇之神。

msg: Heh...
Maybe you're meant to be a Redeemer, as well...
msg_zh: ……或许你也拥有成为代理人的命运。

msg: I was fighting at your side. Against Ordovis, the Crucible Knight.
msg_zh: 我竟然和你一起对上“熔炉”的奥陶琵斯。

msg: Ah, you...
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊……

msg: Did you defeat Ordovis of the Crucible?
msg_zh: 你打败“熔炉”的奥陶琵斯了？

msg: I could sense it. The God of Vengeance surely smiled upon that battle.
msg_zh: 我感觉得到──即使你毫无自觉，\n但那无疑是一场该献给复仇之神的战斗。

msg: Heh...
Maybe you're meant to be a Redeemer too...
msg_zh: ……或许你也拥有成为代理人的命运。

msg: Did you defeat Ordovis, the Crucible Knight.
msg_zh: 你打败“熔炉”的奥陶琵斯了？

msg: Alright, then.
msg_zh: 那接下来……

msg: I'm off to Stormveil Castle.
msg_zh: 我要进入史东薇尔城。

msg: Lord Godrick has kept busy with his grafting...
msg_zh: 君王之一的葛瑞克重复骇人的接肢行为……

msg: Slicing off arms like harvesting ears of wheat. He's run up a mighty debt in blood.
msg_zh: 像割稻一般地切下他人的手臂，招致了许多人的怨恨。

msg: A demigod, yes, he may be...
msg_zh: 即使贵为半神……

msg: But no one escapes a Redeemer.
msg_zh: 也不可能逃得过代理人的手掌心。

msg: I was thinking...
msg_zh: ……除此之外，

msg: Godrick must have an idea.
msg_zh: 葛瑞克肯定知情──

msg: About the vengeance sought by General Radahn, to whom I swore my oath.
msg_zh: 我等誓约所在，拉塔恩将军的仇恨源头……

msg: ...Yes, Godrick's corpse will know what to do...
msg_zh: 我会讯问他的尸体。

msg: Godrick must know.
msg_zh: 葛瑞克肯定知情──

msg: That of all the grudges born of the Shattering, Malenia the Rotted is the object of the most profound.
msg_zh: 破碎战争中最大的仇恨源头，\n“腐败”玛莲妮亚身在何方……

msg: Ahh, my head is throbbing, everything is bright red...
msg_zh: ……啊，整颗脑袋鲜红沸腾……

msg: Master Radahn, is this how it feels to ferment with vengeance?
msg_zh: 拉塔恩啊，这就是复仇，就是迫不及待吗？

msg: I can hardly keep from trembling...
msg_zh: 必须止住颤抖、我必须停止颤抖……

msg: Well, well, you've made yourself a target of vengeance.
msg_zh: ……没想到你会变成他人寻仇的对象。

msg: Perhaps this, too, was meant to be.
msg_zh: 这也是命运吧。

msg: Prepare to become an offering.
msg_zh: ……好了，成为复仇的祭品──

msg: Trust me, you'll rest easier as a corpse.
msg_zh: 准备变成尸体吧。

msg: Hello there, I don't believe we've met.
msg_zh: ……第一次见到你啊，你好。

msg: I'm afraid you've made yourself the object of somebody's ire.
msg_zh: 不好意思，你是他人的寻仇对象。

msg: As a Redeemer, I'm bound to exact revenge.
msg_zh: 我身为代理人，要取你的性命。

msg: Prepare to become an offering.
msg_zh: ……好了，成为复仇的祭品──

msg: Trust me, you'll rest easier as a corpse.
msg_zh: 准备变成尸体吧。

msg: Whoah, what're you playing at? (OKテイク, v303902000_ALT_3)What're you playing at?
msg_zh: 你有什么意图？

msg: This is a little awkward.
msg_zh: 虽是情非得已，

msg: There's no revenge to be had in this killing.
msg_zh: 竟然要杀害没有遭人怨恨的人。

msg: Not too sharp, are you?
msg_zh: ……你还真是“锲而不舍”啊。

msg: If you want to die, ask someone else.
msg_zh: 既然一心寻死，能不能去找其他人？

msg: Let it be known.
msg_zh: ……劝你最好记住，

msg: Wherever vengeance must be had, a Redeemer there will be...
msg_zh: 只要复仇存在，代理人是如影随形……

msg: Oh, my Lord. Good God of Vengeance!
msg_zh: ……噢，神啊，复仇之神啊……

msg: Till grudges soak the lands...
msg_zh: 请庇佑复仇之心充斥人间……

msg: Don't you see now?
msg_zh: 你也很清楚吧？

msg: There is no escape from a Redeemer.
msg_zh: 不可能逃得过代理人的手掌心。

msg: Death ought to be earned.
msg_zh: 一心寻死的人真是恼人。

msg: What am I to make of this?
msg_zh: 这场战斗毫无意义……

msg: Didn't I tell you before?
msg_zh: ……我没有告诉过你吗？

msg: No one escapes a Redeemer.
msg_zh: 你不可能逃得过代理人的手掌心。

msg: Prepare to become an offering, once and for all.
msg_zh: ……好了，这次真的该成为复仇的祭品──

msg: Trust me, you'll rest easier as a corpse.
msg_zh: 准备变成尸体吧。

msg: I see... You must be Ranni's new hireling.
msg_zh: ……你是菈妮推荐的人？

msg: I see... You must be Ranni's new girl.
msg_zh: ……你是菈妮推荐的人？

msg: Yes, yes, I've heard all about you.
msg_zh: 嗯，我有听说。

msg: I am Seluvis, preceptor in the sorcerous arts.
msg_zh: 我是赛尔维斯，是魔法教授。

msg: I don't know what it is the mistress sees in a provincial Tarnished like you,
msg_zh: 这种没见过世面的褪色者，\n真不知道她抱有什么期待。

msg: but since we have the misfortune of serving the same Lady,
msg_zh: 只是偏偏那么巧，很不幸地共事一主，

msg: I ask that you kindly try not to drag us all down with you.
msg_zh: 希望你能有点用处。

msg: I reside...in another tower, close by.
msg_zh: ……我待在这附近的另一座塔。

msg: Come and pay me a visit...
msg_zh: 如果你希望自己对菈妮有点用处，

msg: Should you wish to be of actual service to Mistress Ranni.
msg_zh: 就过来找我吧。

msg: If it were up to me, I wouldn't waste my time on the likes of you.
msg_zh: 照道理而言，\n我是不可能为你这种角色花时间，

msg: But who am I to stand against the wishes of my Lady?
msg_zh: 但我也不能无视她的意思……

msg: Well, well. You took me at my word.
msg_zh: ……哦，你还真的过来找我？

msg: Did you not realise I was merely being polite? You provincials never cease to amaze...
msg_zh: 连场面话都听不懂，\n所以我才受不了井底之蛙。

msg: Hmm, I suppose you're here now.
msg_zh: ……唉，既然人来都来了，

msg: Perhaps I'll give you something to do.
msg_zh: 那就麻烦你办一件事吧。

msg: I'd like you to find a woman called Nepheli, to administer a potion.
msg_zh: 找出名叫涅斐丽的女人，让她喝下药水。

msg: Even you can do that much, can't you?
msg_zh: 才这点事情，你办得到吧？

msg: Good, good.
msg_zh: 很好。

msg: Now I shall hand over the potion in question.
msg_zh: 那这瓶药你收着。

msg: Find Nepheli, and ensure she drinks it.
msg_zh: 找出涅斐丽，让她喝下。

msg: I expect glad tidings. And soon.
msg_zh: ……我等你的好消息。

msg: I see...
msg_zh: 原来如此……

msg: What a wretched bunch you Tarnished are.
msg_zh: 所以我才说，褪色者就是没眼界。

msg: Do you understand? I've given you a very fine chance.
msg_zh: 我是在给你机会，你明不明白？

msg: If you complete this simple task, I will graciously permit you to learn from me.
msg_zh: 要你去办个事，事成之后，\n你就有机会接受我的指导。

msg: Even you wish to serve our Lady well, do you not?
msg_zh: 你也想为菈妮出一己之力吧？

msg: Turn those little cogs upstairs, and return with the correct answer.
msg_zh: 想好之后再给出回答。

msg: Have you fumbled out the correct answer now?
msg_zh: ……好啦，让我听听你深思熟虑后的回答吧。

msg: Then you will undertake my task?
msg_zh: 你愿意替我办事吗？

msg: You are peerless in your dullardry.
msg_zh: 你真的是无药可救的蠢蛋。

msg: Fine. I can feel my wits evaporating in your mere presence.
msg_zh: 够了，和你对话只会消耗我的脑力，

msg: Don't bother wasting your breath on me again.
msg_zh: 不要再向我搭话。

msg: I could have sworn I told you to trouble me no more...
msg_zh: ……我都说了，不要再向我搭话……

msg: Are you here to tender your sincere apology, and undertake my task?
msg_zh: 难道你是真心悔过，想为我办事？

msg: Good, good.
msg_zh: 很好。

msg: As a man of abundant charity, I accept your apology.
msg_zh: 我为人宽大为怀，愿意接受你的悔过。

msg: Now I shall hand over the potion in question.
msg_zh: 这瓶药你收着。

msg: Find Nepheli, and ensure she drinks it.
msg_zh: 找出涅斐丽，让她喝下。

msg: I expect glad tidings. And soon.
msg_zh: ……我等你的好消息。

msg: I've no time for idle chit chat.
msg_zh: ……我不想听废话。

msg: The only thing I will hear from you is a report of your task's completion.
msg_zh: 我想听的是事情办妥了没。

msg: Are we understood? Then off you trot.
msg_zh: 听懂了就快点出去，

msg: I have enough on my plate.
msg_zh: 我忙得很。

msg: Ahh, so you made Nepheli drink the potion?
msg_zh: ……哦？这样啊。涅斐丽喝下去了？

msg: Well done. You are a touch more useful than I had thought.
msg_zh: 做得很好嘛，想不到你还真有点用处。

msg: Well done. You are a slight more useful than I had thought.
msg_zh: 做得很好嘛，想不到你还真有点用处。

msg: Very well. Then you shall have your gift.
msg_zh: 很好，那我就赐予你天大的名誉，

msg: Knowledge of the sorcerous arts, under the tutelage of the great Preceptor Seluvis.
msg_zh: 允许你接受我魔法教授，赛尔维斯的指导。

msg: I doubt much of it will lay within the grasp of a mere Tarnished, but...
msg_zh: 绝大部分都是褪色者无法掌握的知识，

msg: If you put your mind to it, perhaps you won't embarrass our Lady.
msg_zh: 你就尽力学，努力为菈妮尽一份力吧。

msg: You wish to begin right this moment?
msg_zh: ……这么快就想求人指教？

msg: Well, your impatience, though boorish, is understandable. Let's have at it.
msg_zh: 真是肤浅，虽然我能体会这种心情。

msg: Begging for another lesson so soon?
msg_zh: ……又来求人指教了？

msg: There remains much to be done. Make it quick.
msg_zh: 我很忙啊……

msg: Come now, the pretence of comprehension becomes you not.
msg_zh: ……想假装自己都学会了是无妨，

msg: Bend over backwards any further and you're apt to break.
msg_zh: 但要记住，所谓的棒打出头鸟啊。

msg: Well, well. You're asking me about that, are you?
msg_zh: ……哦，这件事你拿来问我？

msg: The task was left to you and the mongrel, was it not?
msg_zh: 那不是你跟那只蠢狗的任务吗？

msg: Not only are you incompetent, but shameless to boot.
msg_zh: 无能就算了，你们还这么不知耻？

msg: Well...there's no helping it.
msg_zh: ……不过，好吧。

msg: Now's as good a time as any. I'll let you in on it.
msg_zh: 时机也成熟了，我告诉你。

msg: There's a glintstone sorcerer by the name of Sellen in Limgrave.
msg_zh: 在宁姆格福，\n那里应该有位名叫瑟濂的辉石魔法师。

msg: She owes me for the help I gave her when she was expelled from the academy.
msg_zh: 在她被逐出学院的时候，我关照过她。

msg: I asked her to look into the matter some time ago.
msg_zh: 以前也很常委托她调查事情。

msg: I'll write you a letter of introduction. Go ask her.
msg_zh: 我帮你写介绍信，带着过去问她吧。

msg: So, you had Nepheli drink the potion? Truly?
msg_zh: ……你是真的有让涅斐丽喝下药水？

msg: Hmm. Then perhaps something was amiss with it.
msg_zh: ……嗯，既然如此，代表那瓶药有问题。

msg: It's concocted from the finest ingredients. But perhaps I should review the recipe.
msg_zh: 那是用稀有材料制成的药水，\n看来需要重新检验一遍。

msg: I may have expected too much of her, to begin with.
msg_zh: 但也有可能，是我对那女人的期望过高……

msg: You break into a man's private chambers, rooting about as you please?
msg_zh: ……你不经同意，擅自溜进别人的房间翻箱倒柜？

msg: Your oafishness knows no bounds.
msg_zh: 真是肤浅至极。

msg: Fine and well.
msg_zh: ……唉，想想也罢。

msg: You tricked Nepheli, and had her drink the potion.
msg_zh: 你欺骗涅斐丽，让她喝下那瓶药──

msg: I believe that makes you my accomplice.
msg_zh: 仔细一想，你我早就是共犯。

msg: You yearn for a puppet of your own, hmm?
msg_zh: 你也想拥有自己的傀儡吧？

msg: Well, normally one of your stature would never be allowed.
msg_zh: 真是不知天高地厚的奢望，

msg: But perhaps I can make a very special exception.
msg_zh: 但我可以特别开恩，实现你的愿望。

msg: Now, choose.
msg_zh: 来，选吧。

msg: Ah, I knew you'd see things my way.
msg_zh: 啊，我就相信你会这么做。

msg: You knew you were already my accomplice, and as such...
msg_zh: 你我已经是共犯，而且我知道……

msg: You wanted one for yourself, hmm? A puppet, to cherish.
msg_zh: 你也很想品味傀儡的美吧？

msg: Oh I can see right through you. That's just the kind of man you are.
msg_zh: 我当然明白，你就是这种人。

msg: Oh I can see right through you. That's just the kind of woman you are.
msg_zh: 我当然明白，你就是这种人。

msg: Well, it's been some time since a pupil of mine last walked this road.
msg_zh: ……好久没有收这方面的学生了，

msg: To mark the occasion, I shall grant you the puppet you so desire.
msg_zh: 就给你特别的傀儡当作纪念。

msg: Now, choose.
msg_zh: 来，选吧。

msg: Well, this is a surprise.
msg_zh: ……哦，来这一手啊。

msg: But aren't we forgetting something?
msg_zh: 只是你该不会忘了吧？

msg: The tipple you fooled Nepheli into drinking, yes, my little draught.
msg_zh: 在你诓骗涅斐丽，让她喝下那酒……\n那瓶我拿给你的药酒。

msg: You are already my accomplice.
msg_zh: 从那时候开始，你我早就是共犯。

msg: Are you ready to change your mind, now?
msg_zh: 既然如此，你还能有其他答案吗？

msg: It's no sin, pining for a puppet to cherish.
msg_zh: ……我说啊。\n品味傀儡的美，是非常美好的一件事。

msg: Now, hand it over, and don't make a fuss.
msg_zh: ……好了，快点归还那物品吧。

msg: Nothing bad will happen. I'll even consider giving you a puppet of your own.
msg_zh: 我不会加害于你。\n除此之外，我还可以给你一具傀儡。

msg: (huge sigh)
msg_zh: （大口叹气）

msg: You truly are beyond salvation.
msg_zh: 无药可救的蠢蛋。

msg: Fine. Leave this place, and never darken my doorstep again.
msg_zh: 那就免谈了。\n快点离开，不要再让我见到你。

msg: Ah, what a terrible pity.
msg_zh: ……唉，真是惋惜。

msg: This is the last time I'll see you, in your present state.
msg_zh: 这是最后一次见到神智清楚的你。

msg: I thought I told you never to show your face again.
msg_zh: ……我有说过，不要再让我见到你……

msg: Have you decided to return what's mine, and proffer a sincere apology?
msg_zh: 难道你是真心悔过，想归还那物品？

msg: Good, good.
msg_zh: 很好。

msg: As a man of abundant charity, I accept your apology.
msg_zh: 我为人宽大为怀，愿意接受你的悔过。

msg: And well, you finally realised, did you?
msg_zh: ……况且，你应该有自觉了吧？

msg: All you really wanted was a puppet to cherish. To fill that hole deep in your heart.
msg_zh: 自己打从心底，想要品味傀儡的美。

msg: Oh I can see right through you. That's just the kind of man you are.
msg_zh: 我当然明白，你就是这种人。

msg: Oh I can see right through you. That's just the kind of woman you are.
msg_zh: 我当然明白，你就是这种人。

msg: Well, it's been some time since a pupil of mine last walked this road.
msg_zh: ……好久没有收这方面的学生了，

msg: To mark the occasion, I shall grant you the puppet you so desire.
msg_zh: 就给你特别的傀儡当作纪念。

msg: Now, choose.
msg_zh: 来，选吧。

msg: How's the puppet I gave you?
msg_zh: ……傀儡的状况如何？

msg: A thing of exquisite craft, is it not?
msg_zh: 那孩子很棒，对吧……？

msg: What's that? You want another puppet?
msg_zh: ……哦？你想要新的傀儡？

msg: Quite the keen paramour, aren't we.
msg_zh: 出乎意料，你还真是博爱啊。

msg: Well, aren't you a woman of many passions.
msg_zh: 出乎意料，你还真是博爱啊。

msg: But, I'm afraid each and every one is like a child to me.
msg_zh: 但那些全是我心爱的孩子，

msg: I can hardly just give them away.
msg_zh: 不能白白让出……

msg: Oh dear, what's to be done?
msg_zh: ……嗯，该怎么办才好……

msg: Why don't you...fetch me some starlight shards?
msg_zh: 好，你去准备星光碎片吧。

msg: It's no mere booze, but a refined old drink of amber hue.
msg_zh: 那可不是普通的酒，是形似琥珀的老酒。

msg: If you can manage it, I'll gladly prepare a new puppet for you.
msg_zh: 把那交给我，我很乐意送你新的傀儡。

msg: The soul of every puppet has its own ambience. You'll soon come to know, once you possess a few.
msg_zh: ……拥有的傀儡一多就会明白，\n每个灵魂各有千秋。

msg: And once each's predilections are known to you, the better you'll be able to love them.
msg_zh: 在理解到这一点之后，就会更加疼爱每个孩子。

msg: Oh yes, you have much to look forward to, further down this road.
msg_zh: 只是你现在还不能体会……

msg: You're proving to be quite the puppeteer.
msg_zh: ……你在傀儡师的领域十分上进啊。

msg: I've not had an apprentice for…a very long time indeed.
msg_zh: 好久没有收这方面的学生了。

msg: Perhaps, you'd be interested in a little scheme of mine?
msg_zh: ……有个秘密，你有没有兴趣听？

msg: It will produce the finest of puppets.
msg_zh: 那是关于能亲自品味上乘傀儡的美……

msg: Which I aspire to cherish with these very hands.
msg_zh: 但是连带着，会蒙骗菈妮的秘密。

msg: A ploy to fool even Lady Ranni... How does that sound?
msg_zh: 怎么样？我想你一定有兴趣吧？

msg: Ahh, I knew I had you pegged.
msg_zh: ……啊，我明白你就是这种人。

msg: Heh. I knew I had you pegged.
msg_zh: ……啊，我明白你就是这种人。

msg: You're just like me.
msg_zh: 和我一样兴趣盎然。

msg: Then I'd like you to procure something.
msg_zh: 我想要你去准备一样东西。

msg: A rather unique starlight shard that glistens with amber.
msg_zh: 闪耀着琥珀色光芒的，特殊的星光碎片。

msg: With that, my special draught will gleam with nectar-sweetness.
msg_zh: 只要有它，我的药水就能散发出柔美光泽……

msg: And even a demigod would be slave to its charms...
msg_zh: 肯定连半神也会为之心醉。

msg: Procure it for me.
msg_zh: 快去准备先前说的东西，

msg: The rather unique starlight shard that glistens with amber.
msg_zh: 那闪耀着琥珀色光芒的，特殊的星光碎片。

msg: With that, my special draught will gleam with nectar-sweetness.
msg_zh: 只要有它，我的药水就能散发出柔美光泽……

msg: And even a demigod would be slave to its charms...
msg_zh: 肯定连半神也会为之心醉。

msg: Very good.
msg_zh: ……很好。

msg: A wise choice, indeed.
msg_zh: 标准答案。

msg: You passed my little test with flying colours.
msg_zh: ……对，我是在考验你。

msg: I was merely gauging your loyalty to Lady Ranni.
msg_zh: 测试你身为侍奉菈妮的人，到底称职与否。

msg: Well done, I'm very proud of you.
msg_zh: 你及格了，我也与有荣焉。

msg: Let's both do our utmost in service of our Lady.
msg_zh: 继续为了她鞠躬尽瘁吧。

msg: Ah ha. Might you be interested after all?
msg_zh: ……难道说，你有兴趣吗？

msg: In a fine scheme to sport with Lady Ranni?
msg_zh: 那个会蒙骗菈妮的秘密？

msg: Alright, enough of these games.
msg_zh: ……别说废话浪费时间，

msg: Your test is well and truly over.
msg_zh: 考验已经结束了。

msg: Wag your tail for master all you like, but your loyalty is merely blind.
msg_zh: 对主人摇尾巴、展现忠诚是无妨，\n但是不是也该适时遵循自己的渴望？

msg: I fear your wretched provinciality is apt to burst. You're oozing at the seams.
msg_zh: 那股藏也藏不住的肤浅，欲盖弥彰啊。

msg: Well, well, you managed to lay your hands on it!
msg_zh: ……你拿到了吗！

msg: The blessed day is finally upon us...
msg_zh: 这就是我梦寐以求的……

msg: Goodness gracious, the way it glistens...utterly enchanting.
msg_zh: 哦、哦哦，多么魅惑的光芒啊……

msg: To think, this was once a demigod's very fate...
msg_zh: 这曾是半神的命运啊……

msg: My oh my oh my...
msg_zh: 哦、哦哦……

msg: Ah, are you still here?
msg_zh: ……哦，你还没离开啊。

msg: Oh yes, I should give you your reward.
msg_zh: 想起来，我还没有给你奖励。

msg: Please, it's all yours. Splendid work. Just marvellous.
msg_zh: 你做得非常好，收下吧。

msg: Now, just you wait. The merriment is soon to begin.
msg_zh: ……还有，慢慢期待吧。

msg: The scheme I promised is to be revealed very shortly...
msg_zh: 那“秘密”已经推进到最后阶段了。

msg: Good, I've been waiting for you.
msg_zh: ……啊，等你很久了。

msg: It's finally complete. The perfection of my draught, gleaming nectar-sweet.
msg_zh: 终于完成了──\n我的药水发出了堪称完美的柔美光泽。

msg: Give it to Ranni and ensure she drinks it.
msg_zh: 好啦，让菈妮喝下吧。

msg: The dead-eyed doll lets down her guard in your presence, rather remarkably.
msg_zh: ……没什么好担心的。\n那冷冰冰的人偶，不知怎地，对你特别有兴趣。

msg: Though she might dip her hands in the dirt, and feign that icy persona…she's a frail, gentle girl at heart.
msg_zh: 即使背负罪孽，举止岸然──\n她也不过是个娇弱的可爱女孩。

msg: Though she might dip her hands in the dirt, and feign that icy persona...she's still just a feeble, pampered little girl when it comes down to it.
msg_zh: 即使背负罪孽，举止岸然──\n菈妮也不过是个娇弱的可爱女孩。

msg: Which is why you're the only one for the job.
msg_zh: 所以你应该能成功，

msg: Now do it. Make Ranni drink my draught.
msg_zh: 让菈妮喝下我制成的药酒吧。

msg: You...understand, don't you?
msg_zh: ……你懂了吗？

msg: That once you have Ranni drink my draught, my scheme will come to fruition.
msg_zh: 让菈妮喝下药水，就能实现“秘密”了──

msg: And we, well, we'll be in a position to claim the very finest puppet ever crafted.
msg_zh: 你我就能得到上乘的傀儡，尽情品味她的美。

msg: Just imagine...the pure elation...
msg_zh: 试想那有多么地愉快……

msg: Come now, don't make me wait.
msg_zh: ……啊，不要让我等太久……

msg: I can barely contain myself as it is...
msg_zh: 我快要等不及了……

msg: You'll be flabbergasted, I can assure you.
msg_zh: ……慢慢期待吧。

msg: The scheme I promised is to be revealed very shortly...
msg_zh: 那“秘密”已经推进到最后阶段了。

msg: Hmm. Is that a scroll?
msg_zh: ……哦，是卷轴啊。

msg: I won't bother to ask where you pilfered it, but...
msg_zh: 受不了，你是从哪偷来的？

msg: You're correct to assume I'm one of the few who can decipher it.
msg_zh: ……但确实，大概要到我这种水准的人，\n才有办法解读内容。

msg: So, I'm perfectly happy to take it off your hands.
msg_zh: 我就收下了。

msg: That said, don't you dare get your hopes up.
msg_zh: 别抱太大的期待啊。

msg: More often than not, new knowledge is merely an opportunity to reflect…
msg_zh: 接触新事物通常是发觉自身的平庸，

msg: …upon the mediocrity of one's intellect.
msg_zh: 还有脑力贫乏的契机。

msg: Oh, perhaps you've already noticed.
msg_zh: ……对了，话说回来，

msg: The nightly wolf howling that's been disturbing the peace here.
msg_zh: 这几天夜里有时会听见狼嚎，相当扰人。

msg: If that bothersome mutt, Blaidd, is back in town,
msg_zh: 如果你在附近见到那只蠢狗，布莱泽，

msg: then tell him to pack up and ship out.
msg_zh: 帮我传话给他，叫他快滚。

msg: I never liked the din of a dog's howl.
msg_zh: ……畜生的吠声实在恼人，受不了。

msg: From a mongrel like him, it's simply agony.
msg_zh: 更别提是那种不上不下的家伙。

msg: Well, what have we here?
msg_zh: ……哦，你这是……

msg: Are you proposing that I partake?
msg_zh: 要我喝酒吗？

msg: Do I appear such a gormless tomfool to you?
msg_zh: 你认为我有那么愚蠢？

msg: A slow-wit who'd divulge his secrets for a moment of bliss?
msg_zh: 会沉浸在一时的快乐，吐露自己的秘密？

msg: Well, let me give you some advice.
msg_zh: ……给你一个建议。

msg: Scheming has its place, but consider the one you're scheming against.
msg_zh: 用计谋算人是无妨，但要看清对手的底细。

msg: You might find yourself on the wrong end of a proper beating one day.
msg_zh: 不然总有一天，你会吃尽苦头。

msg: O-oh!
Y-you! I, er, sorry, your worship...
msg_zh: 你、你……不，您怎么……

msg: Y-you! I, er, sorry, madam...
msg_zh: 你、你……不，您怎么……

msg: I-I apologise for any offence given.
msg_zh: 没、没有注意到您，万分抱歉。

msg: I am Pidia. Servant to the Carian royal family.
msg_zh: 小的名叫毕迪，是卡利亚王室的仆人。

msg: I am charged with maintaining these g-ghastly dolls.
msg_zh: 负责打理这些恶、恶心的人偶。

msg: Ahh, your worship, allow me to be of use.
msg_zh: 啊，还请您关照、关照毕迪──

msg: Ahh, kind madam, allow me to be of use.
msg_zh: 啊，还请您关照、关照毕迪──

msg: Other than the puppets, there are some very fine things up here in this storeroom.
msg_zh: 除了人偶以外，这座仓库还有各式稀奇的物品，

msg: Why not pick something out, before you go?
msg_zh: 看过之后有属意的，也请别吝啬带走。

msg: But please, can you offer poor ill-starred Pidia...
msg_zh: 只、只是，还请您可怜、可怜小的，

msg: A little something by way of compensation?
msg_zh: 带走之余，也请留下相对的钱财……

msg: Ah, a fine day to your worship.
msg_zh: 啊，您好。

msg: Ah, kind madam, a fine day to y-you.
msg_zh: 啊，您好。

msg: Please, choose whatever you like.
msg_zh: 有属意的，请别吝啬带走。

msg: Ah, I'm sorry your worship, but poor Pidia has given all he has.
msg_zh: 啊，是您。\n小的把全部的物品都交给您了。

msg: Ah, I'm sorry kind madam, but poor Pidia has given all he has.
msg_zh: 啊，是您。\n小的把全部的物品都交给您了。

msg: I can't be of further use to you. Please, forgive me.
msg_zh: 毕迪已经竭尽所能了，请您见谅。

msg: Please, find it in your heart... Forgive me...
msg_zh: 啊啊，请您见谅、请您见谅……

msg: Argh!
msg_zh: 呀！

msg: Arrgh!
msg_zh: 呀啊！

msg: S-stop, please, stop!
msg_zh: 住手啊、住手啊……

msg: Y-you're my puppets! I loved you with all I have!
msg_zh: 你们是我的傀儡，我都投注这么多爱给你们了，

msg: How could you forget...such bliss?
msg_zh: 难道你们忘记了吗？我们的那段幸福时光。

msg: Ouch!
msg_zh: 好痛！

msg: That hurts!
msg_zh: 好痛啊！

msg: Please, I beg you, cease this cruelty!
msg_zh: 求求你们了，不要这么残忍。

msg: Eeek
msg_zh: 呀啊！

msg: Eeeeeeek!
msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

msg: Oh, that's very kind.
msg_zh: ……您、您这是，

msg: Poor Pidia could never accept such a precious brew.
msg_zh: 这么稀罕的珍品，毕迪实在不能收。

msg: Very sorry, really, if I... I've disappointed you,
msg_zh: 非、非常抱歉，无法接受您的好意。

msg: If you will, please forget this matter entirely.
msg_zh: 请您见谅。

msg: Agh!
msg_zh: 呜哇。

msg: Enough of that, now.
msg_zh: 快点住手。

msg: Have you forgotten that we both serve the same Lady?
msg_zh: 再怎么说，你我还算是共事一主的人。

msg: You incorrigible lout.
msg_zh: ……无药可救的蠢蛋。

msg: Don't you dare waltz back here ever again.
msg_zh: 不要再让我见到你。

msg: Well, well, well?
msg_zh: 哦哦哦？

msg: Thought you'd just help yourself to a man's personal belongings?
msg_zh: 想偷偷摸摸拿走别人的东西喔？

msg: You scheming little thief. The gods demand repentance!
msg_zh: 不要脸的小偷就活该遭天谴！

msg: Cough up your coin, all of it!
msg_zh: 把值钱的东西全部留下，滚吧！

msg: Wait, wait, please!
msg_zh: 等、等一下！

msg: I surrender! White flag and all!
msg_zh: 我投降！投降！

msg: For Pete's sake! I concede!
msg_zh: 住手啦！我不是说投降了吗！

msg: No one likes a bull-headed brute, you know!
msg_zh: 不听人话，小心惹人嫌喔！

msg: I yield, yield! You can't harm a yielding man!
msg_zh: 你打算攻击手无寸铁的人喔？

msg: Cripes, are you dense, boy?
msg_zh: 啧！不甩我吗！

msg: Cripes, are you dense, sweetheart?
msg_zh: 啧！不甩我吗！

msg: Fine, have it your way. You'll get what's coming.
msg_zh: 好啊，要打就来啊，打就打嘛！

msg: We're about to make out like Bandits, boys!
msg_zh: 做坏事还理直气壮，指的就是你这种人！

msg: Well, finally come around, have you?
msg_zh: ……呼，终于把人话听进去了，谢天谢地。

msg: I knew you would. You're a man of reason, through-and-through.
msg_zh: 我其实一开始就知道，\n你这个人会讲理啦。

msg: I knew you would. You're a lady of reason, through-and-through.
msg_zh: 我其实一开始就知道，\n你这个人会讲理啦。

msg: Ha ha ha...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Ahhh...
Well, what do you know? You're Tarnished, like me.
msg_zh: 仔细一看，你不也是褪色者吗？

msg: Now, how did I get that wrong?
msg_zh: 哎呀，我完全误会了说，

msg: I took you for a demi-human, or some such.
msg_zh: 还以为你是亚人之类的……

msg: An innocent mistake, I assure you.
msg_zh: 总而言之，这种不幸的误会常有啦。

msg: Well, water under the bridge. Now we're squared up, how about we play nice from now on?
msg_zh: 话说开之后，恩怨就放水流吧。\n之后再多多关照啦，如何？

msg: A true man of reason. Just what I like about you.
msg_zh: 哎呀，我就知道你讲理，太赞了。

msg: A true lady of reason. Just what I like about you.
msg_zh: 哎呀，我就知道你讲理，太赞了。

msg: I'm Patches. Patches the Untethered.
msg_zh: 我叫帕奇，“疯癫”帕奇。

msg: Tarnished, like you, only, free-spirited. Nomadic, you might say.
msg_zh: 和你一样都是褪色者，也是到处旅行的漂泊者。

msg: Only for now, those retired-soldiers-turned-bandits they're paying for my gruel.
msg_zh: 现在跟着那个落魄士兵变成的强盗团行动。\n我算是同路人啦……

msg: In exchange for my, well, showing them the ropes.
msg_zh: 总之，我有在罩他们就对了。

msg: But honestly... this looting racket is bloody terrifying.
msg_zh: 不过啊……抢夺财物这一行，风险也不小嘛。

msg: Frankly, I'm ready to wash my hands clean. Maybe set up a legitimate shop.
msg_zh: 我正打算洗手不干，改开店做生意。

msg: So, don't be a stranger, eh?
msg_zh: 所以说，有空再过来喔。

msg: I'll be ready to wheel and deal, come next time.
msg_zh: 我会做好准备，等待你大驾光临。

msg: Ha ha ha...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Slow down, son...
msg_zh: 欸欸欸……

msg: Slow down, madame...
msg_zh: 欸欸欸……

msg: What's the matter? This simply isn't like you.
msg_zh: 怎么啦？你应该很讲理的啊。

msg: You've always known an innocent mistake when you see one.
msg_zh: 明明知道这只是一场不幸的误会。

msg: Well, suit yourself.
msg_zh: 唉，就算了吧。

msg: I'm Patches. Patches the Untethered.
msg_zh: 我叫帕奇，“疯癫”帕奇。

msg: Tarnished, like you, only, free-spirited. Nomadic, you might say.
msg_zh: 和你一样都是褪色者，也是到处旅行的漂泊者。

msg: Only for now, those retired-soldiers-turned-bandits are paying for my gruel.
msg_zh: 现在跟着那个落魄士兵变成的强盗团行动。\n我算是同路人啦……

msg: In exchange for my, well, showing them the ropes.
msg_zh: 总之，我有在罩他们就对了。

msg: But honestly... this looting racket is bloody terrifying.
msg_zh: 不过啊……抢夺财物这一行，风险也不小嘛。

msg: I'm ready to wash my hands clean. Maybe set up a legitimate shop.
msg_zh: 我正打算洗手不干，改开店做生意。

msg: So, don't be a stranger, eh?
msg_zh: 所以说，有空再过来喔。

msg: I'll be ready to wheel and deal, come next time.
msg_zh: 我会做好准备，等待你大驾光临。

msg: Ha ha ha...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Don't forget to pop back for another visit, friend.
msg_zh: ……有空再过来吧。

msg: I'll be ready to wheel and deal, come next time.
msg_zh: 我会做好开店准备，等你大驾光临。

msg: Ha ha ha...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Well, nice of you to drop in, finally.
msg_zh: 嗨，你好啊，等好久啦。

msg: It's all a bit ad hoc, but I'm sure you'll find something.
msg_zh: 都是些临时进货的商品，别嫌弃来看看吧。

msg: And welcome to Patches' Emporium.
msg_zh: 欢迎光临帕奇商店，

msg: Where you won't need a refund, 'cause everything's top notch.
msg_zh: 买到绝对让你赚到。

msg: Hello, again. Welcome to Patches' Emporium.
msg_zh: 嗨，你好啊。\n欢迎光临帕奇商店。

msg: Cheers for that.
msg_zh: 铭谢惠顾──

msg: Stingy little beggar...
msg_zh: 啧，铁公鸡喔……

msg: Try to find it in your heart next time, eh?
msg_zh: 下次再请多多惠顾啦。

msg: Yeah, I had those bandits make a clean break.
msg_zh: 哦，之前那个强盗团，全都金盆洗手啦。

msg: Now they're all suppliers, and good ones at that.
msg_zh: 现在他们的专职是进货。

msg: I mean, they don't understand a word I'm saying,
msg_zh: ……哎呀，虽然完全无法沟通，

msg: but it hardly matters, we have a natural connection.
msg_zh: 但我就是觉得和他们合得来。

msg: They're all foot soldiers. Survivors of a defeated army.
msg_zh: 乍看之下，他们好像是战败的士兵。

msg: Worked to the bone by their high-and-mighty lord, only to be thrown out with the rubbish.
msg_zh: 替某个大人物做牛做马，压榨完了就被随便一扔──\n反正八九不离十，就是这回事吧。

msg: ...It's the same old story, everywhere I go. Ah, to hell with it all.
msg_zh: ……走到哪都在玩历史重演啊，混账东西。

msg: Hm? Wondering what's inside the treasure chest?
msg_zh: 嗯？你注意到那个宝箱了？

msg: Well, it's uh, nothing too special.
msg_zh: 那宝箱，嗯……放了特殊的宝物。

msg: Just something I'm saving as thanks, for a very valuable customer...
msg_zh: 我想说之后可以把那东西\n送给我们店的贵客，当作谢礼。

msg: But then again, it would fetch some spectacular coin...
msg_zh: 但是又觉得送出去很舍不得……

msg: And besides, this valuable customer could be a long time coming...
msg_zh: 唉，还不是贵客的话，这件事也不好说。

msg: Eh? Everything is give and take, give and take.
msg_zh: 你是明事理的人，应该也知道吧？\n就是所谓的人要互相、各取所需嘛。

msg: Forgot something on your shopping list?
msg_zh: 哦，漏了东西没买吗？

msg: No, no trouble to me.
msg_zh: 我最欢迎回头客了。

msg: By the way, friend...
msg_zh: 啊，你好。

msg: You've really been there for me, through thick and thin.
msg_zh: 感谢你时常光顾。

msg: And so, I've made up my mind. I bequeath that chest to you.
msg_zh: 我决定啦，那个宝箱就送给你吧。

msg: An extra-special thanks, for an extra-special customer.
msg_zh: 特殊宝物就送给你这位大贵客了。

msg: What's wrong? I've made up my mind.
msg_zh: 怎么啦？我都下定决心了。

msg: The treasure chest is yours, in word and deed.
msg_zh: 那个宝箱是你的了。

msg: Sure, it may be worth its weight in gold.
msg_zh: ……舍不得，说实话真舍不得，

msg: But a Patches Promise? Well, that's priceless!
msg_zh: 但我男子汉帕奇一言既出，驷马难追！

msg: Ah, oh... How in blazes... You're alive.
msg_zh: 哦、哦……你平安无事啊。

msg: You had me proper scared. Poofing away in a flash like that.
msg_zh: 我真的吓坏了，你突然就消失不见。

msg: Maybe it's a sign to keep your mitts off what's not rightly yours, hmm?
msg_zh: 说不定是因为你乱碰别人的东西，\n才会遭到这种天谴。

msg: But I'll forgive you. View it as a learning experience.
msg_zh: 唉，但我愿意原谅你。之后不要再犯了。

msg: At any rate, it's nice just to see you safe.
msg_zh: 总而言之，你人没事就好。

msg: And don't miss all the bargains, here at Patches' Emporium!
msg_zh: 来逛一逛帕奇商店吧。

msg: Ah, oh... How in blazes... You're alive.
msg_zh: 哦、哦……你平安无事啊。

msg: You had me proper scared. Poofing away in a flash like that.
msg_zh: 我真的吓坏了，你突然就消失不见。

msg: Who on earth spends their time booby-trapping treasure chests?
msg_zh: 万万没想到那个宝箱会藏着那种陷阱。

msg: No way I could've known, but still, I apologise. It's all very unfortunate.
msg_zh: 就算我不知情，还是万分抱歉。\n竟然发生这种不幸的意外。

msg: At any rate, it's nice just to see you safe.
msg_zh: 总而言之，你人没事就好。

msg: And don't miss all the bargains, here at Patches' Emporium!
msg_zh: 来逛一逛帕奇商店吧。

msg: Oh yes, by the way. I'm saying goodbye to the old cave.
msg_zh: 哦，你来啦。\n我差不多要离开这座洞窟了。

msg: I'm untethered, by nature, and It's about time that I moved on.
msg_zh: 我生来居无定所，疯癫度世──时候差不多到了。

msg: No worries, the old gang will inherit the shop.
msg_zh: 帕奇商店会交由他们继续经营，

msg: They may not speak a word, but they never forget a face.
msg_zh: 沟通是没办法沟通，但他们认得你。

msg: Spare them some coin after I'm gone, eh?
msg_zh: 之后再请多惠顾啦。

msg: Oh, well! It's been a long while.
msg_zh: 哦，好久不见。

msg: It's me. Patches the Untethered.
msg_zh: 是我啦，“疯癫”帕奇。

msg: I'm still in business, if you can believe it.
msg_zh: 其实我还是有继续做生意。

msg: Now I'm my only supplier, so I haven't got much, but everything here is top notch.
msg_zh: 现在连进货都是我自己包办，\n品项稍微少了点，但绝对买到不吃亏。

msg: Patches' Emporium, now open in Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 来逛一逛帕奇商店，雷亚卢卡利亚分店吧。

msg: You have yourself a discerning eye, I can tell.
msg_zh: 你很有眼光喔。

msg: That statuette will net you a small fortune, no doubt.
msg_zh: 那尊小雕像一定能卖很多钱。

msg: In fact, I'll bet any of those scruffy merchants would leap at the chance to buy it...
msg_zh: 比如说卖给那边那群……\n穿着破烂衣服的流浪商人。

msg: (laughs)
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Oh, really? No interest in the statuette?
msg_zh: 哦？你不买小雕像吗？

msg: I was sure it would catch your eye.
msg_zh: 你那么有眼光，这不寻常喔。

msg: Well, I can't force it on you, but...
msg_zh: 唉，我也不强迫推销啦……

msg: Incomparable craftsmanship, you know. I'd hate to see it go to someone else...
msg_zh: 但那东西真的不错，不买可惜啦……

msg: By the way, have you met that girl Rya?
msg_zh: 话说回来，你有见过一个叫菈雅的女孩吗？

msg: I spotted her somewhere along the highroad not long ago.
msg_zh: 前阵子我有在大道附近看到她……

msg: She's a strange one, but I believe she was in need of help.
msg_zh: 那女孩子有点奇特，看起来好像需要人帮忙。

msg: Not that it's any of my business, but...
msg_zh: 嗯，反正不关我的事……

msg: If she rings your bell, why not lend her an ear?
msg_zh: 如果你想管闲事，要不要跑一趟找她？

msg: Looking for Rya? Still hanging around on the high road, I suppose.
msg_zh: 那个叫菈雅的女孩子，应该还在大道附近吧？

msg: Oh, hello. I knew it'd all be fine...
msg_zh: 嗨，你好，还是全身而退啊。

msg: Oh, it's nothing, don't mind me. Welcome to Patches' Emporium!
msg_zh: 没事，我自言自语。\n欢迎光临帕奇商店。

msg: You're...making your way to the Erdtree, no?
msg_zh: ……你想到那棵黄金树的所在地，是吧？

msg: Well I heard something that might help. A special means of reaching your destination.
msg_zh: 是的话正好，我知道一个好方法。\n有一个特殊的方法可以到那里。

msg: Have you ever seen an iron virgin?
msg_zh: 你有看过铁少女人偶吗？

msg: The clunky contraptions are whirlwinds of sickles and spiked wheels.
msg_zh: 就是那个拿着锁镰和刺轮挥舞，\n很奇怪的自动人偶……

msg: ...but long ago, they were endowed with a spell of transposition.
msg_zh: ……听说在以前啊，\n它身上会搭载传送魔法的装置喔。

msg: And get this. A surviving virgin sits at the bottom of the big waterwheel in the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 然后啊，在雷亚卢卡利亚学院里面，\n有座大水车的底部，那里有一尊少女人偶。

msg: Its transpositional powers fully intact.
msg_zh: 据说那一尊人偶的魔法装置还好好的没坏。

msg: So, right, if you get caught in it on purpose...
msg_zh: ……所以啊，只要故意被它抓到，

msg: It'll chuck you out straight at the base of the Erdtree... Or so I'm told...
msg_zh: 就有办法到黄金树的树脚下喔……

msg: Ha ha...ha ha...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Oh yeah, great story isn't it. I'll tell you as many times as you like.
msg_zh: 哦，那个好方法啊。多听几次也好。

msg: There's a surviving Iron Virgin at the bottom of the big waterwheel in the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 在雷亚卢卡利亚学院里面有座大水车，\n它的底部有一尊少女人偶。

msg: And I heard...if you let yourself get caught in it, it'll chuck you out straight at the base of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……然后啊，只要故意被它抓到，\n就有办法到黄金树的树脚下。

msg: Heh heh...ha ha...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Well, fancy meeting you here.
msg_zh: ……没想到又遇见你啦。

msg: Hold on, don't you say a word, my friend.
msg_zh: 哦，我大概知道你想说什么，

msg: I spoke no lie, not a one.
msg_zh: 但是我可没说谎喔。

msg: You were trapped inside a volcano, no mistake,
msg_zh: 只要被抓去火山再逃出来的话，

msg: but the Erdtree was right outside. You just had to spring yourself out.
msg_zh: 那边就是黄金树的树脚下啊。

msg: I'm willing to admit. I could have been more clear.
msg_zh: 对、对啦……\n可能是我解释得不够清楚啦……

msg: But I did not lie, and you're perfectly unscathed. All's well that ends well, right?
msg_zh: 但我没说谎啊，你也平安无事。\n这就是圆满落幕、皆大欢喜啊，对不对？

msg: Oh, erm, hello, yes.
msg_zh: ……哦、哦，是你啊。

msg: Strange place for a chance encounter, eh?
msg_zh: 好巧啊，在这里遇见你。

msg: Thought I could use a rest. Don't mind me, go about your business.
msg_zh: 我正在休息。\n不用管我，你先走吧。

msg: Right, over there, see that? Something's shimmering, I swear.
msg_zh: 你看，那边好像有东西在发光耶？

msg: Heh heh heh...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: What is it? Oh, don't mind me. Off you trot.
msg_zh: ……怎、怎样啦，不用管我，你先走吧。

msg: Right over there, see that? Something's shimmering, I swear.
msg_zh: 你看，那边好像有东西在发光耶？

msg: Heh heh heh...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Oh, my, well, here you are again.
msg_zh: 嗨、嗨，你回来啦。

msg: So sorry for that. I meant to warn you, but whoops! There you went.
msg_zh: 刚才抱歉啦，我本来想要警告你，\n没想到你竟然掉下去了。

msg: Despite my best intentions, I've done you wrong, I have.
msg_zh: 虽然说是弄巧成拙，抱歉给你添了麻烦。

msg: But here you are, standing tall and proud. All's well that ends well, eh.
msg_zh: 但是啊，你也平安无事嘛。\n这样不算数啊，不算数。

msg: And my warning was spot-on, you tell me different!
msg_zh: 而且我说的警告是真的。

msg: Stay clear of Volcano Manor, end of discussion.
msg_zh: 劝你别靠近火山官邸，

msg: I heard the brutes there hunt Tarnished like animals.
msg_zh: 听说那群人正在狩猎褪色者啊。

msg: Mm...heh heh...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: You didn't listen last time, but I'm warning you again.
msg_zh: ……我说的警告是真的。

msg: Stay clear of Volcano Manor, end of discussion.
msg_zh: 劝你别靠近火山官邸，

msg: I heard the brutes there hunt Tarnished like animals.
msg_zh: 听说那群人正在狩猎褪色者啊。

msg: Heh heh...heh heh...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Well, you've joined the Manor, eh?
msg_zh: ……哦，你变成火山官邸的一员啦？

msg: I don't believe it. Didn't think you had it in you.
msg_zh: 没想过你会加入这一边，吓我一跳。

msg: And here I thought Rya was barking up the wrong tree...
msg_zh: 菈雅的眼光算是马马虎虎吧。

msg: All good, though. We're on the same side, now.
msg_zh: 唉，也好啦，总之就是同伴了。

msg: We'll do good work together.
msg_zh: 那之后再请多关照啦。

msg: Oh, and of course, we can do business, if you like.
msg_zh: 啊，对了。\n想买东西的话，我可以卖你喔。

msg: Patches' Emporium at the Volcano Manor. Specially for you.
msg_zh: 帕奇商店，火山官邸分店，\n特别为你敞开大门。

msg: Ahh, hello, what impeccable timing.
msg_zh: 哦，你在啊，刚好。

msg: This is for you.
msg_zh: 这个让给你吧。

msg: You're new here at the Manor.
msg_zh: 你在火山官邸还是个菜鸟──

msg: But if you complete the request, you can improve your standing.
msg_zh: 好好完成委托，提升对自己的信任，\n这样比较有利喔。

msg: Relax, we're old friends. Time's come to pass the torch, right?
msg_zh: 不用客气啦，我们这么熟。\n而且前辈要提携后进嘛。

msg: Go on, break a leg, then.
msg_zh: 唉，加油啦。

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: What's the matter? Having trouble nabbing your prey?
msg_zh: 怎么啦？那份委托太棘手了吗？

msg: Well, I wouldn't go asking for help so soon.
msg_zh: 不过，该怎么说呢？才刚开始就要人帮忙，

msg: We're not here to make your life easier.
msg_zh: 那你不适合待在火山官邸吧。

msg: Do you remember your vow to Tanith? To rise against the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 你不是在塔妮丝面前发过誓了吗？\n说要对黄金树举剑相向。

msg: Dare I say your heart was never in it to begin with?
msg_zh: 这样不就代表，你的决心根本不够吗？

msg: You and Diallos both. Perhaps your hearts were never in it to begin with?
msg_zh: 这样不就代表，你还有那个叫狄亚罗斯的，\n你们的决心根本不够吗？

msg: You hunted down Tragoth?
msg_zh: ……你杀了忒拉格斯？

msg: Are you certain?
msg_zh: 真的？

msg: No, it's quite alright, fine work, indeed.
msg_zh: 不，没事，这样很好。\n你做得很好。

msg: I'll give Tanith the news.
msg_zh: 我来替你向塔妮丝报告吧。

msg: Have some rest, by all means.
msg_zh: 你好好休息。

msg: Are you surprised? That I belong to the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: ……我是火山官邸的一员，你很意外吗？

msg: I always hated the gibberish about lost grace and the laughable Two Fingers.
msg_zh: 那个什么赐福的指引，还有双指之类的，\n我很认同那根本就是狗屁。

msg: I thought I could lend a hand in unmasking the charade.
msg_zh: 既然有人心有二意，打算攻其不备，\n我就觉得助阵一下也不坏。

msg: Not to mention Tanith has always made me curious.
msg_zh: ……而且啊，我觉得塔妮丝颇有意思的。

msg: I guess her master must really be something, cause she's pretty damn smug about it.
msg_zh: 不清楚她背后的主人是多厉害的角色，\n但就看她自信满满的，

msg: Even after announcing her blasphemous ambitions, she still stands proud.
msg_zh: 公开宣告亵渎的意图与野心就算了，\n还一副凛然的态度。

msg: I've never seen a woman quite like her...
msg_zh: 我还是第一次遇到那种女人……

msg: Hmph.
Sharper than you seem, aren't you...
msg_zh: 你还挺会计较的嘛。

msg: I was just holding onto it for you, you know.
msg_zh: 对啦，塔妮丝是有给我报酬。

msg: Here you go. The reward for hunting Tragoth. All yours.
msg_zh: 给你，狩猎忒拉格斯的奖励。收下吧。

msg: Now you've gone and killed Rykard?
msg_zh: ……你干掉拉卡德啦？

msg: You scheming little bastard.
msg_zh: 嘿嘿……你这男人真恐怖。

msg: You scheming little doxie.
msg_zh: 嘿嘿……你这女人真恐怖。

msg: Cripes, you make this nonsense seem, well, less nonsensical...
msg_zh: 看了你这个人，\n就觉得那句话不是空穴来风──

msg: Perhaps a Tarnished will be Elden Lord after all...
msg_zh: 褪色者能当上艾尔登之王啊……

msg: But for now, this Manor is finished.
msg_zh: ……这座官邸也差不多完蛋了。

msg: The demigod beast is slain, and Tanith has lost her head.
msg_zh: 半神怪物被打败，\n塔妮丝也失去了自我……

msg: A fine mess, but how else could it end when daddy ambition is head over heels courting lady blasphemy.
msg_zh: 心存亵渎的意图与野心，\n最后落得这种烂下场还真适合喔。

msg: Heh heh...ha ha...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Well, here I am. Untethered, once again.
msg_zh: 我打算回到疯癫度世的生活，

msg: Good-bye, my friend.
msg_zh: 再会啦。

msg: What is it?
msg_zh: 怎么啦？

msg: Oh, come to make a parting donation to Patches' Emporium?
msg_zh: 打算为帕奇商店来个最后的送别吗？

msg: Ah, oh, you again...
msg_zh: ……嗨、嗨，你好啊……

msg: A shame you had to see me like this...
msg_zh: 这么巧，在栽了斤斗的时候遇见你……

msg: Ohh, I had a bit of a slip-up, that's all.
msg_zh: ……嗯，我一闪神就这副德性了。

msg: I should have stuck to what I know best...
msg_zh: 人真的不该做超出本分的事……

msg: No matter. I know I-I can trust you.
msg_zh: ……唉，也好啦。我信得过你。

msg: Gullible, yes, but a good soul.
msg_zh: 你是个烂好人嘛……

msg: Make certain that Tanith gets this.
msg_zh: 把这东西交给塔妮丝吧。

msg: Oh, it's nothing, it's just... Makes me sick to see her all bent out of shape.
msg_zh: 那不是多厉害的东西……\n我只是看那个失去自我的女人不顺眼。

msg: C'mon, Tanith, back on your high horse, where you belong.
msg_zh: 想要她恢复自信满满的样子……

msg: You're able, then?
msg_zh: 欸，那东西，

msg: Then I can rest easy, my friend...
msg_zh: 就拜托你了……

msg: Well, well, well?
msg_zh: 哦哦哦？

msg: Thought you'd just help yourself to a man's personal belongings?
msg_zh: 想偷偷摸摸拿走别人的东西喔？

msg: You scheming little thief. The gods demand repentance!
msg_zh: 不要脸的小偷就活该遭天谴！

msg: Cough up your coin, all of it!
msg_zh: 把值钱的东西全部留下，滚吧！

msg: Hm? Wait, don't tell me, is that you?
msg_zh: ……嗯？欸，是你喔？

msg: Oh, cripes, please, wait!
msg_zh: 欸，等、等一下啦！

msg: I surrender! I surrender, I swear!
msg_zh: 投降啦！我说投降啦！

msg: Do you even hear me? I said \"surrender\", loud and clear!
msg_zh: 你的耳朵是怎样？我说投降了耶！

msg: No one likes a bull-headed brute!
msg_zh: 不听人话，小心惹人嫌喔！

msg: You'd clobber your old mate, then, would you?
msg_zh: 你打算伤害朋友喔？

msg: Cripes! Are you dense, mate?
msg_zh: 啧！不甩人喔！

msg: What in the world has gotten into you!
msg_zh: 你到底是哪根筋不对啦？

msg: Fine, have it your way. You'll get what's coming.
msg_zh: 好啊，要打就来啊，打就打嘛！

msg: Don't go thinking I'm a soft touch!
msg_zh: 劝你不要看扁我！

msg: Well, glad to see we're on the same page.
msg_zh: ……呼，终于把人话听进去了，谢天谢地。

msg: I'd never cross you, not even close.
msg_zh: 要我跟你打，我还真百般不情愿咧。

msg: He he he...
msg_zh: 嘿嘿嘿……

msg: Ahhh...
It's been ages since I've seen you.
msg_zh: 好久不见了啊。

msg: I didn't even realise it was you.
msg_zh: 我完全误会了说，

msg: Took you for a demi-human, or some such.
msg_zh: 还以为你是亚人之类的……

msg: You know how it is, just an innocent mistake.
msg_zh: 唉，这种不幸的误会常有嘛。

msg: Water under the bridge, eh, back to business as usual?
msg_zh: 话说开之后，恩怨放水流。\n再多多关照啦。

msg: Hell's bells...
msg_zh: 话说回来啊……

msg: This bandit business is hardly what it's cracked up to be...
msg_zh: 抢夺财物这一行，风险真的不小。

msg: Especially if we keep running into the likes of you...
msg_zh: 要是运气差抢到像你这种人，\n完全就会赔了夫人又折兵。

msg: ...Maybe I'll set up another shop with the lads...
msg_zh: 也许该和他们再开始做生意吧……

msg: ...Maybe I'll set up another shop with the lads...
msg_zh: 也许该和他们再开始做生意吧……

msg: Well, finally made it, eh, and just in time.
msg_zh: 嗨，你好啊，等好久啦。

msg: For the grand reopening of Patches' Emporium.
msg_zh: 帕奇商店重新开幕。

msg: Where you won't need a refund, 'cause everything is top notch!
msg_zh: 买到绝对让你赚到。

msg: Hello, again. Welcome to Patches' Emporium.
msg_zh: 嗨，你好啊。\n欢迎光临帕奇商店。

msg: Cheers for that.
msg_zh: 铭谢惠顾──

msg: What, do I have to beg?
msg_zh: 啧，铁公鸡喔……

msg: Give us a coin or two next time around, will you?
msg_zh: 下次再请多多惠顾啦。

msg: Forgot something on your shopping list?
msg_zh: 哦，漏了东西没买吗？

msg: No trouble to me.
msg_zh: 我最欢迎回头客了。

msg: Booze, eh? Good stuff, by the look of it.
msg_zh: ……哦，是酒啊？看起来挺赞的。

msg: But, er, I'm alright, thanks.
msg_zh: 但不劳费心了。

msg: As my dear nan used to say, \"there's no such thing as a free lunch\"...
msg_zh: 我家的祖母最常讲：“免费的东西最贵”。

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 哇！

msg: What are you playing at? That bloody well hurts!
msg_zh: 痛死啦！你干么啦！

msg: What's wrong with you?
msg_zh: 你怎么啦？

msg: It's me, Patches. Patches!
msg_zh: 是我啊！帕奇啊！

msg: Enough now, stop!
msg_zh: 快住手啦！

msg: Ugh. Hard of hearing, are we?
msg_zh: 啧！不甩人喔！

msg: Fine, have it your way. You'll get what's coming!
msg_zh: 好啊，要打就来啊，打就打嘛！

msg: Don't go thinking I'm a soft touch!
msg_zh: 劝你不要看扁我！

msg: Last chance to surrender, mate.
msg_zh: 想投降的话趁现在啊，

msg: Grovel...and I'll forgive you.
msg_zh: 只要下跪求饶，我就愿意原谅你喔！

msg: Well... It was bound to happen some day...
msg_zh: ……我就知道迟早会这样，

msg: What a shit show...
msg_zh: 混账东西……

msg: Try not to be so slow on the uptake, eh.
msg_zh: 不听人话，小心惹人嫌啊……

msg: There's a special circle, for rotten thieves like you.
msg_zh: 不要脸的小偷，活该遭天谴啊……

msg: Well, it looks like you've seen the error of your ways.
msg_zh: ……你好像有在反省嘛。

msg: Water under the bridge. Am I wrong?
msg_zh: 那就当作没发生吧。

msg: We'll call it a momentary lapse of judgment. \"All's well\", as you know.
msg_zh: 彼此的恩恩怨怨就归零，不算数了。

msg: So, what can I do you for today?
msg_zh: 好啦，找我有什么事？

msg: Okay, I can see you mean it.
msg_zh: ……跪得真标准啊。

msg: Consider it water under the bridge.
msg_zh: 事情就当作没发生吧。

msg: A momentary lapse of judgment. \"All's well\", as you know.
msg_zh: 彼此的恩恩怨怨就归零，不算数了。

msg: So. Do you need something from me?
msg_zh: 好啦，找我有什么事？

msg: Hello? Is somebody there?
msg_zh: ……有人在那里吗？

msg: Might I bend your ear for a moment, please.
msg_zh: 拜托您，请听我说。

msg: My name is Irina. I've escaped from Castle Morne, to the south.
msg_zh: 我的名字是伊蕾娜，\n是从南方的摩恩城逃出来的。

msg: The servants there...have rebelled.
msg_zh: 城里的仆人群起叛乱，

msg: I-I can't be sure what it is; my eyesight's been weak since birth you see...
msg_zh: 我生来眼睛不方便，没办法全盘了解发生什么事，

msg: But I swear I heard frightful howling from all over.
msg_zh: 但是我听到恐怖的嘶吼声从四方传来。

msg: My good father secreted me out the castle,
msg_zh: 父亲让我逃了出来……

msg: but decided himself to stay. He says it's his duty, as commander.
msg_zh: 但是他还留在那座城里面，\n认为那是掌权者应尽的职责。

msg: I understand.
msg_zh: ……我明白了。

msg: I fear some of the castle's servants are still prowling nearby.
msg_zh: ……说不定那些仆人还在附近徘徊，

msg: Do take care on the road. I pray your journey comes to fruition.
msg_zh: 请您一路小心，\n希望您在旅途的终点能如愿以偿。

msg: And if you happen to change your mind...
msg_zh: ……还有如果您改变心意了，

msg: Please come to see me again.
msg_zh: 请再和我说一声。

msg: Hello? Is somebody there?
msg_zh: ……有人在那里吗？

msg: Ah, you're the one from before, aren't you?
msg_zh: 难道是刚才那位吗？

msg: Please, I implore you.
msg_zh: ……拜托您了。

msg: Would you mind taking a letter to my father, at the castle?
msg_zh: 能不能把这封信交给留在城里的父亲？

msg: My sole wish is that he escape,even if his honour should be the price.
msg_zh: 就算会背负弃城懦夫的骂名，\n我也希望父亲离开那座城。

msg: Please...I just need him to be safe...
msg_zh: ……我希望父亲活下来。

msg: Thank you, dearly.
msg_zh: 噢，谢谢您。

msg: Then please, take this.
msg_zh: 那么，请收下……

msg: Deliver it to my father, who remains in the castle, if you please.
msg_zh: 拜托您，请交给留在城里的父亲。

msg: Please, if you wouldn't mind. Deliver the letter to my father at the castle.
msg_zh: 拜托您了，请把那封信交给留在城里的父亲。

msg: He can be stubborn, but I'm sure he'll come around.
msg_zh: 他的个性顽固，但看过信之后一定会改变心意。

msg: I...I fear for father's life.
msg_zh: ……我很担心父亲。

msg: The servants are full wroth. Filled with hatred for every one of us.
msg_zh: 仆人非常愤怒，恨着我们所有人，

msg: They've since come for every one of the companions I escaped with.They haven't spared a soul.
msg_zh: 那些一起逃出来的人都受他们攻击……全部消失了。

msg: I fear it's no different at Castle Morne...
msg_zh: 摩恩城会不会也是同样情况……

msg: Please, I implore you.
msg_zh: ……我想拜托您。

msg: Would you mind taking a letter to my father, at the castle?
msg_zh: 能不能把这封信交给留在城里的父亲呢？

msg: My sole wish is that he escape,even if his honour should be the price.
msg_zh: 就算会背负弃城懦夫的骂名，\n我也希望父亲离开那座城。

msg: Please...I just want him to be safe...
msg_zh: ……我希望父亲活下来。

msg: Hello? Is someone there?
msg_zh: ……有人在那里吗？

msg: My name is Hyetta, and I'm journeying in search of the distant light.
msg_zh: 初次见面，您好。我的名字是海妲，\n正为了找寻彼岸灯火而旅行。

msg: If I might be so bold as to ask...
msg_zh: 在此，我有一个不情之请……

msg: Would you donate any Shabriri grapes in your possession to me?
msg_zh: 如果您有夏玻利利葡萄，能不能请您让给我呢？

msg: My eyesight has been weak since birth, you see.I can't tell which way I'm supposed to go next.
msg_zh: 我自出生眼睛就不方便，看不清该何去何从，

msg: But when I eat one of those grapes, I can feel a distant lightin the back of my eyes.
msg_zh: 但只要吃了那葡萄，\n就能从眼睛深处感觉到彼岸灯火。

msg: It will lead me, to my true duty, as a Finger Maiden.
msg_zh: 朝着灯火前进，成为指头女巫──就是我的使命。

msg: Hello? Is someone there?
msg_zh: ……有人在那里吗？

msg: Would you donate any Shabriri grapes in your possession to me?
msg_zh: 如果您有夏玻利利葡萄，能不能请您让给我呢？

msg: I'm on a pilgrimage in search of the distant light.
msg_zh: 我正为了找寻彼岸灯火而旅行。

msg: And when I eat one of those grapes, I can feel the lightin the back of my eyes.
msg_zh: 只要吃了那葡萄，\n就能从眼睛深处感觉到它。

msg: Oh, many thanks to you.
msg_zh: 啊，谢谢您。

msg: Now I can feel the distant light once more.
msg_zh: 这么一来，我就能再次感受到彼岸灯火了。

msg: You are most kind, indeed.
msg_zh: 我很感谢您的好心，

msg: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
msg_zh: 愿您也有指头的庇护。

msg: You're not like the others who give me grapes, are you...
msg_zh: ……您真的很特别。

msg: They rest their trembling hands upon me.
msg_zh: 其他给我葡萄的人，\n每个人都颤抖着手碰触我，

msg: Howling wordlessly, they gently stroke my eyes.
msg_zh: 一边发出不成话语的嘶喊，\n一边轻轻地摸过我的眼睛。

msg: Their frail fingers, emaciated... Yet still, they give me the grapes.
msg_zh: 那些非常干瘦的手给了我葡萄。

msg: But you...seem somehow...firmer.
msg_zh: 而您带给我的……是很强大的印象。

msg: Oh, many thanks to you.
msg_zh: 啊，谢谢您。

msg: Now I can feel the distant light once more.
msg_zh: 这么一来，我就能再次感受到彼岸灯火了。

msg: That aside, I wonder what Shabriri grapes really are?
msg_zh: 话说回来，夏玻利利葡萄到底是什么模样呢？

msg: Delectably tender and sweet, yet searing...
msg_zh: 咬起来粘稠又柔软，甘甜又有些烫口……

msg: What a sight they must be to behold.
msg_zh: 那肯定是很美丽的果实吧？

msg: N-No... That's not possible...
msg_zh: ……怎么会……

msg: Not all of those people... Their own...
msg_zh: ……可是那代表……大家……

msg: So those noises I heard were...
msg_zh: 那声音……

msg: <retching>
Sorry... I'm alright now.
msg_zh: ……不好意思，我已经没事了。

msg: Don't mind me...
msg_zh: 请您不必挂心。

msg: Ah, is that you over there?
msg_zh: ……噢，您人在那里吗？

msg: I've gleaned something very important indeed, thanks to you.
msg_zh: ……您让我察觉了很棒的事情：

msg: The reason why it was eyes I had to eat.
msg_zh: 葡萄等同眼眸，以及我吃下它有什么意义。

msg: The distant light is far and frail.
msg_zh: 彼岸灯火距离遥远，火光细小。

msg: So faint it can't be seen by the naked eye.
msg_zh: 所以单靠一个人的眼眸，实在无法分辨。

msg: But with everyone's eyes together, it appears.
msg_zh: ……将大家的眼眸集中起来，就能感觉到它了。

msg: Finally, it all makes sense.
msg_zh: ……我终于明白了。

msg: I'm certain now. I will be a Finger Maiden.
msg_zh: 我一定能够成为指头女巫。

msg: You are most kind, indeed.
msg_zh: 感谢您的好心。

msg: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
msg_zh: 愿您也有指头的庇护。

msg: You are most kind, indeed.
msg_zh: 感谢您的好心。

msg: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
msg_zh: 愿您也有指头的庇护。

msg: I wonder, what are Shabriri grapes?
msg_zh: ……夏玻利利葡萄到底是什么模样呢？

msg: Delectably tender and sweet, yet searing...
msg_zh: 咬起来粘稠又柔软，甘甜又有些烫口……

msg: What a sight they must be to behold.
msg_zh: 那肯定是很美丽的果实吧？

msg: I apologise. You only did as I asked.
msg_zh: ……不好意思，您特意告诉我，我还这种反应。

msg: I'll be fine. Think no more of it.
msg_zh: 已经没事了，请您不必挂心……

msg: I've gleaned something very important indeed, thanks to you.
msg_zh: ……您让我察觉了很棒的事情。

msg: I'm certain now. I will be a Finger Maiden.
msg_zh: 我一定能够成为指头女巫。

msg: Oh hello, is that you over there?
msg_zh: ……噢，您人在那里吗？

msg: Have you ever heard of fingerprint grapes?
msg_zh: 您知道指痕葡萄吗？

msg: They're special grapes which only grow on thosewho've been clasped by the burnt Fingers...
msg_zh: 那是只长在烧伤手指抓过的生物身上，\n很特殊的葡萄……

msg: I would truly love to try one...
msg_zh: 我想要尝尝那种葡萄。

msg: The distant light seems far closer than before,
msg_zh: 彼岸灯火已经比之前更加靠近了，

msg: But I can't sense a thing from the usual grapes anymore...
msg_zh: 但是以普通的葡萄，我感觉不到任何改变。

msg: Please, could you donate a fingerprint grape to me?
msg_zh: 拜托您，请将指痕葡萄带来给我。

msg: Without one I don't know, I feel like I might go mad.
msg_zh: 如果吃不到那葡萄，啊啊，我好像就快发疯了。

msg: Oh, Oh!
msg_zh: 啊，啊啊！

msg: A fingerprint grape, tried and true, what a wondrous thing! A fingerprint grape!
msg_zh: 指痕葡萄、指痕葡萄，这个就是，对吧？

msg: Ohh, how sweet, yet, how it burns...
msg_zh: ……啊，多么地甘甜，多么地烫口呀……

msg: Thank you. I've composed myself again.
msg_zh: ……谢谢您。我的心总算平静下来了。

msg: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
msg_zh: 愿您也有指头的庇护。

msg: Oh, that's right.
msg_zh: ……啊，我想起来了。

msg: ...Might I ask a boon of you?
msg_zh: 可以拜托您一件事情吗？

msg: Look after this for me, if you please.
msg_zh: 我想把这件物品托付给您。

msg: It's been so long, I don't know how I came upon it,but I've been looking for its owner.
msg_zh: 它跟着我似乎有一阵子了，\n但我不知道属于谁，想找出它的所有人。

msg: Now I'm to be a Maiden though, it'll never find its way home.
msg_zh: 只是我一直找不到。\n在成为女巫之后，就没办法一边旅行，一边寻找了。

msg: Which is why I'd like you to have it.
msg_zh: 所以我想要把它交给您。

msg: It must be very, very precious indeed.
msg_zh: 这肯定是很重要的物品……

msg: They're special grapes which only grow on thosewho've been clasped by the burnt Fingers...
msg_zh: 那是只长在烧伤手指抓过的生物身上，\n很特殊的葡萄……

msg: Please, could you donate a fingerprint grape to me?
msg_zh: 拜托您，请将指痕葡萄带来给我。

msg: Without one I don't know, I feel like I might go mad.
msg_zh: 如果吃不到那葡萄，啊啊，我好像就快发疯了。

msg: Thank you from the bottom of my heart.
msg_zh: ……谢谢您。

msg: I'm sure I'll be a Finger Maiden.
msg_zh: 我一定会成为指头女巫。

msg: Ah, so you're here as well, are you?
msg_zh: ……噢，您也抵达这里了。

msg: ...I realised as we've talked.
msg_zh: ……每和您攀谈一次，就更明白──

msg: I'll be a Maiden, and you... Surely, a Lord.
msg_zh: 我是女巫，而您一定会成为王。

msg: Go to the door ahead, after divesting yourself of your possessions.
msg_zh: 请卸下一切，往前方的门前进。

msg: It will surely open, and the Three Fingers will welcome you.
msg_zh: 门一定会为您而开，您也会见到叁指大人。

msg: May the flame of chaos find purchase within you.
msg_zh: ……愿浑沌火焰能深植于您。

msg: Go to the door ahead, after divesting yourself of your possessions.
msg_zh: 请卸下一切，往前方的门前进。

msg: It will surely open, and the Three Fingers will welcome you.
msg_zh: 门一定会为您而开，您也会见到叁指大人。

msg: Ahh, the flame of chaos has nestled within you.
msg_zh: ……啊，浑沌火焰深植您的体内了。

msg: Could you please rest your hand upon me?
msg_zh: 可以请您碰触我吗？

msg: Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...
msg_zh: 请用那火焰燃烧我，让我成为您的女巫……

msg: Oh, it burns...
msg_zh: ……啊啊，好烫……

msg: My eyes, my eyes, they're melting...
msg_zh: 我的眼睛、我的眼睛要熔化了。

msg: Aaargh!
msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊……

msg: Could you please rest your hand upon me?
msg_zh: 可以请您碰触我吗？

msg: Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...
msg_zh: 请用那火焰燃烧我，让我成为您的女巫……

msg: Thank...thank you...
msg_zh: 谢谢、您。

msg: I have touched them. The words of the Three Fingers.
msg_zh: ……我感应到叁指大人的话了。

msg: As your maiden, allow me to divine them.
msg_zh: 身为您的女巫，请让我转达。

msg: All that there is came from the One Great.
msg_zh: “……万事始于巨大的一，由一产生区别。”

msg: Then came fractures, and births, and souls.
msg_zh: “产生区别后，生命诞生，也拥有了心智。”

msg: But the Greater Will made a mistake.
msg_zh: “然而这就是无上意志犯下的错误。”

msg: Torment, despair, affliction. Every sin, every curse.
msg_zh: “痛苦、绝望、诅咒──所有的罪恶与苦痛，”

msg: Every one, born of the mistake.
msg_zh: “全是由‘错误’而生。”

msg: And so, what was borrowed must be returned.
msg_zh: “所以我们必须重回起点──”

msg: Melt it all away, with the yellow chaos flame.
msg_zh: “用浑沌的黄色火焰熔化一切，”

msg: Until all is One again.
msg_zh: “熔化一切，重回巨大的一……”

msg: Those who gave me grapes howled without words.
msg_zh: ……那些给我葡萄的人，\n虽然不成话语，但所有人在嘶喊。

msg: Saying they wished they were never born.
msg_zh: 说着：自己不是自愿诞生世上。

msg: Become their lord.
msg_zh: ……请您成为他们的王。

msg: Take their torment, despair. Their affliction. Every sin, every curse.
msg_zh: 成为痛苦、绝望、诅咒，所有的罪恶与苦痛──

msg: And melt it all away. As the Lord of Chaos.
msg_zh: 都能熔化消失的，浑沌之王……

msg: No more fractures. No more birth...
msg_zh: 让所有人不再有区别，不再诞生……

msg: Agh!
msg_zh: 呜！

msg: What's happened to you?
msg_zh: 您怎么了？

msg: Please, you must stop this.
msg_zh: 请您住手，拜托。

msg: Ah, why on earth?
msg_zh: 唉，为什么要这么做呢？

msg: I do not wish to cause anyone harm.
msg_zh: 我不想伤害任何人。

msg: Oh, bless the stars.
msg_zh: ……啊，终于。

msg: You've chosen to reconsider.
msg_zh: 您愿意好好谈一谈了吗？

msg: Father...
msg_zh: ……父亲啊……

msg: Please, be safe...
msg_zh: 请您一定、要平安……

msg: Ahh, the distant light...fades...
msg_zh: ……啊，彼岸灯火、在消失……

msg: I'm so sorry, my dears...
msg_zh: 大家，对不起……

msg: Ah, there's a face I've not seen before.
msg_zh: ……哦，我没见过你。

msg: I'm Edgar, warden of this castle as ordained by Lord Godrick himself.
msg_zh: 我是艾德格。\n奉葛瑞克大人之命，固守这座城……

msg: But you can see how things have turned out.
msg_zh: 但你也见识到现在的窘态。

msg: The menials have all rebelled.
msg_zh: ……仆人全都造反了。

msg: They gave me good service, or so I thought,but it seems it was all an act.
msg_zh: 才以为他们安份工作，没想到只是障眼法。

msg: Foul creatures, as it's said.And true enough they're foul inside and out.
msg_zh: 真是名副其实的玷污者，连心也一样污秽。

msg: I'm sorry to disappoint you,
msg_zh: ……对你很不好意思，

msg: But whatever you've come here to do,I'm afraid Castle Morne won't hold much longer.
msg_zh: 即使你有任何请托，摩恩城也无法回应。

msg: Take this, by way of apology.
msg_zh: 这是表示歉意的薄礼，你收下吧。

msg: Now then, away with you.
msg_zh: 好了，快离开吧。

msg: You've no reason to risk your neck dawdling here, eh.
msg_zh: 你没有理由在这里赌上性命。

msg: I see, from Irina...
msg_zh: ……原来，伊蕾娜她……

msg: Thank you. I'm in your debt.
msg_zh: 谢谢你，你照顾了我女儿。

msg: But I can't leave yet.
msg_zh: 但我还不能离开。

msg: Even if the castle should fall, as commander, I must remain.
msg_zh: 即使城已经失守，身为掌权者还是有事得做。

msg: To ensure the treasured sword of Morne does not fall into the wrong hands.
msg_zh: 那把剑，摩恩的无价之宝，\n绝不能落入玷污者手里……

msg: If you see Irina, do tell her.
msg_zh: 在你遇到伊蕾娜之后，帮我传话吧：

msg: That her father will come for her, once he's fulfilled his duty.
msg_zh: 等到该尽的责任完了，父亲一定会去接她。

msg: I'm in your debt.
msg_zh: ……承蒙相助。

msg: For keeping the sword from those fallen creatures.
msg_zh: 那把剑总算免除落入玷污者手中的命运。

msg: I'm no longer bound by duty.
msg_zh: ……我的责任已了。

msg: Once I've rescued Irina, I will spend my remaining days with her.
msg_zh: 该动身去接伊蕾娜。从今以后，我要为她而活。

msg: Thanks to you, I will be reunited with Irina.
msg_zh: 承蒙相助，我才有办法去接伊蕾娜。

msg: And devote my remaining days to her.
msg_zh: 从今以后，我要为了女儿而活。

msg: Irina has a gentle nature, though.
msg_zh: ……只是伊蕾娜实在太过善良。

msg: I only hope it remains intact.
msg_zh: 希望她没有被意图不轨的人算计。

msg: Irina...
msg_zh: ……伊蕾娜。

msg: How could this be…
msg_zh: 为什么……

msg: My daughter deserved better…
msg_zh: 我的女儿做了什么……

msg: The fault lies...with me.
msg_zh: ……都该怪我。

msg: I chose duty over my daughter's safety.
msg_zh: 因为我把职责摆在最前头，

msg: And that is how fate has answered…
msg_zh: 才会受到这种报应……

msg: I'll find them.
msg_zh: ……我要找出来。

msg: The foul wretches responsible for this.
msg_zh: 那群让你沦落这种下场的畜牲，

msg: I'll hunt them down, and exterminate every last one of them.
msg_zh: 我一定会全找出来，把他们杀得片甲不留……

msg: Rest assured, Irina. It will be done.
msg_zh: 唉，伊蕾娜啊。为父肯定说到做到……

msg: Ugh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: What's this about?
msg_zh: 这是做什么？

msg: We need not fight, I assure you.
msg_zh: 我们没有必要交战。

msg: I haven't a clue what's got into you,
msg_zh: ……我不了解你的意图。

msg: but as Lord of this castle, I will stand for it no longer!
msg_zh: 但我艾德格不会轻饶！

msg: And now even your ilk have complicated matters.
msg_zh: ……连你这种分子都混了进来。

msg: Please, enlighten me.
msg_zh: 我真的不明白，

msg: What was the purpose of such folly?
msg_zh: 你到底图的是什么？

msg: Please forgive me, Lord Godrick.
msg_zh: 万分抱歉，葛瑞克大人……

msg: No, not here, not yet…
msg_zh: ……不该是在这种时候……

msg: Forgive me, Iri…na…
msg_zh: 为父对不起你，伊蕾、娜……

msg: Ugh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: What's the matter?
msg_zh: 你是在做什么？

msg: Cease this at once.
msg_zh: 还不住手。

msg: Ah, now I see!
msg_zh: ……该不会吧。

msg: You had a hand in Irina's undoing!
msg_zh: 杀害伊蕾娜这档事，你也有份吗！

msg: What could she have done to deserve that?
msg_zh: 那孩子做了什么，必须有这种下场！

msg: I will not rest until they are eliminated.
msg_zh: 为父一定会将他们杀得片甲不留。

msg: Forgive me, Irina…
msg_zh: 为父对不起你，伊蕾、娜……

msg: I will join you soon enough…
msg_zh: 现在就去、接你……

msg: Oh, Tarnished, are you?
msg_zh: 哦，是褪色者啊。

msg: How did you slip inside, with the gate closed?
msg_zh: 城门早就关闭了，你从哪里混进来的吶？

msg: Hmph. No matter.
msg_zh: 罢了，不深究。

msg: If you can fell one of them, you're a champion, in my book.
msg_zh: 有能耐打赢那群家伙，想必也有资格成为勇士。

msg: I am Jerren. Foolish old warrior, and witness.
msg_zh: 我叫杰廉，只是个不起眼的老战士……还有见证人。

msg: Incidentally, do you like a good festival, from time to time?
msg_zh: 我问你，你喜欢祭典吗？

msg: Well, it's true, this fortress houses only the vanquished.
msg_zh: 目前这地方只是座败战军的要塞，

msg: But when the stars align, we celebrate.
msg_zh: 等到天空布满繁星，就会化成祭典的舞台。

msg: A war festival honoring the last battle and death of General Radahn,
msg_zh: 那是为了凭吊破碎战争中\n最为强大的半神──拉塔恩将军，

msg: the mightiest demigod of the Shattering, and bearer of a Great Rune.
msg_zh: 纪念他的最后一战，还有继承大卢恩的战斗祭典。

msg: Well, good.
msg_zh: 哦，这样啊。

msg: As you should. The festival affords glory to warriors.
msg_zh: 也是啊，祭典能让战士获得名誉嘛。

msg: Then all you need is a little patience.
msg_zh: 有兴趣的话，稍待片刻吧。

msg: When the stars align, the festival will be declared.
msg_zh: 等到繁星出现，也会带来祭典开始的信号。

msg: Well, you're not much fun, are you, chum?
msg_zh: 哦，你这人还真没趣。

msg: No matter. One day you will see.
msg_zh: 算了，也罢。只是时间问题，你迟早会明白──

msg: That true warriors bask in glory at the festival.
msg_zh: 参与祭典才能获得战士的名誉吶。

msg: Have patience, mm.
msg_zh: 稍待片刻吧。

msg: When the stars align, the festival will be declared.
msg_zh: 等到繁星出现，也会带来祭典开始的信号。

msg: Go on, now.
msg_zh: ……好啦，离开吧。

msg: This old geezer hasn't any use for you just yet.
msg_zh: 现在你哪有事情需要找我？

msg: One day you will see, chum.
msg_zh: 你迟早会明白──

msg: That true warriors bask in glory at the festival.
msg_zh: 参与祭典才能获得战士的名誉吶。

msg: Go on, now.
msg_zh: ……好啦，离开吧。

msg: This old geezer hasn't any use for you just yet.
msg_zh: 现在你哪有事情需要找我？

msg: Well, I haven't heard that name in an age.
msg_zh: 哦，这名字真让人怀念吶。

msg: Then you must serve Princess Ranni?
msg_zh: 你隶属菈妮大人吗？

msg: The next time you speak to Iji, tell him this:
msg_zh: 那帮我带话给伊吉吧：

msg: The festival of Radahn will surely set Ranni's fate back into motion.
msg_zh: 拉塔恩的战斗祭典\n肯定能带动菈妮大人的命运。

msg: By the by… Is that old fool still hammering out weapons?
msg_zh: ……对了，那家伙还在锻造武器吗？

msg: His enormous frame, cramped in that little place...
msg_zh: 看他把巨大的身体缩得小小的，好像很不自在……

msg: Bit of a haughty sort. Strange fella, when I knew him.
msg_zh: 而且还啰唆得很，真是奇怪无比的巨人吶。

msg: And funny thing, his swords were all blunt as stone.
msg_zh: 嗯，不过啊……他锻造的武器虽然钝到不行，

msg: But not one of them decayed when faced with the scarlet rot...
msg_zh: 但是在对上猩红腐败，却不会受到腐朽侵蚀……

msg: Champions, welcome!
msg_zh: 诸位勇士啊，欢迎你们！

msg: The stars have aligned! The festival is nigh!
msg_zh: 繁星布满天空，祭典的时刻到了！

msg: General Radahn, mightiest demigod of the Shattering, awaits you!
msg_zh: 破碎战争中最强大的半神，拉塔恩将军正在等着你们。

msg: Champions, prepare for battle! Defeat the General, claim glory, and grab that Great Rune!
msg_zh: 勇士啊，战斗吧！\n满怀荣誉击败强敌，取得大卢恩吧！

msg: A celebration of war! The Radahn Festival!
msg_zh: 战斗祭典开始啦！拉塔恩祭典开始啦！

msg: Are you good and prepared, young chum?
msg_zh: ……你准备好了吗？

msg: The festival begins!
msg_zh: 拉塔恩祭典要开始了。

msg: But now, we must make merry.
msg_zh: ……好啦，该开始了。

msg: O gathering of champions, the revels begin!
msg_zh: 勇士啊，祭典拉开序幕啦！

msg: The celebration of war! The Radahn Festival!
msg_zh: 战斗祭典开始啦！拉塔恩祭典开始啦！

msg: You will find the field of battle past the church ahead, upon the shore under the fort.
msg_zh: 从前方的教堂进到要塞底下的海岸吧，\n战场就在那里。

msg: General Radahn is there, even now.
msg_zh: 拉塔恩将军还留在原地。

msg: Divested of his wits, devouring corpses…
msg_zh: ……依旧失去神智，啃食尸体。

msg: And howling at the sky...
msg_zh: ……依旧朝天空发出痛心的哭喊。

msg: I see...
msg_zh: ……还没好啊。

msg: When you are ready, come to me again.
msg_zh: 等你准备好之后，再和我说一声吶。

msg: At last, the war festival has ended.
msg_zh: ……战斗祭典结束了，是吧？

msg: Brave champion, you have our gratitude.
msg_zh: 勇士啊，我要对你表示谢意。

msg: The celebration was spectacular. General Radahn is surely pleased.
msg_zh: 这场战斗祭典很不错，将军肯定很满意。

msg: Festering with rot, and crippled by madness, all he wanted was an honourable death.
msg_zh: 比起受腐败侵蚀，陷入发狂与腐朽的境地，\n这结果名誉得多。

msg: Finally, my work is done.
msg_zh: ……这下总算尽了我的责任。

msg: I am no longer bound to this fortress.
msg_zh: 没必要继续留在这座要塞了。

msg: I have a task in mind.
msg_zh: 我打算出门旅行，

msg: Old business you could say. You wouldn't understand.
msg_zh: 我也有自己的过去吶。

msg: May we meet again, if the fates deign it. Brave champion.
msg_zh: 有缘再见吧，勇士。

msg: It's time I went on my way.
msg_zh: 好啦，我要准备出门旅行了。

msg: May we meet again, if the fates deign it. Brave champion.
msg_zh: 有缘再见吧，勇士。

msg: Ah, well met.
msg_zh: 哦，是你啊。

msg: I hardly expected to see the champion of the festival here of all places.
msg_zh: 没想到会在这里和祭典的勇士相会。

msg: You didn't...know Sellen, did you?
msg_zh: 难道你和瑟濂有牵扯？

msg: Well, whatever the case, she's dead now.
msg_zh: 无论如何，这女人已经死了。

msg: Just put it behind you.
msg_zh: 劝你忘了关于她的一切吶。

msg: She was known as the Graven Witch.
msg_zh: ……她是“魔块魔女”──

msg: Obsessed by the primeval current, countless sorcerers fell to her hand.
msg_zh: 沉迷于起源论调，对无数魔法师狠下毒手，

msg: The most dangerous mage in the entire history of Raya Lucaria's Academy.
msg_zh: 是雷亚卢卡利亚学院有史以来最为棘手的灾难。

msg: Oh, a Tarnished, are you?
msg_zh: 哦，是褪色者啊。

msg: You didn't...know Sellen, did you?
msg_zh: 难道你和瑟濂有牵扯？

msg: It is strange, though...
msg_zh: ……只是，有些蹊跷……

msg: The woman, she was like a husk, her soul already fled.
msg_zh: 这女人让我感觉，像是没了灵魂的空壳。

msg: I suspect Sellen lives on, elsewhere.
msg_zh: 瑟濂的实体可能还幸存，

msg: I'm sure she'll turn up eventually, in another body.
msg_zh: 未来也许会透过其他身体，再一次现身……

msg: A sickening thought, but one that won't stop gnawing at me.
msg_zh: 真是不吉利，但我忍不住这么想。

msg: I suspect Sellen lives on, elsewhere.
msg_zh: 瑟濂的实体可能还幸存，

msg: I'm sure she'll turn up eventually, in another body.
msg_zh: 未来也许会透过其他身体，再一次现身……

msg: A sickening thought, but one that won't stop gnawing at me.
msg_zh: 真是不吉利，但我忍不住这么想。

msg: My thanks, for the aid given.
msg_zh: ……承蒙拔刀相助，感激不尽。

msg: I heard from Iji that Lady Ranni might have found herself a champion.
msg_zh: 我有听伊吉提起，\n说菈妮大人可能遇见了英雄，

msg: But I didn't know he was talking about you.
msg_zh: 没想到那个人就是你吶。

msg: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
msg_zh: ……有了你的帮忙，\n我才得以实现以前的约定。

msg: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
msg_zh: 这是聊表谢意的薄礼，拿着吧。

msg: My thanks, for the aid given.
msg_zh: ……承蒙拔刀相助，感激不尽。

msg: Always a pleasure to witness the festival champ put on a display.
msg_zh: 祭典的勇士果然不是省油的灯。

msg: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
msg_zh: ……有了你的帮忙，\n我才得以实现以前的约定。

msg: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
msg_zh: 这是聊表谢意的薄礼，拿着吧。

msg: My thanks, Tarnished, for the aid given.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，承蒙拔刀相助，感激不尽。

msg: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
msg_zh: ……有了你的帮忙，\n我才得以实现以前的约定。

msg: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
msg_zh: 这是聊表谢意的薄礼，拿着吧。

msg: Well, I must be leaving now.
msg_zh: ……好啦，我要准备动身了。

msg: Brave warrior, if the fates deign it...
msg_zh: 勇士啊，有缘……

msg: No, we shall indeed meet again, at the next glorious tourney.
msg_zh: 不对，在下一次的盛大祭典再会吧。

msg: Well, I must be leaving now.
msg_zh: ……好啦，我要准备动身了。

msg: If the fates deign it, may we meet again, Tarnished.
msg_zh: 有缘再见吧，褪色者。

msg: Ugh!
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: What's the matter with you?
msg_zh: ……发生什么事？

msg: You trying to get revenge?
msg_zh: 难不成，你想复仇？

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……也罢。

msg: If the Graven Witch put you under her spell, you must be eliminated...
msg_zh: 既然一心向着魔女，迟早也会是卡利亚的敌人。

msg: Before you can pose a threat to Caria.
msg_zh: 趁早斩除祸根吧。

msg: Rest now. Alongside the witch's corpse.
msg_zh: ……陪着魔女的身体一起安眠吧……

msg: You...are a menace...
msg_zh: ……你、很危险……

msg: Iji...beware...
msg_zh: 当心啊，伊吉……

msg: Sellen, Graven Witch, enemy of Caria.
msg_zh: ……“魔块魔女”瑟濂，卡利亚的敌对者啊。

msg: I vow this time to crush both your frame and your primal glintstone.
msg_zh: 这一次，我会连同源辉石一起粉碎。

msg: I am Jerren, bringer of your death. Do not forget.
msg_zh: 牢牢记住──我杰廉的存在，就代表你的死亡。

msg: You must be eliminated...
msg_zh: 你迟早会是卡利亚的敌人。

msg: Hello... Hello...
msg_zh: 那边那位……

msg: Please... Over here...
msg_zh: 就是您……请来我身边……

msg: Hello... Hello...
msg_zh: 那边那位……

msg: Right over here...
msg_zh: 请来我这边……

msg: Hello.
msg_zh: 您好，初次见面。

msg: It's rather chilly here, isn't it?
msg_zh: 这附近有一点冷呢。

msg: My mistress sent me off on an errand...
msg_zh: 我奉主人的命令，出外旅行……

msg: But I was accosted by a ruffian, and now I'm in a bind.
msg_zh: 但是受到流氓攻击，正在发愁。
