msg: Could I ask you lend a hand, perhaps?
msg_zh: ……我能不能拜托您一件事？

msg: That thug made off with a precious necklace. I need someone to retrieve it.
msg_zh: 刚才说的流氓，他拿走了我重要的项链，\n想请您帮忙拿回来。

msg: I would be sure to provide ample reward.
msg_zh: 当然，我会给出应有的谢礼。

msg: Only... He, too, is Tarnished.
msg_zh: 只不过……他和您一样是褪色者，

msg: If you've any qualms confronting your own, I shall find another...
msg_zh: 如果您不愿与同胞战斗，我也不会勉强……

msg: Ohh, thank you dearly.
msg_zh: 啊，谢谢您。

msg: What a blessing that we've met like this.
msg_zh: 我很庆幸能遇见您。

msg: The thug should be resting at an abandoned home down the way...
msg_zh: ……那位流氓可能在前面的空屋休息。

msg: Please, I must have the necklace back.
msg_zh: 拜托了，请帮我把项链拿回来。

msg: Yes, I see. Most unfortunate, but I'll have to make do.
msg_zh: ……这样啊。虽然遗憾，但也只能接受。

msg: I know that some Tarnished balk at the thought of harming their own.
msg_zh: 我想也是有人不愿与同胞战斗。

msg: But if you should change your mind, do not hesitate to speak to me again.
msg_zh: 如果您改变想法了，请再告诉我。

msg: Have you had a change of heart?
msg_zh: 您改变想法了吗？

msg: The thug should be resting at an abandoned home down the way...
msg_zh: ……那位流氓可能在前面的空屋休息。

msg: Please, I must have the necklace back.
msg_zh: 拜托了，请帮我把项链拿回来。

msg: Oh, yes, that is my missing necklace.
msg_zh: 对，这的确是我被抢走的项链。

msg: Thank you kindly. I am in your debt.
msg_zh: 谢谢，您是我的恩人。

msg: Did I forget to announce myself?
msg_zh: ……我还没有自我介绍吧？

msg: I am Rya, in the service of Lady Tanith of the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 我是菈雅，侍奉火山官邸的主人，塔妮丝大人。

msg: I seek stalwart Tarnished who might join our house.
msg_zh: 邀请拥有英雄资质的褪色者前往官邸，\n是我身为招募者的职责。

msg: You are very brave yourself. Not only a steady hand,
msg_zh: ……您很强，这不单指擅长战斗，

msg: but a steady heart, merciless, even to your own kind.
msg_zh: 您还拥有强韧的心，勇于和同胞刀剑相向。

msg: Such strength is precisely what my mistress seeks.
msg_zh: 我的主人渴求的，就是这些特质。

msg: Please, take this.
msg_zh: 请您收下此物。

msg: Brave Tarnished, seek the Altus Plateau, the realm of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……拥有英雄资质的褪色者啊，\n请您朝着黄金树大地的亚坛高原前进。

msg: Most Tarnished are doomed to wander the outskirts of the Lands Between, peering wistfully at the towering Erdtree...
msg_zh: 受到赐福引导，却只能在交界地边陲徘徊，\n眺望远方的黄金树……

msg: But you are no ordinary Tarnished. And once that is proven,
msg_zh: 您绝对不是这种凡夫俗子。\n只要您的强大获得证实，

msg: the Volcano Manor will fully extend its invitation. To fight, amongst a family of champions.
msg_zh: 火山官邸肯定会正式邀请您，\n成为并肩作战的英雄──成为族人。

msg: Ohh, and... One more thing, only for you...
msg_zh: ……对了，还有……我个人想要告诉您一件事。

msg: This land of Liurnia is connected to the Altus Plateau by the Grand Lift of Dectus, beyond the High Road.
msg_zh: 这个地方，利耶尼亚地区原本和亚坛高原，\n能透过街道尽头的迪可达斯大升降机往来，

msg: But the lift has been defunct for an age, meaning there's no simple means of passage.
msg_zh: 但是大升降机已经很久没有运转，\n道路也早就年久失修。

msg: Instead, you must seek the old ruins in the cliff.
msg_zh: ……所以，请先去找出古遗迹断崖吧。

msg: At the base of the valley near the Grand Lift, there's an old tunnel.
msg_zh: 那座古遗迹位在大升降机旁的谷底，\n是一座古老的坑道……

msg: It was excavated from both ends, linking Liurnia to the Altus Plateau.
msg_zh: 听说是从利耶尼亚与亚坛高原，\n两个方向共同开采而成的坑道。

msg: I have faith in you. A champion, through and through.
msg_zh: ……您一定会是英雄，我相信您。

msg: I do hope that we can meet again.
msg_zh: 期待下次与您相见。

msg: I've been waiting for you.
msg_zh: 我等您很久了。

msg: I knew you had the stuff of champions.
msg_zh: 果然和我说得一样，您就是英雄。

msg: I hereby invite you to the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 我想正式邀请您前往火山官邸。

msg: Take my hand, and have audience with my mistress.
msg_zh: 请牵住我的手，会见我的主人吧。

msg: I will pray. That you follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
msg_zh: ……愿您与塔妮丝大人走在同一条路上，我衷心期盼。

msg: I will pray. That you will follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
msg_zh: ……愿您与塔妮丝大人走在同一条路上，我衷心期盼。

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……我知道了。

msg: Speak to me again once you are ready.
msg_zh: 那么在您准备好之后，请告诉我。

msg: You will find me here.
msg_zh: 我会在这里等您。

msg: Are you ready, then?
msg_zh: 您准备好了吗？

msg: I hereby invite you to the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 那么，我想正式邀请您前往火山官邸。

msg: Take my hand, and have audience with my mistress.
msg_zh: 请牵住我的手，会见我的主人吧。

msg: I will pray. That you will follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
msg_zh: ……愿您与塔妮丝大人走在同一条路上，我衷心期盼。

msg: Give me your hand.
msg_zh: ……那么，请把手交给我。

msg: I will pray. That you follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
msg_zh: ……愿您与塔妮丝大人走在同一条路上，我衷心期盼。

msg: Hello... Hello...
msg_zh: 那边那位……

msg: Right over here...
msg_zh: 请来我这边……

msg: But I hardly hold him in high regard.
msg_zh: ……但是我对他的印象，实在算不上太好。

msg: He seems to bear animosity toward the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 我感觉得到，那个人的心中有着对火山官邸的敌意，

msg: Perhaps it is to be expected, only...
msg_zh: 还有就是，我时不时会感觉到……

msg: his intent, while vicious, is also tenuous, as if his heart is not in it.
msg_zh: 那敌意带有英勇的意念，\n却又有股淡淡的，犹疑不定的味道。

msg: Doesn't really seem like champion material, to me...
msg_zh: 这样的人有资格称为英雄吗……？

msg: Brave Tarnished, what is your business here?
msg_zh: ……褪色者大人，您怎么会在这里？

msg: I'm afraid this is not a guest room.
msg_zh: 各位的房间不是在这个方向……

msg: What's that peculiar look upon your face?
msg_zh: ……为什么您的表情那么诧异？

msg: <gasp>
Goodness, am I still a serpent?
msg_zh: 不会吧，我还维持着蛇的模样吗？

msg: Oh, how dreadful...
msg_zh: 啊啊，怎么会……

msg: How dreadful indeed...
msg_zh: 怎么会……

msg: Forgive my distress.
msg_zh: ……对不起，我乱了方寸。

msg: I ought to be thanking you for treating me as usual, despite this appearance.
msg_zh: 即使看到我的模样，\n您待我依旧温暖，我太失礼了。

msg: Brave Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……拥有英雄资质的褪色者啊，

msg: This is my true form. My real name is Zorayas.
msg_zh: 这才是我真正的模样。\n我真正的名字是泽菈雅丝。

msg: Please forgive the deception.
msg_zh: 没有以真面目与您相见，我由衷致歉。

msg: Do understand. This duplicity is my own doing.
msg_zh: 但是请您相信我，虚假的只有我本身。

msg: Lady Tanith speaks no falsehoods, and the Volcano Manor is just as it seems.
msg_zh: 关于火山官邸，不对，不只这样，\n还有塔妮丝大人说的一字一句，这些绝无虚假。

msg: Lady Tanith is my mother.
msg_zh: ……塔妮丝大人是我的母亲。

msg: I am told I was born by the grace of a glorious king.
msg_zh: 据说母亲受到伟大王者的恩宠，我因此诞生。

msg: That my mother cherishes this form I inhabit.
msg_zh: 所以我这身模样，也是母亲喜悦的象征。

msg: I am proud of what I am.
msg_zh: ……这模样是我的荣耀。

msg: But people are cruel. If they saw my true form, they wouldn't speak to me.
msg_zh: 然而并不是所有人都这么认为──\n如果展现蛇的模样，他们就不愿再听我说话。

msg: And so I assume a guise when seeking new recruits.
msg_zh: 所以我才会伪装真面目，好善尽招募者的职责。

msg: But you are not like the rest.
msg_zh: ……但是您和他们不一样呢。

msg: My serpentine form, and the name Zorayas,
msg_zh: ……这身蛇的模样，还有泽菈雅丝这个名字，

msg: were secrets known only to Lady Tanith and I.
msg_zh: 是我和塔妮丝大人之间的秘密。

msg: Now I share the secrets with you, as well.
msg_zh: ……现在您也共享了这个秘密。

msg: Please keep them safe from anyone else.
msg_zh: 这件事，请不要向他人张扬。

msg: Seek the old ruins in the cliff.
msg_zh: ……请先去找出古遗迹断崖。

msg: At the base of the valley near the Grand Lift, there's an old tunnel.
msg_zh: 那座古遗迹位在大升降机旁的谷底，\n是一座古老的坑道……

msg: It was excavated from both ends, linking Liurnia to the Altus Plateau.
msg_zh: 听说是从利耶尼亚与亚坛高原，\n两个方向共同开采而成的坑道。

msg: I have faith in you. A champion, through and through.
msg_zh: ……您一定会是英雄，我相信您。

msg: I do hope that we can meet again.
msg_zh: 期待下次与您相见。

msg: Hello again. Brave Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者大人，好久不见了。

msg: As a scout, I am pleased to see you again here at the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 能够在火山官邸与您相会，身为招募者喜不自胜。

msg: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
msg_zh: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

msg: Have you ever...
msg_zh: ……话说回来，褪色者大人……

msg: heard any strange sounds here at the manor?
msg_zh: 您在这座官邸里，有没有听过奇怪的声音？

msg: Something beyond the walls, like breathing, or slithering scales...
msg_zh: 那声音从墙壁另一侧传来，\n还有类似呼吸声、鳞片摩擦的声音？

msg: Oh fie, what am I saying?
msg_zh: ……抱歉，问了这么奇怪的问题。

msg: It just isn't possible. I must be tired.
msg_zh: 怎么可能有这种事，应该是我太累了吧。

msg: Um, oh, it's you.
msg_zh: ……啊，是您。

msg: Forgive me. My mind never ceases to churn of late.
msg_zh: 不好意思，我正在想事情。

msg: Hmm, well...
msg_zh: ……不，仔细一想，

msg: I know I can trust you...
msg_zh: 还是和您说吧。

msg: I saw something, slithering in the pitch black of night.
msg_zh: 我在晚上的时候，看到走廊上有蠕动的黑影……

msg: It entered the room across the hall, and never came out.
msg_zh: 那黑影走进对面的房间之后，就没有出来了。

msg: If I'm not mistaken,
msg_zh: 还有，如果我没有看错，

msg: it took the form of a serpent, just like me...
msg_zh: 那黑影有着蛇的轮廓，和我一样。

msg: Does the Volcano Manor hide some secret,
msg_zh: ……火山官邸有着我不知道的秘密……

msg: that Lady Tanith has kept from me?
msg_zh: 塔妮丝大人到底对我隐瞒了什么？

msg: I realise that I shouldn't impose but,
msg_zh: ……这件事情本来不该请求您，

msg: if you discover anything, would you please share?
msg_zh: 但如果您有任何发现，能不能告诉我？

msg: It entered the room next to this one, and never came out.
msg_zh: 那黑影走进隔壁的房间之后，就没有出来了。

msg: The serpent that lurked in the shadows that night...
msg_zh: ……那天夜里出现的蛇形黑影……

msg: It entered the room across the hall, and never came out.
msg_zh: 走进对面的房间之后就没有出来。

msg: Perhaps the manor yet holds some secrets.
msg_zh: ……火山官邸可能有着我不知道的秘密。

msg: If you discover anything, would you please share?
msg_zh: 如果您有任何发现，能不能告诉我？

msg: It entered the room next to this one, and never came out.
msg_zh: 走进隔壁的房间之后就没有出来。

msg: Really...
msg_zh: ……原来是这样。

msg: Oh, so there was a secret after all...
msg_zh: 果真有秘密啊……

msg: Oh my...
msg_zh: 啊啊……

msg: Lady Tanith, my own mother, has deceived me...
msg_zh: 塔妮丝大人──母亲她对我说了谎……

msg: Was I not...
msg_zh: 那么，我真的是……

msg: born by the grace of a king?
msg_zh: 因为母亲受到恩宠而诞生的吗？

msg: Hello again. Brave Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者大人，好久不见了。

msg: It is a shame that I did not beckon you here with my own hand,
msg_zh: 无法亲自邀请您前来火山官邸，虽然略感遗憾……

msg: but I am pleased that we meet again, here at the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 但能够在此与您相会，我依旧喜不自胜。

msg: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
msg_zh: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

msg: Hello again. Brave Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者大人，好久不见了。

msg: Do you remember me? I am Rya. We spoke once in Liurnia.
msg_zh: 您还记得吗？我是菈雅。\n我们曾经在利耶尼亚交谈过一次。

msg: I am pleased that we meet again, here at the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 能够在火山官邸与您相会，实在喜不自胜。

msg: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
msg_zh: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

msg: A pleasure to meet you. Brave Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者大人，初次见面，您好。

msg: I am Rya, the scout. Very pleased to welcome you to the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 我是“招募者”菈雅。\n能够在火山官邸见到您，我深感荣幸。

msg: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
msg_zh: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

msg: Brave Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……褪色者大人。

msg: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
msg_zh: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

msg: Sometimes I hear strange sounds beyond the walls.
msg_zh: 我曾经听过墙壁另一侧传来奇怪的声音。

msg: Like breathing, or slithering scales.
msg_zh: 也有类似呼吸声、鳞片摩擦的声音。

msg: Oh, perhaps I'm just feeling tired.
msg_zh: ……应该是我太累了吧。

msg: Hmm, what is this?
msg_zh: ……这是什么？

msg: I remember this scent, distinctly.
msg_zh: 有一股非常怀念的味道……

msg: Funny, isn't it.
msg_zh: ……啊，真不可思议。

msg: I am certain of it. I was born inside this.
msg_zh: 我明白了，这是我出生的地方……

msg: It's a part of my birth mother.
msg_zh: 是生母的一部分。

msg: You have my gratitude.
msg_zh: ……谢谢您。

msg: Thanks to you, I am no longer afraid.
msg_zh: 多亏有您的帮忙，我终于下定决心。

msg: I want to know. How I was born, and met Lady Tanith.
msg_zh: 我想知道自己的出身，\n也想知道是如何与塔妮丝大人相遇。

msg: One day, I hope to call her mother once again, this time from the bottom of my heart.
msg_zh: ……还有，我想要打从心底，\n再一次称呼那位大人“母亲”。

msg: Lady Tanith, my own mother, has deceived me...
msg_zh: 塔妮丝大人──母亲她对我说了谎……

msg: Was I not...
msg_zh: 那么，我真的是……

msg: born by the grace of a king?
msg_zh: 因为母亲受到恩宠而诞生的吗？

msg: I want to know. How I was born, and met Lady Tanith.
msg_zh: 我想知道自己的出身，\n也想知道是如何与塔妮丝大人相遇……

msg: One day, I hope to call her mother once again, this time from the bottom of my heart.
msg_zh: ……还有，我想要打从心底，\n再一次称呼那位大人“母亲”。

msg: Oh, it's you...
msg_zh: 啊，是您……

msg: I'm afraid... there is something I must tell you.
msg_zh: ……对了……我是该知会您。

msg: I was an unwanted child. Born not of grace, but of a hideous ritual.
msg_zh: 我是被抛弃的孩子，并不是生于恩宠，\n而是生自可怖仪式的孩子。

msg: Something that can never be accepted, not by men, nor serpents.
msg_zh: 那种存在不见容于人类，也不见容于蛇……

msg: Even Lady Tanith shouldn't accept me.
msg_zh: 更不该被塔妮丝大人所接受……

msg: You are very brave yourself. Not only a steady hand,
msg_zh: ……您很强，这不单指擅长战斗，

msg: but a steady heart, merciless, even to your own kind.
msg_zh: 您还拥有强韧的心，勇于和同胞刀剑相向。

msg: I know that you have done so much for me.
msg_zh: ……我向您提过许多无理的请求，

msg: But I wish to ask one last kindness.
msg_zh: 但拜托您，这是最后一次了。

msg: Kill me, please.
msg_zh: 请您杀了我。

msg: I thought that I feared nothing. But this...
msg_zh: 我自认下定决心了，但是……

msg: Free me from this accursed frame.
msg_zh: 请让我摆脱这副受诅咒的身躯，获得自由。

msg: Agh...
msg_zh: 呜……呜呜……

msg: Thank you... My champion...
msg_zh: 谢谢您……我的英雄……

msg: Mother...
msg_zh: 母亲……

msg: I'm to drink this, then?
msg_zh: ……喝下这个就可以了吗？

msg: Yes, of course. You always were very kind.
msg_zh: ……我明白了，您真的很温柔。

msg: Ahh... How delightfully sweet...
msg_zh: 啊……好甜……

msg: And yet...
msg_zh: 可是，好像……

msg: I know that you have done so much for me.
msg_zh: ……我向您提过许多无理的请求，

msg: But I wish to ask one last kindness.
msg_zh: 但拜托您，这是最后一次了。

msg: Kill me, please.
msg_zh: 请您杀了我。

msg: I thought that I feared nothing. But this...
msg_zh: 我自认下定决心了，但是……

msg: Free me from this accursed frame.
msg_zh: 请让我摆脱这副受诅咒的身躯，获得自由。

msg: You're not willing to kill me, are you.
msg_zh: ……无论如何，您都不愿意动手杀了我。

msg: Hah...
msg_zh: 呵呵……

msg: You've always been so kind. And uncompromising.
msg_zh: 您一直以来都很温暖……却也非常地严格呢。

msg: I suppose I knew in my heart of hearts.
msg_zh: ……我可能早就知道了。

msg: How kind, and uncompromising, you always were.
msg_zh: 您一直以来都很温暖……却也非常地严格。

msg: Oh, it's you.
msg_zh: ……啊，是您。

msg: Heaven knows what happened here,
msg_zh: 我还不清楚发生了什么事。

msg: but Lady Tanith, and all the Tarnished champions, are gone.
msg_zh: 塔妮丝大人，拥有英雄资质的所有褪色者，\n全都消失不见了。

msg: It feels rather quiet without them.
msg_zh: ……让人感到有些寂寥。

msg: But with you here, things will be just fine.
msg_zh: 但是您还在，我就放心了。

msg: I await Lady Tanith.
msg_zh: 我要等塔妮丝大人回来。

msg: I am her daughter, born by the grace of a great king.
msg_zh: 身为母亲与伟大王者，因为恩宠诞生的女儿……

msg: I do not wish to burden her, or cause concern.
msg_zh: 我不希望擅自行动，造成困扰、让人担心。

msg: Brave Tarnished. Do tread the path of valour.
msg_zh: 褪色者大人，请您走在英雄的路上。

msg: I'm certain that this is what Lady Tanith wishes.
msg_zh: 塔妮丝大人肯定也是如此期盼。

msg: Please, stop, Brave Tarnished.
msg_zh: 褪色者大人，请住手。

msg: You will only tire by striking this barrier.
msg_zh: 攻击防护障壁对您没有好处。

msg: Besides, I am no foe of yours.
msg_zh: 我绝对不是敌人。

msg: Please, think this over.
msg_zh: 拜托您，请停下来。

msg: I see that you have reconsidered.
msg_zh: ……您冷静下来了吗？

msg: Thank goodness.
msg_zh: 太好了……

msg: Ah, hello. You must be new here.
msg_zh: 哦，我没看过你。
我的名字是……

msg: Well, just call me Diallos.
msg_zh: 嗯，叫我狄亚罗斯就好。

msg: The honor of one's house holds little import in these lands.
msg_zh: 在交界地讲出再响亮的姓氏，也没有意义。

msg: By the way, have you met a young woman named Lanya on your travels?
msg_zh: 话说回来，有事相问。\n你有见过名叫勒妮亚的女孩吗？

msg: She's my servant, but fickle as the wind.
msg_zh: 她是我的随从，但很随心情做事，

msg: Take your eyes off her for but a moment and she's good as gone.
msg_zh: 常常一转眼就不见人影。

msg: If you find her, please be sure to tell me.
msg_zh: 如果你有看到人，能不能告诉我？

msg: Be sure to tell me if you meet a young woman named Lanya.
msg_zh: 如果你看到名叫勒妮亚的女孩，麻烦告诉我。

msg: She's a servant to my house.
msg_zh: 她是我的随从。

msg: She's been my companion since childhood.
msg_zh: 我们从小一起长大，

msg: I've lost count of the number of times I've had to find her like this.
msg_zh: 已经懒得数这是第几次找人了。

msg: Honestly, she's such a little tomboy.
msg_zh: 真受不了那失控的家伙。

msg: Lanya... Lanya...
msg_zh: 勒妮亚……勒妮亚……

msg: It's me, Diallos. Answer me, would you?
msg_zh: 是我，狄亚罗斯，听到就回应一声吧……

msg: Hello, friend. Tell me if you know, would you.
msg_zh: ……如果你知道的话，麻烦告诉我，

msg: The whereabouts of the hidden house of those despicable fiends.The recusants who hunt their fellow Tarnished.
msg_zh: 叛律者──狩猎同胞的褪色者，\n那群卑劣鼠辈的藏身处在哪？

msg: They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,and I refuse to let the insult stand.
msg_zh: 那群人对我的随从勒妮亚动手，\n我要让他们受到应有的报应。

msg: \"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood.\"
msg_zh: “霍斯劳以血代言”──

msg: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
msg_zh: 我狄亚罗斯会让他们切身体会。

msg: Ah, you again, is it?
msg_zh: 是你啊。

msg: The recusants sent a lackey.
msg_zh: 叛律者的使者找过我了，

msg: Can you believe they invited me to join them?Now! After what they did...
msg_zh: 他们竟然还想找我入伙……

msg: I can scarcely believe it myself. Do they think me a fool?
msg_zh: 说什么鬼话！认为我是无能之辈吗！

msg: You might be surprised to learn I took them up on the offer.
msg_zh: ……不过，我还是故意答应他们的邀请，

msg: Then I only had to ask. The location of the recusant hideout.
msg_zh: 因此打听到那群叛律者的藏身处。

msg: It's on Mt. Gelmir, found off the old road that leads westfrom the town of windmills.
msg_zh: 从风车镇的旧道路往西走一段距离后，会到格密尔火山，

msg: That's where they hide. The manor on the peak.
msg_zh: 那群家伙躲在山顶的官邸里。

msg: Just you wait, wretched recusants.
msg_zh: ……卑劣的叛律者，给我脖子洗干净等着。

msg: You'll rue the day you insulted my name by laying hands on Lanya.
msg_zh: 对勒妮亚动手，侮辱我狄亚罗斯，\n我肯定要让你们悔不当初。

msg: \"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood\" after all.
msg_zh: “霍斯劳以血代言”。

msg: Who on earth are you?
msg_zh: ……你是什么人？

msg: Hmph, never mind. But tell me if you know, would you.
msg_zh: 算了，是谁不重要。\n如果你知道的话，麻烦告诉我，

msg: The whereabouts of the hidden house of those despicable fiends.The recusants who hunt their fellow Tarnished.
msg_zh: 叛律者──狩猎同胞的褪色者，\n那群卑劣鼠辈的藏身处在哪？

msg: They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,and I refuse to let the insult stand.
msg_zh: 那群人对我的随从勒妮亚动手，\n我要让他们受到应有的报应。

msg: \"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood.\"
msg_zh: “霍斯劳以血代言”──

msg: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
msg_zh: 我狄亚罗斯会让他们切身体会。

msg: They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,and I refuse to let the insult stand.
msg_zh: ……那群人对我的随从勒妮亚动手，\n我要让他们受到应有的报应。

msg: \"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood.\"
msg_zh: “霍斯劳以血代言”──

msg: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
msg_zh: 我狄亚罗斯会让他们切身体会。

msg: It's on Mt. Gelmir, found off the old road that leads westfrom the town of windmills.
msg_zh: ……从风车镇的旧道路往西走一段距离后，会到格密尔火山，

msg: That's where they hide. The manor on the peak.
msg_zh: 那群家伙躲在山顶的官邸里。

msg: Just you wait, wretched recusants.
msg_zh: ……卑劣的叛律者，给我脖子洗干净等着。

msg: \"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood\" after all.
msg_zh: “霍斯劳以血代言”。

msg: Ah. Oh... I-it's you, is it?
msg_zh: 啊、啊……是你……

msg: Well. Nice to see you again.
msg_zh: 嗯，好久不见了。

msg: So you've been invited as well, I see.
msg_zh: 你也受到邀请啦？

msg: Then we're comrades in arms, henceforth.You watch my back, and I'll watch yours, yes?
msg_zh: 这么一来，我们就是同伴了。再请多关照。

msg: I, um, I can tell... You're wondering about Lanya...
msg_zh: ……嗯，我知道你想说什么，关于勒妮亚的事情吧？

msg: Well, you see, I...
msg_zh: 嗯，不过我……

msg: After much internal debate, I've come to realise...
msg_zh: 决定不复仇了。

msg: Revenge is not the answer.
msg_zh: 这是我苦苦思索后，得到的答案……

msg: According to Lady Tanith...
msg_zh: 据塔妮丝女士所说……

msg: I've got the stuff of champions.
msg_zh: 我有走上成为英雄之路的资质。

msg: And champions, ironic as it is, are oft forced to walk a tainted path.
msg_zh: 还有真正的英雄会刻意挑污秽不洁的路走。

msg: It hit me like a bolt from the blue...
msg_zh: ……听完之后，我感到茅塞顿开。

msg: That my former thoughts were simple naiveté.
msg_zh: 啊，这就是我没做好心理准备的地方。

msg: Of course, my heart weeps for Lanya.
msg_zh: 当然我也认为勒妮亚很可怜，

msg: That unfortunate incident was a cruel twist of fate indeed.
msg_zh: 她的下场实在可悲又残酷。

msg: But succumbing to the pain and sadness caused won'tmake me a champion, will it.
msg_zh: 只是被那“可悲”、“残酷”的感受影响，\n我就无法成为英雄。

msg: Lanya knows this, I'm certain. Fate has laid hard roads for us both.
msg_zh: 所以勒妮亚一定也能谅解，\n明白这是我和她的命运。

msg: But such is true of any road trod by champions.
msg_zh: 这就是所谓的英雄之路啊。

msg: I always resented these hands.
msg_zh: ……我一直被瞧不起。

msg: Their pale complexion, a far cry from any warrior's. The shame of House Hoslow.
msg_zh: 这双白净的手，没有战士该有的样子……\n我被认为是霍斯劳的耻辱。

msg: But that won't be the case for long.
msg_zh: 所以我很期待──

msg: They'll be darkened by grit, once I've set out on the path of champions.
msg_zh: 有机会玷污这双手，走上英雄之路。

msg: \"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood\" after all.
msg_zh: ……“霍斯劳以血代言”。

msg: Ah, it's you, is it.
msg_zh: ……是你啊。

msg: I'm terribly sorry, but would you mind giving me some time to myself?
msg_zh: 抱歉，能不能让我静一静……？

msg: I haven't achieved anything at all thus far.
msg_zh: 我又成不了任何事，

msg: Even though I've dirtied my hands time and time again.
msg_zh: 这双手已经玷污了一次，又一次，

msg: I'm still yet to achieve anything.
msg_zh: 但我还是一事无成。

msg: Perhaps I am a fool after all...
msg_zh: 我真的只是一介无能之辈吗……？

msg: No. It's worse than that. As things stand I've given up on thepath of revenge and sullied the name of my house.
msg_zh: 不对，还要更糟。\n我放弃复仇，也让家族蒙羞，

msg: What an easy mark I must have been...
msg_zh: 只是一个不知耻的蠢货……

msg: How did it take me so long to realise, honestly...
msg_zh: 怎么没有早一点察觉呢……

msg: There's just no end to my foolishness, is there...
msg_zh: 自己真是无能至极……

msg: It's just as my noble brother says.
msg_zh: ……唉，哥哥，你说得对。

msg: I'm a complete fool. I can't believe I thought I could becomea champion.
msg_zh: 我无能至极，根本不该妄想成为英雄……

msg: Perhaps I am a fool after all...
msg_zh: ……我真的只是一介无能之辈吗……？

msg: No. It's worse than that. As things stand I've given up on thepath of revenge and sullied the name of my house.
msg_zh: 不对，还要更糟。\n我放弃复仇，也让家族蒙羞，

msg: What an easy mark I must have been...
msg_zh: 只是一个不知耻的蠢货……

msg: Well. Aren't you full of beans.
msg_zh: 哼……你精神不错嘛……

msg: No wonder you're covered in muck.
msg_zh: 怪不得弄得那么脏。

msg: Oh? My friend, it's been far too long.
msg_zh: ……嗯？好久没看到你了。

msg: I have to say you caught me at a rather low point.
msg_zh: 抱歉让你看到这副窘样。

msg: But...as you see, I've put all that behind me.
msg_zh: ……对，没错，我逃出来了。

msg: Left the Volcano Manor. Forging my own path now.Making my own choices.
msg_zh: 离开火山官邸了……更准确一点，\n是逃离所有曾选择，曾决心去做的任何事。

msg: Even a fool like me can look after some simple jars.
msg_zh: 即使像我一样无能，也有办法照顾壶。

msg: Do you pity me? Well don't. I feel like for the first timein my life I'm on the straight and narrow.
msg_zh: 你认为我很可悲吗？\n可是直到现在，我才感觉到自己活着。

msg: A fool I may be, but I can look after some simple jars.
msg_zh: ……即使像我一样无能，也有办法照顾壶。

msg: Do you pity me? Well don't. I feel like for the first timein my life I'm on the straight and narrow.
msg_zh: 你认为我很可悲吗？\n可是直到现在，我才感觉到自己活着。

msg: ...Ah, you...
Are the jars...they alright?
msg_zh: 壶都没事吧……？

msg: Did I defend them?
msg_zh: 我有成功保护他们吗……？

msg: Then all is well...
msg_zh: ……这样啊，好险……

msg: This fool proved his worth, in the end...
msg_zh: 我这无能的人，也能在最后……

msg: Ha...ha ha...
msg_zh: 哈哈、哈哈哈……

msg: I see... I see...
msg_zh: 是吗？我想也是……

msg: I've been a fool...to the last...
msg_zh: 我这无能至极……

msg: Agh!
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: What on earth was that for!
msg_zh: 你做什么！

msg: Now I see. You're a wretched recusant!
msg_zh: ……原来，你是叛律者吗！

msg: May you rue the day that you thought to trample me!
msg_zh: 侮辱我狄亚罗斯，我肯定要让你悔不当初！

msg: The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood!
msg_zh: “霍斯劳以血代言”！

msg: In blood!
msg_zh: 唔喔喔喔喔喔！

msg: Lanya, your honour has been restored.
msg_zh: ……勒妮亚，我替你报仇了。

msg: You can rest easy.
msg_zh: 你不用再担心了。

msg: Ha ha...ha...
msg_zh: ……哈哈。

msg: I am the shame of House Hoslow after all...
msg_zh: 我真的只是霍斯劳的耻辱……

msg: Ugh!
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: What's the matter? Please, stop!
msg_zh: 你怎么了？住手吧！

msg: I've no quarrel with the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 我不打算与火山官邸为敌，

msg: I will never brandish a sword again, I swear!
msg_zh: 我已经不再拿剑了！

msg: Why on earth...?
msg_zh: ……你，为什么……

msg: Wait, you're a poacher, aren't you?
msg_zh: 你是盗猎者吗？

msg: I'll turn my back on duty no more.
msg_zh: 那么，我不会再逃了。

msg: The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood!
msg_zh: “霍斯劳以血代言”！

msg: In blood!
msg_zh: 唔喔喔喔喔喔！

msg: Unharmed, thank the stars.
msg_zh: ……勉强守住了。

msg: Ahh, just what I deserve...
msg_zh: ……啊，这是报应吗？

msg: For absconding from my duties...
msg_zh: 因为我逃离一切……

msg: I'm sorry, my dear jars...
msg_zh: 对不起啊，壶……

msg: Tarnished, are we? A wonder you should turn up here.
msg_zh: ……哦，是褪色者啊？难得有这么稀奇的客人。

msg: I am Sellen, a sorcerer, quite plainly.
msg_zh: 我名为瑟濂，如你所见，是一名魔法师……

msg: Why are you here?
msg_zh: 那么，有何贵干？

msg: Ahh, a yen for glintstone sorceries?
msg_zh: ……哦，你想学习辉石魔法？

msg: Well, your aptitude does appear...passable.
msg_zh: 看起来的确有最基本的资质……

msg: But one must choose one's masters wisely.
msg_zh: 然而拜师要慎选对象──

msg: I was exiled from the Academy of Raya Lucaria,
msg_zh: 我被逐出雷亚卢卡利亚学院，

msg: as a reviled, apostate witch.
msg_zh: 是众人避之唯恐不及，所谓的异端魔女。

msg: Do you still wish to learn from me?
msg_zh: 即使如此，你还坚持拜师吗？

msg: Well, you are a piece of work.
msg_zh: ……哈，你真是怪人。

msg: Very well. You are now my protégé in glintstone sorcery.
msg_zh: 好吧，我愿意收你为徒，传授辉石魔法。

msg: But I refuse to coddle. Or cast kind words. Never.
msg_zh: 但我很严格，不走温和教导那一套。

msg: Anticipate grievances, young apprentice.
msg_zh: 可别后悔啊。

msg: Really.
msg_zh: ……是吗？

msg: It's not every day I meet a Tarnished just milling about.
msg_zh: 褪色者还真是奇特，没有事也会找人攀谈。

msg: What is it now? Why are you here again?
msg_zh: 怎么了？不是没有事吗？

msg: You are quite the enigma, aren't you...
msg_zh: 你真的很奇特……

msg: I dare say your proclivities are far from ideal...
msg_zh: 但老实说，我不认为你能学好辉石魔法……

msg: Oh well, perhaps nurture will defy nature, with a bit of luck.
msg_zh: 学习魔法并不是只看资质。

msg: Yes, I think that would be wise.
msg_zh: 嗯，这样比较妥当。

msg: We must choose our masters wisely.
msg_zh: 拜师要慎选对象啊。

msg: Well? Have you made up your mind?
msg_zh: 怎么样？考虑清楚了吗？

msg: Young apprentice. First things first.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，第一步该做的是“理解”。

msg: You are a tadpole when it comes to magic. Infantile. Without the legs to walk.
msg_zh: 你在魔法的领域还是个婴儿，\n极度不成熟，甚至连路都不会走。

msg: So, to become a sorcerer, first, you must face your ignorance.
msg_zh: 然而认知到自己不成熟，才能成为魔法师……

msg: Now, shall we start learning?
msg_zh: 我们开始上课吧。

msg: There you are, my apprentice.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，你来了。

msg: Shall we commence the lesson?
msg_zh: 我们开始上课吧。

msg: You wish to continue the lesson?
msg_zh: 还想继续上课吗？

msg: Very well, I have time aplenty.
msg_zh: 我乐意奉陪。

msg: Our art draws upon the powers embedded in glintstone.
msg_zh: 辉石魔法是找出辉石内的力量，并加以施展的魔法。

msg: But what is the nature of such power?
msg_zh: 你可能会疑问：那股力量是从何而来？

msg: Glintstone is the amber of the cosmos.
msg_zh: ……所谓的辉石，就是由星星形成的琥珀。

msg: Golden amber contains the remnants of ancient life, and houses its vitality,
msg_zh: 金色琥珀蕴含古老生命碎屑拥有的力量，

msg: while glintstone contains residual life, and thus the vitality of the stars.
msg_zh: 以此类推，辉石也蕴含星星生命碎屑所拥有的力量。

msg: It should not be forgotten,
msg_zh: 你要记好：

msg: that glintstone sorcery is the study of the stars, and the life therein.
msg_zh: 辉石魔法意在探索星星以及星星的生命。

msg: A fact lost on most sorcerers, these days...
msg_zh: 现下有一群不入流的魔法师，根本忘记这一点。

msg: Your appetite for learning is impressive.
msg_zh: ……你真好学。

msg: You make me proud. To have grown little legs so readily.
msg_zh: 我的徒弟真不简单，这么快就开始学走路了。

msg: You must have a fabulous teacher.
msg_zh: 但也多亏为师教导有方啊。

msg: Hmm? What's on your mind?
msg_zh: ……怎么了，你想说什么？

msg: Well, well...
Seluvis is not a name I ever wanted to hear again...
msg_zh: 赛尔维斯──又让我想起这讨人厌的名字。

msg: But, fine. If it will help you, my apprentice, I offer my knowledge.
msg_zh: ……好吧，既然能帮到你，我知无不言，言无不尽。

msg: The stars alter the fate of the Carian royal family. And the fate of your mistress, Ranni.
msg_zh: 卡利亚王室的命运会随着星星变动──\n这点连你侍奉的菈妮也不例外，

msg: But long ago, General Radahn challenged the swirling constellations, and in a crushing victory, arrested their cycles.
msg_zh: 然而当拉塔恩将军击碎星星流转的定律，\n固有的流转戛然而止……

msg: Now, he is the force that repulses the stars.
msg_zh: 那个男人本身就是星星的封印。

msg: If General Radahn were to die, the stars would resume their movement.
msg_zh: 只要拉塔恩将军死亡，星星又会开始流转，

msg: And so, too, would Ranni's destiny.
msg_zh: 当然菈妮的命运也是。

msg: My apprentice, what happened to your nail?
msg_zh: ……徒弟啊，你的手指怎么了？

msg: Perhaps you have a different view, but...
msg_zh: 我是不知道你怎么想，

msg: That foul thing is eyeing you from afar, plotting to enlist you as a pawn.
msg_zh: 但那是用来监视你、支配你的印记，堪称恶意的化身。

msg: May I remove it for you?
msg_zh: 我来替你解除吧？

msg: A wise choice. Let me neutralize it.
msg_zh: ……你听懂了啊，立刻来解咒吧。

msg: But first...
msg_zh: 但在那之前……

msg: Listen up, wretched curse-peddler.
msg_zh: 咒印之主啊，你有在听吧？

msg: This is a vile craft in which you engage.
msg_zh: 胆敢做出这种行为，真是瞧不起人啊。

msg: Let it be known.
msg_zh: 给我记好了，

msg: This is the beloved apprentice of Sellen, Graven Witch.
msg_zh: 这个人是我“魔块魔女”瑟濂的爱徒，

msg: I set a curse upon you and your meddling hand.
msg_zh: 诓骗他的罪行，足以构成受我诅咒的理由。

msg: Your death will not be a pleasant one.
msg_zh: 别以为你能死得痛快。

msg: May you shudder between breaths in your sleep...
msg_zh: ……尽管怕得夜不成眠吧。

msg: If you prefer not, that is your prerogative.
msg_zh: ……既然你拒绝，我也不再多说。

msg: But let it be known.
msg_zh: 但是你要记得，

msg: That foul thing is eyeing you from afar, plotting to enlist you as a pawn.
msg_zh: 那是用来监视你、支配你的恶意化身。

msg: If what I have told you one day rings true,
msg_zh: 如果你愿意听进我的话……

msg: by all means, come to me again.
msg_zh: 记得，随时来找我。

msg: What's this sorcery, my apprentice?
msg_zh: ……哦，那魔法……

msg: Ah, then you have seen Master Azur.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，你见到亚兹勒大师了吧？

msg: Master Azur was a founding glintstone sorcerer, and my first teacher.
msg_zh: 亚兹勒大师是辉石魔法的创始者，也是我的第一位师父。

msg: A stern judge of men, but he must have seen something in you.
msg_zh: 那位严格闻名的亚兹勒认同你了。

msg: You make us both proud.
msg_zh: 这可不是件简单的事。

msg: We can speak more later, my apprentice.
msg_zh: ……徒弟啊，等会儿好好聊一聊吧。

msg: If you recall, I was exiled from the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 我曾提过自己被逐出雷亚卢卡利亚学院，\n你还记得吧？

msg: It was for attempting to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
msg_zh: 背后的原因，是因为我想要复兴辉石魔法的起源。

msg: The toothless pedantry peddled by the Carian royal family can rot for all I care.
msg_zh: 不是那个受卡利亚王室摆布，\n失去核心、只懂得卖弄的学问，

msg: I want glintstone sorceries that open our minds, unbound by terrestrial taboos.
msg_zh: 我所追求的是毫无禁忌，\n有着纯粹探索精神的辉石魔法。

msg: No matter what we give in return.
msg_zh: ……为了实现愿望，我不惜牺牲一切。

msg: My apprentice. I presume nothing.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，我不强求。

msg: Teacher and student are not bound to tread the same path.
msg_zh: 即使分道扬镳，也是师徒间的常态。

msg: But hear me out, my apprentice.
msg_zh: 在这前提下，我想拜托你：

msg: I need your help to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
msg_zh: 复兴辉石魔法起源──\n这件事你愿意出一份力吗？

msg: Perhaps this is a journey we could take together?
msg_zh: ……愿意和我共同努力吗？

msg: Splendid. I thank you.
msg_zh: ……这样啊，谢谢你。

msg: This pleases me. It's been far too long since I found a fellow kindred spirit.
msg_zh: 很久没有遇见志同道合的人了，我很高兴。

msg: You must have a fabulous teacher.
msg_zh: ……肯定是为师教导有方吧。

msg: Forgive me, it was an outlandish idea to begin with.
msg_zh: ……抱歉，拜托你这种诡异的事情。

msg: And I fear quite presumptuous of me, as well.
msg_zh: 我可能太过依赖你了。

msg: Don't give it another thought, my apprentice.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，忘了这件事吧。抱歉了。

msg: Really? My apprentice.
msg_zh: ……徒弟啊，你真的愿意？

msg: You must have given this quite some thought.
msg_zh: 原来你一直在考虑吗？

msg: Splendid. I thank you. This pleases me.
msg_zh: 啊，谢谢你，我很高兴。

msg: It's been far too long since I found a fellow kindred spirit.
msg_zh: 很久没有遇见志同道合的人了……

msg: There you are, my apprentice.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，你来了。

msg: Shall we commence the lesson?
msg_zh: 我们开始上课吧。

msg: You wish to resume the lesson?
msg_zh: 还想继续上课吗？

msg: Indeed, that would be the wiser option.
msg_zh: 继续上课的确比较好。

msg: I need your help, my apprentice.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，有事需要你的帮助。

msg: Master Lusat is another founding glintstone sorcerer.
msg_zh: 辉石魔法创始者共有两位，\n另外一位是卢瑟特大师。

msg: And like Master Azur, he was banished from the academy. Now he languishes, imprisoned somewhere.
msg_zh: 他和亚兹勒大师一样被逐出学院，幽禁在某处。

msg: My apprentice, can you find Master Lusat?
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，能不能去找出卢瑟特大师？

msg: With this glintstone key, you should be able to cross the boundary that encloses him.
msg_zh: 只要有这把辉石钥匙，\n应该就能穿过囚禁大师的那道障璧。

msg: I need him to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
msg_zh: 想要复兴辉石魔法的起源，\n我们需要卢瑟特大师──

msg: He's nigh a child of the stars, such is his body now...
msg_zh: 尤其是那副最为接近星之子的身体……

msg: After his expulsion from the academy, I heard that Master Lusat returned to his home.
msg_zh: 我听说卢瑟特大师被学院放逐之后，\n就回到了自己的故乡──

msg: A place called Sellia, in the eastern Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 那位在盖利德原野东方的瑟利亚镇。

msg: Thinking about it, I obtained the glintstone key I gave you from a Sellian sorcerer.
msg_zh: ……刚才拿给你的那把辉石钥匙，\n原本的持有人是来自瑟利亚的魔法师。

msg: It wouldn't be too much of a leap to suppose he's still cooped up nearby...
msg_zh: 我想大师可能就被囚禁在那座小镇附近……

msg: Who could've guessed. What a place to find Master Lusat...
msg_zh: ……原来卢瑟特大师在那种地方……

msg: You have my gratitude. This is all your work.
msg_zh: 谢谢，这件事肯定只有你才能办到。

msg: I am truly pleased to have you as an apprentice, and a kindred spirit.
msg_zh: 我很庆幸能收你当徒弟，有你这位知己。

msg: This is a mere token of my thanks. Please, take it.
msg_zh: 这是一点谢礼，收下吧。

msg: This brings us a full step closer.
msg_zh: 这么一来，我们又前进了一步。

msg: The bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat can be admitted to the Academy.
msg_zh: 亚兹勒大师、卢瑟特大师──\n这么一来，就能随时将他们的身体接回学院。

msg: If only I could undo these wretched shackles...
msg_zh: ……只要没有那个可恨的制约……

msg: This brings us a full step closer.
msg_zh: 这么一来，我们又前进了一步。

msg: The bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat can be admitted to the academy.
msg_zh: 亚兹勒大师、卢瑟特大师──\n这么一来，就能随时将他们的身体接回学院。

msg: If only I could undo these wretched shackles...
msg_zh: ……只要没有那个可恨的制约……

msg: My apprentice. Give me a moment later.
msg_zh: ……徒弟啊，等等有话要说。

msg: I have a favour to ask.
msg_zh: 不好意思，又有事需要你的帮忙。

msg: The form you see before you is merely a projection.
msg_zh: ……目前在你眼前说话的我，是幻象。

msg: My body lies elsewhere. But the academy's shackles prevent it being moved.
msg_zh: 我的身体在别的地方，因为学院的制约动弹不得。

msg: My body is on the Weeping Peninsula, at the southern tip of the Lands Between,
msg_zh: 我的身体在交界地南方的啜泣半岛，

msg: imprisoned in the ruins just down from the Church of Marika, past the plain of the Wandering Mausoleum.
msg_zh: 穿越有灵庙漫步的平原后，\n玛莉卡教堂下方的一座废墟里。

msg: Can you make the journey to my body?
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，你能不能到那里一趟？

msg: I have something that I can only trust with you.
msg_zh: 我有物品想要交给你保管。

msg: My body is on the Weeping Peninsula, at the southern tip of the Lands Between,
msg_zh: 我的身体在交界地南方的啜泣半岛，

msg: imprisoned in the ruins just down from the Church of Marika, past the plain of the Wandering Mausoleum.
msg_zh: 穿越有灵庙漫步的平原后，\n玛莉卡教堂下方的一座废墟里。

msg: Can you make the journey to my body?
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，你能不能到那里一趟？

msg: I have something that I can only trust with you.
msg_zh: 我有物品想要交给你保管。

msg: My apprentice, thank you for coming.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，一路辛苦了。

msg: These shackles take a toll on us all.
msg_zh: 都因为制约，让你费了点工夫。

msg: There is something I need you to look after.
msg_zh: ……这物品想交给你保管。

msg: My primal glintstone.
msg_zh: 收下我的源辉石吧。

msg: A star has fallen, and my fortunes waver.
msg_zh: ……当星星坠落，我的命运也开始运转。

msg: Someone may come for my life. And so, I entrust it with you.
msg_zh: 我可能会被杀。\n所以在事情发生以前，先把这交给你──

msg: My self.
msg_zh: 这就是我。

msg: <groaning in pain>
<panting>
Thank you...my apprentice...
msg_zh: 徒弟啊……谢谢你……

msg: This...is my essence. Please, treat it with care.
msg_zh: 那就是我……万事拜托了……

msg: <shivering moans>
It will do no good, I swear it...
msg_zh: ……再怎么做都是徒劳……

msg: ...and yet you persist, you frothing degenerates...
msg_zh: ……真不厌其烦啊，一群心理变态……

msg: A...argh!
msg_zh: 啊！啊啊啊……

msg: <shivering moans>
Treat it with care, my apprentice...
msg_zh: ……徒弟啊，万事拜托了……

msg: What you hold is my very being...
msg_zh: ……那就是我……

msg: My apprentice, just how long has it been?
msg_zh: ……徒弟啊，好久没见到你了。

msg: Thank you. You've helped me fill a new body, once again.
msg_zh: 谢谢，幸亏有你，我又获得了新的身体。

msg: And it's truly a gem. Young and full of vigor, a snug fit for my Primal Glintstone.
msg_zh: 这个身体很不错──既年轻又健康，与源辉石很契合。

msg: Better still, I've shed those awful shackles.
msg_zh: ……而且那可恨的制约已不复存在。

msg: Finally, I can return to the academy.
msg_zh: 我终于能够回去学院了──

msg: To expel the Carian royal family, and restore the primeval current.
msg_zh: 能够回去废除卡利亚王室，复兴起源了。

msg: My dear apprentice, I owe this all to you.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，这全都是你的功劳……

msg: Finally, I can return to the academy.
msg_zh: 我终于能够回去学院了──

msg: To expel the Carian royal family, and restore the primeval current.
msg_zh: 能够回去废除卡利亚王室，复兴起源了。

msg: My apprentice, shall we commence the lesson?
msg_zh: ……徒弟啊，要开始上课吗？

msg: As thanks for procuring this new form, I'll be holding you to a higher standard.
msg_zh: 机会难得，这次课程会比较难。\n当作是帮忙获得新身体的谢礼。

msg: You wish to resume the lesson?
msg_zh: 还想继续上课吗？

msg: Have I not been strict enough, I wonder?
msg_zh: ……难道课程不够难吗？

msg: Ahh, my apprentice.
msg_zh: ……啊，徒弟啊。

msg: You've saved my skin once again.
msg_zh: 我又受到了你的帮助。

msg: Do you see this? The Queen of Caria is no more.
msg_zh: 看啊，卡利亚女王不存在了。

msg: With the bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat returned, the academy can hone the primeval current.
msg_zh: 亚兹勒大师、卢瑟特大师的身体也接回学院，\n这么一来，学院就有办法全然领会起源。

msg: So that we, fallen children of the stars, shall beam with brilliance once again.
msg_zh: 总有一天，我们这群弃子\n也能成为闪闪发亮的星之子。

msg: My apprentice. Will you stay with us, here at the academy?
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，可能的话，希望你继续留在学院……

msg: Oh, I know it's not possible.
msg_zh: 但我清楚，这无法如愿。

msg: You have your own calling. To be the next Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 因为你有自己的使命──要当上艾尔登之王。

msg: But do think of me.
msg_zh: 只是希望你记得──

msg: Of your teacher. On the eve of your crowning.
msg_zh: 即使成为王，我还是你的师父；

msg: You will always be my darling pupil.
msg_zh: 你还是我心爱的徒弟。

msg: Rest assured that I...
No, the entire academy, will swear allegiance to the new monarch.
msg_zh: 不对，我们学院会对新王宣示效忠。

msg: My apprentice. Become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，当上艾尔登之王吧。

msg: Hmm, perhaps I'm jumping ahead,
msg_zh: ……可能心急了一点，

msg: but here is a symbol of my allegiance, and the academy's.
msg_zh: 这是我和学院表示忠诚的证明。

msg: Do you recall what once I told you?
msg_zh: ……我之前曾经教过你：

msg: That glintstone is the amber of the cosmos, and sorcery is the study of the stars, and the life therein.
msg_zh: 辉石是星星形成的琥珀，\n辉石魔法是在探索星星与星星的生命。

msg: When you become Elden Lord, please illuminate me.
msg_zh: 等你当上艾尔登之王，再反过来教我吧──

msg: Lay bare the secrets of life which course the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 艾尔登法环潜藏了什么样的生命奥秘。

msg: Next time, I will be your student.
msg_zh: 我很期待那一刻到来。

msg: Oh, one last thing.
msg_zh: 对了，还有啊，

msg: If you fail to claim your throne,
msg_zh: 如果你没能当上王，

msg: you can always pay me a visit.
msg_zh: 就回来我身边吧。

msg: Oh, don't fret. Even my dullest pupils will always have a place here.
msg_zh: ……别担心，即使徒弟不成材，\n还是会准备个地方让他待着啊。

msg: What is it? My apprentice.
msg_zh: 徒弟啊，怎么了？

msg: Ahh, I am glad to see you. My apprentice.
msg_zh: 啊，徒弟啊，你来了。

msg: Would you like a lesson? I'm always glad to further your education.
msg_zh: 要上课吗？\n你要上课，我随时欢迎。

msg: It warms my heart. That you still think of me.
msg_zh: 哦，真高兴。\n看来这件事你一直放在心上。

msg: Yet I still yearn, for you to find Master Lusat.
msg_zh: 对，没错，希望你帮忙找出卢瑟特大师。

msg: His body is needed. At the academy, to hone the primeval current...
msg_zh: 学院要全然领会起源，大师的身体不可或缺……

msg: Who could've guessed. What a place to find Master Lusat...
msg_zh: ……原来卢瑟特大师在那种地方……

msg: Oh, this is wonderful news. Now, his body will be brought home.
msg_zh: 啊，实在太棒了。\n这么一来就能接回大师的身体了。

msg: And when the bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat are together, the academy can hone the primeval current.
msg_zh: 有了亚兹勒大师与卢瑟特大师的身体，\n学院肯定能全然领会起源。

msg: So that we, fallen children of the stars, will beam once again.
msg_zh: 总有一天，我们这群弃子\n也能成为闪闪发亮的星之子。

msg: I am most grateful. There are no others who would have done this.
msg_zh: 谢谢，这件事肯定只有你才能办到。

msg: What a joy to have you as an apprentice, and kindred spirit.
msg_zh: 我很庆幸能收你当徒弟，有你这位知己。

msg: This is a mere token of my thanks. Please, take it.
msg_zh: 这是一点谢礼，收下吧。

msg: You wish to resume the lesson?
msg_zh: 还想继续上课吗？

msg: Good. Indeed, it is better to finish what one starts, is it not?
msg_zh: 我很乐意奉陪。\n既然如此，来彻底学习一回吧。

msg: With the body of Master Azur returned, the academy can restore the primeval current.
msg_zh: 接回亚兹勒大师的身体，学院就能回归起源──

msg: So that we, fallen children of the stars, might beam with brilliance once again.
msg_zh: 总有一天，我们这群弃子\n也能成为闪闪发亮的星之子。

msg: Jerren, bringer of my death.
msg_zh: ……杰廉，我的死亡啊。

msg: You have my gratitude. For freeing me from my shackles.
msg_zh: 我必须感谢你，你让我脱离制约的束缚。

msg: But I am afraid your work is done.
msg_zh: ……但你对我没有用处了。

msg: Join the school. To reflect on your mistake.
msg_zh: 成为我教室的一部份，后悔自身的愚蠢吧……

msg: U...urgh
M-my...apprentice...
msg_zh: ……徒、徒弟啊……

msg: My...apprentice...
msg_zh: ……徒、徒弟啊……

msg: Oh, is that a scroll? Takes me back to my academy days.
msg_zh: ……哦，是卷轴啊。\n让我回想起学院的时光。

msg: Very well. This is sorcery with which I'm not entirely unfamiliar.
msg_zh: 好吧，其中也没有完全陌生的魔法。

msg: I'll be sure to incorporate it into one of your lessons.
msg_zh: 就把这些魔法加入教材吧。

msg: Never lose that inquisitive spirit, my apprentice.
msg_zh: ……徒弟啊，别忘了这份求知欲。

msg: What's the meaning of this?
msg_zh: 你有什么企图？

msg: How unfortunate.
msg_zh: 是吗？我很遗憾。

msg: That we should part ways in this manner...
msg_zh: 没想到会以这种形式分道扬镳……

msg: Ngh!
Why, you. Are you mad?
msg_zh: ……你有什么企图？

msg: My death would only be temporary.
msg_zh: 杀了我也只是逞一时之快，

msg: Your savagery achieves nothing.
msg_zh: 我不认为有什么意义……

msg: Agh!
msg_zh: 呜呜！

msg: Why, you. Are you mad?
msg_zh: 你有什么企图？

msg: Another moment of this, and no amount of grovelling will spare you.
msg_zh: 再继续动手，\n我就不打算轻轻放下了。

msg: You sadden me, my apprentice.
msg_zh: ……是吗？徒弟啊，很遗憾。

msg: Ahh, how can this be...
msg_zh: ……啊，为什么……

msg: ...every fallen child... must shine again...
msg_zh: 为什么弃子……\n无法成为闪闪发亮的星……

msg: For a time, I believed us kindred spirits.
msg_zh: 我真心以为遇到了知己。

msg: My apprentice...
msg_zh: 徒弟啊……

msg: If it isn't Nerijus. The Bloody Finger.
msg_zh: ……找到你了，“血指”涅利乌斯。

msg: The end is nigh. For you, and your cessblood.
msg_zh: 与你那份咒血，一起画下句点吧。

msg: Just joining the fray, Tarnished?
msg_zh: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

msg: Well, you fought Nerijus and survived. That alone deserves commendation.
msg_zh: 和涅利乌斯交战又幸存，看来有一点本事。

msg: I am Yura. Hunter of Bloody Fingers.
msg_zh: 老夫叫尤拉，是猎杀血指的猎人。

msg: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
msg_zh: ……他们是为咒血痴狂的褪色者，\n一群袭击同胞的恶徒。

msg: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
msg_zh: 在这块土地上游走，\n肯定免不了与他们一战。

msg: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
msg_zh: 听好了，就算你念在彼此是同胞，\n那群家伙也早就疯了，不可能和他们沟通。

msg: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
msg_zh: 可别因为犹豫就手下留情。

msg: Well, you fought Nerijus and made good your escape. Fortune favours you, it seems.
msg_zh: 和涅利乌斯交战又顺利脱逃，\n至少你算是运气不错。

msg: Oh, one other thing...
msg_zh: 对了，还有啊……

msg: There are other Tarnished, like me, who hunt the Bloody Fingers.
msg_zh: 除了老夫以外，\n还有其他担任血指猎人的褪色者。

msg: If a Bloody Finger threatens you, use this ring.
msg_zh: 当你被血指攻击的时候，就用这枚戒指吧。

msg: If fortune takes your side, a hunter will come to your aid.
msg_zh: 只要你运气够好，血指猎人会助你一臂之力。

msg: Just joining the fray, Tarnished?
msg_zh: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

msg: I am Yura, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
msg_zh: 老夫叫尤拉，是猎杀血指的猎人。

msg: Have you ever faced a Bloody Finger?
msg_zh: 你有和血指交战过吗？

msg: They are Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
msg_zh: 那群袭击同胞，为咒血痴狂的褪色者。

msg: If you stay the path, you will face this blight, sooner or later.
msg_zh: 只要在这块土地上游走，\n他们就是避无可避的灾厄……

msg: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
msg_zh: 听好了，就算你念在彼此是同胞，\n那群家伙也早就疯了，不可能和他们沟通。

msg: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
msg_zh: 可别因为犹豫就手下留情。

msg: If fortune remains on your side, a hunter will come to your aid.
msg_zh: 只要你像这次一样，运气够好，\n血指猎人会助你一臂之力。

msg: One last word of warning.
msg_zh: 最后再给你一个建议：

msg: Stay clear of Agheel Lake. A great dragon roosts there.
msg_zh: 别靠近亚基尔湖，那里是龙的地盘。

msg: Be on your way.
msg_zh: ……快离开吧。

msg: Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.
msg_zh: 彼此有缘会再相见。

msg: Well, we meet again.
msg_zh: ……哦，是你。又见面啦。

msg: Beware. A great dragon roosts at Agheel Lake.
msg_zh: 你要小心了，这座亚基尔湖是龙的地盘。

msg: And it's as fearsome as it is majestic.
msg_zh: 龙兼具强大与美丽，但也十分可怕。

msg: So, unless you're mad, or wish to be burned alive...
msg_zh: 除非你是希望龙焰烧死自己的长生者……

msg: stay clear of the lake.
msg_zh: 否则贸然靠近，算不上聪明。

msg: Hmm, I gave you fair warning.
msg_zh: ……哦，老夫警告过你了：

msg: To stay clear of Agheel Lake, a known dragon roost.
msg_zh: 这座亚基尔湖是龙的地盘，别靠近。

msg: Don't be a fool. Turn back, before it's too late.
msg_zh: 不是笨蛋的话，现在折返还来得及。

msg: Don't be a fool. Turn back, before it's too late.
msg_zh: 不是笨蛋的话，现在折返还来得及。

msg: Ah, we meet again.
msg_zh: ……又见面了。

msg: To have fought Nerijus and lived, you must have seen your share of battle.
msg_zh: 和涅利乌斯交战又幸存，你确实有一点本事。

msg: To have fought Nerijus and escaped, fortune must smile upon you indeed.
msg_zh: 和涅利乌斯交战又顺利脱逃，\n你算是运气不错。

msg: I am Yura, as you might recall, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
msg_zh: 老夫叫尤拉，是猎杀血指的猎人。

msg: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
msg_zh: ……他们是为咒血痴狂的褪色者，\n一群袭击同胞的恶徒。

msg: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
msg_zh: 在这块土地上游走，\n肯定免不了与他们一战。

msg: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
msg_zh: 听好了，就算你念在彼此是同胞，\n那群家伙也早就疯了，不可能和他们沟通。

msg: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
msg_zh: 可别因为犹豫就手下留情。

msg: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

msg: You'd do well to steer clear of Agheel Lake, fledgling. A dragon roosts there...
msg_zh: 那你要小心了，这座亚基尔湖是龙的地盘……

msg: You bloody halfwit.
msg_zh: ……你真的是个笨蛋啊，

msg: Picking a fight with a dragon?
msg_zh: 竟然异想天开，想挑战龙。

msg: Well, I can tell you want to see it through.
msg_zh: 老夫不再阻止你了，反正也是徒劳。

msg: Seems I'm forever crossing paths with hotheads like you.
msg_zh: ……看来，老夫似乎和笨蛋特别有缘。

msg: Ah, we meet again.
msg_zh: ……又见面了。

msg: I am Yura, as you might recall, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
msg_zh: 老夫叫尤拉，是猎杀血指的猎人。

msg: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
msg_zh: ……他们是为咒血痴狂的褪色者，\n一群袭击同胞的恶徒。

msg: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
msg_zh: 在这块土地上游走，\n肯定免不了与他们一战。

msg: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
msg_zh: 听好了，就算你念在彼此是同胞，\n那群家伙也早就疯了，不可能和他们沟通。

msg: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
msg_zh: 可别因为犹豫就手下留情。

msg: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

msg: And quite the fool, by the look of it.
msg_zh: 而且看来，是个笨蛋──

msg: Picking a fight with a dragon? Hah.
msg_zh: 竟然异想天开，想挑战龙。

msg: Well, I can tell you want to see it through.
msg_zh: ……但老夫不阻止你，反正也是徒劳。

msg: Seems I'm forever crossing paths with hotheads like you.
msg_zh: ……看来，老夫似乎和笨蛋特别有缘。

msg: I can tell you want to see it through.
msg_zh: ……老夫不会阻止你。

msg: Fools will be fools. Fight all the dragons you like.
msg_zh: 不够聪明的，就继续挑战龙吧。

msg: There you are. That was my first dragon hunt in quite some time.
msg_zh: ……是你啊。好久没有狩猎龙了。

msg: Paired up with a hothead like you, it was just like old times.
msg_zh: 又是和笨蛋联手，真怀念。

msg: Now that you've so impressively felled that dragon, there's something you should know.
msg_zh: ……而且你还成功打倒了龙。\n既然如此，该告诉你。

msg: That heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
msg_zh: 你手上那颗龙心脏，是龙飨用的供品。

msg: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
msg_zh: 等到某一天，当你为了获得力量吃下它，\n心中因此萌生渴望，难以克制的时候……

msg: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
msg_zh: 记得到西边海岸的尽头，那里有座小岛，\n到岛上的废弃教堂一趟。

msg: You must not forget, though.
msg_zh: ……不过，你也要记得──

msg: Those who partake in Dragon Communion will one day shed their humanity.
msg_zh: 所有执行龙飨的人，都会渐渐成为非人。

msg: Their hunger for dragon, their yearning, only worsens.
msg_zh: 渴望龙的念头不会消失，而是会逐渐累积……

msg: Until the floodgates burst, unleashing eternal torment.
msg_zh: 最后那念头会充斥全身，不断折磨着你。

msg: The strength of a mighty dragon. Magnificent, but deadly.
msg_zh: 龙的力量既强大又美丽，却十分可怕──

msg: It's no surprise that Dragon Communion is ruinous.
msg_zh: 也因此，执行龙飨等同踏上毁灭的不归路。

msg: Beautiful work, felling that dragon.
msg_zh: ……你成功打倒了龙啊。

msg: And as such, there's something you might like to know.
msg_zh: 既然如此，该告诉你。

msg: Wretched worms, leave me be...
msg_zh: 天杀的寄生虫，越来越痛……

msg: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

msg: That was my first dragon hunt in quite a while.
msg_zh: ……好久没有狩猎龙了。

msg: Paired up with a hothead like you, it was just like old times.
msg_zh: 又是和笨蛋联手，真怀念。

msg: Now that you've so impressively felled that dragon, there's something you should know.
msg_zh: ……你成功打倒了龙。\n既然如此，该告诉你。

msg: The heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
msg_zh: 你手上那颗龙心脏，是龙飨用的供品。

msg: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
msg_zh: 等到某一天，当你为了获得力量吃下它，\n心中因此萌生渴望，难以克制的时候……

msg: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
msg_zh: 记得到西边海岸的尽头，那里有座小岛，\n到岛上的废弃教堂一趟。

msg: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

msg: Beautiful work, felling that dragon.
msg_zh: 而且你还成功打倒了龙……

msg: And as such, there's something you might like to know.
msg_zh: 既然如此，该告诉你。

msg: That heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
msg_zh: 你手上那颗龙心脏，是龙飨用的供品。

msg: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
msg_zh: 等到某一天，当你为了获得力量吃下它，\n心中因此萌生渴望，难以克制的时候……

msg: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
msg_zh: 记得到西边海岸的尽头，那里有座小岛，\n到岛上的废弃教堂一趟。

msg: Ah, oh, it's you. Thanks for your help there.
msg_zh: ……哦、哦，是你啊。受你关照了。

msg: That Bloody Finger was a thorn in my side. And now I'm finally rid of him.
msg_zh: 那个血指很棘手，终于解决掉他了。

msg: Here's a token of thanks. Please, take it.
msg_zh: 这是一点心意，收下吧。

msg: I may not have much time.
msg_zh: ……嗯，所剩的时间也不多了。

msg: I'm dying to see you, Eleonora... Violet Bloody Finger...
msg_zh: 真想尽快找到“纯紫血指”艾琉诺拉……

msg: Yes, I've been tracking Eleonora for quite some time.
msg_zh: ……对，老夫一直在追杀艾琉诺拉。

msg: She is the deadliest of all Bloody Fingers. She's felled many an old hand already.
msg_zh: 她是最具威胁性的血指，\n技术纯熟的战士前仆后继，已经死了不少人……

msg: But in spite of her cessblood zealotry, Eleonora is a proud knight.
msg_zh: 艾琉诺拉即使为咒血痴狂，\n依旧保有荣誉感，会用全力战斗。

msg: If she comes for you, do not think twice. You must flee.
msg_zh: 老夫不会害你，\n如果被她攻击了，直接逃跑吧。

msg: There is no shame in self-preservation.
msg_zh: 这种情况逃亡也算不上耻辱，要记住了。

msg: Be on your way.
msg_zh: ……快离开吧。

msg: Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.
msg_zh: 彼此有缘会再相见。

msg: Eleonora, it seems I am no match for you.
msg_zh: ……艾琉诺拉啊，虽说远不及你，

msg: But I've learned a thing or two myself, you see.
msg_zh: 但老夫也没有虚度光阴。

msg: I've sliced the finger off.
msg_zh: 老夫砍下你的指头了，

msg: Please, please, Eleonora, yield to the cessblood no longer.
msg_zh: 所以别再心向着咒血──

msg: Do not stain the immaculacy of your sword, your flesh, your fire...
msg_zh: 别再让你的剑、你的身躯，\n还有你那美丽的龙焰染上任何一点阴霾……

msg: Finally, we meet.
msg_zh: ……望穿秋水，终于遇见您了──

msg: The Tarnished, who would be Lord.
msg_zh: 必定为王的褪色者啊。

msg: Oh my, why the long face?
msg_zh: ……哎呀，看您的表情有些诧异，

msg: I fear that you were previously acquainted with this vessel.
msg_zh: 难道说您认识这副身体的原主人？

msg: Well, that is most unfortunate. For he is dead.
msg_zh: 事情真是如此，那我很遗憾──\n他已经往生了。

msg: As for his flesh, he gave it to me, Shabriri.
msg_zh: 他将这副身体托付给我──夏玻利利。

msg: I hope you can make your peace with that.
msg_zh: 今后还请您多多关照。

msg: You are about to sacrifice something precious.
msg_zh: ……您正面临做出牺牲的时刻──

msg: The life of a fair maiden, that you would toss into the fiery forge.
msg_zh: 那可怜的女孩将投身火焰大锅，焚烧自己……

msg: Only so that you may be Lord.
msg_zh: 就为了让您步上为王的路。

msg: What a horrible thing to ponder.
msg_zh: 这情况真让人不忍卒睹。

msg: Your ascendency requires her sacrifice, whether she wishes it or not.
msg_zh: 不提那女孩是出于自愿，您也只有牺牲她一途，\n否则想步上自己的路，别无他法。

msg: But how would the Lord, crowned so, be looked upon?
msg_zh: 综观下来，您认为众人会真心认您为王？

msg: Chosen Tarnished and would-be Lord, dare to tread the path of true rigor.
msg_zh: ……必定为王的褪色者啊，\n请步上险恶的道路吧。

msg: Spare the poor girl, and singe your own flesh in her stead.
msg_zh: 不该焚烧那可怜的女孩，\n该焚烧的，是您自己的身体。

msg: If you are prepared to show resolve,
msg_zh: 如果您已经有所准备，

msg: and attain Lordship through righteous hardship,
msg_zh: 认为即使路途险恶，也必须步上正统的王者之路──

msg: then heed the words of I, Shabriri.
msg_zh: 就请将夏玻利利的话听进去。

msg: Chosen Tarnished, and would-be Lord.
msg_zh: 必定为王的褪色者啊──

msg: Descend into the depths, far below the Erdtree Capital.
msg_zh: 请您朝黄金树王城底下，地底深处前进。

msg: Seek audience with the Three Fingers, and the flame of frenzy.
msg_zh: 接着会见叁指以及癫火。

msg: If you inherit the flame of frenzy, your flesh will serve as kindling,
msg_zh: 在受赐癫火之后，您会成为火种，

msg: and the girl can be spared.
msg_zh: 就不必让那女孩接受焚烧。

msg: ...setting you on the righteous path of lordship.
msg_zh: ……请步上正统的王者之路──

msg: The path of the Lord of Chaos.
msg_zh: 那成为浑沌之王的路。

msg: Burn the Erdtree to the ground,
msg_zh: 燃烧、击倒黄金树──

msg: and incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
msg_zh: 侵略、熔化那分隔你我的一切事物吧。

msg: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
msg_zh: 啊，愿浑沌充满世间！

msg: May chaos take the world!
msg_zh: 愿浑沌充满世间！

msg: Chosen Tarnished, and would-be Lord.
msg_zh: 必定为王的褪色者啊──

msg: Descend into the depths, far below the Erdtree Capital.
msg_zh: 请您朝黄金树王城底下，地底深处前进。

msg: Seek audience with the Three Fingers, and the flame of frenzy.
msg_zh: 接着会见叁指以及癫火。

msg: Burn the Erdtree to the ground,
msg_zh: 燃烧、击倒黄金树──

msg: and incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
msg_zh: 侵略、熔化那分隔你我的一切事物吧。

msg: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
msg_zh: 啊，愿浑沌充满世间！

msg: May chaos take the world!
msg_zh: 愿浑沌充满世间！

msg: Ugh.
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: That will be quite enough.
msg_zh: 住手吧。

msg: What do you stand to gain by challenging me?
msg_zh: 老夫没有和你交手的理由。

msg: Too late for you, eh?
msg_zh: ……莫可奈何啊。

msg: Well, if you've succumbed to cessblood...
msg_zh: 唉，既然迟早会为咒血痴狂，

msg: it's better that I finish you here.
msg_zh: 早点猎杀也好。

msg: I had no choice.
msg_zh: ……这样就事成了。

msg: Your death could have been much worse.
msg_zh: 认命受死吧。

msg: What a wretched fate.
msg_zh: ……真可惜，

msg: Why did you turn foul...
msg_zh: 怎么会变成恶徒……

msg: I must not die...
msg_zh: ……在杀了她之前……

msg: until she is eradicated...
msg_zh: 老夫不能死……

msg: What's this?
msg_zh: 哦？

msg: Well, this is peculiar.
msg_zh: 您的行为还真是不合常理。

msg: Is this how you express contempt?
msg_zh: 难道说，您恨我吗？

msg: This, I did not expect.
msg_zh: ……那就没有办法了。

msg: But if you do not care for Lordship,
msg_zh: 既然您无意为王，

msg: I'm afraid you are of no use.
msg_zh: 我也与您无缘了。

msg: How very unfortunate.
msg_zh: ……唉，真是可惜。

msg: I did not take you for a fraud.
msg_zh: 结果只是个蠢蛋啊，我看错人了。

msg: Shabriri is chaos incarnate. I cannot die.
msg_zh: ……夏玻利利等同浑沌，绝不会死亡。

msg: Until we meet again, in another place or time.
msg_zh: 往后肯定会以不同样貌，再次相见吧。

msg: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
msg_zh: 啊，愿浑沌充满世间！

msg: There's no mistake, is there?
msg_zh: ……嗯，这也是……

msg: Death has left its mark once again.
msg_zh: ……死亡又再一次扩散……

msg: I'm sorry, I cannot give you your proper rites...
msg_zh: ……万分抱歉，我现在无法替你处理身后事。

msg: But at least you did not join Those Who Live in Death.
msg_zh: 但既然没有遭遇“死诞”，

msg: Your soul will return to the Erdtree, in time.
msg_zh: 灵魂终究会回归大树。

msg: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver this spirit.
msg_zh: 黄金啊，掌管此人的魂魄吧。

msg: Ah, a Tarnished, are you?
msg_zh: ……你是褪色者吗？

msg: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.
msg_zh: 你可以称我为Ｄ。\n我正在狩猎死诞者，摘除死根。

msg: Heed my warning.
msg_zh: ……先警告你一声，

msg: The village here has been touched by Death.
msg_zh: 死亡已经扩散到前面的村子，

msg: And worse yet, it is home to a mariner.
msg_zh: 大概“船”也在。

msg: If you value your life, then go no further.
msg_zh: 不想平白送命的话，别随意靠近。

msg: The village here has been touched by Death.
msg_zh: 死亡已经扩散到前面的村子……

msg: Turn back, while you still can.
msg_zh: 别随意靠近。

msg: Another fool who won't listen to reason, eh?
msg_zh: ……你是听不懂警告的蠢蛋？

msg: But with a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
msg_zh: 但看来是有摘除死根的实力……

msg: How would you like to earn the strength of beasts?
msg_zh: 你对野兽的力量有兴趣吗？

msg: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,
msg_zh: 要是你有意愿狩猎死诞者，摘除死根，

msg: then I'll introduce you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
msg_zh: 我会把你推荐给“野兽祭司”古兰格。

msg: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
msg_zh: ……我有其他规划，

msg: And the beast himself wishes for someone to take my place.
msg_zh: 古兰格大概也想换个帮手。

msg: What say you?
msg_zh: 你怎么想？

msg: Very well. Show me your map.
msg_zh: ……很好，借我地图。

msg: I've marked the location for you. Of a hidden gateway.
msg_zh: 我在地图上做好标记了，\n记号的地方有隐藏的传送门。

msg: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
msg_zh: 用那传送门去见“野兽祭司”古兰格吧。

msg: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
msg_zh: ……我有其他规划。

msg: I spotted the mark of the centipede here in the village.
msg_zh: 这座村子出现了百足环的烙印，

msg: An ill-omened symbol that should not be.
msg_zh: 那是不该有的不祥印记。

msg: Someone, or something, threatens the sanctity of the Golden Order.
msg_zh: ……有人意图玷污黄金律法，

msg: And must be eradicated.
msg_zh: 必须除之而后快。

msg: What is it? Still milling about?
msg_zh: ……怎么？你还不出发？

msg: The map indicates where the gateway is hidden.
msg_zh: 地图上的记号标着传送门隐藏的位置，

msg: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
msg_zh: 用那传送门去见“野兽祭司”古兰格吧。

msg: Well, all right, then.
msg_zh: ……哦，是吗？

msg: No sense in forcing you.
msg_zh: 我不勉强。

msg: What now? Had a change of heart?
msg_zh: ……怎么？改变心意了？

msg: Ah, a Tarnished, are you?
msg_zh: ……你是褪色者吗？

msg: With a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
msg_zh: 看来是有摘除死根的实力……

msg: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.
msg_zh: 你可以称我为Ｄ。\n我正在狩猎死诞者，摘除死根。

msg: How would you like to earn the strength of beasts?
msg_zh: 你对野兽的力量有兴趣吗？

msg: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,
msg_zh: 要是你有意愿狩猎死诞者，摘除死根，

msg: then I'll introduce you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
msg_zh: 我会把你推荐给“野兽祭司”古兰格。

msg: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
msg_zh: ……我有其他规划，

msg: And the beast himself wishes for someone to take my place.
msg_zh: 古兰格大概也想换个帮手。

msg: Ha! Prince of Death, take a good long look!
msg_zh: 死王子啊，看仔细了！

msg: See the wrath of the Golden Order! The Order's justice, writ in blood!
msg_zh: 这就是黄金律法的怒火！黄金律法的正义！

msg: This is what's become of your precious witch! Naught but expired meat and bone!
msg_zh: 你的魔女已经变成这副德性了！\n迎接正确的死亡，化成尸块！

msg: This is a proper death, O Prince!
msg_zh: 看仔细了！死王子啊！

msg: Look at this rotten whore. No more children can be got from this useless flesh!
msg_zh: 这骯脏的娼妓，这尸块不会再怀上小孩！

msg: Behold, your mother is dead!
msg_zh: 你的母亲已经死了！

msg: Heh heh heh heh...
msg_zh: 哈哈哈哈哈哈！

msg: This is revenge, you witch! And you, you ghoul! This is the wrath of D!
msg_zh: 这就是报应，Ｄ的怒火！\n活该的魔女！可悲的死王子！

msg: Ah. Hello.
msg_zh: ……哦，是你啊。

msg: The rotten witch is dead. The Golden Order, unsullied.
msg_zh: 骯脏的魔女已经死了，黄金律法不会再受玷污。

msg: Now I can look my brother Darian in the eye.
msg_zh: ……总算对得起我哥哥达利安了。

msg: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver my spirit.
msg_zh: 黄金啊，掌管我的魂魄吧。

msg: Darian, now I have no regrets.
msg_zh: ……总算对得起达利安了。

msg: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver my spirit.
msg_zh: 黄金啊，掌管我的魂魄吧。

msg: <sleeping>
Ah, aah...
D-da...ri...
Ngh...nnngh...

msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！

msg: Ah, mm...
Y-You...
I require the sword...and raiment...of D...
msg_zh: 请给我Ｄ的剑……Ｄ的盔甲……

msg: I require the sword...of D...
msg_zh: 请给我Ｄ的剑……

msg: For revenge...
msg_zh: 为了复仇……

msg: For the wrath...of D...
msg_zh: 为了Ｄ的怒火……

msg: Yeeesss...
msg_zh: 哦、哦哦哦……

msg: YESSS!
msg_zh: 哦哦哦哦哦哦哦！

msg: Soon you will know, filthy witch...
msg_zh: 骯脏的魔女，好好感受吧──

msg: Soon you will know... Vengeance for Darian.
msg_zh: 达利安的仇人，好好感受吧──

msg: The wrath of D...
msg_zh: 何谓Ｄ的怒火……

msg: I don't believe we've met.
msg_zh: ……之前没见过你。

msg: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.
msg_zh: 你可以称我为Ｄ。\n我正在狩猎死诞者，摘除死根。

msg: Heed my warning.
msg_zh: ……先警告你一声，

msg: Those Who Live in Death should be left well alone.
msg_zh: 不要靠近死诞者。

msg: All the more, should you spy a mariner among their number.
msg_zh: 尤其是在“船”出现的时候。

msg: Unless you wish to lay down your life in vain.
msg_zh: ……你应该不想平白送命吧？

msg: Those Who Live in Death should be left well alone.
msg_zh: 不要靠近死诞者，

msg: All the more, should you spy a mariner among their number.
msg_zh: 尤其是在“船”出现的时候。

msg: Ah...we meet again.
msg_zh: ……哦，是你啊。

msg: I'm glad you took my warning to heart.
msg_zh: 看样子我的警告奏效了。

msg: Those Who Live in Death should be left well alone.
msg_zh: 不要靠近死诞者。

msg: All the more, should you spy a mariner among their number.
msg_zh: 尤其是在“船”出现的时候。

msg: Well, well...
msg_zh: ……哦，你这是……

msg: Another fool who won't listen to reason, eh?
msg_zh: ……听不懂警告的蠢蛋啊，

msg: But with a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
msg_zh: 但看来是有摘除死根的实力……

msg: With a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
msg_zh: 看来是有摘除死根的实力……

msg: How would you like to earn the strength of beasts?
msg_zh: 你对野兽的力量有兴趣吗？

msg: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,
msg_zh: 要是你有意愿狩猎死诞者，摘除死根，

msg: then I'll introduce you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
msg_zh: 我会把你推荐给“野兽祭司”古兰格。

msg: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
msg_zh: ……我有其他规划，

msg: And the beast himself wishes for someone to take my place.
msg_zh: 古兰格大概也想换个帮手。

msg: What say you?
msg_zh: 你怎么想？

msg: Very well. Show me your map.
msg_zh: ……很好，借我地图。

msg: I've marked the location for you. Of a hidden gateway.
msg_zh: 我在地图上做好标记了，\n记号的地方有隐藏的传送门。

msg: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
msg_zh: 用那传送门去见“野兽祭司”古兰格吧。

msg: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
msg_zh: ……我有其他规划。

msg: I've spotted the mark of the centipede.
msg_zh: ……百足环的烙印出现了，

msg: An ill-omened symbol that should not be.
msg_zh: 那是不该有的不祥印记。

msg: Someone, or something, threatens the sanctity of the Golden Order.
msg_zh: ……有人意图玷污黄金律法，

msg: And must be eradicated.
msg_zh: 必须除之而后快。

msg: What is it? Still milling about?
msg_zh: ……怎么？你还不出发？

msg: The map indicates where the gateway is hidden.
msg_zh: 地图上的记号标着传送门隐藏的位置，

msg: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
msg_zh: 用那传送门去见“野兽祭司”古兰格吧。

msg: Well, all right, then.
msg_zh: ……哦，是吗？

msg: No sense in forcing you.
msg_zh: 我不勉强。

msg: What's wrong? Got cold feet, have you?
msg_zh: ……怎么？改变心意了？

msg: You've met Gurranq, I take it?
msg_zh: ……你见到古兰格了吧？

msg: Then owing to our duties shared, we are now comrades-in-arms.
msg_zh: 既然你愿意一起摘除死根……\n我们就是同伴了。

msg: I think you've earned this.
msg_zh: ……那我应该告诉你，

msg: The power of the Golden Order, to aid the hunt of Those Who Live in Death.
msg_zh: 何谓狩猎死诞者的，黄金律法的力量。

msg: Did you need something else?
msg_zh: ……还有事吗？

msg: Ah, hello there. What can I do for you?
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。还有事吗？

msg: Ah, hello. You've been busy weeding Deathroot, I take it.
msg_zh: ……你真勤奋啊。

msg: I thank you, as your brother-in-arms.
msg_zh: 身为共事的人，很感谢你的努力。

msg: So what can I do for you?
msg_zh: 找我有什么事？

msg: Ah, hello again.
msg_zh: ……哦，是你啊。

msg: You haven't gone to see Gurranq yet, have you?
msg_zh: 你还没去见古兰格？

msg: Well, no rush. You do as you please.
msg_zh: ……也罢，你自己决定吧。

msg: Just as long as he doesn't starve to death, eh.
msg_zh: 只希望古兰格不会饿死。

msg: Go to Gurranq only if you feel the time is right.
msg_zh: ……见不见古兰格，你自己决定吧。

msg: Killing Those Who Live in Death and weeding their Deathroot...
msg_zh: 狩猎死诞者、摘除死根……

msg: Is a path not to be trod without ample resolve.
msg_zh: 都要有决心才能办到。

msg: I serve the Golden Order.
msg_zh: ……我志愿为黄金律法服务。

msg: That I might put this crooked land to rights.
msg_zh: 只有伟大的艾尔登法环能引导我们，

msg: Following only the guidance of the great Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 带领我们修复这破坏殆尽的世界。

msg: Those Who Live in Death fall outside the principles of the Golden Order.
msg_zh: ……那些死诞者不存在于黄金律法的法则之内，

msg: Their mere existence sullies the guidance of gold. Tainting its truth.
msg_zh: 他们只要留在世上就会玷污引导，\n还会让引导的正当性蒙上阴影。

msg: And so it is the vermin must be exterminated... Down to the very last.
msg_zh: ……所以必须除掉他们，一个也不能留……

msg: Are you acquainted with a man named Rogier?
msg_zh: ……你认识罗杰尔吗？

msg: You know, the piteous fellow hiding away on the balcony?
msg_zh: 躲在圆桌厅堂露台的，那个可悲的男人。

msg: He was a formidable spellblade, in times past.
msg_zh: ……他以前是位优秀的魔法剑士。

msg: Don't let his easy air deceive you. He was wise beyond his years, stout of heart and clear of mind.
msg_zh: 天资聪颖，看似一派从容，\n但意志坚定，不会受外力影响。

msg: No more though.
msg_zh: 可是你看，现在是什么德行？

msg: You see him now, ravaged by thorns, muttering and rambling...
msg_zh: 被玷污荆棘贯穿，不停讲些没用的废话──

msg: Like he's half dead already. I can't stomach to watch.
msg_zh: 不堪入目，犹如半具尸体的东西。

msg: Take well the lesson, friend.
msg_zh: ……劝你要记牢了，

msg: That's how you end up, when seduced by Those Who Live in Death.
msg_zh: 那就是受死诞者魅惑的下场。

msg: When grace is sullied, it rots people from the inside. Breaks them.
msg_zh: 当引导受到玷污，必会侵蚀人……毁了人。

msg: Well, what have we here?
msg_zh: ……哦，那武器……

msg: How did you get your hands on that dagger?
msg_zh: 你怎么拿到那把短剑的？

msg: Well. That hardly matters.
msg_zh: ……嗯，没关系。

msg: I know very well whose dagger it is.
msg_zh: 我熟识那把短剑的主人，

msg: Why don't I return it to them for you?
msg_zh: 由我代为归还吧？

msg: Good work, bringing this to me.
msg_zh: ……辛苦你了……

msg: <wince>
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: Don't you dare.
msg_zh: ……劝你停手。

msg: Unless you want to die like a dog?
msg_zh: 还是说，你这么想平白送命？

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……好吧。

msg: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver this spirit.
msg_zh: 黄金啊，掌管此人的魂魄吧。

msg: I swear, there's a blight spreading amongst the Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……褪色者里的无聊之辈也多了不少……

msg: How could this...happen...?
msg_zh: ……怎么会……

msg: Forgive me, Devin... D-Devin...
msg_zh: 对不起，达文……达、文……

msg: Oof!
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: What's the meaning of this?
msg_zh: ……你做什么？

msg: Has she bewitched you?
msg_zh: 你是魔女的奴隶吗？

msg: Very well.
msg_zh: ……好吧。

msg: Then you are a blight.
msg_zh: 那你就是玷污者。

msg: A defiler of the Golden Order, and murderer of my brother!
msg_zh: 玷污黄金律法之辈，我要替哥哥报仇！

msg: Die! Die! Die!
msg_zh: 去死！去死！去死吧！

msg: I'll grind your corpse into that vile wench's rotting remains.
msg_zh: 我要把你的尸体刺进那骯脏娼妓的尸块里。

msg: A witch's eternal embrace, just as you wished!
msg_zh: 这样就能永远被它抱在怀里了！\n不是你梦寐以求的吗！

msg: You defiled cretin. My brother is now avenged!
msg_zh: ……玷污者，这就是我哥哥带来的报应！

msg: How could this...
msg_zh: ……怎么会……

msg: Forgive me, Darian... D-Darian...
msg_zh: 原谅我，达利安……达、利……

msg: Everyone's...been grafted.
msg_zh: ……大家都被“接肢”了。

msg: Everyone who came with me. They crossed the sea for me. They fought, for me.
msg_zh: 和我一起来到交界地，为我而战的那些人……

msg: Heh...
msg_zh: 呵呵。

msg: Only to have their arms taken. Their legs taken. Even their heads...taken.Taken and stuck to the spider.
msg_zh: 手、脚、头全部被砍断，变成蜘蛛的一部分了。

msg: Did you know? If you're grafted by the spider, you become a chrysalid.
msg_zh: 你知道吗？被接到蜘蛛身上之后，\n人就会长得像是虫蛹喔。

msg: It's quite the lark, when you think about it.
msg_zh: 真的很奇妙，对不对？

msg: You're all on your own, are you?
msg_zh: 你一个人行动吗？

msg: And heading to Stormveil Castle?
msg_zh: 正朝着史东薇尔城前进吗？

msg: Enticed by the one in the white mask, I suppose. Oh, you've come to be one with the spider?
msg_zh: 是因为听信那位白面具先生的好听话？\n还是说，你想要变成蜘蛛的一部分呢？

msg: Well, that makes us two peas in a pod.
msg_zh: 如果是的话，那就和我一样了。

msg: But I don't have your courage.
msg_zh: 可是我没有勇气──

msg: It's scary, you know. Having your arms cut off. Or legs. Or your head.
msg_zh: 要被砍断手脚、砍断头，太可怕了。

msg: I want to be like everyone else, but I'm just too scared.
msg_zh: 我很想和大家变得一样，但实在怕得不得了。

msg: I'm nothing but a craven.
msg_zh: 我太懦弱了。

msg: Oh, I know.
msg_zh: 啊，对了。

msg: Can you take this little one along with you?
msg_zh: 能请你带着这孩子一起旅行吗？

msg: Can you take these little ones along with you?
msg_zh: 能请你带着这些孩子一起旅行吗？

msg: The poor thing deserves someone braver than myself…
msg_zh: 要他陪着这么懦弱的我，太可怜了……

msg: And the spirits look rather fondly upon you.
msg_zh: 而且灵魂好像很喜欢你，

msg: It'll be glad of your company, I think, the little'un.
msg_zh: 我想这孩子也会很开心。

msg: They'd be glad of your company, I think, the little'uns.
msg_zh: 我想这些孩子也会很开心。

msg: The poor things deserve someone braver than myself…
msg_zh: 要他们陪着这么懦弱的我，太可怜了……

msg: It was a pleasure to see you.
msg_zh: 那么，请多保重。

msg: Oh, can you pass on a message for me, if you see the little chrysalids in Stormveil Castle?
msg_zh: 如果你准备前往史东薇尔城，\n请帮忙转达给成为虫蛹的大家：

msg: Tell them I love them. And that despite my craven heart, I'm sure I'll be joining their club soon enough.
msg_zh: “我爱你们。虽然还是很害怕，\n但迟早会变得和大家一模一样。”

msg: I'm finally getting the hang of this whole \"pain\" thing, you know.
msg_zh: ……我终于比较不怕痛了。

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 呵呵。

msg: What's this?
msg_zh: ……这是什么？

msg: A keepsake? From my men?
msg_zh: 这是大家的遗物？

msg: Oh, goodness me…
I can't…
msg_zh: 竟然有这种事……

msg: A pleasure to see you.
msg_zh: ……你好。

msg: Did you give the little chrysalids the message?
msg_zh: 你帮我转达给大家了吗？

msg: That I love them. And that despite my craven heart, I'm sure I'll be joining their club soon enough.
msg_zh: “我爱你们。虽然还是很害怕，\n但迟早会变得和大家一模一样。”

msg: They all...believed in me.
msg_zh: ……大家相信我。

msg: They all thought I'd make something of myself. Me! Who can't do anything...
msg_zh: 即使现在什么事都办不到，\n还是相信在未来，我能够成就些什么。

msg: I think I'll head to the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: ……我想前往圆桌厅堂。

msg: Perhaps I'll find my purpose there.
msg_zh: 去找出自己能做些什么。

msg: I think I'll head to the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: ……我想前往圆桌厅堂。

msg: Perhaps I'll find my purpose there.
msg_zh: 去找出自己能做些什么。

msg: Greetings. Nice to see you again.
msg_zh: 好久不见了。

msg: My name is Roderika. I should have told you sooner.
msg_zh: 我叫罗德莉卡。\n抱歉，这么晚才告诉你名字。

msg: Isn't this place impressive, though?
msg_zh: 说起来，圆桌厅堂很厉害呢。

msg: The Roundtable Hold, covert quarters of the Two Fingers, and gathering place of champions who vie to become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 既是双指的藏身处，\n也是想当上王的英雄群集的地方……

msg: I never knew the guidance bestowed upon us Tarnished had such fantastic roots.
msg_zh: 真没想到褪色者的指引，背后竟然充满着奥秘。

msg: Although, it's all a bit much for me, in truth.
msg_zh: ……只是对我而言，\n圆桌厅堂的指引过于伟大。

msg: I'm still looking for my own purpose.
msg_zh: 我想找找其他自己能做的事。

msg: You're telling me I possess some kind of gift?
msg_zh: ……我有那方面的潜力吗？

msg: I don't believe you. But...
msg_zh: 真不敢置信，但如果是真的……

msg: If I do have this talent, and goodness knows it would be my first...
msg_zh: ……如果是真的，就算我不够优秀，

msg: I suppose I should try to hone it. Shouldn't I?
msg_zh: 我也想去学习，想去磨练。

msg: I'll ask Master Hewg to teach me.
msg_zh: ……我想请修古先生指导我。

msg: Certainly, he does appear intimidating, and holds no love for us Tarnished...
msg_zh: 那位先生外表恐怖，被束缚在圆桌厅堂，\n厌恶我们褪色者。

msg: But I know he's trapped here, at the Roundtable Hold... So...
msg_zh: 会被讨厌是理所当然，但是……

msg: I can tell. He's a gentle soul, underneath it all.
msg_zh: 我却认为，那位先生其实非常温柔。

msg: Oh, and…
msg_zh: 啊，还有一件事……

msg: Please, allow to me to express my thanks.
msg_zh: 请让我向你道谢。

msg: For giving me that keepsake from my men.
msg_zh: 如果你没有将大家的遗物转交给我，

msg: It was as if I was frozen with self-pity. I failed them at every turn.
msg_zh: 我肯定会一直坐在原地，自怨自艾，\n继续背叛大家的期待。

msg: You have my gratitude. Please, take this.
msg_zh: 我很感谢你，请收下这个。

msg: A pleasure to meet you.
msg_zh: 初次见面，你好。

msg: My name is Roderika. I'm a recent arrival.
msg_zh: 我叫罗德莉卡，刚来到这里。

msg: Isn't this place impressive?
msg_zh: 说起来，圆桌厅堂很厉害呢。

msg: The Roundtable Hold, covert quarters of the Two Fingers, and gathering place of champions who vie to become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 既是双指的藏身处，\n也是想当上王的英雄群集的地方……

msg: I never knew the guidance bestowed upon us Tarnished had such fantastic roots.
msg_zh: 真没想到褪色者的指引，背后竟然充满着奥秘。

msg: Although, it's all a bit much for me, in truth.
msg_zh: ……只是对我而言，\n圆桌厅堂的指引过于伟大。

msg: I'm still looking for my own purpose.
msg_zh: 我想找找其他自己能做的事。

msg: It's all a bit much for me, in truth.
msg_zh: 对我而言，圆桌厅堂的指引过于伟大。

msg: I'm still looking for my own purpose.
msg_zh: 我想找找其他自己能做的事。

msg: A pleasure to see you.
msg_zh: 你好。

msg: Thank goodness you're safe.
msg_zh: 平安无事比什么都重要。

msg: I'm still looking for my own purpose.
msg_zh: ……我还在寻找自己能做的事。

msg: It's not easy, by any means, but it's what I must do.
msg_zh: 这没有办法马上找到。\n但我想，这是目前的我该做的事情。

msg: If I do have a talent for spirit tuning, and goodness knows that would be a surprise…
msg_zh: ……如果我真的有调灵的潜力，\n即使不够优秀也好。

msg: I suppose I should try to hone it. Shouldn't I?
msg_zh: 我也想去学习，想去磨练。

msg: I'll ask Master Hewg to teach me.
msg_zh: ……我再去请修古先生指导我。

msg: Good to see you again. Thank you very much!
msg_zh: 啊，谢谢你。

msg: I have you to thank, don't I? For persuading Master Hewg?
msg_zh: 你替我说服修古先生了，对吧？

msg: I can happily announce that he has taught me the noble toil of spirit tuning.
msg_zh: 多亏如此，修古先生愿意教导我\n关于调灵的学问。

msg: I'm as yet unsure of what I might be able to accomplish,
msg_zh: ……我还不知道自己能走得多远，

msg: but if I might be any help to you all, I'd certainly like to try.
msg_zh: 但只要一想到自己能尽棉薄之力帮助你们，

msg: And if there's any chance to ease the suffering of my dear men who were grafted...
msg_zh: 也能慰藉被“接肢”的大家──

msg: Well, I certainly must try.
msg_zh: 我就想继续努力下去。

msg: Roderika the spirit tuner prentice. Pleased to make your acquaintance.
msg_zh: 调灵实习生罗德莉卡，今后请多多指教。

msg: Greetings.
msg_zh: 你好啊。

msg: Are you here for spirit tuning?
msg_zh: 要委托调灵吗？

msg: I feel like I'm really coming to grips with spirit tuning of late.
msg_zh: 这阵子，我开始熟悉调灵的工作了──

msg: I can see how and why immortal essence exists as spirit under the Golden Order.
msg_zh: 灵魂具有的不死特质，在律法之下会是如何运作，

msg: I can understand their yearnings, what they become drawn to...
msg_zh: 而他们渴望着什么，以及会被什么吸引。

msg: Master Hewg said it himself, actually, that I'm no mere prentice any longer.
msg_zh: ……修古先生说了，我已经不算实习生了。
呵呵。

msg: Once again, I'm pleased to make your acquaintance. Roderika the certified spirit tuner.
msg_zh: 那么，调灵师罗德莉卡，再请你多多关照了。

msg: I'd like to ask you a small favour.
msg_zh: ……我可以拜托你一件事吗？

msg: Can you take this little one along with you?
msg_zh: 我想请你带着这孩子一起旅行。

msg: Can you take these little ones along with you?
msg_zh: 我想请你带着这些孩子一起旅行。

msg: They can't be summoned here.
msg_zh: 毕竟在这个地方也不能召唤出来，

msg: But the spirits look rather fondly upon you.
msg_zh: 而且灵魂好像很喜欢你，

msg: It'll be glad of your company, I think, the little'un.
msg_zh: 我想这孩子也会很开心。

msg: They'd be glad of your company, I think, the little'uns.
msg_zh: 我想这些孩子也会很开心。

msg: I need to warn you about something.
msg_zh: ……有件事情，我想和你说一声。

msg: A little while ago someone started lurking in the wing on the opposite side of the roundtable.
msg_zh: 在不久以前，隔着圆桌的另一侧，\n更往里面走的地方，好像有人来了。

msg: And I can hear, from all the way over there...
msg_zh: ……即使隔了这么远的距离，我还是能听到──

msg: The howling and wailing of spirits in fear of a curse. I can even hear the repulsive, twisted malison itself...
msg_zh: 灵魂发出的悲叹、哭喊，害怕诅咒的声音，\n也能感觉到恐怖、疯狂的诅咒。

msg: A plethora of spirits in an unceasing cacophony...
msg_zh: 那群灵魂为数众多，声音也不曾停息。

msg: I can't even imagine. How much suffering, inflicted to who knows how many souls...
msg_zh: 我实在无法想象──会有这种情况，\n到底是什么样的人，做了什么样的事情？

msg: Not even the grafting caused anything like this to happen...
msg_zh: ……即使做出“接肢”恶行，也不会如此。

msg: You should keep your distance.
msg_zh: ……我认为不该靠近那里。

msg: I know you're strong, but please...
msg_zh: 就算你很强大，也不该贸然接近。

msg: I can hear it from across the wing, past the roundtable...
msg_zh: ……我听到声音，从圆桌的另一侧\n更往里面走的地方传来。

msg: The howling and wailing of spirits in fear of the curse. I can even hear the repulsive, twisted malison itself...
msg_zh: 灵魂发出的悲叹、哭喊，害怕诅咒的声音，\n也能感觉到恐怖、疯狂的诅咒。

msg: You should keep your distance.
msg_zh: ……我认为不该靠近那里。

msg: I know you're strong, but please...
msg_zh: 就算你很强大，也不该贸然接近。

msg: I can't hear them any more; the voices of the spirits cowering from the curse...
msg_zh: 之前和你提过的，灵魂害怕诅咒发出的声音，\n现在已经听不见了。

msg: I suppose the Dung Eater must have left the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 食粪者先生已经离开圆桌厅堂了吗？

msg: I just pray nothing ill comes of this.
msg_zh: 希望不会再有坏事发生……

msg: Be on your guard, I beg you.
msg_zh: ……请多加小心。

msg: He's back. The Dung Eater. Again.
msg_zh: 那位食粪者先生，好像又回来了。

msg: I can hear them; the spirits as they howl and lament in fear of the curse.
msg_zh: 我能听见，灵魂发出的悲叹、哭喊，害怕诅咒的声音。

msg: And worse than ever, the reverberations of the twisted malison itself.
msg_zh: 还能感觉到那恐怖、疯狂的诅咒，又增强了几分。

msg: But after all this time, I've started to grasp it now.
msg_zh: ……只是听着听着，我也感觉到了──

msg: I can hear, in the malison, another fearsome Order.
msg_zh: 那诅咒是一种无法撼动的律法。

msg: The voices of the tormented spirits are silent again...
msg_zh: ……现在又听不见灵魂害怕诅咒的声音了。

msg: But it isn't like last time.
msg_zh: 但是这一次和上一次的情况不同，

msg: I'm almost certain...the spirits have escaped their confinement.
msg_zh: 我觉得灵魂一定是摆脱禁锢，逃出来了。

msg: Did you...have anything to do with it, I wonder?
msg_zh: 是不是你从中助了一臂之力呢？

msg: Take a look around. The Roundtable Hold is burned. Razed to the ground.
msg_zh: ……请看，祝融肆虐，圆桌厅堂就快烧毁。

msg: The Two Fingers went mad, and the Tarnished have all left.
msg_zh: 双指陷入疯狂，褪色者的大家都已经离开，

msg: Myself and Master Hewg are the only ones who remain.
msg_zh: 只剩我和修古先生留下来。

msg: Don't worry, I don't blame you.
msg_zh: ……我没有指责你的意思。

msg: I'll continue spirit tuning just the same as before.
msg_zh: 调灵的工作，我也会继续做──

msg: Which is why I need your help persuading Master Hewg to leave.
msg_zh: 但是可以拜托你，劝劝修古先生吗？

msg: His roots are so knotted in this place.
msg_zh: 他与圆桌厅堂之间的缘分太深，

msg: He won't last much longer if he stays here...
msg_zh: 再继续留在这里，\n会跟着圆桌厅堂一起陪葬的。

msg: His shackles are broken. He's a free man, now.
msg_zh: ……修古先生的俘虏枷锁已经损毁，\n他早已获得自由。

msg: It's high time he put the Roundtable behind him.
msg_zh: 我希望他离开圆桌厅堂。

msg: I see. You're here for some spirit tuning?
msg_zh: 我知道了，想要委托调灵，是吗？

msg: Oh, is that right...
msg_zh: ……这样啊。

msg: So Master Hewg won't listen to you, either.
msg_zh: 即使由你开口，修古先生还是这么坚持。

msg: You have my thanks, regardless.
msg_zh: 谢谢你。

msg: I'll try and talk him round next time.
msg_zh: 我再去说服他看看。

msg: I know he was given this great entreaty;
msg_zh: ……关于弒神武器，

msg: To craft a weapon which could slay a god. Though I can't help but think of it as a curse.
msg_zh: 修古先生一直挂念着那件事，\n我觉得那就像是个诅咒──

msg: A fearsome curse, put on him by Queen Marika.
msg_zh: 玛莉卡女王施加的恐怖诅咒。

msg: And if that's the case, I'm not sure there's anything we can do...
msg_zh: 真是如此，我们有任何对抗的手段吗？

msg: Ah. So it wasn't just me this happened to...
msg_zh: ……唉，果然不只有我。

msg: To think he'd forget who you were, as well.
msg_zh: 修古先生连你都忘了，

msg: I knew he'd burn himself out, old Hewg.
msg_zh: 真的已经回天乏术了……

msg: I think we could talk him into leaving the Roundtable Hold, now.
msg_zh: 现在就有可能说服他离开圆桌厅堂……

msg: But maybe it's better that we don't.
msg_zh: 但我决定放弃了。

msg: It's only proper that we respect his choice to stay.
msg_zh: 因为不离开，是出自修古先生的选择。

msg: I'll remain with Hewg.
msg_zh: ……我要陪修古先生一起留下来。

msg: He made me who I am today.
msg_zh: 修古先生让我的生命有了意义，

msg: I'd like to return the kindness, in whatever small way I can.
msg_zh: 所以轮到我回报他了。\n即使力量绵薄，我也想要帮助他。

msg: Please, become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 请你一定要当上艾尔登之王。

msg: Hewg was always saying that you were a Lord, to him.
msg_zh: 修古先生总是挂在嘴上，说你才是他的王。

msg: So slay her, with the weapons he smithed.
msg_zh: 还有，请你用修古先生锻造的武器杀害神祇吧。

msg: Slay the god, Marika, who cursed us all.
msg_zh: 杀害那诅咒我们的玛莉卡女王。

msg: You're...giving it to me?
msg_zh: ……这要送给我吗？

msg: I've never had alcohol before...
msg_zh: 我不曾喝过酒……

msg: I'm no longer a child. It's about time I took this step.
msg_zh: 但我已经不是小孩子了，会挑战喝喝看。

msg: <sleeping>
You're willing to make me a chrysalid?
msg_zh: 你想把我变成虫蛹吗？

msg: Ah, but I'm still a milksop craven...
msg_zh: 唉，但我太过胆小、懦弱，

msg: I can't even govern myself to step beyond the bounds of this ward...
msg_zh: 没有勇气踏出这层防护障壁。

msg: Please. You're only wasting your strength.
msg_zh: 所以，请你放弃吧。

msg: I know how you must feel.
msg_zh: 我了解你的想法，

msg: But please, I'm not ready.
msg_zh: 但现在请你先放弃吧。

msg: Or are you like me? You're so far out of your mind with fear...
msg_zh: 难道说，你的心里很害怕吗？

msg: You've divested yourself of all reason?
msg_zh: 所以才会表现得如此疯狂？

msg: Please, stop.
msg_zh: 拜托你了，请你放弃吧。

msg: Even if you persist, your fear will not abate.
msg_zh: 这么做也不会冲淡你的恐惧。

msg: Hello? Is anybody there?
msg_zh: ……来人啊！有没有人在？

msg: Someone who might be interested in rescuing the great Kenneth Haight?
msg_zh: 任何能帮助我──肯尼斯·海德的人啊！

msg: Servant to the true Order, and celebrated repudiator of the false!
msg_zh: 志愿屏除不合理，维护正当秩序的人啊！

msg: O Erdtree! Grant me succour!
msg_zh: 啊，黄金树啊！请带来您的侍者吧！

msg: What are you waiting for? A kiss goodbye?
msg_zh: ……你还在这里做什么？

msg: My fort lies to the south, beyond the Mistwood. Take it back for me.
msg_zh: 快点往南走，穿过雾林，夺回我的要塞。

msg: Oh I see. You wish to know the reward?
msg_zh: ……啊，原来如此。你想问报酬吧？

msg: Fret not, the great Kenneth Haight is known for his considerable largesse.
msg_zh: 别小看我肯尼斯·海德，打赏我绝不吝啬。

msg: The celebrations will be lavish indeed, upon the dawn of my fort's retrieval.
msg_zh: 只要确实夺回要塞，肯定大大有赏。

msg: Hmph, yes, now allow me to furnish you with a little advice.
msg_zh: 啊，对，给你一个建议。
