msg: I would take great care to avoid Godrick's Tarnished hunts, were I in your shoes.
msg_zh: 最好小心葛瑞克的褪色者猎人。

msg: That depraved lot are obsessed with sacrificing Tarnished like you for the sake of \"grafting\".
msg_zh: 那群家伙一心想抓到你们褪色者，\n当作恐怖“接肢”的祭品。

msg: Honestly, Godrick's nothing more than a jumped up country bumpkin. Lord? Don't make me laugh.
msg_zh: ……只是凭葛瑞克那种格局，\n根本不配挤身君王之流。

msg: First he hid himself amongst the womenfolk to flee the capital, then hid from Radahn in that castle...
msg_zh: 战败之后混在女人堆里逃出王城，\n忌惮拉塔恩，躲在城里一个气也不敢吭。

msg: Then he insulted Malenia, lost to her in battle, only to lick her boots rather than die like a man.
msg_zh: 小看玛莲妮亚，结果输得落花流水，\n还跪地亲吻她的脚表示服从。

msg: Has he no shame, the big girl's blouse?
msg_zh: 实在是软弱无比，不知羞耻的男人。

msg: And to think, he's the blood of Godfrey! Last of the golden lineage, though you almost wouldn't know it to look at him.
msg_zh: 即便出身名门黄金一族，\n也看得出来葛孚雷的血统淡了许多。

msg: I almost feel sorry for the chap the more I think of it.
msg_zh: 仔细一想，还真是可悲。

msg: What are you waiting for? A kiss goodbye?
msg_zh: ……你还在这里做什么？

msg: My fort lies to the south, beyond the Mistwood. Take it back for me.
msg_zh: 快点往南走，穿过雾林，夺回我的要塞。

msg: Ah, you've come to lend me your aid, have you?
msg_zh: ……哦哦，出现了啊。

msg: Well, that's very kind, but, um...
msg_zh: 但是，嗯……

msg: No, no. Th-the help is very much appreciated. Even from a Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……不，即便是褪色者，也值得欢迎。

msg: Despite appearances, nobility is no prerequisite to serving the true Order.
msg_zh: “不限身分尊贵与否，皆能维护正当秩序。”

msg: You might have heard of me. Kenneth Haight. Next in line as the rightful ruler of Limgrave.
msg_zh: 我名为肯尼斯·海德，\n是宁姆格福领主的嫡长子。

msg: Young Tarnished, I would have a boon of you.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，我有事要你帮忙。

msg: I want you to take back my fort. It lies to the south, beyond the Mistwood.
msg_zh: 从这里往南走，穿过雾林有一座要塞──\n那是我的要塞，希望你帮忙夺回来。

msg: A Knight commander from Stormveil took it. A fool, and plumb mad to boot. Simply obsessed with blood!
msg_zh: 都怪史东薇尔派来的骑士长\n实在过于驽钝，竟然会为血痴狂。

msg: Hm? What's this, kind sir?
msg_zh: ……嗯？你想说什么？

msg: Hm? What's this, fair lady?
msg_zh: ……嗯？你想说什么？

msg: Remarkable! The Knight Commander, dead. Already!
msg_zh: 什么！骑士长已经死了吗！

msg: A blessing, if ever I chanced upon one.
msg_zh: 哈哈！实在天助我也。

msg: Fine work, I say, fine work, indeed.
msg_zh: 做得好，做得非常好。

msg: I doubt that it was your intention, but the deed is done, and I commend you.
msg_zh: 虽然你意不在领赏，但实在值得嘉许。

msg: Now, this is your reward.
msg_zh: ……来，这是给你的奖赏。

msg: Go on, it is yours, for the keeping.
msg_zh: 尽管大方收下吧。

msg: Ah-ha! I've been waiting for you with baited breath!
msg_zh: 哦哦，是你啊，我等好久了！

msg: Did you manage to recapture my fort?
msg_zh: 你成功夺回我的要塞了？

msg: Oh excellent news, just wonderful. And the knight's dead to boot!
msg_zh: 成功了吗！骑士长死了啊！

msg: Well done my friend, well done indeed!
msg_zh: 做得好，做得非常好。

msg: I knew I was right to trust you!
msg_zh: 我的眼光果然够精准。

msg: Now, here's your reward, as promised.
msg_zh: ……好，这是说好的报酬。

msg: Go ahead, it's all yours.
msg_zh: 大方收下吧。

msg: Right then. Time for me to head to the fort.
msg_zh: 我要准备回去要塞了。

msg: I've much to do. First I'll have to reestablish communication with the demi-humans.
msg_zh: 该做的事情堆积如山。\n首先，必须重启与亚人之间的交流。

msg: What's that look? You don't believe me?
msg_zh: ……瞧你一脸狐疑。

msg: Well, under the Erdtree, commingling with the demi-humans is made possible.
msg_zh: 只要身在黄金树之下，\n即便是亚人也会是芳邻。

msg: Even the vulgar shall not be left behind, under the rule of true Order.
msg_zh: “那些卑贱的，正当秩序不会屏除在外。”

msg: Which is why I, Kenneth Haight, next in line as the rightful ruler of Limgrave, have sworn to uphold it.
msg_zh: 这也是宁姆格福的正统政权后代──\n我肯尼斯·海德应尽的使命。

msg: Just you watch, my friend. Just you watch.
msg_zh: 你就好好见证一切吧。

msg: Ah, yes. I've been meaning to ask.
msg_zh: 啊，是你啊。我看时机也成熟了……

msg: Would you like to enter my service?
msg_zh: 有没有意思在我底下工作？

msg: I see bright things in your future, stout warrior.
msg_zh: 我很看好你的能力。

msg: Enter into my service and learn the workings of the Erdtree's true Order.
msg_zh: 在我这里工作，学习何谓黄金树之下的正当秩序，

msg: And who knows, perhaps some time down the line, the grace of gold will return to those Tarnished eyes of yours.
msg_zh: 说不定有一天，赐福也会重回你那对褪色的双眼。

msg: What say you? A fine accord, is it not?
msg_zh: 你怎么想？在我看来，是个不错的提案。

msg: Very well. Very well, indeed.
msg_zh: 哦，明智的判断。

msg: I knew I saw something in you.
msg_zh: 你果然前途无量。

msg: I shall await you at my fort.
msg_zh: 我在要塞等你，

msg: We shall hold the ceremony for your knighting there, I think.
msg_zh: 届时封你为骑士。

msg: I see great things ahead of us. We are truly by the Erdtree blessed.
msg_zh: ……多么美好的未来。\n名副其实“黄金树赐福我等”啊。

msg: Excuse me?
msg_zh: 什么！

msg: Such foolishness have I never seen!
msg_zh: 你是认真的吗？真是不智。

msg: Well...not that I can't sympathise with your choice.
msg_zh: ……不过，我也能理解，

msg: Such a miraculous manifestation of felicity is like to startle one such as yourself.
msg_zh: 毕竟幸运从天而降，遇见了当然会踌躇。

msg: Should you change your mind, do visit me at my fort.
msg_zh: 如果你改变心意，随时造访我的要塞。

msg: What is it? Have you put your misgivings to rest?
msg_zh: 怎么样？心里的踌躇已经化解了吗？

msg: Well...not that I can't sympathise with your choice.
msg_zh: ……是吗？我能理解。

msg: Such a miraculous manifestation of felicity is like to startle one such as yourself.
msg_zh: 这对你来说真的是天大的幸运。

msg: Oh don't fret, there's no hurry.
msg_zh: 没关系，不急一时。

msg: Should you change your mind, do visit me at my fort.
msg_zh: 如果你改变心意，随时造访我的要塞。

msg: Why...
msg_zh: ……唔，为什么……

msg: Why the queen... Now all hope is...
msg_zh: 为什么对女王……为时、已晚……

msg: (dies)
msg_zh: （死亡）

msg: Ah, you, is it?
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊。

msg: I suppose you must have seen it by now, yes, the sorry state of my fort?
msg_zh: 要塞的现况，你也看到了。

msg: Oh, indeed, it is a foul fate for a land, to be without a ruler.
msg_zh: ……没有王的土地，实在惨不忍睹。

msg: One must be found, with haste. And not that awful Godrick.
msg_zh: 我必须找到王，但绝非葛瑞克之流，

msg: But a true and stalwart Lord of the proper lineage to take the reigns of Limgrave.
msg_zh: 是能将宁姆格福的正统政权托付于他，\n走在正道上的强大王者。

msg: I am sorry to have lifted your hopes...
msg_zh: ……抱歉在你满心期待的时候泼冷水。

msg: But I haven't the authority to raise you to knighthood as things stand.
msg_zh: 现况如此，我没有资格封你为骑士。

msg: The great Kenneth Haight issues his sincerest apology.
msg_zh: 我肯尼斯·海德，由衷地向你致歉。

msg: But now, I must begin my search post-haste.
msg_zh: ……我必须动身寻找──

msg: For a true and stalwart Lord of the proper lineage to take the reigns of Limgrave.
msg_zh: 能将宁姆格福的正统政权托付于他，\n走在正道上的强大王者。

msg: I must begin my search post-haste.
msg_zh: ……我必须动身寻找──

msg: For a true and stalwart Lord of the proper lineage to take the reigns of Limgrave.
msg_zh: 能将宁姆格福的正统政权托付于他，\n走在正道上的强大王者。

msg: Ah, nice to see you after so long.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊。好久不见。

msg: Safe and sound, I take it, yes? Good.
msg_zh: 别来无恙？

msg: Ah, quite. I have indeed selected a new ruler.
msg_zh: ……没错，我找到王了──

msg: Lady Nepheli is strong and just. Worthy of the burden of Limgrave's lineage.
msg_zh: 涅斐丽王。她目视正道、强大，\n值得我将宁姆格福的正统政权托付于她。

msg: Such is the sincere opinion of I, Kenneth Haight, no less.
msg_zh: 我肯尼斯·海德有十二万分的肯定。

msg: For the time being, I share command of the castle with my Lady, but I plan on returning to my fort afterwards.
msg_zh: 我将从旁协助涅斐丽王治理这座城，\n随后回到我的要塞。

msg: At which time I can fulfil my old promise.
msg_zh: ……届时，我会实现先前的承诺──

msg: By raising you to the glory of knighthood.
msg_zh: 封你为骑士。

msg: I hope it is just as wonderful as you imagine.
msg_zh: 好好期待吧。

msg: For the time being, I share command of the castle with my Lady, but I plan on returning to my fort afterwards.
msg_zh: 我将从旁协助涅斐丽王治理这座城，\n随后回到我的要塞。

msg: At which time I can fulfil my old promise.
msg_zh: ……届时，我会实现先前的承诺──

msg: By raising you to the glory of knighthood.
msg_zh: 封你为骑士。

msg: I hope it is just as wonderful as you imagine.
msg_zh: 好好期待吧。

msg: Oof!
msg_zh: 哇啊。

msg: Goodness gracious!
msg_zh: 你做什么！

msg: Calm yourself, this instant!
msg_zh: 冷静下来！

msg: Enough! This is madness!
msg_zh: 快住手！少做蠢事！

msg: Blast! You wretched Tarnished!
msg_zh: 可恶！就凭你这种褪色者！

msg: I am Kenneth Haight, and I have seen quite enough!
msg_zh: 不准小看我肯尼斯·海德！

msg: The madness leaves nothing untouched.
msg_zh: ……所有人都渐渐疯狂，

msg: I fear for the integrity of the Order...
msg_zh: 秩序已经破坏到这种程度了吗……？

msg: Where are my...men...?
msg_zh: ……啊，都没有人在吗？

msg: O Erdtree, why have you forsaken me...?
msg_zh: 黄金树啊，为何弃我于不顾……

msg: Greetings, great champion called by grace.
msg_zh: 受赐福指引而来的英雄啊，\n初次见面，幸会。

msg: I am Fia.
msg_zh: 我名为菲雅，

msg: Circumstances have compelled my stay at the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 因故栖身在圆桌厅堂。

msg: Great champion, would you allow me to hold you, but briefly?
msg_zh: 英雄啊，片刻就好，能否让我抱紧你呢？

msg: Perhaps you might share with me some of your lifely vigour, and your stout-heartedness.
msg_zh: 希望你能分给我生存的力量与意志力。

msg: Doing so will grant me the warmth of a champion.
msg_zh: 在抱紧英雄之余，我能感受到你的温暖，

msg: And you, I am sure, will bear a baldachin's blessing.
msg_zh: 也能带给你床帘恩泽。

msg: Do you think it vulgar, perhaps?
msg_zh: ……你会不齿这种行为吗？

msg: Where I come from, it is a sacred act.
msg_zh: 但是在我的故乡，这是具有神圣意义的做法。

msg: Ah, my thanks, great champion.
msg_zh: ……英雄啊，感谢你。

msg: You are...very warm...
msg_zh: ……你好温暖啊……

msg: What you felt light up inside you was a baldachin's blessing.
msg_zh: 现在在你体内深处点亮的，是床帘恩泽。

msg: Though it is but a fleeting thing, I am afraid.
msg_zh: 但那非常短暂易逝……

msg: Come back to me, should you require another.
msg_zh: 在你需要恩泽的时候，请来找我。

msg: I will take you in my arms as often as you need.
msg_zh: 不论几次，我都会再抱紧你。

msg: I understand.
msg_zh: ……我明白了。

msg: Your disdain is only natural.
msg_zh: 会感到不齿，我也能理解。

msg: But should you change your mind...
msg_zh: 但如果你改变了心意……

msg: Come pay me another visit.
msg_zh: 请再过来这个房间。

msg: Oh, my dear...
msg_zh: ……哎呀，是你……

msg: Had a change of heart already?
msg_zh: 难道你改变心意了？

msg: I am pleased to see you again.
msg_zh: 欢迎你来找我。

msg: Would you like me to hold you, once more?
msg_zh: 需要我再抱紧你吗？

msg: The blessing is still aflame in your breast, dear.
msg_zh: 但是你的恩泽还没有熄灭……

msg: Would you like to be held, regardless?
msg_zh: 这样还要继续吗？

msg: Now, come closer...
msg_zh: ……来，过来吧……

msg: You are so...very warm...
msg_zh: ……你真的好温暖唷……

msg: Then good day to you, my dear.
msg_zh: ……请多保重。

msg: I was known as a Deathbed Companion, where I come from.
msg_zh: ……我在故乡的时候，被称呼为“死眠少女”。

msg: After I received the warmth and lifely vigour from a number of champions,
msg_zh: 在我得到无数英雄的温暖，以及生存的力量之后，

msg: I lay with the remains of an exalted noble, to grant him another chance at life.
msg_zh: 再与伟人的尸体同床，\n就能让尊贵的生命重回于他──

msg: To do so is the purpose of my being.
msg_zh: 我是为了这个目的而在。

msg: But before I could bear the noble into new life,
msg_zh: ……但是在让伟人重新获得生命之前，

msg: I was awakened by the guidance of grace, and chased from my birthplace.
msg_zh: 我却因为赐福而觉醒……被赶出故乡。

msg: Pray, be kind.
msg_zh: 你应该也察觉到了──

msg: Despite all that, I still wish to be a Deathbed Companion.
msg_zh: 即使如此，我还是想当个死眠少女。

msg: So please, let me hold you like this, as often as it takes.
msg_zh: 所以不论几次都好，请让我像这样抱紧你吧。

msg: My dear...
msg_zh: ……我问你唷。

msg: Might I ask something of you?
msg_zh: 你愿意听听我的请求吗？

msg: Could you please find the owner of this dagger, and return it to them?
msg_zh: 我想请你找出这把短剑的主人，再把短剑还给对方。

msg: A certain person gave it to me, as a gift.
msg_zh: 那是某位大人送给我的礼物，

msg: It's a very precious thing. It must have a special place in the owner's heart.
msg_zh: 但那非常地贵重……\n而且好像是具有纪念价值的物品。

msg: So I would like for the original owner to have it back, if you wouldn't mind.
msg_zh: 所以我希望能将它物归原主。

msg: I'd like you to find the owner of the dagger I gave you, and return it to them.
msg_zh: 那把交给你的短剑，\n可以帮我找出它的主人，物归原主吗？

msg: It's a very precious thing. It must have a special place in the owner's heart.
msg_zh: 那非常地贵重……\n而且好像是具有纪念价值的物品。

msg: My dear...
msg_zh: ……我问你唷。

msg: Have you ever heard of black knifeprints?
msg_zh: 你知道什么是黑刀烙印吗？

msg: Dear Rogier likes to talk of them when abed.
msg_zh: ……罗杰尔先生对我说了枕边故事：

msg: And the ancient plot, in which the first of the Demigods was slain.
msg_zh: 在半神首次出现死者的遥远阴谋之夜，

msg: The black knives wielded by the assassins who committed the act,
msg_zh: 那些动手暗杀的刺客持有的黑刀，

msg: along with the impressions they made, somehow hide the truth of the conspiracy.
msg_zh: 上头肯定藏有烙印，还有阴谋背后的真相。

msg: These grand affairs are hardly my forté...
msg_zh: ……太过复杂的事情，我也是听得一知半解，

msg: But dear Rogier began to weep as he spoke...
msg_zh: 但罗杰尔先生那时说着说着，就哭出来了。

msg: Dear Rogier likes to talk of it when abed.
msg_zh: ……罗杰尔先生对我说了枕边故事：

msg: The ancient plot, in which the first of the Demigods was slain.
msg_zh: 在半神首次出现死者的遥远阴谋之夜，

msg: The black knives wielded by the assassins who committed the act,
msg_zh: 那些动手暗杀的刺客持有的黑刀，

msg: along with the impressions they made, somehow hide the truth of the conspiracy.
msg_zh: 上头肯定藏有烙印，还有阴谋背后的真相。

msg: I heard that you lent a hand to dear Rogier.
msg_zh: ……你帮了罗杰尔先生，对不对？

msg: He seemed positively elated.
msg_zh: 他高兴得不得了呢。

msg: He must be possessed of great mental fortitude.
msg_zh: 罗杰尔先生的心中，肯定有坚强的意志。

msg: It anchors his will, and sustains him, despite his grievous wounds.
msg_zh: 所以即使身体伤痕累累，\n还是有办法贯彻自己的信念。

msg: You truly are a champion.
msg_zh: 你果然是英雄。

msg: To dear Rogier, and myself, too.
msg_zh: 尤其对罗杰尔先生，还有对我而言……

msg: In truth I've heard tell from someone else,
msg_zh: ……但其实，罗杰尔先生说的黑刀烙印，

msg: about the black knifeprints that fascinate dear Rogier so.
msg_zh: 我曾经听某位大人说过。

msg: But It wouldn't be right to give this to him, stuck as he is in the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: ……罗杰尔先生没有办法离开圆桌厅堂，\n所以这张纸条不能交给他。

msg: Perhaps you could make use of it?
msg_zh: 我想把它交给你，你能好好利用它吗？

msg: Finally, it is returned to its rightful place.
msg_zh: ……总算物归原主了。

msg: The stolen hallowbrand, of the exalted noble.
msg_zh: 那位伟人被夺走的圣痕，总算回来了。

msg: And now, I must bid you goodbye as well.
msg_zh: ……该和你道别了。

msg: Though I ask you deliver this message to the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 最后，请替我转达给圆桌厅堂的所有人：

msg: I am Fia, Deathbed Companion.
msg_zh: 我名为菲雅，是“死眠少女”。

msg: Hark, Roundtable. Disturb not the Death of Godwyn, the exalted.
msg_zh: 圆桌厅堂啊，请勿干扰伟人葛德文的死亡。

msg: We, who humbly live in Death...
msg_zh: 我们仅仅因为死亡而诞生──

msg: Live in waiting, to one day welcome our Lord.
msg_zh: 总有一天，我们会得到王。

msg: What right does anyone have to object?
msg_zh: 人民、弱者拥戴自己的王，

msg: Our Lord will rise. The Lord of the many, and the meek.
msg_zh: 会有谁出声指责？

msg: Ah...there you are.
msg_zh: ……你果然来了呢。

msg: I knew you would come.
msg_zh: 我有料想到。

msg: What is it you intend?
msg_zh: 那么，你想怎么做呢？

msg: To deny us, and our ways?
msg_zh: 要像那群粗鲁的黄金律法基本主义者，

msg: Like the dogmatic brutes of the Golden Order?
msg_zh: 否定我们的一切吗？

msg: I see. Then you must kill me.
msg_zh: ……我明白了，那么，请你动手。

msg: For I am the companion of Godwyn, Prince of Death.
msg_zh: 我是葛德文──死王子的同床者。

msg: I wished to be a mother to Those Who Live in Death.
msg_zh: 自认为是众多死诞者的母亲。

msg: So it is, that any loathing, any hatred that overshadows them...
msg_zh: 你对他们的憎恨，

msg: I must bear, as a matter of duty, with my own flesh.
msg_zh: 应该由我全盘承受。

msg: Go on, kill me.
msg_zh: 快，请你动手。

msg: You deny us, do you not?
msg_zh: 你不是否定我们吗？

msg: Because we deign to live in Death, and wish our Lord to rise to glory.
msg_zh: 即使我们不过是因为死亡而诞生，\n想要拥戴属于自己的王。

msg: You are an odd one.
msg_zh: ……你还真是奇特。

msg: I am the guardian of Those Who Live in Death.
msg_zh: 我是保护死诞者的人，

msg: They call me a foul and rotten witch.
msg_zh: 甚至被咒骂成骯脏的魔女呢。

msg: Yet you still wish to be held by me?
msg_zh: 你是知情之后，还这么要求吗？

msg: I will soon lay with Godwyn.
msg_zh: ……我就快和葛德文同床了。

msg: And it will surely stir within me.
msg_zh: 一切肯定都会开花结果──

msg: the new life of the golden prince, and first Dead of the demigods,
msg_zh: 黄金王子、半神的初始死者，他将重新获得生命。

msg: as the rune of Those Who Live in Death.
msg_zh: 那为了死诞者而生的卢恩，也要孕育而出。

msg: Please, do one thing for me.
msg_zh: 我想要拜托你。

msg: Brandish this child, my rune, and take for yourself the throne.
msg_zh: 能不能展现我的孩子，\n也就是那卢恩，当上王呢？

msg: Stay the persecution of Those Who Live in Death.
msg_zh: 成为允许死诞者存在的，

msg: By becoming our Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 属于我们的艾尔登之王。

msg: I will soon lay with Godwyn.
msg_zh: ……我就快和葛德文同床了。

msg: To conceive my child, the rune.
msg_zh: 而且肯定会怀上孩子，也就是卢恩。

msg: Brandish my rune, and take for yourself the throne.
msg_zh: 你能不能展现那个卢恩，当上王呢？

msg: Stay the persecution of Those Who Live in Death.
msg_zh: 成为允许死诞者存在的，

msg: By becoming our Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 属于我们的艾尔登之王。

msg: This is goodbye, my dear.
msg_zh: ……该和你道别了呢。

msg: But I am satisfied.
msg_zh: ……其实，我很心满意足。

msg: I choose to lie with Godwyn of my own will. Not the remains of one chosen for me.
msg_zh: 因为我不是被迫与某具尸体，\n而是自愿与葛德文同床……

msg: And I will bear a child.
msg_zh: 然后怀上孩子。

msg: Who will inherit your warmth, too.
msg_zh: 我想那孩子肯定会继承你的温暖。

msg: What greater blessing could there be, but to be born a Deathbed Companion?
msg_zh: 生为死眠少女，还有什么会比这样更幸福呢？

msg: Have you ever seen a hallowbrand?
msg_zh: ……你看过圣痕吗？

msg: When the first of the demigods died, his flesh was marked with the half-wheel wound of the centipede.
msg_zh: 那是在半神的初次死亡时，\n被刻下的、缺半的百足伤环。

msg: Godwyn's hallowbrand has since been recovered at the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 我在圆桌厅堂拿回了葛德文的圣痕，

msg: But there is another hallowbrand out there somewhere.
msg_zh: 但还有另外一个圣痕。

msg: And I must find it.
msg_zh: ……我必须找出另一个圣痕。

msg: Before the time comes we receive our Lord.
msg_zh: 在拥戴我们的王以前，必须要找到。

msg: When Godwyn died, a hallowbrand scored his flesh.
msg_zh: ……葛德文死亡的时候，被刻下了圣痕，

msg: But another exists. Another mark in the shape of the half-wheel wound of the centipede.
msg_zh: 但应该还有另外一个缺半的百足伤环。

msg: And I must find it.
msg_zh: ……我必须找出另一个圣痕。

msg: Before the time comes we receive our Lord.
msg_zh: 在拥戴我们的王以前，必须要找到。

msg: My hands will be dirtied once more by the deed.
msg_zh: ……我很有可能会再弄脏这双手。

msg: Will you still let me hold you, even then?
msg_zh: 即使如此，你还愿意接受我的拥抱吗？

msg: When Godwyn died, a hallowbrand scored his flesh.
msg_zh: ……葛德文死亡的时候，被刻下了圣痕，

msg: But another exists. Another mark in the shape of the half-wheel wound of the centipede.
msg_zh: 但应该还有另外一个缺半的百足伤环。

msg: And I must find it.
msg_zh: ……我必须找出另一个圣痕。

msg: Before the time comes we receive our Lord.
msg_zh: 在拥戴我们的王以前，必须要找到。

msg: This...is the other hallowbrand.
msg_zh: 这是……另一个圣痕……

msg: How did you...
msg_zh: 你为什么会……

msg: Oh, my utmost thanks.
msg_zh: ……啊，谢谢你。

msg: With this, Godwyn can take his rightful place as First of the Dead.
msg_zh: 这么一来，葛德文就能成为纯粹的初始死者，

msg: And claim a second, illustrious life.
msg_zh: 一定能让尊贵的生命重回于他。

msg: You are my-- our true champion.
msg_zh: 你是我的……不对，你是我们的英雄。

msg: And though I can't be of any use to you...
msg_zh: 我能做的事情非常有限……

msg: Can I hold you tight, if only for a moment?
msg_zh: 只有一瞬间也好，让我紧紧拥抱你吧。

msg: Godwyn...
Is that you, dear?
msg_zh: 葛德文，是你吗……？

msg: Will your kind never stop?
msg_zh: ……这就是你们的一贯作风吧……？

msg: Ravaging...the weak?
msg_zh: ……欺凌，弱者……

msg: Have you ever felt the curse, with your whole being?
msg_zh: ……你曾经感应过诅咒吗──

msg: The pox upon life itself, feared and despised by all. The reviled blessing.
msg_zh: 那受人恐惧、嫌恶的生命宿疾，那丑陋的赐福？

msg: Apparently not.
msg_zh: ……在我看来，你不曾吧。

msg: You are but a lamb. A stranger to defilement. Ignorant of your own ignorance.
msg_zh: 你还是稚子──\n不知污秽，也浑然不觉自身的无知。

msg: You no longer interest me.
msg_zh: 和你，我没有话好谈。

msg: I've been long without peace. Don't spoil my quietude.
msg_zh: 难得这么宁静……不要打扰我。

msg: I asked you not to disturb me.
msg_zh: ……我都说了，不要打扰我。

msg: Be thankful of the Hold's serenity.
msg_zh: 你要感谢圆桌厅堂不得械斗的规矩，

msg: It is all that keeps your death and defilement at bay.
msg_zh: 因此你才留住一命，得以不受玷污。

msg: No, wait.
msg_zh: ……慢着，等一下。

msg: You have felt the curse.
msg_zh: 你感应得到诅咒吧？

msg: I can smell it on you. The pox, yet tender.
msg_zh: 那湿润的宿疾气味，扑鼻而来啊。

msg: Apparently my seedbed is ripe and waiting.
msg_zh: ……看来，我的温床已经熟成了，

msg: Twas a brief respite, I must say.
msg_zh: 这份宁静真短暂。

msg: Go, and unshackle my corporeal flesh.
msg_zh: ……你来释放我的身体吧。

msg: Trapped in the sewer gaol, below the capital.
msg_zh: 我的身体被关在王城地底的下水道监牢。

msg: I can kill you, and defile your corpse.
msg_zh: 到时候，我会杀了你、玷污你，

msg: Then the pox will truly be your own.
msg_zh: 让那宿疾完全转化，变成属于你的东西。

msg: Go, and unshackle my corporeal flesh.
msg_zh: ……你来释放我的身体吧。

msg: Trapped in the sewer gaol, below the capital.
msg_zh: 我的身体被关在王城地底的下水道监牢。

msg: I can kill you, and defile your corpse.
msg_zh: 到时候，我会杀了你、玷污你，

msg: Then the pox will truly be your own.
msg_zh: 让那宿疾完全转化，变成属于你的东西。

msg: Let me out! Let me out of here!
msg_zh: 让我出去！让我从这里出去！

msg: Must eat more! Defile more!
msg_zh: 让我吃！让我玷污！

msg: Everything that matters to you!
msg_zh: 吃尽你们的一切！

msg: For generations to come!
msg_zh: 玷污你们的未来！

msg: I am the Dung Eater!
msg_zh: 我是“食粪者”！

msg: A scourge upon the living!
msg_zh: 你们所有人的诅咒！

msg: Who are you?
msg_zh: ……你是谁？

msg: I've been here long enough.
msg_zh: ……我要出去，从这里出去。

msg: I will kill again. And defile each corpse with care.
msg_zh: ……我要杀，还要仔仔细细玷污，

msg: Just to be sure. That when they're reborn…
msg_zh: 让所有人都变成在诅咒下诞生，

msg: They'll be cursed. Along with their children, and their children's children, for all time to come…
msg_zh: 让子孙，后代的诅咒源源不绝。

msg: I will kill again. And defile each corpse with care.
msg_zh: ……我要杀，还要仔仔细细玷污，

msg: Just to be sure. That when they're reborn…
msg_zh: 让所有人都变成在诅咒下诞生，

msg: They'll be cursed. Along with their children, and their children's children, for all time to come…
msg_zh: 让子孙，后代的诅咒源源不绝。

msg: I am the Dung Eater.
msg_zh: 我是“食粪者”，

msg: A scourge upon the living.
msg_zh: 你们所有人的诅咒。

msg: I must eat more. Defile more...
msg_zh: 让我吃，让我玷污……

msg: Let me out. Let me out of here.
msg_zh: ……我要出去，让我出去。

msg: I will kill you, and defile your corpse.
msg_zh: ……我要杀了你、玷污你，

msg: Then the pox will truly be your own.
msg_zh: 让那宿疾完全转化，变成属于你的东西。

msg: I'll give you a good blessing.
msg_zh: ……赐福降临了──

msg: You'll be nourishment for the pox.
msg_zh: 变成宿疾的温床吧。

msg: There you are.
msg_zh: ……我等你很久了。

msg: You warded off my blessing.
msg_zh: ……你拒绝了赐福。

msg: Despite the curse stirring within you.
msg_zh: 你明明感应得到诅咒，

msg: No one has succeeded in that before.
msg_zh: 那无人能敌的赐福，你却拒绝了。

msg: How? I thought. Then it hit me.
msg_zh: 为什么？\n……背后的原因，我终于想通了。

msg: That you are, in fact, me. And I...am the Dung Eater.
msg_zh: 你，就是我。而我，是“食粪者”。

msg: It is my flesh that must receive the blessing.
msg_zh: 我的身体蒙受赐福的时刻，总算来到。

msg: Give me your blessing.
msg_zh: ……对我降下赐福吧──

msg: Defile my flesh with the seedbed curse.
msg_zh: 让温床的诅咒侵蚀我的身体。

msg: Again and again. Until it is done.
msg_zh: 周而复始、巡回不断地，侵蚀我吧──

msg: Until a cursed ring coalesces, that may one day defile Order itself.
msg_zh: 玷污律法，直到诅咒法环降临于世。

msg: Countless, I have killed. And countless, I have defiled.
msg_zh: ……我杀人无数，玷污更不在话下，

msg: And soon the fruits will be borne.
msg_zh: 一切总算开花结果。

msg: Hundreds will be reborn cursed, and they'll bear thousands of cursed children, who'll bear tens of thousands more.
msg_zh: 数以百计的诅咒应运而生，数以千计的诅咒之子降世，\n再之后，数以万计，受诅咒的后代繁衍不息，

msg: A few of those will be born just like me, and they'll kill, and defile, and bless in my stead!
msg_zh: 从那之中再诞生几个我一般的存在──\n无止尽地杀害、玷污、降下赐福。

msg: The rotten fools. My fate was the grandest, most brilliant of them all!
msg_zh: ……好好看仔细了。\n我们受到的引导有多么美妙。

msg: My corporeal flesh lies in the sewer gaol beneath the Capital.
msg_zh: ……我的身体在王城地底的下水道监牢。

msg: Give it your blessing. Defile my flesh with the seedbed curse.
msg_zh: 对我降下赐福吧──让温床的诅咒侵蚀我的身体。

msg: Until a cursed ring coalesces, that may one day defile Order itself.
msg_zh: 玷污律法，直到诅咒法环降临于世。

msg: Uur...urgh...
msg_zh: ……呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: A curse... A curse upon them all.
msg_zh: 诅咒，我要诅咒……

msg: They'll be born cursed, all of them.
msg_zh: 让所有人在诅咒之下诞生……

msg: Along with their children, and their children's children, heh, for all time to come…
msg_zh: 让子孙，后代的诅咒源源不绝……

msg: Uur...urgh...
msg_zh: ……呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: Curse you, Golden Order.
msg_zh: 黄金律法啊，受诅咒吧……

msg: One day, you'll get what's coming.
msg_zh: 我一定要玷污你……

msg: Ah...argh...
No... I am... the Dung Eater...
msg_zh: 住手……我、我是……“食粪者”……

msg: I am...
msg_zh: 直到最后一刻……

msg: Bless you!
msg_zh: 蒙受赐福吧──！

msg: Oh, this is a rare occasion.
msg_zh: ……哦，有新的褪色者来到圆桌厅堂。

msg: I can't remember the last time a new Tarnished made their way to the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 上一次有新人来，是很久以前了。

msg: Very well. As your senior, I bid you welcome.
msg_zh: 很好。作为圆桌厅堂的前辈，\n欢迎后生晚辈来到这里。

msg: It is safe here. You may let down your guard.
msg_zh: 这里很安全……好好放松吧。

msg: Allow me a word of advice, as your senior.
msg_zh: ……前辈我想先给你一个建议。

msg: You are a mere visitor to the Roundtable, nothing more.
msg_zh: 现在的你只是有办法出入圆桌厅堂。

msg: A house guest, yet to earn their keep.
msg_zh: 换句话说，就只是个过客。

msg: Remember your place, newcomer.
msg_zh: 把这件事谨记在心，不要逾矩。

msg: There's nothing left to say. Be at your leisure.
msg_zh: ……我该说的都说完了。好好放松吧。

msg: What do you need? I have little time to spare.
msg_zh: ……有什么事吗？我还有事要忙……

msg: Oh, are you aggrieved? At the notion you are but a visitant here?
msg_zh: ……哦，说你是圆桌厅堂的过客，不高兴吗？

msg: Then you would do well to remember the first words of grace given to you.
msg_zh: 那你回想一下吧──\n得到赐福指引的最一开始，自己听到了什么。

msg: Stand before the Elden Ring, and become the Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 如果不想把那些话当作天方夜谭，

msg: If those words held any meaning to you...
msg_zh: 想要觐见艾尔登法环，成为艾尔登之王……

msg: Follow the guidance of grace, lay low the shardbearers, and claim for yourself a Great Rune.
msg_zh: 就遵从赐福的指引，打倒碎片君王，\n成为大卢恩的持有者吧。

msg: Do so, and the doors to the Roundtable's inner chamber will open.
msg_zh: 成功之后，圆桌厅堂最深处的房间──\n它的门也会为你敞开。

msg: And you will receive the wisdom of the Two Fingers.
msg_zh: 你就能听到双指的建言。

msg: Once the wisdom of the Two Fingers becomes your own, I'll impart to you a proper welcome.
msg_zh: 在你听过双指的建言之后，我会欣然欢迎你──

msg: As a true member of the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 成为圆桌厅堂真正的一员。

msg: I have high hopes for you.
msg_zh: ……我很期待你的表现。

msg: I'm sick and tired of them.
msg_zh: 老实说，我已经受够了那群人──

msg: These namby-pamby Tarnished think us no more than a shelter from the rain...
msg_zh: 误以为圆桌厅堂是避难所的，褪色者冒牌货。

msg: We've spoken long enough. I have matters to attend to.
msg_zh: ……该说的都说完了，我还有事要忙。

msg: If you haven't anything to say, I would prefer you didn't pester me for attention.
msg_zh: ……既然无话可说，就不要搭话。

msg: Try not to make a spectacle of yourself either. Or are you as irredeemably foolish as you appear?
msg_zh: 自己胸无点墨，用不着昭告天下。

msg: You've received the wisdom of the Two Fingers, have you not?
msg_zh: ……你听过双指的建言了。

msg: Then just as promised, I bid you welcome, as a true member of the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 那么，如同我承诺的──\n欢迎你加入，成为圆桌厅堂真正的一员。

msg: I am known as Gideon Ofnir.
msg_zh: 我是基甸·奥夫尼尔。

msg: As a Tarnished who wishes to stand before the Elden Ring and become Elden Lord,
msg_zh: 作为一名褪色者，\n为了觐见艾尔登法环，成为艾尔登之王，

msg: I am accumulating knowledge. To be all-knowing.
msg_zh: 求知若渴，渴望全知的人。

msg: You now belong to a select group of fellows. As such, I ask that you remain constant.
msg_zh: ……为数不多的同志啊，希望我们能长久合作。

msg: You'll be after more Great Runes, now eh?
msg_zh: ……你应该想得到更多大卢恩吧？

msg: Then as your fellow, allow me to divulge a little knowledge.
msg_zh: 看在彼此的同志情谊，我共享一些情报。

msg: The inheritors of the Great Runes; the shardbearers.
msg_zh: 拥有大卢恩的碎片君王──

msg: We of the Roundtable know the location of five of them, including the one you defeated.
msg_zh: 包含你打倒的在内，\n圆桌厅堂已经掌握了其中５位的所在地。

msg: Godrick the Grafted, Lord of Stormveil.
msg_zh: 史东薇尔之主，“接肢”葛瑞克。

msg: General Radahn, who fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 在盖利德原野与玛莲妮亚战成平手的拉塔恩将军。

msg: Praetor Rykard, Lord of the Volcano Manor of Mt. Gelmir.
msg_zh: 格密尔的火山官邸之主，拉卡德司法官。

msg: Morgott the Grace-Given, Veiled Monarch and Lord of Leyndell.
msg_zh: 王城罗德尔的城主，不见形影的王，“赐福”蒙葛特。

msg: And Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon, ruler of Raya Lucaria's Academy.
msg_zh: 还有魔法学院雷亚卢卡利亚，“满月女王”蕾娜菈。

msg: ...You'll still be after more Great Runes, won't you?
msg_zh: ……他们之中，你想得到谁的大卢恩？

msg: So. Godrick the Grafted, Lord of Stormveil.
msg_zh: 史东薇尔之主“接肢”葛瑞克，

msg: Despite being the blood of Godfrey, first Elden Lord, he's a grotesque old fool, grasping for power.
msg_zh: 他是“初始艾尔登之王”葛孚雷的后代，\n却是又老又丑，汲汲营营、贪得力量的异形。

msg: His castle lies upon the cliff to Limgrave's northwest.
msg_zh: 那座城就在宁姆格福地区，西北方的断崖上。

msg: ...but I suspect you know that well enough already.
msg_zh: ……这些，我想你很熟悉。

msg: General Radahn, the famed Red Lion and scourge of the stars, is a ferocious warrior.
msg_zh: “碎星红狮子”拉塔恩将军，是万夫莫敌的习武之人，

msg: He fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds to Limgrave's east.
msg_zh: 然而他在宁姆格福往东，那辽阔的盖利德原野上，\n和玛莲妮亚的腐败战成平手。

msg: And now Caelid has been engulfed by the scarlet rot, even approaching the region is no mean feat.
msg_zh: ……从那之后，盖利德就被猩红腐败吞噬，\n无法轻易靠近。

msg: I've heard survivors of Radahn's army are still in the wilds, staving off the rot with fire.
msg_zh: 我听说拉塔恩军队的残兵还留在原地，\n用火焰对付腐败。

msg: And if it's true, I suspect Radahn is still there as well, in Caelid.
msg_zh: 看样子，拉塔恩应该还在盖利德。

msg: Though I doubt he much resembles his former self anymore...
msg_zh: ……但他现在的模样，可能让人不敢领教。

msg: Praetor Rykard is the Lord of the Volcano Manor on Mt. Gelmir.
msg_zh: 拉卡德司法官是格密尔火山官邸的主人，

msg: He is a ruthless justiciar who commands a company of inquisitors, reviled for his serpentine demeanour.
msg_zh: 是个毫无怜悯心的法官，也是众多拷问官的长官。\n如蛇一般，令人感冒的男人。

msg: The volcano, Mt. Gelmir, lies in the west of the Altus Plateau; the realm of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 格密尔火山在黄金树大地，亚坛高原的西边。

msg: It was the stage of the most appalling battle in the entirety of the Shattering.
msg_zh: 那里是破碎战争中，战况最为惨烈的地方。

msg: Rykard has committed the grave sin of blasphemy. Marking himself as an enemy, never to be forgiven.
msg_zh: ……拉卡德犯下了亵渎罪，是罪无可赦的敌人。

msg: Morgott the Grace-Given is Lord of Leyndell, the capital city.
msg_zh: “赐福”蒙葛特是王城罗德尔的主人。

msg: It lies at the foot of the Erdtree, in the east of the Altus Plateau.
msg_zh: 那座城就在亚坛高原以东的黄金树树脚……

msg: But the Two Fingers forbid us from venturing there.
msg_zh: 但双指不允许我们靠近该处。

msg: Until we've acquired enough Great Runes to repair the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 直到获得多个大卢恩，\n得以修复艾尔登法环之后，才有可能靠近。

msg: Set your sights elsewhere for the time being. The Veiled Monarch can wait.
msg_zh: 因此那不见形影的王，现在不是我们的目标。

msg: The Academy of Raya Lucaria lies to Limgrave's north, towering over the mist-laden lands of Liurnia.
msg_zh: 魔法学院雷亚卢卡利亚耸立在宁姆格福以北，\n飘着浓雾的利耶尼亚地区。

msg: Rennala is the queen of the Carian royals, who govern the academy.
msg_zh: 蕾娜菈是学院的领导者──卡利亚王室的女王。

msg: But Rennala herself is no demigod.
msg_zh: ……然而蕾娜菈本身不是半神。

msg: She is merely the recipient of an amber egg, given to her by Radagon,
msg_zh: \n她手上有一颗受赠的琥珀卵──

msg: Her beloved, Radagon, left her to become Queen Marika's second husband, taking the title of King Consort.
msg_zh: 抛弃她之后，成为玛莉卡女王\n第二任丈夫的王夫拉达冈──

msg: The Great Rune dwells within the amber egg that was Radagon's gift to her.
msg_zh: 据说那男人送给她的琥珀卵里头，藏着大卢恩。

msg: There are four more demigods yet to be located.
msg_zh: 还有４位半神的所在地，\n我个人和圆桌厅堂都毫无线索。

msg: Miquella of the Haligtree, the Unalloyed.
msg_zh: 纯净无比的黄金，“圣树”米凯拉。

msg: His twin, Malenia, the undefeated swordswoman.
msg_zh: 米凯拉的孪生手足，“战无不胜之剑”玛莲妮亚。

msg: Lunar Princess Ranni, daughter to Rennala.
msg_zh: 蕾娜菈的女儿，“月之公主”菈妮。

msg: And the one only known as the Lord of Blood.
msg_zh: 还有被称为“鲜血君王”的不明人物。

msg: Ranni is said to have cast aside her Great Rune,
msg_zh: 据说菈妮抛弃了大卢恩，

msg: so here at the Hold, we seek the whereabouts of the remaining three shardbearers.
msg_zh: 所以圆桌厅堂一直在搜寻其他３位的下落。

msg: If you should learn anything of these matters,
msg_zh: 如果你告诉我相关的情报……

msg: I'll trade your findings for a hidden treasure, or a long-lost rite, known only to me.
msg_zh: 我会提供你只有我知道的秘密宝藏，\n或是秘术作为交换。

msg: We both desire to stand before the Elden Ring, and become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 彼此都为了觐见艾尔登法环，\n成为艾尔登之王而努力，

msg: As such, I hope we are compelled to work together.
msg_zh: 看在同志情谊，还望你鼎力相助。

msg: I'll trade your findings for something rather special.
msg_zh: 我会提供你特殊的物品，作为交换。

msg: Ah, you. What is it?
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊。有什么事吗？

msg: Well...what is it now?
msg_zh: ……还有什么事吗？

msg: Well. I see you've found another Great Rune.
msg_zh: ……哦，你拿到另一个大卢恩了？

msg: Wonderful. You are a worthy fellow Tarnished, indeed.
msg_zh: 太出色了，你真是表现出色的同志，\n出色的褪色者。

msg: Make the journey.
msg_zh: ……既然如此，你就动身前往吧。

msg: To the capital Leyndell, that lies to the east of the Altus Plateau, at the foot of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 朝亚坛高原以东的黄金树树脚，王城罗德尔前进。

msg: The Two Fingers will deny your passage no longer.
msg_zh: 双指的封印不会再拒你于门外。

msg: You may be our best hope. Find your way to the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: ……我满心期待，你接近艾尔登法环的那一刻。

msg: For we are Tarnished. And we must answer the call of grace.
msg_zh: 我们褪色者受到指引，那是指引所说的下一步啊。

msg: Journey to the capital Leyndell, to the east of the Altus Plateau, at the foot of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 动身前往吧。朝亚坛高原以东的黄金树树脚，\n王城罗德尔前进。

msg: The Two Fingers will deny your passage no longer.
msg_zh: 双指的封印不会再拒你于门外。

msg: You may be our best hope. Find your way to the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: ……我满心期待，你接近艾尔登法环的那一刻。

msg: General Radahn, the famed Red Lion and scourge of the stars, is a ferocious warrior.
msg_zh: “碎星红狮子”拉塔恩将军，是万夫莫敌的习武之人，

msg: He fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds to Limgrave's east.
msg_zh: 然而他在宁姆格福往东，那辽阔的盖利德原野上，\n和玛莲妮亚的腐败战成平手。

msg: And by my reckoning Radahn remains there, even now.
msg_zh: 拉塔恩应该还在盖利德。

msg: Though I doubt he much resembles his former self anymore...
msg_zh: ……但他现在的模样，可能让人不敢领教。

msg: Morgott the Grace-Given is Lord of Leyndell, the capital city.
msg_zh: “赐福”蒙葛特是王城罗德尔的主人。

msg: It lies at the foot of the Erdtree, in the east of the Altus Plateau.
msg_zh: 那座城就在亚坛高原以东的黄金树树脚……

msg: But the Two Fingers forbid us from venturing there.
msg_zh: 但双指不允许我们靠近该处。

msg: Until we've acquired enough Great Runes to repair the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 直到获得多个大卢恩，\n得以修复艾尔登法环之后，才有可能靠近。

msg: The Academy of Raya Lucaria lies to Limgrave's north, towering over the mist-laden lands of Liurnia.
msg_zh: 魔法学院雷亚卢卡利亚耸立在宁姆格福以北，\n飘着浓雾的利耶尼亚地区。

msg: Rennala is the queen of the Carian royals, who govern the academy.
msg_zh: 蕾娜菈是学院的领导者──卡利亚王室的女王。

msg: And her Great Rune dwells within the egg she so dearly clutches.
msg_zh: 她紧紧抱着的琥珀卵里头，藏着大卢恩。

msg: You've received the wisdom of the Two Fingers, have you not?
msg_zh: ……你听过双指的建言了。

msg: Then I bid you welcome, as a true member of the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 那么欢迎你加入，成为圆桌厅堂真正的一员。

msg: I am known as Gideon Ofnir.
msg_zh: 我是基甸·奥夫尼尔。

msg: As a Tarnished who wishes to stand before the Elden Ring and become Elden Lord,
msg_zh: 作为一名褪色者，\n为了觐见艾尔登法环，成为艾尔登之王，

msg: I am accumulating knowledge. To be all-knowing.
msg_zh: 求知若渴，渴望全知的人。

msg: You now belong to a select group of fellows. As such, I ask that you remain constant.
msg_zh: ……为数不多的同志啊，希望我们能长久合作。

msg: I understand you've been speaking to Nepheli.
msg_zh: ……你和涅斐丽说过话了？

msg: She is my daughter.
msg_zh: 对，她是我的女儿。

msg: I took her in when she lost the guidance of grace.
msg_zh: 在她失去赐福指引的时候，我收养了她。

msg: Though a mere axe-wielding barbarian, her youthful credulity suited my purposes.
msg_zh: 虽然是个只懂得挥舞斧头的野人，\n但那孩童一般，对人深信不疑的性格，实在可爱。

msg: So I put her to work.
msg_zh: 所以我让她替我做事。

msg: Do not hesitate to employ her, should her services benefit you.
msg_zh: ……如果有她能帮忙的，就让她出力吧。

msg: Despite her looks, she is more than capable in the press of battle.
msg_zh: 你看到她的外表可能会怀疑，但她确实有实力。

msg: Ahh, you've already heard?
msg_zh: ……哦，这件事你知情啊？

msg: Indeed, it seemed the whelp harboured suspicions.
msg_zh: 对，既然她开始心存疑念……

msg: So I had no further use for her.
msg_zh: 那就没用处了。

msg: Honestly, what's a man to do.
msg_zh: ……实在恼人。

msg: A determined plebian is more wicked than an Omen horn, quite frankly.
msg_zh: 无知者的意志是毒瘤，\n恶质到连恶兆的角都显得逊色。

msg: I suspect...that's just what the Queen wants.
msg_zh: ……但我猜想，可能女王盼的也是如此──

msg: A dose of ambition, to incite the Tarnished.
msg_zh: 我们褪色者的相互猜忌。

msg: Is that potion what I think it is?
msg_zh: ……哦，你手上的那种药……

msg: Bloody Seluvis. I suppose he's up to something again.
msg_zh: 赛尔维斯那厮，恶习又犯了。

msg: Oh, I won't interfere. You go ahead and do what you must.
msg_zh: 啊，无妨。你也有自己的做事方式。

msg: The Roundtable has no code to speak of.
msg_zh: 圆桌厅堂无意约束任何人。

msg: But, I ask you this. Are you really going to do the bidding of that twisted dolly botherer?
msg_zh: 但是啊，你打算任凭那令人不悦的男人摆布？

msg: Or would you rather hand that potion to me, and see if we can't get one over on the bastard?
msg_zh: 还是说，你愿意把药交给我，\n假装自己有照他的意思行事？

msg: Good. I'll dispose of the potion myself.
msg_zh: ……很好。药交给我善后。

msg: You go and see Seluvis, but don't give anything away.
msg_zh: 你只要装作不知情，回报赛尔维斯就好──

msg: Just tell him that you tricked your mark into drinking the potion as planned.
msg_zh: “确实让对方喝下了。”

msg: Despite knowing next to bloody nothing, he's so far up his own arse he won't suspect a thing.
msg_zh: 那厮绝对不会察觉。重要的事情他一概不知，\n那书痴连发生这种事的可能性都不曾推想过。

msg: His inevitable display of arrogance will certainly be a sight to behold.
msg_zh: 好好欣赏他自大的滑稽样吧。

msg: Well, I won't force you.
msg_zh: ……嗯，我不会强求。

msg: But I think your plan would be a dreadful waste.
msg_zh: 但难道，你不觉得可惜？

msg: She's not herself right now, and though I have no need of her, she still has potential.
msg_zh: 尽管那女娃儿不合我的心意，现在又是那副样子，\n但她的确是未经琢磨的原石。

msg: Certainly more value than she'd have as a bloody puppet.
msg_zh: ……那样的她，竟然要变成无趣的傀儡啊。

msg: I hear you helped get the girl back on her feet.
msg_zh: ……那女娃儿受你照顾了。

msg: Though I'm not her foster father anymore, I'd still like to thank you.
msg_zh: 我毕竟曾是义父，该向你致谢。

msg: Sorry. For the time you had to waste.
msg_zh: ……不好意思，浪费你不少的时间。

msg: Well, I won't force you.
msg_zh: ……嗯，我不会强求。

msg: If you want to do that dolly botherer's bidding, that's up to you.
msg_zh: 你愿意接受那男人摆布，也是种选择。

msg: Not that I could fathom why you'd want to...
msg_zh: 只是我无法理解罢了……

msg: Oh, my apologies for that nasty business.
msg_zh: ……啊，发生那件事，我深感抱歉。

msg: Ensha got rather ahead of himself, it seems.
msg_zh: 恩夏实在太过急躁。

msg: As his master, I'd like to express my regret.
msg_zh: 身为他的主人，向你致上歉意。

msg: But now, Ensha is slain and gone.
msg_zh: 但又说来，恩夏战败、赔上性命──

msg: Finished, forever more.
msg_zh: 实在是无药可救啊。

msg: Ah, yes, by way of apology,
msg_zh: ……啊，为了表示歉意，

msg: allow me to tender some advice, in regard to the half of the secret medallion you possess.
msg_zh: 我来提供情报吧──\n关于你拿到的秘密符节，它的另一半边的情报。

msg: Find the Albinauric woman.
msg_zh: ……去找白金之子的女人吧。

msg: She hides in a cave to the west of the Laskyar Ruins which jut from the mist-shrouded lake of Liurnia,
msg_zh: 那女人躲在利耶尼亚的雾湖，\n拉斯卡废墟西边的洞窟内，

msg: She knows the location of the medallion's counterpart, I am sure.
msg_zh: 她肯定知道另一半的秘密符节在哪里。

msg: together with her great wolf.
msg_zh: 和她的大狼一起行动。

msg: Find the Albinauric woman.
msg_zh: ……去找白金之子的女人吧。

msg: She hides in a cave to the west of the Laskyar Ruins which jut from the mist-shrouded lake of Liurnia,
msg_zh: 那女人躲在利耶尼亚的雾湖，\n拉斯卡废墟西边的洞窟内，

msg: She knows the location of the medallion's counterpart, I am sure.
msg_zh: 她肯定知道另一半的秘密符节在哪里。

msg: together with her great wolf.
msg_zh: 和她的大狼一起行动。

msg: Ah, yes, by way of apology,
msg_zh: ……啊，为了表示歉意，

msg: allow me to tender some advice, in regard to the half of the secret medallion you possess.
msg_zh: 我来提供情报吧──\n关于你拿到的秘密符节，它的另一半边的情报。

msg: Find the village of the Albinaurics.
msg_zh: ……去找白金村吧。

msg: It lies to the southwest of Liurnia, below the Altar clifflands.
msg_zh: 白金村就在利耶尼亚的西南边，祭坛悬崖的下方。

msg: And some of the old village folk have hidden the secret medallion's other half somewhere.
msg_zh: ……那另一半边的秘密符节，\n应该是村里的那群老人把它藏了起来。

msg: Find the village of the Albinaurics.
msg_zh: ……去找白金村吧。

msg: It lies to the southwest of Liurnia, below the Altar clifflands.
msg_zh: 白金村就在利耶尼亚的西南边，祭坛悬崖的下方。

msg: Some of the old village folk have hidden the secret medallion's other half somewhere.
msg_zh: ……那另一半边的秘密符节，\n应该是村里的那群老人把它藏了起来。

msg: Ahh, I know already. You're after it too, aren't you.
msg_zh: ……嗯，我当然知道，你的目标也一样。

msg: To pass the impenetrable thorns, you seek the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
msg_zh: 你想穿过拒绝的刺，所以要前往\n积着厚雪的巨人山顶，抵达灰灭火焰的大锅。

msg: Then you need to reach the Grand Lift of Rold, beyond the forbidden region.
msg_zh: ……既然如此，你该朝禁域前头的洛德大升降机前进。

msg: Hah, no need to pay me for that gift.
msg_zh: 不需要道谢，别客气。

msg: All my knowledge is for the sake of guidance.
msg_zh: 我的知识全为了引导而在，

msg: That a Tarnished might stand before the Elden Ring, and become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 也是为了让褪色者觐见艾尔登法环，\n成为艾尔登之王而在。

msg: It doesn't have to be me, my fellow.
msg_zh: ……达成这些伟业的，不必是我本人。

msg: If you're heading to the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
msg_zh: ……想前往积着厚雪的巨人山顶，\n抵达灰灭火焰的大锅，

msg: You'll need to find the Grand Lift of Rold, beyond the forbidden region.
msg_zh: 你该朝禁域前头的洛德大升降机前进。

msg: I marked your map with its location.
msg_zh: ……刚才我已经在你的地图上注记。

msg: Go, if you would. Take no heed of \"cardinal sin\".
msg_zh: 做出这些行为等同犯下重罪，\n但你还是出发吧。

msg: The Two Fingers lost their purpose a long, long time ago.
msg_zh: ……早在很久以前，双指就已经毁坏了。

msg: Ahh, I see you've laid your hands on the other secret medallion.
msg_zh: ……哦，两个秘密符节，你都拿到手了？

msg: I'm glad to see my counsel has borne fruit, but the honour of the deed is yours alone.
msg_zh: 我很庆幸先前的情报有帮上忙……\n但话说回来，你真的很出色。

msg: You've made more of yourself than Ensha has...
msg_zh: 比起恩夏，更是出色……

msg: Now, more importantly, both secret medallions are in your hands.
msg_zh: 总之，现在总算凑齐了秘密符节。

msg: I suppose you'd like to know then? What awaits you on the path ahead?
msg_zh: 你想知道前头会有什么等着你吧？

msg: Me too, my friend, me too. I wait with baited breath.
msg_zh: 对，我也很想知道。我很期待。

msg: Ahh, so the secret medallions led you to the land of the Haligtree?
msg_zh: ……果然如此。秘密符节带你前进的地方，\n是圣树的所在地。

msg: I'd expect to find Malenia there. She who fought Radahn to a standstill.
msg_zh: 和拉塔恩战成平手的玛莲妮亚，人应该就在那。

msg: Well, if the scarlet rot hasn't eaten her away completely.
msg_zh: ……前提是，她没有因为猩红腐败自毁的话。

msg: But...with the Haligtree as it is...
msg_zh: ……只是说，圣树的那模样……

msg: I suppose Miquella must already be...
msg_zh: 米凯拉可能已经……

msg: Ah, my apologies. Lost myself, for a moment there.
msg_zh: 啊，抱歉，我自顾自地陷入沉思。

msg: The information you've shared is of great value. As promised, your reward:
msg_zh: 你的情报很有价值，如同我们约定的──

msg: A hidden treasure, known only to me.
msg_zh: 我愿意提供给你，只有我知道的秘密宝藏。

msg: A secret rite known only to me.
msg_zh: 我愿意提供给你，只有我知道的秘术。

msg: You are a true fellow. All I ask is that you remain constant.
msg_zh: ……你是我如假包换的同志。\n希望我们可以一直长久合作。

msg: And it is a wondrous thing indeed.
msg_zh: 我愿意提供给你特殊的物品。

msg: So. The Haligtree, now but a husk...
msg_zh: ……原来啊。圣树果真变成空壳了。

msg: I heard speculation Miquella embedded himself in the Haligtree,
msg_zh: 听说米凯拉原本寄宿在圣树之中，

msg: but before he could finish, someone cut the tree open and absconded with his infant form.
msg_zh: 然而在他完全寄宿以前，\n有人剖开圣树，夺走其中的稚子。

msg: Indeed, it seems those words held weight.
msg_zh: ……看样子，那件事不假。

msg: How vexing. That the All-knowing didn't have the full story...
msg_zh: ……真是棘手。\n居然会有百智爵士无从知晓全貌的事。

msg: Perhaps the Queen's sorrow was justified...
msg_zh: 也难怪女王会感到烦忧……

msg: Oh, so that's where the so-called Lord of Blood was hiding himself eh.
msg_zh: ……哦，那名叫鲜血君王的，竟然藏身在那种地方。

msg: A fitting little squat for that deluded maniac to bleat about the revival of his precious dynasty,while he turns our fellow Tarnished into Bloody Fingers.
msg_zh: 意图将我们褪色者化为血指，\n满怀着复兴王朝的夸张妄想，那地底倒是很适合他。

msg: Let him stay there. That way, his delusions will remain as they are - distant and unattainable.
msg_zh: ……他继续蛰伏地底倒也好。\n如此一来妄想只会是妄想，也是永远的美梦。

msg: But perhaps it's worth looking into...
msg_zh: ……话说回来，这听来有调查的必要。

msg: If what I've heard is right, then maybe...
msg_zh: 如果那件事不假，有可能……

msg: Ahh, I see! So Miquella was with the Lord of Blood after all!
msg_zh: ……哦哦，原来啊！\n米凯拉果真在鲜血君王的身旁吗？

msg: That is some fine intelligence indeed!
msg_zh: 你啊，这可是天大的情报。

msg: With it, the final clue has been brought into the light.
msg_zh: 圆桌厅堂，不，该说是我个人该知道的，\n这是最后一件了。

msg: One of the last few pieces the Roundtable-- I need, to put everything together.
msg_zh: 那条线索总算明朗了。

msg: As promised, allow me to impart to you
msg_zh: ……依照我们的约定，我愿意提供给你──

msg: the last of the hidden treasures known only to me.
msg_zh: 只有我知道的秘密宝藏，其中最上等的一个。

msg: the last of the secret rites known only to me.
msg_zh: 只有我知道的秘术，其中最上等的一个。

msg: a thing most wondrous, known only to me.
msg_zh: 只有我知道的特殊物品。

msg: Well, I wonder what comes next...
msg_zh: ……嗯，接下来该怎么做……

msg: If he continues his slumber within the cocoon, all would be well.
msg_zh: 让他继续沉眠茧中，也是不错。

msg: But perhaps it would be safer to destroy it.
msg_zh: 但也许该消灭他才是。

msg: Miquella is the one thing that remains a mystery to me...
msg_zh: ……米凯拉，蒙着一层面纱的存在……

msg: You...burned the Erdtree, didn't you?
msg_zh: ……你燃烧了黄金树吧？

msg: Then the Roundtable is soon to follow.
msg_zh: 看来圆桌厅堂就快画下句点。

msg: Ah, no need to fret about that.
msg_zh: 哦，不必放在心上。

msg: The Roundtable Hold served to put a Tarnished upon the throne of Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 圆桌厅堂本来就是\n为了让褪色者成为艾尔登之王而设。

msg: And if the Erdtree needed to burn for that to happen,
msg_zh: 如果为此必须燃烧黄金树，

msg: then the Roundtable must go, as well.
msg_zh: 那圆桌厅堂画下句点，也是必然。

msg: I'll stay at the Roundtable, for a time.
msg_zh: ……我会暂时留在圆桌厅堂。

msg: I must learn all that can be taken from this place,
msg_zh: 我必须把放在这里，该知晓的一切记在脑海。

msg: and sear it into my memory.
msg_zh: 必须把这一切刻划在心中。

msg: How could I call myself the All-Knowing, if I did any less?
msg_zh: ……“百智爵士”的含意，正是如此。

msg: The pursuit of knowledge is without end, for knowledge is never a thing complete.
msg_zh: ……知识无穷，但也不尽完美。

msg: Thus, I maintain the mantle of All-Knowing.
msg_zh: 也因此，我能一直是“百智爵士”。

msg: Perhaps the same could be said of guidance.
msg_zh: 试想，这可能与引导很雷同。

msg: Who's to say whether we'll remain who we are, once the fight is finished?
msg_zh: 在战争结束之后，我们还有办法维持本性吗？

msg: What do you think, as one who aspires to become Elden Lord?
msg_zh: ……想成为艾尔登之王的人啊，你有什么想法？

msg: Ahh, I knew you'd come.
msg_zh: ……啊，结果真的是你。

msg: To stand before the Elden Ring. To become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 准备觐见艾尔登法环，成为艾尔登之王吗。

msg: What a sad state of affairs.
msg_zh: ……不胜唏嘘啊。

msg: I commend your spirit, but alas, none shall take the throne.
msg_zh: 我认同你的意志，\n但要让你得偿所愿是另当别论。

msg: Queen Marika has high hopes for us.
msg_zh: 因为玛莉卡女王希望我们做的，

msg: That we continue to struggle. Unto eternity.
msg_zh: 是维持现状，不停挣扎啊。

msg: You think I don't know what that is?
msg_zh: ……我这等人物，会不知道这是什么？

msg: I have no secrets for you to salaciously gawp at.
msg_zh: 我没有让你窥视的秘密。

msg: You think too little of Gideon Ofnir, the All-knowing.
msg_zh: ……劝你不要小看我“百智爵士”基甸·奥夫尼尔。

msg: My fellow, you've fought well, until now.
msg_zh: ……同志啊，到目前为止，\n你的战果确实不凡。

msg: I know...in my bones...
msg_zh: ……我全都知道。

msg: A Tarnished cannot become a Lord. Not even you.
msg_zh: 褪色者无法成为王，即使是你也一样。

msg: A man cannot kill a god...
msg_zh: ……人类，杀不了神。

msg: Knowledge above all!
msg_zh: 百智的世界啊！

msg: Ah, nice to meet you.
msg_zh: ……我们是第一次见面吧？

msg: The pleasure's mine. Rogier's the name. A sorcerer, as you might have guessed.
msg_zh: 你好，我是罗杰尔。\n正如你所想的，我是魔法师。

msg: I'm looking for a little something, here in the castle.
msg_zh: 我想找的物品就在这座城里，

msg: When I'm not hotfooting it from the troops, that is.
msg_zh: 所以一直在躲避士兵的追缉。

msg: But enough about me, what are you doing here in Stormveil Castle?
msg_zh: ……话说回来，你为什么来到史东薇尔呢？

msg: This place is bristling with Tarnished hunters, you know. They sacrifice our kind, for grafting.
msg_zh: 这座城的人都在狩猎褪色者，\n拿来当作“接肢”的祭品，

msg: Not exactly a place I'd stroll into without a purpose in mind...
msg_zh: 正常来说，应该不会主动靠近吧……

msg: I see. Here to challenge Godrick, and lay your hands upon a Great Rune, are you?
msg_zh: 原来是这样，你是为了获得大卢恩，\n跑来挑战葛瑞克啊……

msg: You can see it then, I take it? The guidance of grace.
msg_zh: 所以你看得到赐福的指引？

msg: Well, enjoy it while you can.
msg_zh: ……真羡慕你。

msg: I'm Tarnished, like you.
msg_zh: 我也跟你一样是褪色者，

msg: But unlike you, I've seen neither hide nor hair of this guidance for the longest time.
msg_zh: 只是已经很久没再看过指引。

msg: Still, I won't forget how it felt when I first came here, to the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 不过，当时来到交界地的初心，\n我还是牢牢记在心底。

msg: I'm privy to a few magical battle arts.
msg_zh: ……我知道几招魔法相关的战技。

msg: Would you care to learn one?
msg_zh: 如果你愿意的话，要不要学看看？

msg: As a fellow Tarnished, once guided by grace. I'd love to help you out, if it please.
msg_zh: 我也是受过赐福指引的褪色者，\n想以这种身分帮助你。

msg: Oh? Keen to learn another battle art, are we?
msg_zh: 哦？又想再学习战技吗？

msg: Oh hello there, good to see you safe.
msg_zh: 嗨，你好啊。平安无事就好。

msg: Stopping by to learn a battle art or two?
msg_zh: 要来学习战技吗？

msg: The battle art you've learned is of the glintstone family.
msg_zh: ……你学习的战技是归在辉石魔法之下──

msg: They were conceived at the great Academy of Raya Lucaria, to the north of this castle.
msg_zh: 据说是出自这座城北方的雷亚卢卡利亚，\n有一间规模庞大的学院……

msg: In the past, they obeyed laws which contravened the Golden Order, or so I'm told.
msg_zh: 听说从很久以前开始，\n他们就遵循着与黄金律法完全对立的法则。

msg: Fascinating, isn't it?
msg_zh: ……这件事情真的很有意思。

msg: That the Golden Order was pliable enough to absorb practices that contradicted itself in the past.
msg_zh: 以前的黄金律法十分宽大，\n连完全对立的法则都能够包容。

msg: With the Order broken, twisted, and in need of repair,
msg_zh: 在黄金律法破碎、扭曲，必须被修复的现在……

msg: such adaptability is more important now than ever.
msg_zh: 我认为这种特质，真的是万分重要。

msg: Of course. I understand.
msg_zh: 啊，也对。

msg: Why place trust in a perfect stranger?
msg_zh: 对素昧平生的人，要有所防备嘛。

msg: Be safe, then, stranger.
msg_zh: 那么，和你说声再会。

msg: Watch you don't get sacrificed, eh. I'll do the same.
msg_zh: 希望彼此都能平安，不会沦为祭品。

msg: Oh? Something bothering you?
msg_zh: 哦？还有什么事吗？

msg: Or are you just trying to pass the time?
msg_zh: 难道说……你改变心意，愿意告诉我了？

msg: I'm curious how you ended up inside this castle.
msg_zh: 你是为什么来到这座城呢？

msg: Ah, we meet again after all.
msg_zh: ……嗨，你好，又见面了。

msg: I apologise for any offence given by my bearing, but I'm quite unable to move, you see.
msg_zh: 抱歉，用这种姿势跟你说话，\n但我的身体真的无法动弹。

msg: So. What do you need?
msg_zh: 所以找我有什么事吗？

msg: Ah, you defeated Godrick and claimed yourself a Great Rune.
msg_zh: 哦，你成功了啊！\n顺利打倒葛瑞克，获得大卢恩了。

msg: Mm, looks like we both got we wanted out of Stormveil, didn't we.
msg_zh: 这么一来，你跟我到史东薇尔的目标都达成了。

msg: Well done, friend.
msg_zh: 恭喜你。

msg: Something to mark the occasion. Go on, take it.
msg_zh: 这是给你的贺礼，请收下。

msg: As you might've guessed, I still can't move. My fighting days are behind me.
msg_zh: ……看我这副模样──\n身体无法随意行动，战斗更是不用说。

msg: No need to be polite, I've no use for it anymore.
msg_zh: 所以那物品对我来说，已经毫无用武之地。

msg: The misshapen corpse under Stormveil?
msg_zh: 你想问史东薇尔地底的，那副异形身体吗？

msg: That is a sacred relic. Of the black knives plot. As that famed night of assassination is known.
msg_zh: ……那是人称黑刀阴谋的暗杀之夜，留下的产物。

msg: It happened during the Golden Age of the Erdtree, long before the shattering of the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 在艾尔登法环破碎以前，那远古黄金树的全盛时期，

msg: Someone stole a fragment of the Rune of Death from Maliketh, the Black Blade.
msg_zh: 不知道是谁，\n偷走了“黑剑”玛利喀斯持有的死亡卢恩碎片，

msg: And on a bitter night, murdered Godwyn the Golden.
msg_zh: 在冰冷的夜里，杀害了“黄金”葛德文。

msg: That was the first recorded Death of a demigod in all history.
msg_zh: 那是史上第一起半神死亡的记录，

msg: And it became the catalyst. Soon, the Elden Ring was smashed, and thus sprang forth the war known as the Shattering.
msg_zh: 也连带影响了艾尔登法环的破碎，还有破碎战争的爆发。

msg: I once wished to become a scholar, you see. I've spent many an hour scouring the archives for knowledge of that fateful plot.
msg_zh: ……其实我原本希望成为学者，\n所以一直在调查那场阴谋。

msg: The world has grown crooked, and if you intend to put it to rights,
msg_zh: 我认为想导正这世界的扭曲之处，

msg: You'd better understand what happened to make it this way, mm?
msg_zh: 就必须先了解事情发生的成因。

msg: This...is a black knifeprint!
msg_zh: ……这该不会是黑刀烙印吧？

msg: I can scarcely believe you managed to get your hands on this!
msg_zh: 你竟然把它拿到手了……

msg: You recall our conversation about the Night of the Black Knives, yes?
msg_zh: 之前我曾跟你说过黑刀阴谋之夜……

msg: They say the assassins who carried out the deed were scions of the Eternal City.
msg_zh: 听说动手的人是永恒之城的后裔──

msg: A group entirely of women, arrayed in armour of silver under cloaks which fooled the eye.
msg_zh: 一群穿着具有隐身效果的衣服，\n披上银色盔甲，只有女性成员的刺客集团。

msg: The knives they wielded though, were imparted with the power of the Rune of Death through sinister rite.
msg_zh: 而她们使用的武器黑刀，\n则是透过仪式注入死亡卢恩的力量。

msg: Please, I beg of you, lend me the knifeprint for a time.
msg_zh: ……我拜托你，能不能将那烙印暂时借给我？

msg: I'd love nothing more than to tease out its secrets.
msg_zh: 我想要花一些时间仔细调查。

msg: Though only a fragment, a very specific ritual had to be performed to impart the power of the Rune of Death.
msg_zh: 想要注入死亡卢恩的力量，\n虽说只是碎片，还是需要一定规模的仪式才办得到。

msg: Traces of the one who performed the rite are sure to remain in the imprint...
msg_zh: 而仪式的烙印，肯定会留下主导者的蛛丝马迹……

msg: Half my body has been suffused with Death. I'm certain it will help me see.
msg_zh: 像我这样半身受死亡侵蚀的人，一定能找得到线索。

msg: Oh, still need something?
msg_zh: 哦，还有什么事吗？

msg: Always good to see you safe.
msg_zh: 啊，是你。平安无事就好。

msg: So. What do you need?
msg_zh: 所以找我有什么事吗？

msg: Ah, so you've met D.
msg_zh: 哎呀，你知道Ｄ这个人吗？

msg: D is an old friend.
msg_zh: ……他是我的老朋友。

msg: We found ourselves journeying together for a time, bound by our exploration of Death.
msg_zh: 我们都在探寻死亡，所以一起旅行过。

msg: But our paths have since diverged. Never again to cross.
msg_zh: 但最后我们分道扬镳了，从那之后不曾再有交集。

msg: Though that's hardly an uncommon fate for two friends.
msg_zh: ……所谓的朋友，大概都是如此吧。

msg: Pleased to meet you.
msg_zh: ……我们是第一次见面吧？

msg: The name's Rogier. A sorcerer, by trade.
msg_zh: 我是罗杰尔，是魔法师。

msg: But now I'm in this sorry state.
msg_zh: ……说是这么说，但现在是这副模样。

msg: I had a little mishap, and now I can't move.
msg_zh: 因为事情发展不如我的预期，身体变得无法动弹了。

msg: As you might guess, it's far from ideal...
msg_zh: 唉，真是伤脑筋……

msg: Ah, I know.
msg_zh: ……啊，对了。

msg: I'm privy to a few magical battle arts.
msg_zh: 我知道几招魔法相关的战技。

msg: Would you care to learn one?
msg_zh: 如果你愿意的话，要不要学看看？

msg: Time can move rather slowly, stuck here, you know.
msg_zh: 一直待在这种地方，其实心情有点闷。

msg: A little conversation goes a long way.
msg_zh: 也想要找人说说话。

msg: Ahh, hello. I was hoping to see you.
msg_zh: ……嗨，你好。久候多时啰。

msg: My examination is complete. Here's the knifeprint back, with my thanks.
msg_zh: 调查完毕了，烙印还给你。

msg: Now, I have a fairly good idea who performed the rite upon the blade. The person who orchestrated the Night of the Black Knives.
msg_zh: ……我也查到了关于仪式的主导者，\n也就是阴谋之夜的主谋身分。

msg: Lunar Princess Ranni. One of the children born to King Consort Radagon and his first wife, Rennala.
msg_zh: “月之公主”菈妮──\n王夫拉达冈与第一任妻子蕾娜菈生下的其中一位孩子，

msg: Demigod and sister to General Radahn and Praetor Rykard.
msg_zh: 她与拉塔恩将军、拉卡德司法官之间是兄妹关系。

msg: Her's was the name I discovered in the imprint.
msg_zh: 她的名字被隐藏在烙印里面。

msg: Truly, you have my thanks.
msg_zh: ……真的很谢谢你。

msg: But, if I might be so bold, I would also like to ask something more of you.
msg_zh: 还有就是，我可以向你提出不情之请吗？

msg: If Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,
msg_zh: 既然“月之公主”菈妮是阴谋之夜的主谋，

msg: then she should bear the cursemark of Destined Death somewhere upon her flesh.
msg_zh: 那她的身体一定有“命定之死”留下的咒痕。

msg: I would like you to procure it for me.
msg_zh: 你能不能将咒痕拿到手呢？

msg: And then all will be laid bare. I will have the answers I have sought for so long.
msg_zh: ……这么一来，我应该就能豁然开朗，\n得到一直以来追求的答案。

msg: Don't fret, it is entirely in accordance with the guidance of grace.
msg_zh: 而且如果你想要遵从赐福的指引，

msg: If you seek to stand before the Elden Ring and become Elden Lord,
msg_zh: 觐见艾尔登法环，成为艾尔登之王的话，

msg: The answers you find will surely bolster your chances.
msg_zh: 我所追求的答案，肯定也能助一臂之力。

msg: I have some idea of Ranni's potential whereabouts.
msg_zh: ……菈妮的所在地，我有些头绪。

msg: There's a manor to the north of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 在雷亚卢卡利亚学院的北方，有一座城寨。

msg: It is the familial home of the Carian royals from whom Ranni descends.
msg_zh: 那里是菈妮的原生家庭──卡利亚王室的故乡。

msg: There's been talk of the old royals' vassals gathering there in recent years
msg_zh: 有传闻说最近几年，王室的老臣陆陆续续前往那座城寨。

msg: Ranni's whereabouts since the Shattering are a well-kept secret. She hasn't been seen even once.
msg_zh: 在破碎战争的时候，菈妮销声匿迹，\n从那之后就没有人见过她的身影。

msg: But I suspect she might have returned to the manor in which she was born...
msg_zh: 我在猜想，她有可能回到了故乡，也就是那座城寨。

msg: If Lunar Princess Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,
msg_zh: 既然“月之公主”菈妮是阴谋之夜的主谋，

msg: then she should bear the cursemark of Destined Death somewhere upon her flesh.
msg_zh: 那她的身体一定有“命定之死”留下的咒痕。

msg: Would you be willing to procure it for me?
msg_zh: 你能不能将咒痕拿到手呢？

msg: She may have returned to the manor that is her home.
msg_zh: ……她有可能回到了故乡，也就是那座城寨。

msg: The Royal Carian residence to the north of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 位在雷亚卢卡利亚学院的北方，那座卡利亚王室的城寨。

msg: I'm afraid there's something I must tell you.
msg_zh: ……我想，还是该和你说吧。

msg: Do you know of Those Who Live in Death?
msg_zh: 你知道“死诞者”吗？

msg: The very notion of life in death defies the Golden Order.
msg_zh: 他们是被排除在黄金律法的法则之外，\n因为死亡而诞生的人。

msg: By D's account, these defiled fiends must be expunged.
msg_zh: 套用Ｄ的话来说，\n那些人是不允许存在世上的玷污者。

msg: But truth be told, I seek the cursemark to save them.
msg_zh: ……我之所以想找到咒痕，就是想要拯救他们。

msg: You may find this peculiar,
msg_zh: 你肯定认为我在说天方夜谭吧？

msg: but I discovered something in my examination of the Night of the Black Knives.
msg_zh: 但是我在调查阴谋之夜的过程中，明白了一件事：

msg: These souls have committed no offence. They have every right to life, only, they happened to touch upon a flaw in the Order.
msg_zh: 死诞者没有侵害任何事物。\n他们只是拚命生存，也就因此冒犯了律法。

msg: Yes, indeed.
msg_zh: ……我想也是。

msg: If D knew what drives me now,
msg_zh: 如果Ｄ知道了，我現在想要做什麼，

msg: he would surely boil over with rage.
msg_zh: 肯定會氣得怒不可遏。

msg: Or perhaps, he would even feel some pity.
msg_zh: ……還是說，他會感到一絲絲哀傷呢？

msg: But no need to fret, none of that will come to pass.
msg_zh: 不管怎麼樣，這些情況都不會發生──

msg: I can tell a good lie when I need to.
msg_zh: 因為我很會說謊啊。

msg: And...that thing is to blame for the shape I'm in now...
msg_zh: ……唉，结果现在落得这副模样就是了。

msg: I urge the utmost caution. Don't disturb the corpse more than necessary...
msg_zh: 你也要小心喔，不要长时间接触那副异形身体。

msg: Oh? Forgot something, did you?
msg_zh: 哦？还有什么事吗？

msg: Alright there. Good to see you safe.
msg_zh: 啊，是你。平安无事就好。

msg: I see...
msg_zh: ……原来如此……

msg: When Ranni shed her flesh, she shed the cursemark, too.
msg_zh: 菈妮抛弃身体的同时，\n连带抛弃了咒痕，原来是这样啊。

msg: You know, not everyone would trust such a tale...
msg_zh: 乍听之下难以置信，

msg: But, if she in her current form is nothing more than the living doll you profess...
msg_zh: 但如果她现在的外表，\n如你所说，是有着少女外貌的人偶……

msg: Then perhaps it's true after all.
msg_zh: 也不是完全不可能。

msg: Hmm.
Forgive the bluntness of the notion, but...
msg_zh: 如果这提议冒犯到你，请你见谅……

msg: How would you like to become one of Ranni's vassals?
msg_zh: 你愿意成为菈妮的臣子吗？

msg: Ah, only in order to get what we want, of course.
msg_zh: 啊，当然，只是为了方便行事。

msg: The location of the body which bore the cursemark, which right now I haven't the faintest.
msg_zh: 现在还不知道她抛弃的身体在什么地方，

msg: And the best way to find out is for you to enter her service and take a poke around on the sly.
msg_zh: 所以说，我希望你成为她的臣子，\n待在她身边刺探，找出身体的所在地。

msg: I know you've got what it takes.
msg_zh: 我相信你办得到。

msg: Not only are you a superb fighter, but people want to trust you. I've seen it.
msg_zh: 因为你不只是一名优秀的战士，\n还有一种特质，让人容易相信你。

msg: Can you become Ranni's vassal to advance our agenda?
msg_zh: ……为了方便行事，可以请你成为菈妮的臣子吗？

msg: While in her service, you'll be able to take a poke around on the sly.
msg_zh: 希望你成为她的臣子，\n待在她身边刺探，找出身体的所在地──

msg: And determine the location of her original body that bears the cursemark.
msg_zh: 那连同咒痕一起抛弃的，原本身体的所在地。

msg: I realise that I'm asking you to put yourself in grave danger.
msg_zh: ……我知道这要求会让你身处险境，

msg: But I know you've got what it takes. Quite possibly the only one, in fact.
msg_zh: 但我相信你办得到……\n不对，我认为也只有你办得到。

msg: Not only are you a superb fighter, but people want to trust you. I've seen it.
msg_zh: 因为你不只是一名优秀的战士，\n还有一种特质，让人容易相信你。

msg: D was telling me.
msg_zh: ……话说回来，我有听Ｄ稍微提到。

msg: That he discovered the mark of the centipede.
msg_zh: 他好像发现了百足环的烙印。

msg: The centipede is an ancient symbol of the cursemark.
msg_zh: 百足环是和咒痕有密切关系的古老烙印。

msg: As long as whoever finds and uses it is not nefarious by nature,
msg_zh: 那知情而使用的人，如果不是坏人……

msg: then we may be able to form an alliance.
msg_zh: 也许我们可以互相帮助。

msg: If only I could speak to them in person.
msg_zh: ……真希望能够见面聊一聊啊。

msg: And if they were like you, all the better.
msg_zh: 对方是类似你这样的人就好了。

msg: Hmm. Maybe I should tell you.
msg_zh: ……我想了想，还是和你说一声。

msg: Lately, I feel I'm on the precipice...
msg_zh: 老实说，我最近的睡意非常浓。

msg: Of falling into a deep...fathomless slumber.
msg_zh: ……感觉会睡得很沉、很沉的那种睡意。

msg: And I have an inkling it could spell trouble for you, somehow.
msg_zh: 我想可能会给你添麻烦，

msg: So I just wanted to get the apology out of the way, beforehand.
msg_zh: 所以先和你说声抱歉。

msg: Since you're so scary and all.
msg_zh: ……毕竟，你很凶嘛。

msg: <sleeping>
<moans and stutters>
<struggles to say a word, but mostly fails>
Off..er her c-curse...m-mark
msg_zh: 啊、啊……咒、咒痕……

msg: Fi…a's… fi…a's…
msg_zh: 菲、雅……菲、雅……

msg: T-to... G-god... wyn
msg_zh: 献、葛、葛德文……

msg: A…fu-full...circle
msg_zh: 合、为一……成、圆……

msg: F-forms…a…r...rune...
msg_zh: 变、卢、卢恩……

msg: (Dies)
For me, really?
msg_zh: ……这要给我吗？

msg: Why thank you very much.
msg_zh: ……我欣然收下啰。

msg: I'll try anything once.
msg_zh: 凡事都要亲身尝试，是我的主张嘛。

msg: <sleeping>
...No thank you.
I don't need your pity.
msg_zh: 如果你是可怜我，就别费心了。

msg: Ah...
Sorry. You were only trying to be nice.
msg_zh: 抱歉，你明明是一番好意。

msg: It would be my pleasure to take it. My thanks.
msg_zh: 我欣然收下了，谢谢你。

msg: <sleeping>
Oof!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: I fear you are mistaken.
msg_zh: ……你怎么了吗？

msg: I am no foe of yours, far from it.
msg_zh: 我不打算和你为敌……

msg: This is rather unfortunate.
msg_zh: ……那就没办法了。

msg: I don't normally find myself cornered like a rat.
msg_zh: 既然已经穷途末路……

msg: But I have my ways...
msg_zh: 那也只能杀出重围。

msg: No need to grandstand; you're not even on stage.
msg_zh: ……我认为真人不露相才是上策喔。

msg: Well, this is unfortunate.
msg_zh: ……真是，伤脑筋啊……

msg: Couldn't change a thing...
msg_zh: ……结果没成就任何事……

msg: Agh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: I fear you are mistaken.
msg_zh: ……你怎么了吗？

msg: I am no foe of yours, far from it.
msg_zh: 我不打算和你为敌……

msg: If you think I am helpless,
msg_zh: ……请不要一厢情愿了，

msg: you are quite mistaken, I'm afraid.
msg_zh: 我还是有能力抵抗。

msg: If this doesn't cause you shame, nothing will.
msg_zh: ……你都不觉得丢脸吗？

msg: Well, this is unfortunate.
msg_zh: ……真是，伤脑筋啊……

msg: Couldn't change a thing...
msg_zh: ……结果没成就任何事……

msg: C-curse...m-mark
Fi…a's… fi…a's…
msg_zh: 菲、雅……菲、雅……

msg: T-to... G-god... wyn
msg_zh: 献、葛、葛德文……

msg: Not seen you before.
msg_zh: ……第一次见到你啊。

msg: Name's Bernahl. Tarnished, just like you.
msg_zh: 我是贝纳尔，和你一样是褪色者。

msg: Let me ask you something.
msg_zh: ……能问你一件事吗？

msg: Are you here in the Lands Between to take up the fight?
msg_zh: 你会待在这块交界地，不停战斗下去吗？

msg: Does your faith in the guidance of grace hold firm,
msg_zh: 即使黄金律法破碎到难以修复的境界，

msg: despite the collapse of the Golden Order?
msg_zh: 还会继续相信赐福的指引吗？

msg: Yes, you're a Tarnished through and through.
msg_zh: ……嗯，堪称褪色者的楷模。

msg: Takes me back, but that's a quality needed now more than ever.
msg_zh: 真让人怀念。\n放眼现下，有这种想法很珍贵。

msg: Any interest in bearing the torch, of my battle arts?
msg_zh: 那么，你有意思继承我的战技吗？

msg: All I know is the sword. Picked up a fair few tricks in my time, too.
msg_zh: 我只懂得用剑，心血全投注在战技上。

msg: Now's the time to pass 'em on. To a good and proper Tarnished, like you.
msg_zh: 我想把战技传承下去，\n传给像你这种模范褪色者。

msg: Oh, not had your fill, eh? Worry not, I've enough to keep you busy.
msg_zh: ……哦，还学得不够吗？\n很好，我奉陪到底。

msg: Ah, hello. Glad to see you safe.
msg_zh: ……是你啊，平安无事就好。

msg: Here to learn a battle art or two?
msg_zh: 那么，再来学习战技吧。

msg: There's a myriad of battle arts in these lands that I've yet to discover.
msg_zh: ……这块土地上，还有很多我没见过的战技。

msg: Mementos of all the warriors who raised their arms in battle, lost, and died.
msg_zh: 战技是战士持武而战、败北、丧命的证明，

msg: A fine tale, all told, of true chivalric romance.
msg_zh: 是最为鲜明的英雄故事。

msg: That's how I fell in love with the sword, and the arts of combat.
msg_zh: 所以我才会对剑，还有战技爱不释手──

msg: It grants meaning even to falling in battle, to death itself.
msg_zh: 那传达、赋予了战败与死亡的意义。

msg: Honest to a fault, I see.
msg_zh: ……你还真老实。

msg: Such thoughts won't behove you, as a Tarnished.
msg_zh: 就褪色者而言，这确实是缺点……

msg: But there's nothing wrong with that.
msg_zh: 但这种态度，我不反感。

msg: Any interest in bearing the torch, of my battle arts?
msg_zh: 你有意思继承我的战技吗？

msg: All I know is the sword. Picked up a fair few tricks in my time, too.
msg_zh: 我只懂得用剑，心血全投注在战技上。

msg: Now's the time to pass 'em on. To a good Tarnished, like you.
msg_zh: 我想把战技传承下去，传给像你这样的褪色者。

msg: Not floating your boat, eh?
msg_zh: ……没兴趣吗？

msg: Well, there's no rush. Knowledge of the arts can wait another day.
msg_zh: 不急于一时。\n等有意愿的时候，再来找我。

msg: There you are. Decided to bear the torch of my battle arts?
msg_zh: ……是你啊。有兴趣继承战技了？

msg: Well, until we meet again.
msg_zh: ……再会了。

msg: You...
What in heaven's name are you doing here?
msg_zh: 为什么来这种地方？

msg: The Volcano Manor is a pit of recusants who spit at grace and hunt our own kind.
msg_zh: 火山官邸是亵渎赐福、\n狩猎同胞的叛律者聚集的巢穴。

msg: I hope you understand the weight of my words.
msg_zh: 你懂这代表什么吗？

msg: Well. As long as you understand what you're saying.
msg_zh: ……明白的话，我不多说。

msg: I thought you a Tarnished bred by virtue.
msg_zh: 我还以为你是褪色者中的楷模……

msg: Perhaps playing that part led you to your doubts, I wonder.
msg_zh: 也可能正因为如此，才会感到疑惑。

msg: But know that the path you walk is blasphemy, and leads only to a miserable death.
msg_zh: 参与亵渎，最后只会不得善终，

msg: Before you consider hunting any of your own kind, think on that.
msg_zh: 劝你狩猎同胞之前，先仔细思考。

msg: This blasphemous path leads only to a pitiful death.
msg_zh: 参与亵渎，最后只会不得善终，

msg: Before you consider hunting any of your own kind, think on that.
msg_zh: 劝你狩猎同胞之前，先仔细思考。

msg: So. You've bloodied your sword in the hunt.
msg_zh: ……你狩猎同胞了。

msg: Then I shall introduce myself once more.
msg_zh: 那是该重新介绍自己──

msg: Bernahl, a recusant, just like you.
msg_zh: 我是贝纳尔，和你一样是叛律者。

msg: Recusants have particular battle arts, styled to our methods of slaughter.
msg_zh: ……而叛律者自然有叛律者的战法，\n也就是所谓的战技。

msg: Why not add some to your repertoire?
msg_zh: 学了是有备无患。

msg: Oh, not had your fill, eh?
msg_zh: ……哦，还学得不够吗？

msg: You're still alive, I see.
msg_zh: ……你还活着啊。

msg: Why not learn another battle art, see if we can't keep it that way.
msg_zh: 那再来学习战技吧。

msg: You've come to understand, now, eh?
msg_zh: ……我想你也很明了。

msg: To take power and make it his own,
msg_zh: 抢夺他人的力量、化为己有──

msg: The recusant must hunt his own kind.
msg_zh: 就是叛律者狩猎同胞的目的。

msg: To raise the flag of revolt against this sanctified pillaging,
msg_zh: 为了那被迫互相残杀的恶令，叛律者揭竿而起。

msg: We recusants must become the most wretched of predators.
msg_zh: 但到头来，却变成最为肤浅的掠食者。

msg: All you can do is laugh.
msg_zh: ……真可笑。

msg: Look at you. A recusant through and through.
msg_zh: ……你越来越有叛律者的味道了。

msg: I knew you had it in you.
msg_zh: 正所谓适才适所吧。

msg: Take this.
msg_zh: 这个交给你。

msg: A special invitation, to hunt some of the first Tarnished who sat at the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 那是特殊的邀请函──\n邀请你狩猎圆桌厅堂的创始褪色者，其中的幸存者。

msg: If you should accept, I'll next see you on the field of battle.
msg_zh: 有意思出席的话，届时在战场会合吧。

msg: Ah, I had hoped you'd soon return.
msg_zh: 我等你很久了。

msg: I have the reward from Lady Tanith.
msg_zh: 塔妮丝女士拿给我先前那场狩猎的谢礼。

msg: Take it. It's yours, by right.
msg_zh: 但这谢礼该由你收下。

msg: Let us tread the path of the recusant together.
msg_zh: ……一起在叛律的路上前进吧，

msg: Till we reach the miserable death that awaits us.
msg_zh: 直到不得善终的时刻到来。

msg: So. You killed Rykard?
msg_zh: ……看来你杀害了拉卡德。

msg: I harbour you no ill will. The strong take. Such is our code.
msg_zh: 我无意出言责备，\n弱肉强食是我们的规矩。

msg: Even he was prepared to meet a wretched end when he first took blasphemy unto his very flesh.
msg_zh: 在投身亵渎之中的那一刻起，\n他应该也做好不得善终的心理准备。

msg: But anyroad, the Volcano Manor is no more.
msg_zh: ……但这样一来，火山官邸也就此落幕。

msg: Though we may yet fulfil an old promise.
msg_zh: 我该履行以前许下的约定了。

msg: We hunted our own kind, and took what was theirs.
msg_zh: ……我狩猎了不少同胞，也抢夺了不少力量。

msg: And with everything in hand, the time has come to rise, against the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 这一切都是为了对黄金树举剑相向，\n时机已经成熟。

msg: O Greater Will, hear my voice.
msg_zh: ……无上意志啊，仔细听好。

msg: I am the recusant Bernahl, inheritor of my brother's will, and you will fall to my blade.
msg_zh: 我“叛律者”贝纳尔继承了挚友的遗志，\n决意要让你溃不成形。

msg: We refuse to become your pawns. Consider this fair warning.
msg_zh: 我们不会沦为你手掌心的傀儡，\n你很快就能亲身领教。

msg: Who are you?
And what in heaven's name are you doing here?
msg_zh: 为什么来这种地方？

msg: The Volcano Manor is a pit of recusants who spit at grace and hunt our own kind.
msg_zh: 火山官邸是亵渎赐福、\n狩猎同胞的叛律者聚集的巢穴。

msg: I hope you understand the weight of my words.
msg_zh: 你懂这代表什么吗？

msg: Well. As long as you understand what you're saying.
msg_zh: ……明白的话，我不多说。

msg: You have harboured doubts from the very beginning.
msg_zh: 原本你就心存迷惘，

msg: Perhaps this day was always lurking on the horizon.
msg_zh: 会走到这一步也是必然吧。

msg: But know that the path you walk is blasphemy, and leads only to a miserable death.
msg_zh: 但参与亵渎，最后只会不得善终，

msg: Before you consider hunting any of your own kind, think on that.
msg_zh: 劝你狩猎同胞之前，先仔细思考。

msg: Then you must leave immediately.
msg_zh: ……那就立刻离开。

msg: Those with weak stomachs have no place here.
msg_zh: 没有决心叛律的家伙，只会碍手碍脚。

msg: I thought I told you to leave.
msg_zh: ……我说了立刻离开吧？

msg: Or do you claim to understand?
msg_zh: ……还是你真的明白？

msg: What it means to be a recusant, renouncing grace and hunting down one's own.
msg_zh: 成为亵渎赐福、狩猎同胞的叛律者，代表着什么？

msg: Well. As long as you understand what you're saying.
msg_zh: ……明白的话，我不多说。

msg: But know that the path you walk is blasphemy, and leads only to a miserable death.
msg_zh: 参与亵渎，最后只会不得善终，

msg: Before you consider hunting any of your own kind, think on that.
msg_zh: 劝你狩猎同胞之前，先仔细思考。

msg: Oh, a brew, is it?
msg_zh: ……哦，是酒啊。

msg: Thanking me for the battle arts?
msg_zh: 这是传承战技给你的谢礼吗？

msg: You're one of the good ones. Thank you.
msg_zh: 礼数真周到，那我不客气了。

msg: Oh, a brew, is it?
msg_zh: ……哦，是酒啊。

msg: Fitting, I suppose.
msg_zh: ……确实，对沉醉于亵渎的叛律者来说，

msg: For a recusant already drunk on blasphemy.
msg_zh: 酒说不定是很适合的礼物。

msg: <sleeping>
Agh!
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: What's wrong with you?
msg_zh: 你这是做什么？

msg: I won't say it twice. Stop this.
msg_zh: 好话不说第二遍，住手吧。

msg: I suppose I have no choice, then.
msg_zh: ……不得不战吗？

msg: Is this what grace would have of us?
msg_zh: 赐福啊，这也是指引吗？

msg: Dog eat dog, once again. A sad lot, we Tarnished.
msg_zh: 又是互相残杀的肤浅作为，\n这就是我们褪色者……

msg: You are an enigma, to be certain.
msg_zh: ……你这人有意思……

msg: The Volcano Manor awaits you.
msg_zh: 去火山官邸吧……

msg: You're Tarnished, aren't you?
msg_zh: ……阁下是褪色者吗？

msg: I welcome you, to the Church of Vows.
msg_zh: 欢迎来到结缘教堂。

msg: I am Miriel, steward of this sacred chamber.
msg_zh: 我名叫米利耶，负责管理这座教堂。

msg: My apologies, for the unseemly state of affairs.
msg_zh: 只是任它荒废成这副模样，着实令人汗颜……

msg: Do you know the origin of this place?
msg_zh: 在这里，想请教阁下是否听过？

msg: How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?
msg_zh: 关于这座结缘教堂，背后有什么样的故事。

msg: Well, that is a shame. But who can blame you?
msg_zh: 啊，阁下不清楚啊。这也是很自然的事情。

msg: The Shattering has caused us - all of us - to lose sight of something very dear.
msg_zh: 毕竟在爆发破碎战争之后，\n人们都遗忘了那些重要的事情。

msg: It is here, at the Church of Vows, that the great houses of the Erdtree and the Moon were joined.
msg_zh: 过去黄金树与月，双方王室为求和平共存──

msg: By the matrimonial bond between red-haired Radagon and Rennala of the Full Moon.
msg_zh: “红发”拉达冈与“满月”蕾娜菈，\n两位大人就是在这座教堂缔结契约。

msg: And so, our church holds in view the monuments of both houses.
msg_zh: 至今这座教堂与王城黄金树，\n以及雷亚卢卡利亚学院仍有所联系，

msg: The Erdtree of the Capital, and the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 也是出自这个原因。

msg: Oh, was there something you needed?
msg_zh: 啊，这么说来，阁下有什么事吗？

msg: You are free to show yourself around.
msg_zh: 如果阁下的目的是参观，就请随意。

msg: I would serve as your guide, only my legs aren't what they used to be...
msg_zh: 我的脚已经不方便行走，\n没办法领着阁下四处介绍……

msg: If you find anything of use, you are free to take it with you.
msg_zh: 如果看到需要的物品，不必介意，带走它吧。

msg: Unless perhaps you are in search of instruction?
msg_zh: 还是说，阁下是为了学问而来呢？

msg: In which case, I will share all that I know.
msg_zh: 真是如此，我愿意倾囊相授。

msg: Whether it be sorcery or incantations, learning should not fetter you to one side or the other.
msg_zh: 魔法也好，祷告也罢──学问不分高低。

msg: This is, after all, a church celebrating the union of two such opposed practitioners.
msg_zh: 在两者结合的地方，这道理更是自然。

msg: Is there something else?
msg_zh: ……怎么了？还有什么事吗？

msg: Greetings. Do you need anything?
msg_zh: ……您好啊，有什么事呢？

msg: Do you possess any celestial dew?
msg_zh: ……阁下持有星星泪滴吗？

msg: Then I would like to share my knowledge with you.
msg_zh: 既然如此，那我需要告诉阁下──

msg: Concerning the miracle of this Church of Vows.
msg_zh: 关于这座结缘教堂所蕴藏的奇迹。

msg: Radagon once cleansed himself with celestial dew,
msg_zh: 在过去，拉达冈大人用星星泪滴沐浴自身，

msg: repented his territorial aggressions, and swore his love to Rennala.
msg_zh: 此举是为侵略战争真心忏悔，\n同时也是立誓，对蕾娜菈大人的爱永志不渝。

msg: The Order of the Erdtree and the fate of the moon were conjoined, and all the wounds of war forgiven.
msg_zh: 在黄金树律法与月之命运结合之际，\n所有的一切，包含纷争带来的伤害，就回归于零。

msg: This miracle blesses the church to this day.
msg_zh: 之后，那奇迹就一直留存在这座教堂里。

msg: And so, you need only follow Radagon's example,
msg_zh: 只要拉达冈大人做过的，阁下照着做──

msg: to restore any bond, however strained or severed, to its rightful state of harmony.
msg_zh: 那产生裂痕、难以修复的人际关系，\n想必也能重回安稳的状态吧。

msg: My faith does not waver.
msg_zh: ……我坚信不移──

msg: The miracle rooted in these grounds will, once again, mend the world.
msg_zh: 总有一天，蕴藏在这块土地的奇迹，\n能够再一次将世界连系起来。

msg: And this time, its bounty will not be squandered.
msg_zh: 而且这一次，毁约之事不会再发生。

msg: If you would be Elden Lord, Tarnished,
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，如果阁下当上了艾尔登之王，

msg: I hope that you, too, will share my faith.
msg_zh: 请成为有如此作为的王者吧。

msg: Are you taking the sword with you?
msg_zh: ……阁下想带走那把剑吗？

msg: Oh, fear not, I don't wish to chide you.
msg_zh: 啊，不是，我没有责问的意思。

msg: Clearly, you are no conniving thief.
msg_zh: 阁下不可能是可鄙的梁上君子，

msg: The sword is telling us something, no doubt.
msg_zh: 既然如此，那肯定是剑本身想离开此处。

msg: Rather than collect dust in the shadows underground,
msg_zh: 与其被供奉在无人出入的地下室，

msg: it yearns to be wielded by your rightful hand.
msg_zh: 那把剑更希望阁下正确地使用它。

msg: Ah, now I recall.
msg_zh: ……相信肯定是如此。

msg: As the priest of the Church of Vows, I undo the sword's seal, and bequeath it unto you.
msg_zh: 我身为结缘教堂的神父，\n愿意解除剑的封印，把它交给阁下。

msg: May you hold it high and proud.
msg_zh: 请大方地挥舞那把剑吧。

msg: Are you quite finished?
msg_zh: ……您冷静下来了吗？

msg: Take this opportunity to learn to master your emotions.
msg_zh: 请趁这次机会，学会控制自己的情绪。

msg: Worry not, I take no offence. But others are not always so forgiving.
msg_zh: 我倒是无妨，但相同情况发生在其他人身上，

msg: Some take to anger, others sorrow... Bonds are fragile things, wont to break under strain.
msg_zh: 有些人会生气，有些人会难过……\n人际关系会产生裂痕，或是陷入难以修复的境地。

msg: And once they're broken, everything is lost, with naught to gain.
msg_zh: 这对阁下而言，绝对是有害无益。

msg: Are you quite finished?
msg_zh: ……您冷静下来了吗？

msg: I suppose my ample frame must have given you quite the fright.
msg_zh: 看到身形巨大的生物，想必让阁下吓了一跳。

msg: Allow me to introduce myself. Miriel, steward of this sacred chamber.
msg_zh: 请容我自我介绍──\n我名叫米利耶，负责管理这座教堂。

msg: My apologies, for the unseemly state of affairs.
msg_zh: 只是任它荒废成这副模样，着实令人汗颜……

msg: Do you know the origin of this place?
msg_zh: 在这里，想请教阁下是否听过？

msg: How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?
msg_zh: 关于这座结缘教堂，背后有什么样的故事。

msg: Are you quite finished, now?
msg_zh: ……您冷静下来了吗？

msg: To experience the miracle, kneel in the basin at the back, and cleanse yourself with celestial dew.
msg_zh: ……如果阁下期盼奇迹发生，\n请到里头的水池中跪下，用星星泪滴沐浴自身。

msg: Absolution will be yours. Any bond, no matter how strained, or even severed, will be put to rights.
msg_zh: 此举为赎罪──那产生裂痕、难以修复的人际关系，\n想必也能重回安稳的状态吧。

msg: Ah, I see you have undergone absolution, the miracle that blossoms from these grounds.
msg_zh: ……我注意到阁下蒙受这块土地的奇迹，完成了赎罪。

msg: Good. As such, the bond you may have strained or severed...
msg_zh: 没错。如此一来，阁下那产生裂痕、难以修复的人际关系，

msg: Has been restored, to its rightful state of harmony.
msg_zh: 想必已经重回安稳的状态。

msg: Be mindful, not to take for granted...
msg_zh: ……奇迹带来的安稳时光，

msg: the serenity restored by this miracle.
msg_zh: 请阁下好好珍惜。

msg: And take care. Never to break a bond again.
msg_zh: 并请多留意，别让憾事再次发生。

msg: You wish to know more of Lord Radagon?
msg_zh: ……您想知道关于拉达冈大人的事情啊。

msg: Lord Radagon was a great champion, possessed of flowing red locks.
msg_zh: 拉达冈大人是有着一头飘逸红发的英雄。

msg: He came to these lands at the head of a great golden host, when he met Lady Rennala in battle.
msg_zh: 他率领黄金树的军队来到此地，\n在战场上邂逅了蕾娜菈大人。

msg: He soon repented his territorial aggressions though, and became husband to the Carian Queen.
msg_zh: 随后对发起侵略战争一事真心忏悔，\n和卡利亚女王，蕾娜菈大人结为伴侣。

msg: However. When Godfrey, first Elden Lord, was hounded from the Lands Between,
msg_zh: ……但是在初始艾尔登之王，葛孚雷被逐出交界地之后，

msg: Radagon left Rennala to return to the Erdtree Capital, becoming Queen Marika's second husband and King Consort.
msg_zh: 拉达冈大人抛弃了蕾娜菈大人，回到黄金树王城，\n成为玛莉卡女王的王夫、第二任丈夫……

msg: Taking the title...of second Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 也成为第二任的艾尔登之王。

msg: The mystery endures, to this day...
msg_zh: 这件事情依旧成谜──

msg: As to why Lord Radagon would cast Lady Rennala aside...
msg_zh: 为了什么原因，拉达冈大人抛弃蕾娜菈大人？

msg: And moreover...why a mere champion would be chosen for the seat of Elden Lord...
msg_zh: 又话说从头，拉达冈大人不过是位英雄，\n为什么会被选为艾尔登之王呢？

msg: You know, it's said that Lord Radagon harboured a secret...
msg_zh: ……不过，关于拉达冈大人……\n我曾听说一个关于他的秘密。

msg: A famed sculptor of the Erdtree Capital was once summoned to render Lord Radagon's likeness in giant stature.
msg_zh: 黄金树王城里有一位知名的雕刻家，\n受王室委托，制作拉达冈大人的大型雕像……

msg: When he glimpsed the skeleton in Radagon's closet.
msg_zh: 听说他因此窥见了那个秘密。

msg: And as such, it's said the great statue harbours his secret too.
msg_zh: 又听说，那座大型雕像藏着那个秘密。

msg: You wish to know more of Lady Rennala?
msg_zh: ……您想知道关于蕾娜菈大人的事情啊。

msg: She is Queen, head of the Carian royal family, and governor of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 蕾娜菈大人是卡利亚王室的女王，\n也是雷亚卢卡利亚学院的掌权者。

msg: The great and beautiful Full Moon Witch.
msg_zh: 一名既伟大又美丽的“满月”魔法师。

msg: Sadly, her heart was broken when Lord Radagon left her.
msg_zh: 但是啊，自从丈夫拉达冈大人抛弃了她，\n她就失去了自己的心。

msg: And then, when the academy rebelled against the royals, she was locked away in the grand library.
msg_zh: 在学院背叛王室的时候，她被囚禁在大书库里头。

msg: In the end, Lady Rennala was left alone, cradling the amber egg Lord Radagon bequeathed her.
msg_zh: ……事情发生之后，蕾娜菈大人仰赖着\n拉达冈大人赠予的琥珀卵，度过每一日。

msg: Now she devotes herself to it through forbidden rite;
msg_zh: 将自己的一切奉献在不容于世的法术上──

msg: the grim art of reincarnation.
msg_zh: 那恐怖无比的，重新诞生的秘术。

msg: You would do well to remember...
msg_zh: ……希望阁下能记得，

msg: Severing a vow, strongest of bonds, has consequences ever more dire.
msg_zh: 在结下缘分之后遭到反悔，\n所带来的伤害是难以估计啊。

msg: Why, this is nectar, is it not?
msg_zh: ……哦，这是……是甘露啊。

msg: And you're giving it to me?
msg_zh: 阁下要送给我吗？

msg: Oh, wonderful, just wonderful.
msg_zh: 哦哦，真令人喜上眉梢。

msg: Truth be told, I'm rather fond of the stuff.
msg_zh: 老实说，我非常喜爱甘露。

msg: I'll happily take it off your hands!
msg_zh: 恕我不推辞了。

msg: <sleeping>
Oh, what have we here?
msg_zh: ……哦，这确实不错。

msg: Very well, let us both learn together.
msg_zh: 让我们一同学习，教学相长吧。

msg: Heresy is not native to the world; it is but a contrivance.
msg_zh: ……这个世界原本没有异端，

msg: All things can be conjoined.
msg_zh: 所有的一切都能结合、互融。

msg: Mngh!
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: Stop it, please.
msg_zh: 阁下，请停手。

msg: My flesh is akin to stone.
msg_zh: 我的身体和石头没有两样。

msg: I cannot be wounded. I cannot die.
msg_zh: 我既不会受伤，也不会死亡。

msg: But nor will I cause any harm unto you.
msg_zh: 当然，我更不会伤害阁下。

msg: Cease your futile efforts.
msg_zh: 请阁下不要走冤枉路。

msg: Well, aren't we determined.
msg_zh: ……阁下不肯放弃啊。

msg: Aaa...aaargh!
msg_zh: 呀啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

msg: What are you lookin' at?
msg_zh: ……啊？你谁啊？

msg: You trying to start something, mate?
msg_zh: 你有事吗？看什么看？

msg: Oh, that necklace what you're after, is it?
msg_zh: ……哦，你想要那条项链啊？

msg: Hmm, well…
msg_zh: 哼，你想要啊……

msg: Show me what it's worth to you,
msg_zh: ……那总该表现出一点诚意吧？

msg: and I'll consider parting ways with it.
msg_zh: 看情况，说不定我愿意卖给你喔。

msg: I'm not in love with it or nothing.
msg_zh: 反正那玩意儿也是随手拿到的。

msg: You're a shrewd one, chief.
msg_zh: ……很会听话嘛。

msg: First, you hand me the runes. And don't try nothing, neither.
msg_zh: 先把卢恩交过来，劝你少耍花招。

msg: Hmm...
Alright. Take it.
msg_zh: 好吧，东西拿去。

msg: Thing's no damn use to anyone, anyway.
msg_zh: 那本来就是没路用的东西……
