msg: Your bloody idea, mate. Don't come crying to me later.
msg_zh: 你自己找上门来谈的，不关我的事啊。

msg: Oh piss off, what is it now?
msg_zh: ……啊？你又要干么？

msg: Oh, I see. You want some of me prawn?
msg_zh: ……啊，是喔。你想吃虾子啊？

msg: Freshly cooked, it is.
msg_zh: 是啦，虾子是刚煮好……

msg: Alright then. It's yours, if you can meet me price.
msg_zh: 知道啦。东西我可以卖给你，\n但是该给我的，拿出来。

msg: I could be persuaded to sell you some other bits too, if you've got the runes.
msg_zh: 还有其他想要的，可以问我。

msg: What the hell is wrong with you.
msg_zh: ……你是怎样？

msg: You trying to start something?
msg_zh: 站在那干么？

msg: Piss off. Before I crack you in 'alf.
msg_zh: ……宰了你喔，滚啦。

msg: This bloody swine...
msg_zh: ……啊？你干么？

msg: Decided to play ball now, 'ave you?
msg_zh: 想表现诚意了吗？

msg: You'll be wantin' the necklace, then?
msg_zh: 你不是想要那条项链吗？

msg: Think you're bloody clever, do ya?
msg_zh: ……听不懂人家的意思喔？

msg: Then how about you piss off?
msg_zh: 那就快滚。

msg: fore I crack you in 'alf.
msg_zh: 小心我宰了你。

msg: Marika's tits, you must be 'ungry.
msg_zh: ……是怎样，你还吃不够喔？

msg: Alright mate. Want some more prawn, do ya?
msg_zh: 哦，是你啊。又跑来买虾子了吗？

msg: Alright mate. Still 'ungry, are ya?
msg_zh: 哦，是你啊。又想吃了吗？

msg: Never met someone with a taste for prawn I couldn't trust.
msg_zh: ……喜欢虾子的，绝对没坏人。

msg: We'd make good mates, I reckon.
msg_zh: 我应该跟你合得来。

msg: I'll be seeing ya.
msg_zh: 再见啦。

msg: Oh, so you met the girl, did ya?
msg_zh: ……搞什么，你认识那女的喔？

msg: Alright, well, sod the particulars of the matter,
msg_zh: ……就不用往下讲了。

msg: But it ain't my fault she's stupid enough to get duped, is it.
msg_zh: 管他怎样，都是被骗的人有错啦。

msg: Anyway, she ain't all right, that one.
msg_zh: 只是那女的真的怪怪的。

msg: Lucky she ain't died on the bloody roadside, I reckon.
msg_zh: 唉，也好啦，至少她没有死在路边。

msg: You're Tarnished too, ain'tcha?
msg_zh: ……你也是褪色者吧？

msg: Can you see it then? The guidance of grace, I mean.
msg_zh: 那你看得到吗？那个赐福的指引。

msg: I can't see it at all no more.
msg_zh: 我完全看不到。

msg: Makes no bloody sense anyway, why some no-name shithead like me should get called to the Lands Between.
msg_zh: 说起来，像我这种小混混因为指引跑来这，

msg: Cruel bloody joke, you ask me.
msg_zh: 这件事本身就很可笑。

msg: Maybe something went tits up with it. Maybe... it's been broke for a good long time.
msg_zh: 搞不好安排这些事的，早就没救了。

msg: The Erdtree, I'm sayin'.
msg_zh: 就是说那个黄金树啦。

msg: You what? Sod the particulars, mate.
msg_zh: ……啊？不用往下问啦。

msg: Ain't my fault people are so bloody stupid, is it?
msg_zh: 管他怎样，都是被骗的人有错啦。

msg: Don't like that it's stolen? Don't sodding buy it...
msg_zh: 不想买赃物？那就不要买啊。

msg: What are you lookin' at?
msg_zh: ……啊？你谁啊？

msg: Oh...you again, is it.
msg_zh: 呃，是你喔。

msg: Perfect bloody timing, actually.
msg_zh: 那你来得正好，

msg: I got crab, cooked up fresh.
msg_zh: 这一次是螃蟹刚煮好喔。

msg: Marika's tits, you must be 'ungry.
msg_zh: ……是怎样，你还吃不够喔？

msg: Alright mate. Want some more crab, do ya?
msg_zh: 哦，是你啊。又跑来买螃蟹了吗？

msg: Alright mate. Still 'ungry, are ya?
msg_zh: 哦，是你啊。又想吃了吗？

msg: Never met someone with a taste for crab I couldn't trust.
msg_zh: ……会喜欢螃蟹的，全都是好人。

msg: We've got a real thing here, eh, and it's only gettin' better.
msg_zh: 我们同一挂的，以后交流一下啊。

msg: Mate, there's somethin' I should probably tell ya.
msg_zh: ……还是跟你说一下好了。

msg: You 'eard of the Dung Eater?
msg_zh: 你知道食粪者吗？

msg: E's a madman, 'as it out for everyone. Curses 'em. Goes 'round in this rank armour, an' all.
msg_zh: 就是那个穿着恶心、丑死人的铠甲，\n诅咒世间的疯子。

msg: You see 'im though, stay well away.
msg_zh: 要是碰到他，千万不要靠近他。

msg: I was in the same gaol as him, once, so I know first 'and.
msg_zh: ……以前我跟他关在同一间牢房，所以我知道。

msg: E's a god-forsaken monster. Not just some petty thug like me.
msg_zh: 那家伙跟我这种小混混不一样，\n是很恐怖的男人。

msg: E's a killer. Kills people and curses their souls...
msg_zh: ……那家伙会为了对灵魂设下永恒诅咒而杀人，

msg: Does all sorts of shit to their corpses, to keep 'em cursed, forever.
msg_zh: 会用自己的诅咒布满整个尸体，玷污尸体。

msg: I ain't seen nothin' more disgustin' in all my years.
msg_zh: ……我不曾看过那么恶心的景象。

msg: I ain't ever been more scared, neither. Rooted to the bloody spot...
msg_zh: 看得我怕到只能像小鬼头一样躲在旁边。

msg: While 'e did all that, to my friend...
msg_zh: ……明明那个被玷污的，还是我朋友。

msg: Yeah...and now I seen it 'ere, again.
msg_zh: ……对，我又看到了──

msg: Never thought I would. What 'e does to those bodies.
msg_zh: 被玷污的尸体。\n那绝对不想再看到第二次的东西。

msg: It was... It was 'im, no question.
msg_zh: 只有食粪者会干这种事，

msg: That monster. He's lurkin' round 'ere.
msg_zh: 那恐怖的男人居然在这附近闲晃。

msg: Heh...serves me right.
msg_zh: ……哈，丢脸啊。

msg: Fitting bloody end, for a jumped up little shit with big ideas...
msg_zh: 自以为是的小混混，\n最后的下场还不就这样？

msg: Help me out, would ya, mate...
msg_zh: ……喂，救救我啊。

msg: I don't wanna get cursed. Just let me die...
msg_zh: 我不怕死，但我不想被诅咒，

msg: I don't wanna live like this...not anymore...
msg_zh: 我想在下辈子当个走在正路上的人啊……

msg: So, please...
msg_zh: 喂，求求你……

msg: Oof!
msg_zh: 哇。

msg: What's your blinkin' problem!
msg_zh: 你搞什么鬼！

msg: You don't mess with Big Boggart, mate.
msg_zh: 知道我是“愚弄巨妖”，还动手吗！

msg: That bitch put you up to this, eh.
msg_zh: ……看这样子，你是收钱帮那女的办事？

msg: Damn it! I'll rip you to shreds!
msg_zh: 那就来打啊！混账！

msg: Not scared, are ya.
msg_zh: ……啧，果然听了也没在怕。

msg: Damn it! I'll rip you to shreds!
msg_zh: 那就来打啊！混账！

msg: You feel that, eh?
msg_zh: ……懂了没啊？

msg: That's the fists of Big Boggart.
msg_zh: 我“愚弄巨妖”的拳头有多大。

msg: Goddamn it.
msg_zh: ……混账啦……

msg: Why ain't it me, why ain't it ever...
msg_zh: 其实我本来，本来也想……

msg: <sigh>
msg_zh: 呜……呜呜……

msg: Someone, please, kill him...
msg_zh: 有没有人啊？快杀了他吧……

msg: That horrendous serpent... Praetor Rykard...
msg_zh: 快杀了大蛇……快杀了拉卡德大人……

msg: Mm, you're Tarnished.
msg_zh: 呜……你是褪色者吧？

msg: Here to put the demigods to the sword.
msg_zh: 是挑战半神的人吧？

msg: Then please. Kill the great serpent.
msg_zh: 拜托，快杀了大蛇。

msg: The one that devoured Praetor Rykard.
msg_zh: 快杀了吃掉拉卡德大人的大蛇。

msg: I left the serpent-slaying spear in the Lord's Chamber.
msg_zh: 弒蛇的矛就放在谒见厅。

msg: Worthy Tarnished, brandish the spear, and run him through.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，快用那把矛刺穿大蛇吧……

msg: The great serpent...that unspeakable monstrosity.
msg_zh: 快杀了那可恶的怪物……

msg: Praetor Rykard's ambitions, though blasphemous, marked him a worthy sovereign.
msg_zh: ……以前拉卡德大人抱有亵渎的野心，\n那是霸王的雄心壮志。

msg: But they were reduced to gluttonous depravity, once he gave himself to the serpent.
msg_zh: 但是在大人被大蛇吃掉之后，\n那雄心壮志摇身一变，沦落成卑贱的贪欲。

msg: Whatever that thing is, it is no longer Praetor Rykard.
msg_zh: 那东西已经不是拉卡德大人了……

msg: Someone must kill him.
msg_zh: 必须杀了那东西。

msg: To spare him, and his ambitions, from further dishonour.
msg_zh: 不能再让那东西侮辱大人的名声与野心。

msg: Worthy Tarnished. I left the serpent-slaying spear in the Lord's Chamber.
msg_zh: 褪色者啊，弒蛇的矛就放在谒见厅。

msg: It is the only thing that can kill that horror.
msg_zh: 用那把矛才能杀死大蛇。

msg: Run it through. The great serpent...that unspeakable monstrosity...
msg_zh: 快刺穿那只大蛇吧……那可恶的怪物……

msg: You're Tarnished, aren't you?
msg_zh: ……你是不是褪色者？

msg: Then, perhaps you could spare some runes?
msg_zh: 既然是的话，方便分一些卢恩给我吗？

msg: Believe it or not, I studied glintstone sorceries at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 俗话说人不可貌相，\n我曾待过雷亚卢卡利亚学院，在那学习辉石魔法。

msg: For a small donation, I'd be happy to share my knowledge.
msg_zh: 只要你分卢恩给我，我可以教你魔法。

msg: Well, bless you, bless you.
msg_zh: 哦哦，感谢啊，太感谢了。

msg: You are a true saint.
msg_zh: 你真是好人。

msg: My name is Thops.
msg_zh: 我叫托普斯。

msg: Presuming you're interested, I can teach you sorceries, as promised.
msg_zh: 照我们说好的，如果你有兴趣学，\n我愿意教你魔法。

msg: Only, none of them are particularly great...
msg_zh: 只是我会的，也不是上得了台面的魔法……

msg: Back to learn another?
msg_zh: 又来学习了吗？

msg: Wonderful. You're most welcome, to any of my anaemic little spells.
msg_zh: 当然欢迎啊，只要你愿意学这些不起眼的魔法。

msg: Back to learn another?
msg_zh: 又来学习了吗？

msg: Why, of course.
msg_zh: 愿意学习，当然好。

msg: Well, I can't blame you, I suppose.
msg_zh: ……好吧，那只能作罢……

msg: But, in the case that you do change your mind,
msg_zh: 但如果你改变心意了，

msg: just speak up, loud and clear.
msg_zh: 再过来找我吧。

msg: Oh, there you are.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊。

msg: Care to donate a few runes?
msg_zh: 难道说，你愿意分一些卢恩给我了？

msg: Believe it or not, I studied glintstone sorceries at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 俗话说人不可貌相，\n我曾待过雷亚卢卡利亚学院，在那学习辉石魔法。

msg: For a small donation, I'd be happy to share my knowledge.
msg_zh: 只要你分卢恩给我，我可以教你魔法。

msg: Apologies, friend.
msg_zh: ……真是不好意思，

msg: I'm afraid my meagre sorceries are no match for your generosity.
msg_zh: 你好心分卢恩给我，\n我教的却是些上不了台面的魔法……

msg: Oh, right.
msg_zh: ……啊，既然如此，

msg: I can tell you what I know about this place. That should help a bit.
msg_zh: 不如这样吧。关于这块土地的事情，\n我把所知道的一切，全部告诉你。

msg: You've seen that structure to the north, towering over the water?
msg_zh: 从这里往北边看，有看到伫立在水平面的建筑吧？

msg: That's the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Where we study glintstone sorceries.
msg_zh: 那里就是雷亚卢卡利亚学院，辉石魔法师的学问殿堂。

msg: Only, its doors have been closed for quite some time now.
msg_zh: 但是学院已经封闭了很长一段岁月。

msg: After they declared they wouldn't interfere with the Shattering,
msg_zh: 为了贯彻不介入破碎战争的信条，

msg: the academy cast repelling seals on the east gate leading to the Capital and the south gate leading here.
msg_zh: 学院在面向王城的东门，\n还有通往这块土地的南门一同设下了魔法封印。

msg: As you might have guessed, the seals are still active,
msg_zh: ……封印直到现在都还没解开。

msg: making entry to the academy impossible without a glintstone key.
msg_zh: 只要没有辉石钥匙，就无法进入学院。

msg: And so I'm stuck here. A fledgling sorcerer, with little chance of acquiring a key.
msg_zh: ……对，我也回不去。像我这种低阶魔法师，\n辉石钥匙不是我能奢求的物品。

msg: When they cast the seals, I'd just popped out, and now I'm uprooted from my place of learning.
msg_zh: 施展封印的时候，我恰巧离开学院。\n我已经回不去那座学问殿堂了。

msg: Why not find yourself a glintstone key?
msg_zh: ……所以说，你先去找辉石钥匙吧。

msg: Without one, you can't pass through the academy,
msg_zh: 因为没有辉石钥匙，就进不了学院……

msg: and you'll never reach the Erdtree Capital.
msg_zh: 进不了学院，就到不了黄金树王城。

msg: And if you find an extra glintstone key, perhaps...
msg_zh: 然后，如果你除了自己要用的以外，\n还有找到另外一支辉石钥匙……

msg: Once you've tied up all your loose ends - and I can be very patient -
msg_zh: 不急，等到你的事情都办完之后就好……

msg: would you consider donating it to me?
msg_zh: 能不能把那支钥匙让给我？

msg: I know it. I'm a bluntstone. Nary a hint of talent for sorcery.
msg_zh: ……我很明白自己只是颗废石，\n丝毫没有施展魔法的才能。

msg: But still, my place is at the academy...
msg_zh: 但我还是想再回到那座学问殿堂……

msg: Oh, one more thing... Beware the Albinaurics...
msg_zh: 啊，还有就是……要注意白金之子。

msg: ...accursed souls born of a forbidden rite of the Eternal City.
msg_zh: 他们诞生自永恒之城的秘术，\n是一群受到诅咒的人──

msg: The curse withered the legs of the old, and silenced the tongues of the Frogs.
msg_zh: 脚渐渐消失的长者，不能言语的“青蛙”，\n他们全部受到了诅咒……

msg: And now they hold deep grudges for anyone left untouched.
msg_zh: 也怨恨那些身体健全的人。

msg: Thank you, kind soul.
msg_zh: ……谢谢你啊。

msg: For learning my paltry sorceries.
msg_zh: 你愿意学这些不起眼的魔法，我很感谢。

msg: I never imagined that a bluntstone like myself would have the chance to play teacher.
msg_zh: 从来没想过像我这种废石，也有机会教人魔法。

msg: Are you certain?
msg_zh: ……真的吗？

msg: You're willing to give your glintstone key to me?
msg_zh: 你真的要把辉石钥匙让给我？

msg: …My oh my!
msg_zh: ……哦哦，哦哦……！

msg: Thank you, thank you dearly.
msg_zh: 谢谢你，真的很谢谢你。

msg: Now I can go back to the academy.
msg_zh: 我又能再回到那座学问殿堂了，

msg: To resume my study...of glintstone sorceries, and the very stars.
msg_zh: 又能再探索辉石魔法……还有星星了……

msg: You've taken an apprenticeship with Sellen?
msg_zh: ……你也有和瑟濂学习魔法啊？

msg: Well, that is something.
msg_zh: 噢，这可是不得了的事。

msg: Sellen was well known. The most promising sorceress in the history of the academy.
msg_zh: 我当然知道她，她是学院有史以来的才女啊。

msg: I followed her at school, but there may as well have been an ocean between us.
msg_zh: 像我这种名不见经传的人，\n根本不会和她有交集。

msg: But Sellen was expelled from the academy.
msg_zh: ……只是她被逐出学院了。

msg: Accused of unthinkable treatment of certain sorcerers, under the name of the Graven Witch.
msg_zh: 因为“魔块魔女”的嫌疑──\n她被怀疑虐杀了大量人数的魔法师。

msg: I still don't believe the accusations.
msg_zh: ……这我实在无法置信。

msg: The illustrious Sellen would never do such things...
msg_zh: 那么惹人怜爱的女性，哪有可能做出那种事？

msg: Find yourself a glintstone key.
msg_zh: ……你先去找辉石钥匙吧。

msg: Without one, you can't pass through the academy,
msg_zh: 因为没有辉石钥匙，就进不了学院……

msg: and you'll never reach the Erdtree Capital.
msg_zh: 进不了学院，就到不了黄金树王城。

msg: Well, what's this?
msg_zh: ……哦，这个是……

msg: For me, is it? But surely, that's a passing fine brew?
msg_zh: 你要给我吗？这一定很珍贵吧？

msg: My meagre sorceries hardly warrant such a reward.
msg_zh: 我那些不起眼的魔法和它相比，\n感觉价值不对等啊……

msg: Oh, bless you.
msg_zh: 嗯，谢谢你。

msg: I'll save it for a special occasion.
msg_zh: 我会留在重要的时刻享用它。

msg: I may never have another drink like it for as long as I live.
msg_zh: 毕竟这辈子，这种酒可能就喝这么一次啊。

msg: So, you've found yourself a glintstone key.
msg_zh: ……你找到辉石钥匙了啊。

msg: But I certainly can't take it from you.
msg_zh: 但是那支钥匙，我不能收。

msg: That key belongs to you.
msg_zh: 那该由你使用。

msg: By rights, you should use it for yourself.
msg_zh: 为了你自己好，那该由你使用。

msg: It's true, I wish to return to my place of study.
msg_zh: ……没错，我很希望回到那座学问殿堂，

msg: But that's no excuse to impose upon others.
msg_zh: 但我不愿意自己达成了目的，却妨碍到其他人。

msg: Ah...is this why bluntstones always finish last?
msg_zh: ……唉，所以我才会一直都是废石吧。

msg: Head to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: ……快出发去雷亚卢卡利亚学院吧。

msg: Carry on with your journey. Press forward with your fight.
msg_zh: 踏上你的旅程，继续下一场战斗。

msg: Don't bother holding yourself up for my sake.
msg_zh: 不用把我的事放在心上。

msg: Thank you dearly.
msg_zh: ……谢谢你啊。

msg: With your blessing, I will depart for the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
msg_zh: 承蒙你的好意，我要动身前往雷亚卢卡利亚学院了。

msg: Perhaps, one day, you'll pay me a visit?
msg_zh: ……之后等你方便的时候，要不要再来学院一趟？

msg: Who knows, I may be a decorated sorcerer by then!
msg_zh: 到时候，你的老师可能会变得更厉害一些。

msg: Ha ha!
msg_zh: 哈哈。

msg: Oh, did I not mention?
msg_zh: ……我没有告诉过你吧。

msg: I'm a bluntstone. I don't even have a pebble's worth of power.
msg_zh: 我是废石──\n意思是完全没有施展魔法的才能。

msg: So I'm afraid I can't help you decipher the scroll.
msg_zh: 所以真的很不好意思……

msg: I'm sorry I'm so useless. I truly am.
msg_zh: 凭我的本事，没办法解读这个卷轴。

msg: Ow!
msg_zh: 啊。

msg: What's wrong with you?
msg_zh: 你怎么了？

msg: Stop that, now. Please.
msg_zh: 住手，住手啊。

msg: There's no getting through to you, is there.
msg_zh: ……听不进我说的话了吗？

msg: Why on earth...
msg_zh: ……为什么要做这种事……？

msg: Oh, Raya... Lucaria...
msg_zh: ……啊，雷亚卢、卡利亚……

msg: The home of my studies...
msg_zh: 我们的、学问殿堂……

msg: Be proud. You were a fine warrior.
msg_zh: 为自己骄傲吧，\n你确实是名优秀的战士。

msg: Your only mistake was your choice of master.
msg_zh: 只不过，跟随错了人。

msg: Let the winds lift you, to a higher place.
msg_zh: ……随风消逝，飘摇到遥远的巅峰吧。

msg: Well, who do we have here?
Tarnished, are you? Clearly not one of Godrick's lot.
msg_zh: 是褪色者啊，看起来不是葛瑞克的同伙。

msg: I am Nepheli Loux. Tarnished and warrior, like you.
msg_zh: 我叫涅斐丽·露。\n一样是褪色者，也是战士。

msg: I'm here by decree of my father.
msg_zh: 因为义父的命令来到这里。

msg: How utterly repellant this is.
msg_zh: ……话说回来，这真过分。

msg: This \"grafting\" of Godrick's ill befits a Lord.
msg_zh: 可恶的葛瑞克，竟然做出“接肢”行径，\n这绝不是君王该有的作为。

msg: He's tainted the very winds.
msg_zh: 连风都受到玷污。

msg: If you intend to challenge Godrick,
msg_zh: ……如果你准备挑战葛瑞克，

msg: I ask you call upon me.
msg_zh: 可以找我帮忙。

msg: The winds run foul with his deeds.
msg_zh: ……他玷污风，玷污得太过分。

msg: I'm certain father would permit me aid the fight.
msg_zh: 即使我出手帮忙，\n义父肯定也会睁一只眼，闭一只眼。

msg: Apologies, but I've idled long enough.
msg_zh: 抱歉，我太多话了。

msg: As fellow Tarnished we must each follow our own guidance.
msg_zh: 同为褪色者，就各自相信指引，往前走吧。

msg: Down whatever road takes us to the throne of Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 相信总有一天，\n路会通往艾尔登之王的宝座。

msg: You again...
I thought you'd receive a summons to the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 你果然也受邀到圆桌厅堂了。

msg: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.
msg_zh: 我是涅斐丽·露，\n在史东薇尔之后就没见过面了。

msg: I'm glad to see you here. I have something for you.
msg_zh: 幸好碰面了，我有东西要给你。

msg: I found it in Godrick's grafting grounds.
msg_zh: 那是我在葛瑞克的接肢房找到的。

msg: You defeated him. You should have it.
msg_zh: 既然打倒了葛瑞克，那就是你的。

msg: Make good use of it.
msg_zh: ……别拒收喔。

msg: I don't intend to make a habit of scavenging corpses.
msg_zh: 我可不想变成战场拾荒者。

msg: You again...
I thought you'd receive a summons to the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 你果然也受邀到圆桌厅堂了。

msg: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.
msg_zh: 我是涅斐丽·露，\n在史东薇尔之后就没见过面了。

msg: I'm glad to see you here. I have something for you.
msg_zh: 幸好碰面了，我有东西要给你。

msg: I found it in Godrick's grafting grounds.
msg_zh: 那是我在葛瑞克的接肢房找到的。

msg: You were the one to defeat him, I would hazard?
msg_zh: 打倒了葛瑞克的人是你吧？

msg: Make good use of it.
msg_zh: ……别拒收喔。

msg: I don't intend to make a habit of scavenging corpses.
msg_zh: 我可不想变成战场拾荒者。

msg: Ah, yes.
msg_zh: ……啊，对了。

msg: I wonder if you've met my foster father?
msg_zh: 你有见过我的义父吗？

msg: He's in his study. The room Ensha's guarding just over there.
msg_zh: 他现在人在书房，\n书房的门旁有恩夏先生站岗。

msg: If you haven't already, I advise you introduce yourself.
msg_zh: 如果还没见过面，可以去见见他。

msg: Father is leader of the Roundtable.
msg_zh: 义父是圆桌厅堂的领导人，

msg: I'm sure talking to him will be worth your while.
msg_zh: 与他交谈，想必能获益良多。

msg: It's about time I headed off.
msg_zh: ……那么，我该出发了。

msg: I'll see you again, warrior, should the fates deign it.
msg_zh: 战士啊，有缘再见。

msg: You again...
You received a summons to the Roundtable?
msg_zh: 你受邀到圆桌厅堂啊。

msg: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.
msg_zh: 我是涅斐丽·露，\n在史东薇尔之后就没见过面了。

msg: The pleasure's mine, as a fellow Tarnished, guided by grace to the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 同样是被引导、来到圆桌厅堂的褪色者，\n今后多指教了。

msg: Oh, hello.
I've not seen you here before.
msg_zh: 我第一次见到你。

msg: I am Nepheli Loux. Warrior.
msg_zh: 我是涅斐丽·露，是战士。

msg: Here by decree of my father.
msg_zh: 因为义父的命令来到这里。

msg: The pleasure's mine, as a fellow Tarnished, guided by grace to the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 同样是被引导、来到圆桌厅堂的褪色者，\n今后多指教了。

msg: Is that some kind of medicine?
msg_zh: ……那是某种药品吗？

msg: One that affects the heart, I'd wager.
msg_zh: 看起来是会对心理产生效用的类型。

msg: If it's what I think, I have no need of it.
msg_zh: 是的话，我不需要。

msg: I am a warrior.
msg_zh: 我涅斐丽·露是战士──

msg: I need no external aid.
msg_zh: 不论是对战斗的恐惧也好，\n或是陷入一时的迷惘也罢，

msg: Not to brave the horrors of battle. Nor to bolster my resolve.
msg_zh: 都该由我独自承受。

msg: Oh, it's you...
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Well, what do you make of it? What's happened to this village?
msg_zh: 这座村子的惨状，你怎么看？

msg: I witnessed a sight much the same, in my infancy.
msg_zh: ……我小时候，曾看过一样的景象。

msg: The oppression of the weak. Murder and pillage unchecked.
msg_zh: 弱者惨遭蹂躏、掠夺、杀害……

msg: A waking nightmare, made by men.
msg_zh: 人间炼狱的景象。

msg: But this time, I'm a woman grown.
msg_zh: ……但我已经不是当时那年幼的孩子，

msg: And though the suffering cannot be undone, I can still mete out justice.
msg_zh: 虽说为时已晚，但来报一箭之仇吧……

msg: Justice to the oppressors.
msg_zh: 对那群施暴的人。

msg: Let the scars I carve remind them. I am Nepheli Loux. Warrior.
msg_zh: 让他们知道，我涅斐丽·露是战士。

msg: Ah, you...
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Please, leave me be.
msg_zh: 抱歉，能让我静一静吗？

msg: It's pathetic, I know, but I...need to think.
msg_zh: 说来丢脸，我现在思绪很乱。

msg: ...So you know already, do you?
msg_zh: ……你听说了啊。

msg: Right. It's true. My father cast me out.
msg_zh: 对，没错。我被义父抛弃了。

msg: For indulging my emotions. Forgetting the mission. Punishment for offing his pawns.
msg_zh: 这是沉浸在情绪里，忘记命令……\n害他手中的棋子折损的惩罚。

msg: Father...rather, Lord Gideon has offered me guidance all my life.
msg_zh: ……我的义父基甸爵士，一直是我的明灯。

msg: I would have done anything for him, to place him on the throne of Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 只要能让他当上艾尔登之王，\n我什么都愿意做。

msg: And yet I... Though it was not my intent...
msg_zh: 但是，我……

msg: I betrayed him...
msg_zh: 我还是背叛他了。

msg: I...can no longer trust in father...
msg_zh: ……而且我已经无法完全信任义父……

msg: To think he'd order his men to enact such tragedy...
msg_zh: 既然那些人是遵从义父的命令，引发那桩惨剧，

msg: Where is the justice he purports, in that?
msg_zh: 那么，义父哪有正义可言？

msg: He once told me that if he became Elden Lord,
msg_zh: 义父曾说过，只要他当上艾尔登之王，

msg: he would never allow the downtrodden to be cheated ever again.
msg_zh: 在他的治理之下，弱者将不再受欺凌──

msg: Was he simply lying to me?
msg_zh: 难道那句话是谎话？

msg: No, no, no...
msg_zh: ……唉，不对，不是这样。

msg: How could I say that?
msg_zh: 忘了我说的话吧。

msg: Father has always given me his guidance...
msg_zh: 义父是我的明灯。

msg: And now...I've lost it...
msg_zh: 但现在，我失去了他……

msg: Medicine, is it?
msg_zh: ……那是药品吗？

msg: Fine. I'll take a dose. Perhaps it'll do me some good.
msg_zh: 嗯，现在的我，可能会需要。

msg: It's very sweet...isn't it...
msg_zh: ……这原来这么香甜啊。

msg: And very...very...
msg_zh: 而且，非常……

msg: Is that ash?
msg_zh: ……这个是骨灰吗？

msg: I can smell the ancient storm in it...
msg_zh: 有一股古老风暴的味道。

msg: My thanks. I'll gladly take it.
msg_zh: 谢谢，我收下了。

msg: I'm...not like Roderika.
msg_zh: ……我和罗德莉卡不一样，

msg: I don't feel the presence of spirits, let alone see them.
msg_zh: 我看不见，也感应不到灵魂。

msg: Still, this ash...
msg_zh: 即使如此，看着这骨灰……

msg: It reminds me of my first hawk.
msg_zh: 还是会让我想起，我的第一只老鹰。

msg: Thank you.
msg_zh: 谢谢你。

msg: In this ash, I can smell the ancient storm.
msg_zh: ……这个骨灰有一股古老风暴的味道。

msg: It reminds me of my first hawk.
msg_zh: ……让我想起，我的第一只老鹰。

msg: It's been some time.
msg_zh: ……好久不见了。

msg: I must thank you, for your aid.
msg_zh: 那个时候，谢谢你的关照。

msg: I told father I would be with him no longer.
msg_zh: 没错，我已经告别了义父。

msg: I remembered the vow I took when I first became a warrior, so many moons ago.
msg_zh: 因为我想起很久以前，\n当上战士的时候，立下的誓言。

msg: This land is much like the one from which I hail.
msg_zh: ……这块土地很像我的故乡。

msg: I will call upon the storm, to drive away the foulness that has settled on the winds.
msg_zh: 我很想刮起风暴，吹散风中的污秽。

msg: Again, I am Nepheli Loux. Warrior.
msg_zh: 再次报上名号。\n我是涅斐丽·露，是战士。

msg: Some call me by the title of Lady, but I remain the same woman underneath.
msg_zh: 身边虽然有人唤我为王，\n但我的本质依旧不变。

msg: Though I have now abandoned my former guidance.
msg_zh: 唯一改变的，是我舍弃了引导的明灯。

msg: I cannot express how much you've helped me.
msg_zh: ……我很感谢你。

msg: Should you become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 如果是你当上艾尔登之王，

msg: I would gladly lighten your burden.
msg_zh: 我愿意化作你的其中一片羽翼。

msg: Farewell, fellow warrior.
msg_zh: ……再会了。

msg: I will remain, to summon the storm.
msg_zh: 我会继续待在这里，刮起风暴。

msg: But your guidance, and your fight...
msg_zh: 那引导你前进、战斗的地方……

msg: Surely lie elsewhere.
msg_zh: 应该不是这里。

msg: I will remain, to summon the storm.
msg_zh: 我会继续待在这里，刮起风暴。

msg: But your guidance, and your fight...
msg_zh: 那引导你前进、战斗的地方……

msg: Surely lie elsewhere.
msg_zh: 应该不是这里。
呜。

msg: What do you intend?
msg_zh: 这是做什么？

msg: Such conduct ill befits a warrior.
msg_zh: 这不是战士该有的作为。

msg: I see. You are but a simple villain.
msg_zh: ……原来是凶恶盗匪之流。

msg: Let the scars remind you; this lesson comes from Nepheli Loux!
msg_zh: 我涅斐丽·露，要让你明白是非。

msg: You wouldn't even register as a threat to father.
msg_zh: ……像你这种人，用不着义父动手。

msg: Hurry up and die.
msg_zh: 去死吧。

msg: Father... I am slain.
msg_zh: ……义父啊，我战败了。

msg: Please...become Elden Lord...
msg_zh: 请您当上、艾尔登之王……

msg: Hm.
A new face, are you?
msg_zh: 没看过你吶。

msg: Well, while you're here. Have you, too, been seduced by the good lady alcohol?
msg_zh: 不过来得正好，你对酒有没有兴趣啊？

msg: Perhaps you've heard of dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?
msg_zh: 而且不是普通的酒，\n是过去只有半神才能喝的甘露，也就是粹酒喔。

msg: Well, believe it or not, I know just how to make it.
msg_zh: 世事难料啊，其实贫僧对粹酒了解得透彻。

msg: And if you were to help me gather its ingredients,
msg_zh: 如果你能帮忙收集制酒的原料，

msg: I'd gladly share some with you.
msg_zh: 贫僧可以分给你一些。

msg: The Lands Between are no kind place for we Tarnished.
msg_zh: ……交界地对我们褪色者实在不算亲切，

msg: And I'm getting too old to keep scavenging corpses on the battlefield...
msg_zh: 大概因为年纪有了吧，\n这阵子到战场找原料，身体实在吃不消吶。

msg: You'll help me then?
msg_zh: 哦，这样啊！你愿意帮忙吗！

msg: Wonderful! Music to my ears.
msg_zh: 真好、真好。

msg: Then take this with you.
msg_zh: 那这东西，你拿着吧。

msg: That, is St. Trina's Crystal Ball.
msg_zh: 那东西叫作托莉娜水晶球，

msg: It can be used to take slumber fog from those submerged in deepest sleep,
msg_zh: 当你找到那群酣梦难醒的幸运儿，

msg: those merry fools sunk so low they will not awaken.
msg_zh: 可以用水晶球收集深眠浓雾。

msg: Dreambrew, I should say, is a special filtration of slumber fog.
msg_zh: 所谓的粹酒，是滤过深眠浓雾之后，\n生成的特殊液体吶。

msg: Go ahead and bring me some slumber fog, my compeer.
msg_zh: ……帮个忙，去收集深眠浓雾吧。

msg: About two should do it, by my reckoning...
msg_zh: 嗯，再收集２个……

msg: About three should do it, by my reckoning...
msg_zh: 嗯，再收集３个……

msg: About four should do it, by my reckoning...
msg_zh: 嗯，再收集４个……

msg: About five should do it, by my reckoning...
msg_zh: 嗯，再收集５个……

msg: About six should do it, by my reckoning...
msg_zh: 嗯，再收集６个……

msg: And then I'll have enough dreambrew to share.
msg_zh: 贫僧可以考虑分给你一些粹酒。

msg: Drink is a wonderful teacher. Imbibe and you will understand; this world's delights, and its futility.
msg_zh: ……酒可是好东西，\n让人体会人生在世的喜悦，还有美妙之处吶。

msg: You what? You hardly know what you're missing out on.
msg_zh: 怎么！你也太不知趣了吶！

msg: Well, suit yourself. But I'm sure you'll be after a drink before long.
msg_zh: 唉，也算啦。\n以后你会主动来问酒的事情。

msg: Perhaps you'll tire of this crumbling world...
msg_zh: 当你对逐渐步向毁灭的世间感到厌烦，或是……

msg: Or maybe you'll wish to uncover someone's deepest, darkest secrets...
msg_zh: 当你想知道其他人心底的秘密吶……

msg: What? Taken an interest in the finer things, after all?
msg_zh: 怎么了吶？你有兴趣了吗？

msg: Like dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?
msg_zh: 那个只有半神才能喝的甘露，也就是粹酒。

msg: Well, believe it or not, I know just how to make it.
msg_zh: 世事难料啊，其实贫僧对粹酒了解得透彻。

msg: And if you were to help me gather its ingredients,
msg_zh: 如果你能帮忙收集制酒的原料，

msg: I'd gladly share some with you.
msg_zh: 贫僧可以考虑分给你一些。

msg: What do you say?
msg_zh: 怎么样吶？

msg: Ah, I've been eagerly awaiting your return.
msg_zh: 哦，等你好久啦。

msg: How did you fare? Find any slumber fog?
msg_zh: 事情办得怎么样？有收集到深眠浓雾吗？

msg: Hmm, not quite enough.
msg_zh: ……这样还不够吶。

msg: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need two doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
msg_zh: 贫僧也说了，想分到粹酒，\n还要再收集２个浓雾吶。

msg: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need three doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
msg_zh: 贫僧也说了，想分到粹酒，\n还要再收集３个浓雾吶。

msg: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need four doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
msg_zh: 贫僧也说了，想分到粹酒，\n还要再收集４个浓雾吶。

msg: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need five doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
msg_zh: 贫僧也说了，想分到粹酒，\n还要再收集５个浓雾吶。

msg: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need six doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
msg_zh: 贫僧也说了，想分到粹酒，\n还要再收集６个浓雾吶。

msg: I see, I see. You have what I asked.
msg_zh: ……唔、嗯，这就对啦。

msg: All splendid fogs of superior quality. Sediment firmly settled, mm.
msg_zh: 每个浓雾都很纯净无瑕，也有漂亮的沉淀物。

msg: Good work, my compeer.
msg_zh: ……辛苦你啦。

msg: Here's the dreambrew I promised. All yours.
msg_zh: 来，这是说好要给你的粹酒，收下吧。

msg: Bring me more slumber fog, my compeer.
msg_zh: ……再帮个忙，多收集一些深眠浓雾吧。

msg: Do so, and I'll have a bottle of dreambrew with your name on it.
msg_zh: 这样贫僧就能再分给你粹酒喔。

msg: Allow me a little advice, my compeer.
msg_zh: ……贫僧想给你一个建议。

msg: Dreambrew is known to drag people's secrets into the daylight.
msg_zh: 粹酒能揭露秘密。

msg: If that's what you seek, rather than the usual fleeting pleasures,
msg_zh: 所以说，和获得短暂的愉悦相比，\n如果你更希望知道他人的秘密，

msg: Then treat them to some dreambrew.
msg_zh: 就让对方喝下粹酒吧。

msg: Secrets are like fine wine. The longer they mature in the dark, the richer the flavour...
msg_zh: ……秘密就好比老酒──越陈是越香吶。

msg: Know that, and all will be as you desire. Friendship, rule, intrigue...
msg_zh: 懂了这个道理，一切都能随心所欲啦。\n想要友情，想要支配，想要欺骗都行啊……

msg: Did you forget something?
msg_zh: ……有什么事吶？

msg: Oh, hello there.
msg_zh: 哦，是你啊。

msg: Have you brought me some more slumber fog?
msg_zh: 又带来深眠浓雾了吗？

msg: You certainly have a taste for spirits.
msg_zh: ……你还真喜欢酒吶。

msg: I'm sure I'll be seeing a lot more of you.
msg_zh: 看来之后，我们会很常打交道啊……

msg: As you surely know, my compeer, I am but a humble man of the cloth.
msg_zh: 你也知道，贫僧是虔诚的圣职人员。

msg: And I must profess, the study of alcohol is but another form of worship.
msg_zh: 对酒有多了解，就等同是祷告有多虔敬吶。

msg: Oh, St. Trina. My faith is in alcohol, and the hearts of men.
msg_zh: 哦，托莉娜。\n我的信仰生于酒，我的信仰生于人心吶。

msg: Ah, good to see you.
msg_zh: ……哦，是你呀。

msg: I heard the path to the Haligtree had been reopened.
msg_zh: 贫僧听说那通往圣树的路，\n原本封闭不通，现在再一次开放了。

msg: So I forced these old bones to weather the journey.
msg_zh: 所以才拚了老命赶来……

msg: Don't tell me it was you who opened the passage?
msg_zh: 看起来是你的功劳啊？

msg: Nevertheless, it's rather nippy in these lands, eh.
msg_zh: ……说起来，这片土地真够冷。

msg: But there's nothing like a good drink to warm the cockles...
msg_zh: 这时候该上场的，就是酒吶。

msg: Did you need something else?
msg_zh: ……你找贫僧，还有什么事吶？

msg: Oh it's, good, good to see you.
msg_zh: 唔、喔，是你啊。

msg: I think I was about to freeze solid.
msg_zh: 差那么一点就要冻僵了吶。

msg: You know, a holy personage was once abducted from these lands.
msg_zh: ……这块土地啊，曾经发生\n某位尊贵的大人被掳走的事情吶。

msg: Thus I am here in search of clues that might unravel the mystery.
msg_zh: 贫僧正在搜集相关的线索……

msg: The abductor's bloody footprints are said to have disappeared in the Forest of Ancient Bowers.
msg_zh: 据说那群贼人躲进古代树森林，\n贫僧在找寻他们留下血腥足迹。

msg: Hm? That's quite a face you're pulling...
msg_zh: 唔？瞧你一脸古怪。

msg: Need I remind you? Though I am but a humble man of the cloth,
msg_zh: 贫僧不是常挂嘴上吗？贫僧是虔诚的圣职人员……

msg: each of us has our secrets, my compeer.
msg_zh: 还有，人生在世，谁无秘密吶？

msg: You know, a holy personage was once abducted from these lands.
msg_zh: ……这块土地啊，曾经发生\n某位尊贵的大人被掳走的事情吶。

msg: Thus I am here in search of clues that might unravel the mystery.
msg_zh: 贫僧正在搜集相关的线索……

msg: The abductor's bloody footprints are said to have disappeared in the Forest of Ancient Bowers.
msg_zh: 据说那群贼人躲进古代树森林，\n贫僧在找寻他们留下血腥足迹。

msg: Finally, I have found it!
msg_zh: ……贫僧总算找到了。

msg: St. Trina's, no, Lord Miquella's cadaver.
msg_zh: 托莉娜，不对，\n总算找到您的身体了，米凯拉大人。

msg: I have partaken of untold secrets.
msg_zh: 贫僧遍尝了各种秘密，

msg: Such that I might aid you, O Lord.
msg_zh: 肯定能为您带来益处。

msg: So please, I hope you can welcome your humble servant Rhico,
msg_zh: 还请您允许贫僧里可，

msg: Into your dream, the world of your heart.
msg_zh: 进入您的梦，以及您的心中世界。

msg: Indeed, I beg you grant my wish,
msg_zh: 也请您允准──

msg: That when you transcend from empyrean to god, allow me a place by your side.
msg_zh: 在神人的您成为神的那个时候，\n请允许贫僧随侍您的身旁。

msg: I have partaken of untold secrets.
msg_zh: 贫僧遍尝了各种秘密，

msg: Such that I might aid you, O Lord.
msg_zh: 肯定能为您带来益处。

msg: So please, I hope you can welcome your humble servant Rhico,
msg_zh: 还请您允许贫僧里可，

msg: Into your dream, the world of your heart.
msg_zh: 进入您的梦，以及您的心中世界。

msg: Oh ho, are you asking me to partake?
msg_zh: ……哦，你送给贫僧啊。

msg: Well, I haven't got a clue what to think.
msg_zh: 这是脸皮够厚，毫无心机，\n还是出于全然的好意吶？

msg: Is this outright impudence? Simple callousness? Or genuine kindness, I wonder?
msg_zh: 真摸不透。

msg: Well, what matters it? I'll take some, regardless.
msg_zh: 唔、嗯，贫僧就收下吧。

msg: You couldn't possibly fathom the secrets I possess, my compeer.
msg_zh: 想来贫僧的秘密对你而言，\n可能也太过难解。
啊。

msg: Have you lost your marbles?
msg_zh: ……你是昏头了吗？

msg: You do know I'm merely a beggar.
msg_zh: 贫僧正如你所见，一贫如洗。

msg: I've nothing left to give.
msg_zh: 没有值钱的东西可抢。

msg: Haven't you Tarnished any respect?
msg_zh: ……真是受不了最近的褪色者……

msg: For those who came before you.
msg_zh: 就不能尊重前辈先进吗？

msg: Well, that knocked the wind out of me.
msg_zh: ……呼，没想到有点吃力吶。

msg: The perfect time to try that special reserve…
msg_zh: 拿珍藏的来喝一喝吧……

msg: You base, facile, uncharitable bastard…
msg_zh: ……恶劣，浮躁，短视……

msg: You're beyond help, my compeer…
msg_zh: 你完全无可救药……

msg: Welcome, dear guest.
msg_zh: ……客人啊，欢迎你。

msg: After being out there, it must be quite surprising,
msg_zh: 既然来自外地，\n想必入目的一切都令你惊叹吧？

msg: to see our capital, cradled by the Erdtree, showered by an eternal wellspring of grace.
msg_zh: 这座城市位在黄金树的树脚，\n沐浴在源源不绝的赐福之下──

msg: The sights, the sounds, the luscious scents. Each precisely as they should be. Each eternal.
msg_zh: 飘扬的乐音、芳香、光辉……\n一切都在正轨之上，在永恒之中。

msg: Oh?
I didn't notice that you were Tarnished.
msg_zh: 但仔细看来，你似乎是褪色者？

msg: Now, you mustn't take this the wrong way.
msg_zh: ……既然如此，我好言相劝，

msg: But you must leave the capital at once.
msg_zh: 尽快离开这座城市吧。

msg: It is for your own good, I assure you.
msg_zh: 我是出自好意才如此规劝。

msg: All things have their proper place.
msg_zh: 正所谓人各有安身之地──

msg: We, having been chosen by grace, were given this Golden Capital.
msg_zh: 受赐福宠爱的我们，被赋予这座黄金之城；

msg: You, on the other hand, have your own home, which is a far cry from here.
msg_zh: 不受宠爱的你们，也有恰如其分的郊野可去。

msg: So far, in fact, that it cannot be further marred by your touch.
msg_zh: 只要待在那地方，你们还能维持本色，\n不会玷污任何事物。

msg: The Shattering caused a great many fools to overstep their bounds.
msg_zh: ……在破碎战争的时候，\n就是有太多蠢人不懂得安分守己。

msg: Their impudence led to insurgency against Morgott, Lord of Grace. They raised an army, and sought to lay siege to this sacred ground.
msg_zh: 竟敢反叛“赐福王”蒙葛特，\n举兵进攻，企图侵略、夺走圣地。

msg: But do you see where it got them? King Morgott's rule would not be shaken!
msg_zh: 可是你瞧，蒙葛特王的治理无可匹敌！

msg: Their attempt to defile the capital failed, and while we revelled in eternal grace,
msg_zh: 妄想攻击黄金树之城的，皆不能得逞，\n我们得以永远蒙受赐福。

msg: the traitors were eyed by the grotesque Fell Omen, and their corpses piled high outside the wall!
msg_zh: 所有叛徒都被恐怖“恶兆妖鬼”盯上，\n一个个都在城墙外尸迭成山、血流成河！

msg: The lesson here is self-evident.
msg_zh: ……客人啊，这样你明白了吗？

msg: The capital is simply not where you belong.
msg_zh: 你是应该离开这座城市。

msg: You mustn't take it the wrong way.
msg_zh: ……我是好言相劝，

msg: But you must leave the capital at once.
msg_zh: 尽快离开这座城市吧。

msg: Well, what have we here...
msg_zh: ……哦，这物品……

msg: You hunt Omen, do you?
msg_zh: 原来你在狩猎恶兆之子啊。

msg: Mm-hmm, yes it appears so...
msg_zh: ……唔、唔，这的确货真价实……

msg: Well, then perhaps we can talk.
msg_zh: 既然如此，你的去留就另当别论。

msg: For a barbarous Tarnished, you see the difference between right and wrong rather clearly.
msg_zh: 你身为褪色者，一介野蛮人，\n但似乎能明辨是非。

msg: Very well. I permit your stay in the capital for the time being.
msg_zh: 好吧，我允许你在这座城市短暂停留。

msg: And in the name of the house of Shanehaight, I beseech you hunt down the foul Omen.
msg_zh: 接着，我以榭海德一族之名，\n向你提出狩猎恶兆之子的要求。

msg: The Undercapital is a repository of waste.
msg_zh: 这座城市的地底已然化成弃置场，

msg: For ages it's teemed with repulsive Omen. Fiendlings, even, who've never lost a horn.
msg_zh: 从古至今，那群骯脏的恶兆之子，\n还有不曾切除畸角的恶鬼之子，就躲藏在地底。

msg: And what's worse, they've taken to bellowing in a most blood-curdling manner. You can hear it all the way up here.
msg_zh: ……让人深感悲痛的是，从不久之前开始，\n那些东西发出的，令人作呕的叫声竟然传至地面。

msg: A vile, ceaseless affront to the Erdtree's sanctity.
msg_zh: 丝毫不放弃玷污黄金树的意图。

msg: Get on with it, then.
msg_zh: 快出发吧。

msg: Hunt down the vile Omen scurrying about in the Undercapital, and give us peace from those wretched howls.
msg_zh: 去狩猎那些躲藏在地底弃置场的恶兆之子，\n快快断绝那一阵阵令人作呕的叫声。

msg: I know you can do it. Do not dishonour House Shanehaight.
msg_zh: 我很期待你的表现。\n切记，勿做出侮辱我族英名的举止。

msg: Haven't set off to hunt the Omen yet?
msg_zh: ……还不打算狩猎恶兆之子吗？

msg: Well, you're certainly dragging your heels more than I foresaw.
msg_zh: 看来你比我认为得还要优柔寡断。

msg: I forgive you.
msg_zh: ……好吧，也无妨。

msg: We Shanehaights are known for patience, a virtue amongst the noble.
msg_zh: 我可以等──宽容待人是身为贵族的气度。

msg: Haven't set off to hunt the Omen yet?
msg_zh: ……还不打算狩猎恶兆之子吗？

msg: That wretched screeching... I feel as if I could go mad.
msg_zh: 那些东西……令人作呕的叫声……\n快要逼疯人了。

msg: Ohh, there you are, pleased to see you.
msg_zh: 哦，久候多时了。

msg: You must've expunged the Omen from the repository.
msg_zh: 那些弃置场的恶兆之子，你狩猎完毕了吧？

msg: Otherwise their revolting screeches would still be affronting my ears.
msg_zh: 因为那令人作呕的叫声渐渐消失了……

msg: Well, you've done us a fine service, I must say.
msg_zh: 不过啊，你做得非常好。

msg: The Erdbishops will be very pleased to hear it.
msg_zh: 诸位树神官肯定会欣喜无比。

msg: No, this is above their station...
msg_zh: ……唔，不只如此……

msg: If I explained that this was all my idea,
msg_zh: 只要确实证明是我的功劳，

msg: I could be granted audience with Morgott, Lord of Grace.
msg_zh: 也许还能觐见“赐福王”蒙葛特，一见尊容。

msg: What a wondrous opportunity.
msg_zh: ……准爵家的人有幸觐见赐福王，

msg: That a viscount as myself might be seen by the Lord of Grace.
msg_zh: 这是何等荣耀的事情。

msg: Such an honour will place me amongst the most venerated Shanehaights.
msg_zh: 肯定能成为一族流芳百世的荣誉。

msg: Oh, very sorry, I almost forgot about you completely.
msg_zh: ……唔，失礼了，我忘记你还在现场。

msg: This Shanehaight heirloom has been held for generations.
msg_zh: 这是我们榭海德一族的传家之宝，

msg: It is yours now, a reward for your fearless execution of my request.
msg_zh: 用来奖励你完美达成了要求。

msg: I'm afraid its worth might be lost on a Tarnished, but...
msg_zh: ……对一介褪色者来说，那是过于贵重的物品。

msg: For everything, there is a first. For you, and for House Shanehaight, and its newfound glory.
msg_zh: 哎，也无妨。\n当作是庆祝我们榭海德一族的荣耀之始吧。

msg: Now, I need to get myself ready.
msg_zh: ……我得开始做准备了。

msg: If fortune favours me, and I am seen by the Lord of Grace,
msg_zh: 万一真要觐见赐福王，

msg: I'd be put to shame if I didn't look my very best.
msg_zh: 一身邋遢的，成何体统。

msg: Kill our lord...
msg_zh: ……杀了王……

msg: He is a stain upon all things golden...
msg_zh: 不能再玷污黄金……

msg: Kill Morgott, kingly impostor!
msg_zh: 杀了骗徒王、杀了蒙葛特！

msg: Ah...ahh...
Ngh... W-who's there?
msg_zh: ……呜，你、你是谁？

msg: Well, it matters not. If you are wise, you will leave, immediately.
msg_zh: 不管你是谁，最好离开我身边。

msg: My flesh writhes with scarlet rot.
msg_zh: 我体内的猩红腐败正在蠕动……

msg: It is a curse. Not to be meddled with by man.
msg_zh: 这是诅咒，不是一般人该接触的东西。

msg: If you are wise, you will leave, immediately.
msg_zh: ……最好离开我身边。

msg: My flesh writhes with scarlet rot.
msg_zh: 我体内的猩红腐败正在蠕动……

msg: You ask that I stab myself with the needle...
msg_zh: ……要我用这根针刺自己吗？

msg: To quell the scarlet rot?
msg_zh: 能用来抑制猩红腐败？

msg: But...how?
msg_zh: 你是什么人……

msg: Never mind. I've decided.
msg_zh: 没事，我明白了。

msg: I would rather trust you,
msg_zh: 与其继续受腐败侵蚀……

msg: than simply continue to spoil from within.
msg_zh: 我选择相信你。

msg: Would you mind...averting your eyes for a moment?
msg_zh: ……能请你闭上双眼一阵子吗？

msg: Well. That was easier than expected.
msg_zh: ……顺利刺进去了，真没想到。

msg: But...why do I feel so...
msg_zh: 但是……怎么会、这么……

msg: I...hoped to see you again.
msg_zh: ……我在等你。

msg: My apologies, for when last we met. I fainted before I could even thank you.
msg_zh: 抱歉，在那之后就失去意识，\n没有向你好好道声谢。

msg: Everything is as you said. Since inserting the needle, the scarlet rot has ceased to writhe.
msg_zh: 没错，和你说得一样。\n把针刺进身体后，猩红腐败就不再蠕动。

msg: Even the nightmares have abated... And now, though I can scarcely believe it myself, I can move as I please.
msg_zh: 而且不再做恶梦了……\n也能自在行动，我到现在还不敢置信。

msg: Not that I could ever truly repay you,
msg_zh: 对你真是不知从何感谢起。

msg: but I would like you to have this, by way of thanks. A token, though it is.
msg_zh: 这是微薄的心意，请你收下。

msg: I'm considering leaving. On a journey.
msg_zh: ……我想出门旅行。

msg: With the needle buried in my flesh, I've started to recall, but dimly...
msg_zh: 针刺进身体之后，\n我在朦胧的意识中想起了──

msg: My destiny...
msg_zh: 自己的命运。

msg: It's all thanks to you.
msg_zh: 没错，这都多亏有你帮忙。

msg: My name is Millicent. I pray fate permits us meet again.
msg_zh: 我叫米莉森，期待以后再相会。

msg: I'm considering leaving. On a journey.
msg_zh: ……我想出门旅行。

msg: With the needle buried in my flesh, I've started to recall, but dimly...
msg_zh: 针刺进身体之后，\n我在朦胧的意识中想起了──

msg: My destiny...
msg_zh: 自己的命运。

msg: Oh, hello again.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Something about this place felt familiar to me.
msg_zh: 不知道为什么，这个地方让我有种怀念的感觉。

msg: So I decided to pay a visit, hoping to find someone here.
msg_zh: 想着可能会遇见人，所以来了这里一趟，

msg: But I've only found emptiness.
msg_zh: 结果你也看到了，没有人在。

msg: Perhaps before my departure, I needed someone to say farewell to.
msg_zh: ……我可能想在出门旅行以前，向某个人道别吧。

msg: Well, never mind that.
msg_zh: ……说了一些让人摸不着头绪的话了。

msg: I must focus on my journey, for which I have you to thank.
msg_zh: 总之多亏有你帮忙，我有办法出门旅行了。

msg: I must stay strong.
msg_zh: 我必须变得更强……

msg: Ah. We meet again.
msg_zh: ……又遇见你了。

msg: In truth, it's been smooth sailing, for me.
msg_zh: 嗯，我的状况很稳定。

msg: The scarlet rot has stilled, since last we met.
msg_zh: 猩红腐败从那之后就不再蠕动，

msg: As such, I've been able to continue my journey.
msg_zh: 幸亏如此，我才能继续旅行。

msg: Though rather vexingly,
msg_zh: ……不过，真令人焦虑。

msg: I realise that if I still had my sword arm,
msg_zh: 要是右手没有被切断，

msg: I could have aided you in battle.
msg_zh: 我就能用剑报答你的恩情。

msg: Now, I'm tracing the path Malenia took,
msg_zh: ……我正在追查玛莲妮亚的下落。

msg: after unleashing the power of the scarlet rot, during her battle with General Radahn, in the Caelid Wilds.
msg_zh: 在盖利德原野与拉塔恩将军的战争中，\n她释放了腐败的力量──

msg: I should like to meet her, this vanished woman.
msg_zh: 从那之后就失去了踪影，但我想见见她。

msg: I think she's in the north.
msg_zh: ……玛莲妮亚在北方，

msg: In the lands that lie beyond the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 她在走过黄金树之后，更远的地方。

msg: Are you...
msg_zh: ……这只义手……

msg: Giving me this arm?
msg_zh: 你要让给我吗？

msg: I thank you.
msg_zh: ……感谢你。

msg: I am in your debt, yet again.
msg_zh: 老是受你照顾。

msg: I think, If the arm serves well enough,
msg_zh: ……如果我能运用自如，

msg: It might be possible for me to wield a sword again.
msg_zh: 说不定还能继续挥剑。

msg: If the arm serves well enough,
msg_zh: ……如果我能运用自如，

msg: It might be possible for me to wield a sword again.
msg_zh: 说不定还能继续挥剑。

msg: Perhaps, then, I can aid you in battle.
msg_zh: ……到时候，我就能报答你的恩情。

msg: Now, I'm tracing the path Malenia took.
msg_zh: ……我正在追查玛莲妮亚的下落。

msg: She's passed into to the lands that lie beyond the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 她在走过黄金树之后，更远的地方。

msg: Ah, we meet yet again.
msg_zh: ……又遇见你了。

msg: The arm you gave me truly is a thing of wonder.
msg_zh: 你让给我的义手令人非常惊艳，

msg: It feels just like my own, even handling a sword.
msg_zh: 使用起来犹如自己的手，\n我也能继续挥剑了。

msg: Perhaps it is foolish to say this to you of all people, but I am sure of my skill with the sword.
msg_zh: ……这样说有些班门弄斧，\n但我对剑术有几分自信。

msg: Thus, I would have you call upon me in battle again, should you ever have the need.
msg_zh: 所以在需要人手的时候，\n希望你再找我一起作战。

msg: Ah, we meet yet again.
msg_zh: ……又遇见你了。

msg: The arm you gave me truly is a thing of wonder.
msg_zh: 你让给我的义手令人非常惊艳，

msg: It feels just like my own, even handling a sword.
msg_zh: 使用起来犹如自己的手，\n我也能继续挥剑了。

msg: Perhaps it is foolish to say this to you of all people, but I am sure of my skill with the sword.
msg_zh: ……这样说有些班门弄斧，\n但我对剑术有几分自信。

msg: Thus, I would have you call upon me in battle, should you ever have the need.
msg_zh: 所以在需要人手的时候，\n希望你找我一起作战。

msg: I would have you call upon me in battle, should you ever have the need.
msg_zh: ……在需要人手的时候，希望你找我一起作战。

msg: It is the only way that I can express my thanks.
msg_zh: 那是我唯一能报答的方式。

msg: To think we'd meet in such a place...
msg_zh: ……真没想到会在这种地方遇见你。

msg: What could your purpose possibly...
msg_zh: 你是为什么……

msg: No, I know well enough who you are, and what I know is good enough for me.
msg_zh: 没事，你就是你。\n对我来说，这样就够了。

msg: Call upon me again in battle, should you have the need.
msg_zh: 需要人手的时候，希望你找我一起作战。

msg: I'm searching for a fort to the west of the ruins.
msg_zh: ……我正在找一座城，据说那在这座遗迹的西方。

msg: I'm searching for a fort to the north of the ruins.
msg_zh: ……我正在找一座城，据说那在这座遗迹的北方。

msg: I heard the master of the fort was given a medallion that allowed him to visit the Haligtree.
msg_zh: 传闻说，那座城的领主曾经受赐符节，\n那是前往圣树需要的物品。

msg: Indeed, I believe that is where Malenia will be found.
msg_zh: ……对，玛莲妮亚人在圣树。

msg: The Haligtree is hidden somewhere in these Northern lands.
msg_zh: 圣树就藏在这块北方大地的某处。

msg: I'm searching for a fort to the west of the ruins.
msg_zh: ……我正在找一座城，据说那在这座遗迹的西方。

msg: I'm searching for a fort to the north of the ruins.
msg_zh: ……我正在找一座城，据说那在这座遗迹的北方。

msg: I heard the master of the fort was given a medallion that allowed him to visit the Haligtree.
msg_zh: 传闻说，那座城的领主曾经受赐符节，\n那是前往圣树需要的物品。

msg: Again we meet.
msg_zh: ……又遇见你了。

msg: I can only surmise our purposes are aligned.
msg_zh: 看来我们是殊途同归啊。

msg: In which case, allow me to explain myself.
msg_zh: ……既然如此，我想先告诉你──

msg: I am of Malenia's blood.
msg_zh: 其实我和玛莲妮亚有血缘关系。

msg: But in what capacity I know not. I could be sister, daughter, or an offshoot…
msg_zh: 至于是亲子、姊妹，\n或者是她的分身──这我不清楚。

msg: Whatever the case though, I am certain of a kinship between us.
msg_zh: 但我能明确感觉到，\n自己和她之间有近亲的连结。

msg: There is something I must return to Malenia.
msg_zh: ……我想要还给玛莲妮亚──

msg: The will that was once her own.
msg_zh: 过去玛莲妮亚持有的意志、

msg: The dignity, the sense of self, that allowed her to resist the call of the scarlet rot.
msg_zh: 面对猩红腐败的呢喃，作为人与其抗衡的自尊、

msg: The pride she abandoned, to meet Radahn's measure.
msg_zh: 还有为了与拉塔恩匹敌，她不惜打破的戒律。

msg: There is something I must return to Malenia.
msg_zh: ……我想要还给玛莲妮亚──

msg: The will that was once her own.
msg_zh: 过去玛莲妮亚持有的意志、

msg: The dignity, the sense of self, that allowed her to resist the call of the scarlet rot.
msg_zh: 面对猩红腐败的呢喃，作为人与其抗衡的自尊。

msg: Oh, hello.
msg_zh: ……啊，是你。

msg: Thank you for lending your hand.
msg_zh: 刚才那场战斗你为我助阵，十分感谢。

msg: Without your help, I could not have defeated that quartet.
msg_zh: 单凭一个人要打赢那四个人，想必是不可能的事。

msg: I feel as if I've been in your debt from beginning to end.
msg_zh: ……从头到尾，我一直受你关照。

msg: Thank you. With your help, I was able to live as my own person, if only in passing.
msg_zh: 谢谢你──因为有你在，\n即使时间短暂，我得以维持自我活到现在。

msg: But this is where things end.
msg_zh: 看来我的旅途到此为止了。

msg: I pause to even tell you, but...
msg_zh: 对你实在很难启齿……

msg: I took out the needle myself.
msg_zh: 我已经拔起那根针了。

msg: Tell whoever put you up to this.
msg_zh: ……请你转告那恶意的源头──

msg: That if I am to flower into something other than myself,
msg_zh: 要我化身为非我的存在，绽放成花，

msg: I would rather rot into nothingness as I am.
msg_zh: 我宁可就此腐化。

msg: Please, let me pass alone.
msg_zh: ……能让我独处吗？

msg: The scarlet rot writhes now, worse than ever.
msg_zh: 猩红腐败蠕动得很厉害。

msg: Soon, I won't be more than a mound of flesh.
msg_zh: 我就快要化成肉团，

msg: Curse-laden. Untouchable.
msg_zh: 变成一般人不该接触的诅咒。

msg: I wouldn't want such a thing to bring you harm.
msg_zh: ……我不希望你因此受到伤害。

msg: Ugh.
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: Is there something wrong?
msg_zh: ……这么突然，怎么了？

msg: Please, cease this at once.
msg_zh: 住手吧，别再继续了。

msg: Why are you doing this?
msg_zh: ……为什么？

msg: Now you've forced my hand.
msg_zh: 为什么我们非得战斗……？

msg: I will not forget what you did for me.
msg_zh: ……我很感谢你。

msg: But this day marks our farewell.
msg_zh: 但是，就此别过了。

msg: I did not imagine it ending like this.
msg_zh: 居然会这个时候迎向终点……

msg: But I will not forget what you have done.
msg_zh: 即使如此，我还是很感谢你。

msg: Thank...you...
msg_zh: 谢、谢……

msg: Ahh, how could you...
msg_zh: ……啊，你、为什么……

msg: Is this your true heart?
msg_zh: 你一直这么想的？

msg: Was I... was it all...for this?
msg_zh: 你是为了这个时候、吗……？

msg: Oh, a pleasure to see you, a pleasure indeed.
msg_zh: ……哦哦，恭候多时了。

msg: I am Gowry. A great sage, in my day, anyway.
msg_zh: 我名叫格威。\n在过去，人们称我为贤者。

msg: I'd hoped to ask a favour, when one of your ilk came along.
msg_zh: ……有一事相求，请您务必答应。

msg: A strapping young Tarnished, able to cross the scarlet swamp of Aeonia.
msg_zh: 这事只能请跨越艾奥尼亚的猩红沼泽之后，\n依旧身强体健的褪色者帮忙。

msg: Don't fret, I'll provide fine recompense.
msg_zh: 当然，我不会要您平白出力。

msg: Should you accept…
msg_zh: 只要您答应我的请求……

msg: I will teach you the secret of Sellia, the town you see there.
msg_zh: 我愿意告诉您──\n那边那座瑟利亚镇，到底隐藏了什么秘密。

msg: Ah, then you're willing to lend a hand, are you?
msg_zh: 哦哦，您愿意帮忙啊。

msg: I need your help to heal a certain young girl.
msg_zh: 老实说，我需要您帮忙治疗一个女孩。

msg: Her name is Millicent. You will find her beyond Sellia,
msg_zh: 那女孩名叫米莉森，\n她人在穿过那座瑟利亚镇之后，

msg: resting at the church atop the cliff, stricken by the rotting sickness.
msg_zh: 一座山崖上的教堂里。\n罹患了腐败病，在那卧病不起。

msg: The rotting sickness that afflicts Millicent has no cure.
msg_zh: 米莉森的腐败病是不治之症。

msg: When the Erdtree flourished, even the demigods could not stave off its effects, despite their nigh godhood.
msg_zh: 那病即使在黄金树最为辉煌的时期，\n最接近神的半神也束手无策。

msg: But Millicent's suffering can be ameliorated.
msg_zh: 虽说无法治愈它，但有办法抑制它。

msg: For this, you are to find a certain needle.
msg_zh: ……我想请您去寻找用来抑制腐败病的针。

msg: Seek the deep scarlet swamp of Aeonia, outside Sellia's bounds.
msg_zh: 在瑟利亚镇前方的那一大片\n又红又深的艾奥尼亚沼泽之中，

msg: The needle, made from unalloyed gold, is lost somewhere there.
msg_zh: 应该会有一根纯净金针。

msg: First, you must find the unalloyed gold needle.
msg_zh: 请先前往又红又深的艾奥尼亚沼泽，

msg: It's hidden somewhere in the deep scarlet swamp of Aeonia.
msg_zh: 到那沼泽寻找纯净金针。

msg: Then I will tell you, as promised.
msg_zh: ……在达成之后，我一定会告诉您──

msg: The secret of the town of Sellia.
msg_zh: 先前我们说好的，瑟利亚镇的秘密。

msg: Ah, my apologies. I rather got ahead of myself, didn't I.
msg_zh: ……啊，非常抱歉，是我太过心急。

msg: Well, no matter. I'm accustomed to waiting.
msg_zh: 不要紧的，我很习惯等待。

msg: But if you should decide to hear my offer, whenever that may be,
msg_zh: 但如果，您愿意答应我的请求了，

msg: do come and speak with me again.
msg_zh: 请再过来告诉我。

msg: I'll wait as long as it takes.
msg_zh: 随时恭候您大驾光临。

msg: Ah, changed your mind, have you?
msg_zh: 哦哦，您改变心意了吗？

msg: If you are willing to undertake my request,
msg_zh: 只要您答应我的请求……

msg: I'll gladly share with you the secret of Sellia, the town yonder.
msg_zh: 我愿意告诉您──\n那边那座瑟利亚镇，到底隐藏了什么秘密。

msg: Ohh, you've found the unalloyed gold needle.
msg_zh: 哦哦，您找到了纯净金针。

msg: As promised, I've detailed the secret of Sellia right here.
msg_zh: 先前说的瑟利亚镇的秘密，就写在这里头。

msg: Go on, it's yours.
msg_zh: 请您收下。

msg: Now, let me have a look at the needle.
msg_zh: 来，请让我仔细端详那根针。

msg: Hmm.
Hmmmm.
msg_zh: 嗯。

msg: Well, well, this is a marvel indeed.
msg_zh: 哎呀，这真是，作工真是精良。

msg: The work of a true artisan…a meticulous, bold craftsman who grasps the essence of life.
msg_zh: 通晓何谓生命，既纤细却又无所畏惧……\n是有这些特色的名匠制成的。

msg: Can you give me some time with this?
msg_zh: ……那么，能请您稍待片刻吗？

msg: As well made as it is, it won't be much use snapped in half, will it.
msg_zh: 因为再怎么精良的针，\n断成两截也会落得无用武之地。

msg: I have awaited your return.
msg_zh: 让您久等了。

msg: The needle is repaired. Now it will forestall the rotting sickness, I'm sure.
msg_zh: 已经修理完成了。\n这根针已经能抑制腐败病。

msg: Will you give it to the girl, Millicent?
msg_zh: 能请您把针交给那女孩，米莉森吗？

msg: I will reward you in kind.
msg_zh: 当然，我会支付相对的报酬。

msg: Millicent rests at the church atop the cliff, beyond Sellia, the town yonder.
msg_zh: 米莉森在穿过瑟利亚镇之后，\n一座山崖上的教堂里，卧病不起。

msg: Tended to by the witless pests who worship her, or rather, her rotting sickness, as a god.
msg_zh: 一群无知的坏虫殷勤呵护她，把她……\n不对，把她的腐败病当作神在奉养。

msg: A wretched fate, indeed. The poor girl, she never wished for any of this.
msg_zh: 您不认为这件事太过荒唐吗？\n那女孩毫无理由受这种对待。

msg: Do you find it peculiar?
msg_zh: ……您认为不可思议吗？

msg: That I would show such concern for the girl.
msg_zh: 为什么我会这么关心那女孩。

msg: Well, I'm the one that found her.
msg_zh: ……米莉森是我捡来，抚养长大的孩子。

msg: A mere babe, in the swamp of Aeonia.
msg_zh: 那女孩还在襁褓中的时候，\n我在艾奥尼亚的沼泽捡到她。

msg: She is one of my dear daughters.
msg_zh: 她是我其中一位可爱的女儿。

msg: But the rotting sickness erodes one's memory.
msg_zh: ……只是腐败病会破坏记忆，

msg: I doubt that she remembers the first thing about me.
msg_zh: 她已经不记得我了吧……

msg: Oh, I must be getting old. I didn't always worry so much.
msg_zh: ……话说回来，人一老了，\n自然就会变得爱管事啊。

msg: Ha ha ha...
msg_zh: 呵呵。

msg: Can you give me some time with this?
msg_zh: 能请您稍待片刻吗？

msg: As well made as it is, it won't be much use snapped in half, will it.
msg_zh: 因为再怎么精良的针，\n断成两截也会落得无用武之地。

msg: Now, all you need do is deliver the needle to Millicent.
msg_zh: ……那根针能请您转交吗？

msg: She's convalescing in the church atop the cliff just beyond Sellia.
msg_zh: 请交给米莉森。她在穿过瑟利亚镇之后，\n一座山崖上的教堂里，卧病不起。

msg: Do so, and you shall receive handsome recompense, of course.
msg_zh: 当然，我会支付相对的报酬。

msg: Thank you kindly.
msg_zh: ……非常感谢您。

msg: For giving the needle to Millicent.
msg_zh: 您把针交到米莉森手中了吧？

msg: Now she, too, can begin her journey.
msg_zh: 嗯，这么一来，那女孩也能出门旅行了。

msg: And stare her fate straight in the eye.
msg_zh: 能够面对自己真正的命运。

msg: You've been a saint, through and through.
msg_zh: 受您这么多次帮助，不胜感激。

msg: As thanks, I vow to impart to you my knowledge
msg_zh: 为了表示谢意，我愿意倾囊相授──

msg: of the lost sorceries of the Sellians, descendants of the Eternal.
msg_zh: “永恒后裔”瑟利亚的失落魔法。

msg: Please make certain that little Millicent goes unharmed.
msg_zh: ……請您從旁守護米莉森。

msg: Like her mother, she has the stuff to be a great warrior,
msg_zh: 那女孩与她母亲的素质相似，\n是块优秀剑士的璞玉。

msg: but commands only one arm, and is yet preciously young.
msg_zh: 但无奈只有单臂，而且还很年幼。

msg: Oh, you noticed, did you?
msg_zh: ……哦？原来您知情？

msg: Indeed, Millicent did visit this hovel of a home.
msg_zh: 没错，米莉森来过这间破屋。

msg: It seems the memories eaten away by the rotting sickness yet remain, but faintly.
msg_zh: 那理应被腐败病破坏的记忆，\n也许还残留着那么一些。

msg: However, she has no need of me, any more.
msg_zh: 不过，我不该再和那女孩见面。

msg: No, she must embark on her journey, and stare her fate in the eye. I mustn't impede.
msg_zh: 她应该出门旅行。\n必须面对自己真正的命运，而不是挂念我。

msg: As I've aged, I've found the best way to aid the young...
msg_zh: ……人老了，就更该替年轻人着想。

msg: Is to be forgotten.
msg_zh: 她不记得我，这对她最好。

msg: Ah, welcome, welcome. How may I help?
msg_zh: 哦哦，欢迎您来。

msg: Do you...need me for something else?
msg_zh: ……还有什么事情呢？

msg: So, you gave Millicent a golden arm replacement…
msg_zh: ……哦，您將黃金義手給了她……

msg: This is a wonderful development.
msg_zh: 這真是美事一樁。

msg: Thank you for your kindness.
msg_zh: 非常感謝您。

msg: Now Millicent may fully realise her true warrior's potential.
msg_zh: 在您的安排之下，\n米莉森說不準會蛻變成劍士啊──

msg: Like her beautiful mother.
msg_zh: 就像她美麗的母親一樣。

msg: The girl, Millicent. She is a bud.
msg_zh: ……米莉森啊，那女孩是花蕾。

msg: Green and undeveloped, waiting to flower into magnificence.
msg_zh: 目前含苞未放，不到盛開的時機……\n但一綻放，肯定驚豔四方。

msg: What a wondrous day that will be.
msg_zh: 令人引頸期盼，可不是嗎？

msg: In truth, before her, I'd never seen a bud of such superior quality.
msg_zh: 那是我有生之年看過最上等的花蕾。

msg: She might very well outshine her sisters.
msg_zh: 其他姊妹都相形失色……

msg: Do you have an interest in rot incantations?
msg_zh: ……您对腐败祷告有兴趣啊。

msg: Then you might like to learn something of the history...
msg_zh: 既然如此，我们可以聊一聊吗？

msg: of Malenia, goddess of scarlet rot.
msg_zh: 关于猩红腐败的女神，玛莲妮亚大人。

msg: Queen Marika and her King Consort Radagon were blessed with twin demigods, and Malenia was one of them.
msg_zh: 玛莲妮亚大人是玛莉卡女王\n与王夫拉达冈生下的孪生半神。

msg: She was born an Empyrean, carrying the scarlet rot.
msg_zh: 生为神人，身体与生俱来就寄宿着猩红腐败。

msg: An Empyrean...is no mere demigod.
msg_zh: 神人与寻常的半神不同。

msg: In the age of the Elden Ring, and Queen Marika,
msg_zh: 当艾尔登法环的时代──\n也就是玛莉卡女王的时代走向终点，

msg: the precious Empyrean was born. A new god to forge a new Order.
msg_zh: 尊贵的神人背负着必须成为神，\n必须展现新律法的使命。

msg: Since Malenia fought Radahn, and the great scarlet flower blossomed in Aeonia, I have dedicated myself to her.
msg_zh: 从玛莲妮亚大人与拉塔恩战斗，在艾奥尼亚\n让猩红大花怒放那一天起，我的心就成了俘虏──

msg: And to the resplendence of the Order of Rot. The cycle of decay and rebirth.
msg_zh: 我心系着玛莲妮亚大人、灿烂夺目的腐败律法。\n也就是那盛极转衰的轮回法则……

msg: Oh, Millicent. Finding herself, is she?
msg_zh: ……哦，原来。那女孩这么说了……

msg: The words of a true innocent, the dear girl.
msg_zh: 米莉森果然还年幼，\n说的话也一样不够成熟。

msg: Well, perhaps this is just as it should be.
msg_zh: 但，又何妨呢？

msg: Little Millicent, following in the steps of her mother, no matter what.
msg_zh: 只要那女孩挨近她的母亲──\n玛莲妮亚大人，万事便圆满。

msg: This is their fate, after all.
msg_zh: 那就是她们的命运。

msg: <sobbing>
msg_zh: ……呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: Oh, mm, I didn't notice you there.
msg_zh: ……哦、哦哦，是您啊。

msg: Welcome. How may I help you?
msg_zh: 欢迎您来。

msg: My apologies though, you hardly needed to see me like that.
msg_zh: 非常抱歉，让您看到丢脸的一幕了。

msg: Oh, it's just…
msg_zh: ……噢，那是因为……

msg: I realised that I'd soon be saying my goodbyes to Millicent, and…
msg_zh: 一想到要和那女孩，米莉森分开了，

msg: My eyes began to well...
msg_zh: 不知怎地，眼泪就扑簌簌地掉下来。

msg: She is to meet them very soon. Her sisters.
msg_zh: ……那女孩就快见到她的其他姊妹──

msg: And when she does, she'll be defeated, surely, and begin to flower.
msg_zh: 这么一来，她肯定会战败，幻化成花。

msg: Which is why...
msg_zh: ……在这里，我想拜托您。

msg: If you happen to be present for the girl's fight with her sisters,
msg_zh: 如果那女孩和其他姊妹战斗时，您恰巧在场，

msg: I ask that you side with the sisters and kill Millicent.
msg_zh: 是否能请您加入姊妹的那一方，杀了米莉森？

msg: It must be done by your hand; no other.
msg_zh: 不假他人，就由您亲自动手。

msg: Millicent trusts you, rather deeply in fact.
msg_zh: ……因为米莉森似乎很信任您，

msg: Sever that trust. Nurtured by betrayal, her bud will flower most vividly.
msg_zh: 受到背叛所产生的绝望，\n正是让花蕾开成娇艳花朵的关键。

msg: When Malenia ascends to godhood, Millicent too shall be reborn.
msg_zh: 而且当玛莲妮亚大人成为女神之际，她将会重生──

msg: As a scarlet valkyrie.
msg_zh: 化为猩红女武神。

msg: Thus, I have a request of the utmost import.
msg_zh: ……我想要郑重拜托您一件事。

msg: I beg you, kill Millicent.
msg_zh: 在米莉森见到她的姊妹之前，

msg: Before the girl can meet her sisters.
msg_zh: 请您动手杀了那女孩。

msg: There is no other way. It must be done by your hand alone.
msg_zh: 不假他人，就由您亲自动手。

msg: You seem to have sown a seed in Millicent's heart.
msg_zh: ……米莉森对您似乎抱有特殊情感。

msg: Which will flower most vividly, should she be plucked by you.
msg_zh: 有您经手这事，想必花也能长得娇艳。

msg: Malenia will be a goddess. And once she is, Millicent will flower anew, as a scarlet valkyrie.
msg_zh: 当玛莲妮亚大人成为女神之际，\n她将会重生，化为猩红花的女武神。

msg: You can't tell me you don't wish to see it.
msg_zh: ……难道您不想亲眼目睹？

msg: The superior bud that is Millicent, becoming the finest of flowers?
msg_zh: 那女孩──最上等的花蕾，\n绽放出最上等花朵的那景象？

msg: I beg of you, kill her. With your own two hands.
msg_zh: ……请您杀了米莉森，亲手杀了她。

msg: Welcome, welcome. How may I help you?
msg_zh: ……欢迎您来。

msg: Oh how I have counted the days. Millicent shall soon meet her sisters.
msg_zh: 那女孩与其他姊妹相遇的那天，真叫人望穿秋水啊。

msg: When the time is ripe...
msg_zh: ……如果那时机到来了，

msg: Do what you must to ensure Millicent dies.
msg_zh: 请您杀了米莉森……

msg: <sigh>
Millicent, my daughter.
msg_zh: ……米莉森啊，吾儿啊……

msg: Why would you take out the needle?
msg_zh: ……为什么拔掉了针？

msg: You were so close. So very close. To becoming the fairest of all flowers.
msg_zh: 再一会儿、就再一会儿……最上等的花就要绽放。

msg: Would you disown us too? As your Mother did?
msg_zh: ……你也拒绝我们吗？\n就像玛莲妮亚大人一样──

msg: We children of the scarlet rot?
msg_zh: 拒绝接受我们猩红腐败之子。

msg: Millicent...
msg_zh: ……米莉森……

msg: Malenia...
msg_zh: ……玛莲妮亚大人……

msg: Do you detest us, so utterly?
msg_zh: ……就如此厌恶我们吗……？

msg: Have you taken the lesson, now?
msg_zh: ……这么一来，您明白了吗？

msg: Killing me is but an exercise in futility.
msg_zh: 即使杀了我，也毫无意义可言。

msg: All is well, provided you understand.
msg_zh: ……您明白了就好。

msg: Let's just pretend it never happened, shall we?
msg_zh: 我们就当这件事没发生过吧。

msg: <sobbing>
msg_zh: ……呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: O Millicent, my daughter...
msg_zh: 米莉森啊，吾儿啊。

msg: Who would prune your sapling flesh?
msg_zh: 是谁，为了什么，攀折了花蕾？

msg: Such...such cruel and vulgar violence...
msg_zh: 竟然、竟然做出如此暴行。

msg: <sobbing>
msg_zh: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

msg: Oh, Millicent...
msg_zh: ……唉，米莉森啊，

msg: My most promising little bud...
msg_zh: 我们最上等的花蕾啊……

msg: <sobbing>
msg_zh: ……呜呜呜……

msg: Well, well. What have we here?
msg_zh: ……哦，原来如此。

msg: I-is this to toast the girl's departure?
msg_zh: 是为了那女孩启程，准备的饯别酒吗？

msg: How very kind of you.
msg_zh: ……实在是感激不尽。

msg: Well, well. What have we here?
msg_zh: ……哦，原来如此。

msg: Is this to toast the girl's flowering?
msg_zh: 是因为那女孩快要绽放，预祝用的酒吗？

msg: You've got a good head on your shoulders.
msg_zh: ……您真是送进心坎儿里了，

msg: How very kind of you.
msg_zh: 实在感激不尽。

msg: <sleeping>
Owgh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: Please, enough.
msg_zh: 请您停手。

msg: There is nothing to be gained by persevering.
msg_zh: 这种行为对您没有任何好处。

msg: So, the lesson remains unlearned.
msg_zh: ……您还不能明白啊。

msg: Perhaps you've taken one knock to the head too many.
msg_zh: 我很遗憾，原来您的思考能力有极限。

msg: We shall meet again, you and I.
msg_zh: ……我们会再次相见。

msg: There are countless pests to choose from.
msg_zh: 毕竟有这么多，数也数不尽的虫子。

msg: We shall meet again.
msg_zh: ……日后再见吧。

msg: As many times as it takes. For you to understand.
msg_zh: 直到您完全明白为止……

msg: Oh, I see you've just arrived.
msg_zh: 哦哦，您是第一次来到这里吧？

msg: Welcome to the Roundtable Hold. I'm Corhyn, a man of the cloth.
msg_zh: 欢迎来到圆桌厅堂。\n我是柯林，是圣职人员。

msg: I teach incantations, the strength granted us by the Two Fingers,
msg_zh: 我负责教导如何祷告──\n那双指大人赐予我们的力量，

msg: and explore the secrets of the Golden Order.
msg_zh: 也同时在探索黄金律法。

msg: So that one day, if a Tarnished of the Roundtable Hold should become Elden Lord, I might counsel them,
msg_zh: 当聚集到圆桌厅堂的人之中，\n有人成为艾尔登之王时，我也会从旁辅佐，

msg: ensuring order regains its proper form, righting rule over men.
msg_zh: 让律法正确地修复，让王的治理步上正轨。

msg: By the way, do you still see it? The guidance of grace.
msg_zh: ……想请教您，请问您还看得见赐福的指引吗？

msg: You do! Wonderful news.
msg_zh: 您还看得见啊！这是好事一件。

msg: Most Tarnished are blind to it these days.
msg_zh: 嗯，因为最近遇到很多褪色者看不见指引，

msg: You are something of a rare breed.
msg_zh: 和您的状况不一样。

msg: Well, what do you say? Care to learn an incantation of the Two Fingers?
msg_zh: 那么，您要不要学习双指大人的祷告呢？

msg: Ah, well, that is unfortunate.
msg_zh: 噢，竟然……真令人遗憾。

msg: But no cause for despair.
msg_zh: 但请您千万别放弃。

msg: It's likely a temporary condition, I'm told. For whatever reason, it happens from time to time.
msg_zh: 据说也有人是因为某种缘故，\n才暂时看不见指引。

msg: Just keep your chin up, and stay the path.
msg_zh: 所以请别气馁，继续踏上旅程吧。

msg: I pray the great guidance of grace returns to you.
msg_zh: 愿赐福的美好指引，早日降临于您。

msg: What is it?
msg_zh: ……有什么事呢？

msg: Has the guidance of grace returned to your vision?
msg_zh: 难道说，您看得见赐福的指引了？

msg: Ah, I see.
msg_zh: ……这样啊。

msg: Just keep your chin up, and stay the path.
msg_zh: 请别气馁，继续踏上旅程吧。

msg: I pray the great guidance of grace returns to you.
msg_zh: 愿赐福的美好指引，早日降临于您。

msg: Further study of incantations, is it?
msg_zh: 您还想学习祷告吗？

msg: I can happily spare the time, and applaud your enthusiasm.
msg_zh: 我当然愿意教导，热衷学习是件好事。

msg: Ah, you appear to be doing well. Very good.
msg_zh: 哦哦，您平安无事啊，是好事一件。

msg: Well then. Would you like to learn an incantation?
msg_zh: 那么，您要学习祷告吗？

msg: May the Golden Order shine through you.
msg_zh: 愿黄金律法与您同在。

msg: There's something I should mention to you, as well.
msg_zh: ……我想也应该和您说一声。

msg: I'm thinking of leaving the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 其实我正在考虑离开圆桌厅堂。

msg: Do you know of the noble Goldmask?
msg_zh: ……您知道金面具先生吗？

msg: Though he was but a Tarnished, living outside the Lands Between,
msg_zh: 他在过去作为褪色者，\n人还在交界地之外的地方时，

msg: he was a great scholar, who foresaw the coming guidance of grace.
msg_zh: 就能准确预测赐福的指引即将到来，是一名大学者。

msg: And now, I hear he has come to the Lands Between alone, to contemplate the Golden Order...
msg_zh: 他现在身在交界地，独自探索黄金律法……

msg: I wish nothing more than to seek his instruction, and perhaps even help him in his research.
msg_zh: 知道这件事之后，我就非常想向他讨教，\n也很想帮忙探索黄金律法。

msg: Ah, I had been waiting for your return.
msg_zh: 哦哦，等您很久了。

msg: I've decided to leave the Roundtable Hold after all.
msg_zh: 我决定离开圆桌厅堂了，

msg: As I mentioned, I'm off in search of the noble Goldmask.
msg_zh: 打算去寻找先前和您提过的金面具先生。

msg: We may not meet again for some time.
msg_zh: 只是这么一来，就暂时无法和您见面。

msg: If there's any incantations you wish to learn, now's the moment.
msg_zh: 如果有想学习的祷告，请把握机会。

msg: Ah, I had been waiting for your return.
msg_zh: 哦哦，等您很久了。

msg: I've decided to leave the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 我决定离开圆桌厅堂了，

msg: I'm off in search of a noble scholar known as the Goldmask, to beg his instruction.
msg_zh: 打算去寻找名叫金面具的大学者，向他讨教。

msg: We may not meet again for some time.
msg_zh: 只是这么一来，就暂时无法和您见面。

msg: If there's any incantations you wish to learn, now's the moment.
msg_zh: 如果有想学习的祷告，请把握机会。

msg: Ah, look who we have here.
msg_zh: 哦哦，又遇见您了。

msg: How delightful, to meet a familiar face, even after departing the Roundtable Hold.
msg_zh: 离开圆桌厅堂后，遇见故知……\n令人感到无比雀跃啊。

msg: I've been doing some learning of my own since then, actually.
msg_zh: 其实在启程之后，\n我又学到了一些，有所收获。

msg: And will happily pass it along to you.
msg_zh: 如果您愿意的话，请听我说。

msg: I'm yet to find the noble Goldmask.
msg_zh: ……我还没有见到金面具先生。

msg: I suppose he'll be closer to the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 可能他在更靠近黄金树的地方吧。

msg: The path ahead might be perilous, but tread it I shall.
msg_zh: 那对我来说是条险峻的道路，\n但我不打算轻易放弃。

msg: Since departing the Roundtable Hold, I've come to understand, in my solitude,
msg_zh: 在离开圆桌厅堂，\n独自一人旅行之后才明白，

msg: How little it is I truly know...
msg_zh: 原来自己是这么地无知……

msg: Do...do you sport with me!?
msg_zh: 咦！您是说真的吗！

msg: From your description, it can be no other than the Goldmask himself!
msg_zh: 听外表的描述，那的确就是金面具先生。

msg: Of course, of course, I knew he would be close by.
msg_zh: ……他真的在这个地方啊。

msg: Bless the Golden Order, and its benevolent rays.
msg_zh: 黄金律法啊，感谢您与我同在。

msg: And to you too. My sincerest thanks.
msg_zh: 我也该向您道谢，\n真不知道该如何表达我的谢意。

msg: I will soon leave to join the noble Goldmask.
msg_zh: ……我准备离开这里，\n前往金面具先生的所在地。

msg: It is entirely thanks to you. You have my sincerest gratitude.
msg_zh: 幸亏有您的帮助，真的非常谢谢您。

msg: Ah, we meet yet again.
msg_zh: 哦哦，又遇见您了。

msg: Thanks to you, I have become acquainted with the noble Goldmask himself,
msg_zh: 托您的福，我成功找到金面具先生了。

msg: and taken my place by his side, as you can see.
msg_zh: 老师允许我跟在他的身边。

msg: Have no fear, I will still teach you incantations, as before.
msg_zh: 而当然，我也在继续教导如何祷告。

msg: Though we must do so quietly, such that we not disturb the great master's cogitation.
msg_zh: 只是为了避免干扰老师的思绪，\n音量要压低，再麻烦了。

msg: Further study of incantations, is it?
msg_zh: 您还想学习祷告吗？

msg: Indeed, I applaud your enthusiasm.
msg_zh: 当然好，热衷学习是件好事。

msg: Ah, you appear to be doing well. Very good.
msg_zh: 哦哦，您平安无事啊，是好事一件。

msg: Well then. Would you like to learn an incantation?
msg_zh: 那么，您要学习祷告吗？

msg: May the Golden Order shine through you.
msg_zh: 愿黄金律法与您同在。

msg: The master is always deep in contemplation.
msg_zh: ……老师一直在专注思考之上。

msg: While I frantically attempt to record his wisdom; the movement of his finger.
msg_zh: 我拚了命想赶上他的指头，记录表达的内容。

msg: And though I am yet to comprehend even the daintiest morsel of his wisdom...
msg_zh: 而记录的内容，我只看得懂一小部分……

msg: I know that this, this is my life's calling.
msg_zh: 但我马上明白，这是上天赋予我的天职──

msg: The Golden Order has bestowed me, talentless as I am, the great duty of documentarian.
msg_zh: 黄金律法赐予毫无才能的我，担任记录者的任务。

msg: Master! What ever is the matter?
msg_zh: 老师，您是怎么了呢？

msg: Please, I implore you continue! Continue your reflections, your rhythms!
msg_zh: 请您继续思考、继续奏出旋律！

msg: I must be the one to record them!
msg_zh: 让我把一切记录下来！

msg: What matters this issue of Radagon, really?
msg_zh: 拉达冈不过是细微末节的小事。

msg: The Erdtree, heart of the Golden Order, lies before our very eyes!
msg_zh: 黄金树──黄金律法就近在眼前了，

msg: Why must these qualms come to you now?
msg_zh: 您到底在犹豫什么呢？

msg: We were on the very cusp!
msg_zh: 噢，究竟在犹豫些什么！

msg: Oh, was that you? Sorry, I hardly noticed.
msg_zh: ……啊，是您啊。\n很抱歉，我没有注意到您。

msg: I'm a little shaken since the master ceased his movements.
msg_zh: 因为老师静止不动，我有点慌了。

msg: Did you need something else?
msg_zh: ……还有什么事吗？

msg: Oh, was that you?
msg_zh: ……啊，是您啊。

msg: Yes, the master is still ceased.
msg_zh: 是的，老师一直静止不动。

msg: And after coming all this way... Why now, of all times?
msg_zh: 唉，都走到这一步了，怎么会……

msg: The master's reflections had heightened as we neared the Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……越靠近黄金树，老师的思考就越加繁复──

msg: While still a precise calculus, the rhythms grew increasingly wild.
msg_zh: 基本上严谨缜密，类似数学，\n但也不乏从中浮出放纵不羁的旋律。

msg: Until he simply ceased.
msg_zh: ……只是现在，一切停了下来。

msg: Now the master is facing quite the puzzle.
msg_zh: 老师正面临着神秘的谜题。

msg: The Golden Order is founded on the principle that Marika is the one true god. However...
msg_zh: 在黄金律法之中，我们视玛莉卡女王为唯一神……

msg: The name of Marika's second husband, King Consort Radagon, also appeared...
msg_zh: 事实如此，但现在却找到\n玛莉卡的第二任丈夫，王夫拉达冈的名字。

msg: Who exactly was Radagon?
msg_zh: 拉达冈究竟是何等人物？

msg: The master is stumped.
msg_zh: 老师找不到答案。

msg: His finger has remained still, ever since Radagon's name was discovered.
msg_zh: 从找到拉达冈的名字之后，他的指头就不动了。

msg: Curse my mediocre mind.
msg_zh: 唉，我真痛恨自己欠缺才能。

msg: The master only has me, and here I fail him...
msg_zh: 只有我待在老师身边，却什么忙都无法帮。

msg: What on earth did you do to the master?
msg_zh: ……您对老师做了什么？

msg: Well, not that I'm complaining.
msg_zh: 没关系，发生过什么都无所谓。

msg: Master's finger moves again, resuming his cogitation; more than good enough for me.
msg_zh: 老师的指头又动了起来，开始思考。\n我认为这样就够了。

msg: I haven't the words to thank you.
msg_zh: 对您真的感激不尽。

msg: So I'd like to pass this on to you instead.
msg_zh: 说是谢礼可能不恰当，但这件事只让您听──

msg: A glimpse into the heart of the Golden Order, documented by yours truly.
msg_zh: 关于我记录到的，黄金律法的深渊，其中部分内容。

msg: To think, that Radagon was Marika herself.
msg_zh: ……拉达冈的真实身分，就是玛莉卡。

msg: Or at least, such is all I can interpret from the rhythm and calculus of his finger.
msg_zh: 从老师的指头编织出的数学与旋律，\n只能有这种解释。

msg: How would such a thing even have been possible, I wonder.
msg_zh: ……但这种事情真有可能吗？

msg: Sadly, I cannot comprehend it, myself.
msg_zh: 我完全无法吸收，真难受。

msg: Do you have a fuller understanding of the matter?
msg_zh: 难道说，您能完全理解这件事？

msg: Well, either way, I can continue my documentation.
msg_zh: 嗯，即使无法理解，我也会继续记录。

msg: In truth it matters very little whether I understand the master's thoughts or not,
msg_zh: 老师的思考，还有真相──\n我的理解于此，都不是必要。

msg: I am merely his scribe. It is my sole and unwavering purpose.
msg_zh: 我只是单纯的记录者，也想贯彻这一点。

msg: Who exactly was Radagon?
msg_zh: 拉达冈究竟是何等人物？

msg: The master is stumped.
msg_zh: 老师找不到答案。

msg: His finger has remained still, ever since Radagon's name was discovered.
msg_zh: 从找到拉达冈的名字之后，他的指头就不动了。

msg: But oh, how important could it really be?
msg_zh: 唉，但那是这么重要的事吗？

msg: The Erdtree, heart of the Golden Order, lies before our very eyes!
msg_zh: 黄金树──黄金律法就近在眼前了，

msg: Why must these qualms come to you now?
msg_zh: 到底在犹豫什么呢？

msg: We were on the very cusp!
msg_zh: 噢，究竟在犹豫些什么！

msg: Ah, nice to see you.
msg_zh: ……啊，是您啊。

msg: I can't believe you've come all this way.
msg_zh: 您居然来到这种地方。

msg: Do you need...something else?
msg_zh: ……还有什么事吗？

msg: Ah, nice to see you.
msg_zh: ……啊，是您啊。

msg: Do you need...something else?
msg_zh: 还有什么事吗？

msg: I've…been gripped by a terrifying thought.
msg_zh: 其实……我心中有个恐怖的猜测，挥之不去。

msg: The rhythms and calculus of the master's finger...
msg_zh: ……老师的指头编织出的数学与旋律，

msg: betray a suspicion of the holism of the Golden Order.
msg_zh: 表现出对黄金律法的完美，产生怀疑……

msg: A conceit, I am afraid, that cannot be overlooked.
msg_zh: 我从中感受到了万万不可有的傲慢。

msg: Oh, but how could this be?
msg_zh: 唉，那种事情不可能发生，

msg: I dread to even entertain the possibility...
msg_zh: 也千万不能发生。

msg: but somehow, I cannot cast aside my doubts about the master.
msg_zh: 我没办法完全信任老师了。

msg: Tell me, have I simply lost my head?
msg_zh: 是我哪里出了问题吗？

msg: Only, if the master were true to the Golden Order,
msg_zh: 但如果，老师对黄金律法依旧虔诚，

msg: why would he think to breach this forbidden mount of fire?
msg_zh: 那为什么，他会考虑进入这座有着禁忌火焰的山？

msg: Oh master, put my mind at ease.
msg_zh: 唉，老师，请您否定吧。

msg: Dispel these fearsome thoughts.
msg_zh: 否定我这恐怖的猜测。

msg: I want to place my trust in you, to be your scribe.
msg_zh: 我想相信老师，我想继续当您的记录者。

msg: <sobbing>
msg_zh: ……喔喔、喔喔喔喔喔……

msg: What...is this?
msg_zh: ……这是什么……？

msg: It will make me forget, you say?
msg_zh: 您要我遗忘一切吗？

msg: So that I can push aside these frightful thoughts...
msg_zh: 要我遗忘这恐怖的猜测吗？

msg: Ha...ha ha...
msg_zh: ……哈哈、哈哈哈。

msg: Would that I could... Would that I could...
msg_zh: 我怎么可能遗忘……

msg: Oh, it's you.
msg_zh: ……啊，是您啊。

msg: I've finally come to understand.
msg_zh: 我终于明白了。

msg: The master was nothing more than a madman.
msg_zh: 老师就只是个疯子。

msg: Enchanted by a vain and ruinous delusion, he rejected the perfection of the Golden Order,
msg_zh: 坚信那傲慢又荒诞的妄想，否定黄金律法的完美，

msg: seeking to supplant our glorious faith with his own!
msg_zh: 还想推动独善其身的完美，只是个不虔诚的信徒！

msg: Could there be a more pitiable comedy?
msg_zh: 哈哈，真是讽刺啊。

msg: Look at it. The culmination of perfection, burning, before our very eyes!
msg_zh: 看啊，投注多少心血探索的完美存在，\n竟然会燃烧得那么剧烈！

msg: Ha...ha ha ha...
msg_zh: 哈哈哈哈。

msg: Master...where did you go?
msg_zh: ……啊，老师，您在哪里？

msg: I'm right here. Please, show me.
msg_zh: 我在这里，请让我见见您。

msg: Your finger. Your rhythms, and calculus.
msg_zh: 您的指头编织出的数学与旋律，

msg: Let me document the motions...
msg_zh: 拜托您，请让我记录……

msg: Master...master...
msg_zh: 老师、老师……

msg: Where did you go?
msg_zh: 您在哪里……？

msg: This...is a volume of incantation.
msg_zh: ……这一本书，是祷告书啊。

msg: It's good to see your enthusiasm.
msg_zh: 热衷学习，是好事一件。

msg: Indeed, I will happily take it off your hands.
msg_zh: 是的，我很乐意收下。

msg: That...is a work of heresy.
msg_zh: ……这一本书，是异端的书。

msg: Its incantations bear no lineage from the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 上头记载着与黄金树不相关的祷告……

msg: My interests lie solely in the Golden Order.
msg_zh: 我是探索黄金律法的人，

msg: I cannot accept this.
msg_zh: 所以这本书，我不能收。

msg: That...is a work of heresy.
msg_zh: ……这一本书，是异端的书。

msg: Its incantations bear no lineage from the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 上头记载着与黄金树不相关的祷告……

msg: Very well...I'll take it off your hands.
msg_zh: ……我明白了，我愿意收下。

msg: I cannot afford to maintain my innocence any longer. I must dirty my hands to test my faith.
msg_zh: 即便我会因此不再纯净，我的信仰会不再无暇，

msg: Even if it offers only the most meagre of hints, I will do whatever I can to help my master.
msg_zh: 只要能借此找到些什么，蛛丝马迹也好，\n有办法成为老师的助力，我欣然接受。

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 呜啊。

msg: What are you trying to achieve?
msg_zh: 您怎么动手！

msg: Cease that!
msg_zh: 请您住手！

msg: You've done it now.
msg_zh: ……这样就没有办法了。

msg: Faith grants me strength, that I might endure.
msg_zh: 所谓的信仰，也包含抵抗的力量。

msg: O Golden Order, shine through me.
msg_zh: 黄金律法啊，与我们同在吧。

msg: I pray...
msg_zh: ……我会祈求，

msg: That the guidance of grace abandons you.
msg_zh: 希望赐福的指引能早日放弃您。

msg: Please don't trouble us again.
msg_zh: ……请不要再妨碍我们。

msg: O guidance...of grace...
msg_zh: ……赐福的指引啊……

msg: Why...can't I...
msg_zh: 为什么，我看不……

msg: O, master...
msg_zh: ……啊，老师，

msg: To be ever...at your side...
msg_zh: 我会永远在您身边……

msg: A proper death means returning to the Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……所谓正确的死亡，指的是回归黄金树的怀抱。

msg: Have patience. Until the time comes...and the roots call to you.
msg_zh: 耐心等吧──等到树根呼唤你的那一刻……

msg: The mausoleum prowls. Cradling the soulless demigod.
msg_zh: ……灵庙正在漫步，怀抱着无魂的半神。

msg: O Marika, Queen Eternal. He is your unwanted child.
msg_zh: 噢，“永恒女王”玛莉卡啊，\n安歇在它怀中的，是您丑陋的弃子。

msg: O Sapling! Sweet sapling of glorious gold.
msg_zh: ……小树啊，生自伟大黄金树的小树啊。

msg: Has your crystal teardrop ripened?
msg_zh: 你的结晶露滴快滴落了吗？

msg: Unthinkable. Our hallowed resting place is violated.
msg_zh: ……我们的安眠地受玷污了，怎么有这种事？

msg: To refuse the Erdtree's call to return, to live within Death... Sickening.
msg_zh: 竟然会有拒绝回归黄金树，\n死后继续活命这种事，太可怕了。

msg: The demi-humans wax wroth, now their mother's been taken...
msg_zh: ……那群母亲被掳走的亚人暴动了。

msg: Where are you, Lord Kenneth?
msg_zh: 肯尼斯大人，您在哪里？

msg: The knight...bedeviled by blood.
msg_zh: 那个骑士，为血痴狂了……

msg: Please, help me. I'm of noble blood.
msg_zh: ……唉，救救我吧。我可是贵族啊。

msg: If those hideous mongrels eat me, I'll be forever marred...
msg_zh: 一旦被那些杂种吃下肚，我会永不得……

msg: Anything but that, please! Think of the disgrace!
msg_zh: 啊，我不要沦落那种下场，不要玷污我！

msg: All I wanted was to fight. To fight, as a warrior, to the last...
msg_zh: ……我想当个战士，战斗到最后一刻。

msg: So, why? Why, O guidance of grace, will this door not open?
msg_zh: 赐福的指引啊，那为什么这扇门不开……？

msg: Maiden, dear maiden, where are you?
msg_zh: ……女巫大人啊，女巫大人，您在哪里呢？

msg: Please, take my grapes.
msg_zh: 请您收下我的葡萄。

msg: Ohh, there it is, the tower!
msg_zh: ……哦，看到了，就是那座塔吧！

msg: Finally, I can return. To our home, bathed in rays of gold!
msg_zh: 总算能回去黄金树的树脚，回到我们的故乡了！

msg: This village is done for.
msg_zh: ……这座村子已经完蛋啦。

msg: Please, even if it's just you, old Albus, hide well and still your breath.
msg_zh: 唉，艾尔帕斯老先生，\n只有您活命也好，请千万要躲好……

msg: Ahh, Lord Vyke, it seems that you were no lord, after all.
msg_zh: ……唉，维克大人，结果您不是王吗？

msg: Then where is he? Our true Lord, our Lord of Frenzied Flame.
msg_zh: 我们的王，我们的癫火之王啊，您在哪里？

msg: We beg of you, incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
msg_zh: 请熔化那分隔你我的一切事物吧。

msg: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
msg_zh: 啊，愿浑沌充满世间！

msg: Ahh, the puppets...
msg_zh: ……啊啊，傀儡……

msg: The puppets besiege us...
msg_zh: 一群傀儡，攻过来了……

msg: Raya Lucaria, hallowed hall dedicated to the study of magic.
msg_zh: ……雷亚卢卡利亚，唯我独尊的魔法学问殿堂啊。

msg: Why shut your doors to me? Am I barred from donning the crown of stone?
msg_zh: 为什么关上了大门？就因为我没有辉石头罩？

msg: Ahh, Iji, forgive me.
msg_zh: ……啊，伊吉大人，实在万分抱歉。

msg: These royal grounds were placed in our trust,
msg_zh: 大人要我们守着这块王室的领地，

msg: but we stood no chance.
msg_zh: 我们却只能眼巴巴看着，无能为力……

msg: O Celestial Globe, transmit to posterity. The wisdom of the moon and stars.
msg_zh: ……星象仪啊，将星星与月亮的法则，\n传达给后世的人们吧。

msg: And obscure, forever, the transgressions of the princess.
msg_zh: 永远隐藏公主所犯下的罪过吧。

msg: Lady Ranni, we have long awaited you.
msg_zh: ……菈妮大人，小的一直在等待。

msg: I pray for your house's swift revival.
msg_zh: 请大人复兴王室。

msg: May the full moon shine upon Caria.
msg_zh: 愿满月与卡利亚同在……

msg: Come out, one and all, from the darkness underground.
msg_zh: ……各位，快从昏暗的地底出来吧。

msg: And let us offer unto the maiden our eyes.
msg_zh: 为女巫大人献上我们的葡萄吧。

msg: Ahh, the poor fellow...gone perfectly mad.
msg_zh: ……唉，那位大人也发疯了。

msg: Love...revenge...the frenzied flame melts it all away...
msg_zh: 爱恨情仇，一切都被癫火烧熔了。

msg: It's there, somewhere.
msg_zh: ……一定藏在某个地方，

msg: Another path, leading back to the foot of the Erdtree.
msg_zh: 另外一条回去黄金树树脚的路……

msg: An ancient tunnel.
msg_zh: 那座古老的坑道……

msg: Eek... I hear a festive melody...
msg_zh: ……噫……听到庆典的歌声了……

msg: No, no, don't skin me...
msg_zh: ……不要、我不要……不要剥我的皮……

msg: My hide is filthy, I swear...
msg_zh: 我的皮已经受玷污了……

msg: Ohh, Erdtree, great Erdtree.
msg_zh: ……噢，黄金树啊，黄金树，

msg: The Golden Order itself, unwavering, stretched to the sky.
msg_zh: 屹立不摇的黄金律法啊。

msg: Confer your guidance. To our Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 请赐下指引，引导我们的艾尔登之王。

msg: To put this weary world to rights...
msg_zh: 让世界得以修复……

msg: Lord Rykard...
msg_zh: ……我的主人，拉卡德啊。

msg: If this putrid field of death is what your blasphemy would bring,
msg_zh: 如果这充满污秽的战场，\n这副景象是你所盼望的亵渎……

msg: then I can no longer abide.
msg_zh: 我就无法继续跟随你了。

msg: No one can.
msg_zh: 不会有人继续跟随你……

msg: House Marais is ruined...
msg_zh: ……玛雷家已经完了吶……

msg: Just deserts, for falling for that severed harpy.
msg_zh: 竟然会爱上那种骯脏、残身的丑女，

msg: No surprise that guilty cretin took the castle and our storied sword...
msg_zh: 还被那种罪人夺走了城和宝剑……

msg: Eek...! The wretched fools...
msg_zh: 嘻、嘻嘻……一群蠢蛋……

msg: They'll never find me.
msg_zh: 我才不会被你们找到……

msg: Heh heh... I'll survive, I swear it.
msg_zh: 嘻嘻……我一定要活下去，

msg: I'll soon be back at the Volcano Manor.
msg_zh: 活下去，回到火山官邸……

msg: Sublime, I tell you.
msg_zh: 真是高贵吶……

msg: The very first flower of Aeonia bloomed on this very spot.
msg_zh: 艾奥尼亚的初始之花，就是在这里绽放的吶。

msg: Malenia, may you blossom into a goddess.
msg_zh: ……玛莲妮亚大人，请您成为女神。

msg: Convene the festival of war.
msg_zh: ……举办祭典，战斗祭典……

msg: Honor General Radahn, with a warrior's glory.
msg_zh: 让拉塔恩将军恢复战士的名誉……

msg: It's in your hands, Sir Jerren...
msg_zh: 杰廉啊，万事拜托了……

msg: Let me see it, if only one last time.
msg_zh: ……拜托，再让我看一眼吧。

msg: Your splendid blade, dancing amongst the scarlet rot.
msg_zh: 那猩红腐败随之舞动的美妙剑舞。

msg: I'm dry, dry as a bone...
msg_zh: ……好渴，好渴啊……

msg: Fool dragon, surrender your strength.
msg_zh: ……龙啊，把你的力量给我。

msg: Let me feast on your heart.
msg_zh: 让我吃下，你的心脏……

msg: It's rotting.
msg_zh: ……全都腐败了吶。

msg: Everything, rotting scarlet.
msg_zh: 所有的一切，都陷入猩红腐败……

msg: The very earth that Caelid rests upon, and Sellia, town of sorcery.
msg_zh: 盖利德也好，魔法镇瑟利亚也罢，

msg: The end is nigh, for us all.
msg_zh: 一切都完了吶……

msg: Ohh great sun! Frigid sun of Sol!
msg_zh: ……噢，太阳啊！索尔的寒冷太阳啊！

msg: Surrender yourself to the eclipse!
msg_zh: 请您接受侵蚀吧，

msg: Grant life to the soulless bones!
msg_zh: 让无魂的尸骸，得以再世……

msg: Lord Miquella, forgive me.
msg_zh: ……万分抱歉，米凯拉大人。

msg: The sun has not been swallowed. Our prayers were lacking.
msg_zh: 太阳还未受到侵蚀，都怪我们的祈祷过于无力。

msg: Your comrade remains soulless...
msg_zh: 您的友人还是无魂的状态……

msg: I will never set my eyes upon it now...
msg_zh: ……我可能无缘见到……

msg: Your divine Haligtree...
msg_zh: 您的圣树了……

msg: Show me the path, O gentle lights.
msg_zh: ……光芒啊，照亮我的去路，

msg: The promised path to the Haligtree!
msg_zh: 引导我前往应许的圣树！

msg: Only...a little further now...
msg_zh: ……啊，路程肯定不远了。

msg: Show me the path, O gentle lights...the path to Elphael.
msg_zh: 光芒啊，照亮我的去路……\n前往艾布雷菲尔的路……

msg: Mohg, you rotten Omen. Your blood is cursed.
msg_zh: ……可恶的蒙格，流着诅咒之血的恶兆之子。

msg: Give him back.
Give Lord Miquella back!
msg_zh: ……把米凯拉大人，还来……

msg: How dare you lay hands on such precious flesh!
msg_zh: 你这种身分的东西，竟敢触碰大人……

msg: Lord of Blood, your eminence.
msg_zh: ……哦哦，伟大的鲜血君王啊。

msg: I beg you, grant me a seat at the table of the dynasty.
msg_zh: 请您开恩，将小的纳入王朝的末座。

msg: Long live the Mohgwyn Dynasty.
msg_zh: 愿蒙格温王朝，永垂不朽。

msg: Long live! The Mohgwyn Dynasty!
msg_zh: 愿蒙格温王朝，永垂不朽！

msg: Behold. The Erdtree yet stands.
msg_zh: ……看啊，黄金树依旧耸立。

msg: Tall and unwavering, mindless of the scorch of the flame of ruin.
