msg_zh: 受到灰灭火焰焚烧，还是屹立不摇。

msg: Hahah, Hahah...
msg_zh: 哈哈、哈哈哈……

msg: Then, we are yet Golden Ones.
msg_zh: 既然如此，我们就还是黄金之民……

msg: He is returned! The Lord has returned at long last.
msg_zh: ……回朝啦，引颈期盼的王，回朝啦。

msg: Our very first lord, to brandish the Elden Ring once more...
msg_zh: 我们的初始之王，会再一次展现艾尔登法环吶……

msg: Brave Tarnished. Take the plunge.
msg_zh: ……褪色者啊，跳下去吧。

msg: Of learning, and remembrance.
msg_zh: 去学习，去回想吧──

msg: Recall the arts of war. And your warrior's blood.
msg_zh: 学习交战的方法，想起身为战士的事实。

msg: One day, we'll return together.
msg_zh: 终有一天，我等将返家。

msg: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
msg_zh: 一同返回黄金树脚的故乡。

msg: There is only one tree, and only its branches.
msg_zh: 人言正统为主枝，主枝其下为旁枝，

msg: That bathe in true rays of gold.
msg_zh: 主枝之于黄金树脚，名正言顺──

msg: Not the fool Omen King.
msg_zh: 弃子的恶兆之王，不可企及；

msg: Nor the rank malformed twins.
msg_zh: 不成熟的畸形兄妹，望洋兴叹。

msg: O, we are the Golden Ones. The true and rightful heirs.
msg_zh: 噢，我们是黄金之民、正统王者之民。

msg: Our land's grown old, now ashen, and cold.
msg_zh: 纵然大地贫瘠、乌云满布，

msg: But look up, the Erdtree glows!
msg_zh: 抬头一望，大树蓊郁如常。

msg: Is there still a place for us?
msg_zh: 我等是否还能返家？

msg: In our home, bathed in rays of gold.
msg_zh: 返回黄金树脚的故乡。

msg: They will always welcome us.
msg_zh: 我等一定能返家，

msg: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
msg_zh: 返回黄金树脚的故乡。

msg: Erdtree, O Golden Circle.
msg_zh: 黄金树啊，黄金法环啊──

msg: Grant us the droplets of life,
msg_zh: 赐予我等生命露滴吧。

msg: Structure us. Reveal our path.
msg_zh: 掌管我们、引导我们吧。

msg: We are your guardians.
msg_zh: 我们是您的守卫：

msg: We swat at flies, snuff out flame,
msg_zh: 我们除去蛀虫，我们拨开火星，

msg: Repel the Omen, and undo Tarnish.
msg_zh: 我们驱散恶兆，我们屏除褪色。

msg: Blessed we, at your side, eternal.
msg_zh: 一同前进吧，受赐福之民啊。

msg: Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.
msg_zh: 一同前进吧，受赐福之民啊。

msg: Serve you we shall, in life, eternal.
msg_zh: 侍奉永生，永生侍奉吧。

msg: <battlefield warcry - rallying his own spirit by shouting the name of his home: \"For Kaiden!\" etc.>
Agheel, oh, Agheel...
msg_zh: 亚基尔啊，噢，亚基尔啊……

msg: Feral flame of Agheel, burn true...
msg_zh: 亚基尔的火焰啊，请将我燃烧殆尽吧……

msg: Whoah, whoah, whoah, whoah.
We journey on a road so far,
msg_zh: 棺木与我们同行，

msg: Death's fortune's what we seek.
msg_zh: 目的地过于遥远，旅途显得无穷──

msg: Coffin in tow, we'll find a hero
msg_zh: 我们寻找战争后英雄残存的片段，

msg: And scraps of his great deeds!
msg_zh: 我们寻找英雄的死亡命运。

msg: Whoah, whoah, whoah, whoah.
Who rode along this road before?
msg_zh: 这是谁的来路？

msg: He did, but won't anymore.
msg_zh: 这是他的来路。

msg: Whoah, whoah, whoah, woah.
He did, but won't anymore.
msg_zh: 这是他的来路。

msg: <Incoherent rambling>
<Pathetic nonverbal wail that seems to suggest \"Stop! Just go away!\">
<Pathetic nonverbal wail when he suddenly notices a stranger nearby>
Erdtree, O Golden Circle.
Grant us the droplets of life,
Structure us. Reveal our path.
We are your guardians.
We swat at flies, snuff out flame,
Repel the Omen, and undo Tarnish.
Blessed we, at your side, eternal.
Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.
Serve you we shall, in life, eternal.
<Incoherent rambling. Very quiet, but sounds acutely irritated and on the verge of breaking out in madness.>
<The wings of a fly reverberate inside his headpiece, and it becomes too much to tolerate - he makes this sound as his psyche snaps.>
<Sound of swinging a giant pickaxe. A slow swing with much weight. Several versions.>
<A shout as he holds his pickaxe high, mustering strength. Several versions.>
<Loud snoring as he sleeps.>
<A roar as he releases the all the strength that he was holding inside. A growly warcry.>
<He screams to intimidate his foe as he draws his sword.>
<A shout as he holds his sword high, mustering strength: whoaahhh! Etc.>
<Feeling bored and exhausted, his jaw drops open and this sound emanates from deep down his throat. It is a low bellowing that can be heard echoing around the vicinity.>
<Loud snoring as he sleeps.>
Blessed Erdtree...
msg_zh: 黄金树啊……

msg: O hallowed Runes...
msg_zh: 我等的卢恩啊……

msg: <Invigorating shouts for repeated rapier thrusts. Sharply enunciated, suggesting proper training.>
You're a Tarnished, I can see it.
msg_zh: ……你是褪色者吧？

msg: And I can also see...
msg_zh: 而且看起来……

msg: That you're not after my throat.
msg_zh: 好像不会攻击我。

msg: Then why not purchase a little something?
msg_zh: 既然如此，要不要买些什么？

msg: I am Kalé. Purveyor of fine goods.
msg_zh: 我叫咖列。\n可能看不太出来，我是做生意的。

msg: What is it? Still going to purchase something?
msg_zh: ……怎么？还想买些什么吗？

msg: Wait, weren't you...?
msg_zh: ……你是先前的……

msg: Well, you're back. Care to buy something?
msg_zh: 又过来啦？那要不要买些什么？

msg: Ah, it's you again.
msg_zh: ……啊，果然是你啊……

msg: Always a pleasure. Care to purchase anything?
msg_zh: 大常客，要买些什么啊？

msg: Good-bye for now.
msg_zh: 再会了。

msg: Good-bye. Nice to do business.
msg_zh: 和你做生意很愉快，再会了。

msg: I am of a nomadic people.
msg_zh: 我出身流浪民族。

msg: Selling wares as I travel.
msg_zh: 一边旅行，一边做生意。

msg: The land has been tainted by madness since the shattering of the Elden Ring.
msg_zh: 艾尔登法环破碎之后，\n这块土地的人，脑袋几乎都变得不正常。

msg: It's only Tarnished like yourself who keep things from drying up entirely.
msg_zh: 好在有你们褪色者，\n我才得以摆脱毫无收入的下场。

msg: Let's say you're a very welcome customer.
msg_zh: 总之，之后也请多加惠顾了。

msg: You know, if you can spare the runes,
msg_zh: 啊，你手边的卢恩要是还够的话，

msg: you should buy yourself a crafting kit.
msg_zh: 我建议你买下工具皮袋。

msg: A crafting kit allows you to make basic items on your own.
msg_zh: 有了那只皮袋，就能自己制作简单的道具。

msg: Essential really, if you intend to survive out here for any duration.
msg_zh: 要在这块土地奋战下去，颇需要这类东西。

msg: The kit costs a bundle, and I admit, I do take my cut.
msg_zh: 那确实有点价位，卖出去我也能赚个一笔……

msg: But the important thing is that you survive. Every customer counts, after all.
msg_zh: 但我的初衷，是希望重要的客人能活下去。

msg: I'm glad you took my warning to heart.
msg_zh: 谢谢你相信我的话。

msg: You've made an excellent choice.
msg_zh: 这笔生意，我谈得很愉快。

msg: There are others of my people who yet survive in these lands.
msg_zh: 我们幸存的族人，\n应该也在这块土地上讨生活。

msg: If the mood takes you when you meet one, then offer them some trade, won't you?
msg_zh: 要是你遇到他们，有兴趣的话，\n和他们买点东西吧。

msg: My people, wanderers all, have long been spurned by the grace of gold.
msg_zh: ……我们流浪民族从古至今，\n都不受黄金赐福的青睐。

msg: Which is why we cannot settle, but instead are forced into this pitiful, unceasing journey.
msg_zh: 因此我们被迫四处为家，过着困顿的旅行生活。

msg: But thanks to that, things are not so different for us now, though the Elden Ring is shattered.
msg_zh: 在艾尔登法环破碎之后，我们还能保有神智，\n可能这就是原因吧。

msg: I think this makes us kindred spirits of sorts.
msg_zh: 光这点看来，褪色者和流浪民族，

msg: Your people, the Tarnished, and mine.
msg_zh: 我们两个还颇类似的。

msg: I suppose I shouldn't keep this from you.
msg_zh: ……先和你说一声好了。

msg: I'm thinking of moving elsewhere for a time.
msg_zh: 再过一阵子，我会离开这个地方。

msg: My people are wanderers all, which I won't deny is one reason...
msg_zh: 流浪民族就该四处旅行，这也是理由……

msg: But I've done all I can here, in search of the Great Caravan.
msg_zh: 但主要是因为继续待在这里，\n好像也没办法得到大商队的情报。

msg: Perhaps you don't need to hear this, but...
msg_zh: 嗯，这个警告也许对你没有意义……

msg: See that no harm comes to my kin.
msg_zh: 记住，绝对不要攻击我们的族人。

msg: We have a saying, we wanderers.
msg_zh: 流浪民族有一条族规：

msg: Lament not your solitude. Expect no sympathy. No regard. Nothing.
msg_zh: “孤单也很好──即使受人轻视、被人抛弃，\n也不必想着谋求什么。”

msg: But if anyone dares harm us, show them no mercy.
msg_zh: “唯独那些伤害我们的，绝不能轻易放过。”

msg: That is our code, so to speak.
msg_zh: 要说的话，这就是我们的律法。

msg: Just the way we are. Deeply... unforgiving.
msg_zh: 这民族听起来很执着、很烦人吧？

msg: Ah, by the way...
msg_zh: 话说回来……

msg: Have you heard of the Great Caravan?
msg_zh: 你有听过“大商队”吗？

msg: ...I see, more's the pity.
msg_zh: ……没有吗？可惜了。

msg: Well, even we had a place to call home, once.
msg_zh: 我们以前也有等同故乡的存在，

msg: The Great Caravan, they called it… but it's been lost to us for ages.
msg_zh: 就是那个“大商队”……\n只是不知不觉中消失不见，很久没人看过。

msg: I've been searching for it as long as I can remember.
msg_zh: 我一直在寻找大商队的下落。

msg: And with a name like that,
msg_zh: 既然都有这么响亮名字了，

msg: You'd hope they kept some fine goods there, eh.
msg_zh: 说不定能看见数也数不尽的稀世珍宝啊。

msg: The howl of a wolf, in the Mistwood...
msg_zh: ……雾林里有狼嚎……

msg: I suppose he must still be skulking about...
msg_zh: 这样啊，是他……

msg: Mmm, I know. Why not meet him for yourself?
msg_zh: ……对了，应该介绍给你认识。

msg: Next time you hear the wolf's howl, make this signal right under the source.
msg_zh: 你之后听到狼嚎，\n在那声音的正下方打出暗号吧。

msg: Oh, don't fret, there is nothing to fear.
msg_zh: ……没事，这没有什么。

msg: I just have an inkling the two of you might hit it off.
msg_zh: 只是觉得你们应该处得来。

msg: Oh, by the way. There's someone you should meet.
msg_zh: 对了，有个人我想介绍给你认识。

msg: If you happen to hear a wolf's howl, make this signal under the source.
msg_zh: 你之后如果有听到狼嚎，\n在那声音的正下方打出暗号吧。

msg: Oh, then you met Blaidd, did you?
msg_zh: 哦，你见过布莱泽了？

msg: Wonderful. I'm glad I pointed you in his direction.
msg_zh: 那很好啊，我从中牵线也有价值了。

msg: He's boorish, blunt, and couldn't find his nose with both hands, but he's a good egg.
msg_zh: 他态度不怎么友善，为人笨拙，\n找东西的能力也差到令人发噱……但人不错。

msg: I think the two of you are sure to find the best in one another.
msg_zh: 希望认识彼此对你们来说，都是一件好事。

msg: Ah, good to see you.
msg_zh: ……你来啦。

msg: I knew leaving the sign would be worth the trouble.
msg_zh: 石文放得有价值了。

msg: Thought I'd set up shop here for a time.
msg_zh: 我会暂时待在这里做生意。

msg: A pleasure, as ever. Care to purchase anything?
msg_zh: 大常客，要买些什么啊？

msg: We meet again, I see.
msg_zh: ……又见到面了。

msg: It's me, Kalé.
msg_zh: ……是我，咖列。

msg: Thought I'd set up shop here for a time.
msg_zh: 我会暂时待在这里做生意。

msg: Right then. Care to purchase anything?
msg_zh: 要不要买些什么？

msg: Have you seen a crow around here by any chance?
msg_zh: ……你有没有在这附近看过乌鸦？

msg: You know, a burial crow, with a letter fastened to its claw?
msg_zh: 那种鸟爪上绑着信的墓地乌鸦。

msg: Well, if you do set eyes upon it, I'll buy that letter from you, no question.
msg_zh: 要是你有看到，希望你能把它带的信卖给我。

msg: I'd give you a generous sum for it, of course.
msg_zh: 当然，之后买东西会给你一点优惠。

msg: My thanks. I've been wanting to get my hands on this.
msg_zh: 谢谢，我一直很想得到这封信。

msg: And I was willing to pay whatever was needed. Your reward, as promised.
msg_zh: 我们说好的，全是优惠价，挑你喜欢的吧。

msg: So, about the letter you brought me...
msg_zh: 关于你拿来的那封信，

msg: It's just as I suspected, it features a cryptogram of my people.
msg_zh: 和我料想的一样，\n上面写着流浪民族使用的暗语。

msg: And I'm sure it's come from wherever the Great Caravan disappeared to.
msg_zh: ……这可能是来自消失不见的大商队，\n上头标注的或许是他们的所在地。

msg: This could be my chance to get close to it.
msg_zh: 说不定我离他们越来越近了。

msg: Thanks to you.
msg_zh: 幸亏有你帮忙。

msg: Once I decipher that cryptogram, I'll be packing up shop again.
msg_zh: ……等我解开暗语之后，就会离开这里。

msg: Don't worry, I'll leave a sign that shows where I've gone.
msg_zh: 对，我会用石文留下目的地。

msg: With any luck, I'll see you there, eh.
msg_zh: 要是有缘分，应该会再见到面吧。

msg: I've always preferred my own company, to that of other people's...
msg_zh: ……其实，我对于孤独一人这件事很满意。

msg: And I don't have any burning questions I wish to ask my ancestors...
msg_zh: 而且事到如今，\n我也不是有什么话想对祖先说……

msg: But there's something I need to know.
msg_zh: 我只是想知道──

msg: My roots.
msg_zh: 我的根在哪？

msg: I want to know who I am. Where I came from. Where I'm headed.
msg_zh: 我到底是谁、来自哪里、要往哪里前进？

msg: Ah, good to see you.
msg_zh: ……你来啦。

msg: I knew leaving the sign would be worth the trouble.
msg_zh: 石文留得有价值了。

msg: The shop is all set up.
msg_zh: 当然，我还是有在做生意。

msg: A pleasure as ever. Care to purchase anything?
msg_zh: 大常客，要买些什么啊？

msg: Oh yes, about the cryptogram from the letter...
msg_zh: 对，关于那封信的暗语，

msg: I think it's pointing underneath the capital.
msg_zh: 上头写的位置，好像是在那座王城的地底。

msg: I think it's pointing here, underneath the capital.
msg_zh: 上头写的位置，好像是在这座王城的地底。

msg: But I'm perplexed as to the path to take down there.
msg_zh: 可是我完全不知道怎样才能进到地底。

msg: Well, the journey can wait, I suppose.
msg_zh: 嗯，反正也不急于一时。

msg: I'll settle here for the time being, and start looking into it.
msg_zh: 我打算多花点时间调查看看。

msg: Where...did you find this letter?
msg_zh: ……你是在哪里找到这封信的？

msg: I can't imagine how it ended up there...
msg_zh: ……原来，在那种地方……

msg: But the well might just lead under the capital.
msg_zh: ……说不定和那口井相连啊──

msg: To the spot indicated by the cryptogram from the letter.
msg_zh: 信纸上暗号所写的，王城地底的某个地方。

msg: Seems like an odd place for the Great Caravan...
msg_zh: ……大商队会在那种地方，是有点奇怪……

msg: But no amount of thinking will change anything. I'll be heading straight there, after some preparation.
msg_zh: 想破头也没用。\n调查完之后，直接过去看看吧。

msg: Once again, I find myself in your debt.
msg_zh: 又受到你的帮忙了。

msg: Take this, as a token of my appreciation.
msg_zh: 这是谢礼，收下吧。

msg: It's not from my usual stock, but something rather more special.
msg_zh: 是非卖品，相当特殊的东西。

msg: I hope you can join me at the Great Caravan, in fact.
msg_zh: 希望下一次我会在大商队和你碰面，

msg: Who knows what wonders there might be to trade?
msg_zh: 说不定到时候，我的生意规模会变得更大！

msg: Ah, you, is it...
msg_zh: ……啊，是你啊……

msg: Did you see? What they did to my ancestors?
msg_zh: 我们祖先的模样，你看到了吗？

msg: The whole clan, buried alive. Sick. Maddened. Husks of themselves.
msg_zh: 一整个民族被活埋进地底，病的病，疯的疯。

msg: Have you heard their moans? They're hardly human anymore.
msg_zh: 那一阵阵，不像人类发出的悲叹声，\n你有听见吗？

msg: They think we worship the Three Fingers? That we called the maddening sickness down upon them?
msg_zh: ……我们是参指的信徒？是招来狂病的祸首？

msg: Well. If that's what they expect from us, then that's what they shall get from us!
msg_zh: 好啊，那好啊！我就让一切变成事实吧！

msg: The world of grace and its people should have been content to see us sink between the cracks.
msg_zh: 受到赐福的世界啊、人们啊，\n你们要轻视我们、抛弃我们都没关系。

msg: But to have intruded upon our solace... Having broken us upon their whims...
msg_zh: 只要你们影响、践踏我们的孤独，

msg: I'll never forgive any of you.
msg_zh: 我就绝对不会原谅你们。

msg: I'm sorry, but we won't be trading any longer.
msg_zh: 对你很抱歉，但我不会再和你做生意了。

msg: And...I think it's time we parted ways.
msg_zh: ……就此永别吧。

msg: Guided by grace, you seek to become Elden Lord.
msg_zh: 受到赐福指引，目标当上艾尔登之王──

msg: I don't want anything to do with you Tarnished lot any more.
msg_zh: 我已经不能认同你们这些褪色者的存在。

msg: I should apologise to you.
msg_zh: ……我该和你道歉。

msg: It's my fault that we stumbled into this mess.
msg_zh: 让你配合我东奔西跑，最后变成这种结果。

msg: I'm sorry.
msg_zh: 抱歉啊。

msg: I'm sorry, but we won't be trading any longer.
msg_zh: 对你很抱歉，但我不会再和你做生意了。

msg: I think it's time we parted ways.
msg_zh: 就此永别吧。

msg: Wait, what's that?
msg_zh: ……你等一下。

msg: That burn...
msg_zh: 你身上的那个烧伤……

msg: Your eyes...
msg_zh: 你的眼睛……

msg: You've inherited the flame of frenzy!
msg_zh: ……你受赐癫火了吗！

msg: Oh, that's it... That's what I need...
msg_zh: 啊啊，我……我也想要癫火……

msg: To melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
msg_zh: 能把诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法，\n所有的一切都熔化的……

msg: The yellow flame of chaos...
msg_zh: 黄色浑沌火焰……

msg: Oh, that's it... That's what I need...
msg_zh: 啊啊，我……我也想要癫火……

msg: To melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
msg_zh: 能把诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法，\n所有的一切都熔化的……

msg: The yellow flame of chaos...
msg_zh: 黄色浑沌火焰……

msg: O Three Fingers, throw wide the door.
msg_zh: ……参指啊，请您打开门吧。

msg: Please, bestow unto me the yellow flame of chaos.
msg_zh: 请将黄色浑沌火焰赐予我吧。

msg: A frenzied flame to melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
msg_zh: 赐予我将诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法──\n所有的一切都熔化的癫火吧。

msg: May chaos take the world.
msg_zh: 全为了让浑沌充满世间。

msg: May chaos take the world.
msg_zh: 全为了让浑沌充满世间。

msg: The frenzied flame...burned me...
msg_zh: ……癫火……也只有燃烧我……

msg: I was not... a suitable home.
msg_zh: ……我不是……对的容器……

msg: Unknown warrior...
msg_zh: ……不知名的……人啊……

msg: You, who reached the Three Fingers' abyss...
msg_zh: ……来到……参指深渊的人啊……

msg: Tell the one... Who will become Lord...
msg_zh: ……转达给……必定为王的人……

msg: Divest yourself of everything, and head to the door.
msg_zh: ……卸下一切……走向门……

msg: Divest yourself of everything...
msg_zh: ……卸下一切……

msg: And pray to the Lord...
msg_zh: ……记得……请求王……

msg: To melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
msg_zh: ……把诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法……\n所有的一切都熔化……

msg: May chaos...take the world.
msg_zh: ……让浑沌充满世间……

msg: The frenzied flame...burned me...
msg_zh: ……癫火……也只有燃烧我……

msg: I was not... a suitable home.
msg_zh: ……我不是……对的容器……

msg: Dear Lord, Lord of Chaos...
msg_zh: ……王啊，浑沌之王啊……

msg: Melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
msg_zh: 熔化诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法……\n熔化所有的一切吧……

msg: May chaos...take the world.
msg_zh: ……让浑沌充满世间……

msg: Are you offering that drink to me?
msg_zh: ……你要给我酒吗？

msg: Oh, no, what do you take me for? I am an honest merchant of good standing!
msg_zh: 嗯，我不是那种商人，不接受贿赂。

msg: [pause]
Oh, for heaven's sake, I jest.
msg_zh: ……我开玩笑的。

msg: That's a very kind gesture, and I accept.
msg_zh: 如果是单纯表示心意的礼物，我愿意收下。

msg: A pleasure as ever, old friend.
msg_zh: 之后再请多关照了，大常客。

msg: Urgh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: What's the matter with you?
msg_zh: 你怎么了？

msg: Have you gone mad?
msg_zh: 你也变得不正常了吗？

msg: I knew you for a highwayman all along.
msg_zh: 唉，原来你的真面目是盗匪啊。

msg: Then it's time you learnt a lesson.
msg_zh: 就让你知道，

msg: Our people will not stand for your barbarism!
msg_zh: 攻击流浪民族，下场会怎样！

msg: Is that all you were, mate?
msg_zh: 你的真面目还真是无聊。

msg: Is this...how it ends?
msg_zh: 啊，我会死吗……

msg: I'll never find...
msg_zh: 我还什么都没找到……

msg: <takes damage>
So you're just like the others?
msg_zh: 你也一样？

msg: Another would-be oppressor to my people.
msg_zh: 想要践踏我们吗？

msg: I see. I see how it is! You were one of them all along!
msg_zh: 唉，我懂了。你是属于那一边啊──

msg: Trying to trample us underfoot, you grace-given bastard?
msg_zh: 那些践踏我们，受到赐福的恶意化身！

msg: I'll never forgive your kind...
msg_zh: 我绝对不会原谅你们……

msg: Your kind...will all be razed clean.
msg_zh: ……你们最好都熔化到尸骨无存，

msg: By the frenzied flame...of chaos...
msg_zh: 受浑沌癫火焚烧吧。

msg: Ahh, welcome...dear customer.
msg_zh: 啊……客人啊，欢迎光临。

msg: Yes, right this way... Right this way...
msg_zh: 这里……我在这里、在这里……

msg: Welcome...
msg_zh: 客人啊……

msg: Valued customer... Come trade, in our wandering emporium.
msg_zh: 欢迎光临……流浪民族的商店……

msg: Please, buy something...
msg_zh: 买些什么吧……

msg: I'm hungry. I've been hungry so long. Please.
msg_zh: 拜托了……我已经饿了好几天……

msg: Ahh, hello.
msg_zh: 啊……客人啊，

msg: How nice of you to stop by, again.
msg_zh: 您又来光顾了啊……

msg: Please, buy something, won't you?
msg_zh: 买些什么吧……

msg: You're new around here.
msg_zh: ……我没见过你。

msg: Surprised you found me in my little nook.
msg_zh: 待在这么偏僻的地方，居然还能找到我。

msg: No matter, no matter. Your money's as good as anyone else's.
msg_zh: 嗯，也罢，总之横竖都是客人。

msg: Why don't you take a look at my wares?
msg_zh: 那来谈谈生意吧。

msg: Oh, but...
msg_zh: 只不过……

msg: Don't ask me how I got my hands on them, eh.
msg_zh: 商品的来源，就别追问了。

msg: Ah, back again are we?
msg_zh: ……你又来了啊。

msg: Not everyone can tell how good my wares are. You've a discerning eye, you have.
msg_zh: 明白我商品的价值，很有眼光嘛……

msg: Mm? Ohh...
A...custom...er?
msg_zh: 客、人吗？

msg: Hello...again...
G-good...customer...
msg_zh: 又来、光顾……

msg: Hello...again...
You...g-good customer...
msg_zh: 常来、谢谢……

msg: G-good...bye...
Till nex...t-time...
msg_zh: 欢迎、再来……

msg: Buying or selling?
msg_zh: ……做买卖吗？

msg: Not finished yet?
msg_zh: ……还有事吗？

msg: Trade again?
msg_zh: ……还要做买卖吗？

msg: Be well.
msg_zh: ……保重啊。

msg: Ooh, dear.
msg_zh: 噫！

msg: Oh, dear, terribly sorry.
msg_zh: ……啊，不、不好意思……

msg: Are you here as a customer?
msg_zh: 您是客人吗……？

msg: Oh...
msg_zh: 请、请问……

msg: Is there anything wrong?
msg_zh: 我有哪里不周到吗……？

msg: Ooh!
msg_zh: 噫噫！

msg: Ah, oh, terribly sorry...
msg_zh: ……啊，不、不好意思……

msg: I-I didn't realise you came back.
msg_zh: 您再度莅临了啊。

msg: I-I must apologise.
msg_zh: 万分抱、抱歉……

msg: I'm afraid I've very little to offer.
msg_zh: 商品不是很尽善尽美……

msg: Oh, nothing that suits your tastes, then?
msg_zh: 您、您不满意吗？

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 呵、呵呵……

msg: What do you need?
msg_zh: ……你是客人吗？

msg: I don't want any trouble.
msg_zh: ……别做出节外生枝的举动。

msg: You again?
msg_zh: ……又来了？

msg: I don't want any trouble.
msg_zh: ……别做出节外生枝的举动。

msg: All done?
msg_zh: ……好了？

msg: Well, be on your way, then.
msg_zh: 那就快点离开。

msg: Well…
It's been an age since I've seen a customer.
msg_zh: 已经很久没有客人上门了。

msg: How can I help, here at the end of the earth?
msg_zh: ……你跑到这么偏僻的地方，求的是什么？

msg: Anything else for you?
msg_zh: ……又想买些什么吗？

msg: Back already?
msg_zh: ……你又来啦。

msg: Unusual fellow, aren't we.
msg_zh: 说来你还真是奇特。

msg: Did this aged merchant have something that caught your eye?
msg_zh: 这些老商人的货物，有什么吸引到你的目光吗？

msg: Have a safe journey.
msg_zh: ……保重啊。

msg: Is someone there?
msg_zh: ……有人在那里吗？

msg: A customer?
msg_zh: ……想做买卖？

msg: Well, how long has it been.
msg_zh: 这件事，久远到令人怀念啊。

msg: Something else?
msg_zh: ……还想做买卖吗？

msg: Well, there you are again.
msg_zh: ……哦，你又来了。

msg: Divorce from one's trade does not come easily.
msg_zh: 世袭职业真像影子，分也分不开啊。

msg: Agh!
msg_zh: 噫。

msg: Please! Stop this, good customer!
msg_zh: 不要！不要打，客人！

msg: Bollocks! What the devil's wrong with you!
msg_zh: 畜生！你有什么问题？

msg: Dirty little thief...
msg_zh: ……你这下贱的强盗。

msg: You dirty little thief...
msg_zh: ……下贱的强盗……

msg: Melt away with the rest of it...
msg_zh: ……燃烧吧、熔化吧……

msg: Owgh!
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: What are you playing at! Stop this!
msg_zh: 你干什么！住手！

msg: That's the last straw, you bloody thief!
msg_zh: 混账，少瞧不起人了，你这强盗！

msg: Stay away, Us wanderers have had enough.
msg_zh: ……别对我们流浪民族动手。

msg: How dare you trample us.
msg_zh: ……别以为事情就这样结束……

msg: You filthy thief.
msg_zh: ……你这强盗……

msg: A-agh!
msg_zh: 噫。

msg: S...stop
msg_zh: 不、要……

msg: P...please, s...stop
msg_zh: 客、人啊……住、手……

msg: E...enough
msg_zh: 够、了……

msg: M...melt away...
msg_zh: 熔化、吧……

msg: G-good...bye...
msg_zh: 永别、了……

msg: Dear...customer...
msg_zh: 客、人啊……

msg: But, why...?
msg_zh: 为什、么……？

msg: Kind...sir...
msg_zh: 客、人啊……

msg: Madame...
msg_zh: 客、人啊……

msg: You've always...
been...too kind...
msg_zh: 常来、谢谢……

msg: Ngh!
msg_zh: 唔。

msg: Enough.
msg_zh: 住手。

msg: Another thief? Fine.
msg_zh: ……遇上强盗啊，那没办法。

msg: What folly.
msg_zh: ……无聊。

msg: How in the...
Blast...
msg_zh: 怎么可能……

msg: Eh!
msg_zh: 噫。

msg: Please!
msg_zh: 噫噫！快住手！

msg: Please, stop this!
msg_zh: 请您快住手！

msg: It was me! It's all my fault!
msg_zh: 我道歉！我会道歉！

msg: Please, don't hurt me!
msg_zh: 请不要这样对我！

msg: I said don't hurt me!
msg_zh: 我不是说住手了吗！

msg: Aaargh!
msg_zh: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

msg: I warned you. I told you to stop...
msg_zh: ……所以我才说，要你住手啊……

msg: How could you...
msg_zh: ……好过分……

msg: What have I ever done?
msg_zh: 我有做了什么吗……？

msg: Heh heh...
msg_zh: 呵、呵呵……

msg: Ow!
msg_zh: 噫。

msg: I knew it, you dirty scoundrel!
msg_zh: 你果然非善类！

msg: There was something off about you from the start!
msg_zh: 打从一开始我就觉得可疑！

msg: Hurry up and die! You wretched thief!
msg_zh: 去死吧！臭强盗！

msg: Rotten scoundrels...
msg_zh: ……真的是……

msg: Every last one of 'em...
msg_zh: 没有人信得过……

msg: Agh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: Enough of that.
msg_zh: ……别再动手了。

msg: Surely you are no highwayman.
msg_zh: 除非你是夺人财物的盗匪。

msg: A pity, this.
msg_zh: ……太可悲了。

msg: Our descent into savagery.
msg_zh: 最近只碰见这种人物。

msg: You've never heard?
msg_zh: 难道没有人提醒过你，

msg: Of the swiftness of a wanderer's fury.
msg_zh: 流浪民族到底有多恐怖？

msg: Offed by a highwayman?
msg_zh: 竟然会败给盗匪……

msg: I must've lost my touch…
msg_zh: 岁月不饶人啊……

msg: Agh!
msg_zh: 呜。

msg: Stop this at once.
msg_zh: ……停下来。

msg: And I will forgive you.
msg_zh: 现在停手，我能不追究。

msg: You'd come this far for your pillaging?
msg_zh: ……在这种地方也会遇上强盗。

msg: No different than a plague, your kind.
msg_zh: 你们真的是无所不在。

msg: I've heard enough from you. Be gone.
msg_zh: 真烦人，消失吧。

msg: All that I wanted was solitude…
msg_zh: ……就连唯一的孤独，也不能拥有吗……？
